bdag tu bzung ba'o/ a kA ro mu khaM/ a kA ro mu khaM ni gtsor byed pa ste/ sarba d+harmA NaM/ chos thams cad la sems nyid nga rgyal ba ste phung po la sogs pa rtogs pa snyam pa'o// thog ma nyid nas ma skyes pa de lta bur rab tu rtogs zhes pa'o/ A d+ya nut+pan+na twA ta/ de rgyu las byung

na thog ma nas ma skyes pa'i tshul gyi/ oM sku'i bdag nyid sprul sku/ AHgsung gi bdag nyid longs sku/ hU~M thugs kyi bdag nyid chos sku/ shes rab phaT swA hA/ snying rje// mthu chen rgyal po sde bzhi la// phyi mtshams srung ba'i phrin las bcol// sku bzhi

!/ sku bzhi ni/ dgongs pa myang 'das kyi sku yin pas/ thugs bud+d+ha dang mnyam/ sbyor ba khams gsum na mdzad pa'i sku yin pas sems can gyi don byed pa dang/ longs sku yin pas rgyan rnams kyi brgyan pa dang/ sprul sku yin pas rigs pa'i rgyal ba'i phrin las mdzad pa'o/

dpal brgyad ldan pas na/ de yang brgyad ni/ yul 'khor srung gi dpal gnyis ni/ 'jig rten mkhyen pa'i dpal dang/ rang bzhin 'khor gyi dpal lo// 'phags skyes po'i ni/ rang bzhin gnas kyi dang/ drag po 'dul ba'i dpa' gnyis so// spyan mi bzang gi ni/ dug lnga

sel ba'i dang// ye shes sgrol ba'i dpal gnyis so// rnam sras kyi ni/ ye shes mdzod kyi dang/ rin chen gter gyi dpal gnyis so// gling bzhi'i sems can rgyal chen bzhi'i chab 'og na gnas pas 'bangs so yin/ lcags ri gcig gi nang na gnas pas khyim mtshes yin/ rgyal

po'i 'bangs yin pas phur khyim dang 'dra ba yin no// phyogs bzhir mchod rten gzhal yas khang// shar na dri za yul 'khor skyong/ rang gi yul dang 'khor la mtshan du btags pa ste/ rang gi yul dang 'khor stong phrag brgyad cu dang/ rang gi gnas bsrung

bas na yul 'khor skyong ngo// lho na grul bum 'phags skyes po// gnas dang gzhal yas khang las mtshan du gsol te/ rat+na bdun las grub pa'i gzhal yas khang khyad par du 'phags pa'i nang du skyes pas na 'phags skyes po/ sku gzi byin gzhan

las khyad par du 'phags pa'o// nub na klu rgyal spyan mi bzang/ 'khor las ming tags pa dang/ klu las mthong ba'i dug yod pas mig mi bzang zhes bya/ yang na rgyal po 'dis gnod sbyin nag po la sogs pa'i spyan 'jor bar byed pas na'o/ byang na gnod sbyin

rnam thos sras/ pha ma las btags te/ yab drang srong rnam pa mang po thos pa'i sras yin pas na rnam thos sras so// ma lha mo dpal mo'i sras yin/ dpal lha mo sgeg mo dang/ drang srong rnam pa mang po thos pa gnyis yid kyis bshos pa'o// de yin/ oM b+h+r-iSh+ta raSh+tA ya swA hA/

shar na yul 'khor skyong dkar po pi wang 'dzin pa'o// dpal gnyis te/ thugs 'jig rten mkhyen pa'i dpal dang/ phyag gi pi wang rang bzhin 'khor gyi dpal gnyis so// oM bi rU D+ha kA ya swA hA/ lhor 'phags skyes po mthing ga ral gri bsnams pa'o// rang bzhin gyis dpal

rat+na'i khang pa dang/ drag pos 'dul pa'i phyag gi ral gris gshin rje 'dul ba'o// oM bi ru pak+ShA ya swA hA/ nub tu mig mi bzang dmar po sprul zhags can/ dug lnga sel ba'i dpal sbrul zhags gis klu'i dug sel/ phyag g.yas na ye shes sgron me bsnams pa ni/ ye shes

sgron me'i dpal lo// oM bai shra ba NA ya swA hA/ byang rnam sras ne'u le'i rgyal mtshan 'dzin pa ni g.yon pa ste/ rin chen mdzod kyi dpal lo// ye shes gter gyi dpal ni/ g.yas na rin po che'i ring bsrel mchod rten no// bskyed nas spyan drangs bstim byas nas/

mtho gzhal yas khang dang shing ring rgyal por bskyed/ rang bzhin gnas nas spyan drangs te gnyis su med par bstim/ chu dang 'o ma 'dres pa ltar bsam mo// mchod nas bstod de phrin las bcol/ spaus dang me tog la sogs gtor ma dang mchod pa gtsang mas mchod/

che ba'i yon tan la/ bstod pa bya/ phyi mtshams bsrung bar phrin las bcol zhing gnyer gtad/ mtshams ma thon bar du bsrung bar/ smon lam btab nas phyi mtshams bcad/ de sgrub khang nas phyi rol du dri chu 'dor sa nas phyir mi 'gro/ !/ phyi mtshams rgyal

po'i tho las phyir mi 'da' bar nang du lus ngag/ de las spyod lam bag yang bya/ !/ sems dpa' y-i ni skyil krung gis// 'jam pa'i ltan la 'dug nas ni/ !/ de bzhin nyid stong pa dang/ kun snang snying rje bsgom/ rgyu'i ting nges hU~M mthing nag

'bar ba gcig bsgom/ de'i byin rlabs las ma sUr+ya maN+Da la zhes brjod pas ma las nyi dkyil du gyur pa'i steng du hU~M mthing nag 'bar ba gcig bsam/ hU~M s+pha ra Na phaT ces spros pas/ hU~M mang pos 'jig rten gang bas dus gsum gyi sangs rgyas kyi thugs dam rgyud bskul/

sems can gyi don byas/ saM ha ra Na hU~M brjod pas hU~M snga ma la thim/ hU~M badzra s+pha ra Na phaT ces brjod pas phyag mtshan rdo rjer gyur/ de 'phros 'dus pas hU~M badzra hU~M d+h+r-i ka dzaH zhes brjod pas rang zhe sdang rdo rje zhal gsum phyag drug pa/ g.yas dkar g.yon dmar dbus dang sku mdog

mthing nag 'bar ba bskal me'i klong na bzhugs par bsams/ de la oM sarba ta thA ga ta kA ya/ la sogs pas sku gsung thugs byin gyis brlabs che ba'i nga rgyal bskyed do// zhe sdang rdo rje'i ting 'dzin du// gnas nas gnas bsrung rnam par bsam// shrI

badzra d+h+r-i ka hU~M dzaH !/ nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor dbus gnas pas/ dbyar gyi sprin phung lta bu nyid// bskal pa'i me dpung rab tu 'bar// g.yas brkyangs bar ni rab tu gnas/ !/ zhe sdang rdo rje'i thugs ka

nas/ ma sUr+ya maN+Da la zhes brjod pas ma las nyi dkyil bskyed pa'i steng du hU~M gi 'phro 'du las/ hU~M kA ra badzra ma hA kro d+ha hU~M zhes brjod pas/ khro bo hU~M kA ra bskyed nas hU~M kA ra zhe sdang rdo rje'i mdun du bka' nod pa'i tshul du rdo rje 'chang chen po'i ci bka' stsal zhes zhus pa las/ zhe

sdang rdo rjes/ oM sum b+ha ni sum b+ha hU~M/ gr-i h+Na gr-i h+Na hU~M/ gr-i h+Na pa ya gr-i h+Na pa ya hU~M/ A na ya ho/ b+ha ga bAn/ bid+yA rA dzA hU~M phaT/ ces pa'i sngags bzlas pa'i don ni/ hU~M gA ras phyogs mtshams su gdan thing zhig par bka' stsal/ hU~M kA ra'i thugs ka nas Tak+ki rA dza badzra ma hA kro d+ha hU~M

zhes brjod/ khro bo TAk+k-i rA dzar khrongs kyis bskyed nas/ bka' nod pa'i tshul du rdo rje 'chang chen po ci bka' stsal zhes pa las/ hU~M kA ras sum b+ha ni'i sngags lan cig zlas pa'i don ni/ phyogs mtshams su gdan thing zhig par bka' stsal nas/ nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor zhes pas

bskul lo// mtshams khro bo dmar ba'i spyan/ zhal gsum mche gtsigs rnam par bsgyur// phyag gnyis hU~M gi rgya bcings te// dang po rdo rje dril bu 'dzin// g.yas gnyis lcags kyu ral gri 'dzin/ g.yon gnyis dgra

s+t+wa zhags pa 'dzin/ !/ 'di 'dra'i gzugs ni bsam byas nas// rang gis de la bka' stsal to/ !/ hU~M kA ras TAk+ki rA dza la tho ba dang lcags kyu gtad nas/ T+wak+ki rA dza a b+hi ShIny+tsa zhes dbang bskur de nas TAk+ki rA dzas tho ba dang lcags kyu thogs

nas/ rdo rje'i 'gros dang chas nas sum b+ha ni'i sngags bzlas shing sems can chen po rnams kyi steng du phyogs skyong bcu gdan du btong bar byas te/ shar phyogs nas brgya byin pho mo gnyis snying ga nas lcags kyus bzung nas/ tho bas myos se myos se tsam du brdungs nas pho kha bub

mo gan rkyal du phyi chings su bcings nas gdan du gdeng/ de bzhin du shar lho me lha/ lho gshin rje/ lho nub srin po/ nub klu/ nub byang rlung lha/ byang du gnod sbyin/ byang shar dbang ldan/ steng nyi zla pho mo/ 'og sa bdag/ shar du dri za pho mo gding ngo// hU~M kA ra badzra ma hA kro

d+ha hU~M// 'dod pa'i rgyal po khro bo che/ sma pa lta bu'i TAk+ki rA dza'i phyag g.yas g.yon stong par gnas pa las rdo rje rgya gram gyi tho ba dang lcags kyu gtad pa las phyogs skyong gdan bshams legs par zhu ba gsol nas TAk+ki rA dza 'od du zhu nas hU~M kA ra la bsdus/ hU~M kA ra zhu

nas zhe sdang rdo rje la bsdus pa'o// rdo rje tho ba lcags kyu 'dzin// gdan bting lags so khro rgyal gtso// rgyal po zhe sdang rdo rje blon po hU~M kA ra dmangs TAk+ki rA dza kyi tshul gcig yin// sUr+ya tsan+d+rA ya/ bya ngang pa'i steng na nyi zla steng/ an+d+rA ya/

shar glang po'i steng du brgya byin/ ag+na ye/ shar lhor ra bskyes steng du me lha/ ya mA ya/ lhor ma he'i steng du gshin rje/ nair r-i t+ya ya/ lho nub mi'i steng du srin po/ ba ru NA ya/ nub chu srin steng na klu/ ba ya be/ nub byang sha ba'i steng du rlung lha/ ku be rA ya/ byang

rta'i steng du gnod sbyin/ i sha nA ya/ byang shar glang gi steng du dbang ldan/ nA ga b+hu be ya/ 'og phag gi steng du sa'i lha mo/ !/ gzugs chen 'bar bas 'jigs byed pa'i/ khro bo bcu dag phyung nas ni// hU~M las bskyed pa'i nyi ma'i steng/

zhe sdang rdo rje'i thugs ka nas ma las nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor bcu tham pa phyogs skyong steng du bskyed/ de'i steng du hU~M bcu tham pa bskyed/ khro bo nub nas byang du bskyed de/ hU~M pad+man+ta krita ha ya grI ba badzra ma hA kro d+ha zhes brjod pas/ nub tu rta mgrin zhal gsum phyag

drug sku mdog dmar po/ zhal g.yas dkar g.yon mthing phyag g.yas dang po rdo rje/ bar ma rin chen/ tha ma ral gri/ g.yon dang po 'khor lo/ bar ma pad+ma// tha ma zhags pa/ big+h+nAM ta kr-ita a mr-i ta kuN+Da lai badzra ma hA kro d+ha zhes pas byang du bdud rtsi 'khyil pa/ zhal gsum phyag drug

sku mdog ljang gu g.yas ser g.yon dmar/ phyag dang po rdo rje dril bu/ g.yas gnyis rin chen ral gri/ g.yon gnyis pad+ma rgya gram mo// hU~M pradz+nyAn+ta kr-ita a pa ra dzi ta badzra ma hA kro d+ha zhes pas/ shar du shes rab mthar byed dkar po/ g.yas dkar po g.yon dmar g.yas pa gsum na

rim pa bzhin/ mda' bo che/ 'khor lo ral gri/ g.yon pa gsum na zhags pa rin chen pad+ma'o// ya mAn+ta kr-i ta ya mAn+ta ka badzra ma hA kro d+ha/ zhes pas lhor/ ya ma mthar byed sku mdog nag po/ g.yas ljang gu/ g.yon dmar po/ g.yas gsum dbyug pa rdo rje ral gri/ g.yon gsum rgya

gram rin chen pad+ma'o// nI la daN+Da badzra ma hA kro d+ha zhes pas/ lho nub tu dbyug sngon dkar po/ g.yas dmar g.yon mthing/ g.yas dang po be con/ bar ma rdo rje/ tha ma gser gyi rdo rje dpung mgor 'byar/ g.yon dang po sdigs mdzub/ bar ma rin chen/ tha ma pad+ma'o// hU~M T+wa?k+ki rA dza

badzra ma hA kro d+ha zhes pas nub byang du 'dod pa'i rgyal po dmar po/ g.yas g.yon gnyis ka ljang gu/ phyag dang po gnyis bsnaul nas thugs kar phyag rgya/ g.yas gnyis lcags kyu dang mda'/ g.yon gnyis zhags pa dang gzhu'o// hU~M ma hA ba la badzra ma hA kro d+ha/ zhes pas byang shar du

stobs po che/ g.yas ljang g.yon ljang skya/ g.yas dang po rdo rje/ bar ma ral gri/ ba ma rdo rje phrag par 'phyar/ g.yon dang po zhags pa sdigs mdzub/ bar ma gnyis pany+tsa kha pad+mas gcod// tha ma gnyis rgya gram mo// hU~M Ar+ya a tsa la badzra ma hA kro d+ha zhes pas/ shar lhor mi g.yo mgon

po dmar nag/ g.yas ljang g.yon dmar/ g.yas gsum ral gri rin chen rdo rje/ g.yon gsum zhags pa pad+ma rin chen no// hU~M ka ma la kuN+Da li badzra ma hA kro d+ha zhes pas 'og tu pad+ma 'khyil ba dmar po g.yas sngo skya g.yon dkar/ g.yas gsum 'khor lo ban+d+ha rdo rje/ g.yon gsum

ne'u le pad+ma dril bu'o// hU~M kA ra badzra ma hA kro d+ha zhes pas/ steng du hU~M kA ra mthing nag/ g.yas dkar g.yon dmar/ g.yas g.yon dang po gnyis rdo rje dril bu thugs gar bsnol/ g.yas gnyis lcags kyu ral gri/ g.yon gnyis dgra s+t+wa zhags pa'o// de kun kyang zhabs g.yas

brkyangs g.yon bskums pa/ dbu la thod pa skam pos brgyan pa/ sbrul dang thod pas se ral khar brgyan pa/ bskal pa'i me 'bar ba'i nang na bzhugs pa'o// zhabs rnams yang na phur pa'o// smad ni rtse mor rnam par bsam// phyogs bcu'i dkyil 'khor

rnams su yang/ rim pa bzhin du kun tu bsam// bgegs rnams thams cad gzhig pa'i phyir// gdab pa ni 'khor ba'i 'dre ldog/ dug gsum rtsad nas gcod/ phyogs skyong la gdab pa ni dper na rgyal po btson du bzung nas dmangs cham la

'bebs pa ltar 'khor dbang du sdud pa'o// gnod mdzes bka' stsal phur pas gdab/ oM g+ha g+ha g+ha ta ya g+ha ta ya/ sarba duSh+taMn phaT/ kI la ya kI la ya/ sarba pA baM hU~M/ badzra kI la ya/ badzra d+ha rod a dz+nyA pa ya ti/ kA ya bA ka

tsit+ta badzra kI la ya/ Tak+ki rA dza badzra ma hA kro d+ha hU~M phaT/ ! bdag zhe sdang rdo rje'i phyag g.yas nas sprul pa'i khro bo bdud rtsi 'khyil bar bsnams nas/ khro bo bcu la re re zhing ske nas bzung ste/ bgegs la phur pas btab la gnod mdzes kyi phyag

na tho ba bsnams pas phur pa'i spyi bor brdeg pas phyogs skyong la thal byung nas nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor la thal byung bar bsam mo/ !/ hU~M khro bo'i rgyal po 'di dag gis// bgegs ni bkug nas rnam par 'jig/ blo ldan rab tu sbyor ba yi// cho ga

bzhin tu phur kun thob/ !/ lnga pa gdab pa'i dgos pa ni/ phur pa gdab pa yang phyogs skyong ni chos kyi dbyings yin la/ phur pa ni thugs yang dag pa'i ye shes yin/ phur pas btab ste rtse mo mar la lhag gis dbyung ba ni thugs yang dag pa'i ye shes kyis chos kyi

dbyings gting nas rtogs pa'i don yin no// de ltar phur pa btab nas phyogs mtshams steng 'og kun khro bo'i bskal pa'i me dpung sgo nga'i dbyibs lta bu'i nang du khro bo bsgom pa'o/ !/ phur pa 'debs mkhan ni khro bo bdud rtsi 'khyil pas bya ste/ bdud rtsi 'khyil pa'i phyag

g.yon du khro bo'i phur pa rnams blangs la/ g.yas pa'i gnod mdzes kyi tho bas spyi bo nas brdungs la gdab par bya'o// rdo rje bdud rtsi rgyal chen po// rdo rje phur bur nyid gnas pas// ut+pal sngon po'i 'dab 'dra ba'i/ !/ me tog ut+pal 'od 'bar

ba'i phreng bas lus la brgyan pa ni sprin 'khrigs pa'i 'od 'dra// 'bar ba'i phreng bas 'khrigs pa'i 'od// lte ba man chad chas rnams ni/ phur bur bsam pa'o// rtse mo lta bur rnam par bsam// ro stod khro bo lta bu nyid/ zhal gsum phyag

drug/ zhal gsum phyag kyang drug pa ste// bgegs kyi tshogs la rab tu gzir/ phyogs skyong bcu ni mi dge ba bcu yin pas na dge ba'i gegs byed pas na bgegs yin no// de yi sngags 'di brjod byas nas// rdo rje phur pas nges

btab na/ ! lcags sam shing la phur pa bcu byas nas dar gyi cod pan btags nas phyogs skyong bcu la gdam mo// bgegs lus shin tu mi g.yo ba'o/ !/ rdo rje'i tho ba phyag bsnams mchog/ gnod mdzes rgyal po rnam par bsgom/

!/ hU~M brjod 'bar ba'i lta bas ni// bgegs rnams thams cad phur kun gdab/ gnod mdzes kyi phyag na rdo rje'i tho ba thogs pas spyi bo nas brdung zhing gdab par bya'o// phyogs mtshams kun tu rdo rje'i me// rnam par 'phro ba rnam
bsams te// ma rungs pa ni tshig bsams na// phyogs mtshams kun tu 'bros par 'gyur// phyogs mtshams phur pa btab nas ni// steng 'og yang dag byin gyis brlab/ !/ phyogs bzhi mtshams bzhi steng 'og

bcu/ khro bo'i rgyal po bdud rje rnams// ya mtshan che ba phyag 'tshal te// shar phyogs dri za'i rgyal po rab dga' la sogs thabs kyis 'dul// lho phyogs 'chi bdag rgyal po grul bum la sogs pa gshin rje zhabs kyis

gnon// nub phyogs klu rgyal mgrin sngon klu gdon rnam par gzir// byang phyogs gdug pa can gnod pa sbyin pa kun kyang brlag/ mtshams kyi khro bo chen pos ni// mtshams kyi bgegs me lha drang srong srin po lang ka rlung lha dbang
ldan rnams zil gyis gnon// phyogs bcur khro rgyal bdud rje rnams// ya mtshan che la phyag 'tshal te// bdud dgra thams cad yongs bcom nas// bgegs rnams ma lus zhi bar mdzod/ shar du

bka' bsgo ba bya// oM sum b+ha ni sum b+ha hU~M/ lhor gr-i h+Na gr-i h+Na hU~M/ nub gr-i h+NA pa ya gr-i h+NA pa ya hU~M/ byang du A na ya ho/ spyir b+ha ga bAn/ bid+yA rA dza hU~M phaT/ rnam thar gru gsum yum gyi mkhar/ thod par snod dur khrod kyi thod par

gnan te/ thod pa'i nang na 'chi bdag gshin rje'i sku yod pas 'chi bdag ni lto bar gnan pa'i dgos pa'o/ !/ bcud dam sri gnan pa ni/ las las gyur pa'i dam sri las ngan gyi rgyus bskyed pa dang/ rkyen las gyur pa'i dam sri chos pa dam po de 'drer song ba dang/ gnod par

sems pa'i dam sri 'phral du glags 'chol ba rnams gnan te/ ling+ga la gzugs dang ming rus bris pa'o// snod bcud gcig la gcig chags par bya ba ni/ bal tshon sngon dmar gyis bcing bar bya'o// gnyen por shis pa'i lhas gnan pa ni/ phur pa khro bo mi g.yo bar bsgom

pa'o// rten 'brel 'dzom par gnan pa ni/ dong gru gsum yum gyi mkhar gnan/ thod pa skya bo 'chi bdag gi ltor gnan/ mtshan ma dmigs rten ling gar gnan/ byad du gzhug pa tsho skud kyis gnan/ rdo rje rgya gram gyis kha gcad do// gdul spyod drag po'i bro brdung ngo// shis pa'i

smon lam gdab bo/ dam sri phur pas gdab/ !/ dur khrod chen po'i gnas brgyad du// bskul ba'i rbod gtong chen po dang/ ye shes lha dang 'brel ba'i pho nya las kyi lha dang 'brel ba'i pho nya rang dang 'brel ba'i pho nya las mkhan gyi pho nya'o// za

byed chen po'i *! khro bo mi g.yo ba ni dus gsum du bgegs kyi sha khrag la rngam pa'o/ rngam stabs kyis/ !/ rkyen las gyur pa'i dam sri dang gnod par sems pa'i dam sri dang las las gyur ba'i dam sri rnams/ gnan pa'i las rnams dus la bab/ thugs/

hU~M mdzad hU~M gis Ar+ya a tsa la/ thugs las/ sprul pa'i 'od zer gsung hU~M phaT la sogs pa/ rngam pa'i dang sku'i gzi mdangs dang ldan// hU~M dang phaT ces kyi sgra sgrogs sdang dgra gnod bgegs 'joms// dur khrod shar na khams

gsum gyi bdag po dang/ lho na sprin gyi sgron ma/ nub na rdo rje mchu/ byang na bi nA ya ka bgegs kyi tshogs 'joms mi g.yo mgon// hU~M Ar+ya a tsa la/ ban d+ha ban d+ha/ kI li kI la ya hU~M phaT// ri rab chen po'i rmang du sba/ steng du ri rab

kyis gnan pas na/ ya ma rA dza'i zas su sbyin/ thod pa 'chi bdag gi grong khyer du bcug pas na// chu srin 'bar ba'i kha ru brdzang/ gshin rje'i kha nas mi 'chor ba'i dpe/ g.yam pa la nang/ 'khor lo 'bar ba'i phyi ri rab kyi phyag rgyas gnan/ te

gzugs bris pas/ bdun rgyud rigs ni skye ba bdun du rigs chad de/ mes po yang mes gsum/ bu tsha bo yang tsha gsum du ldang mi nus so/ brlag 'gyur na// nam yang ldang bar mi 'gyur te/ gsang sngags mchog la dad pa'i/ byang chub kyi sems ni skyes

na gtang/ bar bya'o// phrin las 'dul sbyong bro yang brdung/ yi dam lha yi zhabs kyis brdzi// smon lam shis pa gdab par bya'o// ni/ ho dur khrod gsang ba mchog gi gnas/ zhe sdang 'dul ba'i gtso bo/ khro bdag chen po shri he ru ka'i sku gsung thugs kyi

dngos grub sgrub pa na/ gnas 'dir deng nas dbu btsugs nas nam mtshams las ma byung gi bar du ya ma dam sri la sogs pa rnams 'dul bar mdzad du gsol/ zhes so// dur khrod ras sam sog pa la// gshin rje gshin rje zhal gcig phyag

gnyis pa g.yas dbyug tho g.yon sdigs mdzub gdan ma he'o/ bskyed bstim phrin las bcol/ rtogs dkar bas na/ gsang rtogs na zab pas na/ chen ma byas pas lhun grub pho brang nas/ ni 'og min gnas so// las kyi gshin rje'i bgegs

kyi bdag po la/ sngon/ bcom ldan chos rjes 'das rdo rje 'chang gis bka' bsgos pa'am stsal ba ltar// de bzhin du rjes su 'jug pa'i rig 'dzin sgrub pa pos/ sangs rgyas rdo rje 'chang gi/ bka' gsang gzhung chen 'di bsgrub cing/

drang don ma yin par/ yang dag don la nges par 'jug na/ 'di dag mchog thun mong gi dngos grub thams cad 'byung ba'i dpe nor bu rin chen lta bu ste// 'di la gnod pa byed cing thob na bar du gcod pa'i// lha srin sde brgyad

dbang po kun/ lha klu gnod sbyin dri za mi'am ci 'dab bzang srin po nam mkha' lding/ gshin rje khyed kyi sde brgyad 'khor dang bgegs g.yog lags kyi// rnam par smin pa'i las dge sdig rgyu 'bras kyi chos shod la/ kri yaug kyang gsang sngags yin la/

gsang ba mchog gi nang pa ste rnal 'byor pas/ tshe gcig lus gcig la 'tshang rgya bas// bla med 'bras bu yang dag par rdzogs pa'i dngos grub ma thob bar/ du/ sgo bsrung bas mtshams bcad pa'i/ sa 'di yan chad ma btang bar// dpal

chen mi pham zhe sdang rdo rje'i bka' las mi 'da'/ zhig/ bdag cag gi sems dang gshin rje'i thugs ye nas gnyis su med/ dkyil 'khor gyi/ phyi 'khor skyong ba'i mu ran la/ lhor bzhugs/ rdo rje'i sngags kyi yal gam dam tshig thub par

mdzod// oM ya ma gshin rje'i rgyal po'i mtshan sngags rA dza sa do me ya// kring skri sa sna dza ma ri sa ma ya s+t+waM/ !/ lug gi/ sog par bdud rtsi 'khyil pa bris/ la dam tshig pa/ bskyed ye shes spyan drangs la bstim mchod pa phul

la phrin las bcol/ smon lam gdab bkra shis gsol/ gnas gang na bzhugs na/ bskal pa'i me dpung 'bar 'dra'i klong/ lha gang bzhugs na/ 'chi med khro bo chen po'i sku/ zhal gsum gyi phrin las gang mdzad na/ zhal g.yas zhal ser po

rab tu bzhad pa ni/ dngos grub rgyas par mdzad// 'dzam bu na dA'i gser 'od 'dra/ dbus ma/ zhal kun tu rngams pas bar gcod sel bar byed ma rgad ljang gu'i mdangs// g.yon pa pad+ma rA ga 'dra/ dmar la gshe bas log lta tshar

gcod// dbu yi ral ba'i thor tshugs la rdo rje rgya gram gyis mdzes/ pa'i staing na// rigs kyi bdag po sangs rgyas don yod grub pa bzhug/ phyag drug gis phrin las ni/ thabs mchog g.yas rdo rje thabs snying rje rdo rje dang/ g.yon/ shes

rab stong pa dril bu gnyis thabs shes thugs kar bsnol/ g.yas bar ma na dgos 'dod 'byung ba'i/ yid bzhin nor bu rin po che/ g.yas tha ma na// mtshon cha'i rgyal po ral gri g.yas/ nyon mongs dug gsum 'joms/ g.yon dang po na 'khor ba'i

'dam las/ chags med skyon bral pad ma dang/ g.yon tha ma phrin/ las kyi rdo rje rgya gram g.yon/ sku'i rgyan dang cha lugs ni// gdug pa sprul rigs bzhi rnams gyis phyag zhabs brgyan// tshar gsum/ thod phreng tshangs
skud do shal mdzad// dpa' bo stag lpags sham thabs can/ gdan ni gang la na/ bgegs chen bsnol ba'i gdan stengs na// phrin las gang mdzad na thog ser bgegs la 'bebs// dngos grub gang bskul na bar

chad bsrung du gsol// oM a mr-i ta kun d+ha li ts+tshin d+ha sa ma ya s+t+waM/ !/ phyi nang bgegs rnams bskrad pa yi/ gshin rje gshed kyi sngags// gsang sngags phreng ba bshad kyi nyon/ oM bkra shis pa yin yang na bsod nams len zer

ro// oM na maH phyag 'tshal lo sa man+ta kun nas kA ya sku bA ka gsung tsit+ta thugs badzra NaM/ rdo rje rnams kyi/ kha kha gsol gsol khA hi khA hi/ gsol cig gsol cig/ sarba duSh+ta sa twa da ma ka gdug par sems pa thams cad 'dul ba/ a si mu sa la par+shu

pA sha hasta/ ral gri btun shing dgra s+t+wa zhags pa'i phyag can/ tsa turmu khu/ zhal bzhi pa tsa tur+b+hu dza phyag bzhi pa Sha Tatsa ra Na zhabs drug pa A gats+tsha A gats+tsha/ tshur spyon tshur spyon/ sarba duSh+ta sdang ba thams cad prA Na a ba hA ri Ne/ srog 'phrog pa/ ma hA bi g+h+nAM g+ha ta

ka bgegs chan po gsod pa/ bi kr-i ta A nan/ rnam par 'gyur ba'i bzhin can/ sarba b+hu ta b+ha yaM ka ra/ 'byung po thams cad 'jigs par byed pa/ aSh+tA T+Ta hA sa nA dI ni/ gad rgyangs drag tu bzhad pa'i sgra 'byin pa/ byA g+h+ra tsarma ni pA sa na/ sta lpags kyi

sham thabs can/ ku ru ku ru/ mdzod mdzod/ sarba karmA Ni/ las rnams thams cad/ ts+tshin+da ts+tshin+da/ chod chod/ sarba man+t+ra/ ngan sngags thams cad/ b+hin+da b+hin+da/ phug cig phug cig/ ba ra mu drA na/ gzhan gyi phyag rgya/ A kar+Sha ya A kar+Sha ya/ khug cig khug

cig/ sarba b+hU taM/ 'byung po thams cad/ nirma tha nirma tha/ 'joms par gyis 'joms par gyis/ sarba duSh+ta/ gdug pa thams cad/ pra be sha ya pra be sha ya/ dbye bar gyis dbye bar gyis/ maN+Da la ma d+h+ye/ dkyil 'khor dbus la/ bai b+ha swa ta/ gshin rje/ dzI

bi tAn+ta ka ra/ srog mthar byed pa/ ku ru ku ru/ mdzod cig mdzod cig/ ma ma kAr+YaM/ bdag gi bya ba/ da ha da ha/ sregs shig sregs shig/ pa tsa pa tsa/ tshos tshos/ mA bi la m+ba mA bi lam+ba/ dmigs pa med par gyis dmigs pa med par gyis/ sa ma ya

ma nu sma ra/ dam tshig rjes su dran par gyis/ hU~M hU~M phaT phaT/ s+pho Ta ya s+pho Ta ya/ tshal par gyis tshal par gyis/ yar+b+bA nA sha ya/ pa ri pU ra ya/ bsam pa thams cad yongs su gang bar gyis/ he he b+ha ga bAn/ kye kye bcom ldan 'das/ ki ma tsi rA ya

si/ ci yang myur bar/ ma ma sarba yar+tha sA d+ha ya sA hA/ bdag gi don thams cad 'grub pa'i gzhi tshugs/ gshin rje gshed kyi phyi srung ba'i sngags so/ !/ na maHsa man+ta kA ya wAk+tsit+ta badzrA NAM/ phyag 'tshal lo kun nas sku gsung thugs rdo rje la/ na mo badzra kro d+hA ya/ phyag

'tshal lo rdo rje khro bo chen po la/ ma hA daMSh+to t+ka Ta b+hai ra wA yA/ khro bo chen po mche ba gtsigs pa 'jigs su rung ba la/ a se mu sa la pa chu pA sha ha s+t+wa ya/ ral gri gtun shing dgra s+t+wa zhags pa phyag na bsnams pa la/ oM a mr-i ta kuN+Da li bdud rtsi 'khyil pa/

kha kha zo zo khA hi khA hi/ zo zhig zo zhig/ hu lu hu lu/ zhugs shig zhugs shig/ tiSh+Tha tiSh+Tha/ gnas par gyis gnas par gyis/ ban+d+ha ban+d+ha/ chings chings/ ha na ha na/ rgyob rgyob/ da ha da ha/ sregs sregs pa tsa pa tsa/ chos chos/

gar+dz+dza gar+dz+dza/ sgrogs sgrogs/ bi s+phoT ya bi s+phoT ya/ rnam par khos rnam par khos/ sarba big+h+nAM bi nA ya kA na/ bgegs dang log 'dren thams cad/ ma hA ga Na pa ti/ tshogs bdag chen po/ dzI bi tAn+ta ka rA ya sA hA/ srog mthar byed pa la gzhi tshugs/

bdud rtsi 'khyil pas nang bsrung ba'i sngags/ !/ gtsang mar sbyar ba'i phud dag dang// sha khrag las byas gtor ma yis// 'byung po kun la byin byas te// gshin rje'i gnas su sngags kyis bskrad/ !/ phyi nang

bsdus pa ni/ bgegs rigs stong phrag brgyad cu la gtor ma dang gser skyems btang la bden pa bdar la bskrad la gtang ngo// phyogs bzhir ! gom pa bdun cu rtsa gnyis kyi sar/ mtho bzhi btsugs nas kyang/ bgegs gtor rgyal chen phyogs skyong dam sri sgo

byang rnams sngar yang bshad 'dir yang bshad pas 'gal zer na mi 'gal te/ mdor bstan pa rgyas par bshad pa gong du bshad/ 'dir ni bsdus nas bshad de/ mdor bstan/ rgyas bshad/ mjug sdud do/ !/ rgyal po chen po sde bzhin la/ rgyal chen sde bzhi mchod de/

dang po rdzas bsag/ bar du lha bsgom/ tha ma phrin las gzhung bsrang ngo// rdzas bzhi la/ mtho brtsig/ shing gzug/ dkyil 'khor bri/ mchod pa bsham mo// lha la bzhi/ bdag lhar bsgom/ mtho gzhal yas khang du bsgom/ shing rgyal por bsgom/ mchod pa byin brlab/ de nas

las bcol lo// phyi mtshams bsrung bar zhal 'ches pa'i// mthu chen phyogs skyong 'khor bcas la// gtor ma cha re byin nas kyang// phyi mtshams bsrung bar phrin las bcol/ !/ de nas gom pa bdun nang du nye bar phyogs

skyong bcu mchod de/ dang por rdzas bsag/ bar du lha bsgom/ tha mar las bcol lo// rdzas la bzhi/ hom khung bru/ shing brtsig/ mchod pa bsham/ bdag lhar bsgom/ hom khung khang pa/ shing phyogs skyod du bsgom/ mchod pa byin brlab bo// phrin las ni dang por mchod/ tha mar

phur pas gdab par bya'o// phur pa dar gyi cod pan can/ de nas phur pa gdab pa ni/ phyogs skyong gi 'khor bka' mi nyan cing gsung mi sdod pa la gdab/ phur pa khro bcur bsgoms la dang po dbugs bar du gdab/ tha mar sprul pa spro zhing mtshams bcad do// khro bo

bcu ru byin brlabs nas// phyi mtshams bsrung ba'i phrin las bcol// de nas phyag rgya chen po yi// ma d+hal nag po gru gsum du// bar chad dam sri gnan byas te/ bag yangs bde bas nan tan bya/ !/ de nas dam

sri gnan ti/ gnas them pa'i 'og tu rdzas thod par/ bar chad rkyen dang/ gnod par sems pa/ las las grub pa gnan/ thabs dang por dgug tha mar dam sri gnan par bya'o// 'bur lugs ris su bris pa yi// chos kyi rgyal po bdud rtsi

'khyil// phyi nang sgo byang gdags par bya'o// de nas sgo byang gdags te/ bgegs bsrung ba la gshin rje gshed gdags/ nang gi dngos grub phyir mi gtong bas dngos grub bsrung ba la bdud rtsi 'khyil ba gdags so// dang po zhe sdang rdo rje la bka' bsgo ba ni pho

brang gi sa dang bsgrub pa'i dus te/ sa dang dus kyi gzhal yas khang gi gnas 'di ru// yang dag pa'i don bsgrub pa la mi brtson zhing// byang chub don chos sku'i la mi gnas pa'i// mi dang dbang med mi min gyi 'byung po/

gang yang rung/ de dag/ thams cad dbyer med gcig tu bsdus nas ni// rdul phran bzhin du brlag pa dang/ sems lus rdul du gshig nas nyid theg pa chen po yi/ ra sems bskyed de/ 'bras bu/ rnam par thar pa'i sgo gsum dag la

dgod par mdzad/ zhe sdang rdo rjer/ ye shes phrin las bzhi'i nus can gyi mdzod/ le lo'am/ btang snyoms sam yal yol lam phyad phyod du bar ma btang zhig/ ces bka' bsgos te sangs rgyas rnams mdun gyi nam mkhar spyan drangs/ badzra sa mA dza

dza/ !/ zhes g.yas g.yon dpung pa'i khar se gol gdab bo// phyogs bcu dus bzhi'i sangs rgyas thams cad sngon gyi smon lam gyi dbang gis mdun gyi nam mkha' sprin zhin du gtibs nas mtshams ky-i phrin las mdzad par bsam mo// rnal 'byor chen po'i dkyil

'khor 'dir// gsang ba'i dam can 'di nyid kyi bka' bsrungs ma gtol ba rnams la so so nas// thams cad thugs rjes bkang zin gyis/ !/ bgegs r-igs stong phrag brgyad cu la 'byung po'i gtor ma btang zin gyis/ dus/ da lta nyid du so

sor rang rang gi gnas su dengs/ gal te 'am/ ci ste mi 'gro bar 'dir 'dug gyur na// rdo rje 'dzin rgyal khros nas kyang/ khro bo rdo rje gnod sbyin ljang nag g.yas rgya gram g.yon sdigs mdzub can gyis// de ma thag tu snying bkas nas

ni// bdun brgyud rigs kyang brlag par 'gyur// bden pa bdar zhing bskrad par bya/ bden pa bdar ba ni/ gsang ba bas kyang ches gsang ba/ yang gsang thugs kyi dkyil 'khor/ bka' gsang rmad du byung ba/ dur khrod 'bar ba mchog gi gnas

'dir 'du ba'i lha la ma gtogs pa bgegs rigs stong phrag brgyad cu'i rigs su gyur pa/ mi min mi ru rdzu ba/ lha min lha ru rdzu ba/ gsang sngags bla na med pa'i bka' dang dam tshi+eg ma mnos shing/ sngags nyan la mi dbang ba phyag rgya blta ba la mi dbang ba/ rnal 'byor pa mched

dang lcam dral gyi tshe srog gi bar du gcod cing/ dngos grub kyi bgegs gcug byed pa de dag bskal pa'i me dpung 'bar la srog gi sbrang bu mi gnas pa'am/ mar khol mal chu'i thigs pa mi gnas pa'am/ nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor la/ mun pa'i gzhi mi gnas pa bzhin du ma gnas

par dengs shig/ rdo rje gnod sbyin gshed po che/ g.yas bskor du spros nas bgegs skrad g.yon bskor du 'dus nas mtshams gcad do// oM badzra kro d+ha hU~M kA ra hU~M gardza gardza hU~M phaT/ steng du hU~M kA ra sngo skya mda' gzhu bsnams pa smad lcags phur ro/ oM badzra

kro d+ha bi dza ya hU~M ha na ha na hU~M phaT/ shar du rnam par rgyal ba dkar po 'khor lo bsnams sku smad thams cad 'dra/ g.yas bskor g.yon bskor 'dra/ oM badzra kro d+ha nI la daN+Da hU~M da ha da ha hU~M phaT/ shar lhor dbyug pa sngon po dbyug pa thogs pa/ smad lcags phur/ oM badzra

kro d+ha ya mAn+ta ka hU~M pa tsa pa tsa hU~M phaT/ lhor gshin rje gshed mthing nag mi mgo'i dbyug pa/ oM badzra kro d+ha Ar+ya a tsa la hU~M n+d+ha ban+d+ha hU~M phaT/ lho nub tu mi g.yo ba smug nag ral gri/ oM badzra kro d+ha ha ya gri ba hu lu hu lu hU~M phaT/ nub tu mgrin

dmar po lcags sgrog/ oM badzra kro d+ha a pa ra dzi ta hU~M tiSh+Tha tiSh+Tha hU~M phaT/ nub byang gzhan gyis mi thub pa dmar skya ba dan thogs pa sku smad lcags kyi phur pa zur gsum pa g.yas bskor g.yon bskor 'dra/ oM badzra kro d+ha a mri ta kuN+Da li

hU~M ts+tshin+d+ha ts+tshin+d+ha hU~M phaT/ byang na bdud rtsi 'khyil pa ljang nag rgya gram bsnams pa/ oM badzra kro d+ha trai lo kya bi dza ya hU~M b+hin+da b+hin+da hU~M phaT/ byang shar khams gsum rnam rgyal ser po ne'u le thogs pa/ oM badzra kro d+ha ma hA ba la hU~M s+phoT s+phoT hU~M phaT/ 'og na stobs po che

dud kha gtun shing thogs pa/ sku smad phur pa'o// zhe sdang rdo rje'i phyas g.yas pa zla ba'i steng na dpa' bo 'bru lnga g.yon nyi ma'i steng na yum lnga'i sa bon/ des spro bsdu byas nas sor mo bsnol bas rigs lnga yab yum sbyor ba byas pa'i mtshams nas mtshon cha sna tshogs pa'i thog dbab

pa'o/ khro bo 'chol ba phyag mtshan sna tshogs pa bsnams pa'o// 'khor lo'i thogs/ oM b+h+rUM/ rdo rje'i thogs/ hU~M b+h+rUM/ rin po che traM b+h+rUM/ pad+ma hrIHb+h+rUM/ rgya gram a b+h+rUM/ sngags 'dis rigs lnga yab yum sbyor mtshams nas khro bo 'chol ba 'phros nas phyag na mtshon cha sna

tshogs thogs pas bgegs rnams bskrad nas tshur 'dus nas mtshon cha rnams mdun du spungs nas khro bo rnams rang la thim pa'o// oM dz+wa la badzra/ man+t+ra sum b+ha ni/ man+t+ra dz+wa la badzra/ badzra dz+wa la badzra hU~M phaT/ !/ g.yas pa dpa' bo 'bru lnga yab/ ra

ba dang gur gyi mtshams na lag pa g.yas pa nyi ma la oM AHhU~M swA hA/ bsam pas rigs lnga gsal ba dang/ g.yon pa dpa' mo 'bru lnga yum/ nyi ma la muM lAM mAM pyAM tAM// bsam pa las yum sngar gsal bas mdun na yod pa'i mtshon cha la dmigs nas dka' bsgo ba bya ba

dang/ bgegs la bka' bsgo ba byas la mtshams gcad do/ !/ rigs lnga las sprul pa'i tshon cha la bka' bsgo ba ni/ nam mkha' stong pa las sprin ldang ba ltar g.yas bskor du bgegs bskrad g.yon bskor du mtshams gcad do// bgegs la bka' bsgo ba ni bgegs kyis ra ba

dang 'dra ba'i gur de la tshur mda' mi nus par bsam par bya'o// nga yi dkyil 'khor brtan bya'i phyir/ khro rgyal byin rlabs las byung ba'i// mtshon cha rnam pa sna tshogs kyis// dkyil 'khor rim pa tshul bzhin bsrungs// steng

yang rdo rje'i bla re la/ 'og kyang rdo rje'i sa gzhi gcal// phyogs mtshams rdo rjes btams pa las// gsang ba rdo rje'i mtshams las ma 'da' zhig/ rdo rje'i mtshams kyi 'brel// 'khor lo dang ral gri dang dbyug tho

dang// phur bu rnams shes par bya'o/ rdo rje'i tshul mchog nyid// de dag rang rang so so yi// phyag rgya rab tu bcad nas kyang/ rdo rje'i phyag rgya ni gung mo gnyis rtse sprad gzhan bsnol/ mdzub mo gnyis gung mo'i rgyab tu gnan no// 'khor lo ni/ lag

pa g.yas g.yon sor mo'i rtse sprad la bral ba'o// ral gri ni mthe bong mthe'u chung mthil du bkugs la gzhan gsum po rkyang ba'o// dbyug tho ni g.yas g.yon du gung mo rtse sprad gzhan bsnol la/ dbyug tho ltar phyar/ phur bu ni/ lag pa g.yas g.yon gnyis phur pa 'dril ba ltar

bya'o// rdo rje'i badzra badzra rak+Sha/ dz+hA na tsakra rak+sha/ 'khor lo// ral gri tIk+Sh+Na ts+tshin+da rak+Sha/ dbyug tho/ a ko Ta ya mung+ga ra rak+Sha/ phur bu kI li kI la ya rak+Sha/ !/ drug pa bka' nan ni tshig 'di dag brjod pas bgegs kyis 'di las 'da' mi nus par

bsam mo// mtshams bcad nang 'di tshun chad du/ bar chod byed pa rnams// su yang 'da' bar ma byed cig/ ji ste bka' las 'das gyur na/ zhe sdang rdo rje 'am rdo rje gnod sbyin gyi phyag mtshan/ tho ba lcags kyur bcas

pa yis// snying nas drang zhing brdung bar bya'o// thabs dang shes rab hU~M las Ta ba rdo rje dril/ hU~M las dril bu shes rab stong pa/ bzung nas rkang pa hU~M las rdo rje rgya gram du bsams la rgya gram bsam/ shar du zhi ba'i stabs/ g.yas brkyang

shar la lhor rgyas pa'i stabs g.yon brkyang lho/ nub tu dbang gi stabs/ zlum po nub la byang du drag po'i stabs gru bzhi byang// mtshams ni rdo rje'i 'gros kyis bskor nas/ bsad/ 'og rdo rje'i brag gi/ sa gzhi rdo rjer gtams par bsam ma/

byin gyis brlabs/ gong du song ba yin no// lung dkrugs pa'o// 'gyod rtogs ting 'dzin dad pa'i mes/ !/ nang bshags pa gnyis las/ me bzhis bshags pa ni/ 'gyod pa drag po'i mes rnam smin bsreg pa dang/ rtogs pa blta ba'i mes rnam smin bsreg

pa dang/ ting 'dzin goms pa'i mes rnam smin bsreg pa dang/ dad pa brlabs po che'i mes rnam smin bsreg pa'o// rgyu bzhi'i bshags pa ni/ dam tshig nyams pa bshags pa nyi shu rtsa brgyad pa ni mched lcam gyis bskang gso'i dus su bya/ ye shes lha dang 'khon gcugs dbral ba ye

shes su mchog ni/ sngon 'gro'i dus su bya/ dam can dbang du bya ba ni/ tshogs kyi dus su dpal chen khro rgyal bya/ ma mo mkha' 'gro dbang du bsdus pa ni/ lhag ma'i dus su ye shes mkha' 'gro bya/ kha skong zhi khro gnyis ni/ bskyed rdzogs gzhung bsrong ba'i rjes la bya'o// nyams

pa'i chad pa bshags pa dang// lus ngag yid kyi sgrib pa yang// rab tu bshags par bya ba'o/ !/ spyi rkang rtsib lpags ba spu sen// rdor sa ra gur dra ba me/ !/ nang gi mtshams ni/ spyi bor sna tshogs rdo rje/ rkang mthil rdo rje'i sa

gzhi/ rtsib ma rdo rje'i ra ba/ pags pa rdo rje'i gur/ ba spu mda'i dra ba/ sen mo'i ri rab tu 'bar ba/ de ltar gnas pas srung ba'i 'khor lo rang gi lus la rdzogs par gnas so// sems nyid srog rtsa'i hU~M ring rlung// sa gzhi rtsigs pa bla re gur/ !/ de

nyid rlung sems kyi mtshams ni// sems kyi rang bzhin srog 'dzin pa'i rlung yi ge hU~M du gnas te/ hU~M cha gcig srog las rtsol ba ba'i rlung du phyi rol du 'phros te/ hU~M de las 'og tu 'phros pas rdo rje'i sa gzhi/ phyogs su 'phros pas rdo rje'i rtsigs pa/ steng du 'phros pas rdo rje'i

gur/ bla rer gyur pa ni/ srog gi rlung sems nyid las/ rtsol ba'i rlung sems kyi snang bar gyur nas srung ba'i 'khor lor gyur pa'o// kun gzhi chos nyid pho brang na/ de kho na nyid kyi bshags pa ni rang gi kun gzhi chos nyid kyi pho brang myang 'das kyi grong khyer chen por

gnas pa de na// yid kyi rang byung ye shes lha/ yid rang byung gi ye shes dpal kun tu bzang po don skye ba med pa'i lhar gnas pa la// nyon mongs pa lnga rgyal ba rigs lnga bcom ldan 'das/ su bzhugs te gti mug rnam snang/ zhe sdang mi bskyod pa/ nga rgyal

rin 'byung/ 'dod chags snang mtha'/ phrag dog don yod grub par bzhugs so// sgo lnga'i 'khor dang bcas pa rnams// dbang po sgo lnga 'khor te/ mig gi dbang po sa snying byams pa yab yum/ rna ba sgrib sel phyi nang yab yum/ sna spyan ras gzigs phyi nang yab yum/

lce phyag rdor phyi nang yab yum/ lus kyi dbang sgo ba yab yum du ye nas gnas par bzhugs pa lags/ rtsa gnas snod du lus khams sbyar/ lus la gnas pa rtsa ni/ mchod pa'i snod yin la lus khams kyi bdud rtsi mchod pa'i rdzas su ye nas gnas pa

yin te/ bdud rtsi lnga yang sems can kun gyi lus la gnas so// rang sngags byin rlabs rlung gis dbul/ rang gi gi lus la grub pa'i sngags dpa' bo 'bru lnga nyid ye nas bdud rtsi byin gyis rlabs pa'i sngags yin/ snying po rlung gi spro bsdus rlung bzung nas lus kyis

sangs rgyas rnams mnyes par mchod pa 'bul lo// mnyes nas lus dang ngag yid la/ kyi sgrib pa lus sangs rgyas su ma shes pa dang/ ngag sngags su ma shes pa dang/ sems chos skur ma shes pa'o// mi shes pa kho na ma rig pa yin pas na sgrib pa dang/ shes pa ni sgrib

pa dag pa'o// sgrib la mi gnas rang grol bshags/ de ltar rtogs pas sgrib pa mi gnas par rang sar grol ba kho na bshags pa yin no// de yang dper na mar me btegs pas mun pa rang dengs pa ltar rtogs pas sgrib pa rang dag par gyur pa'o// zhes gsungs

so// he ru ka yi gal po las/ mtshams kyi phrin las kyis bar chad bsal ba ste brtag pa drug pa'o//// ! phyi bshags phyi skong phyi mtshams gsum ni/ chos thams cad thun mong du gsungs pa yin la/ nang mtshams nang bshags ni/ 'bras

bu gsang sngags nang pa kho na'i yin te/ de yang phyi skong dkon mchog mchod pa ni rgyu mtshan nyid dang mthun/ mgron bzhi mchod pa kri yog dang mthun/ phyogs skyong mchod cing phur pa gdab pa phyi mtshams so// nang mtshams dam sri sgo byan la sogs pa nang pa dang mthun no// sngon

'gro phrin las kyi rim pa yin no// sgrub pa po la bar chad 'byung ba rnams bsal zhing phyi nang gi mtshams gcad par bya ba'i/ cho ga'i rim pa rnams yang nas yang du gsungs pas na/ brtag pa'o/ !/ brtag pa ni sangs rgyas kyi thugs gnyis su med pa'i ye shes te/ rtogs par byed

pas na brtag pa'o zer ro/ rtog cing rdzogs par byed pa'o/ !/ yang na/ saM skr-i ta'i sgra las/ kalpa saM pa ta ni/ zhes bya ba yin te/ bod skad du/ rtog pa'am/ brtag pa'am/ cho ga'am/ cho ga zhib mo yin gsungs so// yi ge 'di nyid bla ma'i phyag dpe la mi bzhugs so// gzhan nas

gsungs pa 'dir kho bos bris so//// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis gsang ba rmad du byung ba'i dkyil 'khor chen po 'di gsungs so// dkyil 'khor nub phyogs su bya'o/ de bzhin gzhi/ thod sku zhal nub tu bstan slob dpon

dgongs pa'i gzhi yang/ kham phor te thod pa dgu la ri mo bris pa'i sku dgu/ snang ba'i 'od mar me dgu dang bcas par dgram/ dkyil 'khor/ rdzas kyis mdzes par 'khor bar bzhag/ la mtha' rtsang gis byang bskor ro// mig gi bde ba'i rten

lu ma ting nge 'dzin rten bris sku la sogs yang mngon par bri/ sde dgram mo// rang bzhin dkyil 'khor sku gsum lhun gyis grub pa 'og min na gnas/ so/ gzugs brnyan gyi rgyu'am rnam grangs ni gser dngul lugs ma dang ni/ rdo la

brkos ma 'am ba so la 'bur du brkos shing// ras bal la sogs pa las thags su btags pa dang khang bu dang/ ste lha khang bris pa'i// sa 'am 'jim pa'i gzugs lder so dang dang ras sam shing la sogs pa la ri mo bris pa dang/ sa la sogs pa la/ rdul

tshon du byas pa dang sa la sogs pa shing blak+Sha dang tsan+dan rnams las byas pa mang po rnams// rnal 'byor bsgrub po'i rgyu 'byor pa che chung dang sbyar/ ro// gzhi lam 'bras bu'i/ rgyud dang rtsa ba dang bskyed pa dang las sngags kyi sbyor ba mkhas pa can// de nyid bcu ni

rtogs pa blta ba la sogs yongs su shes/ pa'o// gzugs brnyan gyi/ dkyil 'khor bri ba'i las la brtson/ pa'o// rang gi lus la mtshon pa rgyar/ 'dom gang gru bzhi dang snying mtshon pas dpangs su chag gang la// yang na lus kyi phyaid yin pas snying mtshon pa mda' gang gru bzhir

bya/ !/ dbus kyi/ byang chub sems ni me long ye shes te/ sngar sangs rgyas pa'i/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsang mchog dam pa rab tu bsgrub pa'i phyir/ rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi/ bka' snod min rnams la gsang rmad du byung ba'i dkyil 'khor 'dir// snod min dbang ma thob

pa'am dam tshig med pa rnams la/ gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor chen po'i dbus su byang chub sems kyi chag chag 'debs/ pas me long lta bu'i ye shes su gsal lo// oM ma hA ye shes dz+nyA na maN+Da la dkyil 'khor hU~M/ sangs rgyas re re la sku gsung thugs yon tan phrin las lnga lnga mnga'

ba/ bdud rtsi dri chen ye shes lngar ldan pas// de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsang mchog bsgrub pa'i phyir/ rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi/ bka' snod min rnams la gsang rmad du byung ba'i dkyil 'khor 'dir/ snod min nam dbang ma thob pa'i dam tshig med pa rnams la gsang ba'i dkyil

'khor chen po chag chag shar du 'debs/ so// chen po/ ma hA ba su rgyu ma maN+Da dkyil 'khor la hU~M/ !/ bdud rtsi mAM sa sha chen rin 'byung gi dam rdzas yin rin 'byung gi sku gsung thugs yon tan phrin las lnga lnga ye shes lngar ldan pas na ye shes lngar ldan pas// de bzhin gshegs

pa'i gsang mchog bsgrub pa'i phyir// bka' gsang rmad du byung ba'i dkyil 'khor 'dir// gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor chen po lho na bdud rtsi sha chen gyi chag chag 'debs/ dkyil 'khor gyi lho nas chag chag gdab bo/ ma hA mAM sa maN+Da la hU~M/ lus khams bdud rtsi lnga las khyad par du

yum gyi pad+ma rak+tas gangs pa ni/ bka' gsang rmad du byung ba'i dkyil 'khor du// de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsang mchog so sor rtogs pa'i ye shes kyis rang spyi'i mtshan nyid rtogs par byed pa ste/ de bsgrub pa'i phyir/ pad rAg 'byung gnas gang yin na/ mkha' dbyings rnam dag

yum gyi gzhal yas nas/ rak+ta gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor snang mtha'i dam rdzas chen por spro/ dkyil 'khor gyi nub tu byug par bya'o// ma hA rak+ta maN+Da la hU~M/ bdud rts-i dri chu ye shes lngar ldan pas/ bdud rtsi dri chus chag chag gdabs pas bya phug ron gyi ske'am rma bya'i mdongs ltar dri

chu kha dog lnga ldan no// ye shes las byung bya ba grub pa'i ye shes 'grub pa'i rgyu dri chu rang las byung ba'o/ dag pa las kyi chu// de bzhin gshegs pa'i bya ba grub pa'i ye shes kyis phrin las ma lus pa 'grub pa ste rtogs dka' las gsang mchog bsgrub pa'i phyir/ yang dag par

rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi// bka' rtogs par dka' bas gsang rmad du byung ba'i dkyil 'khor du// gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor chen po chag chag 'debs/ lha don yod grub pa'i gzhal yas khang du gnas par bya dngos su dr-i chus byug go/ oM ma hA ma ma ki ri dri chu maN+Da dkyil 'khor

la hU~M/ dbus nas shar te dbus nas byang chub sems dang/ shar du dri chen dang/ lhor mAM sa/ nub tu pad rAg/ byang du dri chus/ g.yas bskor gdab/ pas/ ! dbus chos kyi dbyings/ shar me long/ lho mnyam nyid/ nub so sor rtogs pa/ byang bya ba grub ba'i/ ye shes lnga yi byin

rlabs phebs par bsam// ras bal pad+ma'i rgyus pa dang// shi ba'i skra yi skud pa'am// ba su ta yi thig skud byas/ thig skud la bzhi ste/ rgyu phyi ltar ras bal lam/ pad+ma'i rgyus pa/ nang yugs skra'am shi skra la bya'o// gsang ba ni khyi dkar po'i rgyu ma'am zhing gi rgyu

ma'o// ye shes lnga ldan ! kyi thig skud lnga bsgril gyis steng gi thig/ nam mkha' la thig gdab ste ye shes kyi lha steng gi nam mkha' la dpang por spyan drangs// sa thig dam tshig gi thig skud gsum bsgril gyis sa la btab pas sa gzhi/ sku gsung thugs/ mi zad pa rgyan gyis 'khor

lo'i che ba rgyas par bsam/ !/ slob dpon nub tu bzhugs pa thams cad dbang du byed pas so// theg grogs yum la gsum// dang por btsal// bar du chas su gzhug/ tha mar byin brlab bau// dang po ni rgyal rigs sam/ rje'u rigs sam/ dmangs sam/ bram ze'am/

gdol pa'i bu mo mtshan ldan no// chas ni khrus bya/ drin zhim pos byugs/ gu gul bdug/ bgegs bskrad/ rgyan gdags so// byin gyis brlab pa ni/ yab kyi spyi bor thig skud bzhags 'od du zhu nas lhag pa byang chub sems su byin brlab/ yum gyi spyi bor bzhags pas yum

gyi lhag pa byang sems su byin gyis brlab bo/ la shar du yum/ bzhugs te bde ba'i ye shes shar bas so// bkra shis pas mchog grub mtshan ldan gyis thun mong grub pa'o/ gzungs ma'i yum/ sku'i yon tan ni/ zhal nas ut+pal ngad ldan zhing/

ut+pal mdzes pa dang/ ngad zhim pa dang/ sbrang rtsi mang ba dang/ bung bas blang par bde ba ltar/ sku mdzes par mtshon dper tshang/ dri zhim pas ma mo mkha' 'gro 'du/ rak+ta mang bas dam rdzas tshang/ kun nas 'grog par sla bas dam tshig mi nyams pa'o// gsung gi yon tan/ skad

kyang ngang pa gzhon nu 'dra// snyan par smra zhing tshul dang ldan// bkra shis mtshan ldan thugs kyi yon tan yid du 'ong// mnyen lcug 'khril ldem dbyer mi phyed/ yon tan gyi yon tan/ rdo rje las kyi don grub ma// gnyis med

sbyor ba'i byin rlabs kyis/ byang sems dkar dmar ni 'khor 'das kun bskyed pa'i rgyu yin pas/ des btab pas rang bzhin lhun gyis grub pa'i gzhal yas khang 'byung bar 'gyur ba'o// yab yum mkha' nas thig bris la gdab pa'o// gsang ba'i dkyil

'khor phrin las kyi yon tan thig 'debs kyis// las rnams ma lus kun gyis shig/ sa ma ya ho// sa ma ya s+t+waM/ de nas thig gdab bzhi las/ dang po khyab pa spyi'i thig snang srid chos nyid du rtogs pa'o// gnyis pa gsang ba byang chub sems

kyi thig ni/ thig skud yum gyi mkha' la 'phangs pas lhag pa byang chub sems dkar brengs kyis song bas// yum gyi mkha' zla khams su gsal ba'o// gsum pa ting nge 'dzin gyi thig ni steng du btab pas gzhal yas khang

du gyur pa'o// 'og tu btab pas 'og gzhal yas khang du gyur pa'o// bzhi la rdul tshon gyi thig cha phye ba'o// thabs dang gsang ba byang chub sems kyi thig gdab pa shes rab ldan pa'i byin rlabs las/ theg pa 'og ma phyi kri yog man chad la/ gsang ba mchog gi dkyil 'khor chen po 'dir// gsang

ba byang chub sems kyi thig/ yab kyi byang sems yum gyi mkhar phab pas thig tu gyur pa/ btab pas// ye shes gzhal yas de la gzhal yas khang zla kham pa yum yi mkha' gyur to/ pho brang lhun gyis grub// oM gu h+ya e kra dz+nyA na maN+Da la hU~M/ !

ting nge 'dzin gyi thig ni/ ye shes lnga ldan gnam thog gis// steng gi 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad dkyil 'khor pho brang gzhal yas khang du gyur 'gyur/ bar bsam mo/ sa thig btab pas 'og gi 'jig rten gyi khams thams

cad yang// dkyil 'khor pho brang gzhal yas khang chen por gyur par bsam pa'o// thig gi 'bras bu bstan pa// thabs dang shes rab ldan pa'i byin rlabs las// gsang ba mchog gi dkyil 'khor chen po 'dir// gsang ba

byang chub sems kyi thig btab pas// dur khrod bdal ba'i gzhal yas lhun gyis grub/ b+h+rUM bi shwa bi shud+d+he/ badzra dz+nya na tsakra/ ma d+ha la b+h+rUM mtshon pa rdul tshon gyi thig ni dbus mi 'gyur ba'i thig/ shar me long/ lho mnyam nyid/ nub so sor

rtog pa/ byang bya ba grub pa/ ye shes kyi gzhal yas khang la phyi dur khrod 'bar bar bsam mo/ !/ drug pa tshon bstan pa la gsum ste/ rgyu/ rak+ta/ byin rlabs so// rgyu la gsum ste rab bstan no// 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po'i rdzas// bu sha ra ga gser dang

ni// pad+ma rA ga mar ka ta// in+d+ra nI la tshon du sbyar/ !/ tshon gyi rgyu bstan pa la gsum ste/ phyi dang/ nang dang/ gsang ba'o// phyi la gsum ste/ rab dkyil 'khor 'bri ba'i yon bdag 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po byed pa'i dbang du bshad pa ste/ dkar po rin po

che pu sha ra ga las byas pa'o// ser po gser/ dmar ba pad+ma rA ga/ ljang gu mar gad/ mthing ga in+d+ra nI la'o// de yang rgyu bzang na byin rlabs che ba dang/ tshogs rdzogs pa dang brnyas pa mi bya ba'i dgos pa yod de/ rgyu bzang po la kun dang bas sems dang ba skye bas byin rlabs

che'o// tshogs rdzogs pa ni sa tshon bla ma dang mched kyis tshogs byas nas sangs rgyas kyi sku gzugs bzhengs pa'o// brnyas pa mi bya ba ni blun po ba glang rdzi lta bu yang tshul bsrung bar 'gyur te/ rgyal po'i bran yang yid ches shing dang ba'o// 'bring gi/ mi yi dbang pos sbyar ste

dkar po nas sam 'bras/ las byas pa dang/ ser po/ bra'o las byas pa dang/ dmar po ram bu nas dmar po la bya dang/ ljang gu nas sam nas kyi/ nag po sran ma la sogs pa bya// ljang pa sran ma la sogs pa// 'bring dang zhi ba'i tshon du

bshad/ zhi ba rdo rje dbyings kyi dkyil 'khor la khyad par du tshon 'bru sna lnga las bya'o// dur khrod kyi rdzas dang dbang po thal chen ser pos sdong ros dang/ dmar po ro bsregs pa/ de yi so phag ljang gu dur khrod ram pa/ dUr ba dang/ sol bas bris ba

'di ni khyad par du khro bo yi// dkyil 'khor dag la rab tu shis/ tshon tha ma dkar po/ rdo thal ser po sa ser ram bab la ldong/ ros/ dmar po/ skag gyis bsgyur la dmar po bya ba dang/ mthing ga/ rams kyi bsgyur ba las byas

dang nag po 'bru bsregs pa/ zhi khro thun mong gi/ tha ma'i rdul tshon dag tu bshad/ !/ rak+ta ni gsang ba'i tshon ni 'bras bu chen po lnga bsgral ba'i rak+ta 'am yum mtshan ldan gyi pad+ma rak+ta'o// ri mo gcig pa zhes bya ba// de dag thams cad ri mo

gcig/ chags pa'i rak+ta byang chub sems// gsang sngags nang pa'i/ dkyil 'khor kun nam gzugs brnyan kun la rak+ta gtang ngo/ gyi tshon rtsir bshad/ !/ yi ge 'bru lngas byin brlabs pa// phyag mtshan rig lnga yab yum

'gyur// sa ma ya ho/ sa ma ya s+t+waM/ rA ga ya mi/ bo d+hi tsit+ta dz+nyA na ma d+ha la hU~M/ thod pa lnga phyogs bzhi dbus dang lngar bzhag gtso bo'i thugs ka nas yig 'bru lnga 'phros dngos po bsres nas 'bru

lngar gyur/ de 'phros 'dus pas phyag mtshan lngar gyur/ de 'od du zhu ba las ye shes lnga'i sngags brjod pas ye shes lngar gyur par bsam mo// rang bzhin 'byung ba lnga yi khyad par las/ tshon gyi che ba bzhi ste/ rgyu ma byas dag pas che ste/ phyi nang gsang ba'i rgyu yang ye shes rang byung gi 'byung ba lngar shar ro// rkyen ma bsgrubs

sbyangs pas che ste byin gyis brlabs pa de yang sngags brgya stong du mas bsgrubs te/ ting 'dzin skad cig mas sbyangs/ 'bras bu ye shes rang shar bas che ste/ dpa' bo 'bru lnga la phyag mtshan lngar gyur de las sku lngar gyur pa de yang ye shes sgyu ma tsam gyi sku/ nam mkha'i 'ja' ltar

rdzogs pa'o// yon tan mchog thun mong grub pas che ba ni thun mong khams gsum thugs rjes sgrol mchog ye shes lngar dag pa'o// 'od kyi 'ja' tshon ye shes lnga ru rdzogs/ khams gsum thugs rjes bsgral ba'i phyir// dag pa dri med ye shes lnga

ru bsgom// oM AHhU~M swA hA/ ye shes lnga dang ldan pas/ 'khor lo rtsibs bzhi tshad med bzhi'i gru chad dang/ thugs rje rgyun chad med pas/ bar khyams rnam thar bzhi'i sgo dang ldan pa la/ ye shes lnga'i/ rin chen brtsigs pa rnam pa lnga/

'dod yon lnga'i lha mo bzhugs snam thugs rje chags pa'i rtags su dmar la rin po che'i pha gu ser/ po// dra ba dra phyed zhi ba mu tig phreng ba dar dmar po la brgyus pa'i khro bo la mi mgo dang snying gi lcags kha la/ las mtha' phyin pas/ da ru khad ni ljang

ngam yang na nyon mongs pa dag pas dkar// rta babs brgyad pad+ma/ sgrom bu/ rta rkang/ za ra tshags/ shar bu/ chun 'phyang/ rin chen/ khyung mgo dang yang dag ldan/ rdo rje ra ba'i lcags ri me dpung 'bar/ bas mtha' 'khor// yang na de yi dbus

su ni// rab tu zlum po'i nang du thig bzhi btab/ pas// le'u tshe dgu dang ldan par bya/ 'o/ sku tsag li gsung yig 'bru thugs kyi phyag mtshan gyi mtshan ma bris/ !/ dkyil 'khor gnyis te/ rdo rje dbyings dang/ 'jigs byed chen po'o// dang po

la gsum ste/ sku phyag rgya'i tsa ka li dkyil 'khor dang/ gsung yig 'bru'i bruM cing ya dkyil 'khor dang/ thugs phyag mtshan gyi'o// 'jigs byed la drug ste/ rang dpal gyi bzhin gyi dang/ ye shes spyan drangs kyi dang/ gzugs brnyan gyi stegs bu dang/ ting 'dzin gyi bskyed pa

dang/ rtsa ba'i thod sku dang/ rgyan gyi dkyil 'khor ral gri mda' la sogs te/ zhi khro gnyis dril bas dkyil 'khor dgu'o// dbus khro bo gnyis las zla kham ni su 'gying phur btab nas bskor/ dbus dang tha ma/ dbus su khams gsum dbang du bsdus pa'i

rtags// zla kham dmar po nub bstan sgo/ de'i/ nang du 'khor gyi zla kham chung ba dgu yang bris// nub zla kham dkar dmar kha sprod pa'i phyogs zla kham dkar por bya/ zla gam gyi phyi'i/ mu khyud thod pa rdo rjes ra ba bskor// yang na

dbus su 'khor lo rtsibs brgyad mthing gar bya'o/ pa// zla kham 'khor lo rtsibs brgyad dam dbus dam dgu dang ldan par bri/ phrin las mthar phyin pas// gru chad ljang gu lha snam sems can la chags kyang bden gnyid dbyer med gcig tu mtshon

pas dmar// sgo ni phyogs dang mthun pa la/ shar dkar/ lho ser/ nub dmar/ byang ljang/ dpal gyi pho brang 'og min nas ting nges bstims la gzhag/ phyogs bzhi dbus dang lngar/ ye shes lngar ldan bstim thod pa tshar gsum

sku gsung thugs/ su bstim// dkyil 'khor bri ba'i snga rol du/ stegs bu byas thig btab pa'i rjes la/ bsre bsnan cho ga rab tu bya/ mched gsar pa// ma 'dres pa rnams yol bas bcad/ la dkyil 'khor mi ston no// 'dres pa

bsnan la dang por mtshams dang bshags/ yi dam gyi/ lha gsher ming gsang mtshan gsher de rnams brjed 'dug na dbog/ sman bsdus gsang ba'i rdzas la brten nas bskang bas na byin rlabs yi dam gyi dkyil 'khor bskyed/ lha

la/ sman gyis mchod rang re rnams dngos grub blang bar bya// rnal 'byor rnams kyi bka' thub bam// rtogs na rang lus sku gsung ngag thugs yid yin te// ma rtogs na ni ngan song gsum/ rtogs na yi dam gyi sku gsung thugs

la/ ma rtogs na ngan song gsum du ltung bas naM sam zhes bya zhing/ gti mug sku ste byol song/ 'dod chags gsung ste yi dwags/ zhe sdang thugs te dmyal ba// su yang ris su bcad nas gang yang/ 'da' bar ma byed cig/ de nas mched ma 'dres pa dang 'dres

pa bsre/ ba la bcu las/ dang por bca' ba zangs ni dbang yin dngul ni zhi ba de gnyis bsres pa'i me long gis maN+Dal bya// ma d+hal dri yi thig le lnga// tshoms lnga rigs lnga'i dkyil 'khor bskyed// rdo rjes 'i lam nas byang chub kyi lam sgor

drang/ bar bya'o// rdo rje sku ltar skye 'jig dang bral ba yi dkyil 'khor du// bdag kyang lus skye 'jig dang bcas pa 'di skye 'jig med par bsgrub pa'i phyir bdag/ 'jug par// 'tshal lags kyi/ lha dang bla ma'i/ thugs rjes bdag 'jug

pa po la dgongs nas kyang// bdag gi 'khor ba nas myang 'das su 'dren pas na gnas rab mdzad du gsol// gsung dang thugs kyang gos bsgyur der shes bya// byang chub rdo rje rgyal sras 'khor dang bcas pa lcam dral la/ sngon gyi sgrub

pa pos/ mchod cing ji ltar bgyis pa ltar// bdag kyang 'khor ba nas mya ngan las 'das par rab tu bsgral ba dang/ skye 'jig dang bral ba'i don/ nam mkha'i rdo rje deng bdag stsol/ zhes brjod nas lus ngag yid gsum dang bas/ slob dpon

dag la yon phul nas/ slob ma la/ thugs rjes gzung bar rab tu zhu/ 'o// 'khor ba nas myang 'das su 'gro bar rig pas na// bdag gi rig pa'i me tog 'di yi dam gang yin brtag pa'i phyir// rig pa'i me tog lha la 'bul/ 'khor

rnams kyis gus pa bya ba yang gtso bo kho na y-in pas na// me tog dbus su gtad la dor/ gang la babs pa lhag pa'i lha/ rigs gang yin brtag pa'o// rtsa ba sku bla ma mched lcam lha gsung gsang sngags dang phyag rgya thugs gsang ba bcu dang yan

lag bcas/ phog pa las/ mi 'da' sangs rgyas nyid ma grub bar du bsrung ngo zhes/ phyi dbang dus su/ yang dang yang du nang dbang dus su dam tshig bcas pa bzhin/ phangs pa'i/ lus dang srog gces pa'i la babs kyang dam tshig ma

btang zhig/ sa ma ya dang tshig hU~M// nyon mongs lngas rigs drug tu 'khor ba'i sems can rnams// bu khyod kyi ni mi shes pa'i// ma rig pa yi ling tog rnams/ ye shes mig dang 'dra bar mkhyen pa la/ ma rig pa ling

tog dang 'dra bas bsgribs pa// bde gshegs sman pa mkhas pa dang 'dra ba'i dgongs pas ma rig pa'i ling tog bsal bar bya// tsak+Shu mig pra be sha dbyai phaT/ de nas dam tshig bsre bar bya ba yang// rdo rje slob dpon yang lus can yin pas

sku'i dam tshig gtso nyid dang// rdo rje mched dang lcam dral yang lus can yin pas na sku'i dam tshig la/ phangs pa'i/ lus dang gces pa'i srog la bab gyur kyang/ brnag par bya bas na// zhe sdang mnar sems yid la dran du mi rung bas na mi

bskyed do// 'di ni sku yi dam tshig ste/ gsang sngags gsang ba mchog gi/ dam tshig mchog las 'da' mi bya// dam tshig mchog las ma 'da' zhig/ sa ma ya dam tshig na ra kan/ mnas bskyal ba/ !/ sangs rgyas kyi bka'i dgongs pa

mkhyen pas/ lung dang ldan pa'i slob dpon gyi/ gsang sngags kyi bcud du 'dzin par nus pas na// snod dang ldan pa'i slob ma la// yi dam gsal ba'i yi dam bsgom pa sku'i dam tshig yin pas de'i sngags dang phyag rgya 'bog pa la dgongs pas lha

phog pas/ sngags zlos pa dang phyag rgya bcas nas brda sprod pa rgyun mi gcad/ pa// 'di ni gsung gi dam tshig sngags kyis 'bod phyag rgyas brda sprod pa ste/ gsang sngags theg pa kun gyi/ dam tshig mchog yin la de'i bsrung bya las 'da' bar mi

bya/ sngags kyi phyi pa las khyad par du 'phags pas// dam tshig mchog las ma 'da' zhig/ sa ma ya dam tshig na ra kan/ 'da' ri shi zhes pa'o// lus/ bskyed rim dang sems rdzogs pa'i rim pa'i man ngag ni// gnas pa rtsa yi dkyil

'khor dang/ rtsa gzhal yas khang dang lha sku'i dbyibs su// grub pa sngags kyi yi ge dang/ 'bru lnga'i gsung du gnas pas// brten pa lus kyi khams kyi bdud rtsi dang/ lha'i sku nyams bde bar gnas pa'o// snying po rlung gi man ngag rnams/

lha'i thugs su gnas pas sems can gyi dran rtog ltar thugs rje 'char ba'o// 'di ni thugs kyi dam tshig ste/ bla ma'i man ngag thugs la brnag par bya ba'i don// dam tshig mchog phog pa las 'da' mi bya/ ma 'da' zhig ces pa'o// phyi pa las khyad par

'phags pa// dam tshig mchog las ma 'da' zhig/ sa ma ya na ra kan/ 'di ni sku lus can gsung brda sprod la thugs brnag par bya bas kyi dam tshig ste// dam tshig gong ma gsum po ma 'das na/ yi dam lha/ rdo rje sems dpa'

slob ma'i snying la gnas te// sku gzi brjid gsung smra brjod thugs mkhyen pa'i ye shes sam dran rtog la dbang thob kyi dngos grub ni/ skye ba phyi mar mi 'gor/ tshe 'di nyid la thob gyur la// dam tshig phog pa rnams ma bsrung bar nyams par gyur

pa na/ yun ring po mi thogs par/ tshe 'di nyid la rdo rje dmyal bar ltung// oM sku AHgsung hU~M/ thugs/ ming bsre ba ni// rdo rje las bos gsang mtshan gdags/ lha bsre ba ni bab pa'i lha dang mos pa'i// yi dam lha yang dpog par bya// de

yi snying po bsre pa'i phyir phog byas nas// rdo rje'i gral bse ba gsar pa re dang rnying pa re bsre spel phreng ba gtad// rig pa phreng ba gtad srog gi 'brel ba'i thugs rje'i brtse gdung du phreng thag la/ mched pho

rnams/ thabs dang mo rnams shes rab rig pa brtse gdung phreng thag 'brel ba'i phreng ba brgyus/ sems nyid/ rtse gcig lha bsgom pa dang 'grogs pa'i ting 'dzin gyis/ spyod lam dus bzhir mi gtang pa// 'dzab zlos yi dam lha bsnyen pas na zur

ma chag par rkyen dbang du ma song bar bgrang du gsol/ rdo rje/ badzra ma le phreng ba traM/ rat+na rigs// rtsa ba sku gsung thugs kyi dam tshig dang// bsnyen bsgrub rnam bzhi bsnyen pa nye bsnyen sgrub pa sgrub chen bsnyen cing bsgrub pa

dang// yi dam zhi khro'i lha mchog 'dzab bsnyen drang ba'i phyir/ gsang ba'i/ dam tshig mnos nas rdo rje'i gral du mchi bar gnang// tiSh+Tha bzhugs shig sa ma ya dam tshig hU~M// dam tshig gsar pa bsre ba rnying pa bsnan pa ma byas

na// gsar rnying mched rnams ga la 'dre/ dkyil 'khor du ma zhugs pa rnams zhugs par ga la 'gyur// dkyil 'khor dbus su ban+d+ha bsag pa rgyal rigs kyi// ban+d+ha yab yum snying po bri// phyogs bzhir rgyal rigs ko'u rI rje'u

rigs dang/ tso'u rI// dmangs rigs pra mo hA/ bram ze be tA lI lha mo bzhi// mtshams bzhir khrus mkhan puk+ka sI gar mkhan dang/ g+hasma rI// gdol pa sme sha nI btso blag mkhan tsan+d+ha lI rnams kyi// tshal bu mnyam par lha mo

ri// snying po lhar bskyed dbang byin brlabs/ rak+tas snying po bri rtsa sngags lhar bskyed ye shes lngas dbang bskur sku gsung thugs su byin brlabs/ rang rang gnas nas/ spyan drang dkyil 'khor dag la dgod/ dpal gyi zhal bu ni thod pa mtshan ldan

no// zhal bu ka pA la'i mtshan gsol pa/ dngos grub gnyis ster bas/ 'phrul zhal yid bzhin phra men gser la g.yus spras pa 'dra rgyan gyis bklubs/ mkha' 'gro mas bskyod pa ste// rkang med mkha' la 'gro ba'i tog tog rkan sgra can/

!/ sngon thod pa mtshan ldan sa la sbas pas nam mkha' la rkan sgra rdebs shing song ba'o// sngon gyi skyes mchog sgrub pa po yi rdzas yin gyi/ !/ de sgrub pa pos sngags kyis bkug pas dpal chen po'i dngos grub grub pa'o// rnal 'byor pa gang// su zhig

mchog thun mong gi dngos grub 'dod pa nang thod pa mtshan ldan nga la long// gang zhig nga yi bka' ! gsang sngags kyi gzhung ltar mi byed rtsa ba dang yan lag gi dam tshig la mi gnas pa/ thod pa mtshan ldan/ nga yi gzugs mthong tsam

gyis 'tshig pa dang/ thod pa mtshan ldan yod ces pa'i// sgra dag thos pa tsam gyis brlag par 'gyur// dkar po zangs g.yag 'tsher ba ni// snga rab 'das pa'i bcom ldan 'das/ thod pa skam pos chos sku ste skam thag chad pa dang

'dra bas chos sku sgrib pa mtha' dag dang bral ba'o// chos kyi sku dri ma med pa'o/ dang rab ldan zhing/ rigs drug gi/ 'gro ba'i don mdzad pas na la de bzhin gshegs// rlon pa lcang lor bcas pa ni// da ltar bzhugs pa'i bcom

ldan 'das// longs spyod rdzos pa'i sku ! thod par ri zhes pa ban+d+ha lcang lo can longs sku ste longs sku ye shes sgyu ma ltar skam rlon bar ba'o/ dang rab ldan zhing/ las nyon gyi dbang du/ 'gro ba'i rnams kyi gnas der mi gtong bas don

la de bzhin gshegs// dmar po ra ri chags pa ni// slad kyis 'byon pa'i bcom ldan 'das// sprul pa'i *! dbang po lnga dang ldan pa sprul sku ste/ mngon shes dang ldan pa ltar dbang po tshang ba'o/ sku mdzad pa rdzogs pa dang rab ldan

zhing// 'gro ba'i sems can gyi don mdzad pas na la de bzhin gshegs// dbus na rab byung grub pa'i lha// dus gsum sangs rgyas rnams kyi thugs kyi ngo bo yin pas na// thugs mchog badzra rdo rje he ru ka khrag 'thung// badzra kro d+hI shwa rI rdo

rje khro mo dbyings phyug gnyis// rang bzhin 'og min lhun gyis grub pa'i dkyil 'khor chen po nas// dzaHhU~M baM hoHbrjod pa sngags kyi phyag rgya bzhi dzaHhU~M baM hoHbzhi bsgom la lha'i phyag rgya mtshon pa dpe'i phyag rgya bzhi/ rgyal po spyan 'dren pa lta bu bca' ba lus kyi

phyag rgya bzhi lcags kyu zhags pa lcags sgrog dril bu/ spyan drangs shing// dur khrod chen po'i gnas mchog dang/ !/ phyi gnas kyi dur khrod brgyad dang/ nang lus kyi dang/ gsang ba yum gyi b+ha ga'i dang/ de kho na nyid rnam shes kyi dang/ mtshon pa dpe'i

dang// 'bras bu don gyi dur khrod @#/ brgyad do// dug gsum gti mug can tshangs pa/ 'dod chags can lha chen po/ zhe sdang can khyab 'jug bsgral ba'i dkyil 'khor 'dir// lha chen po rU tra pho mo bskol ba'i gdan stengs su/ de ltar longs spyod

la// dgyes shing gshegs bzhud mi mdzad par ni// brtan par bzhugs su gsol// thabs kyi rgyal po yin pas sku gsum nyid dpal he ru ka'i rang bzhin du gnas pa'o/ dpal chen nyid kyi gnas// rgyal po'i/ pho brang yin pa'i rtags dang

snod bcud tha mal las khyad par du byas pa ltar lha gzhan pas khyad par rgyan du che// sprul pa lcang lo mang po'i kha bad can/ !/ ban+d+ha rlon pa sprul sku'i rtags te dbang po lnga dang ldan pas mngon shes lnga mtshon// dbang po rnam lnga snod bcud rgyan

bkram nas/ ban+d+ha snod chos kyi dbyings nas dbang po lnga btud ye shes lngar 'char bas na/ dngos po dang mtshan ma'i mtha' la// mi gnas pas na dpal chen yab yum yab thabs kyi ye shes chen po yum shes rab chos dbyings stong pa/ bzhugs pa'i rten du

'bul// badzra shrI he ru ka/ rdo rje dpal khro bo/ badzra kro d+hI shwa rI s+t+waM/ rdo rje khro mo dbyings phyug/ sa ma ya ho/ dam tshig pa dgyes/ sa ma ya s+t+waM/ dam tshig dus la bab/ sa ma ya tiSh+Tha lhan/ dam tshig la brtan par bzhugs// rdo rje rigs mchog chen

po ste/ thabs rgya che ba/ rdo rje shes rab zab pa dril bu'i rig pa 'dzin/ snying rje chen po/ thabs dang stong pa nyid shes rab gnyis su ldan/ thabs kyi don mdzad shes rab kyi don rtogs pa'i// rtags kyi phyag rgyar bzhugs su gsol// oM

bid+ya dz+nyA na badzra hU~M/ rigs pa ye shes rdo rje/ sa ma ya ho/ sa ma ya s+t+waM/ sa ma ya tiSh+Tha lhan/ oM d+harma chos kyi dbyings kyi d+ha tu gan d+ha hU~M/ sa ma ya ho/ sa ma ya s+t+waM/ sa ma ya tiSh+Tha lhan/ !/ bzhugs gnas so so'i mtshan nyid// phyogs

mtshams rang byung grub pa'i lha/ ma mo so so'i che ba// ma mo chen mo me 'bar ma/ ba spu'i bu ga nas me 'bar bas sku la bskal pa'i me 'bar ba'i dbus// rdo rje thugs kyi khro mo brgyad/ ma mo'i grangs/ gnas kyi rang bzhin// dur khrod chen po'i gzhal

yas khang/ gnas kyi che ba// dug gsum gti mug tshang pa/ 'dod chags ma hA de ba/ zhe sdang khyab 'jug/ bsgral ba'i dkyil 'khor 'dir/ bzhugs gdan// mchog phran bsnol ba'i gdan stengs su/ bzhugs tshul// dgyes shing brtan par bzhugs su

gsol// ma mo chen mo me 'bar ma/ mtshan// ko'u ri ri shar dkar mo/ chen mo gshegs su gsol/ sku mdog/ mthing nag 'bar ba'i ral pa can/ dpal chen pos rU tra btul ba'i/ sngon tshe ye nas bsnyen pa'i lha// sngon

gyi thugs dam da lta rnal 'byor sgrub pa po/ bdag dang gcig/ gnas gang du na/ dur khrod chen po'i gzhal yas su// gdan gang/ zhing chung bsnol ba'i gdan stengs su/ tshul ji ltar// dgyes shing brtan par bzhugs su gsol// tso'u ri

lhor chom rkun mo pra mo nub rmongs mo be tA lI/ byang ro langs ma/ puk+ka shar lho spos ma g+hasma lho nub sge sha can sme sha nub byang sle mo ni/ nub byang ma tshogs ma// tsan d+ha byang shar gtum mo tshul mchog de yis dgod/ ko'u ri ma dang

'dra bar// skye med chos kyi dbyings nyid las/ gnas khang phyi'i mtshan nyidaganas khang nang gi mtshan nyid ro'i klong// dur khrod chen po'i gzhal yas khang/ gnas khang gsang ba'i mtshan nyid yum gyi b+ha ga/ zla kham dbang gi dkyil 'khor gsal/

bzhugs gdan gtso bo la// dbang phyug 'khor rnams la mchog bran gdan steng na/ rgyu'i dus na rnam shes tshogs dgu 'bras bu'i dus na ye shes dgur shar nas lam gyis dus na// yang dag don gyi lha dgu ru// rang bzhin 'od gsal ye shes dgu// sgrib pa dgu po

rang gsal phyir/ gti mug la sogs mun pa dgu ye shes dgur/ dngos po dang mtshan mar mi dmigs te/ gsal bya bsgrib pa dgu sel phyed kyi lha dgu bsal ba'i don ye shes dgur phye yang/ don la dbyer med du// dmigs

med gsal rtog med tshul gyis// dgyes shing brtan par bzhugs su gsol// oM dz+nyA na d+hi pa A lo ke dz+wa la tiSh+Tha lhan/ ye shes mar me gsal ba 'bar ba brtan par bzhugs// skye spyi'i gnas med chos kyi dbyings nyid na/

bye brag gi gnas// bde skyid dga' ldan lha yi yul/ khyad par gyi gnas// lcang lo can gyi pho brang du// rjes 'jug sgrub pa po gang yin gyi gnas// dur khrod chen po'i gzhal yas khang/ gdug pa can bsgral ba'i gnas// ma trang bsgral ba'i

khog pa la/ dpal gyi pho brang gi gnas// zla kham dgu pa'i dkyil 'khor 'dir// spyir dbyings las ye shes 'char ba ni nam mkha' la nyi ma 'char ba lta bu'o// ye shes dgu yi snang ba gsal// chos kyi dbyings gang du yang ma g.yos pa kyi ye

shes kyis// snod 'byung ba lnga bcud 'gro drug 'jig rten nam mkha' kun la khyab pa ltar chos kyi dbyings kyis/ kun la khyab/ pa'o/ khyab pa'i ye shes chen po yi// 'khor ba kun nyon dang ni byang chub rnam byang kun/ chos kyi dbyings kyi ye shes
nam mkha' lta bu la sprin// mi gnas pa yi tshul gyis ni/ mar me dgod pa'i gnas// thugs rjes dbus kyi gzhal yas su// dgyes shing brtan par bzhugs su gsol// dgyes shing brtan par bzhugs nas

kyang/ bsal bya'i sgrib pa/ gti mug 'thibs pa'i mun pa bsal du gsol// oM dz+nyA na gar+b+ha hU~M/ sa ma ya ho/ sa ma ya staM/ sa ma ya tiSh+Tha lhan/ ye shes kyi ngo bo ma 'gags par rang gsal bas// me long lta bu'i ye shes kyis// skye med byang

chub sems nyid ni/ ma skyes pa me long gi zhal smra brjod bral ba 'dra// ma skyes pa me long gi gzugs brnyan la rnam tog med pa 'dra/ rang rig byang chub sems dang sangs rgyas kyi sku gsung thugs dbyer med pas na// sku gsung thugs su nges par

rtogs// gnyis su med pa'i tshul gyis ni// zhi bas rtogs pa khyad par can skye ba'i gnas// rtogs pa chen po dung gi gzhal yas su// dgyes shing brtan par bzhugs su gsol// dgyes shing brtan par bzhugs nas kyang/

bsal bya'i sgrib pa/ zhe sdang gi dmyal bar skye ba'i 'bar ba'i mun nag bsal du gsol// gnyis su med pa/ mnyam pa nyid kyi ye shes kyi ngo bo kyis/ !/ snod ma dag pa 'byung ba lnga dag pa chos nyid/ bcud ma dag pa sems can dag pa sangs

rgyas// snod bcud kun gyi 'jig rten dang// 'khor ba ngan pa mi 'dor ba dang ni byang chub bzang ste mi len par kun/ 'khor 'das/ thams cad dbyer med du mnyam pa nyid du rtogs/ dbye ba can du/ mi dmigs pa yi tshul gyis

ni// tshe dang bsod nams dpal dang 'byor pa// rgyas pa chen po gser gyi gzhal yas su// dgyes shing brtan par bzhugs su gsol// dgyes shing brtan par bzhugs nas kyang// bsal bya'i sgrib pa// nga rgyal 'bar ba'i

lhar skye ba'i mun nag mar me bltams pas mun pa sel ba ltar ye shes shar bas ma rig pa nga rgyal ye shes su shar ro/ bsal du gsol// so sor rtog pa'i ye shes kyi ngo bo kyis// 1 rang dang 3 mi 'dra ba thun mong ma yin pa rang gi mtshan nyid la 'dra

ba spyi yi mtshan 24 nyid rnams/ spyi dang rang gi mtshan nyid// ma 'dres so sor gsal bar rtogs// ma 'dres pa// gnas pa chen po'i tshul gyis ni// snod bcud dbang du sdud pas// dbang sdud chen mo byu ru'i gzhal yas

su// dgyes shing brtan par bzhugs su gsol// dgyes shing brtan par bzhugs nas kyang// 'dod chags 'bar gyis mir skye ba'i mun nag bsal du gsol// bya ba nan tan mthar phyin par grub pa'i ye shes kyi ngo bo

kyis// bdag gi lus longs sku ngag sprul yid chos sku/ don sku gsum lhun gyis grub// gzhan don gdul bya rnams 'khor ba nas drangs nas/ 'og min myang 'das kyi gnas su sbyor/ bya ba grub par byed pa ste de yang dngos po dang mtshan ma// ci yang

ma yin tshul gyis ni// mthar phyin chen po g.yu yi gzhal yas su// dgyes shing brtan par bzhugs su gsol// dgyes shing brtan par bzhugs nas kyang/ phrag dog 'bar ba'i bsal bya lha min du skye ba'i mun nag

bsal du gsol// spros pa med pa'i ngang du sbyor bas// stong pa nyid kyi ye shes kyi ngo bo kyis// snod bcud gnyis ka dag ma dag kun gyi 'jig rten dang/ 'khor ba dang ni byang chub kun/ snod bcud la chos dang gang zag

gi bdag med pas// thams cad stong zhing bdag med de/ nam mkha' ltar/ stong pa nyid kyi tshul gyis ni// kun la phan pas/ byams pa chen po'i shar lho'i gzhal yas su// dgyes shing brtan par bzhugs su gsol// dgyes

shing brtan par bzhugs nas kyang/ bsal bya/ 'khor ba khams gsum rgyud drug tu 'khyams shing ldaungs pa'i mun nag bsal du gsol/ bde ba chen po la snyom par 'jug pas na// 'da' dka' thugs kyi ye shes kyis/ sdug bsngal dang

bden pa dbyer med par// rtogs pa mnyam pa nyid du bzhag/ bde ba thugs thig le sku chags pa gsung// ting nge 'dzin gyi sku gsum rdzogs/ thugs ye shes las// mi 'da' ba yi tshul gyis ni/ kun la brtse bas// snying rje chen po lho nub

tu rin chen gzhal yas su// dgyes shing brtan par bzhugs su gsol// dgyes shing brtan par bzhugs nas kyang/ dgos pa/ ting 'dzin gsal du mi ster ba'i sgrib pa bying rgod rmongs pa'i mun pa bsal du gsol// 'khor

ba thams cad ye shes chen por gsal bas// dbyings su sgrol ba'i ye shes kyis// 'khor ba'i khri mun rab rib las/ btson khri mun dong nas thar ba 'dra bar// sku gsung thugs su lhun gyis sgrol/ 'khor ba nas/ pha rol phyin pa'i tshul

gyis ni/ sgraul bas na/ 'khor ba'i sdug bsngal dang bral na dga' bas// dga' ba chen po nub byang bse yi gzhal yas su// dgyes shing brtan par bzhugs su gsol// dgyes shing brtan par bzhugs nas kyang/ lta spyod la mngon

par zhen par chos nyid rang gi mtshan nyid// ma rtogs so sor 'dzin pa'i mun nag bsal du gsol/ bdag nyid chen por gsal bas// klong du gyur pa'i ye shes kyis// snod kyi 'jig rten lha'i gnas gzhal yas khang// bcud kyi

'jig rten lha'i sku khrag 'thung tshogs/ glo bur du ma byas shing ye nas// lhun gyis grub pa'i tshul gyis ni// bzang ngan dbye bsal med pas// btang snyoms chen po byang shar rdo rje'i gzhal yas su// dgyes shing brtan par bzhugs

su gsol// dgyes shing brtan par bzhugs nas kyang/ blta spyod bsgom bsgrub la phyin ci log tu blta bas na// phyin ci log gi mun pa bsal du gsol// oM ma hA dz+nyA na de ba hU~M/ sngags 'di ye shes dgu po re re la brjod par bya'o// sa ma

ya ho/ sa ma ya s+t+waM/ sa ma ya tiSh+Tha lhan/ !/ de yang mchog mi las phye bas mchog phran dud 'gro las/ phye ba la bsgral bya'i zhing bcu yod de// dkon mchog slob dpon sku dgra dang/ dam med dam las log pa dag/ 'dus par 'ong dang yongs la gnod// dam dgra

ngan pa'i ngang tshul can// ngan song gsum zhes pa'i// zhing bcu rU tra'i tshogs rnams bsgral byas nas// sha chen lang ling rkang gi dum bu dang/ 'dod chags khrag gis sbags pa'i/ dur sa btab pa'i gnas nas sha khrag gi khrod yod pas na// zhing gi

ras ros dur khrod rdzas chen rnams/ rang gzhan gyi don grub pas na// dpal gyi tha mal pa la gsang ba'i gtso bo las 'khor gyis bskor bas na dkyil 'khor bskor bar bya// srid pa gsum gyi skye ba'i srid pas gdug pa can

du skyes/ na ba'i srid pas nad gtong/ 'chi ba'i srid pas tshe 'phrog go/ gdug pa kun bsgral te// shes rab zab mo'i yum gyi mkha' dbyings su// mtha' dang dbus med dkyil 'khor rang bzhin te/ chos dbyings mtha' dbus dang bral

bas na dus gsum sangs rgyas 'khor bcas bzhugs pa kho na nyid dkyil 'khor te// phyi nang med par lhun gyis grub pa'i rdzas// chos nyid la phyi nang med pas de na bzhugs pa'i sangs rgyas ye nas lhun grub bo// yid bzhin du 'byung ba'i nor bu rin chen la

dgos 'dod 'byung ba lta bu longs spyod 'dod dgu 'byung ba'i rgyu// ye shes chen po bzhi dang ldan pa'i rtags// phrag dog ma spangs zhing gi g.yang gzhi 'di/ g.yang gzh-i chos kyi dbyings las yan lag bzhi ye shes chen por bzhi'i rang

bzhin rtags so// dkyil 'khor chen po'i bla re dgram par bya'o/ !/ phrag dog che bas na mtshan nyid pa dang sngags pa yang mi mthun phrag dog ma spangs pas bya ba grub pa'i ye shes rtog/ de rtog pas spang bya blta ba ngan pa spang/ blta ba ngan pa spangs pas chos nyid

kun la khyab pa'i bla re'o// mchog phur bzhi dang lcags phur bzhi/ sgo bzhir mchog phur mtshams bzhir lcags phur sbom phur shar lhor dgod do// phyogs bzhi mtshams bzhir gzug pa dang// mtha' yang rtsang gi srin rtsang ni srin mo'i phyag rgya

yin te/ srin mos gom pa bsnol nas 'gro bas/ mo 'gros// ba su ta yi rgyu ma'i zhags pas bcing ngo bskor// dpal bshol zla kham rak+ta yis// thig le dgu pa he ru ka'i lha bshos ni dbang du bsdus pa'i las can te 'bul ba dang// rmad

du byung ba'i gtor ma dang/ lho nub tu dgod pa// dmar gyis ar+g+haM chen po dang/ ni thod pa khrag gis bkang ba bzhi dgod do// 'chi med bdud rtsi'i bum pa dang/ byang shar du sman phud dgod// mchod pa rnam pa kun tu rgyu ba/ lnga po dang/ tshe nyi

zla dang mnyam par grub pas na// zab mo mchog gi tshe zan dang/ rigs kyi yab yum// mda' dang 'khor dar sna sgo ba rgyal mtshan rnams// dbang bskur ma thob pa dang dam tshig med pa la// gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor mtha' ma bskor/

!/ dung can ma'am pad+ma can nam/ ba glang can nam// ri dgas can lta bu'i// yum ni mtshan ldan dam tshig bkod/ bud med de nyid kyis bsgom shes na legs min na dpal chen po'i yum du bsgom gtso bo'i g.yon du bzhag ste// byin gyis brlab par byas

nas ni// mig gi rten du g.yon phyogs bzhag/ dgyes pa bskang ba gsang ba'i mchod pa/ gsang dbang bskur ba la dgos te// kro d+hI shwa rI nyid yin no// dpal gyi yum dang 'dra'o// mtshan ldan gyi// bu mo mkhas pas legs bkal

ba'i// thags bzang thags kyang bu mo mtshan ldan gyis btags pa/ phra ras gri la skyes pa dar ma grir bsad pa'i shun gos/ ni ro gos dur khrod rdzas so// brgyangs shing yang// dur khrod mgal pas sam ro'i shing gi mgal bas/ brgyangs nas

ni// tshon rtsi spyin med bzang po yis// thod pa lnga yi kong bu'i nang// dpa' bo 'bru lnga mthing ga'i thod pa'i nang du hU~M dkar por oM ser por swA dmar por AM ljang gur hA/ ye shes kyis/ lha bzo rtsa ba dang yan lag gi/ dam

tshig dang ldan zhing phyi nang gsang ba'i dbang thob pa'i// lha bzo gzugs dang tshon gyi bya ba la mkhas pas bris pa'i sku/ he ru ka la ke'u r-i brgyad kyis bskor ba'i// lha dgu'i dkyil 'khor bzang po ni/ dgos pa ni// sgrub pa po rnams

dgos pa yang// ting 'dzin gsal phyir mig rten dgram/ pas bskyed rim la brten pa ste/ gang zag blo dman rnams las phan gdags pa'i phyir// thang sku'i rgyab tu sku thugs chos sku dri ma med par sku longs sku/ gsung sprul skur byin gyis brlabs pa'o/

gsum gyis// byin rlabs sngags kyang bri bar bya'o// oM ye d+harmA chos he tu rgyu pra b+ha wA/ he tun+te ShAn+ta thA ga to h+ya ba data/ teShAny+tsa yo ni ro d+ha e baM bA dI ma hA shra ma NaHswA hA// chos skur byin gyis brlabs pa'i sngags

so// nam mkhas gar khyab par gzugs sku gnyis byung nas don mdzad pa ltar don mdzad pa'o// oM sngags sor bzhag badzra ku sha smr-i ti dran pa u ta sa/ saM myaka/ yang dag par/ a ri ti/ i tra sa ya bod a gargya/ Ar+Ya ba ti/ 'phags pa/ u

snan ru phye ni ku ru swA hA/ longs sku sa bcu'i byang sems pa'i don mdzad pa ltar byang chub sems dpa'i don mdzad pa'o// longs skur byin gyis brlabs pa'i sngags so// oM badzra dz+nyA na pany+tsa kA ya/ rdo rje ye shes lnga'i sku/ gu Na gar+b+ha bu mi tra sha kra

ni ka ru/ sarba dz+nyA na bA ka sa man+ta/ a mo g+hA ya swA hA/ don yod pa'i sku// sprul skur byin gyis rlob pa'i sngags so// mdzad pa bcu gnyis kyi don mdzad pa ltar sems can gyi don mdzad par bsam mo// sgrub pa po// rang gi lus nyid dur khrod kyi

gzhal yas khang/ du shes par bya ste// lus nyid dkyil 'khor 'dom gang la/ rang lus mi mnyam pa med pas gru bzhi pa nyid dkyil 'khor 'dom gang gru bzhi'o// don snying lnga ! snying nam mkha'/ glo ba rlung/ mchin pa me/ mtsher pa sa/ mkhal ma chu/

dang nang rol drug/ nang rol rgyu ma/ long ka/ mkhris pa/ pho ba/ lgang ba bsam se'u rnams dur khrod kyi rdzas so/ rdzas kyis mdzes par gzhag pa la// mgo ban+d+ha dang yan lag brgyad phur pa'o/ dkyil 'khor rgyan// kun gzhi'i rnam par shis pa'i

kong bu nyon mongs pa'i yi dam lta bur byams pas mar khu/ yum gyi skong bu'i nang// yid ni rang byung gi ye shes chen po me ru gsal// zhes gsungs so// he ru ka yi gal po las// dkyil 'khor du dam tshig sngar ma 'dres pa dang bsre

bsnan bya zhing rdzas dgod pa bstan pa ste/ brtag pa bdun pa'o//// de nas bcom ldan 'das dgyes pa chen po byin rlabs/ dper na sgyu ma mkhan gyis yod pa las med pa'am med pa las yod par sprul pa'am/ rde'u dang/ shing

bu'am rta dang glang por sprul pa ltar byin gyis brlab bo/ 'byung ba'i ting nge 'dzin la bzhugs nas 'di gsungs so// mi dmigs chos la blo ! chos kyi dbyings stong pa nyid las blo 'byongs par byas nas brtags shing// ye shes can gyis

sbyin stobs kyis/ chos kyi dbyings las cir yang snang ba'i ye shes sgyu ma'i stobs kyis/ gnas dang sgrub pa po la sogs pa// thams cad tshul bzhin 'og nas 'byung ba byin gyis brlabs/ byin gyis brlab pa'i dgongs pa ni thams

cad// nus mthu can du de dag 'gyur// dbang sgyur chen po'i ting 'dzin ni// sgrub pa po/ sngon du bla ma las dbang rnams thob pa dang// dam tshig yod pa snying rjer che ba ldan pa yis// gnas khang/ ngan pa'i las dri ma rnams

dag byas la/ gnas// dur khrod kyi sar gzhal yas khang du ni byin gyis brlabs// chos dbyings mkha' dbyings yid bzhin 'bar ba'i 'jigs byed 'bar ba'i gnas/ chos dbyings dag pa'i gzhal yas khang ni/ rang skad cig las lhar bsgoms

la raM yaM khaM zhes pas gnas kyi dngos po sbyangs nas chos kyi dbyings nam mkha' ltar dag par bsgom mo// mkha' dbyings dag pa ni/ de'i nang du ye shes kyi 'byung ba lnga yum lnga'i mkhar bsgom mo// yid bzhin 'bar ba ni ri rab kyi steng du b+h+rUM las ye shes las grub pa'i gzhal

yas khang bsgom mo// 'jigs byed 'bar ba ni/ phyi dur khrod 'bar ba'i gzhal yas khang dur khrod brgyad dang ldan par bsgom mo// che ba brjod pa// lha dang dam can gnas 'dir 'dus// rnal 'byor bag yangs bsgrub byin rlobs// dbang sgyur

chen po 'grub gyur cig/ b+h+rUM ka ma la dz+nyA na b+h+rUM// phyag rgya chen po'i ting 'dzin ni/ gnas dur khrod chen po'i dkyil 'khor gyi nang du skal ldan gtso 'khor kun 'dus nas hU~M ha zhes brjod pas gtso bo'i yi ge hU~M las dpal he ru kar bsgom/ g.yon du hU~M las

yum bskyed// sku gsung thugs su byin gyis brlabs/ ye shes lngas dbang bskur/ spyan drangs la bstim mo// gtso bo rang ni cho ga rdzogs nas 'khor byin gyis rlob pa ni/ 'khor rnams yi ge ha re re las mkha' 'gro ma brgyad du bskyed la sku gsung thugs su byin gyis brlabs/ ye

shes lngar dbang bskur ro// dur khrod chen po'i dkyil 'khor 'dir// skal ldan 'dus pa kun 'tshogs nas/ sgrub pa po rnams cho ga gsum gyis lhar bskyed pa/ ye shes lngas dbang bskur sku gsung thugs su byin gyis brlab bo// gtso bo yab yum

skur bskyed de// byin rlabs cho ga kun rdzogs nas/ khro bo'i rgyal po ji bzhin bskyed// 'khor rnams mkha' 'gro brgyad du gsal/ ko'u ri brgyad rnams rang rang gi gnas su bskyed do// mkha' 'gro ma spyan drangs la bstim 'khor rnams ma

mo brgyad du 'dab nas bskyed pa ni/ ma mo re re la yang rang dang sprul pa mang po yod pa'o// gsang ba sgrub pa'i mched lcam rnams/ lha'i skur// phyag rgya chen por lus ngag yid gsum lha'i sku gsung thugs su gsal lo/ rdzogs gyur cig/ hU~M hU~M ha ha/

!/ 'byung ba ! 'byung ba sa'i bcud kyi nus pa lci bas grang ba 'joms/ chu'i bcud kyi nus pa mang bas ngoms par byed/ me'i bcud kyi nus pa rno bas bzi bar sla/ rlung gi bcud kyi nus pa yang la myur bas skyugs par byed/ chang gis mi mthun pa mdza' bar byed sdug bsngal

can pad mo 'byin pas 'dza' gad do/ bcud len ting 'dzin ni// dang po chang byin gyis brlab bo/ bag chags sbyang byas te// gnyis pa dngos grub rdzas la dbab/ ni gcig sman phud du gzhag go// gsum pa rgyal ba sras bcas mchod/

ni gcig phud du gtor ba'o// bzhi pa dngos grub blang bar bya/ ba ni gcig sgrub pa po rang btud do// dang por rgyal ba rnams dza gad la spyan drangs pa'o// sku gsung thugs kyi rang bzhin rgyal ba rgya mtsho rnams/ dag pa lha'i skad

kyis spyan drang ba// e hi e hi tshur spyon tshur spyon zhes spyan drangs 'khor dang bcas// dzaHhU~M baM hoHsa phyag rgya bzhis/ spyan 'dren ma lus gshegs su gsol/ !/ ka la ki la ha ha dga' ba'i bzhad mos dga' ba'i 'khor du bsdus

khong/ bde ba'i gnas su tshud/ bde drongs bde mchog a ho su kha sham par// ti ta shi shi slob mar tshud cig bdag cag rnams 'phags pa'i slob mar dag par gyis/ gnang bar mdzod// rol gtso bo'i zhal du rol du gsol cig dgongs

shig 'dod pa ti sta kha kha khA hi/ rab tu/ sbyin no bskul lo da ra da ra ha ra ha ra zo zhig 'khor rnams la sbyin du gsol/ khA hi// ngo mtshar mchog tu bstab kyis kha kha khA hi/ gtso 'khor kun mnyes par mdzod// kye zla ba la sogs

dmar chen snying po lnga/ bdud rtsi// mAM sa la sogs sha lnga tshe 'phel dpa' bo'i bcud/ khrag lnga/ ma tsa me tsa rak+ta ru d+hi ra/ kri yog ltar lam ring ba ma yin te/ tshe gcig lus gcig g-is 'grub dang sngags dang ting nge 'dzin dang phyag rgyas 'grub pas

na// nye ba'i bsgrub pa'i dngos grub dam pa ma lus rab sgrubs shig/ dri med gzi ldan mchog gi mchod pa dam par sbyar ba 'di// ye shes rgya mtsho rgyal ba zhi khro'i tshogs rnams la 'bul lo rab sprul cig/ bzhes tshul lnga
