ni/ gzung 'dzin gnyis ma chags par 'bul// ma chags par yang bsnam du gsol/ 'khor 'das gnyis su// ma lus par yang bzhes su gsol/ rab tu dgyes par mdzad pa/ a la la ho/ oM ma ma ki ri ke ri a ti ti sta swa maM/ dza gad

yum mA ma kIs bdud rtsir byin gyis brlab tu gsol/ snod b+h+rUM las gzhal yas khang du bskyed/ bcud yi ge mAM las yum mA ma kI dkar mo phyag na bdud rtsi'i bum pa thogs par bskyed/ 'od zer 'phros pas dngos por 'dzin pa'i rtog pa sbyangs te/ 'jig rten gyi bdud rtsi thams

cad bsdus nas dza gad nang du 'dus pas bdud rtsi'i rang bzhin du gyur par bsgom mo// de nas tsho gnyis su bcad la dang po la yang gnyis su bgo ste gcig sman phud bzhag gcig phud gtor tha ma la yang gnyis su bgos te/ gcig sgrub pa po rang btung/ gcig rdzas gzhan

rnams su gtigs re blug go// mi gtsang dag byed ting 'dzin ni// zla ba'i dkyil 'khor las skyes pa// chu gtsang ma dang tsan+dan dkar dmar sbyar la de'i nang du zla dkyil gyi steng du yi ge hriHdmar po las khro mo dbang phyug ma dmar mo phyag na dri'i 'de gu

bsnams pa bskyed pa 'og gi sngags 'di brgya rtsa brgyad re bzlas pas dri chu nyid khro mo dbang phyug ma dang gnyis su med par bsam mo// chu de rdzas kun la bsang bar rgya'o// de yang sngon bskal pa kun bkod bya ba la khyim bdag rab gtsang gi bu khye'u gtsang ma zhes bya ba sangs rgyas

rnams la gtsang mas mchod pa la dgyes nas/ bdag skye ba 'di 'phaus nas/ lus tsan+dan dkar dmar gyi sdong por skye bar gyur cig/ sems byang chub sems dpa' sems mar gyur cing sangs rgyas rnams la dris mchod par gyur cig/ ces brjod pas skye ba de'i 'og

rol tu rus pa tsan+dan dkar po'i sdong por skye pas/ tsan+dan gyong la dri che ba'o// sha khrag tsan+dan dmar por gyur pas phra la bshan cing mnyen pa'o// sems byang chub sems dpa' tsan+dan dpal dang khro mo dbang phyug mar gyur pas byang chub sems dpa' tsan+dan dpal

gyi sngags phyi kri yog la gal che/ khro mo dbang phyug ma'i sngags nang pa la gal che bar gyur pa'o// zhes ting 'dzin rig pa mchog gi rgyud las bshad do/ khro mo dbang phyug zhi ba'i chus// bsangs na thams cad dag par 'gyur// A+oM chos nyid ye nas

rnam par dag pa la// gtsang dang nyes bral lta ba yangs pa'i chu/ gzung 'dzin dag pas blta ba'i chu// mi gtsang zhen chags sbyong ba dran rig dag pa bsgom pa lha yi chu// dri med gtor bas yod med dag pa 'dag pa spyod pa'i

chu// bskal pa bsam rig dag pas bag chags 'khru ba 'bras bu'i chu/ rdzas dang rnal 'byor mtshan ma// gang la phog kyang dag cing gtsang bar 'gyur// oM ye shes lnga kro d+hI khro mo shwa rI dbyings phyug sarba thams cad dra byaM dag pa sho sbyong ba

d+ha ya/ oM AHhU~M hrIHtha// yid bzhin 'bar ba'i ting 'dzin ni// yo byad cha gsum bgo byas nas// mtshams gcad rol pa'i bros sbyangs shing/ rdzas dang yo byad byin gyis brlab pa ni/ bsgrub rdzas kyi yo byad ban+d+ha la sogs pa dang/

'tshe ba bzlog pa'i rdzas go mtshon rnams b+h+rUM dang trAM las mtshon cha lngar byin gyis brlab/ mchod rdzas lha dang lha mor byin gyis brlabs/ 'tsho ba'i rdzas dang yo byad la/ cha gsum du bgos la/ dang po sngon 'gro'i rdzas bya ste/ sbyin pa gtong ba/ mgon po mchod pa/ mtshams kyi gtor

ma bya'o// gnyis pa tshogs bya/ gsum pa phyir ston la bzhag go// trAM las yid bzhin rin chen 'bar/ tshogs rdzas rnams dkyil 'khor gyi steng du spungs la gu gul dud pas bdug/ mtshams bcad rol pa'i gros sbyong/ trAM rat+na tre lo kya ces pas trI las yid bzhin nor

bu rin po cher bskyed do// rdzas la bkra shis dag pa'i rdzas skye ba bdun pa/ byin rlabs sbrul pa'i rdzas zhing chen/ gdul bya zhing gi rdzas zhing bcu/ tshad med snying rje'i rdzas byol song rnams so// tshogs kyi longs spyod ma lus dang/ pa tshogs kyi longs spyod du

'bul// 'khor gyi rgyan ni thams cad kyang/ dkyil 'khor gyi rgyan du 'bul// bam ril khog pa stod smad dang/ zhing btsos dang ni lhag dum dang// rkang dang lhu tsigs tsit+ta'i tog/ so so'i bye brag kun tu dgram/ mchod pa'i

rdzas su 'bul// gzhan yang dur khrod mchod pa dang/ rmad byung gtor ma sha lnga dang/ bdud rtsi lnga dang dpa' bor bcas// rak+ta spyan gzigs rol mo'i sgra// so sor 'tshams pa nyid du bkod// sman phud mchod pa

gtor mar bcas/ dngos grub rten du 'bul// dngos grub rdzas su bcas par dgram/ lha yi dpag bsam shing chen dang/ lha la dpag bsam shing la 'bras bu zas lo ma gos su snang ba// gnod sbyin la bum pa bzang po la dgos 'dod

'byung ba/ dang// klu yi gtsug na yid bzhin nor bu la dgos 'dod 'byung ba ltar 'bul// traM rdzas dang yo byad rnams traM las rat+na trai lo kya phaT/ ces pas yid bzhin gyi nor bu rin po cher byin gyis brlab pa'i sngags so// sku gsung thugs ni so so'i phyag

mtshan no/ kyi ting 'dzin no// thar byed gang dag bshad pa ni/ 'khor bar chags pa las thar bar byed pas rak+ta'o// rak+tas dkyil 'khor bri ba ri mo gcig pa'i sa tshon no// ri mo gcig pa de bzhin te// yang dag thams cad

ri mo gcig/ 'dod chags nyid lhan cig skyes pa'i ye shes gsal bar byed pa'i rten yum mos te kro d+hI shwa rir bsgom pa'o/ ba'i phyir// mig gi rten yang mngon par gzhag/ yum mi dmigs pa las yi ge kroM las// kroM gi yi ge las byung ba/

yum/ kro d+hI shwa re dpal 'bar ma/ ru bsgom// thang sku hU~M las rab rdzogs pa// sangs rgyas dkyil 'khor lha dgur gsal/ gtso bo hU~M dang 'khor ha las mkha' 'gro ma ste lha dgur gsal bar bsgoms la spyan drangs la bstims la bzhugs su

gsol/ thang sku la dgos pa bzhi yod do// lha mchod cing dngos grub blang bar dam bca' ba'i phyir bzhag/ mtshan mo'i ting nge 'dzin bsgom pa'i phyir bzhag phan gnod byed pa'i lha dang 'byung po rtag pa'i phyir bzhag/ lha med na yengs sla bas skyo ba bsang ba'i phyir gzhag go/ des

na sku gzugs ces so// thod sku gsung dang thugs kyi mtshon// thang sku dang thod sku cho ga gsum las lhar bskyed dbang bskur byin brlabs pas// byin brlab rab gnas rdzogs pa'i phyir// gzhi'i lha dang spyan drangs pa gnyis gcig tu 'dres te

dbyer med bsgom/ dkyil 'khor du/ brtan par bzhugs pa'i phyag rgyas bcings nas ni// brtan par bzhugs pa de la phyi nang gsang ba'i mchod pa'i 'bul ba cho ga thams cad bya/ 'o// ban+d+ha bde gshegs sku yi sku/ mi zad pa rgyan gyi

'khor lor byin gyis brlabs// yi ge dang ri mor bris pa 'bru bde gshegs kyi gsung gi gsung/ mi zad rgyan 'khor du// mar me ni bde gshegs kyi thugs kyi thugs/ mi zad rgyan 'khor du'o// rtsa ba/ don gyi lha dgu tshang ba yang// don

gyi lha ni brgya rtsa brgyad// gting mtha' med pa'i skye 'gro rnams/ sprul pa khams gsum sems can kun yang dag gi lhar sems nyid ye nas gnas pas na// sangs rgyas sa la dgod du gsol// he ru ka kro d+hI shwa ri ha ha b+h+yo// dbyings

kong bu dang mar me ye shes ting 'dzin ni// kong bu chos dbyings yum gyi mkha'// mar me ye shes yab kyi 'od/ byin brlab ni bzhi ste/ sku gsum du byin gyis brlab pa dang/ thabs shes rab byang chub sems su byin brlab pa/ sku gsung thugs su

byin brlab pa/ dkyil 'khor gsum byin gyis brlab pa'o// dang po ni/ mar ni chos sku/ snying po me dang bcas pa longs sku/ 'od sprul sku'o// gnyis pa ni snying po thabs te/ snying rje 'am thugs rje'i mdzad spyod/ mar ni shes rab stong nyid du gnas pas/ kun rdzob la don dam gyi

rtsis zin pa'o// de gnyis las byung ba'i 'od byang chub kyi sems so// yang na kong bu shes rab yum gyi b+ha ga/ mar me thabs yab kyi rdo rje/ 'od de gnyis las byung bas byang sems bde chen du shar bas/ lhan skyes kyi ye shes bde stong gis kun la khyab pa'o// gsum pa ni/ kong bu

ni sku/ 'od gsung/ mar thugs su bsgom/ bzhi pa ni/ mar ni rang bzhin gyi dkyil 'khor/ snying po dang 'od ni gzugs brnyan gyi dkyil 'khor/ de la rtog pa dang rlung du 'dres pas rnam rtog gi rlung gis mi bskyod pa ni ting nge 'dzin gyi dkyil 'khor ro// de'i dgos pa tshogs

gnyis rdzogs pa ste/ mar mer dgu/ dkon pa'i 'am dka' ba'i don nas sbyar ba ni bsod nams kyi tshogs rdzogs/ mar mes bsregs shing mun pa sel bas dngos por ma grub pa ye shes kyi tshogs rdzogs so// sku gsum 'gro ba'i don yang

mdzad// chos kyi dbyings kyi gzhal yas nas/ mar me dgod cing 'bul ba ni rang bzhin gyi dkyil 'khor los dbyings gzung 'dzin dang bral bar gnas so// ye shes chen po sku gsum gyis/ gzugs brnyan gyi dkyil 'khor gdul bya la sku gsum du

shar ba ni nam mkha' sprin dang char gyi tshul lo// 'khor ba'i ma rig mun bsal nas/ ting nge 'dzin gyi dkyil 'khor nyon mongs shes bya'i sgrib pa sel ba ni 'khor ba nas 'don pa'o// 'bras bu yi ge/ 'khor lo tshogs chen sa la gsal/ 'dren par 'bul

zhing dkyil 'khor du bkod la byin gyis brlab bo// oM A lo ke dz+wa la dI pa hU~M hU~M/ !/ 'dod yon lha mo'i ting 'dzin ni/ bsgom pa/ gzugs sgra dri ro reg bya chos/ !/ 'dod yon ni gzugs kyi lha mo dkar mo me long thogs pa sgra ljang gu dril bu

'khrol ba dri ser mo dri chab/ ro dmar mo zhal zas/ reg mthing ga na bza'/ chos mthing ga chos 'byung mthing ga gru gsum bsnams pa'o// 'bul ba/ bla med theg pa 'og ma las mchog gi mchod pa dam par sbyar ba 'di// nyon mongs du sel yid

bzhin bdud rtsi'i mchog/ chos nyid dag pas rigs lnga'i dam tshig lnga// ye shes me long/ mnyam nyid/ kun rtog/ grub pa/ chos dbyings mi gnas pa stong pa nyid kyi ye shes so/ lnga yi 'od zer rnam par 'phro// 'dod pa'i yon tan

gzugs/ sgra/ dri/ ro/ reg bya/ chos/ lnga yis rab brgyan pa/ sngon gsang sngags bsgrubs pa'i rnal 'byor bsnams 'khor nas myang 'das su sgrol bar thugs dam du bzhes pa// thugs dam bzhin du ci bder bzhes su gsol// oM rU pa gzugs shap+ta

sgra hU~M dri ha ro traM reg hri chos kA ya oM/ shin tu sgeg pa'i gzi brjid 'bar/ lha mo sgeg mo me long bsnams pa dkar mo/ yid bzhin rin chen phreng ba 'bar/ phreng ba ma phraing ba 'dren pa ser mo// dbyangs snyan yid 'phrog gzi ldan

'bar/ glu ma pi wang bsnams pa dmar mo// gzugs mdzes bskyod pas phyogs bcur g.yo/ gar mkhan ma gar byed pa ljang gu/ hU~M sgeg mo trAM phreng hrIHglu a gar sa ma ya spyir dam tshig gi sngags so// hU~M// kun tu tshims byed bro

bsung thim/ bdug spos ma spos khang thogs pa dkar// blta mdzes rin chen phung po 'phro/ me tog ma me tog gi gzhong pa thogs pa ser mo// 'od gsal 'chor bas kun tu gsal// mar me ma mar me bsnams pa dmar mo// bdud rtsi bsil dro

'jam pa'i dbyangs/ dri chab ma dri chab thogs pa ljang// d+hU spos pu me tog hrIHmar me gan dri chab sa ma ya spyi'i dam tshig hU~M ho// rig pa'i rlabs las byung ba yi// lha mo tshogs kyi mchod pa 'di/ spyir ni bzhi ste/ phyi nang gsang ba/ de kho na nyid

mchod pa'o// dang po spos/ mar me/ dri chab mo/ nang gi 'od zhing bcu bsgral ba dang gzungs ma dgu la sbyor ba'o// de kho na nyid la gsum ste/ nan tan gyi dang/ ting nge 'dzin gyi dang/ kun tu bzang po'i mchod pa'o// dang po ni tha dag gi lus 'bul ba'o// ting 'dzin gyis ni rang

sems rtogs pa'i don las rig pa byang chub sems kyi rlabs las byung ba'o// 'dir yang de nyid 'bral ba'o// gsum pa ni mchod par ma gyur pa gang yang med par 'bul ba'o// gar dang dbyangs su bcas nas kyang// gzungs dang

dbyings su 'bul lags kyis// sbyor chen tshul du bzhes su gsol// gzhan yang thabs tshul mtha' yas pa'i/ 'dod yon nam mkha' mdzod du 'bul ba ni/ chos thams cad mtshan mar snang ba dang/ chos nyid mtshan ma med par gnyis yang/

mtshan ma dang mtshan ma med pa gnyis su dbyer med de mi dmigs pa chos kyi dbyings yin la/ de ltar blo rang rig pa'i shes rab kyis ma nor bar rtogs shing/ rnam par mi rtog pa'i ye shes dang ldan par byin gyis brlabs/ so sor rtog pa'i rtogs dang bsgom pa las byung ba'i

bsgom pa'i stobs kyis ni 'khor ba'i yo byad dang rdzas rnams tshul bzhin byin gyis brlabs la 'bul lo// gang 'bul na// mchod sprin bla med phyogs bcur 'bul/ ji ltar 'bul na// nam mkha' mdzod kyi gter la sogs/ gang 'bul na// bla med

mchod sprin rab 'byams rnams/ stobs gang du ldan pas 'bul na// dad pas dmigs te 'bul lags kyi/ bzhes tshul ji ltar bzhes na// sngon gyi thugs dam rjes dgongs te// dkyil 'khor rgyan du bzhes su gsol// oM p+shu

dza me g+ha sa mu dra s+pha ra Na/ snang ba gzugs kyi sngags yi ge brjod pa sgra'i sngags rlung/ 'byung ba gnas kyi sngags lha'i sku'o// sa ma ya hU~M/ shes rab/ stong pa thabs snying rje'i bdag nyid ni/ yab kyi sku gsung thugs bstan/ sku'i

che ba gsung gi che ba thugs kyi che ba las sku \u0f84rdo rje yab dril bu yum du bsgom pa'o// mi rtog pa// zhi gnas ma 'gags pa lhag mthong dbyer med zung du 'brel/ thugs kyi ched// bde ba las 'khrungs rdo rje 'chang ba yi// dngos po dngos med 'byung gnas chen por mkhyen/

don dam kun rdzob mkhyen pa'i thugs/ gsung gi che ba// gsung snyan yi ges brjod pa sgra'i gsung kun la khyab pa yi// spros med gsung du 'jig rten skye med don gyi gsung dbang phyug bzhugs// yum gang dang bzhugs na/ mi gsung lha mo

dam bcas 'dul mdzad pa// sgyu khu ba 'phrul bde ba tshul lnga ldan pa bde stong nyams su mnga' ba'i tshul ma yin pa 'ga' ma mchis// gang du bde chen don lhan cig skyes pa'i de stong rang bzhin rjes chags pa'i/ yum/ na chung dag

dang lhan cig bzhad mdzad de// g.yas kyi phyag gis dang po thabs kyi rdo rje gsor nas kyang// g.yon pa yis ni dang po shes rab dril bu'i sgra snyan sgrogs// lha mo mtha' dag btsun mor gyur pa yis// phyi nang lha mo brgyad kyang

btsun mor gyur pa ste/ rigs gang la mchod pa'i lha mo yum du bya'o// dam tshig rnams kyi bya ba byas par 'gyur// gcig gi lag pas g.yas kyi bar mas yum la 'khyud pa'o/ kun la 'khyud pa ste/ gnyis pa g.yon gyi bar mas thod pa bdud rtsi'i bde

bas bkang// rjes su chags phyir bde ba'i mthu// gsum pa mi zad g.yas kyi tha ma na me tog phreng bas brgyan pa'i gzhu 'dzin/ me tog phreng ba 'thor// bzhi pa bde ba yis ni g.yon gyi tha ma na rang rig rtog pa'i mda' yang 'phen// gang zhig glu 'di

len par byed pa ni// bde ba rdo rje can dang mnyam par 'gyur// thabs snying rje chen po'i// rdo rje gsor ba snying rje chen po yis// dril bu gsil ba ni shes rab stong pa nyid/ do// gar gyi mi rtog pa zhi gnas

ma rmongs pa/ lhag mthong mi 'gog pa zung du 'brel// bde chen rol pa che la dgongs su gsol// badzra d+hA tu ho// sgrol gnas ting 'dzin chen po ni// dpa' bo 'bru lnga rlung lnga'i rta la zhon// a nr-i su tri pre du drug rnams

bsregs// gnas sbyong ting nge 'dzin gyi rgyu rnams byin gyis brlab/ !/ byin brlab la gsum ste/ phung po 'das par byin gyis brlab pa ni/ srog 'dzin pa'i yi ge hU~M mthing ga rnam par shes pa'i rta la zhon// sa dang 'dres pa'i rlung gis rta la zhon pas

gzugs kyi phung po/ yi ge oM dkar po/ chu dang 'grogs pa'i rlung gi rta la zhon pa tshor ba'i phung po swA ser po/ me dang drod ma nyams pa'i rlung gi rta la zhon pa 'du shes phung po AHdmar po/ rlung gi rta la zhon pa 'du byed phung po hA ljang gu'o// rigs drug 'khor bar byin gyis brlab

pa ni/ lha'i yi ge a dkar po/ mi'i nr-i sngon po/ lha min gyi su ser po/ dmyal ba'i tri nag po/ yi dwags kyi pre dmar po/ byol song gi du dud ka rnams so// gnas sbyong 'khor 'das dbyer med du byin gyis brlab pa ni// dang por 'khor ba'i gnas sbyangs te/ lha ri rab kyi phyir dang

steng nas yi ge a la bstims// lha min ri rab khong gseng nas su la/ mi gling bzhi nas nr-i la/ byol song phyi'i rgya mtsho nas tri la/ yi dwags grong khyer ser skya nas prai la/ dmyal ba rdo rje gdan gyi 'og nas du la/ rigs drug 'od du zhu nas/ dpa' bo 'bru lnga las rigs lngar gyur

par bsam/ phung po rigs lnga la mchod par bya'o// sdug bsngal lha la ltung ba/ lha min 'thab rtsod/ mi la 'gyur ba/ dud 'gro la mdze thog phol lta bu/ yi dwags la bkres skom/ dmyal ba tsha grang ngo/ mang pos gzir ba'i 'gro ba la// snying rje'i shugs kyis sdug bsngal

bzlog pa'i phyir// nyon mongs kun gsal rgyu drug lam bkag nas/ rigs drug sa bon rgyun bcad pas na// byang chub sangs rgyas sa la bgrod phyir 'phags lam rnam thar bstan// dam rdzas bdud rtsi lnga dang zhal zas lnga// sku lnga

chos lnga dbyer med rang bzhin mnyam// de phyir dam rdzas dag pas lha dag pa nyid mchod de// chos nyid la yang gnas lugs chos nyid la rtogs tshul chos nyid thim par mchod/ dkyil 'khor la yang mchod rdzas lha mo'i dkyil

'khor thim par mchod// bdag rnal 'byor pa gsung gi dam tshig la sogs mi 'da' bar bsrung dgos pas na mchod pa lo zlar mi 'da' bar bya'o// dam tshig mchog gi mchod pa dam pa 'dis// rgyal ba rigs lnga/ sras sems dpa' sems ma bcas

rigs kyi rang rang gi yum rnams dang// phyag brnyan gtum chen rngam pa'i tshogs la sogs/ phyogs bcu na dam la gnas pa'i/ rnal 'byor grub pa'i tshogs dang rig 'dzin dang/ gyi sa la gnas pa rnams// rnal 'byor rnam

lnga'i rigs lnga'i skur bsgom pa tshogs la mchod par 'bul// oM g+ha na tsakra pU dza me g+ha sa mu dra s+pha ra Na sa ma ya hU~M/ sbyor ba gnas kyi ting 'dzin ni// gling bzhi phyi yi sbyor ba dang/ phyi'i sbyor ba yab yum yan lag bzhi brgyud pa ste/

yab kyi sgo ba bzhi/ yum gyi sgo ma bzhi byin brlab de ni phyi'i sbyor ba'o// sgo bzhin nang gi sbyor ba dang/ yab kyi steng zhal 'og zhal gnyis las steng zhal du snang ba mtha' yas bsgom/ 'og zhal rdo rjer byin brlab/ yum gyi steng zhal gos dkar mor

bsgom mo/ 'og zhal pad+mar byin gyis brlab/ de ni nang gi sbyor ba'o// dkyil 'khor bzhi ni gsang ba las/ spyi bo bde chen rlung gis thig le 'bebs/ mgrin pa longs spyod nas me 'bar/ snying ga chos nas chu dang 'grogs/ lte ba sprul pa nas sa'i snod du 'dzin cing

spro ba'o// de ni gsang ba'i sbyor ba'o// bde ba bzhi ni de kho na/ bde ba tsam dang/ mchog tu bde ba tsam dang/ rnam rtog bral ba'i bde ba tsam dang/ bde ba dang stong pa dbyer med pa'o// de ni de kho na nyid kyi sbyor ba'o// ma lus thams cad bde stong gcig

!/ 'khor 'das ma lus pa bde ba chen po gcig tu gnas par byed pa yum yin pas reg pas kyang de ltar du rtog par bya/ ting nge 'dzin gyis kyang da ltar du bsgom zhing byin gyis brlab par bya ba yin no// shin tu 'gyings pa'i dpa' bo sgeg pa dang/ yab rnams la

dmigs nas che ba brjod pa'o// bkra shis mtshan ldan mi mos brgyan pa gnyis// g.yon du dmigs rten yum bzhag pa la dmigs nas che ba brjod pa'o// dpa' bo dgyes pa'i sbyor mchod bde ba yang/ yab kyi dbang po yid bzhin nor bu rin po che

lta bu dang yum gyi dbang po pad+ma lta bu la dmigs pa'o// skal ldan rnams la 'bul lo rab sprul gcig/ sgrub pa po yab yum rnams la dmigs pa'o// shes rab dbyings ma yum gyi gzhal yas su/ yum gyi mkha' la gzhal yas khang b+h+rUM las bskyed la/

der sa bon las// rgyal ba'i dkyil 'khor ma lus mchog bkod de// thabs bde ba dang shes rab stong pa ldan pa'i bde stong dbyer med par sbyor mchod kyis/ 'khor ba las ring du song ba'i// 'phags pa thams cad la bde bas mnyes

pa'i mchod pa 'bul// mnyam nyid dbyings su rtogs pa'i ye shes kyis/ chos skur bsgom// bde mchog longs skur bsgom longs spyod rdzogs pa sku yi rgyan// 'dod dgu'i yon tan mdzes pas rab brgyan pa/ sprul skur

bsgom// rnal 'byor ye shes rgyan rnal 'byor pa'i nyams su len par bsgom du bzhes su gsol// oM a nu rta ra pU dza me g+ha s+pha ra Na hi maM ga ga na khaM hU~M phaT [(]ka[)]swA hA/[ (]nga[)]bdud rtsi 'khyil pa'i ting 'dzin ni// bdag nyid

bdud rtsi 'khyil pa che// lag g.yon phyag rgya rta mgrin nyid// gzhal yas snod nang bdud rtsi lnga/ !/ bar du byin gyis brlab pa ni/ rang bdud rtsi yab yum du bsgoms la/ lag pa g.yon rta mgrin yab yum du bsgom/ bdud rtsi'i snod 'khor lo

rtsibs bzhi gru chad la sgo gtod pa'i ban+d+ha'i gzhal yas khang du bsgom/ rang bzhin dngos gzhi lnga la/ dri chen la oM/ byang sems la hU~M/ mAM sa la swA/ rak+ta la AH dri chu la hA bsgom/ de nas bdag gi spyi bor oM/ mgrin par AH snying gar hU~M/ de gsal ba dang/ oM AHhU~M sarba pany+tsa a

mr-i ta hU~M hrIH zhes brjod pas/ bdag yab yum sbyor ba byas pas/ thugs ka'i hU~M/ mgrin pa'i aHla thim/ AHspyi bo'i oM la thim// 'od du zhu nas sgal tshigs kyi rta brgyud nas rdo rje'i lam du phyung/ yum gyi mkha' la babs/ byang chub sems kyi 'od zer phreng thag gsang ba'i lam

nas brgyud rta mgrin yab yum la phog/ chags pa'i yid g.yos/ ma chags thabs kyi sbyor ba byas ban+d+ha'i dngos gzhi la phog/ don gnyis byas nas yi ger gyur// de ltar sbyong ba dgod/ gnyis pas phyag mtshan du gyur/ gsum pas skur gyur// bzhi pas 'od du

zhu nas bdag la thim/ bdag rta mgrin la thim/ rta mgrin rigs lnga la thim/ rigs lnga gnyis su med pa'i sbyor ba byas nas 'od du zhu nas byang chub kyi sems mu tig ltar gnas pa'o/ !/ bdud rtsi 'bru gsum gyis byin gyis brlab pa ni/ bdud rtsi lnga'i steng du dpa' bo 'bru lnga

bsgom/ de'i khar rdo rje rgya gram bsams te/ lte ba la hrIHlas rta mgrin rwa bzhi la gsang ba'i yum bzhi de'i steng du bdag gi gu h+ya lag gi phyag rgya bcings la/ de rta mgrin smin mtshams su bdag gi rdo rje gtad de oM AHhU~M badzra a mr-i ta hU~M hrIHTha zhes brjod pas/ bdag gi byang chub

kyi sems sgal tshigs kyi rta brgyud rdo rje'i lam nas byung/ phreng ba byang chub kyi lam nas byung ste/ rta mgrin gyi smin mtshams su phog pas/ sgal tshig brgyud yum gyi mkha' la babs nas/ dpa' bo 'bru lnga la thims pas/ de las kyang 'od 'phros pas 'phags pa mchod/ 'gro don

byas slar 'dus pas dngos gzhi lnga 'od du zhu nas/ yig 'bru dang gnyis su med par gyur pas/ oM dkar la dngas pa/ AHdmar la 'tsher ba/ hU~M mthing la 'dril ba gsum du gsal ba las yum bzhi nas brgyud nas bdag la thim/ bdag byin bskyed/ de las 'phros te don

gnyis byas/ ye shes kyi bdud rtsi bdag la thims pas/ bdag gi sgrib pa sbyangs/ yang sgal tshigs kyi rta brgyud nas rdo rje'i lam nas byung nas phreng ba nub kyi lam nas byung ste/ rta mgrin la thim/ de yang 'od du yum bzhi dang bcas pa zhu/ yi ge 'bru gsum yang 'od du zhu nas byang

sems mu tig dkar po ltar bsam mo// sbyangs thog gsum pa gsung thugs sku// gnod sbyin phag !/ de nas a mr-i ta kuN+Da li'i sngags kyis bdud rtsi sor mo lngas gtor bas khro bo rdo rje gnod sbyin lag na phag rgod gyi mche ba thogs pa grangs med pa spros pas

dam sri dmar po la sogs bar gcod thams cad thal bar brlag par bsam/ tshur 'dus te 'og phyogs mtshams thams cad khro bos gang bar bsam mo/ rgod ma che ba can// dam sri bar du gcod pa bsreg/ chos rnams rang bzhin dag pa ltar/ oM

d+harma a mr-i ta'i sngags brjod pas rdzas dang mched la gtor bas chos thams cad stong zhing bdag med pa/ chos thams cad bdud rtsi'i rang bzhin du bsgom mo// dpa' bo 'bru lngas byin gyis brlabs pa'o// gtor byas thams cad dag par 'gyur// oM AHhU~M sarba

pany+tsa a mr-i ta hU~M hrIHTha/ bdud rtsi sbyor bar bya ba'i sngags dgu pa'i 'dzab la rgya rtsa brgyad du bzlas so// nye reg gi sngags so// nye ba ni gzugs brnyan gyi dkyil 'khor du bdud rtsi'i snod bzhag pa dang nye la/ reg pa ni rta'i rgyal po'i phyag rgyas rdo rje bzung nas rdo rje'i rtse mo

snod la reg la 'thor ba ni rdo rje'i sor mo lngas bgegs la gtor la/ 'thung ba ni rang ny-id dngos grub blang zhing 'thung bar bya ba yin no// oM a mr-i ta kuN+Da li badzra yak+Sha kro d+ha ha na ha na hU~M phaT/ ! khro bo rdo rje gnod sbyin gyis bdud rtsi'i mtshams gcad pa'i sngags

lan bdun bzlas// oM d+harma a mr-i ta bi shud+d+he kuN+Da li ng+harma d+hA tu hU~M a/ bdud rtsi 'thor ba'i sngags so// bdud rtsi gsang ba'i sngags lan bdun bzlas rang nyid btung ba'i sngags so/[ (]kha[) ]/ sman phud spyir bsdu ba bsdu bar mdzad pa'i phyir/ dang po sman

yod mad dri bar skul ba// rnal 'byor dbang phyug bde ba'i dkyil 'khor 'dir// rgyal ba zhi khro'i 'khor tshogs mchod pa'i phyir// sman pa'i rdzas lnga sman chen lngar sbyar ba// rgyal ba rgya mtsho mched la mi
mnga' 'am// thugs dam dgongs la rmad grags bskang ba'i phyir// gnyis su rtog pas 'grub par mi 'gyur te// dag pa nyid kyi dag pa nyid mchod na// sgrib pa gnyis byang sku gsum lhun grub 'gyur// dpa'
mchog rdo rje sems dpar zhal 'ches la// sku gsung thugs kyi dngos grub gsol ba rnams// dus gsum rgyal ba rnams dang mnyam sbyor ba'i// rnal 'byor mchog gi grub pa'i rtags kyis gsol// a la la

ho// de nas sgo sgor bsdu bla mas brjod nas dri ba'o/ ba gsungs// sman du sbyor ba gang byed pa// 'chi med bdud rtsi ra sA yan// bre gang phul tsam mi mnga' yang// bag tsam rdul tsam a ti ho// rdo rje slob dpon sman

'bul ba/ bla ma che ba dang ldan pa la byin gyis rlob par zhu// snyigs ma'i skyon spangs 'khor ba'i mun bral bas// dug lnga sman du bsgyur bas ra sA yan// rnal 'byor yongs kyi thugs dam bskang slad du// gtso mchog rnams

la 'bul lo byin gyis rlobs/ mchod rdzas su bla ma la 'bul ba'o// bde gshegs rigs lnga'i bdud rtsi byang chub sems// 'khor ba'i dug sel zhi khro mchod pa'i mchog/ sems rgyud dag pas mnyam nyid dbyings su

bsdus// bla ma dam pas bzhes mchod dngos grub gsol// oM AHhU~M badzra a mr-i ta hU~M hrIH[(]ga[)]tha/ bdud rtsi'i 'dzab dgu pa brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas so// thugs rje chags pa'i ting 'dzin ni/ snod la b+h+rUM ban+d+ha ka pA la zhes brjod pas ban+d+ha'i

gzhal yas khang stong gsum tsam du gyur par bsam mo// rak+ta la yi ge ra dmar po gcig bsams la de la sngags 'dis byin gyis brlabs te/ oM AHhU~M mU la rak+ta hU~M hrIHTha/ zhes brjod pas/ thugs ka'i hU~M las 'od zer dmar po 'phros pas yi ge ra la phog pas ra 'od du zhu

nas dngos po'i log rtogs sbyangs nas bdud rtsi'i rak+tar gyur pa'o// snod bsgom pa/ ban+d+ha stong gsum 'khor yug na/ bcud bsgom pa// 'bras bu lnga bsgral rak+ta 'khyil/ gzar bu// hU~M las gzar bu rdo rje 'bar// zhing bcu bsgral ba rak+ta'i

rgya mtshor 'khyil// rdo rje 'bar ba'i gzar bus lan gsum phyar/ gzar bu hU~M las rdo rjer gyur pas dkrugs pas rba rlabs phyogs bcur 'phyo ba/ de las 'dod yon gyi lha mo sprin 'phro bar bsam/ dang pos stong gsum rak+tar gyur/ gnyis pas snod du 'dus/

gsum pas lha la mchod pa'o// dpa' bo phrin las bzhi mi 'grub pa med pas na yab rnams/ dpa' mo yum rnams g.yog 'khor bcas pa la// mchog dang thun mong dngos grub gsol phyir 'bul// b+h+rUM ban+d+ha ka pA la rak+Sha b+h+rUM/ oM AHhU~M

mU la rak+ta hU~M hrIHTha// rmad byung gsang ba'i ting 'dzin ni/ !/ lta ba'i gtor ma la gnyis las/ gnas lugs kyi lta ba ni/ chos nyid gzung 'dzin dang bral ba des/ 'khor 'das la ma khyab pa med pas na/ chos nyid don gyi gtor ma'o// bsgom lugs kyi gtor

ma ni/ raM yaM khaM gis dngos po dang mtshan mar 'dzin pa'i bag chags sbyangs nas chos rnams stong pa nyid du bsgom pa ste/ bsgom pa chos nyid kyi gtor ma'o// rtogs pa lta ba'i gtor ma ni// chos rnams stong pa nyid du gnas// mtshan ma

rdzas kyis gtor ma ni/ la gsum las khyad par dpal gyi gtor ma ni 'dzin gtor te/ bdud rtsi rnam pa lnga las sbyar ba'i gtor ma yin te/ lo'am zla bar mi gtong ba'am zhag grangs su mi gtong bar lhar bsgom pa ste/ phugs su nyal ba de

gtong yang nam mkha' la gtong ste shing bca' ba'o/ khyad par dpal gyi gtor ma phugs na nyal// sha khrag dmar gyi gtor ma 'ben du bca'/ ni rgyan sha khrag la byas nas dgra bgegs kyi ling ga btsugs nas de la thun gyis brabs nas bsgral ba'i sha khrag 'bul

lo// thugs rjes sprul pa'i gtor ma yongs la khyab/ nang nub gtor chung rgyun tu gtong ba de mkha' 'gro ma lus pa dang 'gro drug la bsngo bar bya'o// rig pa byin rlabs kyi gtor ma rnam pa gsum/ ni phyi ltar 'dod yon du byin gyis brlab/ nang ltar

lha dang/ gsang ba ltar byang sems su'o// dang po ni/ gtor gzhong ltar snang ba ni/ b+h+rUM las gzhal yas khang du bskyed/ gtor ma ni ha drug gam/ oM drug las 'dod yon gyi lha mo drug tu bskyed pa ste/ gzugs kyi lha mo dkar mo me long thogs pa/ sgra'i ljang gu dril bu 'khrol ba/

dri'i ser mo dri mchog bsnams pa/ ro'i dmar mo zhal zas/ reg bya'i mthing ga na bza'/ chos kyi lha mo mthing ga phyag na chos 'byung gru gsum bsnams pa'o// ba ling ta'i sngags kyis byin gyis brlabs pa'o// phyi ltar byin gyis brlab pa ni rin chen khang pa gtor ma'i

snod/ de'i nang du/ bcud ni ha'am yang na oM las yongs gyur pa// 'dod pa'i yon tan drug gi lha mor sprul// oM ba liM ta/ te dzo ba liM ni/ ba la ba ti g+hu h+ya sa ma ya swA hA/ snod ni b+h+rUM las ban+d+ha'i gzhal yas

khang// gtor ma hU~M ha yig 'bru phyag mtshan sku// sku ni yang dag don gyi lha dgur gsal// hU~M ha/ !/ b+h+rUM las gtor gzhong ban+d+ha ye shes kyi gzhal yas khang du/ hU~M ha las zhal zas dang dam rdzas su snang ba dpal khrag 'thung gi lha tshogs za byed kyi

dkyil 'khor du gyur pa'i zhal hom khung du byin gyis brlabs pa der/ mchod sbyin gyi gtor ma dang sna tshogs kyi gtor ma rnams 'dod yon lngar chos nyid zab mo'i rol pa mnyam nyid du shar te/ mchod pa'i sprin dang bcas pa des mchod par byin gyis brlab bo// gsang ba nyi

ma zla ba'i ga'u nang/ snod ma las nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor dang/ a las zla ba'i dkyil 'khor te/ zla nyi ga'u kha sbyar thabs shes rab nang du/ bcud oM dkar la dngas pa/ AHdmar la 'tsher ba/ hU~M mthing la 'dril ba las sku gsung thugs kyi rgyud tshims par byed pa'i byang

chub sems kyi bdud rtsir byin gyis brlab bo// byang chub sems su sha lnga bdud rtsir zhu/ lus khams las byung ba'i bdud rtsi lnga dang sha lnga yang bdud rtsi nyid du zhu'o// thabs dang shes rab tshogs su lhun gyis grub// oM AHoM/ !/ gtor ma 'bul

zhing dgod pa ni yul gang la 'bul na// rgyal ba rgya mtsho ma dang mkha' 'gro'i tshogs// gnas dang zhing dang dur khrod tshan d+hor gnas// dur khrod gsang ba mchog gi dkyil 'khor du/ rdzas gang 'bul na// 'bras bu lnga bsgral
sha khrag rus pa'i tshogs// rmad byung dam rdzas mchod pa 'di 'bul na/ dgos pa ci'i phyir 'bul na// mi zad rgyan gyi 'khor lo'i dngos grub gsol// sngags sor bzhag/ oM AHhU~M/ su ra ho/ u ma to ho/ ka

ma la ma le/ badzra a mr-i ta/ ha ram pra ti dza/ b+ha ga bAn/ dzaHhU~M baM hoH a la la ho/ !/ trAM rat+na tshad med snying rje'i gtor ma ni trAM las rin po cher bsgom pa'o/ trai lo kya phaT/ ! phyag rgya bstan pa ni/ lag pa sor mo bsnaul la mtheb mdzub mig tu

bya srin lag der bcug la mig 'bras bu bya/ gung mo dang mthe'u chung rtse sprad la kha bya'o// thod pa rlon pa'i phyag rgya yis// gnas khang byin gyis brlab par bya// rdo rje rtse lnga'i phyag rgya yis/ gung mo gnyis rtse sprad la bsgreng/ 'dzub mo gnyis de'i

rgyab tu gtang/ mthe'o gnyis sbyar la gung mo la gtad/ mthe'u chung gnyis sbyar la gung mo la gtad/ srin lag gnyis bsnol lo// 'dus pa pho mo byin gyis brlab// phrin las rnam bzhi'i phyag rgya ste/ !/ g.yas kyi mdzub mo g.yon gyi mdzub mo bkug pa la

gtad/ g.yon gy-i mthe 'o g.yas kyi mdzub mo'i rtsa bar gtad/ gung mo gnyis rtse sprad/ srin lag mthe'u chung bsnol// rdzas dang sa gzhi byin gyis brlab/ bum pa thal mo spug por sbyar mthe bong gnyis gyen du bsgreng/ mthe'u chung gnyis thur du brkyang// bdud rtsi

bum pa'i phyag rgya yis// dza gad byin gyis brlab par bya// nor bu rin chen phyag rgya yis/ mtheb mdzub so sor mig tu bya gung mo gnyis rtse sprad srin lag mthe'u chung so sor sbyar lag pa phyir bstan no// yo byad byin gyis brlab par bya// ka

pA la dang ka pA la ltar lag pa g.yas g.yon lag khong snyim par bya/ rta gdong rgyas/ g.yas g.yon gung mo srin lag mdzub mo sprad/ mthe bong mthe'u chung bsgreng// bdud rtsi byin gyis brlab par bya// ral gri g.yas mthe bos mthe'u chung mnan la gzhan

gsum bsgreng ngo/ thod pas g.yon snyim pa thod par bya rak+ta brlab// dpal bshos thod pas gung mo rtse sprad la lag pa'i nang du bsgreng gzhan snyim pa thod pa'o// lag pa rgyab sbyar ro/ gtor ma la// kong bu sdong bu lag pa snyim par mthe bong sdong bu ltar

bya'o/ mar me nyid// ral gris gros bzhin sgrol la dza hU~M sbyor/ sbyor ba la mdzub mo lcags kyus sor mo bsnol ba'o// thun mong phyag rgya rnam pa lnga/ spos la mtheb mdzub mig tu byas la dud ba 'bul ba ltar/ me tog snyim pa 'thor ba ltar/ mar me snyim pa'i

nang du mthe bong bsgreng dri chab bdug pa ltar te snyim par bya'o// zhes gsungs so// he ru ka yi gal po las/ thams cad byin gyis brlabs pa ste/ brtag pa brgyad pa'o//// de nas bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'chang chen pos

chos nyid zhi ba chen po'i ting nge 'dzin 'di gsungs so// mdor bstan// zhi rtags rgyan gyis mdzes byas la/ brda/ sgo dbye brda phyag dang bsgrub par dam bcas te// gnas lugs rang bzhin gyi zhi khro phung po rang rgyud pa'i zhi khro

gdul bya dang/ sprul pa'i zhi khro'o// mthar phyin 'bras bu'i zhi khro yin no/ 'grub par 'gyur byed gces// dbang phyug rig 'dzin mar ldan nas// bgo ba sna tshogs bshad pa ni// tshe yi dam pa grub pa ste/ mi 'khyag na tshe thung la

gos dro na tshe ring ba ltar dag pa ye shes ston no// gos tshul khrims kyi gos dang/ ye shes kyi dang/ sbyin pa'i dang/ brtson 'grus gyi dang/ shes rab gos dang lngas brgyan no/ lnga dag tu bshad pa yin// bdag 'dzin gzhan rtogs bdag gzhan

du 'dzin pa med pas na btang snyoms pa'i// rang bzhin rnam par dag par rtogs/ las nyon/ sgrib gnyis kyi nyes skyon rnam par dag pas na dag pas bral pa'o/ na/ mkhyen pa dang ldan pas na// ye shes nyes pa thams cad dag pas na zhi ba'i

gos ni dkar po bstan/ sgrub pa po rang rig don gyis// rnal 'byor ma la rig pa dbang phyug ! chos rnams la dbang bsgyur bas na phyug pa'o/ na bzar gsol/ ye shes kyi blos// chags bya yul 'dod yon chags byed gang zag spangs nas

ni// thugs rjes sems can thams cad la chags nas 'gro don byed pas/ yul lus khams dang skye gnas dbang du byed par chags pa ste// dbang du gyur yang ma chags te/ sgo gsum sdom pa'i// tshul khrims gos ni 'gro ba dbang du byed pa'i

rtags su dmar por bstan/ dper na rgyal ba shAkya thub pa la dar le'u brgan gyi na bza' gsol ba lta bu'o// rnal 'byor dbang phyug na bzar gsol/ lus dang phung po la/ bdag tu mi 'dzin pa ni byams pa yi// yon tan rgyas pa yid

bzhin nor bu rin po che'i gter chen spro/ sems can ma lus// kun gyi lus ngag yid gsum gyi dgos 'dod skong ba'i phyir/ yongs su gtong ba// sbyin pa'i gos ni rgyas par byed pas yon tan gyis ser por bstan/ de ltar du// rnal 'byor

dbang phyug gi na bzar gsol/ rang gzhan// gnyis med du mkhyen pas bya ba grub pa'i sprul pa mang po spros nas las kyi sprul pa yi/ 'gro ba rnams la// ji ltar 'dul ba ltar ston zhing don mdzad pa// 'gro kun myang 'das kyi bde la 'god

pa'i phyir/ don du gnyer bas// brtson 'grus gos ni ljang gur bstan// rnal 'byor dbang phyug na bzar gsol/ bal nag tshos kyis mi 'gyur ba ltar// chos nyid ngang las bcos su med pa yi/ mi 'gyur bar mtshon par/ kha dog

mthing ga cir yang chos nyid 'gyur ba med/ chos nyid de// mi 'gyur mi shigs rang bzhin pas/ don rtogs pas// shes rab ste chos nyid mi 'gyur ba'i gos ni mthing gar bstan// rnal 'byor dbang phyug na bzar gsol// sku

gsung thugs yon las rnams 'grub/ !/ rnam par brjid pas sku/ smra brjod 'byung bas gsung/ dran rtog mkhyen pas thugs/ 'dod pa 'byung bas yon tan/ don mdzad pas phrin las so// dbu rgyan ! ni chos rnam par 'byed pa byang chub kyi yan lag go/

dang ni phyag gdub dang/ ni brtson 'grus yang dag byang chub la sogs pa 'gre// dpung rgyan dran pa snyan cha shin tu sbyangs pa do shal dang/ ting nge 'dzin// se mo do btang snyoms dang me tog rgyan/ dga' ba yang dag byang chub// byang chub yan lag

bdun du bshad/ sap+ta bo d+h+yi ga zhes pa/ sap+ta ni bdun/ bo d+hi ni byang chub/ aM ga ni yan lag te/ byang chub kyi yan lag 'di bdun ni mthong ba'i lam la de kho na nyid byang chub pa'i rgyur gyur pas na/ byang chub kyi yan lag bdun zhes bya/ rnam pa gcig tu/ bi b+hA Sha las 'byung

ba ming du bgrangs pa'i grangs kyi rim pa bzhin bshad pa tsam du zad de/ byang chub gsum du 'grub pa'i nye ba'i rgyu 'di bdun yin pas bsgoms pa'i lam la byang chub yan lag ces bshad do// dam chos rnam 'byed dbu rgyan rin chen spras/ dbu

rgyan gyi chos rnam par 'byed pa yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag mtshon pa ste// theg pa so so'i chos rnams ma 'dres par phye nas ston/ pa dang// de yi rtags su rig lnga'i dbu rgyan 'di/ gsol bas rigs ma 'dres par ston to// rnal 'byor dbang

phyug dbu yi rgyan du gsol// dga' ba yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag mtshon pa'i mdzes pa'i me tog phreng/ don 'gro ba/ thams cad ma lus mnyes shing dga' bar byed// de yi rtags su me tog phreng ba 'di/ pa brgyan

pa'o// rnal 'byor dbang phyug me tog sna tshogs kyi phreng ba dang ldan par bya'o/ chen po'i sku yi rgyan du gsol// snyan cha lus sems bsil byed shin tu sbyangs/ ba byang chub kyi yan lag ste// nyon mongs 'gro ba'i sdug bsngal gyi tsha bas gdungs ba

nya bye tshan gyis brdungs pa lta bu'o/ gdung sel// de yi rtags su snyan cha ni nyon mongs pa'i gdung ba sel bar byed pas na sel byed do/ bsil byed 'di// rnal 'byor dbang phyug snyan gyi rgyan du gsol// do shal ni ting 'dzin yang dag byang chub kyi yan

lag ste/ dbus mchog phreng ba brgyus// ting 'dzin gyi sgo 'bum phrag sna tshogs 'phro bar mdzad// de rtags su rin po che'i mgur chu rin chen phreng ba 'di/ mu tig gi phreng ba rkang pa'i long bur sleb pa'o// rnal 'byor dbang phyug phreng

ba'i rgyan du gsol// rin chen mchog spras dbu brgyan dra ba 'di/ !/ dran pa yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag/ 'khor 'das kyi// chos rnams ma lus ma bsnyel sa le mkhyen// de yi rtags su rin chen sna tshogs dpung rgyan

'di// rnal 'byor dbang phyug dpung pa'i rgyan du gsol// bdag 'dzin sprul pa sna tshogs se mo do/ ni btang snyoms yang dag byang chub yan lag go/ bdag gi don nang du rtogs nas gzhan gyi don phyir mdzad pa// de yi

rtags su mu tig se mo do// rnal 'a'abyor dbang phyug rang rig don gyi rnal ma la blo rig pa'i ye shes 'byor/ chos rnams ma lus pa la dbang bsgyur/ zad pa med pas na phyug go/ chen po'i rgyan du gsol// phyag gdub sna tshogs las mdzad

brtson 'grus ldan// yang dag byang chub yan lag/ dgos pa'i phrin las rnam bzhis rang gzhan gyi don rnams myur bar 'grub par mdzad// de yi rtags su gser gyi gdu bu 'di// rnal 'byor dbang phyug phyag gi rgyan du

gsol// sku yi rgyan stod g.yogs gsung mchog smad dkris dang// thugs kyi rgyan ze'u ldir yon tan gyi rgyan chos gos dang/ phrin las kyi rgyan/ mdzad pa las kyi phu rung na bza' rnams/ bdag nyid chen po che bas

bsgyings par brjid/ pas nga rgyal chen po bdun dang ldan pa lta bur bzhugs so// tshul khrims rnam dag gos kyis brjid pa'i sku/ mos pa chung ba// nyan thos rang rgyal ! dmigs pa phra bas don mdzad de gnyis la stod g.yogs phrag byus pa yod

pa'o/ rtags su ni// sku mchog che ba'i brjid tshul gcan gzan gyi rgyal po seng ge'i ston la ral pas brjid pa lta bur chos gos 'di// rnal 'byor dbang phyug stod g.yogs sku stod la dar dang ser gyis phrag byus su gsol ba

ltar rgyab gong du bsnams pa'o/ rgyan du gsol// 'khor ba'i sems can ma stongs bar du ni// thugs rjes 'gro ba kun la chags pa'i rtags// gsung mchog thugs rjes chags pa'i smad dkris 'di/ dar pa ti smug po'i tshi gu

can gyi sham thabs 'di// rnal 'byor dbang phyug sham thabs rgyan du gsol/ thugs kyis 'khor 'das ma lus pa// cir yang sal le mkhyen pa'i thugs kyis su// shes bya kun la ma rmongs ! ji lta ba mkhyen pa'i ye shes kyi don dam la ma

rmongs shes bya ji snyed pa mkhyen pa'i ye shes kyi kun rdzob la ma rmongs pa'o/ rtags su ni// thugs mchog shes rab ldan pa dar gyi cod pan 'di// rnal 'byor dbang phyug chos gos tshul khrims kyi chos gos gsol bas yang dam tshig gi tshul khrims

dang ldan no/ rgyan du gsol// che ba'i yon tan 'gro rnams kun la snang// dpa' zhing gzi brjid che bas bsgyings rtags su// yon tan che ba'i ! sangs rgyas kyi che ba'i yon tan stobs bcu mi 'jigs pa bzhi sangs rgyas kyi chos ma

'dres pa bco brgyad la sogs pa'i/ gzi mdangs na bza' 'di// rnal 'byor dbang phyug sku yi rgyan du 'bul// gsang sngags spyod pa'i ! 'dod chags can la sbyor ba'i spyod pa/ zhe sdang can la sgrol ba'i dang/ nga rgyal can la blta ngan gyis mi

tshugs par ting nge 'dzin sran tshugs pa dang/ gti mug can la rmi lam bsgom/ phrag dog can la lta ngan mi shong ba dang/ dug lnga lam du spyod pa'o/ don mchog zab mo 'di// snod du ma gyur pa la gsang ba'i rtags// mdzad pa'i phrin las gar gyi

gsang gos 'di/ tshad med bzhis nyan rang don mdzad pa dang/ bsdu dngos bzhis byang chub sems dpas/ don mdzad pa dang/ phrin sngags las bzhis don mdzad pa'i rtags so// rnal 'byor dbang phyug sku yi rgyan du gsol/ !/ gsang ba'i brda bsres pa la

gnyis te/ mched lcam la bos pa dang// e ma ho/ ni ngoms shing mtshar ba'o// dur khrod ni ro bzhi bskyal ba yan chad do// gsang ba snod ngan pa'o chen po yi/ ni theg pa gzhan las khyad byas pa'o// rmad byung zhing khams dga' tshar 'dir/ sngon gyi

las// skal ba dang ldan pa dang 'phral rkyen gyi skal ldan no/ dbang phyug rgyal ba'i sras// 'dus pa tshogs pa'i rgyal po'i sras rgyal rigs su dbyung ba ltar/ rig 'dzin rnams// e ma ho// bde dga' bde mchog bde chen

grogs// dam tshig srog gi lu gu rgyud/ ! lcags lu gu rgyud ni gzong gis phral yang mi phrel ba ltar gsang sngags kyi dam tshig srog la babs kyang mi 'bral lo// sprul pa'i gshog drug gra rgyas pas// chos nyid mkha' la lding bar rigs/ !

bya rgod gshog drug rgyas pas nam 'phangs gcod pa ltar rnal 'byor pa blta ba/ dam tshig spyod pa ting nge 'dzin dbang phrin las dang drug rgyas nas chos nyid kyi don rtogs nas chos kyi dbyings kyi mkha' la blta bas lding zhing 'gro bar byed pa'o/ de ring phan chad rgyal ba'i

sras// dbang phyug yin pas ci bder spyod// lus gyi brda lus dang yan lag gi bya ba// ngag gi brda ngag gi bya ba dang sems kyi brda nang du rigs par bya ba'o// bya ba thams cad brdas bya/ smra ba bcad do// zan la tshe/ chang la smra byed/ tsha la kun

tu rgyug/ tshod ma la bran mo// mar la 'jam des zhes bya'o// rnal 'byor gsang baba'i brda sgo phye// bya ba'i las rnams thams cad kun// brda yis smra zhing brda bya'o// gsang mchog lhun grub dkyil 'khor la/ tshad med bzhi

yis sgo phye gcig/ rgyal ba/ rigs lnga'i ma rig pa'i gnyid sangs mkhyen pa rgyas bdud bzhi bcom yon tan drug dang ldan mtha' las 'das/ sku phyir la bstan pa'i dus na/ zhi zhing thugs nang du bltas phra la dgongs pa brtag dka' ste// dbang

phyug chen po mchog gi lha/ tshogs gnyis ma bsags bzhin du// rdzogs pa'i sku la phyag 'tshal lo// rig 'dzin 'dus pa'i rnal 'byor rnams/ thugs sems nyid/ yang dag pa'i don yin la bsgrub par dam bcas nas/ sangs rgyas

zhe gnyis bsgom pa'i// ting nge 'dzin la bdag cag rnams gnas 'gyur ba/ ye shes lha'i sku// phyag rgya chen por bdag gsal bar gyur cig/ bde gshegs sems kyi snying po la/ sems bskyed pa las/ sems can la dmigs pa ni/ sems

can rnams ye nas bde gshegs kyi snying po can yin yang/ bdag tu rtog pa'i dbang gis 'khor ba'i sems can du snang ba ste/ snang ba de las bzlog nas sangs rgyas kyi sa la dgod pa'i phyis// sgrub pa pos sems can thams cad sangs rgyas yin par shes pa kho na byang chub

mchog tu sems bskyed pa yin no// de la rgyu mtshan nyid lugs kyis ni kun rdzob dang don dam byang chub mchog tu sems bskyed pa gnyis las/ kun rdzob smon pa byang chub mchog tu dang/ 'jug pa sems bskyed nas/ byang chub sems dpa'i sdom pa bsrung la/ don dam spros bral du

'dod/ 'dir ni kun rdzob byang sems ni sems can rnams rang sems sangs rgyas yin par ma rtogs par 'khor bar 'khyams pa yin la/ don dam byang sems ni/ yang dag bsgrub pa'i rnal 'byor gyi dbang phyug chen pos/ khams gsum sems can rnams kyi de kho na nyid dang/

dpal rdo rje sems dpa'i thugs kyi de kho na nyid la gnyis su med cing tha dad dang dbyer med par rtogs par bsgom par bya'o// ma rtogs 'khor ba'i sems can rnams// sangs rgyas sa la dgod pa'i phyir// byang chub mchog tu sems bskyed

do// sangs rgyas 'di tshe bsgrub bya'i phyir// sku gsum sa la goms par bya/ sangs rgyas bsgrub pa la/ theg pa 'og ma rnams kyis yun ring por bsgrubs nas/ phyis sangs rgyas su bsgrub pa lta bu ma yin te/ gsang sngags pa rnal 'byor chen po'i theg pa/

mthong ba'i chos tshe 'di nyid la sangs rgyas pa'i phyir/ de bzhin nyid kyi ting nge 'dzin la goms par bya zhing/ chos sku kun tu 'od kyi sa la sbyang ba dang/ kun tu snang gi sa la goms par bya zhing longs sku pad+ma can la goms par bya ba dang/ rgyu'i lam goms par bya zhing sprul sku 'khor

lo tshogs chen gyi sa la sbyangs te/ skye ba phyi ma'i rgyu dang las la mi ltos par// tshe 'di nyid la 'bras bu 'thob par bya ba'o// de ni dmigs pa'i yul te/ lta ba la dmigs pa'i yul la sems bskyed par bya ba yin no// zhes brjod cing sems bskyed par bya'o// bskal pa bye

bar mi 'grub pa/ nyan thos la sogs theg pa 'og ma bas/ grangs med gsum du tshogs bsags nas 'bras bu sku gnyis 'thob par 'dod pa ni/ rgyu bsod nams kyi tshogs las 'bras bu ni gzugs sku thob/ 'bras bu ye shes tshogs las chos sku 'thob

par 'dod pa'o// 'dir ni lha dgu bsgom pa bsod nams kyi tshogs/ de la rang bzhin med pa ye shes kyi tshogs te/ sku gsum dbyer med du bsgom pa'o// tshe gcig 'grub pas khyad par 'phags// dang por chos kyi dbyings nyid la// dmigs pa

med pa'i don gyis bsgom/ dang po de bzhin bsgom pa la bzhi ste/ dgos pa/ nges tshig/ thabs/ 'bras bu'o// dang po ni rtogs pa sbyong ba dang/ 'bras bu 'thob pa'i dgos pa'o// rtog pa sbyong ba ni/ sems can thams cad ni thog ma med pa'i dus nas/ rtag tu rtog pa'i

dbang gis 'khor ba yin la/ de'i gnyen po de bzhin nyid bsgom pa dang/ 'bras bu thob pa'i dgos pa ni gsang sngags 'bras bu'i chos yin pas/ 'bras bu sku gsum yin te/ de bzhin nyid chos sku'i ngang las gzugs sku rnam gnyis 'byung ba'i phyir dang po bsgom/ ci'i phyir na/

nges tshig ni chos thams cad kyi de bzhin nyid la blo gzhag pa'i phyir/ de bzhin nyid ces bya'o/ ji ltar sgom pa'i thabs ni/ chos thams cad ni rang gi sems su 'dus las/ sems kyi rang bzhin mtshan nyid thams cad dang bral ba/ ji lta bu'i dngos po yang dag ma yin pas/

sems kyis btags pa'i chos rnams kyang dngos po med de/ rang bzhin gyi stong zhing dag pa nam mkha' lta bu'i ngang las ma g.yos par bya'o// de'i ngang du ma hA su kha hU~M zhes brjod de/ rang gi sems nyid yi ge a dkar po gcig tu gsal bar bsgom/ a de las 'od zer 'phros

te/ dngos por snang ba thams cad bsregs nas/ slar 'dus pas/ je chung je phra la mjug sgra tsam du bsam mo// sgra yang mthar stong ste/ cir yang mi bsam/ cir yang mi dmigs pa'i ngang du bsgom mo// 'bras bu ni/ de ltar bsgoms pas sku chos sku/ ye shes ni chos kyi dbyings kyi

ye shes thob pa'o// bsgrub med yum gyi b+ha ga la// brjod med sems kyi ngang du gsal// chos kyi dbyings kyi ye shes kyis// thams cad du yang khyab par bya// btsal med ma bsgrubs ji bzhin las// kun snang nam

mkha'i mtshan nyid 'byung// med pa'i rgyu las kun snang bsgom pa la yang de bzhin bzhi las/ dang po ni de bzhin nyid ro la mi chags par bya ba dang/ sgyu ma'i cho 'phrul 'byung sla ba dang/ gzhal yas khang dang lha dgod par bde ba'o// nges tshig ni/ ci'i phyir na/

chos thams cad skye 'gag med pa'i ngang du yang bsgoms la/ de ltar ma rtogs pa rnams la khyab pa'i snying rje yang bsgom/ mtshan ma dang mtshan ma med pa gnyis bsgoms pas kun tu snang zhes bya'o// thabs ni rang rig pa'i ye shes kyis chos thams cad skye 'gag med pa las/

sems can rnams kyis de ltar ma rtogs pa la/ snying rje chen po bskyed pa bsgom mo// tsit+ta s+pha ra Na phaT ces brjod de/ chos thams cad gdod ma nas ma skyes shing/ dngos po med pa yin na sems can thams cad kyis de ltar ma rtogs par/ dngos po la mngon par zhen pa 'di

rnams snying rje snyam du snying rje bskyed pa'i rtags su/ 'od dkar po tshon gang ba gcig gsal bar bsgom/ de la tsit+ta s+pha ra Na phaT kyi sgra byung bas/ thams cad 'od kyis khyab ste/ dngos por sbyangs nas/ 'od kyi thig le la 'dus nas shin tu gsal bar bsgom mo// 'bras bu ni

longs sku dang me long lta bu dang/ mnyam pa nyid kyi ye shes thob bo/ mngon gsal ba// sems kyi rang bzhin ye shes gsal// dam pa'i rang bzhin a las ni/ rgyu'i ting nge la yang de ltar bzhi las/ dang po ni gang zag la bdag

med rtogs par bya ba'i phyir ro// nges tshig ni/ gzugs sku rnams gnyis thob par bya ba'i rgyur gyur pa'o/ ye shes ni so sor rtog pa dang bya ba drug pa'i ye shes thob pa'o// thabs ni gong gi 'od kyis gong bu de yi ge a gcig tu gyur par bsgom mo/ badzra tsit+ta a zhes pas a de la

'phros 'dus pas dz+nyA na sa twa hU~M zhes pas ye shes sems dpa' sku mdog dkar po tshon gang ba/ rgyan dang cha lugs spangs pa gcig bsgom mo// 'bras bu ni sku ni sprul sku// ye shes sems dpa' gsal bar shar/ tshad med bsgoms las khyad par

'phags// sku gsum rang la gnas pa na/ theg pa'i khyad ni/ theg pa 'og ma pa ni/ tshad med bzhi bsgoms nas sems can kyi don byed de/ 'dir de las khyad 'phags te/ chos sku las longs sku byung nas sa bcu'i don mdzad longs sku las sprul sku byung nas sems

can gyi don mdzad pa ltar/ de bzhi mchog sku/ kun snang longs sku rgyu'i ting sprul skur bsgoms nas sems can gyi don mdzad do// de yang kun gzhi chos sku/ yid longs sku/ sgo lnga sprul skur rang la gnas pa'o// kun gzhi'i rnam shes stong nyid chos sku dang/ nyon mongs pa can gyi

yid kun tu snang 'od du gsal ba dang/ yid rgyu'i ting nge 'dzin du gsal ba dang/ sgo lnga las ye shes sems dpa' gsal bar bsgoms pas/ sku gsum ye nas rang la gnas pa'i don rtogs pa yin no// rang la gnas shing gzhan nas btsal du med par shes pas/ tshe

gcig lus gcig la 'bras bu thob par byed pa'o// thugs rje rang byung rang shar sku// kun gzhi nyon mongs yid dang sgo/ !/ e las nam mkha' mtha' dbus med// yaM las rlung gi dkyil 'khor te// baM las chu yi rba klong

'khyil// suM las gser gyi sa gzhi chags// yaM las rin chen ri rab steng// raM las ye shes me 'od 'bar/ 'byung ba dbang chen gyi dkyil 'khor bsgom pa/ bdag ye shes sems dpa' de/ ye shes kyi rlung gis btegs nas/ bar snang la

gsal ba las/ e yaM baM suM laM raM/ zhes brjod pas/ thugs ka nas yi ge de rnams shar te/ dngul gyi dong rtse brtsegs ma bzhin/ rim pas gnas pa las/ yig 'bru rnams shin tu gsal bar bsgom mo// e A ka sha maN+Da la zhes pa e mthing ga 'od du zhu nas/ nam mkha' chos kyi

'byung gnas gru gsum pa/ yum kun tu bzang mo'i rang bzhin/ kha dog sngon por bsgom/ yaM karma rak+Sha haM zhes pas/ yaM dud kha las rlung gi dkyil 'khor zla ba kham pa rgya gram pa dam tshig sgrol ma'i rang bzhin/ kha dog dud kha gcig tu bsgom/ paMM mA ma kI ti maN+Da la zhes pas/ paM

las bdud rtsi chu'i rgya mtsho zlum po/ yum mA ma kI'i rang bzhin kha dog dkar por bsgom/ su su me sruM zhes pas/ suM las gser gyi sa gzhi gru bzhi pa yum sangs rgyas spyan gyi rang bzhin kha dog ser por bsgom/ laM tiSh+Tha maN+Da la zhes pas yaM las rin po che'i ri rab kha dog lnga

dang ldan pa/ ga'u ga rting sprad pa 'dra ba'am/ sho btab pa lta bur bsgom/ raM dz+wa la maN+Dal zhes pas/ raM las ye shes kyi me 'od rnam pa lnga 'ja' tshon 'khyil ba/ 'byung ba lnga'i drod snyoms pa/ yum gos dkar mo'i rang bzhin du bsam mo// 'bru lnga'i phra ! don yum lnga'i rang

bzhin yi ge 'bru lnga las rtags 'byung ba lnga shin tu gsal bar bsgom mo/ bkod yum lnga'i rgyu// mkha' dbyings rnam dag yum lnga'i b+ha ga dkyil 'khor ni// ma bcos lhun grub yum gyi mkha'/ rigs lnga 'khor dang bcas

pa// rgyal ba rgya mtsho'i bzhugs gnas [(]ka[)]rten// [ (]nga[) ]rin chen 'bar ba'i gzhal yas khang// mtha' dang dbus med nam mkha'i rgya// phyi dang nang med kun tu nang// rigs pa'i gdan dang ye shes rgyan/ ! gzhal yas khang bsgom pa ni/ b+h+rUM zhes brjod pas thugs ka nas b+h+rUM

le'u brgan gcig me dpung steng du phog pa las/ s+pha ra Na phaT ces brjod pas ye shes kyi b+h+rUM grangs med phyogs bcur 'phros te/ bde bar gshegs pa mchod/ sems can gyi don byas nas/ saM ha ra Na hU~M zhes pas dang po'i b+h+rUM la 'dus te/ 'od du 'bar ba las/ b+h+rUM bi shwa bi shud+d+he

badzra dz+nyA na maN+Da la hU~M zhes brjod pas rin po che sna tshogs las grub pa'i zhal yas khang/ 'khor lo rtsibs bzhi gru chad glau 'bur dang lha snam dang/ sgo bzhi sgo khyud dang bcas pa/ rta babs dang them skas brgyad dang ldan pa/ rgyu sna lnga las grub pa/ 'og rgyan/ sgo rgyan/ logs rgyan/ rtse

mo'i rgyan/ phyi rol gyi rgyan/ bdag po'i rgyan/ ngo bo nyid kyi rgyan dang ldan par bsgom mo// phyi nang med par gsal ba mtha'// dbus med par khyad par bsgom mo/[ (]kha[) ]/ rkang mdo lto ba snying ga sgal// rlung me chu sa ri rab can/[ (]ga[) ]'byung ba lus la tshang ste/

rkang mthil rlung/ sum mdo me/ lto ba chu/ snying ga sa/ sgal tshigs ri rab tu gnas pa'o// de yang rkang mthil rlung gi dkyil 'khor 'og gzhi dang/ sum mdo gru gsum me'i dkyil 'khor dang/ lto ba zlum po chu'i dkyil 'khor dang/ snying ga gru bzhi sa'i dkyil 'khor dang/ sgal

tshigs ri rab kyi dkyil 'khor te/ de ltar na rang gi lus dbyibs 'byung ba rim brtsegs su gnas pa'o// zhes tshigs bcad bsdebs pa'o// [ (]ka[)]lus [(]kha[)]snying [(]ga[)]rkang [(]nga[)]mig [(]ca[)]sna [(]cha[) ]so [(]ja[)]lce// [(]ka[) ]dbyibs [(]kha[) ]sgo [(]ga[)]rkang pan

[(]nga[)]phag [(]ca[)]drar [(]cha[)]gnas/ !/ lus la tshang ste/ lus kyi dkyil 'khor mi mnyam pa med pa gru bzhi/ snying ga'i rtsa bzhi sgo bzhi/ rkang brgyad ka ba brgyad/ mig pany+tsa re khA/ sna rin chen phag gu/ so dra ba dra phyed/ lce dang mchu 'dod yon/ rna ba rta babs so// de yang lus

dbyibs zhes bya ste/ lus 'dom gang gru bzhir gnas pa mi mnyam pa med pas gru bzhi dang/ snying sgo ni chos nyid dang yon tan dang/ las dang/ rang rgyud dang rtsa bzhi sgo bzhi'o// rkang ka ba ni/ yan lag gi rkang brgyad la dkyil 'khor gyi ka ba brgyad dang/ mig pan ni/ pany+tsa re

khA'i brtsigs pa/ sna phag ni rin chen pha gu/ so dra ni dra ba dra phyed/ lce mchu 'dod yon snam bu gnas zhes pa rna ba rta babs su gnas pas ni rang lus gzhal yas khang du gnas so// tshigs bcad gong 'og bsdeb bo// ye shes 'bar ba'i gzhal yas khang// seng ge

glang rta rma bya khyung// nyi zla pad+ma rin po che// gtso dang 'khor bcas rim par gsal/ gdan bsgom pa ni/ saM/ haM/ aM/ maM/ naM/ zhes brjod pas yig 'bru de lnga 'khor ba'i rtsibs dang lte ba la spros te gsal ba las/ de rnam pa 'od du zhu nas/ dbus su saM

las seng ge brgyad du gyur par bsam/ haM las shar du glang chen/ aM las lhor rta/ maM las nub tu rma bya/ naM las byang du shang shang rnams brgyad brgyad du gyur te/ steng na rin po che'i khri rkang bzhi yis sems can gnyis gnyis mjug ma dbus su bstan par bsam/ ma sUr+ya maN+Da la

zhes pas nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor/ a tsaN+Da maN+Da la bzhes pas zla ba'i dkyil 'khor/ paM pad+ma maN+Da la zhes pas pad+ma'i gdan te/ gtso bo la rat+na'i khri rkang dang nyi zla pad+ma ste lnga brtseg go// sems dpa' sems ma nyi

zla pad+ma sum brtseg go// kun bzang yab yum la nyi zla pad+ma rat+na'i khri rkang ste bzhi brtseg go// thub drug la pad rkyang re bsgom mo// mngon par byang ni chub ba dang/ la mi 'jigs pa// zag pa zad par mkhyen pa dang/ la mi 'jigs pa// bar du gcod pa'i chos rnams bstan/ pa la mi 'jigs

pa// nges par 'byung ba'i lam bstan no// pa la mi 'jigs pa'o/ !/ don rtags ni bzhi las/ mi 'jigs pa bzhi ni/ tsatwA ri ta thA ga ta bai shA ra d+yaM zhes pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i mi 'jigs pa bzhi yin te/ mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang ldan pas de bzhin gshegs pa

phal pa mang po'i nang du byon nas khyu mchog gi gnas rlabs po che zhal gyi 'che ste/ tshangs pa'i 'khor lo bskor zhing yang dag par seng ge'i sgra sgrogs pas na mi 'jigs pa zhes bya/ de la mngon par byang chub pa la mi 'jigs pa dang/ zag pa zad par mkhyen pa la mi 'jigs pa

gnyis ni/ sangs rgyas kyi rgyud la mnga' ba'i yon tan yin pas na/ rang gi don phun sum tshogs pa yin/ bar du gcod pa'i chos ngas par bstan pa dang/ nges par 'byung ba'i lam bstan pa las mi 'jigs pa gnyis ni/ gzhan la phan par bya ba'i phyir bshad pa yin pas gzhan

gyi don te/ rang gzhan gyi don phun sum tshogs par bstan pa yin no// sarba d+harmA b+hi saM bo d+hi bai shA ra d+h+yaM/ zhes bya ba/ chos mngon par rdzogs par byang chub pa la mi 'jigs pa yin te/ de bzhin gshegs pas chos thams cad phyag mthil du skyu ru ra'i 'bras bu bzhag pa ltar thugs

su chud de/ mngon par byang chub pa la shes rab brnyes pas/ dge sbyong ngam bram ze'ang rung/ lha'i mig dang pha rol gyi sems shes pa la sogs pa'i yon tan dang ldan pa/ lha 'am bdud kyang rung/ rdzu 'phrul dang mthu che ba'i tshangs pas kyang chos dang mthun par mngon par rdzogs

par sangs rgyas pa ma yin par brgal ba'i gzhi dang gtan tshigs med de/ brgal gyis dogs pa med pas na/ chos thams cad mngon par rdzogs par byang chub pa la mi 'jigs pa zhes bya ste/ mi 'jigs pa 'og ma gsum yang tshig gi mjug 'di 'dra bar bshad do// sarba bra ba k+Sha

ya dz+nyA na bai shA ra d+yaM zhes bya ste/ zag pa thams cad zad par mkhyen pa la mi 'jigs pa yin te/ zag pa ni nyon mongs pa'i ming ste/ 'dod chags la sogs pa nyon mongs pa dang ma bral na srid pa'i rtse mo man chad kyang slar 'dzag cing ltung bas na zag pa'o// nyon mongs thams cad

spangs te zad par mkhyen pa la/ zag pa ma zad par sun phyung zhing don rtags kyis brgal du med de/ mi dogs pas na zag pa thams cad zad par mkhyen pa la mi 'jigs pa zhes bya'o// an ta rA yi ka d+harmA na n+ya thA twa ni sh+tsi ta byA ka ra Na bai shA ra d+yaM zhes pa/ bar du gcod pa'i chos

rnams gzhan du mi 'gyur bar nges pa'i lung bstan pa la mi 'jigs pa yin te/ bar du gcod pa'i chos ni/ bag med pa dang/ ngo tsha mi shes pa/ khrel med pa la sogs pa/ 'phags pa'i lam dge ba'i phyogs kyi bar du gcod pa rnams/ bar chad kyi chos yin no zhes lung bstan

cing bshad pa la thog tu ma bab pa med pas na/ bar du gcod pa'i chos rnam pa gzhan du mi 'gyur bar nges pa'i lung bstan pa la mi 'jigs pa zhes bya/ sarba paM pa da d+hi ga mA ya nai r+ya Ni ka pra ti sat+ta thA twa bai shA ra d+h+yaM/ zhes bya ba phun sum tshogs pa thams cad thob par 'gyur ba nges

par 'byung ba'i lam de bzhin du 'gyur ba la mi 'jigs pa yin te/ de bzhin gshegs pas nyan thos rnams la/ nges par 'byung ba'i lam/ myang 'das kyi bde ba phun sum tshogs pa thob par 'gyur zhing sdug bsngal mthar phyin par bshad pa la/ nges par 'byung

ba'i lam ma yin no zhes dge sbyong dang bram ze sus kyang brgal zhing gzhan du bsgyur du med pas na/ phun sum tshogs pa thams cad thob par 'gyur ba/ nges par 'byung ba'i lam de bzhin du 'gyur ba la mi 'jigs pa zhes bya'o// de phyir na rdo rje sems dpa' la mi 'jigs pa seng

ge'i khri bzhugs pa'o/ !/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu ni/ da sha ta thA ga ta ba laM zhes bya ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes sgrib pa med pas shes bya'i dngos po gang la yang thogs pa med de/ mkhyen pa 'di bcu'i mthu nyan thos la sogs pa gzhan las khyad par 'phags

pas na de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu zhes bya/ de bzhin gshegs pa rnam snang gi gdan glang po stobs bcu mnga' ba'o// ai rA' ba Na zhes bya ba/ i ra ni sa/ a ba ti ni srung ba de'i bu yin pas na glang po che sa srung gi bu zhes bya'o// stobs glang po che'i khri dang sbyar

ro// gnas dang gnas min mkhyen pa'i stobs/ s+thA nA s+thA na dz+nyA na ba lan zhes pa gnas dang gnas ma yin pa mkhyen pa'i stobs yin te/ gnas ni legs par spyad pas 'bras bu yid du 'ong ba 'grub pa dang/ nyes par spyad pas 'bras bu yid du mi 'ong ba smin par

'gyur ba la sogs pa la bya/ gnas ma yin pa ni legs par spyad pa'i 'bras bu yid du mi 'ong bar 'gyur ba dang/ nyes par spyad pa'i 'bras bu yid du 'ong ba 'grub pa la sogs pa la bya ste/ srid pa dang mi srid pa la ma nor mkhyen pa'i stobs dang ldan pa'i phyir gnas dang gnas

ma yin pa mkhyen pa'i stobs zhes bya'o// las kyi rnam par smin pa mkhyen pa'i stobs/ karma bi bA ka dz+nyA na ba la na zhes bya ba ni las kyi rnam par smin pa mkhyen pa'i stobs yin te/ bla na med pa'i ye shes kyi 'das ma 'ongs de ltar gyi las yang dag par blangs pa rnams

kyi rnam par smin pa las kyi rgyu gang gis gnas gang du 'bras bu smin pa mkhyen pas na/ lam gyi rnam par smin pa mkhyen pa'i stobs zhes bya'o// mos pa sna tshogs mkhyen pa'i stobs/ nA nA bi muk+ti dz+nyA na ba la na zhes pa ni/ mos pa sna tshogs mkhyen pa'i stobs yin te/

zag bcas zag med dang/ khams gsum la dga' zhing mos pa sna tshogs mkhyen pas na de skad ces bya'o/ khams ni sna tshogs mkhyen pa'i stobs/ nA nA d+ha tu dz+nyA na ba la na zhes pa khams sna tshogs mkhyen pa'i stobs yin te/ khams zhes bya ba ni sngon gyi bag chags

kyis grub pa'i bsam pa'i khams dang/ rnam byang la sogs pa'i khams la bya ste/ khams tha dad pa mang po'i rang spyi'i mtshan nyid ma nor bar thugs su chud pas de skad bya'o// dbang po mchog dang mchog min mkhyen/ in+d+ri ya ba rA ba ra dz+nyA na ba la na zhes pa/ dbang po

mchog dang mchog ma yin pa mkhyen pa'i stobs yin te dad pa la sogs pa dbang po rab dang 'bring dang tha ma'i rig pa dang/ rnam grangs ma lus par mkhyen pas na'o// thams cad 'gro ba'i lam mkhyen stobs/ sarba tra gA mi nI pra ti ban+tha dz+nyA na pa la na zhes pa/ thams

cad du 'gro ba'i lam mkhyen pa'i stobs yin te/ 'gro ba lngar skye ba'i lam dang/ myang 'das su 'gro ba'i lam la sogs pa lam thams cad chub par mkhyen pas na'o// ldan pa thams cad mkhyen pa'i stobs/ sam b+h+yA ni bi mok+Sha so ma d+hi ma bAk+mat+ti si kle ba na l+ya ba da na

byut+thA na dz+nyA na ba la na zhes pa/ bsam gtan dang rnam par thar pa dang/ ting nge 'dzin dang snyoms par 'jug pa dang kun nas nyon mongs pa dang/ rnam byang dang byang ba thams cad mkhyen pa'i stobs yin te/ bsam gtan dang po la sogs pa bzhi dang/ rnam

par thar pa brgyad dang/ stong pa nyid la sogs pa'i ting nge 'dzin mang po dang/ mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu la sogs pa dang/ kun nas nyon mongs pa ni blta ba dang/ dmigs pa la sogs kyis nyon mongs par gyur pa la bya/ rnam byang ni 'khor bar chags pa

med pa dang/ mi dmigs pa dang ldan pas rnam par dag pa la bya/ ldang ba ni lugs dang mthun pa dang/ mi mthun pa dang/ thod rgal la sogs pa'i tshul gyis ldang ba mkhyen pa la bya'o// sngon gnas rjes su dran pa mkhyen/ surba ni bA gA nu smr-i ti dz+nyA na ba la na zhes bya ba/

sngon gyi gnas rjes su dran la mkhyen pa'i stobs yin te/ bdag dang sems can sngon gyi tshe rabs grangs med pa tshun chad gnas gar skyes pa dang/ byad gzugs kyi rnam pa ci 'dra ba dang/ mtshan ma rtags ci yod pa dang/ las kyi rgyu gang gis skyes pa mkhyen pas na de skad do// shi

'pho skye ba mkhyen pa'i stobs/ ts+yu t+yu pa pat+ti dz+nyA na ba laM zhes bya ba/ shi 'phau dang skye ba mkhyen pa'i stobs yin te/ lha'i spyan gyis sems can rnams gang nas shi 'phos nas gang du skye ba ma lus par gzigs pas na/ de skad do// zag pa zad pa mkhyen pa'i stobs/

A pra bak+Sha ya dz+nyA na ba laM zhes pa/ zag pa zad pa mkhyen pa'i stobs yin te/ 'dod chags la sogs pa'i nyon mongs pa thams cad/ bag chags man chad byung zhing zad par gzigs pas na zag pa zad par mkhyen pa'i stobs zhes bya'o// de ltar rnam snang gi gdan glang po che ni

stobs bcu mnga' ba'i rtags su/ glang po che brgyad bting nas gnas so/ !/ rin 'byung gi rta rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi ni/ ba lA ha ka zhes bya ba/ rta rin po che sngo skya'i ming ste/ sprin gyi shugs ltar mgyogs pas na/ sprin gyi shugs can zhes bya ste/ rta sngon sprin gyi shugs can rin

chen 'byung ldan gyi gdan no/ tsa twA ri r-i d+d+hi pA da zhes pa/ tsa twA ri ni bzhi/ r-i d+d+hi ni rdzu 'phrul/ pA da ni rkang pa ste/ 'dun pa dang/ sems pa dang/ brtson 'grus dang/ dpyod pa dang/ ting nge 'dzin bzhis nam mkha' la 'gro ba la sogs pa'i rdzu 'phrul gyi rten dang/ rgyur gyur pa'i na

rdzu 'phul gyi rkang pa zhes bya ste// 'dun pa'i rdzu 'phrul rkang pa dang/ 'dun pa'i ting nge 'dzin spong ba'i 'du byed dang ldan pa'i rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa ni/ sems ting nge 'dzin du 'jogs pa la lhag par dga' zhing mos pa'i dbang gis rtag tu ting nge 'dzin la 'jug pa'i sgo

nas/ sems rtse gcig tu thob pa ni 'dun pa'i ting nge 'dzin no// sems kyi rdzu 'phul rkang pa dang/ sems kyi ting nge 'dzin spong ba'i 'du byed dang ldan pa'i rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa ni/ tshe rabs snga ma la bsam gtan bsgoms pa'o// yang na tshe 'di la sngar nas ting nge 'dzin

bsgoms pa'i bag chags bsags te yun ring du sgom pa'i shug kyis rtse gcig thob pa'i phyir ro// brtson 'grus rdzu 'phrul rkang pa dang/ brtson 'grus kyi ting nge 'dzin spong ba'i 'du byed dang ldan pa'i rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa ni gang gi tshe sdig pa med dge ba'i chos spang

zhing gnyen pos dge ba'i chas rnams skye zhing 'phel bar bya la/ rgyun mi gcod par 'bad pa las sems rtse gcig thob pa'i phyir ro// dpyod pa'i rdzu 'phrul rkang pa'o// dpyod pa'i ting nge 'dzin sbyong ba'i 'du byed dang ldan pa'i rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa ni/ dge ba'i bshes

gnyen las dam pa'i chos nyan cing sems pa'i shes rab kyis chos thams cad kyi mtshan nyid mi rtags pa dang stong pa la sogs par bshig cing gtan la 'bebs te/ the tshom med par dpyod dpyod pa las sems rtse gcig thab pa la bya'o// snang ba mtha' yas kyi

dbang rma bya'i gdan ni// tshe la dbang ba ni rang ci tsam 'dod par gnas pa'o/ dang las la dbang/ ba ni las kyi dbang du mi 'gro ba// yo byad dbang nam mkha'i mdzod la mnga' mdzad pa dang mos pa dbang// ba ni gdul bya gang mos su bsgyur

ba'o// smon lam dbang ni gang btab 'grub pa'o/ dang rdzu 'phrul dbang/ ji ltar 'dod par bsgyur ba// skye la dbang sems kyi don du gang 'gyur du skye ba len pa dang chos la dbang/ chos kyi phung po brgyad khri bzhi stong thugs su chud dpa'o// sems la

dbang sems can gang 'dod pa'i don lhun gyis grub pa'o/ dang ye shes dbang/ so so yang dag rig pa bzhis ye shes lnga thugs su chud pas sems can la thams cad mkhyen pas gzigs par mdzad pa'o// dbang bcu rdzogs pa rma bya'i gdan/ don grub kyi

shang shang ni/ phrin las te/ tsa twA N+ya pra mA Na zhes pa/ tshad med pa bzhi ste/ sems can dpag tu med pa la byams pa/ snying rje/ dga' ba/ btang snyoms khyad par can bsgom pa'o// byams pas sems sems can thams cad bde ba la 'god pas phan gdags snyams pa byams pa tshad med do/ can sdug bsngal bral bar 'dod/ byams

pa tshad med ni/ 'jig rten pa dag/ bu tsha nye 'khor la byams pa dang/ nyan thos pa dag sems can nyung shas kyi don byed cing byams pa lta bu ma yin te/ sems can thams cad la bu gcig pa ltar snying rje bskyed

pa'o// de ltar don grub pa'i gdan shang shang/ ni tshad med pa bzhi dang yang ldan pa'o// snying rjes tshad med pa sems can thams cad nyon mongs dang bral zhing sdug bsngal bsal bas phan 'dogs so snyam pa'o/ de dag bde dang ldan par 'dod// dga' bas

tshad med pa sems can thams cad la gong ma ltar phan pa dang bde ba byams pa legs so snyam du sems pa'o/ bdag don yongs su grub par 'dod// btang snyoms tshad med pa ni sems can rnams bde ba dang grol bar bya ba la/ dgra dang zun du mi 'byed

'dod// par btang snyoms su phan gdags pa'o// gnod pa nad rnams zhi ba dang/ phrin las bzhi dang yang dag ldan te/ shAt+ti ka zhes bya ba gnod pa dang nad la sogs pa zhi bar byed pa'i sngags kyi ming ste zhi ba zhes bya'o// tshe dang long spyod rgyas 'phel zhing/

paSh+ti ka zhes tshe dang srid dang longs spyod la sogs pa rgyas shing 'phel bar byed pa'i sngags kyi ming yin pas na rgyas zhes bya'o// pha rol sems 'gyur dga' bas dbang/ shang ka ra Na zhes pa pha rol gyi sems bsgyur zhing bdag ci dga' bar bya ba'i sngags kyi ming ste

dbang du bya ba zhes bya'o// gnod cing phung bar byed pa'o// a b+hi tsa ra zhes bya ba gzhan la gnod cing phung bar byed pa'i sngags kyi ming ste drag shul spyod pa zhes bya phrin las shang shang gi gdan no// rin chen sna bdun mdzod mig dang/ ni btsun mo/ blon po/

dmag dpon/ nor bu/ rta/ glang po/ 'khor lo rin po che rnams dang ldan pa'o// sa bcu gcig/ kun tu 'od dang mtshon nyi ma'i gdan/ bcu gnyis ma chags pad+ma spyan/ mtshon pa zla ba'i gdan/ 13/ yi ge 'khor lo tshogs chen mtshon pa pad+ma'i gdan du snang ste 'bras

bu'i sa gsum non pa'i rtags su bstan pa'o/ rdzogs pa'i gdan/ sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' dang/ rig ma dang/ khro bo rnams kyi gdan du gnas par bstan pa'o// rdo rje sems dpa' la sogs pa// thugs rje che dang ldan

pa yi// dkyil 'khor lnga la sogs pa'i 'khor/ thugs rdo rje'i rigs rdo rje sems dpa' dang/ yum dbyings phyug ma'o// rdo rje sems dpa' dbus gnas te/ yab yid kun tu bzang po// kun bzang yab yum chos sku kun bzang mo yum lha/ lha

min/ mi/ byol song/ yi dwags/ dmyal ba/ thub drug bcas// thugs kyi dkyil 'khor chen po'o// sku/ rnam snang yab yum sangs rgyas spyan dbus gnas te/ nang gi sems dpa' yab yum// sa yi snying po sgeg mo dang// byams phyi'i sems

dpa' yab yum pa spos ma sgo ba gshin rje gshed/ yab yum// sku yi dkyil 'khor gnyis pa'o// yon tan/ rin 'byung yab yum mA ma kI dbus gnas te/ nang gi/ nam mkha'i snying po phreng ba ma/ phyi'i sgrib sel me tog sgo ba stobs po

che/ yab yum// yon tan dkyil 'khor gsum pa'o// gsung/ snang mtha' yab yum gos dkar mo dbus gnas te/ nang gi/ spyan ras gzigs dang glu ma dang/ phyi'i/ kun bzang mar me sgo ba rta mgrin dpal/ yab yum// gsung gi dkyil 'khor bzhi

pa'o// phrin las// don grub yab yum dam tshig sgrol ma dbus gnas te/ nang/ phyag na rdo rje gar mkhan ma/ phyi// 'jam dpal dri chab sgo ba bdud rtsi 'khyil/ pa yab yum// phrin las dkyil 'khor lnga pa'o// sku gsung thugs yon

tan phrin las// dkyil 'khor lnga dang ldan gyur pa// dbus kyi rdo rje sems dpa' la ma bcu la gzhan ma rigs bzhi la brgyad/ brgyad do// tshom bu lnga ru gsal bar bsgom/ dkyil 'khor dang tshom bu'i khyad par ni/ 'khor ba'i cha nas brtsis na

tshom bu/ pho brang gtso bo'i cha nas brtsis na/ dkyil 'khor zhes pa dang/ yang na gtso dang 'khor du phye na dkyil 'khor/ gtso 'khor zung 'brel du bsdebs na tshom bu zhes bya/ yang na pho brang gtso bo gtso che ba'i cha nas dkyil 'khor la 'khor so so'i ldog pa'i cha nas tshom

bu'o// grub pas sangs rgyas bstan pa'i lung bzhin du/ lha rnams kyi// sku mdog so so'i phyag mtshan dang// phyag rgya rgyan dang cha lugs dag/ bzhugs tshul la sogs pa// bskyed rdzogs grub pa'i lha dag bsgom// nam mkha'i dkyil nas ye

shes shar/ bskyed pa dngos ni/ ye shes sems dpa' bar snang la zla ba lding ba ltar yod pa de/ gdan thog tu babs te/ badzra tsit+ta A be sha ya a zhes brjod pas skar chen thang la babs pa'i tshul du gdan stengs su shal gyis babs te/ 'od du ltem gyis zhu bar bsam/ de hU~M

gcig tu gyur te/ s+pha ra Na phaT ces brjod pas hU~M phra mo grangs med pa 'phros te/ don gnyis byas nas saM ha ra Na hU~M zhes pas/ dang po'i hU~M la thim/ tiSh+Tha badzra zhes pas rdo rje gcig tu gyur par bsam/ hU~M badzra d+h+r-i ka ces pas rdo rje sems dpa' zhal gsum phyag drug pa gsal gdab

pa nas 'byung ba bzhin no// zhabs gnyis mnyam pa'i skyil krung/ rin po che'i dbu rgyan can/ snyan cha/ mgur chu/ dpung rgyan/ do shal se mo do/ dar dkar gyi stod g.yogs/ sa ti smug po'i sham thabs/ rgyan sna tshogs kyis brgyan pa/ rigs lnga'i dbu rgyan can bsgom/ mUM d+hA twI shwa

rI zhes pas yum dbyings phyug ma brla g.yas pa yab la brten pa/ phyag g.yon dril bu thogs pa sku mdog mthing ga gcig bskyed do// de la ye shes lngas dbang bskur sku gsung thugs su byin gyis brlab mkha' gsang byin gyis brlab/ mkha' nas dkyil 'khor

gdan no/ !/ nges pa las ni rdo rje che// de las bcom ldan rdo rje sems// gsang ba'i yum dang gnyis med 'khril/ de'i rang bzhin rang rig bde ba chen po srid pa bar do na gnas pa ni gsung yig 'bru'i cho ga dang sbyar ro// bar dor rang

rig bde ba'i cha/ nad rnams zhi ba dang/ phrin las bzhi dang yang dag ldan te/ shAt+ti ka zhes bya ba gnod pa dang nad la sogs pa zhi bar byed pa'i sngags kyi ming ste zhi ba zhes bya'o// tshe dang long spyod rgyas 'phel zhing/ paSh+ti ka zhes tshe dang srid dang

longs spyod la sogs pa rgyas shing 'phel bar byed pa'i sngags kyi ming yin pas na rgyas zhes bya'o// pha rol sems 'gyur dga' bas dbang/ shang ka ra Na zhes pa pha rol gyi sems bsgyur zhing bdag ci dga' bar bya ba'i sngags kyi ming ste dbang du bya ba zhes

bya'o// gnod cing phung bar byed pa'o// a b+hi tsa ra zhes bya ba gzhan la gnod cing phung bar byed pa'i sngags kyi ming ste drag shul spyod pa zhes bya phrin las shang shang gi gdan no// rin chen sna bdun mdzod mig dang/ ni btsun mo/ blon po/ dmag dpon/ nor

bu/ rta/ glang po/ 'khor lo rin po che rnams dang ldan pa'o// sa bcu gcig/ kun tu 'od dang mtshon nyi ma'i gdan/ bcu gnyis ma chags pad+ma spyan/ mtshon pa zla ba'i gdan/ 13/ yi ge 'khor lo tshogs chen mtshon pa pad+ma'i gdan du snang ste 'bras bu'i sa

gsum non pa'i rtags su bstan pa'o/ rdzogs pa'i gdan/ sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' dang/ rig ma dang/ khro bo rnams kyi gdan du gnas par bstan pa'o// rdo rje sems dpa' la sogs pa// thugs rje che dang ldan pa yi// dkyil

'khor lnga la sogs pa'i 'khor/ thugs rdo rje'i rigs rdo rje sems dpa' dang/ yum dbyings phyug ma'o// rdo rje sems dpa' dbus gnas te/ yab yid kun tu bzang po// kun bzang yab yum chos sku kun bzang mo yum lha/ lha min/ mi/ byol song/

yi dwags/ dmyal ba/ thub drug bcas// thugs kyi dkyil 'khor chen po'o// sku/ rnam snang yab yum sangs rgyas spyan dbus gnas te/ nang gi sems dpa' yab yum/ sa yi snying po sgeg mo dang// byams phyi'i sems dpa' yab yum

pa spos ma sgo ba gshin rje gshed/ yab yum// sku yi dkyil 'khor gnyis pa'o// yon tan/ rin 'byung yab yum mA ma kI dbus gnas te/ nang gi/ nam mkha'i snying po phreng ba ma/ phyi'i sgrib sel me tog sgo ba stobs po che/

yab yum// yon tan dkyil 'khor gsum pa'o// gsung/ snang mtha' yab yum gos dkar mo dbus gnas te/ nang gi/ spyan ras gzigs dang glu ma dang/ phyi'i/ kun bzang mar me sgo ba rta mgrin dpal/ yab yum// gsung

gi dkyil 'khor bzhi pa'o// phrin las// don grub yab yum dam tshig sgrol ma dbus gnas te/ nang/ phyag na rdo rje gar mkhan ma/ phyi// 'jam dpal dri chab sgo ba bdud rtsi 'khyil/ pa yab yum// phrin las dkyil 'khor lnga

pa'o// sku gsung thugs yon tan phrin las// dkyil 'khor lnga dang ldan gyur pa// dbus kyi rdo rje sems dpa' la ma bcu la gzhan ma rigs bzhi la brgyad/ brgyad do// tshom bu lnga ru gsal bar bsgom/ dkyil 'khor dang

tshom bu'i khyad par ni/ 'khor ba'i cha nas brtsis na tshom bu/ pho brang gtso bo'i cha nas brtsis na/ dkyil 'khor zhes pa dang/ yang na gtso dang 'khor du phye na dkyil 'khor/ gtso 'khor zung 'brel du bsdebs na tshom bu zhes bya/ yang na pho brang gtso bo gtso che ba'i cha nas dkyil

'khor la 'khor so so'i ldog pa'i cha nas tshom bu'o// grub pas sangs rgyas bstan pa'i lung bzhin du/ lha rnams kyi// sku mdog so so'i phyag mtshan dang// phyag rgya rgyan dang cha lugs dag/ bzhugs tshul la sogs pa// bskyed rdzogs grub pa'i lha dag

bsgom// nam mkha'i dkyil nas ye shes shar/ bskyed pa dngos ni/ ye shes sems dpa' bar snang la zla ba lding ba ltar yod pa de/ gdan thog tu babs te/ badzra tsit+ta A be sha ya a zhes brjod pas skar chen thang la babs pa'i tshul du gdan stengs su shal gyis

babs te/ 'od du ltem gyis zhu bar bsam/ de hU~M gcig tu gyur te/ s+pha ra Na phaT ces brjod pas hU~M phra mo grangs med pa 'phros te/ don gnyis byas nas saM ha ra Na hU~M zhes pas/ dang po'i hU~M la thim/ tiSh+Tha badzra zhes pas rdo rje gcig tu gyur par bsam/ hU~M badzra d+h+r-i ka ces pas rdo rje

sems dpa' zhal gsum phyag drug pa gsal gdab pa nas 'byung ba bzhin no// zhabs gnyis mnyam pa'i skyil krung/ rin po che'i dbu rgyan can/ snyan cha/ mgur chu/ dpung rgyan/ do shal se mo do/ dar dkar gyi stod g.yogs/ sa ti smug po'i sham thabs/ rgyan sna tshogs kyis

brgyan pa/ rigs lnga'i dbu rgyan can bsgom/ mUM d+hA twI shwa rI zhes pas yum dbyings phyug ma brla g.yas pa yab la brten pa/ phyag g.yon dril bu thogs pa sku mdog mthing ga gcig bskyed do// de la ye shes lngas dbang bskur sku gsung thugs su byin

gyis brlab mkha' gsang byin gyis brlab/ mkha' nas dkyil 'khor gdan no/ !/ nges pa las ni rdo rje che// de las bcom ldan rdo rje sems// gsang ba'i yum dang gnyis med 'khril/ de'i rang bzhin rang rig bde ba chen po srid pa bar do na gnas pa ni gsung yig 'bru'i cho ga

dang sbyar ro// bar dor rang rig bde ba'i cha// yi ge hU~M du gnas pa yis// pha ma'i cha shas khu khrag gi dum bu rang rig bzhugs pa ni/ thugs/ phyag mtshan gyi cho ga rdo rje lte ba la hU~M gis mtshan par sbyar ro nyid du grub/ 'byung ba/ chen po

lnga las lus grub pa'i ni sku yongs su rdzogs pa dang sbyar ro/ grub pa// yongs su rdzos pa zhes bya'o// mi gsal gdab pa skyod pa zhal dbus dang sku mdog mthun par mthing ga g.yas dkar g.yon dmar zhal/ phyag g.yas dang po/ rdo rje bar ma

'khor lo tha ma rin chen g.yas/ g.yon dang po// dril bu bar ma pad+ma tha ma ral gri g.yon/ yum/ dbyings phyug ma g.yas yab la brten phyag g.yon dril bu sku mdog sngo// srog 'dzin sems can thams cad kyi snying na srog 'dzin pa'i rlung gi

yi ge hU~M// nam mkha' mUM zhes bya ba nyid/ rlung gnas pas las kyi rnam smin ma zad bar du sems gnas/ zad pa dang 'chi ba ni rlung nyid sems la sems nyid hU~M mUM mo// rnam shes phung po shes rab dang/ bi dz+nyA na skan+d+ha ni bi dz+nyA nan zhes bya ste/ yul tha dad pa sna tshogs shes pa/ mig

la sogs pa'i rnam shes brgyad bsdus pa'i ming yin pas na rnam par shes pa'i phung po zhes bya'o// rnam par shes pa'i phung po dmigs pa rnam par rig pa'o zhes te/ rnam shes brgyad po so so'i yul shes par byed pa'o// sems dang yid kyang de yin te/ sna tshogs

dang yid rten byed pa'i phyir ro zhes bya ste/ sems ni sna tshogs zhes bya ba'i don te/ de yang mig la sogs pa'i rnam shes drug po de dag/ rang rang gi yul tha dad pa'i chos sna tshogs la 'jug pa'i phyir ro// rnam shes kyi phung po dang shes rab kyi phung po chos mthun te/ rnam par shes

pas rig pa dang/ shes rab kyi shes pa'o// sems can la rnam shes/ rgyal ba la shes rab kyi phung po'o// bi dz+nyA p+ti zhes bya ba/ lus ngag gi spyod pa'i tshul gyis/ dge mi dge/ lung du ma bstan pa dang/ snying la ci sems pa gzhan la go bar byed pas na/ rnam par rig byed ces bya/

a bi dz+nyA p+ti zhes bya ba/ sdom pa dang sdom pa ma yin pa dang/ sdom pa yang yin/ sdom pa ma yin pa yang yin pa dang/ 'di rnams rnam par rig byed bzhin du/ gzhan gyis shes shing rtogs par mi rung bas na/ rnam par rig byed ma yin pa zhes bya'o// zhe sdang chen por rang

gnas so// rgyu sems can gyi dus na zhe sdang 'bras bu sangs rgyas kyi dus na rdo rje sems dpa'// yum gyis gsang ba'i gzhal yas su/ yum gyi mkha' nas sku gdon pa ste rang la nyon nas rang la thim pa'o// byang chub sems las rdo rje sems dpa' yab

yum mdun gyi nam mkha' la klong gyis bton te gsal bar byas nas rang la thim par bya'o/ skur gsal ba// rdo rje sems dpa' yab yum gnyis// spro zhing rang la thim par byed// snang mdzad dkar g.yas sngo g.yon dmar ba'i zhal/ rnam

snang yum gyi mkha' las bton te/ dkyil 'khor gyi shar gyi rtsibs la sku yongs su rdzogs par bsgoms te/ sku mdog dang dbus zhal dkar po zhal gsum phyag drug pa/ phyag g.yas kyi dang po// 'khor lo bar ma rdo rje tha ma rin chen g.yas/ g.yon dang po// dril bu

bar ma pad+ma tha ma ral gri g.yon/ yum/ sa sangs rgyas spyan phyag g.yas pa yab la brten te 'khyud g.yon na dril bu sku mdog dkar/ rlung lnga las/ sa dang 'dres pa'i rlung gzugs phung skyed sku'i yi ge oM/ 'byung ba/ sa ni gsung yi ge laM zhes

bya ba nyid// gzugs kyi phung po tshul khrims dang/ rU pa skan d+ha ni/ du paN+d+r+yAd rU pa nazhes bya ste/ lag pa dang dbyig pa la sogs pa gzugs shing gnod par byar rung bas na gzugs zhes bya'o// skan d+ha ni dus gsum gyi gzugs bzang ngan dang/ che phra thams cad

gcig tu bsdus pa'i ming ste/ gzugs kyi phung po zhes bya/ de yang rgyu'i gzugs sa chu me rlung 'byung ba bzhi yin/ 'bras bu'i gzugs bcu gcig ni/ rgyu 'byung ba las byung ba'i mig la sogs dbang po lnga/ de dag gi yul lnga ste bcu dang/ rnam par rig byed min pa'i rU pa dang bcu

gcig go rnam par rig byed ma yin pa ni/ bsam gtan bzhi las skye ste/ rgyu gzugs can las skyes pas gzugs su bzhag/ gzugs ni gsum ste/ bstan du yod la thogs pa dang bcas pa'i gzugs ni 'byung ba bzhi dang kha dog dang dbyibs so// bstan du med la thogs pa dang

bcas pa ni mig sogs dbang po lnga dang de'i yul lnga'o// bstan du yang med thogs pa yang med pa ni/ rnam par rig byed ma yin pa'o// sems can gyi gzugs kyi phung por 'jogs pa dang/ rgyal ba'i tshul khrims kyi phung po yang 'chal bas 'jigs pas chos mthun no/ !/ rgyu

sems can la gnas pa'i nyon mongs pa na gti mug 'bras bu sangs rgyas la gnas pa na ye shes/ de gnyis dbyer med pa'i rang bzhin du rtogs pa la rnam snang yab yum rang byung ngo// gti mug chen po rang byung ngo/ lho'i rtsibs la// rin chen

'byung ldan dbus ser g.yas sngo g.yon dmar ba'i zhal/ g.yas dang po// rin chen bar ma rdo rje tha ma 'khor lo g.yas/ dang po// dril bu bar ma pad+ma tha ma na ral gri g.yon/ yum// mA ma kI g.yas yab la 'khyud de brten g.yon dril

bu bsnams sku mdog ser sngo/ !/ yum ni 'byung ba na// chu dang 'grogs pa'i rlung gsung yi ge swA/ yum 'byung ba na// chu ni yi ge na maM zhes bya ba nyid/ sku ni// tshor ba'i phung po ting nge 'dzin/ !/ be da na skan+d+ha ni a nu b+ha ba la k+Sha Na pa da na ka mi

ka zhes pa/ bde sdug la sogs pa tshor ba rnam gsum longs spyod thams cad gcig tu bsdus pa'i ming ste/ tshor ba'i phung po zhes bya/ tshor ba bde ba ni lus sems la dben cing bde ba byung na de dang 'bral ba mi 'dod la bral na yang slar phrad par 'dod pa dang/ tshor ba sdug

bsngal ni lus sems la gnod pa ltar byung na de dang bral bar 'dod pa dang/ gnyis ka ma yin pa ni lus sems la gnod pa byed pa med pas bral bar 'dod pa yang med/ lhag par bde ba phan 'dogs kyang med pas phrad par 'dod pa yang med de/ gnyis kar 'dod pa med

do// sems can la yod pa'i tshor ba'i phung po dang/ 'phags pa'i ting nge 'dzin gyi phung po mnyam ste/ sems can gyi tshor ba yang bde sdug btang snyoms su myong la/ ting nge 'dzin gyis kyang nyams su myong ba'o// nyon mongs na// nga rgyal chen po ye shes na mnyam nyid ye shes

rang byung ba/ nub kyi rtsibs stengs su bskyed pa// mtha' yas dbus dmar g.yas sngo g.yon dkar ba'i zhal/ g.yas dang po/ pad+ma bar pa rdo rje tha ma 'khor lo g.yas/ dang po// dril bu bar rin chen tha ma ral gri g.yon/ yum// gos

dkar mo g.yas yab la brten g.yon dril bu 'dzin sku mdog dmar/ ! rang bzhin// 'du shes phung po ye shes dang/ ye shes na so sor rtog pa'i/ 'du shes kyi phung po ni/ saM dz+nyA skan d+ha ni ni mit+ta twA da gra ha na da mi ka zhes bya ste/ gzugs la sogs pa la/

'di ni dkar po'o// 'di ni sngon po'o// bzang ngo// ngan no zhes mtshan mar 'dzin pa dmigs pa'i yul dang/ de ma thag pa'i rkyen la sogs pa 'dus pa las shes pa 'byung zhing/ 'di yin no snyam du mtshan mar 'dzin pa la bya bas na/ rnam shes su drang du rung gis kyang/ mi drang

bar grags pa bzhin du 'du shes su btags/ 'du shes kyi phung po yul la mtshan mar 'dzin pa la gsum ste/ chung ngu/ chen po/ tshad med pa'o// yul gzugs la sogs pa dmigs par bya ba'i chos so rnams so// mtshan mar 'dzin pa ni kha dog dang dbyibs kyi bye brag tha dad pa

mang po'o// chung ngu ni 'dod pa'i khams ngan pa la dmigs pa'o// chen po ni bsam gtan dang po nas bzhi pa man chad de gzugs kyi khams la dmigs pa'o// tshad med pa ni nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched nas 'du shes med min man chad de gzugs med khams la dmigs
