mtsho'i ye shes kyis// srid pa rgya mtsho dbul byi'i rdzas mtha' yas kun// 'bul lugs// kun bzang mchod sprin mchog tu rol/ phyi ltar dri chab nang bdud rtsi/ snang zhing/ srid pa'i rtsa ba chos kyi dbyings su shar ba'i phyir ma 'gags par

mchod rdzas te/ snang srid// de nyid ma bcos pa'i ngang las gsal ba ltar/ yum gyi thig ler pad+ma rak+sha ltar shar// chags yul bde ba'i 'od phung nang ltar thugs rje chags pa'i rtags su rak+ta/ dmar po la 'khyil/ 'gro ba'i/ nyon

mongs pa rnams chos kyi dbyings su bstim phyir phyi bdud rtsi'i nang rak+ta gsang ba byang sems ar+g+haM bzhes/ zhes so// 'byung ba yum lnga nyid kyi ngang las dbyings nas ye shes bcud shar ba/ ni gsang ba rnam shes tshogs brgyad ye shes su gsal

lo// snang srid kyi mdangs ldan rang rig pa'i me tog ni rang sems mi rtog pa ste nang rang rig pa lta bu gsal// gnyis su med pa'i ngang las ma 'gag pa'i phyi me tog kha dog cir yang gsal/ ba'o// me tog/ 'bras bu'i bcud dang ldan

me tog kha dog 'od phung dang ldan par 'bul/ chos nyid/ ma bcos pa'i ngang las ma 'gags par shar ba'i rang byung dam rdzas spos mchog 'di/ dud pa'i kha dog chos dbyings nam mkha' gsal dris sna'i dbang po tshims

par byed pa// stong gsum dri bsung nang ltar gsur chen gyi dud pas/ gsang ba byang sems bdud rtsi'i dris/ gang ba'i bdud rtsi 'di// 'bul gnas ye shes/ 'bar ba'i lha'i shangs la mchod pas mnyes gyur cig/ snod yum bcud yab

gnyis med yab yum dag pa la/ yab kyi khu ba gsang ba'i mar me/ nang ltar rang byung ye shes kyi rtags su// 'bras bu rang byung ye shes me shar nas/ kong bu dur khrod gzhal yas khang mar khu tshil chen me ye shes kyi rang bzhin no// mtha' dbus

med par gsal ba'i 'od 'bar ni/ phyi kong bu stong gsum rtsi mar rgya mtsho tsam me stong gsum/ dgongs pa// 'khor ba'i ma rig pa'i mun khang sra ba gzhom phyir bzhes su gsol/ gsang ba ltar yab yum gnyis su dri chab khu ba dkar dmar// gnyis med

mkha' dbyings dag pa'i pho brang du/ nang ltar// nyon mongs pa lha mor dag pas skyon bral dag pa lha mo mang po tsan+dan gyi 'de gus byug pa ni/ byang chub sems// phyi ltar tsan+dan la sogs pa'i dri// cir yang 'char phyir dri yi 'od dpung

'bul// zhal gyi dbyings su thim ro phro ba'i mchog yin pas na dgos pa la sku nyams su brtas pa'o/ nas mnyes gyur cig/ gnas gang nas byung na// nam mkha' kun bzang dbyings nas cir yang 'byung/ gsang ba byang sems yid bzhin nor

bu rin che// 'bras bu gang 'byung na// 'byung ba'i 'bras bu nang ltar 'dod pa'i yon tan lnga/ phyi ltar zhal zas ro mchog brgya ldan gyi// lha bshos rin chen yid bzhin longs spyod 'di/ phyi zhal zas// sku nang 'dod yon gsung gsang ba

byang sems thugs kyi ngang du thim par bsam/ dang po rna ba'i yul du/ sgra yi dngos por snang ba yang/ sgra'i dngos po rdos bcas su// yod pa ma yin rna bar shin tu grags// sgra yis phy-i sgra snyan gyis yid rab tu tshim gyur kyang// sgra nyid

rang bzhin gang yang med/ nang ltar sgra rang bzhin med par rtogs so// sgra 'byung gsang ba chos thams cad la sgra brnyan ltar shes pas rang bzhin mchod par 'bul/ phyi/ sku nang gsung gsang ba thugs kyi dngos grub stsol/ bdud rtsi lnga rang gi

lus las byung bas na// rang byung de yang ye gdod ma nas dag pa'i rdzas// bdud rtsi lnga re re las spas pa nang gi bzhi// rtsa mngon pa phyi'i bzhi ste brgyad/ brgyad stong las sbyar ba'i sman// yan lag phyi'i ming gi yin pas na yan lag stong gi sman// ra sA

ya na la sogs rdzas// rigs lnga dri chen rnam snang byang sems rdo rje sha chen rin 'byung rak+ta mtha' yas dri chu don grub/ dam tshig lnga yi dngos// ye shes lnga rdzogs dri chen chos dbyings byang sems me long/ sha mnyam nyid rak+ta kun rtog/ dri chu bya ba grub pa/

grub pa'i rdzas// rgyud drug dri chen dud 'gro/ byang sems dmyal/ sha chen lha/ rak+ta mi/ dri chus lha min dang yi dwags/ sems can kun sgrol ba'i// dug lnga sel dri chen gti mug sel de bzhin sbyar ba'i bdud rtsi 'di/ sangs rgyas rnams la 'bul ba

ni// bcom ldan rig lnga yab yum dang/ phul bas phung po dang 'byung ba lnga dag par mdzad// byang chub sems dpa' lcam dral dang// rnams la phul ba rang rgyud dag par mdzad// kun bzang yab yid dang yum chos dag thub

drug dang/ nyon mongs drug/ sgo skyong yab yum lus kyi khams dag mtha' bzhi las grol/ mkha' 'gro sangs rgyas bstan pa dang 'khor bcas la/ rdzas gang 'bul na// rnam dag bdud rtsi dam rdzas mnyes mchod 'bul/ ji ltar bzhes

nas// thugs rjes bzhes te kun tu dgyes mdzod la// dngos grub gang thob na dam tshig nyams pa rnams// tshangs pa nas 'phrul dang 'dra ba'i gyi dngos grub stsal du gsol// lce yi dam dngos grub len pa'i dam tshig lce rdo rjer bsam/ tshig

rdo rje la// rdo rje khong seng can gyi nang du 'dren pa'i hU~M bsgoms te/ thabs/ mthe bong dang ni shes rab srin lag rtses// thabs yab zla dkyil dang shes rab yum nyi dkyil 'brel ba yis/ yin no// rang gi lus khams// bdud rtsi rnam lnga

sbyar ba la/ lce la ro mchog tshor ba// myangs na sku gsung thugs kyi dngos grub rdo rje gsum 'thob 'gyur/ chos nyid la// dri ma med cing rnam par dag pa'i dpe nam mkha'i rang bzhin las/ 'phral du byung ba'i dpe// log rtog mtshan ma

mang po sprin phung bzhin/ sprin rlung gis gtor ba'i dpes// ye shes nyi zer 'od kyis rab sprin dang bral ba'i nyi ma shar ba ltar log rtog dag pa'i ye shes shar/ bsal phyir/ sgrib pa// dag pa'i don du gsang nan 'bul lo rtogs nas mchod

par bgyi/ sha lnga'i gtor ma// rmad du byung ba'i gtor ma dang/ gtor ma// 'dod pa'i yon tan gyi lha mo rnam pa lnga// chos nyid skye ba med dbyings las/ ye shes ma 'gags par 'char bas/ rang gang 'dod pa'i gsol ba btab cing phul

bas// ji ltar dmigs pa bzhin grub 'bul// bzang ngan che chung med pas// mnyam nyid rtog pa'i rlung gis/ mi g.yo bzang ngan che chung med pas// mnyam nyid mchog gi chos nyid yon tan can/ gzhan don/ thugs rje'i bdag nyid 'gro

ba'i sdug bsngal thams cad sel bar mdzad/ bde gshegs kyi// yon tan mtha' yas pa dang ldan pas gdul bya la dngos grub thams cad sbyin mdzad pa/ thugs gzung 'dzin gyi// dri ma med cing chos nyid las mi g.yo bar 'gro ba so sor mi

'byed pas mnyam med dam pa'i dngos grub mchog chos can/ nyid ster bas na/ longs sku'i// yon tan shin tu brtag dka' bas na phra ba'i cha la yang tshad gzung du med de// dpe ni nam mkha' mtha' yas pa ltar dang yang yon tan mtha' yas

pa 'gran du mnyam pa yod ma yin/ mchog thun mong gi/ dngos grub rnam gnyis gzhan dang mnyam pa med dpe yid bzhin nor bu dgos 'dod 'byung ba'i dpe bas lhag pa'o/ dang bral ba rnams/ dngos grub de gang la sbyin na// sems can

khams las can la mchog gi dngos grub mchog rnams sems nyid chos skur gsal bar ston nges par stsol/ dus/ rtag tu gzung 'dzin gyi dri ma med pa'i phyir mi dmigs pa las thugs rje'i shugs las byung/ ba ni nyi ma shar bas sems can la

'od byung ba lta bu'o// smon lam gang btab pa de grub pa ste thugs la gang yang 'gag pa med pa'i nam mkha'i chos nyid can/ cir yang snang ba'i yon tan gang yang ma 'gags par 'char ba'o// 'gro ba'i don mngon mtho nges legs grub

rab tu brtson pa ni mtha' yas pa/ 'i don 'grub pa'o// nyan rang ltar min pa// thugs rje chen po'i bdag nyid dus rtag tu nam mkha' ltar 'gyur ba med par dus rtag tu bzhugs rnam par snang/ 'jig rten na yon tan/ tshad med pas tshad

gzung ba dang bral ba chos nyid shin tu yongs su rdzogs pa'i/ rnam rtog gi zug rngu dang bral nas// bde bar chos skur gshegs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi dgongs pa'i go 'phang dam pa brnyes gyur kyang/ pas gdul bya'i don mdzad bya mdzad byed kyi

rtogs pa mi mnga'/ 'dod khams gzugs khams gzugs med khams gsum rnams la phyag rgya chen po mchog gi dngos grub mchog stsol zhing ster bar mdzad de rang sems chos sku dri med du gnas pa'i don rtogs par/ mdzad pa yi// thugs rje'i chen pos

sems can gyis don mdzad pa spyod pa mi g.yo 'gag par yongs mi 'gyur// zhing mi 'gag ste yid bzhin gyi nor bu ltar 'gro don 'gag med du mdzad do// e ma ho ni ngam zhing mtshor pa'o// so sor rtogs pa'i ye shes kyis chos spyi dang rang gis tshan nyid mkhyen

pas na/ shin tu bzang ba'i chos nyid mchog dang ldan/ pa'o// mchog sbyin pas sgrub pa po la dngos grub rnams kyi nang nas mu stegs kyi dngos grub las khyad byas pas na go 'phang mchog chos sku brnyes pa/ 'o/ khams 'dod khams

gnas rigs nyi shu gzugs khams bcu bdun/ gzugs med skye mched mu bzhi gang bsgrub pa byed la chos sku ston pa'o/ gsum kun la rtag tu dngos grub mchog stsol mdzad/ 'gro ba'i/ mgon po dus gsum sgrib pa med par me long dag

pa'i byad ltar gsal ba rab mkhyen pa'o// dam tshig mchog sku'i dam tshig sku mi zad pa rgyan gyi 'khor lo'i mtshon nas de bzhin du gsung thugs la yang sbyor/ gsung dngos grub dam pa bdag la stsol/ cig/ bstod pa/ 'di ni sangs rgyas thams

cad kyi/ spyir bstod pa ste// yang dag pa ye shes kyi sgo nas yon tan rgya chen te/ po la bstod pa/ bstod pa 'dis// lan cig tsam ni brjod pas kyang// sangs rgyas thams cad 'grub nas dngos grub stsol bar 'gyur/ ni mang du bstod na lta

ci smos zhes so// de nas rgyal ba thams cad gnyis su med par sgrub pa 'di gsungs so/ ye shes lha// bsnyen pa'i don du bzlas pa 'di dag bya// 'grub 'gyur 'di la the tshom med/ gdon mi za// rdo rje sems

dpa'i thugs ka nyid/ bdag rdo rje sems dpar gsal ba'i thugs ye shes kyi gzhal yas khang du/ nyi dkyil rgya long tsam cig bsam/ de'i steng du dz+nyA na sa twa hU~M zhes pas ye shes sems dpa' dkar po tshon gang ba ral pa'i thor tshugs can cig bsgom/ de'i thugs kar zla

dkyil gyi steng du rdo rje nas tsam gyi bum pa la hU~M nyung 'bru tsam cig bsgom/ de'i tha mar hU~M badzra d+h+r-ika/ ces pas bskor bar bsam// gsang ba'i sngags don bsgom par bya// de bzhin yum la'ang yum gyi thugs kar ye shes sems dpa'i thugs kar dril bu mUM

gyis mtshan par bsgom/ de'i tha mar mUM d+ha twI shwa ris bskor bar bsgom/ bsgom pa dang// rigs bzhi yab yum bsgom pa dang/ de bzhin rigs bzhi yang yum la rang gi phyag mtshan mtshan sa bon sngags kyis bskor bar bsgom// sems

dpa' zla ba'i 'od dang bcas// sems dpa' thams cad kyi thugs kar zla dkyil re de'i steng du 'od dkar po tshon gang ba re'i rtse la rang rang gi bskyed sngags rtsa sngags kyis bskor bar bsgom// kun bzang yab yum sngags don bsgom// gtso bo rdo rje

sems dpa' dang mthun no// thub pa rnams thugs kar pad+ma 'i steng du 'od ser po mtheb long tsam re la sngags kyis bskor ba dang gser gyi 'od// sgo ba rnams la nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor re la 'od mthing ga'i 'od/ mthe bong tsam re la sngags kyis bskor ba dang/

lha rnams kyi dung khang du zla ba la/ oM dang ljags steng du pad+ma la AHste thugs kar hU~M sogs gong ltar ro bcas/ bdag dam tshig sems dpa' dang lha ye shes sems dpa' gnyis med me long nang gi gzugs dang byad 'dra ba'o// dkyil 'khor gnyis kyis tshul bzung

bsgom/ ye shes lnga// oM bo d+hi tsit+ta ma hA su kha dz+nyA na d+hA tu AH byang chub kyi sems bde ba chen po ye shes kyi dbyings/ de nas hU~M bi shwa bi shud+d+he phaT dzaHzhes brjod de/ de las mar me gcig las gnyis su bye ba ltar mdun gyi nam mkha' la dkyil 'khor gnyis su phye

las 'phro 'du bya zhing bzlas pa bya rtog tshogs sbyang/ sku gsung thugs mi zad rgyan gyi 'khor lo// mchog dang grub chen brgyad la sogs pa/ thun mong gang 'dod pa/ rnal 'byor pas 'dod pa'i don la// smon lam rab tu gdab par bya// ye gdod ma na

nas 'khor 'das mnyam nyid chos sku'i ngang du dag par gnas pa la/ de ltar du/ ma rig pa'i dbang gis yod pa la sgro dang med pa la skur btab ste// de bzlog don phyir rgyal ba'i dam mnos nas// sgro skur gzung 'dzin gyis bsags pa'i lus

ngag yid la gnas pa'i sgrib pa rnams bzlog par bya ba'i don du rgyal ba'i dkyil 'khor du zhugs nas dam tshig mnos pa las/ bzhi bcu rtsa gnyis// rgyal ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi lha tshogs kyi thugs dang ci 'gal ba/ bgyis pa rnams// sangs rgyas thugs rje'i

bdag nyid yin pas// thugs rje che mnga' khyed la rtsa ba dang yan lag gi dam tshig dang 'gal ba rnams/ bzod par gsol// ye shes rgyal po sangs rgyas sku rnam snang gsung snang mtha' thugs/ mi bskyod pa/ rin 'byung// yon tan phrin las don

grub de re re la yang snga po tshang bas na/ rmad po che// de nyid du ni mnyam sbyor ba// dus da lta nyid du lus ngag yid gsum sku gsung thugs dang mnyam par sbyor ba// de nyid du ni sku gsung thugs kyi sid+d+hi bdag la stsol// zhes sangs

rgyas thams cad kyis ched du gsungs so// dus gsum gyi rgyal ba rnams kyis 'od min du gsungs pa las gsang bdag gis dam pa'i rigs can lnga la gsungs so// de nas gsungs so zhes sbrel gang gis gsungs na/ phyogs bcu dus gsum gyi de

bzhin gshegs pa 'das pa ma lus shing ma byon pa lus pa med pa da ltar ba thams cad kyis/ gang gi don du gsungs na// rnal 'byor gyi dbang phyug dam pa rnams kyi don/ la gsungs so// gang gsungs na/ yang dag pa rgyun gyi rnal

'byor bsgom pa 'di gsungs so// de ting bsgom pa stong pa nyid de chos thams cad de kho na nyid stong pa nyid do// de gang zhe na// mi dmigs chos dbyings de bzhin nyid// rang bzhin 'od gsal kun tu snang// kun tu snang

zhing khyab pa'i snying rje'i 'od kyi kun tu gdal ba'o// kun la snang ba snying rje sgyu ma'o// a nyid rgyu las dkyil 'khor 'byung// rgyu'i ting nge 'dzin a dkar por bsgom mo// gzhal yas khang gzhung dang lha tshogs 'byung ba'i rgyu'o// nam mkha'/ e yaM rlung baM chu suM sa

laM ri rab raM me b+h+rUM/ khang pa'o// b+h+rUM las rin chen gzhal yas khang// dbus 'khor lo rtsibs bzhi gru chad blo 'bur bar khyams sgo dang bcas pa bskyed do// gdan ni rdor sems// seng ge rnam snang glang rin 'byung rta mtha' yas rma bya te'u/ don grub shang

shang// dkyil 'khor bsam yas lhun gyis grub/ sangs rgyas zhe gnyis rang rang gi sngags gong nas 'byung ba ltar brjod la bsgom par bya'o// lcags kyu zhags pa lcags sgrog dril bu// phyag rgya bzhi yis spyan drangs nas// rang snang bzhi bcu

phyag 'tshal zhing// phyag 'tshal ba'i se gol dkrol la brda dang bcas pas/ dam tshig dkyil 'khor gyi ye shes kyi dkyil 'khor la ma 'gags pa'i sgo nas phyag 'tshal zhing ma skyes pa'i sgo nas gnyis su med par bya'o// sems can don phyir nan tan mchog

bskyed cing// spyan drangs pa rnams/ sangs rgyas kyi thugs// ye shes thugs rjes chen po bdag la dgongs nas kyang/ chos nyid// mi dmigs pa bsgrub pa'i don du mchog gi dngos grub rnams// chos sku thob par bya ba// bdag la stsal

zhing dngos grub ma thob bar du brtan par bzhugs su gsol// sku mdog zhal ni rnam par bsgyur/ rang zhal phyag gsal bar bsgom zhing// phyag rgya pad skor g.yas g.yon dbus dang gsum du bskor lha rnams yud tsam gyis yid la gsal bar bya// sku

ni gar thabs glog 'gyu ba// rtsa ba'i lha zhe gnyis su gsal ba mnyes pa'i lha rnams// phyag rgya'am gar gyi mchod pa 'bul// mchod pa bzhes dbang dang dngos grub stsol// spos kyi lha mo ser/ dang me tog ma sngo mar me ma dmar dri/

chab ma ljang gus mchod pa'o// bdud rtsis mchod la dngos grub blang// rang byung gdod nas dag pa yi// rtsa brgyad stong la sbyar ba'i sman// rigs lnga ye shes lnga yi dngos// dug lnga sel ba'i bdud rtsi 'di// bcom ldan rigs lnga yab yum dang// byang chub lcam

dral thub pa drug/ kun bzang yab yum 'khor bcas la// bla med bdud rtsi'i mchod pa 'bul// thugs rjes cher dgongs dbang dang dngos grub rtsol// ar+g+haM me tog bdug spos dang// mar me dri chab bshos dang sgra// ting nge 'dzin gyis re re la gong du bshad

pa'i// phyi nang gsang bar sbyar ba rnams// bdag gi phung po khams skye mched dang mnyam pa'i lha tshogs la 'bul// rgyal ba'i rigs lnga'i sras sems dpa' rnams kyi dang thugs kyi dpal be'u nas/ ye shes lha la/ dngos grub stsal

ba dang dang stsol bar sgrub pa pos len par don dam par mi dmigs kyang// sngon gyi sems can la dngos grub sby-in par thugs dam du bzhes pa'i dbang gis dngos grub rtsol/ cig/ tshogs 'dod yon drug dang gtor ma dang bdud rtsi

pany+tsa a mr-i ta/ dang// ta na sgrol ba dang ga Na la sogs ci 'byor pa/ sa mchod do// ting 'dzin yid kyis mchod pa mang por spros nas/ dmigs pa'i mchod pa 'di/ 'khor ba las// rgyal ba dgongs pa rgya mtsho ltar

gnas pa rnams kyis bzhes su gsol/ gzhi// chos kyi sku skye ba med pa'i rang bzhin las/ bzhugs pa/ 'gro don du// gzugs kyi sku sgyu ma'i ltar snang la rang bzhin med pa skye ba'i skur ston pa/ sangs rgyas kyi// thugs rjes sems can

kun la khyab pa don byed pa// rgyal ba bzhi bcu rtsa gnyis su snang ba la phyag 'tshal bstod// de nas gnyis med sgrub don du// sngags bzla bar bya ste sgom thabs ni gong ltar byas la/ 'dzab bo d+hi tsit+ta dang// spyi dang khyad par badzra D+h+r-ika

la sogs pa bsnyen 'dzab dbul// de nas zhugs mar gtsigs pa yi// sgrub pa zab mo yang dag bshad// de bzhin nyid dang ni oM yang dag grub pa gcig pu nyid// dang por chos kyi dbyings nyid las// dmigs pa med pa'i don gyis

bsgom// dmigs med chos dbyings de bzhin nyid// oM ma hA su kha hU~M zhes pas chos nyid stong par bsgoms te/ lung 'di nyid nas tshig bsdus nas bsgom mo/ kun tu snang// oM sangs rgyas bde chen kun 'dus pa// chos kyi dbyings kyi ye shes kyis// thams cad kun 'dus

khyab par bya// rang bzhin 'od gsal kun tu snang// tsit+ta pra be sha s+pha ra Na phaT/ lung 'di nas bsdus snying rje sgyu ma bsgam mo// rgyu yi ting 'dzin rab ldan pas// oM rnam 'byor zab mo sku gsum rdzogs// med pa'i rgyu las mngon gsal ba'i// sems kyi rang bzhin ye

shes gsal// rgyu yi yi ge a dkar gsal// zhes bsgom mo// e yaM baM suM laM raM lnga las bskyed// yi ge 'bru lnga'i 'phro 'du las// e a ka sha maN+Da la zhes pas nam mkha' gru gsum bsgom/ oM karma rak+Sha haM gis rlung zla kham/ baM mA ma kI ri maN+Dal zhes pa bdud rtsi'i rgya

mtsho bsgom// nam mkha' rlung dang bdud rtsi mtsho/ laM tiSh+Tha maN+Da la zhes pas// rin chen sa gzhi suM su me ru suM gyis rin po che'i/ ri rab steng/ raM dz+nyA na dz+wa la maN+Dal la zhes pas// ye shes me 'od kun tu gsal// b+h+rUM b+h+rUM cir yang gyur pa'i yig 'bru

bsam zhes brjod de gzhal yas khang dbus zla kham sgo gcig pa gru chad kyi sgo dang ngo// 'phro 'dus rin chen gzhal yas khang/ dbus rat+na'i khri// seng ge sa btegs pa nyi ma zla ba pad+ma'i gdan gyi steng/ gzhal yas khang// yid bzhin rin chen

gyis rgyan dang gdan rin po che'i khri rkang gi rgyan gsal// nam mkha'i dkyil la ye shes sems dpa' rlung gis btegs pa phab/ nas ye shes shar// 'phros bskul don byas 'dus gsal bar cho ga gsum gyis bskyed do/ gyur pa las// rdo rje

sems dpa' yab zhal gsum phyag drug yum zhal gcig phyag gnyis gong ltar/ bsgom// ye shes lnga yi dbang oM ma hA shu n+ya ta la sogs/ bskur zhing/ oM sarba ta thA ga ta la sogs// sku gsung thugs su byin gyis brlab/ de bzhin kun tu rgyu'i/

ting 'dzin gsum po gsal gdab/ brtan byas zhing// rtags kyi yab yum dam tshig gi phyag rgya/ mkha' gsang las kyi phyag rgya// sbyor ba chos kyi phyag rgya/ phyag rgya gsum bcings nas/ yab// chos kyi sku phyag rgya chen por bzhugs par bsgom/

rdo rje sems dpa' yab yum bsgom pa ni// lam kun ma nor bar gsang sngags kyi/ kun bsgom yin/ yum chos dbyings ye shes las spyan drangs// stong nyid ye shes me long las// ngo bo chos sku// ma skyes pa las gzugs sku/ mi

'gag par gzugs skur snang ba/ dpe chos nyid nam/ mkha' la ye shes 'ja' tshon 'dra bar snang ba ji bzhin du/ chos kyi/ dbyings nas ye shes kyi sku'i/ phyag rgyar spyan drangs pas gshegs su gsol/ ! dbyings nyid rang bzhin rnam par dag

pa las// thugs rje'i dbang gis sprul pa'i skur bzhengs pa// zhes mgo la gdags// sangs rgyas kun 'dus mi skyod yab yum gtso// rang snang thugs rje che la phyag 'tshal lo// legs par sems can don phyir nan tan mchog cing// zhes/

bzhugs su gsol nas ni// mi bskyod mthing ga dkar dmar zhal/ rdo rje 'khor lo rin chen g.yas// dril bu pad+ma ral gri g.yon// zhes mgo mnan no// yab yum gnyis su med pa la// gar dbyangs mchod pa 'di 'bul gyis// ye shes ngang

las dngos grub stsol// bdud rtsis mchod rang byung gdong nas rnam par dag/ rtsa brgyad stong la sbyar ba'i sman// ye shes lnga rdzogs sgrub rdzas 'di/ la dngos grub blang// gsang dri med rnams dag gi nan sgrengs la sngags kyis gtor ma

dbul// bde gshegs rgyal ba yab yum la// bdag cag dad pas 'bul lags kyis// thugs rjes dgongs te bzhes su gsol// bzhes nas kun tu dgyes mdzad la// 'phrul gyi dngos grub stsal du gsol// zhes bya'o// chos sku skye ba med pa'i rang bzhin las// gzugs sku

sgyu ma'i skyes bu'i tshul bstan nas// thugs rjes kun la khyab pa'i don mdzad pa// yi dam rgyal ba'i sku la phyag 'tshal bstod// bstod cing 'dzab badzra d+h-ika bzlas bshags pa bya// tshogs mchod dang dam tshig bskang bshags nyin gung mtshan gung tshig
gi tshogs mchod/ pa bya'o// rang gzhan don du chos sku theb par// smon lam yongs su gdab par bya'o// zhes gsungs so// dpal khrag 'thung gi gal po las/ chos nyid zhi ba'i dkyil 'khor te/ brtag pa dgu
pa'o//// de nas sangs rgyas thams cad kyi mnga' bdag gi khro bo 'byung ba'i rU tra chen po 'di dag gsungs so// rtag pa rang rgyud rU tra ni// mos pa rjes su bzhag shes la// skyes bu yul gyi

'dod pas gdungs/ pa lta bu'o// log pa'i dbang gis nyon mongs lnga// dang po log pa'i dbang gis nyon mongs pa lngar brtags pa'i rang rgyud pa ni/ dngos po thams cad rang gi ngo bo phyogs dang bral ba la/ rig pa'i rkyen dang bral bas don ma mthong zhing/

dngos med la dngos por bzung bas rig pa la dngos por zhen cing brtags pas rang rgyud par snang ngo// brtags pa'i dbang gis gzung 'dzin du// brtags pa'i rang rgyud pa ni/ gang la de dag med pa la/ de dang der zhen cing chags pa ni/ gzung 'dzin no// yul

dang shes pa tha dad du gyur pa'i phyir ro// brtags pa ni dngos po bzhi la don ma shes pas dngos po gsum du brtags pa'o// zhen pa'i dbang gis 'dod yon lnga/ brtags pa'i rang rgyus pa ni zhen pa ste// med pa la brtag pas gnyis su 'khrul la phyi rol rang dang

mthun pa'i yul lngas glo bur rang rgyud par rgyun du skye zhing 'jug pa'i phyir rtags pa'o// brtags pas ji bzhin ji bzhin pa ni thams cad du khyab par gnas kyang/ rgya mtsho rbas sgrib pa'am/ long ba rang la shes pa ma skyes pa ltar gzhan las byung ba ma

yin no/ don la bsgribs/ pa de yang gong ma gsum po ma shes pas lan no// nyon mongs 'dod dang gzung 'dzin skyon// bdag dang bdag gir 'dzin pas na/ khams gsum 'khor ba'i grong khyer brgyud// nam mkha' dang chu la

dngos por zhen pa ltar/ rig pa ma skyes pa'i rang bzhin la/ nga'am bdag ces 'dzin pa'i phyir bdag tu mthong ba'o// de'i dbang gis phung po bzhi dang/ khams dang/ dbang po 'khor dang/ longs spyod la bdag zhen mngon par brtags so// de dag kyang chu las rlabs bzhin

no// ji skad bshad pa yang bdag tu 'dzin cing brtags te/ mngon par zhen pas bdag gis khams gsum du yang 'khor ba'i grong khyer brgyud pa/ nam mkha'i mthas gtugs pa'i 'gro ba rnams/ khams gsum du skye zhing grong khyer du brgyud do// brgyud pa gang zhe na// sngon tshe

dus nam byung na/ 'das pa'i dang po la/ gzhi gang las gol na// sangs rgyas srid pa'i sgron mar byung/ bla ma gang las dam nyams na// slob dpon rgyal ba'i 'khor lo yi// slob ma gang yin na/ dge slong nag po la// gsang sngags blta

ba dam tshig/ spyod pa/ ting nge 'dzin/ dbang/ phrin las/ mtha' drug bstan pa las/ gsang sngags zab mo'i// don de gdeng du ma gyur cing/ ma go bar/ srog gcod ma byin len mi tshangs spyod rdzun dang bzhi rang rgyud par// log pa'i lung du spyad pa

yis// dmyal ba tsha grang yi dwags phyi nang sgrib pa can/ kha 'khor te// tha mar las kyi srin por rA tra ma skyes/ khams gsum 'khrugs pa'i bdud du gyur// dang po gang las byung ba med// tha ma gang du 'gag med

la// gzhi las 'khrul pa rang rgyu dang 'bras bur bcas pa de dag gi rang bzhin ji lta bu zhe na/ gang gi phyir dngos po'i snying po de kho na nyid thogs tha mar med pa'i ye shes yin pa de'i phyir/ de las byung ba'i 'khrul pa dang ma 'khrul pa'i rgyu dang 'bras bur bcas pa'i chos ni nam

mkha' ltar dang po gang las kyang 'ong ba med/ bar du gang na 'ang gnas pa med/ tha ma gang du 'ang 'gag cing 'dzin pa med cing chu dang rlabs bzhin no// de'i phyir 'khrul pa'i rgyu dang ngo bo dang 'bras bur bcas pa ni ji ltar snang yang rang rgyud pa med de/ de dag gi rang bzhin ma

spangs par de dag las ma 'das pa ni/ rang bzhin nam chos nyid do// bdag gzhan 'dzin pas sngon smin te// ngo bo ma rtogs pa'i dbang gis bdag gzhan du 'dzin pa la/ brtan zhing yun ring bas/ sgrib pa dang las nyon gyi 'bras bu duHkha zhen pa dang bcas pa nyid

sngon du smin te 'khrul pa'i 'gro ba de dag gi ngo la/ zhen pa ma log cing bden pa mngon du ma byas kyi bar du skad cig ma tsam du'ang bde ba med la/ thar pa dang thams cad mkhyen pa'i skal ba yang med ces bya ba'i don to// skad cig bde dang thar pa med// ma rtogs

zhen pa'i 'gro ba dag/ dper na sems can gyi don ma rtogs pa rnams kyis ma shes par zos pas dug gi na ba lta bu dang// zas la dug gis btab pa'am/ skom gyis gdungs pas// ri dwags smig rgyu la chur 'khrul na smig rgyu la/ bsnyegs pa ltar/

rigs drug 'khor ba'i// sdug bsngal nyid las thar ba med/ de khams gsum 'khor bar 'khyams par gyur pa'o// des brtags pa dang rang rgyud kyi rU tra bshad zin to// sprul pa 'dod pa bskang ba'i rU tra yis// bsam pa yid

dang 'thad shes pa// sna tshogs me tog gling phyin pa 'dra/ gdul bya'i las dang/ de bzhin gshegs pa dang/ rdo rje slob dpon gyi smon lam gyi stobs kyis/ slob dpon rgyal ba'i 'khor lo ste rdo rje snying po dang/ slob ma dge slong nag po sngon byung la snang la/ da lta

slob dpon dang slob ma rnams kyang/ las dang smon lam gyis phrad pa'i phyir ro// dngos dpal chen nyid sprul pa 'dod pa skong ba'i rU tra yin no// las dang smon lam mthun dbang gis// byin rlabs gang zhus bla ma la// gdug pa rU tra 'dul ba'i

phyir// gang sprul pa ni brgyud pa rang thabs kyi byin rlabs dang/ cho ga 'am man ngag gi byin rlabs dang dam tshig/ blta ba/ dgongs pa/ nyams kyis bstan pa'i brtags pa'i snang ba bral zhing ye shes kyi snang ba 'char bar nus la de ni ting nge 'dzin dang tha mi dad do// 'dis ni

'dul byad de// sangs rgyas rnams 'dus nas rU tra 'dul bar bka' bgros bcas/ pa dang/ sangs rgyas kyi// cho 'phrul kyis 'dul bar bskul ba byas nas ni/ phrin las bzhis 'dul bar// las bzhi rdo rje bskos la btab// da ltar gyi

ni man ngag dang ldan pa'i slob dpon la bya'o// rigs nges dang ldan shes rab can// las dang thugs rjes phrad rung la// 'dir sngon byung du rU tra nyid la bya ste/ lta spyod zab mo la gnas shing/ bla mas byin brlabs pas rigs nges pa dang lus kyi phyi nang

gang la yang ma chags par rtogs pas dad pa dang ldan pa dang/ sangs rgyas zhal mthong zhing skad cig mas bden pa mthong bas shes rab can no// sngon nas sbyangs shing bsags pa'i las dang/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i thugs rjes btul nas sa la bzhugs pas phrad rung la zhes

so// gzhan du na bla ma dang theg pa chen po'i rigs su nges pa dang/ dad pa dang dam tshig dang ldan pa snying rje che ba/ yid mi skyo ba shes rab che ba/ gtong phod cing brtson 'grus che ba/ rang gi las dag pa dang/ bla mas de ltar rtogs pas thugs rje skye ba'i yul du gyur pas phrad du

rung ba'o// rang bzhin dag pa'i las dbang gis// dug gis dug nad bsal ba ltar// dug lnga gzung 'dzin 'dod pa lnga// de'i phyir na thog ma bar dang tha ma'i rang bzhin la brtags pa dang/ bde ba chen po la brtags pas/ dug lnga gang nus

pas chos nyid du 'gyur ro// dngos po gang btab pas gzung pa'i yul nub/ de'i ngo bo mthong bas 'dzin pa'i sems nus ste/ chos thams cad nam mkha' ltar gsal bar 'gyur ro// spyod yul lha'i rang bzhin la brtags pa dang/ dbang po de bar nus pa la brtags pa dang/

'dod pa lnga sgyu mar skye ba'i thabs kyi grub kyis// man ngag dang bral ba'i rtog pas ni ma yin no// ma lus pas na spyod yul gyi chos thams cad do// bshad thabs dais 'dul bar 'gyur ba ni chu rlabs zhi ba bzhin no// rlabs chur rtogs na/ rlabs la nyam nga ba med pa ltar/ snang

ba sems nyid ma bcos par shes na dran rtog dang snang ba gang la yang dgag bsgrub dang bral ba'o// ma lus thabs kyis 'dul bar 'gyur// rang nyid gang zhen cing dag pa ni// chags sdang lnga dang/ 'dod yon lnga dang/ gzung 'dzin dang gang la zhen pa dag go/ des

bsgyur ba'i sgo gsum gyi bya ba ni/ las dbang gis zhes so// thabs ni de dag nyid do// de dag gis ji ltar grol zhe na/ dug gi dug nad bsal ba ltar te/ blun po 'chi bar byed pa'i dug nad de/ dug la sngags kyis btab pas sel ba ltar/ theg pa chung ba nad

kyi gzir ba'i chags sdang la sogs pa ni thabs khyad par can de nyid/ ye shes su rang grol bar 'gyur ro// sprul pa'i khrag 'thung cir yang snang// cir yang snang bar sprul pas te/ thugs kyi rigs gcig pu'i khrag 'thung ma nges par cir yang snang ba ni/ rU tra 'dul

ba'i phyir khro bo 'dul byed kyi tshogs su yang snang ste// la la 'di ltar snang bar 'gyur// sku mdog dang zhal dbus/ mthing nag g.yas dkar dang g.yon dmar ba'i dbus/ phyag g.yas dang po na// rdo rje bar ma na zhing mchog gi dbyug pa tha ma na kha

T+wAM ga/ g.yon dang po// dril bu bar ma na b+han+d+ha tha ma na ba su'i zhags/ pa'o// yum yab kyi sku dang mthun pa dang gnyis su med par 'khril/ ba'o// yang ni thugs kyi he ru ka rU tra'i tshogs 'di ltar yang snang bar 'gyur/ te/ gnas/ bskal

pa 'jigs pa dus mtha'i me ltar 'bar ba'i me dpung gi dbus na yi// 'od zer 'du bas dngos grub ster 'phro'i klong dkyil na/ gnas kyi sems can gyi don mdzad pas/ thugs rje 'byung ba'i phyir/ sku ni 'dul ba'i dbang du gyur pa'i phyir/ dud ka
gting dpag dka' ba'i phyir chen po ste/ sku gsum bsgom pas// zhal gsum grub po la phyag drug po// phar phyin drug gi don mdzad pas/ zhe sdang 'dul ba'i phyir// gnag dud ka dang g.yas gti

mug 'dul mthing dang g.yon 'dod chags 'dul dmar ba'i dbu// g.yas pa gsum na thogs pa ni// g.yas dang po na dgra bgegs la brdeg pa'i dang ma mo mkha' 'gro 'bod pa'i g.yab mo// ti ra'i dbyug pa chen po dang// g.yas bar

ma// rdo rjes g.yon thod khrag dkrug cing zhal du gsol ba dang/ tha ma na khyung gi khra chen rU tra'i tshogs la spor zhing 'gyed pa'o// g.yon gyi gsum na thogs pa ni// ti ra'i rgyu ma'i zhags pa dang/ thams cad 'ching ba/ bar ma/ thod

rlon dmar gyis bkang ba dang/ gsol ba/ tha ma// ti ra phra mo'i chung ngu khog pa nas// glo snying nang grol phyung nas 'byin cing za/ gti mug gnas su dag pas sku la// glang chen gyi ko rlon gos su gon/ 'dod chags ma spangs gnas su dag

pas// zhing lpags g.yang gzhi'i sham thabs can/ sprul pa mang po 'gyed pas// thod rlon phreng ba rgyan du byas/ kro d+hI shwa rI sku la thabs shes rab mi 'bral bas 'khril/ phrin las drag pos/ gdug pa thams cad 'dul bar

byed// yang ni sprul pa'i he ru ka gdul bya la 'di ltar snang ste/ zhal g.yas/ dkar dang dbus mthing ga g.yon dmar ba'i mdog/ g.yas kyi phyag na bsnams pa ni/ dang po na gnyis med mtshon pa'i// rdo rje zhing bar ma na sgrol ba mtshon

pa'i dbyug tha ma na rbaud gtong mdzad pa'i/ khyung khra spor/ g.yon dang po// thod khrag bar ma na dug gsum 'jom pa'i kha T+wAM dam nyams 'ching ba'i rgyu zhags bsnams/ pa// yum dang gnyis su med par sku la 'khril/ ba'o// yang ni sprul pa'i he ru
ka 'di ltar gdul bya ba/ snang bar 'gyur// g.yas dkar gsal ba'i nyams g.yon dmar bde ba'i nyams smug nag dbus/ mi rtog pa'i nyams// g.yas kyi dang po ti ra la/ zhing dbyug/ bar ma rdo rje

b+han+d+ha tha// g.yon gyi dang po 'ching ba'i rgyu zhags la// bar ma dam nyams gdug par 'gyed pa'i khyung gi khra chen po// tha ma ti ra'i glo snying nang rol 'dren/ cing za// yum dang gnyis su med pa'o// yab ni sprul pa 'di ltar

snang// g.yas longs sku dkar dbus chos sku smug g.yon sprul sku dmar zhal/ g.yas dang po/ rdo rje bar kha T+wAM tha ma cang te'u g.yas/ dang po// dung dmar bar rgyu zhags tha ma khyung khra g.yon// yum dang thabs shes gnyis su med pa

la// dur khrod chas brgyad rnams sku la rdzogs// yang ni sprul pas 'dod pa skong/ nyes pa dang bral bas// g.yas dkar thugs rje chags pas/ g.yon dmar mi 'gyur bas dbus mthing nag dang po/ rdo rje bar khyung khra tha ma zhing dbyug

g.yas/ dang po// dung chen bar zhing dbyug tha ma rgyu ma'i zhags pa g.yon// yum dang gnyis su med par 'khril// gdug pa rU tra'i tshogs thams cad dbang du bsdus nas zhabs kyis gzir/ te ma lus par 'dul ba'o// yang ni 'di

ltar sprul pa 'dod pa skong ba'i rU tra dpal chen po'i tshogs/ snang ba yang// g.yas dkar ba stong nyid dbus smug mtshan ma med pa g.yon pa dmar/ smon pa med pa/ g.yas dang po// zhing dbyug bar rdo rje tha ma khyung khra ni spor/ dang po/ zhags pa bar

dung chen te thod pa tha mar ro dbyug g.yon// yum dang thabs shes gnyis su med pa la// gdul bya rU tra'i tshogs 'dul ba'i he ru ka/ yang ni sprul pa 'dod pa skong ba'i khrag 'thung snang ba yang// sku mdog dmar khams gsum dbang

du sdud pas smug zhal gsum la// g.yas pa thabs dkar la g.yon pa shes rab mi 'gyur nag/ phyag bzhi g.yas g.yon dang po na/ g.yas// rdo rje g.yon thod khrag dkrug cing gsol/ zhal du/ g.yon/ 'og ma dril bu

g.yas kha T+wAM ga/ yum dang bde stong gnyis su med pa ste/ he ru ka la// rdo rje rU tra zhes te gdul bya'i ming 'dul byed la btags/ bsam yas snang// stong gsum gyi 'jig rten khams rnams kyang thugs kyi he ru ka/ sa gang ba'i dpe// nam

mkha'i rdul phra rab dang mnyam pa'i grangs// ting nge 'dzin ye shes su langs pa ni/ 'i rU tra// sna tshogs dang po rang gi ngo bo nyams dang ldan pa ste/ 'i shes pa// rgya mtsho rin chen sna tshogs kyi gling/ la phyin pa ltar// phyin na rin po

che'i rigs bsam yas pa/ ltar bshad pa khyed la bstan// sngon nas zhen pa'i bag chags dag/ rU tra de'i thog ma med pa nas da lta yan chad kyi skye ba sna tshogs las gyur pa'i bag chags dang sgo gsum gyis spyod pa dang khyad par gsang ba log par gol ba ste/

de dag gi bag chags dag pa'o// 'das pa'i dus na sngon byung ba'i// 'das pa ni sngon yang rU tra nag po gsang ba las gol bas/ dang po rang rgyud pa la zhen cing nyon mongs pa la spyod pa ste/ dngos po'i don ma rtogs par nor bar gyur to// bla mas gsal byas

gsal gyur pa'i/ gang de ltar log par gol ba ste tshar bcad pa'i phyir/ phrin las bzhis rim par btul zhing tshar bcad nas/ mthong lam skyes shing dbugs phyin pa'o// de la sbyor ba byas pas sngon gyi las ci spyad dran zhing gsal bar gyur to// nor

pas yid ches 'gyod pa nyid// de phyir sngar ldan gyi las dang/ lta spyod log pa la log par shes shing the tshom za bas gdung ba dang/ 'gyod pa drag po skyes te/ sngar rang gi las spyad pa rnams nor bar shes pas/ dpal gyis sgrib pa sbyangs pas/ sngar las la 'gyod

pa'o// gang de phyis 'jug med pa'i sems// gal te sngar gyi bya ba log par shes nas de'i nyes pa khong du chud pas 'khrul pa phyis mi skye bas// skye ba dang las shes/ skye ba sngon du gyur pas phyis der mi 'jug pa'i sems skyes pa'o// gdung bas zhen pa mngon bsal

nas// gang gi shugs kyis gdung ba ni/ gdung ba de sngar gyi las nyon dang sgrib pa'i bag chags yun ring por bsags pa la mngon par zhen pa'o// de mngon du bsal ba ni/ rtogs pa dang ting nge 'dzin spyod pa'i gdung ba drag pos nyes pa bsal bas zhal mthong ste// bla mar

drin bsab lus gdan phul// de ltar zhal mthong bas bag chags phra ba sbyang ba'i phyir/ bla ma la drin bsab pa'i ye shes bskyed par bya ba'i phyir/ lus gdan du phul nas dgongs pa bskul bas thugs rje'i byin rlabs shar te/ chu dwangs pa dang zla ba lta bu'o// rang

sems snying po mthong ba'i rgyu// de yang skye ba dang/ gnas pa dang/ dus dang sngar gang du skyes pa'i duHkha rnams mthong bar byed pa'i rgyus ni dang bas rang lus gdan du phul ba'o// da lta nyid du mthong bar snang/ zhal mthong zhing sgrib pa dag nas/ ting nge 'dzin

ye shes su langs so// bla ma dbang po thams cad la// bla ma ni dpal rdo rje snying po he ru ka yin la dbang po ni sangs rgyas dpag tu med pa'i tshogs te/ dus gsum gyi slob dpon la yang 'gal ba med do// de yang blta ba dang/ dam tshig/ dbang/

man ngag gi brgyud pa gsum dang bral ba ni bla ma ma yin par shes par bya'o// mnyes shing tshogs kyis gus mchod cing// 'dir dpal rdo rje snying por rang rang gi sgrib pa 'dag cing tshogs su gyur pa'i phyir dang/ bla ma mnyes par bya ba'i phyir dang//

rU tra'i tshogs rnams kyi bla ma dam pa dpal he ru ka la sku gsum thugs dang zhing mnyes par bya ba'i phyir/ lus dang rgyan dang lag cha dang 'khor tshogs ma lus par gus pas mchod pa mang po phul zhing// lus dang yo byad kun btang la//

de bzhin du dbang dang man ngag thos par 'dod pas kyang rang gi lus bran du gzhug pa la sogs 'khor gsum yongs su dag pas mnyes par byas pas dbang dang man ngag 'thob pa'o// rU tras lus gdan du phul thod skyogs bstabs so// dkyil 'khor gsum du gzhug par bya//

rang gi snying po byang chub/ bla mas mngon du yid ches par bstan pa ni ye ji bzhin pa'i dkyil 'khor ro// sangs rgyas kun gyi sku gsung thugs kyi ngo bo bstan pa ni rang bzhin lhun gyis grub pa'i dkyil 'khor/ de gnyis rigs pa ma byung ma skyes pa la 'jug pa ni rtsa ba byang chub kyi dkyil 'khor ro//

dam pa gsum ldan rnal 'byor la'o// rgyal ba kun gyi sku gsung thugs thabs chen pos bzhag cing phog pas sems nyid nam mkha' ltar yid la byed cing 'jug pa med pa ni/ rnal 'byor dam pa'o// des rU tra dkyil 'khor du gzhug cing bla ma la yon dbul bar bsten pa'o// gang dang gang

snang de dag nyid// dug gis dug nad gso ba ltar/ nyon mongs lngas dbang bskur ba'i phyir byin gyis brlab pa'i skye bo gang la re dogs chad pa'i dus su/ chags pa lnga'i brda gang snang ba de dag nyid yongs su byin gyis brlab par mdzad pa'o// dang po

bar dang tha ma nyid// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ gang gi phyir chos thams cad rang gi sems su gsal zhing/ de nyid nam mkha' ltar mthong bas dang po yang chos nyid do// de la brda chen pos dug lnga nyid gsal ba ngo bo stong pas de nyid chos nyid du mthong ste de yang de nyid du rang

grol bar 'gyur ro// de dag gi dpe chu las byung ba'i chu lbur bzhin no// ro gcig ma skyes rang bzhin gsal// de ltar nyon mongs chos nyid du gsal ba ltar dran rtog ci byung/ gang skyes thams cad chos nyid bde ba chen por ro gcig par 'gyur te rang bzhin gyis

gsol lo// phyin chad kun kyang de bzhin no// de ltar rtogs pa bstan par skyes nas/ phyin chad nyon mongs lnga dang/ spyod yul dran rtog gang snang rnams ma lus pa de kho na nyid du gsal bas/ thag pa la sbrul 'dzin gyi zhen pa log pa'am/ rlabs dang chu bur ngo shes pa la

dus gsum du bsal du med pa bzhin no// phyi nang 'tsho ba'i yo byad lnga// rig pa ma skyes pa nyid phyi rol gyi gzugs la sogs pa lngar rang bzhin shar nas/ longs spyod rgyas par gyur pa dang// nang thabs shes yab yum la bde ba chen po'i longs spyod gcig la

lnga rdzogs pa gsal ba ni/ kha cig gi ni spang bya yin yang/ 'dir ye shes chen por mtshon cing nyams chen po yin no// bya byed ma skyes rang bzhin mthong// de ltar gang gis ston ces na rig pa nyid ma skyes pa las/ yul lnga ji ltar shar yang/ de nyid bde ba chen po

las mi gzhan par mthong la de nyid kyang gnyen pos ma bcos pas rang grol zhing stong par gsal lo// nang gi lnga yang bde chen gyis gzugs la sogs pa ste/ bde ba chen po nyid lngar snang la de yang tha mal dang/ lha'i rang bzhin dang/ sgyu ma'i rang bzhin dang stong pa'i cho 'phrul

las gzhan ma yin par gsal ba'o// nges par mthong bas ngo bo med// de dag kyang ji ltar mthong zhe na/ ji srid du man ngag dang thabs kyi nges pa'i shes rab skyes pa'i tshe/ tha dad dang rang rgyud pa'i zhen pa log cing/ rig pa'i dkyil 'khor gsal la ma 'dres pa ngo bo

stong par mthong ba'o// chu bur sprin dang chu ris ltar// de'i nyams dang dpe ni/ chu dwangs pa la chu bur skyes nas/ yang chu nyid du grol ba dang nam mkha' la sprin byung nas de nyid du grol ba dang/ chu la rkyen gyis ri mo ji ltar bris kyang chu nyid yin la de yang chur grol ba

bzhin no// nges med rang sems dbyings la gtugs// de ltar chos thams cad rig pa nam mkha' ltar mtha' dbus med pa nyid nyon mongs lnga dang/ 'dod yon lnga/ dran rtog gi 'du shes su rang gi sems ji lta bar shes te/ de nyid chos dbyings thog mtha' med

pa'i ngo bo la gnas shing grol lo// snang ba sems la gang zhugs pas// de bas na ji snyed pa'i snang ba rang bzhin gyis sems nyid ma bcos pa'i thig le la rtogs pa'i nyams kyi ngang du zhugs pas sgo gsum gyis bya btsal med par rig pa gang ltar gsal yang/ 'du

shes kun las grol bas de bzhin nyid do// yul sems bden pa'i 'du shes med// de la yul nyid rig par snang ba dang/ snang ba nyid sems su 'dus par gsal bas/ yul la bden pa'i 'du shes med la/ sems la sems kyis bltas pas/ ngo bo gang yang

mthong ba med par bstan pa dang/ sems kyang bden par ma grub cing med de gang du 'du shes dang bya ba zad pa de ni chos nyid ma bcos pa ste/ de la ni bsgom mi bsgom gang yang bdag tu med do// dus gsum ma bcos snying po'i sems// gang du

lung dang bla ma'i man ngag gis/ snang srid byang chub sems nyid ma bcos pa'i bde ba chen por gtan la phebs nas de dag nyid la nges par gnas pa'i tshe/ dus gsum du gzung du med pa'i rig pa ma skyes pa la gnyen po dang thabs kyis 'thos su med de snying po byang chub kyi sems

su rang gsal ba'o// dngos su bltas pas 'du shes med// de nyid la gnas par bya ba ni/ snga phyi spangs pa'i bde ba chen po la gnas pa'i dus su rang rig cing dran pa dang/ thun mong dang gzhan dngos la bltas pas kyang/ 'du shes kyang med la rang gi ngo bo la bltas

kyang 'du shes thams cad las gros bar 'gyur te chu dang nam mkha' bzhin no// snga phyi rtog pa'i ris mi gcad// de la rig pa'i gnas lugs ni snga phyi spangs pa'i bde ba chen po la gnas pa'i dus su dus gsum mnyam pa nyid kyi ngo bo la/ rigs snga ma'i rjes mi bcad phyi

ma la yid mi 'jug/ da ltar rang gi ngo bo la blo mi gnas te rang bzhin gyis gsal ba'o// phyi rol gang mthong yul nyid de// gal te rtog pa chung ngam yun ring nas yul du ston pa byung na gang gi tshe don mi gsal bas shes pa yul lnga la g.yo ba byung ba'i tshe shes pa la gang

snang ba de nyid yul nyid do// de nyid brtags pas nang la thug/ yul de nyid gang la byung brtags pas/ gzhan las ma byung ste/ nang gi sems nyid la thug go// gnyis ka sems nyid dben pa ste// 'o na phyi nang gnyis kar snang ba'i sems de gang yin zhe na/

bshad pa'i phyi rol gyi snang ba dang nang rig pa'i snang ba gnyis ka sems nyid kho na yin la/ de la ni phyi nang du rgyu ba'i 'du shes kyis dben pa ste/ phyogs su zhen pa ma lus pa zad pa'i phyir ro// brtags pas stong pa'i ngang la thim// de'i tshe yul dang shes pa cir snang

zhing mthong ba la bltas pas gnyen po med par rang nyid stong ste/ phyogs kyi zhen pa zad pa la bya'o// dran rig gang byung bltas pas 'jig/ 'o na lta byed kyi rig pa de yod dam zhe na/ gang du phyi rol gyi zhen pa ma lus par zad kyang myong ba dang tshor ba dang zhen pa dang

yid la byed cing snyam du sems pa de ni dran rig ste/ de lta bu sna tshogs gang byung yang/ ngo bo la bltas pas rang bzhin du 'jig par 'gyur te/ de ni rang byung rang zhi'o// de 'dra'i nyams ldan dbang bskur bya// nam mkha' nas yum rnams kyis tshigs su bcad pa'i

dbyangs brjod/ lha mo rnams kyis mchod pa 'bul byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyis bkra shis brjod/ sangs rgyas rnams kyis bum pas dbang bskur bas/ rU tra'i rnam shes la gnas pa'i las nyon gyi bag chags ma lus pa dag nas me long lta bu'i ye shes su gyur to// de yang

nyon mongs zhe sdang dag/ rnam shes kyi phung po gnas 'gyur/ me long lta bu'i ye shes kyis bag chags bdag gi rgyud la bzhag pas lus mi bskyod pa'i rdul phra rab kyis gang ba'o// sangs rgyas rnams ni thams cad kyi/ sku gsung thugs kyi// gsang gsum gnas

las byung ba yi/ khams gsum sems can kun gyis phyag byas pa'i// rdo rje'i sems dpa'i bum pa dbang bskur chen po sbyin// sarba ta thA ga ta badzra a b+hi Shiny+tsa mAM/ sngags kyis dbang bskur/ sangs rgyas rnams kyis rin po che'i cod pan

bdag gi spyi bor bzhag nas dbang bskur bas nyon mongs pa nga rgyal dag/ tshor ba'i phung po rin 'byung du gnas 'gyur/ mnyam pa nyid kyi ye shes kyis bag chags bdag gi rgyud la bzhag pas rin 'byung gi rdul phra rab kyis bdag gis lus gang bar bsam

mo// sangs rgyas rnams ni thams cad kyi/ sku gsung thugs kyi// gsang gsum gnas las byung ba yis/ khams gsum sems can kun gyis phyag byas pa// rin chen 'byung ldan cod pan gyi dbang bskur chen po khyod la

sbyin// sngags kyis bum pa bzhag pa// sarba ta thA ga ta rat+na a b+hi Shiny+tsa mAM/ ! skur mkhan// sangs rgyas kun gyi rdo rje'i dbang/ bskur ba'i bu// de ring khyod la bskur bar bya// 'di de sangs rgyas thams cad de/ lam du lha

dngos// 'bras bu// shin tu grub phyir rdo rje long// lag g.yas su rdo rje byin nas dbang bskur bas nyon mongs 'dod chags 'du shes so sor rtog pa rU tra'i rgyud la bzhag pas/ lus snang ba mtha' yas kyi rdul phra rab kyis gang ba'o// oM badzra a d+hi pa ti s+t+waM badzra

sa ma ya s+t+waM/ sngags kyis brtan par bya ba/ lag pa g.yon pa dril bu byin nas dbang bskur bas nyon mongs pa phrag dog dag bya ba grub pa'i ye shes/ 'du byed kyi phung po/ don yod grub par gnas 'gyur/ bya ba grub pa'i ye shes/ rU tra'i rgyud la bzhag pas don grub kyi rdul phra

rab kyis lus gang ba'o/ !/ 'di ni rdzas gang shes rab dril bu ste// de ring slob ma gang khyod la dbang bskur bas/ rigs kyi lha gang/ las kyi rigs su bdag gyur te/ ji ltar bskur na// chos nyid grub phyir dril bu long// oM badzra

sngags kyis byin brlab pa/ a ti du ma sa ma ya haM haM/ gang gis bskur na// rnam par snang mdzad ston pa yis/ gang la bskur na/ khyod la rdo rje'i ming de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi ming gi dbang bskur nas ming btags pas/ gti mug/ gzugs

rnam snang/ chos kyi dbyings kyi ye shes/ btags pas// gang nyid bskur na// 'di nas sangs rgyas sar 'gro ba// rdo rje'i ming 'di gzung bar bya// oM badzra sa twa a b+hi Shiny+tsa sngags kyi ming btags pa/ mI badzra a b+hi She ka/ ga ming btags nas

bod pa// kye kye dpal ldan rdo rje che ge mo// hU~M A+oM AH lag pa g.yas par rdo rjes dbang bskur bas thabs rdo rje las snying rje ma 'gags par rdzogs par gtang ba ni/ !/ 'di de sangs rgyas thams cad de// phyag na rdo rje'i lag na 'dug/ rtag par khyod

kyis kyang lag pa'i srin lag la rtag tu bcir bzung ste/ lag na rdo rje'i brtul shugs dang ldan/ par bya'o// ye shes lnga/ oM sarba thams cad ta thA ga ta sarba de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad ta thA de bzhin sid+d+hi grub pa badzra rdo rje sa ma ya hU~M/ dam

tshig ! rdo rje'i de kho na nyid brjod pa// thog mtha' med pa'i sems dpa' ni// rdo rje sems dpa' ni sku gsung thugs 'khor ba'i nyes pa dang bral nas myang 'das kyi/ bde ba'i mchog/ kun tu bzang po bzang ste dang du mi len ngan te dor ba med

pas kun bdag nyid// bcom ldan 'das dpal mchog dang po'i skyes bu la'o// oM ma hA badzra hU~M/ rdo rje chen po/ ! lha gang gang bskur// 'di de rnal 'byor ma shes rab dril bu skye ba med par mkhyen pa'o/ kun gyi/ don gang

bskur// shes rab dbyangs kyis rjes 'gror bshad/ khyod kyis kyang ni lag pa g.yon pa'i srin lag la dril bu/ rtag tu bcing/ pas sgrib pa bral te nyon mongs lnga dag/ byang chub mchog tu ye shes rgyas te mkhyen pa ma lus pa

dang ldan rgyal bas bzhed/ d+harma d+hA tu chos dbyings skye med a/ dril bu'i de nyid brjod pas// srid pa ngo bo nyid kyis dag/ srid pa rang gi ngo bo stong pas na// ngo bo nyid kyis stong pasasrid bral stong par gnas byas// rang bzhin dag pa'i

sems 'khor ba ngo bos dag par rtog pa dang ldan na// srid pa dam pa mi'i nang na dgongs pa can/ byed par 'gyur/ sku lhar bsam/ oM AHgsung dril bu hU~M/ thugs rdo rjer bsam/ kA ya bA ka tsit+ta sa ma ya/ dam tshig sbyin pa/ a b+hi Shiny+tsa mAM/

dbang bskur ba// bcom ldan thugs chos skur gnas pa zhi ba chen po kye/ gzugs sku dang dbyer/ mi phyed phyag rgya rab tu bsgrub/ bla ma'i bde ba dang slob ma dbyer med// rdo rje'i sbyor bas yab yum sbyor ba las skye med kyi don/ yang dag

byung// bdag nyid chen po dpal chen po yab yum khyod ji bzhin/ ltar/ srid pa gsum gyi// mnga' bdag rU tra bdag la'ang de bzhin dbang bskur mdzod/ rU tra la sogs// 'khor ba'i dpe 'dam rdzab lta bu'i gyi tshogs kyi nang

du// bying ba bskyab med bdag la rgyal ba'i thugs rjes skyobs// ji ltar rgyal ba ston pa sangs rgyas kyis/ 'khor/ byang chub sras la dbang bskur ltar// bdag gis yab yum sbyor ba byas pa'i byang sems lce thog tu bzhag pas gsang

ba'i dbang gis ni// sems kyi rgyun gyis dbang bskur ro// nam mkha'i he ru yum snyoms 'jug gi sgras phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas thams cad kyi bde ba bskul nas yab kyi thugs kar zhu/ yab yum sbyor mtshams na thig le mu tig gi phreng ba lta bu/ rU tra'i lce thog

tu thim pas mgrin pa'i rtsa mig tshim par byas/ gsang ba'i dbang thob par bskur ba'o// he ru ka nyid// mgon po sprul pa'i rU tra ste gdul bya'i ming 'dul byed la/ khyod// mtshan ni he ru ka dpal nyid// bde ba mchog bde/ bral ba de/ lhan skyes kyi bde
ba/ bzhi dang rab ldan pa'i// shes rab ye shes bdag la zhu// dga' ster gnas ster lha mo ni// sna tshogs gzugs can yid 'ong ma// zung zhig zung zhig sems dpa' che// zung la mchod pa rtag tu gyis// yum

reg rdo rje mar sprul nas rU tra'i lag pa g.yas su yum kyi lag pa g.yon pa gtad de// gzugs la blta/ sgra la nyan/ dri la mnam/ ro la myang/ reg bya'o byed/ skad cig ma bzhi la dga' ba bzhi nyams su myong nas lhan skyes kyi bde bas khyab pas ting nge 'dzin khyad par can skyes

so// zhabs kyi 'khor lo spyi bor btegs nas/ khyed zhabs pad+ma'i bka' drin gyis// gtso bo dbang bskur sku bum pa/ gsung gsang ba/ thugs shes rab ye shes/ rnam gsum thob// de ring lus ngag yid gsum dbyer med pa/ rnam pa bzhi po

yang// gtso bos dag la bka' drin stsol// ye shes 'di ni rtsa srog shing gsum las byung ba'i ye shes 'di ni phra zhing phra bas phra ba ste/ zab mo rtogs par dka' bas so/ ches phra zhing// rdo rje nam mkha'i dkyil nam mkha' stong kyang rtogs par

dka' ba lta bu/ rnam tog gi/ rdul dang bral bas de bzhin nyid du mtha' ste zhi ba nyid/ do// rU tra/ khyod nyid kyang ni de las skyes pas na khyod kyi pha/ yang de yin no// zhes pas lus ngag yid dang ni// gsum ka'i

dri ma dag par rig/ bum dbang lus kyi dri ma dag/ gsang dbang gis ngag gi dri ma dag/ shes rab ye shes kyis sems kyi dri ma dag/ bde ba chen pos gsum ka dag go/ de yan chad ting nge 'dzin ye shes su langs pa'i rU tra'o/ !/ rig pa rnal 'jog rU tra

ni// rang gsal phyogs dang bral ba'i shes pa// skyes bu rang gi mtshan dpe la blta/ ba bzhin no// rang zhal rang gis mthong bar 'dod/ pa'o// rtogs nas rang bzhin ma bcos te// lung chos thams cad kyi rang bzhin

sems nyid ye nas phyogs zhen med pa la mkhas pa rnams kyis lung la brten pa'i man ngag gis snying gi mun pa bsal nas/ snang ba dang dran rtog thams cad de kho na nyid du rtogs nas/ rig pa ma skyes pa'i rang bzhin la blo ma bcos par gzhag pa'o// chu yi rlabs ltar tha

dad med// de nyams kyi dpe bstan pa'i phyir/ dper na rgya mtsho chen po'i rlabs sna tshogs byung yang/ ngo bo chur gcig pa ltar/ mthong ba dag pa dang ma dag pa'i khyad par gyis/ nyams dang snang tshul ji ltar snang yang/ rig pa'i ye shes mtha' dbus med par gcig cing gsal

lo// cir snang rang sems skye med nyid// rnal 'byor pa yi dgongs pa la skyon dang yon tan dang/ mtshan ma dang/ drod rtags cir snang yang/ de'i ngo bo sems nyid du gsal bas nyams la dgag bsgrub med de gcig tu gsal ba'o// ngo bo mi 'gyur bcos su med/

dper na chu'i rlabs dang kha dog ro'i khyad par dag rang bzhin dang rkyen gyi stobs kyis ngo bo mi 'gyur zhing bcos su med pa ltar/ rig pa ma skyes par rtog pa'i ngang las mtshan ma dang byung tshor gang shar yang/ de nyid du gcig pas na/ nyams la dgag bsgrub med de gcig tu

gsal lo// mthun dang mi mthun byung tshor ni/ ma ltos par rnal du 'jog par bstan pa ni/ rig pa'i mtshan nyid rgyu rkyen la ma ltos shing/ gnyen po med par gsal bas rig pa ma skyes pa nyid/ rig pa la mthun zhing dga' ba dang/ mi mthun zhing mi dga' ba gnyis ka

rig pa ma skyes pa'i ngo bor gsal ba'o// rgyu rkyen gnyis po dang bral bar// de'i phyir dngos po gang la 'dus pa'i rkyen med par de la ni 'jig pa'i gnyen po med de/ ma skyes shing ngo bo med pa'i phyir ro// gang la ngo bo med par mthong zhing gsal ba la gnyen po brten

mi dgos par shes pa'o// ngo bo mthong bas ye shes gsal// de ltar chos thams cad rig pa ma skyes par 'dus la/ de nyid ji lta bar ngo bor gsal bas/ de las ci byung ba thams cad kyang ye shes su gsal ba'o// de las bcos 'dzin thams cad la rnam par grol

ba'o// snga phyi khyad med de bzhin nyid// ma bcos lhun grub rU tra ni// dngos po rtogs pa la dus lnga phyi med de/ chu la ri mo bris kyang rang zhig pa ltar/ dus la 'dzin pa med par de bzhin nyid rang gsal bas/ ye shes dus thams cad pa'o// des na chos thams

cad ji bzhin par rang gsal bar dus gsum dang rnam par rtog pa gang yang ngo bo skye ba med par rang bzhin gsal ba'o// rig pa rnal du 'jog pa'i rU tra'o// klong yangs snying por chub shes pa/ thams cad/ nam mkha'i ngang du gnas shing 'byung 'jug

byed/ pa lta bu'o// dang po der byung tha mar thim// rig pa ji ltar gang gsal kyang// nyam nga med par rang bzhin gnas// dang po dngos po ji ltar gnas pa'i don de ji ltar brgyud pa'i man ngag gis rtogs nas/ de'i don la phyin ci ma log par rnal du bzhag pas// goms nas mthar

phyin pa'i dus na rig pa'i gzugs brnyan sna tshogs pa nam mkha'i cho 'phrul dang rgya mtsho'i gzugs brnyan ltar dngos po sna tshogs ji ltar shar zhing gang ltar gsal yang nyam nga med par rang bzhin gnas pa'o// rang

byung rang snang de bzhin nyid// de nyid rig pa ma bcos par snang bas/ snang tshul ma bcos par lhun gyis grub pa ni bshad pa ltar yang ye nas yin pa la/ thabs kyis ma nor bar rig pa la/ sgo gsum dang spyod lam bzhi dang rig pa rang byung zhing rang snang ba yang ngo bo de

bzhin nyid las ma g.yos pa'o// mthong rtags goms pa'i skyes bu la// man ngag la brten nas rang gi sems ji bzhin pa'i lkog nges par mthong zhing chos thams cad ma bcos par rtogs nas shes pa shin tu goms shing mthar phyin pa ni rgyal ba nyid dang 'dra bas

skyes bu zhes so// sgo gsum mdzad pa phyogs ris med// de lta bu la dgongs pa nyams pa dang tha mal gyi 'du shes nyams pa dang zhen rtog mi 'byung ba dang/ sgo gsum gyi mdzad pa la phyogs ris med pa ste/ de'i phyir na rang don du yang nyam nga ba dang/ mi mthun pa'i re

dogs kyi chos med la/ gzhan don du yang mos pa mtha' yas pa la/ gnang bkag med par ched du ma byas par gang ltar yang 'char ba la/ gang ltar yang phyogs ris med pa'o// des na lung thob byin rlabs ldan// gang du btags pa'i zhen pa zad de/ mi gnas pas

de bzhin gshegs pa'i lung mngon du thob cing/ sku gsung thugs de bzhin nyid du/ rdo rje dbyer med par byin gyis brlabs la rang nyid kyang byin gyis brlabs la gzhan dag pa rnams la byin gyis brlabs shing grol bar mdzad do// de phyir gdug byed rU tra yi// sgrub

pa phyi rabs rnams don bshad// gru gsum rtsangs thod me dpung 'bar// thod pa'i nang du ling+ga gzhug/ dang po dkyil 'khor bya ba ni/ grir shi ba'i sa la gru gsum sum brtsegs byas la/ 'og ma la rtsangs/ bar ma la thod pa/ steng ma la me dpung

bri/ gru gsum nang du thod pa mtshan ngan gyi nang du dgra'i ling+ga gzhug/ steng nas 'khor los kha gcad par bya'o// rdzas rnams kyis mtha' ma legs par bskor ro// bka' srung gi bcas so// dbus la// gru gsum nag po la ling+ga zla gam la dgra'i lha/ lnga// mu khyud la

yab yum gyi sngags gling drug 'khor/ gyi sngags/ mu khyud gling// nyer bzhi la las sngags phyi ris la thod phreng ngo/ pad gri thod pas mdzes/ lha/ gang gi las bsgrub pa lha de'i yi lto bar 'khor/ lo bca' 'o// rta lug bya khyi nag po yab/

kyi rdzas// mon dang nal snying sna yum gyi rdzas gta'/ gtso bo'i/ gtor ma dpal bshos dar nag mda'// bdud kyi ni re nag sgrub pa'i rdzas/ gri mda' bshos bu nag/ srog bdag rgyal po 'od lha dkar po'i rdzas bshom bu

mda' dar dkar// ma mo rdo rje bde chen gyi rdzas sme sha 'bru drug dug/ klu gnyan nag po srog gcod// klu sman sna tshogs dkar gtor klu// btsan btsan rje dmar po lag ring la gri mda' bshos bu dmar// za 'og mda' dar ging

chen rdo rje legs/ pa'i rdzas so// mgon po g.yas bing g.yon thod pa mdog nag po stag la bcibs/ pa'o// ma mo/ nag mo dre'u la zhon pa thod pa thogs pa can// bdud nag po g.yas khram shing g.yon zhags pa rta nag po la

bcibs/ pa'o// srog bdag dkar po g.yas 'khor lo g.yon gri rta dkar/ zhon pa'o// ma mo bong zhon nag mo dre'u rta g.yas kha T+wAM g.yon thod// klu ljang nag g.yas sbrul g.yon sbal pa chu srin zhon// btsan dmar dar dmar po g.yas mdung dar

mdung g.yon sbrul rta dmar/ po la zhon/ rdo rje legs pa g.yas// rdor g.yon snying mdog ljang ser dgra bla yin/ ! e badzra hri la rngubs dpal phyag na rdo rje gtum po'i sngags kyis gong mnan pa/ nI laM pa sa a ne u ne hr-i da ye/ badzra yak+sha

kA la/ dpal mgon po nag po'i/ ma hA g+ha Na g+hu tri hr-i da ya/ badzra ging ka ra rak+sha kA li/ ma ma mu khram ma mo dril nag zhon pa'i khrag la mu shi hring/ du na ru tra ru thum b+ha ti/ bdud ri nag spungs pa'i/ ra tsa tsa pa la rgyal po 'od lha dkar

po'i/ a shug me/ ma trag rak+sha nag mo mkha' 'gro rdo rje bde chen gyi/ ti lam b+h+yo/ nA ga hu daM nA ga du ru/ klu gnyan nag po srog gcod kyi/ shu la ra tsa tri shaM dza yaM/ btsan rje dmar po lag ring// badzra tri na sA d+hu kha thuM tri/ ging chen rdo rje legs

pa'i/ srog la thum ril/ gong ma rnams la las sngags spu gri gdags pa/ rtsa la bred shag/ tsit+ta thun rmugs/ khrag thibs rbad/ ling shag rbad/ nr-i hur thum dza khraM rbad/ ! pho lhog gtong na dgra lha'i lto bar bcas mtshon cha

dang// gri rgod 'dod na btsan gyi lto bar bskor ba'i rim pa dang/ mdze nad 'dod na klu yi lto bar gnas// rims nad dal yams khrag gi ma mos 'debs// 'thib nad kyis myos par 'dod na drag po bdud yin la// smyo

'bog gtong bar 'dod na rgyal por lto bar bskor ro/ shes pa nyid/ de dag nag po yab yum gyi lto bar bskor zhing sngags kyang gang byed tha mar gdon// kun gyi rtsa ba rU tra nyid// yab dang yum la yang dag gnas// mun nag dmag 'dren

yab yum mgon gyi rtags/ zhub can 'ong/ mgon po nyid kyi rtags// ban+de g.yag dre'u mon nag bdud/ bdud mgon gyi rtags// skyes pa skya shar seng ge ging/ rgyal mgon// bu med ma sring ma mo nyid/ ma mgon// sbal lcong mtsho

dang sbrul ni klu/ mgon// rta dmar khra lug skyes pa btsan/ mgon// zhang blon skra skrag spyang ku ging mgon rdor legs// snying po gang yin rtags gang byung des las byed pas las la sbyar/ brda dang sbyar/ ! dpal mgon po nag po yab yum

lha srin sde brgyad du gnas pa'i gnas/ yum bzhag pa'i bdun yum dang brgyad// dur khrod pho brang lcags mkhar nas// rU tra nag po yab yum gtso// 'khor drug 'khol bar byed pa nyid/ yum gyi/ khrag yab kyi dug thun dang bcas pas

brabs// bdud mgon gyi yul kha rag sgo dgu nas// bdud mgon gyi ming ri nag spungs pa yis/ las 'thib nad sna tshogs bdag po yin/ rgyal mgon gyi// rgyal yul nam mkha' phyad phyod nas// rgyal ming mgon 'od
lha dkar po yi// shel mkhar nang nas las smyo 'bog bdag/ ma ma mo'i mgon po'i yul byang shar mtsho gling nas// ma mgon ming rdo rje bde chen gyis/ las rims dang dal yams bdag mor

gnas// klu mgon gyi yul na rag sing sngon na// klu gnyan ming srog gcod mgon po nag/ las/ mdze dang shu ba pho 'bras mkhyen// btsan gyi mgon po'i yul zangs thang dmar po nas// btsan mgon ming btsan rje
lag rings kyis// glang thabs las gri rgod las rnams yin// shar ging mgon pa'i yul lhor rin chen thang dkyil nas// ging ming mgon rdo rje legs pa yis// nad kyang las gzir thabs pho lhog mkhyen// dpal

ldan ma hA kA la ni/ gtso bo 'od lha 'khor ging sde brgyad do// de'i nang na yum bzhugs// g.yas ser g.yon ljang mthing nag dbus// lha'i dmag dpon byed cing lha'i ded dpon ka ru btul nas// g.yas kyi dang po bing chen la/ phyag rdor gyis

dbang bskur bas// bar ma rdo rje rtse mo lnga/ las mkhan du mnga' gsol bas// tha ma gnam lcags phur pa 'dril/ bdud rtsi lce thog tu bzhag nas dam la btags pas so// g.yon gyi dang po dung dmar gsol/ srin po rnams dang gshin rjes phul bas// bar ma dbyug

tos myos par byed// tha ma dug klu rnams kyis byin pas sbrul zhags pa 'phen// A+oM phyag na rdo rje'i sngags badzra pA Ne ad+hi pa sngags sor bzhag ta ye/ badzra ma hA dpal mgon po'i sngags kA la dun [(]ka[)]ya/ king [(]kha[)]ka ra tro ta ni hring/[ (]ga[) ]/ g+ha

na g+hu ti pa tra dun/[ (]nga[) ]badzra yak+sha tri rna d+ha sha yum sngags so/[ (]ca[) ]/ ma ma trag hed nag mo shaM/[ (]cha[) ]tik+Sh+Na kA li tsa mun ti/[ (]ja[) ]yak+sha nag mo tsit+ta sham/ bsad pa spu gri'i sngags/[ (]ka[) ]/ dgra bo'i srog la breng shag rbad/

[ (]kha[) ]tsit+ta phyung rak+ta thems rbad/ snying 'byin khrag dang bag chags/[ (]ga[) ]rtsa la thang thang thum ril rbad/ rtsa chen bzhi bcad pa/[ (]nga[) ]nr-i hur thums dza dun dun shag/ srog rang dbang med par 'phrog pa/[ (]ca[) ]srog rtsa dun rmugs myangs khram

rbad/ rtsa phran brgyad bcad pa/[ (]cha[) ]tsi ta ro myags ling shag rbad/ dngas ma lnga bcad pa/[ (]ja[) ]snying khrag tshal pa yi ling rbad/ rtsa la dbugs kyi thig le bsdu ba/ thum ri li li dun b+h+yo b+h+yo/ zor gyi dus su gdags// s+t+waM b+ha dza nan/ mnan

pa'i dus su gdags// 'bru bdun nyin dril mtshan gtong yab yum sngags/ snod ngan la ma spel bar// rab tu gsang bar bya ba'o// de yan chad rgyas pa'o// rU tra rnam pa bzhir 'dod de// gnas lugs rgyu yi rU tra dang// gsang ba'i

skus gsang sngags nang pa la gnas pa ltar thabs lam gang zag 'ga'i spyod yul du byung bar gnas so// gol rkyen lam gyi rU tra dang/ ngo bo nyid kyi sku ni lam ji ltar snang yang ngo bo sangs rgyas kyi sar 'gro 'dod rU tra ji ltar snang yang ma rtogs pa'i gol sa

yin// gol ba sngon byung rU tra dang// ni longs sku ste rU tra skyes dus na gsang sngags kyis btul te/ gsang sngags longs sku'i chos yin pa'o// gol 'gro rjes 'jug rU tra yin// sprul sku ste sprul sku'i bstan pa la chos ma gol bar phyogs ris med par bslab

dgos pa yin pas so// rgyu yi rU tra rnam pa gnyis// grol lam blta ba dang sbyar ba dang/ thabs lam dbang/ dang sbyar ba'o// de yang gang zag dbang po rab blta ba rtogs na sangs rgya ba dang/ 'bring blta ba dang dbang gnyis ka la

brten pa'o// thabs lam grol lam dbang po 'bring gis zung du 'brel bar byed pa'o// dang po kun kyang rU trar skyes// pha ma bla ma g.yog dang bcas// rang nyid rU trar skyes pa'i lus// grol lam chos sku dang sbyar na rang gi pha ni slob dpon rgyal

ba'i 'khor lo// legs pa slob pa'o// ma ni g.yog po ste byams par byed pas so// rang nyid rU tra dge slong nag po ste/ pha ma gnyis ka la sdang ba'o// lus rU trar skyes pa dang 'dra ste/ dge ba bslabs kyang mi byed la/ sdig pa ma bslabs kyang byed pas so// de bas na rgyu'i rU tra yin

no// mi dge bcu spyad ngan song gsum// lus kyi sgo nas gsum/ srog gcod ma byin len mi tshangs spyod/ ngag gi bzhi rdzun phra ma ngag 'khyal tshig rtsub/ yid kyi gsum brnab sems gnod sems// log lta/ dngos po bzhi la spyad pas dmyal ba yi dwags dud 'gro skye ba

blangs so// las smin thams cad rgyal bas 'dren// mi dge bcu zad nas/ dge bcu'i gnas su skye ba ni sangs rgyas kyi lam la zhugs pa yin te/ rU tra ngan song gi las zad nas rU trar skyes pa dang 'dra/ skyes nas btul ba ltar dge bcu la zhugs so/ dbang

bskur sangs rgyas sar 'dren no// dbang bskur bla mas dbang bskur nas theg pa la zhugs nas/ bskyed rdzogs bsgom pa ni rU tra dkyil 'khor du bcug ste sangs rgya bar lung bstan pa lta bu'o// grol lam bsdus nas zhar la bstan pa'o// thabs lam gnyis po

steng 'og sgo// thabs lam gsang ba'i sku dang sbyar ba la gnyis te/ steng sgo yab dang sbyar ba ste/ snying ga chos kyi 'khor lo dang kun tu bzang po/ 'og sgo yum dang sbyar ba ste lte ba sprul pa'i 'khor lo dang kun tu bzang mor gnas so// d+harma tsakra chos kyi gnas// steng sgo

ni snying ga chos kyi 'khor lo na rtsa ni rtsa ba gcig la bzhir gyes te/ de la yan lag brgyad du gyes nas gnas pa ni 'khor chos 'byung ba'o// de bas na chos kyi 'khor lo zhes btags pa yin no// dbus kyi snying po rgyal 'khor nyid// dbus kyi rtsa rtsa ba gcig 'dus pa'i

nang na byang sems chos skur gnas pa ni/ slob dpon rgyal ba'i 'khor lo dang sbyar ro// zhar byung dpon g.yog nyon mongs sgo/ rig pa chos skur ma rtogs pa'i zhar la byung ba ni/ nyon mongs pa can gyi yid ni dge slong nag po ste dpon no// de las nyon can gyi yid byung

ba ni de'i g.yog go// rtsa bzhi gdams ngag gol ba yis// ye shes kyi rtsa dang/ chos nyid kyi/ yon tan gyi/ rang rgyud kyi rtsa bzhi ni gdams ngag ste/ rtsa bzhi la yid rnam 'gyu yang kun gzhi'i ngang du sprin dengs pa ltar gnas so// lta ba rtogs na dngos po bzhi la gnas

bcas kyang nam mkha' la sprin ltar 'gyur ro// rigs drug sa bon lus la 'khyams// a nr-i su tri prai du drug ni dge slong lta ba ma rtogs te 'khor ba ltar 'gro drug tu 'gro ba'i bag chags bde drug la bsags nas 'khor bar kha rgyud pas so// rang gnas bde

gshegs phung po lnga// rU tra rgyal bas 'dul ba ltar rang la gnas pa ni/ yum chos kyi dbyings su phung po lnga rigs lngar 'dus pas/ 'byung ba lnga yum lngar 'dus/ rnam shes sems dpar 'dus so// bka' bgros rtog tshogs sangs rgyas bcad// bka'

bgros pa ni phung po sangs rgyas yin min du bgros/ bka' bgros bcad pa ni rtog tshogs ye nas sangs rgyas sar bcad pa'o// dug lnga ye shes rang du bsad// rU tra bsgral ba ni thabs shes so so la btang bas ya phral bas ma thul/ thabs shes sbyar/

zhi gnas lhag mthong zur du 'brel ba'i sras kyis ma rig pa rang sar bsad do// rang gnas dkyil 'khor dbang thob ste// ma rig pa sangs pa dang/ rang lus rigs lnga'i dbang bskur te thob pa ni rU tra dkyil 'khor du bcug ste dbang bskur ba dang sbyar

ro// bde gshegs yi ge 'bru gsum po// oM sku mi zad pa rgyan gyi 'khor lo// A gsung/ hU~M thugs su gnas te 'bru gsum gyis rigs drug gi yi ge mnan pa ni/ rU tra bstan pa bsrungs nas sangs rgyas so// mi zad rgyan gyi 'khor lor mthong// ba ni rU

tras sangs rgyas zhal mthong ba'o// der srog snying phul nas bstan srung du khas blangs so// steng sgo dang sbyar nas kun tu bzang po bsgom pa'i man ngag go// nir ma tsakra'i pho brang na// lte ba sprul pa'i 'khor lo ste/ phyi'i dbyibs ar gnas pa chos kyi dbyings nang na yi ge

rnams gnas pa chos kyi dbyings gnas kyi nang na 'khor 'das dang rnam shes gnas pa'o// yang na b+ha ga snod yi ge rnams bcud do// snying po a ni rgyal 'khor nyid// slob dpon rgyal ba'i 'khor lo dang 'dra bar/ thams cad nas thams cad du ma bcos pa'i rnal 'byor

du gnas pa'o// k+Sha ni dge slong nag po ste// lte lkog na srin po'i yi ge k+Sha gnas pa ni rU tra'i sa bon te/ slob ma dge slong nag po'o// de yi drong ni g.yog por 'gyur// k+Sha'i drod ni lte ba na me dang mnyam pa'i rlung yod de/ des yi ge k+Sha'i g.yog byed pas g.yog

po dang sbyar ro// bde ba bzhi ni brtan pa'i lam// rU tra la bla mas gdams ngag gsungs pa ltar/ bde ba/ mchog bde/ bde bral gyi bde ba/ lhan skyes kyi dang bzhi gsungs pa las/ ma go bas gol ba ni/ srog gcod/ ma phyin len/ rdzun/ mi tshangs spyod bzhi las

'byol nyog tu spyod pa dang sbyar ro// ma rtogs rigs drug yi ge 'khor// lte ba na lha'i sa bon a dkar/ lha min gyi su ser/ mi nr-i sngo/ yi dwags pre dmar/ byol song du dud ka/ dmyal ba tri nag rnams 'dod khams kyi sa bon te/ rU tra de ngan song gsum du lhung ba dang

srin po dang lha dbang du bsdus pa dang sbyar ro// bsam gtan A+oM dang gzugs med a// yum gyi b+ha ga na oM gnas pa ni bsam gtan gyi oM ste gzugs khams kyi lha'i sa bon no// lte ba sprul pa'i b+ha ga na a gnas pa ni/ gzugs med skye mched mu bzhi gnas

pa'o// rdo rje pad+ma'i sangs rgyas rnams// yab kyi rdo rje rigs lnga'i rgyal ba/ yum gyi pad+ma rigs lnga'i yum/ de rnams rtsa gnas chos kyi dbyings su tshogs nas bka' bgros pa ni/ nyon mongs lam du byed par bka' bgros pa'o// 'byung bzhi rlung 'dul bka'

bgros bcad// bde ba bzhi yang mdus par bka' bgros bcad/ dang po b+ha ga la rdo rje rig pa'i dus su sra bas/ de nas gsher ba chu/ dro ba me/ g.yo ba rlung gi thig le 'bebs pa'o// bde ba mchog bde bral bde dang// rnam rtog che la bde ba chung ba bde ba/

bde ba che la rnam rtog chung ba mchog bde/ de nyid tha mal dang 'jig rten pa la yod pas na 'khor ba'i mtha' yin no// 'khor ba nas 'dren pa dkyil 'khor du 'jug pa'o// bral ba de ni rtog pa med pa bde bas 'das pa'i mthar zhen te/ lha la me tog phog dbang bskur

ba'o// lhan cig skyes bde'i dkyil 'khor bcug/ yab yum rdo rje pad+ma phrad pas lhan cig tu skyes pa'i bde ba ni 'khor 'das kyi mthas ma rig pa ste dkyil 'khor du bcug nas rig 'dzin gyi lam la bgrod pa'o// zung 'jug hU~M gi sar

gnas so// rlung sems gnyis 'byangs na rdo rje pad+ma zung 'jug bde bas/ yul pad+ma chos kyi dbyings/ yul can rdo rje ye shes kyis zhugs pa ni/ dbyings ye shes gnyis su med pa'i don rtogs pas gnas mir gnas kyang sangs rgyas par lung bstan pa ni/ rU tra lung bstan pa lta

bu'o// gol rkyen lam gyi rU tra ni// ngo bo nyid kyi sku dang sbyar te/ gti mug kun la khyab pa dbang phyug chen po/ 'dod chags dbang du sdud pa gu la nag po/ zhe sdang sgrol bas ma hA de ba/ de gsum mu stegs pa'o// phyi pa mu stegs lam song ba// sngags kyi lta ba ma

rtogs na yang mu stegs par ltung bas rU tra yin rU tra kho na gsang sngags 'byung ba'i rgyu'o// mtshan nyid kyi lta ba ma rtogs na yang mu stegs su lhung ngo// mu stegs kho na mtshan nyid 'byung ba'i rgyu'o// sngags dang mtshan nyid ma rtogs pas// thams cad rU trar

gol bar 'gro// des na sngags mtshan nyid thams can ma rtogs na rU tra'i rgyu yin te/ lha dang/ ting nge 'dzin/ spyod pa ma nor bar bya ba'o// lha chen la sogs chung ba dang/ 'dod chags lha chen/ gti mug tshangs pa/ zhe sdang drag po zhe sdang ba ni sngags phyi pa la snang

ba ste/ bgegs dang log 'dren tsam du snang ba las/ bar gcod yin min du snang ste/ gtor ma cha gsum byin na srung ma'o// rgyu mtshan nyid kyi lam la// lha sbyin la sogs pa bdud bzhir snang ngo/ 'bring po dang// gsang sngags nang pa la// rU tra thar pa nag po la

sogs bar snang bas na sangs rgyas pa'i theg pa kun la gol rkyen lam gyi rU tra re snang ngo// gnas so/ rab tu bshad// gol ba sngon byung rU tra la// longs sku dang sbyar ro/[ (]ka[) ]/ 'dod lugs rang rgyud dag par 'dod// sprul par 'dod/ gnyis dang

bshad [(]kha[)]thabs gnyis/[ (]ga[) ]/ nyams su blang lugs rnam pa gnyis// mthar phyin dbyer med lam cig car ba dang lam rim gyis pa/ de thams cad sems shes ma shes dang/ rtogs ma rtogs yin te sems gcig tu gnas/ gcig tu

gnas// dam pa'i rigs can lnga la sogs pa khyed la phyag rdor gyis gsal bar bshad/ ![ (]ka[)]/ rang rgyud phyi yi rU tra 'di// bden pa yin nam rU tra la spyir lugs gnyis su bzhed de/ gsang sngags sgra ji bzhin par spyad pas rgyu 'bras mi bslu ba la

dgongs te rang rgyud dam/ phyi'i rU tra dang/ bdag tu 'dzin pa la dgongs te sprul pa'am nang gi rU tra'o// gal te de ltar min te gang rung gcig bden na/ sprul par bden na/ sems can dmyal ba drang don sdigs ri yin/ yang dag par mi bden par 'gyur ro// rang rgyud par

bden na/ mdo sde las/ de'i tshe na lha sbyin ni gzhan yin snyam du ma rtogs shig/ ces pas sangs rgyas kyi che bar dbyung ba'i phyir sprul pa'o// 'di nyid nas kyang 'gro ba'i tshul du sngon 'byung ba zhes pa dang/ dgongs 'dus las/ de nyid bdag rtogs yin pas na/ zhes pa dang/ lha

srin sde brgyad pa'i 'khor/ rgyal chen rigs bzhi'i dran/ gsang ba mchog gi bdag yin pas/ zhes pas na lung dang 'gal lo// de'i phyir gnyis ka ltar ro// gzhung 'di ltar bzhed pa ni/ blo che ba dang lta ba can la sprul par snang/ chung ba la rang rgyud par snang ste/ don 'khor ba
yang mi bden pa ltar ro/ bden pa min// sprul pa nang gi rU tra 'di// bden nam mi bden dpyad pa dang/ gang rung gcig tu grub ma grub// gnyis ka bden par blo dang sbyar/ bshad thabs phyi phyi lam rang

rgyud pa dang nang ltar bshad pa/ nang gnyis po yang// phyi yi rU tra rang rgyud pa/ sgra ni ji bzhin bshad pa ste/[ (]ka[) ]/ rgyu dang [(]kha[) ]rkyen dang [(]ga[)]'bras bu gsum/[ (]nga[) ]/ bka' bgros [(]ca[)]bkas bcad [(]cha[)]btul ba gsum/

[ (]ja[) ]/ sgrib sbyangs [(]nya[)]dbang bskur [(]ta[)]lung bstan gsum/ slob dpon rgyal ba'i 'khor los/ slob ma dge slong nag po la chos bshad pa'i/[ (]ka[) ]/ rgyu ni gsang ba'i bka' bsgo log/ ji bzhin nyid de ma bcos na/ blta ba chos thams

cad kyi de kho na nyid rtogs na ma byin len mi tshangs spyod rdzun srog gcod pa bzhi spyad// dngos po bzhi la gnas byas kyang// nam mkha' la ni sprin gyis mi gnod par/ dengs bzhin// rnal 'byor lta ba'i don rtogs pa la gnod byed med pas/ de

nyid dam pa'i lam// slob dpon rgyal ba'i 'khor los bshad/[ (]kha[) ]rkyen ni slob ma dge slong nag po/ yang dag don ma rtogs// spyad par bya ba'i dam tshig bsrung ma shes te// sgra bzhin rnam par spyad gyur pa// ngag rtsub rdzun smras

ma byin len pa dang/ chags pa rang dgar// mi tshangs spyod sems can rnams kyi srog bcad pa'o/[ (]ga[) ]/ 'bras bu ngan song kha brgyud nas// tha ma las kyi srin por skyes/ rU tra'i yon tan gyis/ khams gsum ma lus dbang du

bsdus// dus gsum sangs rgyas rnams chos dbyings su 'dus nas bka' bgros nas// phrin las gang gis 'dul bar 'gyur/ ba'i mdun ma byas so// zhi ba'i las/ dang rgyas pas las kyi mi thul bas// dbang gi las dang drag

pos 'i las kyi 'dul bar bka' bgros bcad/ rU tra lings la song ba dang byung gis dogs pa'i/[ (]cha[) ]/ ngag gi dbang phyug rta mgrin so la btang/ he ru ka nyid sprul nas rU tra'i yum dang sbyor ba mdzad de// srin mo'i lhums su sras 'dul byed

bcug/ sprul pa'i sras bskyed nas rU tra btul lo/ bltams dug gsum bcom/ rU tra'i dug gsum gyi/[ (]ja[)]/ las dang nyon mongs sgrib pa sbyangs// rgyal ba'i sangs rgyas mang po sku yang mthong zhal yang mthong nas/[ (]nya[) ]/ dbang

bzhi bum pa/ gsang ba/ shes rab/ ye shes bde ba chen po/ bskur nas skye ba phyi ma'i tshe/ sangs rgyas/ thal ba'i dbang pos lung yang bstan/ tshe 'dir// srog snying phul nas sangs rgyas kyi/ dkon mchog bstod pa'i dpal// bstan srung ma hA

kA la nyid// lha srin sde brgyad dpung gi 'khor dang bcas/ dbang phyug/ ma dang mkha' 'gro lang ka'i tshogs dpa' bo dang bcas// dpa' mo rnal 'byor dam tshig can gyi grogs su bskos/ nas grogs mdzad do// dngos su rU tra rang rgyud pa yang yod de dam

nyams pa'i 'bras bu'o/ sangs rgyas mdzad pas na// rang rgyud phyi yi rU tra yod// sems can gdug pa gang gis kyang mi 'dul bas// sprul pa sprul nas nas 'dul bar gyur pas na// sprul pa'i rU tra yod ma yin/ de yang sprul

pa'i rU tras sems can rnams kho na sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa yin no// nang gi rU tra rnam bshad pa/ rang gi/ sems nyid bla ma rgyal ba'i 'khor/ la'o// bdag tu 'dzin pa ni slob ma dge slong nag/ po yin no// dug lnga la

rtogs pa snga phyi long btags pa mang po ni rU tras/ phyi yi skye ba blangs// smad 'tshong ma yi bu ru skyes/ ma shi nas bu/ ma ro dang chas pa shing nal gyi sdong nag zhes pa'i rtsa ru bu bzhag cing/ bsdad pa ni// rang lus dug gsum ni shing bu la/ nal

gyi sdong nag yin no// nga bdag ni rU tra yin/ nga bdag rtsal drag pa ni/ dwa bu rtsal drag pas// kun gzhi ma bag chags bu yin bus ma sha za/ ba ltar bag chags za'o// rU tra'i kha nas/ tsha ba'i sna nas grang nad dang sngags byung na de'i gzer

gyis// ma mo mkha' 'gro dbang du bsdus/ pa ni rang gi sna nas rlung tsha grang rgyu ba'o// bdud kyi rgyal po nga rgyal skyes// pa ni bdag 'dzin gyi mgo langs pa'o/ lang+ka'i yul gyi ri la babs// pa ni rang gi lus khog pa la bdag 'dzin

babs// srin po'i rgyal po dbang du byas// yul la bdag 'dzin gyi dbang byas so// lte ba'i lang+ka'i ri k+Sha yig srin po gtum mo spor/ bde ba dbang du byas so// lha yi ded dpon ka ru Na bde bas sdug bsngal zhi btul/ ba'o// srin po btul

ba// tshogs dang lha btul bas mthong ba'i lam du sbyar/ gsum pa mthong// lam sbyangs pa dang rang lus bam ri thod pa'i mkhar/ dang bstun te rang lus spyad pa'o// lam du bka' sangs rgyas bka' bgros bgros de bcad do// pas sbyor lam

mo// de bzhin bya ra so pa ni/ rta mgrin bya ra so la btang bas de las// mthong lam du ye shes mthong bas shes rab skyes pa'o// sras lhums su bzhag pa bzhi pa bsgom lam sras bltams 'dam 'thung ba/ bsgom lam rtog pa byang ba// sprul

pa dngos po rnam rtog ye shes su langs pa/ bdud rtsir rol/ rnam shes brgyad// bu mo brgyad yul brgyad mgo brnyan brgyad/ la sogs log par bsgyur// tshogs ma mo brgyad yul phra men brgyad phyin ci log/ bzhi sgom/ gsang ba'i yum bzhi

ni bag/ chags bdag 'dzin dang nga rgyal dang bdag tu rmongs/ pa'o// lnga pa mthar phyin lam// rten gyi stobs gnyen po'o 'gyod pa'i dang gzhan gyis spyo ba byas pa yis// stobs bzhis rgyud sbyangs te/ sdig pa sbyangs par byas// de

dag thams cad tshogs las la sogs lam lnga las/ mtshan nyid dang sgo bstun nas ni// ji ltar gnas pa 'dir rtogs bya// de ltar bstan pa'i rU tra des// btsan thabs dag tu sangs rgyas sam// 'on te rim 'jug sangs

rgyas yin// ji ltar yin pa nges shes byos// langs rtog tshad phul ba lta bu'o// blo chung ba rnams rim gyis sangs rgyas pa yang yod/ dkyil 'khor du bcug dbang bskur sgrib pa sbyangs lung bstan pas so// rgyud 'di ni rU tra spyir dris pa yin la/ sangs rgyas kyis stong

gsum gyi rU tra dus gcig la btul bas/ blo che ba rnams cig char sangs rgyas pa yod de// zhes pa lang+ga'i bdag po blo gros thabs ldan dag gis dris/ ston pa// gsang bdag rdo rje 'dzin pas bshad// gol 'gro rjes 'jug rU tra gsum/ dang

zhes ni ston pa gang gis gdams na gsang ba'i bdag po yis/ 'khor gang la gdams na// dam pa'i rigs can lnga po la// lung gang gdams na/ khrag 'thung gal po'i lung 'di ru// man ngag gang gdams na// rU tra'i spyi yi gdams

par gsungs/ lus ngag yid gsum la bdag tu 'dzin pa de 'joms pa rU tra spyi'i man ngag bshad rjes// de nas lus ngag yid gsum la// bdag tu blta ba'i rU tra gzhom// de nas dur khrod bdag po dag/ gnan bya ma traM yin// phyag rgya

che dang ldan par ni// rnal 'byor dpal du bskyed pas/ lta bas mnan pa/ ting nge 'dzin gyis mnan pa/ spyod pas mnan pa// ci rigs su ni las rnams bya// de yang rang gi rnam rtog bdag 'dzin las gyur pa// thar pa myang 'das kyi gegs/ las kyi rU tra rnam pa

gsum yang/ rang gi lus ngag yid gsum la gnas te/ bgegs thams cad kyi bdag po'o// lta bas gzung 'dzin rtog pa 'joms/ blta bas mnan pa ni gzung 'dzin gyi rnam rtog ste/ gnyis med kyi ye shes chen po blo la dran cing yid la gnas par bya'o// ma traM ka

rU tra ni/ de yang phyi'i yul dang lus dngos por 'dzin pa byang chub kyi sems su rtogs te/ chos thams cad byang chub kyi sems su rtogs pas snod dang lus la rang bzhin med par gnas so// des lus la bdag tu 'dzin pa ma traM rU tra mnan pa'o// yul du snang ba chos kyi

dbyings// sems su snang ba ye shes nyid// dag gi bdag 'dzin kha T+wAM ga rU tra ni/ nang gi sems la bdag tu 'dzin pa yang/ sems nyid rang byung gi ye shes snang ba chen por rtogs par byas nas// mnyam pa chen po'i dpal nga dang bdag med pa'i chos nyid la gnas

par byas la mnan pa'o// snang dang ma skyes phyogs ris med// sems la bdag tu 'dzin pa a kar+sha rU tra ni/ snang ba dang ma skyes pa thams cad gnyis su med pa'i byang chub sems// phyogs ris med par rtogs par bya ba ni/ chos kyi dbyings ye shes su snang/ mi snang na

ni sems dngos por rang mtshan mar ma skyes/ gnyis su med pa ni lus sems rang bzhin med par chos nyid stong pa'i ngang las mi g.yo bar gnas pa'o/ des na yul du snang ba dang sems ma skyes pa yang/ yul phyogs su dang/ sems ris su bcad pa med pas mnan

no// stegs bu'i steng na chos 'byung na// stegs bu'i steng du e gru gsum bris pa'i nang du ma trang gi gzugs thal chen gyis byas la che ba bskyed pa dang// thal bas gdong gsum sna yon po/ kha T+wAM bya rog spyang ku g.yas/ g.yon na// sdigs

mdzub khra dang 'ug pa can// bdag nyid phyag rgya bzhi dang ldan// bdag gtso bo'i sku phyag rgya chen po// g.yon du yum dam tshig gi phyag rgya/ 'gro 'dul las kyi phyag rgya/ de thams cad chos nyid las mi 'da' ba chos kyi phyag rgya'o// hU~M gsum gyis che ba'i

nga rgyal bskyed pa can/ ting nges dgug pa// ma traM gzugs ni bsgom par bya/ bdag nyid stobs dang ldan pas lcags kyu'i phyag rgya bcas te/ dzaHhU~M baM hoH'i sngags brjod pas dur khrod kyi bdag po ma traM ga gdong gsum pa/ thal ba'i mdog sngo skya sna g.yas su yo

ba/ phyag g.yas gsum na rim pa bzhin/ kha T+wAM/ bya rog/ spyang ki/ g.yon gsum sdigs mdzub khra 'ug pa thogs pa/ lus ri rab tsam du che ba gcig bkug ste/ bdag gi mdun na e gru gsum/ mtha' dbus med pa'i nang du tshud par bsam la/ gzugs la bstim mo// de ni ma

traM ga rU tra'o/ kha T+wAM ga rU tra ni de'i ngag rtsub mo'o// a kar+sha rU tra ni de'i sems de dang bdag tu 'dzin pa'o// lus ngag yid gsum la bdag tu blta ba de gzhom na phyi nang gsang ba'i rU tra 'dul bar 'gyur ba yin no// phyag rgyas dgug pa// lcags kyu'i phyag

rgyas bkug la bstim// sngags kyis dgug pa// dzaHhU~M baM hoHlus dgug pa ma traM ka rU tra dzaHdzaHhU~M/ ngag kha T+wAM ga rU tra/ yid a kar+sha rU tra/ ! che ba'i nga rgyal ni rU tra'i skye gzhi dang rgyu bstan pa ni/ rig pa la 'char nub dang thog mtha'i phyogs dang

bral bar gsal ba ni/ sems nyid mngon par dga' ba'i 'jig rten te/ kun dga' ba'i 'jig rten du gyur pa'o// hU~M shar phyogs lam sgo'i 'jig rten na/ de ltar ma rtogs pas 'khor bar 'khyams la gzhan yang 'khor bar 'khyams du 'jug pas na// yang dag pa thar pa'i

lam gcod par byed pa/ 'o// 'byung po gtum po nga rgyal can// ma rtogs shing mnyam pa nyid dang mi ldan pa dag la// nyon mongs pa dang/ nye ba'i nyon mongs pa dang/ dran rtog phra rags te/ nges bar du gcod cing mthu che ba'i las la 'jug pa'o/ khyod ni

sgrib pas kun nas bsgribs// de'i mthu dang nyes pa ni dngos po rang bzhin gyis stong pa la zhen cing blo yis gzhi med pa la yang dag par bzung bas/ rang gi nyes pa byas nas/ de bzhin nyid mthong ba la gol zhing sgrib sgrub pa'i don la sgrib bo// yang dag shes

rab ye shes kyis// de'i 'dul thabs ni rgyal ba yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi thugs kyis mkhyen pa'i ye shes kyi shes rab zab mos gzigs na/ khungs bcad rtsad bcad bdag las byung// nyon mongs pa la sogs pa de yang gang las byung/ ngo bo

ji lta bur brtags pas/ sems nyid las byung ba'o// las nyon ma lus pa rnams skyed par byed pa'i rtsa ba rang sems yin pas so// bdag 'dzin bdag gir rtog pa de// shes pa dang yul ji snyed pa rnams kyang bdag dang bdag gir 'dzin pa yin te/ rang sems las

ngar 'dzin pa'i bdag yin la/ yul la bdag gir 'dzin pas gzung 'dzin can no// bdag med stong pa'i stobs kyis gzhom// phyi rol thams cad yul drug tu 'dus la/ de yang bdag nyid kyi rig pa yin pas yul med pas rig pa nyid ji lta bu yin pa mthong bas/

bdag 'dzin med de/ phyi nang gi chos thams cad nam mkha' ltar mtha' dbus las 'das pa'i phyogs ris bral bar rtogs pa'i stobs kyis gzhom par bya ba'o// bdag 'dzin thabs stobs brtson 'grus kyis// gnas ngan len pa'i daid dpon
