'phrul mo che// nam mkha' la rang bzhin med kyang sprin dang char gyis sems can la 'dod pa bsgrub pa ltar mkha' 'gro ma nam mkha' lta bus rnal 'byor pa la dngos grub ji ltar 'dod pa char ltar 'bebs pa'o// ma sring byams ma'i tshul gyis grogs mdzad

ma// rnal 'byor pa blta ba dang ldan pa rnams la/ ma ltar byams la/ tshul shes shing gdung bas ni sring mo ltar dgongs nas stong grogs mdzad pas na// phyi nang mkha' 'gro'i tshogs la phyag 'tshal lo// phyi ni 'jig rten pa'i mkha' 'gro ma ste/ dbang mo nyer

brgyad/ nang ni 'das pa ste/ dkar mo la sogs pa'o// phyag ni gdul bya gnyen po'i phyag lus kyis bya/ dbyangs snyan gdung ba'i phyag ngag gis bya/ rtogs pa don gyi phyag yid kyis 'tshal bar bya'o// rang byung gdod nas dag pa yi/ sgrub pa po rang gi lus las byung ba'i

dam rdzas lnga ni/ dri chen/ dri chu/ sha chen/ rak+ta/ byang sems dang lnga yang gdod ma nas dag pa mi gtsang bar mi blta// rtsa brgyad stong las sbyar ba'i sman// bdud rtsi lnga po re re la sbas pa nang gi bzhi/ mngon pa phyi'i bzhi ste rtsa ba brgyad/ de'i skyobs dang phrad du sman yan

lag rnams kyang don chos nyid skye med dang sbyar bas// rigs lnga dam tshig lnga yi dngos// rdo rje sems dpa'i tshigs dngos ni byang sems rnam snang gi dri chen snang mtha' pad+ma rak+ta/ rin 'byung gi sha chen don grub kyi dam tshig dngos dri chu// ye shes lnga rdzogs sgrub

pa'i rdzas// dri chen la chos kyi dbyings kyi ye shes rdzogs pas rnam snang gi sgrub rdzas yin/ byang sems la me long/ sha chen mnyam nyid/ pad+ma rak+ta so sor rtog pa/ dri chu bya ba grub pa'i ye shes rdzogs pas don grub kyi'o// rgyud lnga sems can kun sgrol ba'i// dri chen

gti mug byol song sgrol/ byang sems zhe sdang dmyal ba/ sha chen ser sna yi dwags/ rak+ta 'dod chags mi/ dri chu phrag dog lha dang lha ma yin sgrol ba'o// dug lnga sel ba'i bdud rtsi 'di// gti mug dri chen gyis chos dbyings ye shes su sel/ zhe sdang

byang sems kyis me long/ nga rgyal sha chen gyis mnyam nyid/ 'dod chags rak+ta so sor rtog phrag dog dri chus bya ba grub pa'i ye shes rtsa sel lo// ji snyed sangs rgyas thams cad dang// rgyu mtshan nyid dang 'bras bu sngags phyi nang ste rgyud so so nas sangs rgyas pa'i phyogs

bcu dus bzhis bsdus pa'o// byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs chen gyis// phyi phar phyin las skyes pa'i byang chub sems dpa' dang/ nang kri yog ye shes las skyes pa dang/ gsang ba yab yum gyi byang sems las skyes pa'i khye'u dang/ bu mor snang ba'o// thugs dam

dbyings nyid skul ba'i mchog sku gsung thugs kyi dam tshig ye shes dang thugs rjes sems can dang chos nyid la dgongs pa yang gzhan du mi 'dor ba rin po che dbyig lta bur rab tu dag pa des re ba bskang bas na sems can don la bskul lo// 'di ni sngon gyi tha

tshig go/ sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad sems bskyed pa'i dus na yang dam bca' lce thog tu bzhag pa'i dam tshig go/ sku gsung thugs kyi ngang nyid 'di/ sangs rgyas byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi sku gsung thugs kyi ngang nyid dam dam par

gyur pa'i bdud rtsi 'di ye shes lha la dang ba'i dad pas 'bul/ bla ma la 'dod pa'i dad pas/ chos la yid ches pa'i dad pas 'bul ba zhes bya'o// dam tshig sems dpa' sgom pa'i rnal 'byor pa// bdag cag ces phyis 'byung dang sbyar la dad pas 'bul lags

kyis// bzhes te kun tu dgyes mdzod la// rang bzhin lhun gyis grub pa ye shes kyi dkyil 'khor gyi lha la lha thim par bzhes la sku gsung thugs dgyes par mdzod/ mnyes shing tshim par mdzod/ mchog thun mong gi bsdus pa'i dngos grub thams cad kyi ra bar ma

phul du gyur pa sku gsung thugs mi zad brgyan gyi 'khor lo stsal du gsol zhes sbyor 'bul ba'o// 'phrul gyi dngos grub stsal du gsol// bdud rtsi so sor 'bul bas yab la 'bul ba// dpal chen badzra he ru dang// yum la 'bul ba// yum chen kro d+hI

shwa rI la// dam rdzas gang 'bul na// rnam dag bdud rtsi lnga 'bul ba'o/ dam rdzas mnyes mchod 'bul// thugs rje che dgongs byin brlabs gang zhu na slob ma la dbang dang rang la dngos grub stsol// 'khor ma mo brgyad la 'bul

ba// mthing ga'i mchog rnams rdo rje gsang ba'i yum// gau rI la sogs khro mo brgyad rnams la/ rnam dag thugs rje// gzhan yang mkha' 'gro ma lus la// bdud rtsis mnyes par bya ba'o// sna tshogs gdod can za byed mche

gshog can// sid+ha la sogs phra men brgyad rnams la// rnam dag/ thugs rje/ sgo bzhir rab brdams rdo rje sring 'gro ma// lcags kyu la sogs sgo ma bzhi rnams la// rnam dag/ thugs rje/ nam mkha'i bde sbyor ci bgyi'i bka' nyan tshogs// dbang phyug chen po nyi shu rtsa brgyad la/

rnam dag/ thugs rje// ma bdun srid bzhi 'bar ma dgu la sogs// mkha' 'gro sgrol ging 'khor bcas thams cad la// rnam dag/ thugs rje// zhes pa'am/ yang na dpal chen mi pham rdo rje dang// ma tshogs dbang phyug 'khor gyi rkyen// gau rI la sogs brgyad rnams dang//

sing+ha la sogs brgyad rnams la// dbang phyug nyi shu rtsa brgyad dang// sgo ma chen mo bzhi rnams dang// ma mo chen mo bdun rnams dang// sring mo chen mo bzhi rnams la// zhes kun la 'bul lo// bde chen dbyings nas rgyal ba'i skur chos nyid bde ba

chen po'i ngang nas rgyal ba'i skur bzhengs pa bzhengs pa// dpal chen khrag 'thung thugs ni ma skyes rin po che/ dpal he ru kar snang yang thugs chos sku yid bzhin nor bu ltar snang ba/ thugs ka nas dngos grub kyi rtsa ba sngags kyi phreng ba dang ldan pas// ru

lu ru lu'i phreng bas 'khor lo bskor// lha ye shes pa dang dam tshig pa gnyis su med par tha mi dad par mnyam par sbyar na// rtse gcig ting nge 'dzin la ma yengs par bsgrub pa'i ting 'dzin zab mo'i mthus// deng bdag la sku

gsung thugs kyi dngos grub dus 'di/ nyid du bdag la stsal du gsol/ gnas gang nas spyan drangs na// he ru ka yi gnas bcu dang// dur khrod chen po'i gnas brgyad gong du bshad zin/ nas// gang spyan drang na yi dam gyi lha// dpal chen

'khor bcas spyan 'dren te// gnas gang du spyan drang na// dur khrod mchog gi bsgrub pa'i gnas 'di ru// mchod rdzas gang gnas su stob na// zhing chen sha chen gsar rnying ti rar bcas// dmar gyi khrag gi ar+g+haM rgya mtshor

bskyil// 'khor gang dang bcas pa la 'bul na// mkha' 'gro 'bar ba'i tshogs bcas kyis// 'bul tshul ji ltar 'bul na// ma lus bzhes nas bsnams su gsol/ gang gis za bar byed na// nga ni za byed chen po ste// gang la za bar byed

na 'dod khams gzugs khams gzugs med/ khams gsum ma lus bsgral ba dang// gdul dka' khams gsum gyi gdug pa can rnams zhi bas mi 'dul ba rnams ma lus 'dul ba'i phyir// gti mug dag pa// sha zhe sdang dag pa rus la sogs/

'dod chags dag pa khrag bza' bar bya// sems la las dkar nag gi bag chags sogs pa'i cha nas kun gzhi yid rang byung gi ye shes// kun gzhi'i glong nas rang byung ye shes shar// ji ltar snang ba de las shar ba thams cad/ lha yi dkyil 'khor

du// de ltar ma rtogs pas 'khor bar 'khyams pa'i// nongs pa'i las su gyur pa'i sdig pa thams cad kun// 'khor ba nyid mya ngan las 'das par gnas pasan// gnyis su med pa'i ngang du bshags par bgyi// chos sku ni dbyings ye shes gnyis

su med de/ mnyam nyid ngang las ma g.yos kyang// ye shes// thabs dang dbyings shes rab thabs yab/ dbyings yum/ 'brel ba'i byin rlabs las// 'gro ba'i ma lus 'dul ba/ don du khro bo'i skur sprul pa// dpal chen

yab thabs ye shes chen por gsal ba dang/ yum shes rab chos kyi dbyings su gsal ba'o/ sku la phyag 'tshal bstod/ 'khor la bstod pa// yab yum gnyis med thugs las sprul pa'i sras// tshe 'dir thun mong dngos grub grub chen

brgyad/ dngos grub rnam gnyis ma mo mkha' 'gros grogs mdzad nas myur du ster bar mdzad pa'o// phyi mar phyag rgya chen po mchog la sbyor// grogs mdzad mkha' 'gro'i tshogs la phyag 'tshal bstod/ !/ de nas bde bar gshegs

pa thams cad kyis zhugs mar gcig pa 'di gsungs so// bsam du med do sems nyid nam mkha' che// de bzhin nyid kyi ting 'dzin rang gi sems nyid ngo bor rang gis stong pas na nam mkha' dang 'dra ba'o// sems nyid

nam mkha' bsam pa kun dang bral// rang sems nam mkha' lta bu la rang gi rang la bsam du med de stong nyid kyi stong nyid du blta ba dang bral// bsam du med pa'i sems nyid nam mkha' ni// 'o na sems dran rig tu snang la/ nam mkha' bem stong ngo

zhe na/ rig stong gis gang rig na chos kyi dbyings rig/ rig pa'i dus na bsgom bya dang bral// nam mkha' mi dmigs par yang dmigs su med// nam mkha' stong nyid yin pas mi dmigs so snyam du yang bsam du med pa'o// des ni chos thams cad kyi de kho na nyid rtogs

pa'o// rang bzhin ye shes dbyings kun tu snang gi ting nge 'dzin bsgom pa ni ye shes kyi rang bzhin 'od dmar smug shar yang chos kyi dbyings las ma g.yos/ las ma g.yogs kyang// stong khams yongs la khyab pa'i thugs rje 'byung// ye shes de

nyid snying rje sgyu ma'i 'od kyi sems can kun la khyab pa'o// sa le gsal zhing phyogs med mtha' dang bral// 'od dmar smug pa las snying rje sgyu mar gsal yang phyogs char 'dzin pa med pas na mtha' bral lo// dbyibs med dang kha dog med dngos po

med pa'i ye shes 'od// gzhi rtsa med pa'i sems nyid dag pa la/ rgyu'i ting nge 'dzin ni/ rang sems gzhi rtsa bral ba'i chen po'i de la ye gdod ma nas sangs rgyas kyi dgongs par gsal// sems kyi rang bzhin yi ge sangs rgyas thams cad

kyi thugs hU~M du gsal// bzung bas mi zin de bzhin chu zla'i tshul// hU~M de yang gsal la bzung du med pa'i dpe chu nang gi zla ba ltar ro// thig le'i dbyings nas rang byung sku ru shar// chos sku thig le chen po las lha sku'i ngo bo ye shes sems dpar

gsal lo// 'byung ba chen po lnga ni bcom ldan 'das// rigs lnga'i yum du gnas pa ngo bo nyid kyi sangs rgyas so// 'gro ba kun la ye nas rang bzhin gnas// 'gro ba sems can gyi lus sems 'byung ba lngar ye nas gnas pa'o// phyin ci log tu de

ltar ma rtogs par rnam par brtags par gyur kyang// 'gro ba rang grol rang byung gzhan las min// sangs rgyas nas 'byung ba lnga sangs rgyas kyi yum du lngar grol ba las gzhan nas 'byung ba med do// rang sems// kun gzhi byang chub kyi sems

ni sangs rgyas sems can/ thams cad kun gyi gnas/ so// de'i gting blos// dpag cing tshad gzhal du med pas rig pa byang chub kyi sems/ yin pas so// sems nyid chos dbyings rnam par dag pa'i ngang la// dus gsum bde gshegs

bzhugs pa'i gnas sems pho brang du gyur pa ste// phyi sems can nyid nang kun gzhi gsang ba yum gyi b+ha ga rnams// 'du 'bral med do yum gyi mkha' la rdzogs// bde gshegs sems nyid sangs rgyas su rang gi ngang gis rab tu gsal ba'i pho

brang du// thabs kyi sku'i/ bye brag mang po gdul bya rnams la cir bstan kyang// gnyis med 'bras bu khams gsum rgyas btab nas/ sangs rgyas thams cad thugs ye shes chen po thig le chos kyi skur gcig/ sems can thams cad sems nyid

du gcig sems dang ye shes gnyis sems la ye shes kyi rgyas btab/ 'khor ba la myang 'das kyi rgyas btab// mi 'gyur yum gyi klong na rdzogs pa che// chos nyid 'gyur ba med pa'i ngang du skur rdzogs/ thig le'i chos sku dbyings nas rang

byung mngon sangs rgyas// sems nyid rang byung ye shes lhar mngon sangs rgyas// snang srid ma bcos dpal chen he ru ka/ he ni yul du snang ba snod 'byung ba bzhi yang he ru ka/ yul la dgyes pa'o// ru ni srid pa bcud du snang ba yang he ru ka ste chags pa'o// ka

ni yul sems gnyis med rtogs pa'o// snod bcud// kun la khyab pas gzugs sku dpal chen te// zhal phyag can du snang/ don la// kun tu bzang po thugs kyi ma 'gags pa'i/ rol pas spros med chos kyi sku// thugs chos sku'i rang bzhin no// ye

shes chen po hU~M lnga/ b+h+ruM? lnga bsgom pa ye shes/ lnga'i dbang bskur/ gsang dbang// sku gsung thugs su byin gyis brlab/ pa'o// de bzhin nyid sgom pa'i sngags// oM sarba d+harmA bi shud+d+he sarba bi shud+d+he haM/ kun tu snang ye shes sgyu ma lta bur sgom pa'i

sngags/ oM swa b+hA ba shud+d+haHpra b+hA ba ma hA shU n+ya tA dz+nyA na swa b+hA At+ma ko\u0f85haM/ rgyu'i ting nge 'dzin yi ge hU~M sgom pa'i sngags/ traM sarba kra staM ma hA su kha hU~M/ hU~M las ye shes sems dpa' nam mkhar sgom pa/ dz+nyA na sa twa kro d+ha hU~M yaM/ gzhal yas khang gdan dang

bcas pa'i// b+h+ruM bi shwa bi shud+d+he d+harmA d+hA tu a a/ gdan steng du ye shes sems dpa' dbab cing bzhu ba/ dz+nyA na sa twa kro d+ha hU~M a a/ he ru ka'i skur bskyed pa/ oM badzra shrI he ru ka hU~M phaT/ yum khro mo dbyings phyug ma'i/ oM badzra ma hA kro d+hI shwa rI s+t+waM/

rang bzhin gyi gnas nas ye shes kyi dkyil 'khor gzhal yas khang du spyan drang ba'i/ oM badzra ma hA shrI he ru ka dz+nyA na gar+b+ha su kha saM ha ra na hU~M/ dam tshig pa la ye shes pa bstims nas bzhugs su gsol ba'i/ oM shrI he ru ka d+harma d+hA tu pra b+hA ba ma hA su kha

hU~M/ ye shes dkyil 'khor spyan drangs te/ pa skyes pa chos dbyings nas bos te spyan drang ba'o// he ni bod pa dang po'i sgra// ru ni sems can don la sangs rgyas chos kyi dbyings su 'dus pa'o/ dbyings su sdud pa'i don// ka ni byang chub

sems chen po/ snang la rang bzhin med pa'i sku chu zla ltar gsal ba'o// zla ba gsal bar shar ba la/ snang stong dbyer med kyi sku mtshan ma las grol ba ni// mkha' la mtshon du med pa bzhin// sems nyid ye nas rang sems ye nas sangs rgyas kyi

bdag nyid la he ru ka'i/ skur gsal bas/ rnal 'byor pas// spyan 'dren pa dang sangs rgyas gshegs su gsol bar mi dmigs te/ skyes kyang chos nyid du skyes la shi yang chos nyid ngang du shi bar shes pa ni// skye shi med pa'i lam zhes

bya// sangs rgyas las kyang/ yang sangs rgyas pa'i sa la phyin// bsam du med do stong gsal rig pa chos sku nam mkha' 'dra// brjod du med do rnam par shes pa ni rang bzhin dngos por brjod du mi btub pa lkugs pas bu ram zos pa 'dra/ rnam

shes gzugs dang bral/ sems nyid lha dang// 'du 'bral med do yum gyi mkha' la b+ha ga chos kyi dbyings su/ rdzogs// rig pa rtogs pa'i dus na gar skyes kyang gnas las 'pho ba med/ mtshan ma 'dus byas kyi// spros pa med pa rnam

rtog dang bral ba yum gyi mkha' chos kyi dbyings dag pa la// skye med de las 'gyur med rdo rje'i sku snang ba/ rdo rje'i sku gsung thugs mnga' ba// 'gro ba sems can rnams kyi/ mgon po rang byung bcom ldan thugs rje'i

lha/ rtogs pa'i dus na// 'du 'bral med pa'i chos nyid kyi klong du grol ba la phyag 'tshal lo// chos kyi/ sku gcig gis 'khor 'das kun la khyab pas gdal ba'i chen po sku// zhal gsum phyag ni drug pa ste// chos sku dri ma med

pas// g.yas dkar sprul sku thugs rje chags pas/ g.yon dmar chos sku mi 'gyur rdo rje'i sku/ dbus mthing nag/ rdo rje me long ye shes kha T+wAM so sor rtog pa/ rnge'u chung mnyam nyid g.yas// dung dmar chos dbyings rgyu zhags bya grub/ khyung khra

'da' ka thugs kyi ye shes g.yon// yum ni lus dang grib ma ltar 'du 'bral gnyis su med par 'khril/ btags pa'i// ming dang bsam pa'i rtog pa la ming dang tha snyad las 'das pas mi gnas pa'i/ sku phyag rgya chen po chos sku las dgongs pa// mi

g.yo ba ni sku yi rgya/ mchod pa lha gang la 'bul bar bya na// dus gsum bde gshegs rgyal ba'i dkyil 'khor la// mchod pa gang 'bul na// dngos su 'byor pa rdzas dang yid kyis ting nge 'dzin gyi mchod pa sprul pa yis// mchod pa bla

na mchis pa phyi nang kun dang mthun pa dang ma mchis pa// gsang sngags nang pa la yod pa/ rdzas la ser sna// ma chags dgongs pa ting nge 'dzin las mi g.yo ba'i ba lta ba'i/ stobs dang ldan pa kyis mchod par 'bul/ kun gyi// dpal chen he
ru thabs yab shes rab yum la/ skyon/ rnam par dag pa 'chi gso'i rkyen/ nad gso'i sman/ bdud rtsi dam rdzas mnyes mchod 'bul// la/ thugs rjes brtse bar dgongs dbang bskur dang dngos grub stsol// bde

gshegs thams cad mnyam nyid thugs sangs rgyas thams cad thugs chos skur dbyer med kyi ngang/ skye ba med pa'i don rtogs pa// ma skyes rdo rje kun tu bzang po ni/ rgyu'i dus na// thabs snying rje la mkhas pa'i khro rgyal lam gyi dus na dbang

bskur snang/ 'bras bu'i dus na ye shes kyi/ skur bstan pa// sangs rgyas thams cad dbyer med pas na spang blang dang bral ba'o// kun bzang he ru ka la phyag 'tshal bstod/ yum ni chos kyi sku// rnam dag sku la tha mal gyi zhen chags dang bcas pa'i/

'dod chags mi mnga' yang// dgyes byed lhan cig skyes pa'i ye shes la dgyes pa chags pas dpal chen sku la 'khril// yab yum gnyis med bde chen rdzogs pa'i sku// yab kyi bde ba yum la shar/ yum gyi bde ba yab la shar bas zung

du 'jug pa'i sku// yum chen dpal 'bar ma rgyu'i dus na stong pa shes rab lam gyi dus na yum 'bras bu'i dus na chos kyi dbyings/ la phyag 'tshal bstod// srog rtsa kun 'dar ma las srid pa ni// rtsa srog tsit+ta lus ngag yid gsum po// gu h+ya

gsang chen sku gsung thugs kyi mdzod// sku gsung thugs gsang ba'i rtsa srog shing gsum gtso bo'o// kun gzhi'i chos nyid kyi klong nas yid rang byung ye shes shar// shes rab zhan pas dbyings ye shes de ltar ma rtogs te/ kun gzhi yum

chos nyid yid rang byung gi ye shes yab tu rtogs pas na// don dam thig le gnyis su med par bshags// ji ltar snang ba snod yab dang bcud yum du thams cad lha yi dkyil 'khor du/ shes pas// snying po brjod pas

dper na mtsho dwangs pa las nya 'phar ba ltar sngags brjod pa tsam gyis skur gsal ba'o/ thams cad rdzogs pa'i tshul// kun gzhi yum chos nyid dang yid rang byung gi ye shes yab gnyis/ dbyer med ngo bo nyid kyi skur gyur cig/ thabs la mkhas

pas bdag lha gnyis su med par rtogs pa'i ngang du/ bshags// de nas sangs rgyas thams cad kyis rim pa lnga'i dgongs pa 'di dag gsungs so// A+o~M AHhU~M// rdo rje'i [(]ka[)]bzlas dang sems [(]kha[)]la dmigs// rang lus

kyi sems dang sems las byung ba/[ (]ga[) ]/ bdag byin brlab lhar bsgom pa/ dang 'od gsal sems nyid la blta ba/ dang// snang stong 'dres pa/[ (]ca[) ]zung du 'jug dang 'di lnga la/ lnga'o// re re la yang tha mal pa/ lam du khyer ba/ 'bras bu/

gsum gsum yin/[ (]ka[)]/ tha [(]kha[) ]mal sems can kun la yod/ dang ni lam du 'khyer/ rnal 'byor pa la yod/[ (]ga[)]/ 'bras bur sangs rgyas la yod/ 'khyer ba rnam gsum la// re re la yang lnga lngar bshad/ de gsum rim pa lnga po re re la

yang khyab par gnas so/[ (]nga[) ]/ tha mal rdo rje'i [(]ka[)]bzlas pa ni// 'gro ba rnams kyi dbugs 'di ni// 'gro ba mtha' dag la rlung lnga rigs lngar gnas pa las/ phyir 'gro ba oM ste lus gnas/ nang du 'ong ba hU~M ste thugs yid du gnas/ khong du gnas pa

AHste ngag tu gnas/ nyin zhag phrugs gcig la rlung nyi khri chig stong drug brgyar rgyu bas rdo rje bzlas pa nyi khri drug brgyar gnas pa de ma shes pas tha mal pa zhes so// phyir 'gro nang 'og gnas pa dang// lus ngag yid du gnas pa ni// rdo rje'i bzlas

pa tha mal te// de ni ma rtogs zhes su bya// gong ma'i don rtogs nas lam du 'khyer ba ste/ 'jug pa hU~M la sogs/[ (]kha[) ]/ lam du 'khyer ba'i bzlas pa ni// 'jug dang gnas dang ldang ba la// yan lag drug tu tshad bsgom pa// rdo

rje'i bzlas pa lam du 'khyer// phyir ldang ba oM la spro bsdu gnyis nang du 'jug pa hU~M la spro bsdu gnyis nang du gnas pa AHla spro bsdu gnyis so/[(]ga[)]/ 'bras bu rdo rje'i bzlas pa na// yi ge gsum po rnam dag nas// sku gsung thugs su gnas

pa'o// oM sku mi zad pa rgyan gyi 'khor lo// AHgsung/ hU~M thugs su gsal lo/[(]kha[)]/ tha mal sems [(]ka[) ]la dmigs pa ni// 'dod bde bar shar chags zhe sdang gsal bar shar gti mug mi rtog par shar ba/ dang// rnam shes tshogs brgyad/

gzugs la rgyu'i gzugs bzhi 'bras bu'i gzugs bcu gcig/ tshor ba gsum/ 'du shes gsum/ 'du byed sems dang ldan pas lnga bcu'o// rang bzhin brgyad cur shar ba dang/ thabs rdo rje// pho dang shes rab stong pa mo dang thabs shes dbyer med ma ning

ni// tha mal sems la dmigs pa'o/[ (]kha[) ]/ lam du bsgom pa'i dmigs pa ni// lus skur bde/ ngag gsung du sems thugs su// bde ba gsum dang dga' ba mchog dga' dag 'bral gyi dga' ba lhan skyes kyi/ chad dga'

ba bzhi// 'od kyi snang ba gsum me long 'od kyi snang ba zhal phyag me long nang du blta/ nyi ma 'od kyi snang ba thugs rje nyi ma la blta/ mar me 'od kyi snang ba dgongs pa mar me la blta/ me long nang gi bzhin ltar gzugs gsal ba mar me ltar dgongs

pa gsal nyi ma ltar thugs rje gsal/ bcas pa// de ltar bsgom pa lam yin no// 'bras bu'i sems la dmigs pa ni/ rnal 'byor pa gang zhigalha yi nga rgyal 'chang byed pa de la lus skur gsal khams bdud rtsir bde sngags dang bdud rtsis byin

gyis rlob pa'o/ mi// sku rang lus rtsa las lha sku'i dbyibs grub/ dang khams bdud rtsi las bde ba sngags dang rlung gis byin gyis rlabs gsum/ rtsa skur gsal/ ngag sngags/ rlung thugs su gsal ba ni// 'bras bu'i sems la dmigs pa'o/[ (]ga[)]/ tha

mal pa yi bdag [(]ka[)]byin brlab// snang ba rang lugs sems can lus/ khams gsum gyi sems can rnams kyi snang ba la rang lugs su 'byung ba lnga'i rigs lnga rang bzhin gyis gnas pa'o// mi lus grub sogs tha mal pa// de'i nang nas mi

lus khyad par can thob pa ni rdo rje'i theg pa'i chos dang phrad pas so// de [(]kha[)]las lam du khyer tsam na// rdo rje'i lus nyid dag pa ni// dang por blta bas rang lus rdo rje sngags kyi theg pas sangs rgyas su gtan la phebs pas ye nas dag pa'o// rang nyid

dmigs shing yid 'jog pa// de ltar phung po khams skye mched rnams yi dam gyi lhar dmigs shing bsgom pa las 'jog pa'o// spyod lam nyid kyang sgyu mar blta// spyod lam dus bzhi'i yang lha'i sku phyag rgya sgyu mar blta ba'o// de ni rab tu bsgom

pa'o// lam bu bsgom pa yid la 'jog spyod pa dang ma bral ba'o// 'bras bu'i bdag byin brlab pa ni// sgyu ma dang lha skus don mdzad cing lha skur snang yang sgyu ma dang 'dra ba'o/ ni chu zla dang/ snang la rang bzhin med pa chu zla 'dra/ gsal ba rtog pa med

pas// 'ja' tshon bzhin du dngos med pa// de ltar dpal he ru ka'i 'bras bu'i skur snang ba// mtshan khro bo'i gar dgu dang dpe byad chas brgyad kyi rgyan gyis brgyan// de ni gdul bya la sku zhi khror snang ba/ 'bras bu'i rim

pa'o// sems nyid rang bzhin gyis 'od gsal bar grub nas gnas pa de// 'od gsal ba yi mtshan nyid ni// tha mal las grub rang bzhin stong// tha mal la sems rang gis ma bcos la yongs kyis 'od gsal bar grub pa'o// lam yang rang

bzhin sems rang gis 'od gsal bas mkhyen pa ma 'gags/ med pa ste// sems kyi dkyil 'khor 'od gsal nyid// ngang gis ma bcos pas rang bzhin stong// 'bras bu yang ni 'od gsal lo// sangs rgyas thams cad kyi sku ye shes kyi skur

gnas pa sangs rgyas so// de ni theg pa thun mong thams cad kyang de ltar/ sangs rgyas par 'dod pas so// tha mal zung du 'jug pa ni// thog ma'i dus dang tha ma'i dus// sangs rgyas sems can gnyis med de// gnyis su med

pas ye sangs rgyas// thog ma sems can du gnas pa'i dus na yang sems nyid bde gshegs snying po yin la/ tha ma sangs rgyas su gnas pa'i dus na yang sems nyid bde gshegs nyid sangs rgyas pas gnyis med du zung 'jug go/ ye sangs rgyas pas blang dor

med// sems can la ngan par bstan nas dor du med sangs rgyas la bzang por bltas nas blang du med do// blang dor med pas lam du khyer// zung du 'jug dper na rmos slang gnyis gshibs nas zhing rmod par nus pa ltar yab yum gnyis

bsdebs pa de lhan cig skyes pa'i ye shes 'grub par blta ba'o/ pas gnyis su bsdeb// 'bras bu nyid kyang dbyings yum la ye shes yab la 'jug pa'o/ zung du 'jug/ zung 'jug go 'phang la gnas na/ chos sku'i dgongs pa la gnas par 'gyur

pas na// slar zhing gang yang mi slob bo// slob ma'i zung 'jug dang mi slob pa'i zung 'jug las stong nyid chos sku las yar la gshegs pa'i dgongs pa gzhan yod pa ma yin pas na// dgung las slar gshegs don ma mchis// he ru ka'i gal po
las khro bo'i dkyil 'khor gtan la phab pa ste/ brtag pa bcu gcig pa'o//// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bsnyen pa 'di dag gsungs so// bsnyen par gnang ba'i dbang bskur ba'i dus su bsnyen pa'i/

dbang thob nas// bla mas slob ma la// bsgom pa'i rim pa dang dbyangs kyi rim pa dang yi ge 'bru brgyad kyi don bstan/ nas/ phyir bskyed rim bsgom pa'i dus su ni dpal chen po// 'khor dang bcas pa'i mchod pa rdzogs nas kyang// bsnyen pa

'jug pa'i dus su ni// bsnyen pa'i lung bzhin ru lu spros pa'i brtan pa 'di la/ brtson par 'bad// nas bzlas pa'o// rgyud lung man ngag shes pa// yon tan ldan pa'i bla ma la// bsnyen pa'i dbang bskur gyi// dbang lung man ngag ma thob

par// ji ltar rang dgar 'jug par byas nas/ bzlas brjod brtson 'gyur yang// rang gis 'bad rtsol byas kyang// ngal ba don chung zhing slar gol bar te ltung ba'i gnas su/ 'gyur/ ro// 'bru brgyad bzlas brjod smra ma dag pa tshig mi

gsal ba la sogs pa'i/ skyon spangs te// yid bzhin rin chen gter rnyed dgos 'dod 'byung ba la dang ba bzhin// ru lu dkyil 'khor du shes pa la sogs// cir yang bsgyur du btub pa'i phyir// mchog thun mong gi dngos grub// yon tan

mtha' yas mchog tu bstan// sngags kyi ngo bo lha yi sku// yin te dngos su grub rnapa'o// lha'i sku ma rtog/ mtshan ma las dben pa dang/ smra ba dang bsam pa las 'das/ pas brjod bral du gnas so// don dam rang gi rig pa/ byang chub kyi

sems las gzhan du mi 'gyur/ ba'o// yang dag kun rdzob dkyil 'khor gyi lha/ tshogs rnams so// des tshig shes pa dang skyobs pa dang ldan pa ste// ngan song gi gnas ngan len las skyob/ pa dang// sku gsum 'bras bu thob

par byed pa ste shes skyobs dang ldan pas na gsang sngags kyi nges tshig grub pa'o/ shes// mtshan nyid sku gsum dang ye shes lnga// sku rnam par brjid pas/ gsung smra brjod 'byung bas thugs thams cad mkhyen pa/ dang yon tan bya ba byed pas/ phrin

las// mchog sku gsum thob pa/ dang thun mong chu las mi 'byid pa la sogs/ dngos grub ldan// dbye ba shes rab gsal ba/ rig sngags thabs shes che/ gzungs sngags dang// thabs shes cha mnyam pa// gsang sngags dag tu gsungs

pa yin// rig sngags ma rig mun nag sel// bud med gzugs dbyibs phyag rgya sgra// lha mo shas che ste/ sgrol ma/ 'od zer can/ sor 'brang la sogs so// 'khor yang lha mo shas che ba dang/ nyung yang shes rab shas

che'o// gzungs sngags mtha' rig pas mtha' sel/ yul gyi rtags mtha' sel/ gnyis ltung ba 'dzin// lha mo shas che ba thabs rkyang pa gtsor ston pa// skyes pa'i gzugs kyis 'dul 'gyur ba yin/ no// slob ma// gsang sngags snod ma

yin la gsang// shes rab stong pa na// don dam par snying po chos kyi sku/ ra 'dod pa dang/ thabs snying rje las// yang dag pa'i kun rdzob lha dang sngags kyi sa bon yig 'bru// dang skyed rkyen gyi sngags las// lha yi dkyil 'khor du gsal

ba'o// rang snang ba/ de ltar// sngags kyi byin rlabs bstan pa ni// 'bru brgyad las yang dag lha dgu'i dkyil 'khor du gsal zhing byin rlabs ni// mi 'jigs seng+ge'i sgra dang mtshungs// seng+ge dang chos mtshungs pa ni seng+ges sgra bsgrags na ri

dwags phran rnams skrag pa ltar ru lus ru tra skrag go/ gzi byin che bas nyi zla dang rgyun mi 'chad pas rgya mtsho'i rgyun/ dang 'dra ba// nam mkha'i dang chos mtshungs te/ sprin bzhin mkha' las cho 'phrul sprul// o+oM ni sku dang ye shes nyid// dpal

chen 'bar ba seng ges brjid// ru lu nyi zla dang mtshungs te nyi zlas 'od gzhan zil gyis gnon/ nam mkha' dang mtshungs te dngos por ma grub par sprin sogs 'byung ba ltar mkha' 'gro 'byung/ rgya mtsho'i gling la rin chen yod pa ltar re ba skong/ ma mo nam

mkhar 'phro// ma tshogs sprin dang skar ltar 'phro// hU~M chen nyi zla'i tshogs rgyun 'dra// ma nor re skong mkha' la 'gro// sngags kyi yon tan khyad par 'phags// ru lu 'di ni las nyon gyi sgrib pa ma lus pa sbyong// las kyi

sgrib pa sbyangs nas sprul sku'i zhal mthong/ dang nyon mongs pa'i sgrib pa sbyangs nas longs sku mthong shes bya'i/ bag chags sbyangs nas chos sku mthong/ 'joms// ru lu 'di ni rang sems sku dang ye shes gsal bas/ rtogs pa skye// bsgom nyams

sems la rnam par 'phel/ lha sku'i zhal phyag gsal ba/ rnam pa bde ba/ ngo bo stong pa/ rang bzhin rig pa'o// ru lu 'di ni phrin las bzhi 'grub pas na/ ya mtshan che// bdud dang bar chod/ mu stegs rU tra 'dul/ bas ya mtshan che/ phyi nang gsang

ba'i// drod gsum blta sgom spyod pa'i tshad gsum/ gzugs sgra dri'i rtags gsum 'byung// phyi'i drod lus yod du mi tshor/ nang gi drod dbugs rgyu ba mi tshor/ gsang ba'i drod dang bde ba sems la 'bar ba/ ldan/ dang por/ mar me ltar gsal ba blta

ba'i tshad bar du/ rgya mtsho ltar mi g.yo bsgom pa'i tshad tha mar/ shing bal ltar yang ba spyod pa'i/ tshad// brtag pa gsum ni rab lha'i// gzugs dang 'bring sgra gsum dang tha ma dri zhim po yang ston// sngags kyi rang bzhin bstan pa ni// 'jigs

byed he ru ka 'bar ba'i rang bzhin ni// kun tu bzang po he ru ka/ yin/ de'i// dpal be'u thugs kyi dkyil 'khor ni// ye shes gsang sngags snying po 'bru brgyad du ldan/ bar snang ba'i// rdo rje sngags kyi sgra bshad pa/

ni// A+oM ni dpal chen po/ ye shes sku phyag rgyar gsal// ru ni ye shes 'bar ba log pa'i 'dod chags/ bsreg yang dag pa'i bde stong la/ chags pa'i ngang/ ngo// lu ni lum bi ni'i tshal dang 'dra bar kun skye ba'i gnas/ kun

bzang yum gyi tshal// hU~M ni 'khor 'das/ dbang du sdud pa yang thugs hU~M las sprul/ pa byung nas dbang du sdud pa'o// b+h+yo ni ye shes kyi lha mo rnal 'byor ma ru nyer brgyad kyi srog bstan// hU~M ni tshad med bzhis 'gro don mdzad pa'i/ ta na ga Na

mchog/ dpal chen thugs kyi dkyil 'khor nas/ rang byung gi ye shes su bstan pa/ ye shes lha'i// srog gi snying po zhes bya ba/ 'bru brgyad spro// 'bru brgyad dkyil 'khor gyi lha tshogs rnams kyi/ thugs su bstan pa dang// srog gi snying

po bye brag tu brgyad spyir dril bas dgu/ tshang bar yod// de ni ru lu dang ye shes kyi lha dbyer med du gnas pas na/ dkyil 'khor rang bzhin yin// dkyil 'khor dbyings ye shes gnyis su med par/ rig pa'i ye shes kyis/ snod/ dbyings

dang bcud ye shes gnyis su med// 'bras bu sku gsum dngos grub thob// ru lu'i bye brag bsam mi khyab// dbyangs drug blangs bas don drug 'grub/ dbyangs// sha ta pa yi glu sngon byung dpal chen pos dur khrod so sa'i gling du

blangs/ rU tra kha T+wAM gas sgral cing blangs/ rjes 'jug dus thams cad du blang/ g.ya' gseb nas chu 'bab pa bzhin 'bru mi gsal bar blang ngo/ blangs pas/ dpe/ rdo rje srin po'i ngur skad kyis/ 'bras bu dgos pa/ gdug pa thams cad spa yang

bkong/ glu gang blangs/ gardza pa yi glu ri ma la ya'i rtse mo la phyin dus su blangs/ rjes 'jug dus drug gi tshogs dang nyu le ma zlog dus su blang/ blangs pas/ dpe ji ltar// zab cing 'brug ltar sgra sgrogs pas/ 'bras bu gang 'grub na/ gtum po gdug

pa lhan ner 'gyur// glu gang blangs na/ cang de'u yi glu rjes 'jug gso ba dang mtshams sbyor gyi dus su blang/ rang gi thog tsam tshig gsal bar bzlas/ blangs pas// mkhur ba dbugs kyi rlung 'byin gyis/ khro bo khro mo'i sprul pa

'gyed// pang ka de'u gyi glu bde bar gshegs pa rnams kyi bka' bsgo nas ri ma la ya'i byang phyogs su blangs/ rjes 'jug tu srod la blang mchu cung zad btsum la rnga mo bu stor ba'i tshul du blang/ blangs pas// 'khun cing gdung ba'i sgra 'byin gyis//

gnod byed ma lus dbang du sdud// breng nge ba yi glu rU tra gnas spar ba'i don du blangs/ tho rangs/ blangs pas// sngags kyi yi ge'i sgra sgrogs pas// des ni dkyil 'khor lha rnams bskyed// thugs ye shes kyi dkyil 'khor rang

bzhin med par gsal// dung nge ba yi glu rU tra'i gnas su byas te/ blangs pas/ rjes 'jug tho rangs blang// tshangs pa dbyangs kyi 'dren zhi ba'i skad gdangs la 'dril zhugs kyi de'u dang bcas par blang/ tshul gyis/ dam can bsten par shis

pas// 'khor rnams thams cad dbang du sdud// ru lu'i dkyil 'khor dag tu shes/ yum gyi b+ha ga/ gsang ba'i mkha' la lha dgu'i dkyil 'khor rdzogs/ dkyil 'khor gyi rang bzhin// kun bzang mkha' dbyings yangs pa'i

gzhal yas spyir yum kun tu bzang mo'i b+ha ga su/ bye brag tu// 'byung lnga yum lnga'i b+ha ga rnams 'dus pa'i gzhal yas khang/ dkyil 'khor gyis// sku dang ye shes ngo bor rang gsal bas na// rgyal ba'i dkyil 'khor mdzes

pa'i mchog bkod nas// rak+ta'i rba klong 'dod chags khrag mtsho 'khyil cing 'khrugs pa'i 'byung ba rim brtsegs/ dbus/ zhe sdang/ keng rus gsar rnying brtsigs pa'i ri rab steng/ nga rgyal// rdo rje'i brag chen gtams pa'i sa

gzhi la/ dkyil 'khor gyi rgyu// b+han d+ha gsar rnying brtsigs pa'i gzhal yas khang// yon tan che rgyas dbyibs gang na/ gru bzhi lham pa'i dbyibs/ gzer gang gis btab na// gnam lcags dur mo'i gzer chen ta la la// ka

ba du yod na mchog brgyad ldan pa'i re'u cha dgu/ rgyan gang dang ldan na// rab 'jigs dur khrod chen po'i rgyan dang bcas/ 'od gang 'phro na// bskal pa'i me ltar 'bar ba'i 'od zer 'phro// chags bcas dbus kyi dbyings gtso

bo'i gnas/ zla kham pad+ma dbang gi tshul/ 'khor gyi bzhugs gnas// rin chen 'khor lo rtsibs brgyad rgyas pa'i dbus/ gdan gang// pad+ma 'dab brgyad dbus kyi dkyil 'khor du/ gdug pa gang/ dregs pa khyo shug bsnol zhing

gdan gang bting zhing rkyang bting// rab gsal nyi zla 'bar ba'i gdan bshams pa/ lha gang bskyed na// bsod nams mthus grub ye shes kyi lha dang ting 'dzin stobs kyis bskyed/ pa dam tshig lha// ye shes rang snang yul du snang ba

'di kho na/ dkyil 'khor dam pa las// bdag dam tshig dkyil 'khor gi rnam sprul ye shes kyi dkyil 'khor nyid kyi mthus bzhengs shig/ dang ba'i mchod sprin gsal ba'i nam mkha' bzhin/ don dngos po'i// mtshan ma gtan

spangs rnam dag dri ma med pa'i thugs mnga' ba// thugs rje 'char tshul// ye shes chos kyi dbyings chos sku/ las mi g.yo yang// thus rje byung tshul/ smon lam dbang dang 'phral gyi dus mkhyen pas// mtsho las rdzis bskyod nas

rlabs dang mkha' las gsal ba rten med du 'gro ba/ nyi zla bzhin/ skur snang ba dngos ni// lus dang phyag zhabs stong khams rdul snyed kyi/ sku'i ngo bo ni// 'jigs byed khro rgyal 'bar ba'i skur ston pa/ sku'i mdzad pa// zhi khro la

sogs tshul dang rngom brjid bcas// dur khrod rgyan chas ni// thod sbrul g.yang gzhi la sogs rgyan chas ldan/ phyag mtshan// rdo rje dung chen kha T+wAM la sogs bsnams/ gnas ni// rab 'jigs dur khrod bskal pa'i me dkyil

na/ 'khor ni// dkar mo la sogs tshogs kyi dkyil 'khor mdzes/ dbang mo la sogs// bka' nyan mngag gzhug pho nya g.yog 'khor bcas/ gdul bya la snang tshul ni gdul bya'i yul/ dus ngan tha ma'i gdul bya'i rgyud sbyong

ba'i// dpal chen dpa' bo yab yum 'khor bcas la/ 'bul byed kyi sngags ni/ gsang tshig 'bru brgyad legs pa'i mchod pa 'bul// skyes dang skyes len gyi tshul du// bdag la dgongs shing byin rlabs dngos grub

stsol// gnas gzhal yas khang dang brten lha du bcas pa yi// 'bar chen klong gi lha'i dkyil 'khor du rdzogs// ru lu lhar ni shes pa yang// 'bru brgyad lha ma mo brgyad he ru ka dang dgu rnams phyag rgyar

gsal// rtag chen g.yung drung nam mkha'i rang bzhin las// ngo bo nyid kyis rtag pa// thugs mchog ye nas gsung yig 'bru hU~M las thugs phyag mtshan rdo rjer gsal// sku dngos ni kun tu 'od chos sku pad+ma can longs sku yi ge 'khor lo sprul

sku// sku gsum sa non yon tan phrin las rdzogs// zad med ye shes nor bu rin chen 'dra ba'i chos sku las dbyings kyi gter// de nyid las ni sku dngos longs sku dpal chen sku ru bskyed/ sku'i cha lugs// rab 'jigs khro bo'i

cha lugs cir yang ston/ rgyan bstan pa ni// nyi zla thod phreng sbrul nag g.yang gzhis rgyan// kun bzang chos nyid rnam dag chos kyi dbyings yangs pa las// gzugs ma chos kyi dbyings mtshon shes rab yum gyi skur bstan nas/

gdul bya la snang tshul// gang yang thogs med cha lugs tha dad cing// gtso mchog thabs kyi sku la dgyes par 'khril// zhi khro'i yum zhi ba'i dus dang khro bo'i dus na/ tshul ston spyod pa bsam yas kyang// rang bzhin chos kyi

dbyings las gzhan du mi g.yo bar// gsang ba'i yum gyi b+ha ga dkyil 'khor de ltar 'don pa'i 'byung gnas mdzad/ sras ston pa yang ma mo brgyad la sogs pa// mkha' 'gro'i tshogs kyis bskor ba'i yum rnams la/ mchod pa

gang gis 'bul ba na// sngags tshig 'bru brgyad rags pa'i mchod pa 'bul// rtog pa'i skyon bral mtshan ma gtan spangs kyang// gzung 'dzin gyi chags pa med/ yab/ ye shes yum chos kyi dbyings las mi 'bral zhing/

yab// thabs kyi sku la yum shes rab dgyes par 'khril// rnam thar brgyad ldan pad+ma yum gyi b+ha ga pad+ma 'dab brgyad du gsal ba'i/ ge sar la// chags med ye shes yab kyi rdo rje ye shes lngar mnyam gzhag nas// nyi ma dmar

po yum gyi byang sems/ zla ba dkar po yab kyi byang sems/ dkar dmar 'khrugs pa'i 'od zer gyis// gzung 'dzin skyon bsreg 'gro la gsang ba'i dbang bskur zhing// rgyal ba'i dkyil 'khor sangs rgyas thams cad yum gyi b+ha ga nas/

gsal bar bskyed mdzad pa/ de rnams gang gis byed na// sngags tshig 'bru brgyad rags pa'i mchod pa 'bul// lha sku gcig la kun tshang bas na// sku gsung thugs kyi phyag rgyar gsal/ yab// thabs dang yum shes rab zung du

'brel// ru lu spyan drangs shes pa ni/ rang bzhin gyi dkyil 'khor nas spyan drang ba ni// 'og min grub pa'i gnas nas dgug/ brjod pa sngags kyi phyag rgya bzhis spyan drang ba// dzaHhU~M baM hoHgsang sngags phyag rgya bzhis/ bsam pa'i ting

'dzin phyag rgya'i lha mo bzhis spyan drang ba// lcags kyu zhags pa lcags sgrog dril bu ma/ bca' ba'i/ dam tshig phyag rgya bzhis rab tu bcings nas ni/ mtshon pa dpe'i phyag rgya bzhis spyan drang ba ni// rgyal ba'i dkyil 'khor 'bru brgyad

sngags kyis dgug/ rgyal po spyan 'dren pa lta bu'o// ru lu mchod par shes pa ni// sngags kyi ru lu zer// ting 'dzin las lha mo/ spros pas mchod pa'i gter/ mchod pa bzhi ni// me tog bdug spos lha bshos mar me

bcas/ dar gyi rgyu las grub pa'i mchod pa lnga// bla re rgyal mtshan na bza' 'phan dang gdugs// sil snyan rnga sgra'i mchod pa dang nor bu mu tig phreng/ ba'i mchod pa// gzugs sgra dri ro reg sogs 'dod yon drug lha mo'i

tshogs// bde chen byang chub sems kyi gsang ba'i mchod pa mchod sprin rnams/ phyi rdzas kyi mchod pa/ dngos su bshams shing nang ting nge'i mchod pa/ sems kyis mngon sprul te/ gang la 'bul na// ye shes rang snang zhi khro'i dkyil

'khor la/ gang gis 'bul ba// 'bru brgyad 'phro 'dus 'bul na mchod par bzhes/ sku la bstod pa// sku mchog gang 'dod gzugs su de bzhin snang/ gsung la bstod pa// gsung mchod rnam dag sngags kyi yig 'brur
gsal/ thugs la// thugs mchog ye shes dam tshig phyag rgyar gsal/ yon tan la// yon tan rin chen bdag gzhan dgos 'dod bskang/ phrin las la// phrin las rnam bzhis 'gro drug rnam par sgrol/ spyir bstod
pa// legs pa mchog rnams yon tan mnga' mdzad la// bstod mkhan gyi tshul// dang bas rab bstod 'bru brgyad drags pas mchod// mchod dang bstod pa'i mchod pa yang/ rang gi/ ting 'dzin gyi mthun/ sprul pa

mchod pa'i gter// ru lu phyag rgyar shes pa ni/ chos dam tshig las chos nyid// phyag rgya rnam pa bzhi dang ldan/ pa'i// gtso bo chos sku phyag rgya chen por gnas// dam tshig gi phyag rgya yum ni sku la 'khril/ las kyi phyag rgya ni

mkha' gsang 'khor rnams bskyed// zhi ba chos nyid phyag rgyas rang bzhin med// phyag rgya bzhi dang ldan pa'i gtso 'khor rnams rdzogs pa'i sku/ rgyas btab pa ni// rnal 'byor lus la 'debs byed ni/ lha skus rgyas btab

gsal// ru lu phrin las shes par bya ba ni// thugs kyi 'od zer phrin las mchog/ thugs las phrin las bzhi'i 'od 'phro ba'o// stong gsum phyogs bzhi'i 'jig rten na// shar zhi ba lho rgyas nub dbang byang drag po// 'bru brgyad yon
tan bsam mi khyab// dpal chen yab yum 'khor dang bcas// yun ring dus nas bsnyen bsnyen pa// nye ba'i dus su mchod mchod pa// bsnyen mchod 'bras bu mchis par mdzod// dkyil 'khor 'di la byin

phob la// spyir ni phrin las bzhi// bdag cag rnams la dngos grub stsol// byams mgon shes lha'i/ thugs la bya btsal mi mnga' yang/ sgrub pa po// bdag cag re smon 'grub par mdzad slad du// phrin las rnam bzhis

'dul thabs zhi ba la yig 'bru kha dog dkar/ rgyas pa ser/ dbang dmar/ drag po nag po bsgom/ ji bzhin pas// gdul bya rab rU tra la sogs gdug pa can/ 'bring rgyal blon tha mar mi phal pa/ gyur pa rnams/ lha dang bgegs 'gro drug/ bzang

ngan phan gnon rtse gcig sems pa yi// lha bgegs dang por phan gnod byed pa dngos gang yin na/ legs lha nyes bgegs byed pa gang yang rung// sbyor ba ngan pa'i bag chags de'i nus pa ji ltar bzhom na/ gtan

spangs nas/ tha mar gang la 'god na// byang chub sems mchog skye bar bsgrub pa dang// thugs rje'i zhing gyur 'gro drug sems can rnams// 'khor ba'i rgya mtsho mtha' ring mtsho las bsgral slad du/ gang gi phrin las byed

na// bzlas brjod 'phro 'dus bskul nas phrin las mdzod/ 'byung ba rim brtsegs dang 'dod chags// rak+ta'i rgya mtsho chen po 'khyil pa'i dbus/ zhe sdang/ keng rus chen po'i ri rab brtsegs pa'i steng/ gti mug/ rdo rje'i brag

chen gtams pa'i sa gzhi la// rab 'jigs rdo rje 'bar ba'i gzhal yas khang// bskal pa me ltar 'bar ba'i klong dkyil na/ lha'i sku dngos ni// dpal chen 'khor tshogs mtha' yas bzhugs pa ni// ye shes tshad

med thugs rje'i mdzad pa/ sprul pa'i thabs mnga' bas/ gdul bya// gang mos dag la de bzhin skur snang zhing/ 'dul tshul// ci la cis 'dul bzhin du cha lugs ston/ thugs kyi 'dul thabs ni// thugs mtshan sna tshogs mtshon

cha'i char 'bebs shing/ gsung gi 'dul thabs ni// ru lu sngags kyi sgra sgrogs 'brug stong ldir/ skus 'dul thabs ni// gzi brjid spyan bzlog me stag tsha tsha 'phro// zhal gdangs mche gtsigs dug gsum gti mugs sha/ zhe sdang

rus/ 'dod chags khrag zhal du rngub// 'khor gyi 'dul thabs ni// mngag pa'i pho nya mgyogs byed glog stong 'gyu/ mchod tshul ni// bdud rtsi dmar gyi ar+g+haM rgyun gyis mchod/ bskul tshul ni// 'dzab dbyangs sngags kyi phreng bas rgyud

bskul nas/ gdul bya gang yin na// 'dul 'os bsgral ba'i zhing du 'gyur ro 'tshal// phrin las dngos gang gis 'dul na// byin rlabs tsham rngams drag pos gdug pa bsgral du gsol// thugs kyi phrin las bzhis bdud

bzhi 'joms/ pa'o// dang por thugs dam bskul ba// bskul dang bar du las bzhi bcol tha ma/ drag pos bcol// ru lu sgrar ni shes pa ni/ ru lu// sgra dbyangs drug dkyil 'khor lha phar 'phro tshur 'du gsal// A+oM ni dpal chen

po'i sa bon rtsa ba la srog sngags/ sku gsung thugs// ru lu ma mo brgyad kyi sa bon ni srog sngags/ gnas kyi phyag rgya yin// ru lu phra men gnas kyi yul yang yin// hU~M ni thabs kyi sgo ma bzhi/ 'i sa bon nam srog sngags// b+h+yo ni ma sring rgya

mtsho'i dbang mo tshogs// hU~M ni 'khor 'das dbang du byed/ thams cad sdud par byed// zur brgyad snying yul brgyad kyi logs la 'bru brgyad gsal// 'bru brgyad dbus na rdo rje'i lte ba hU~M 'bru gcig gsal/ de la 'bru brgyad kyi/

sngags kyi 'phro 'dus bcol bskul mchod// A+oM ni sku mchog gau rI ma/ dkar mo// ru ni yon tan tsau rI ma/ kun mo// lu ni gsung nyid pra mo he/ rmongs mo// ru ni phrin las be tA lI/ thal byed ma// lu ni zhi byed puk+ka sI/ spos

mo// hU~M ni rgyas mdzad g+hasma rI/ sme sha can// b+h+yo ni dbang sdud sma sha nI/ dur khrod ma// hU~M ni drag po tsaN+Da lI/ gtum mo// yig 'bru brgyad po// kun 'dus dpal chen nyid kyi ngang// dkyil 'khor dbang mo brgyad dpal

yab yum dang lha dgu nyid du gsal// dug lnga rnam par dag ste ye shes lngar gnas 'gyur ba'i/ mnga' brnyes shing// sku lngar ldan pas zhe sdang rdo rje'i sku gti mug chos sku rnam snang nga rgyal longs sku rin 'byung 'dod chags sprul sku 'od dpag med phrag

dog mngon par byang chub sku don grub tu sbyar ro/ dug lnga'i 'gro ba sgrol// rab 'bar cha lugs 'jigs pa kun 'dul ba/ khrag 'thung yab he ru ka yum kro d+hI shwa rI gnas ma mo/ yul phra men phyag rgyar bcas// sgo ba la don gyi khyo yod

pas/ stangs dpyal dbang phyug ma nyer brgyad 'bangs yang bran/ dang g.yog/ yang g.yog/ bka' nyan khro bcu yab yum/ sprul pa khro bo khro mo la/ sngags gang gis mchod par 'bul// 'bru brgyad rags pas 'phro 'dus mchod par

'bul// gsang dbang yab yum gyi sku gsung thugs su byin gyis rlob pa// byin gyis rlabs dang mchog thun mong gi dngos grub stsal du gsol// sku'i 'phro 'du'i sgra ni// stong gsum stong gi 'jig rten na// sku yi sprul pa bsam yas kyang/

he ru ka yab yum 'khor bcas kyi// bla med sku mchog rdo rje la// 'bru brgyad gsal ba'i mchod pa 'bul// gsung gi 'phro 'du'i sgra ni// stong gsum stong gi 'jig rten na// gsung gi sprul pa bsam yas kyang/ he ru ka yab yum

'khor bcas kyi// bla med gsung mchog rdo rje la// 'bru brgyad rags pa'i mchod pa 'bul// thugs kyi 'phro 'du'i sgra ni// stong gsum stong gi 'jig rten na// thugs kyi sprul pa bsam yas kyang// he ru ka yab yum 'khor bcas

kyi// bla med thugs mchog rdo rje la// 'bru brgyad rags pa'i mchod pa 'bul// stong gsum phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten na// sku'i ngo bo gang sprul na// ye shes sprul pa bsam mi khyab// yang dag lha dgu'i// thugs kyi dkyil

'khor 'od zer 'bar/ gsung gi gnas gang nas sprul na// gsang ba'i mkha' las 'bru brgyad 'phro// gdul bya gang na/ khams gsum 'od spros pas sems can sdug bsngal bsal// 'od tshur 'dus pas// rgyal ba rgya mtsho'i sku

la thim// phar 'phros pas rgyal ba la// bla med mchod pa dam pas mnyes// tshur 'dus pas dang po'i gnas su thim// sgrub pa po'i// lus ngag yid gsum sgrib pa sbyang// ye shes lha'i// sku gsung thugs kyi dngos

grub thob// sngags ni ru lu// 'bru brgyad rags pa'i mchod pa 'bul// ru lu'i las kyi sgra dang// rtogs pa'i ye shes 'bru brgyad kyis// nyon mongs ma lus bdud bzhi phung po'i bdud na tsha/ nyon mongs pa'i bdud ni log lta/ lha'i bu'i

bdud bar chod dang/ 'chi bdag gi bdud skye shi 'joms// yid bzhin nor bu ltar 'dod pa 'byung ba/ 'khyil ba'i 'od zer 'di// gsang bar 'khor 'das/ kun la khyab pa dang// ru lu las cir yang snang ste sems las 'khor 'das su snang ba

ltar// cir yang bsgyur du btub pa dang/ thugs ka'i// ye shes sems dpa' sku mchog rin po che// bstod tshig gi sgra dang// 'bru brgyad 'di ltar ru lu 'phrul che ba'i 'phrul po che// dus gsum sangs rgyas yin pa dang

rgyal ba'i sku gsung thugs// phrin las bzhis gdul bya'i// las rnams thams cad byed pa yin// dngos grub thams cad sdud rnal 'byor pas pa yi// bsams pa tsam gyis gang 'dod 'phel// bsam 'phel 'bru brgyad mkha' la

sprul// 'khor tshogs rgya mtsho nam mkha' stong pa la sprin ltar 'du ba ltar sdud// dngos po rtag par ma grub pas// rang bzhin sgra tshig brjod las 'das// ru lu chos nyid shes pa ni// chos thams cad ye 'dod ma nas stong pas na// skye med

gdod nas spros dang bral// sangs rgyas kyi// sku gsung thugs ni mtshan ma med// 'khor ba snod bcud du// snang la spros bral chos kyi dbyings// ru lu dngos grub shes pa ni// sku dang gsung thugs mkha' spyod kyi gnas la 'gro

bas na/ mkha' la 'gro// ji ltar 'khor 'das su/ snang ba thams cad kun// 'khor ba thun mong/ dngos grub 'das pa mchog gi dngos grub kyi gter du gyur// 'bru brgyad kyi ni phreng ba dag/ rin chen sna lnga'i gser ser dngul dkar

zangs dmar lcags nag ma rgad ljang/ do shal bzhin// sna lnga'i 'od zer gsal bar 'gro/ tsa sran ma nyung dkar tsam pa na ka yi 'bru tshad tsam// yig 'bru yang na til 'bru tsam thugs mtshan phyag rgya'i tshogs/ kha dog/ gsal 'od

'tsher ri brag la sogs la/ thogs pa med 'khor 'das kun tu khyab// phar 'phros pas ni 'gro ba'i sgrib pa sbyong/ gzhan don rdzogs// tshur 'dus pas ni sgrub pa po la dngos grub ster/ bdag don 'grub// rnam par mchod pa'i
dngos por/ spros pas rgyu bsod nams tshogs/ rang bzhin// stong par rtogs pas 'bras bu ye shes tshogs// tshogs gnyis rdzogs pas sku gnyis su/ mngon sangs rgyas// 'bras bu smin pas chos longs sprul sku

gsum thob// bsdus pas sku dang gsung dang thugs kyi phyag rgya che/ sku gsum gyi// dngos grub mchog gi gter du 'gyur// de nas gsang sngags ru lu yi// 'dzab bsnyen 'phro 'du bstan pa ni// phra mo'i ting 'dzin rig

pa yid// gsal bas rang gi gnas sbyang ba// rang gi thugs la ting 'dzin rtsal sbyangs te/ de la rang gi/ gnas bsnyen zhes ni bya ba 'di/ gnas gang du bsgom na// bcom ldan dpal chen thugs kyi dkyil 'khor nas// ye

shes sems dpa' gang bsgom na/ sku mchog tshon gang rin po che// tshul ji ltar bsgom na thugs gsal ba'i tshad// dran dang srog chags gsal ba gsung gsung lha// sku'i rgyan gsal ba'i tshad// snyan cha mgur chu yan lag 'gul 'gul

'dra/ ye shes sems dpa'i thugs la ji ltar bsgom na// ye shes sems dpa'i thugs kyi dkyil 'khor nas/ dpal chen snying dpal be'u rin chen zur brgyad pa'i steng// bzhin la dpal be'u'i dbus su thugs/ rdo rje gsung yig 'bru

'bar 'bar lta// zur brgyad steng na ru lu 'bru brgyad po/ nyu 'bru tsam/ yi ge gsal ba'i tshad// gug skyed klad kor tsheg bar zur phyin te/ ye shes sems dpa'i thugs rdo rje yig 'bru// rnam gsum dus gcig yid

la gsal sems te// spyir gsal ba'i tshad dam dpe// ra ri khal khol med par dran gsal rig/ sku chos skur gsal bas// chos kyi rdo rje'i chos nyid stod pa nyid kyi ngang las lhar gsal ba ru lu'i/ glu blangs pas// sems nyid gsung gi

rang bzhin la/ gsung sngags nyid/ thugs gsal ba'i ting nge 'dzin// yid la gsang sngags brjod pa ni// gsang sngags dag cing yig 'bru gsal// sku gsung thugs gcig nas gcig tu mi 'dren par rang rang gi gnas nas 'phro 'du gsal ba'o/

dpal chen thugs kyi dkyil 'khor nas/ bdag he ru ka'i thugs kar nyi zla la// ye shes sems dpa'i tshad/ tshon gang he ru ka ye shes sems dpa'i thugs ka/ dpal be'u rin chen zur brgyad ni// srog zur brgyad la gi snying po 'bru

brgyad po// gser gyi ba thag gzings pa bzhin/ mdog ser po skar khung gi rdul 'dra ba'o// nyi zer gyi rdul// phar spros pas ni sangs rgyas kyi thugs dam bskul// slar 'dus rnal 'byor pa'i rin chen dpal be'u bskang// bdag dang

lha// gnyis su med pa byang chub sems su thim/ mgrin pa pad+mar// dpal chen gsung gi dkyil 'khor nas// srog gi snying po pad+ma 'dab brgyad la 'bru brgyad pa// gsang ba gnas kyi lam du byung/ thugs ka nas phyung ste ljags las

dkan du shar// gsang ba mgrin sgo nas spros pas/ dbugs kyi rlung gis bskyod/ pad+ma'i lte bar gsung gi rigs ljags la// snang ba mtha' yas thugs dam bskul/ sna sbug nas spro ba// shangs kyi rlung sgrom chen por bsdams/ mgar ba'i

sol mal nas zhun ma'i// lcags kyi tsha tsha brdabs pa bzhin// phar 'phros pas ni phyogs bcu rgyal ba'i gsung la thim// slar 'dus rnal 'byor pa bsgom pa'i/ ljags kyi pad+ma bskang/ bdag dang lha// gnyis su med pas 'gag med

gsung// dpal chen sku yi spyi bor zla ba'i dkyil 'khor nas/ zla ba la gnas pa'i/ ru lu 'bru brgyad 'od zer 'phro/ mgrin pa nas spyi bor 'od rlung gi rta la zhon nas// gsang ba ye shes rlung gis bskyod// slar 'dus spyi bor klad pa/

dung khang gzhal yas su/ sku'i rigs// rnam par snang mdzad thugs dam bskul/ rnam snang thugs ka nas// ru lu 'bru brgyad 'od du 'phro/ tshangs pa'i bu ga nas hU~M mgo thur du bstan pa gnas pa las// rdo rje hU~M ring sgra yis

drangs// spyi gtsug tshangs pa'i bu ga nas/ 'di la dbugs ngom nas 'khor ba khyod phrin las tshangs pas na/ 'od kyi 'phro 'du// mgal me glad la bskor ba bzhin/ phar 'phros pas ni phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas/ sku la thim// slar 'dus rnal

'byor pa rang gi sku yi dkyil 'khor gang// bdag dang lha'i dngos grub// gnyis su med par 'gyur med sku// tsit+ta snying sul brgyad yid bzhin rin chen zur brgyad kyi/ rig pa nyid dkyil 'khor du gnas kyang rtogs dka' bas// gsang

chen thugs kyi dkyil 'khor nas// ru lu 'bar ba'i yig 'bru brgyad/ rin po che'i thugs ka na gnas pa las// mgrin pa gsung gi pad+ma'i lam du phyung/ rlung lnga sangs rgyas yin par rtogs dka' bas// gsang ba

dbugs kyi rlung gis bskyod// rin chen 'khor lo'i rtsa thugs yid bzhin nor bu 'dra ba'i rtsa kun 'dar ma dang la la nA dang ra sa nA/ nas drangs/ dbu thod pa dung lta bu// klad pa dung khang gzhal yas su// yig 'bru 'od thugs kar 'od

mthing ga gtso che mgrin pa dmar spyi bo dkar de re re las 'od lnga tshad pa'o/ kyi 'phro 'du gsal// sna nas rlung lnga rang bzhin gyi rgyu bas na// shangs kyi rlung sgrom chen po nas// rdo rje sngags kyi las rnams hU~M gis byed pas hU~M ring sgra las drangs/ sku

gsung thugs rang sa na gnas// yi ge mi 'gyur 'od zer gyi/ phreng bar 'gyur// dril bu'i sgra ltar rgyun mi chad/ dpal gyi thugs// dpal be'u thugs kyi dkyil 'khor du// ye shes sems dpa' he ru ka'i// 'bru brgyad ye shes
sems dpa'i thugs/ gsang ba'i lam brgyud de/ 'od zer rnams// slar 'dus dpal be'u nyid la gsal// bsnyen pa'i ting 'dzin 'phro 'du ni// dung khang dkar po'i sku ni dbu'i gnas gzhal yas khang/ gsung gi

gnas// mgrin pa pad+ma'i gnas chen las/ thugs kyi gnas// thugs ka gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor du/ sku gsung thugs// rang sems byang chub 'bru brgyad nyid/ 'gyur ba med pa// ru lu gser phreng dgos 'dod 'byung ba/ rin po

che/ hU~M/ gcig las ma spros 'bru brgyad dbus dang dgu ru ldan/ gang bsam 'byung bas// bsam 'phel 'bru brgyad yid bzhin rin po che/ 'dra/ dus gsum gyi// rgyal ba kun gyi thugs kyi dbyig/ gdod nas dri ma med pa'i ye shes rang

shar bas/ ye shes snying po bas/ ye shes lha'i thugs kyi// byin rlabs 'bru brgyad phyag rgyar gsal/ lus la// drod tshad sems la rtags rab 'bring tha ma gsum dang ldan pa yi/ chos nyid spros bral// de bzhin nyid du shes par

bya// 'bru brgyad ye shes mkha' la 'phro/ bzlas brjod bsnyen pa'i 'phro 'dus ye shes kyi lha nye bar bsnyen pa'i// sku gsum sku mi 'gyur ba/ gsung mi 'gag pa/ thugs ma skyes pa/ 'bar ba'i rgya mtsho ni// srog gi snying po 'bru brgyad gsal/

bdag dang lha// gnyis med sku gsung thugs kyi ngang// dpal be'u rin chen zur brgyad las// ru lu 'bru brgyad 'phro 'du spro/ sku'i 'od 'phro 'du ser po// gser gyi ba thag gzings pa bzhin// phar 'phros pas ni sku

la thim// tshur 'dus pas ni dpal be'u bskang// dpal be'u rin chen zur brgyad las// ru lu rin chen 'bru brgyad 'phro/ gsung gi 'phro du dmar po// mgal me klad la bskor ba bzhin// phar 'phros pas ni sku

la thim// slar 'dus pas ni 'bru brgyad bskang// yid bzhin rin chen zur brgyad las// ru lu rin chen 'bru brgyad 'phro/ thugs kyi 'od zer mthing ga/ lcags kyi tsha tsha brdabs pa bzhin// phar 'phros pas ni ljags
la thim// slar 'dus pas ni dpal be'u bskang// kun gzhi'i rnam shes yul las skur gsal ba// dpal chen yab yum kun gzhi'i yum yin la rnam shes yab ste kun gzhi ni rnam shes kun gyi rtsa bar gnas so/

gnyis med sku gsung thugs// thugs dam mdzad pas na/ kyi yon tan yid bzhin 'byung ba'i gter// thugs lha ni mchog rdo rje he ru yab yum la// thugs kyi dpal bsgom bya'i sngags don ni/ be'u rin chen zur brgyad
la// ru lu 'bru brgyad 'od zer 'phro zhing 'du/ 'od/ phar 'phros pas ni thugs dam bskul// ye shes lha la bsnyen pa 'bul/ 'od bsdu ba// slar 'dus thugs kyi dpal be'u gang// dngos grub mchog gi gter du

'gyur// rnam shes dbang po gnas 'gyur na khro mo'i skur snang ba// phyag rgya sku'i cha lugs gcig tu ma nges kyang/ sprul tshul ni// gdul bya'i dbang gis cir yang sprul pa yi/ rnam grangs ni// kau rI la sogs khro mo brgyad

rnams la/ ! yi ge sgom gnas ni// dpal be'u rin chen zur brgyad la// lu lu 'bru brgyad kyi 'od zer phar/ 'phro zhing tshur 'du/ 'od zer// phar 'phros pas ni thugs dam bskul// ye shes lha la bsnyen pa 'bul// slar

'dus pas ni thugs kyi dpal be'u gang// dngos grub mchog gi gter du 'gyur/ lha gzhan la sbyar ba// lha dgu rtsa ba'i dkyil 'khor ltar// tshul mchog dpal be'u rin chen zur brgyad man chad/ kun la de bzhin sbyar// yul bzhi dus

bzhi gnas gyur na phra men skur snang ba// mgo brnyan tshogs kyis las gang mdzad na dur khrod za mdzad cing/ ngo bo gang byung na// rdo rje mche gshog phra men mgo brnyan tshogs// sid+ha la sogs rnam grangs du yod na phra men

brgyad rnams la// dpal be'u rdo rje tshul mchog ni/ ru lu'i spro bsdu// kun la rab tu sbyar ba'o// gnas 'gyur kyi rim pa ni// phyin ci log bzhi gnas su dag 'byung ste/ spyi'i las gang mdzad na// tshad med bsdu ba bzhi yi ngang

tshul can/ khyad par du// 'gugs byed 'ching sdom byed pa'i las mkhan ma/ las dang ngo bo rnam grangs ni// dkyil 'khor bsrung ba'i sgo ma bzhi rnams la/ !/ dpal gyi spyan sngar dam bcas tshul ni// dpal gyi bka' nyan dam tshig

gnyan bsrung zhing/ rnal 'byor pa la grogs mdzad tshul ni// ma sring rgya mtsho'i tshul gyis brtse dgongs te/ phrin las mdzad tshul ni// grogs la blta zhing 'gal ba tshar gcod pa// ma tshogs dbang phyug rnam grangs nyi shu rtsa brgyad

la/ ! ngo bo// cha lugs khro 'jigs spyod pa rab mdzes pa/ spyir mdzad pa'i las ni// gzhan dag sreg mdzad gtso la mnyes stob ma/ khyad par gyi// mdzad pa rnam dag pha rol sgrol mdzad ma// dkyil 'khor skyong ba'i srung

ma rnam grangs sring mo bzhi 'am gsang ba'i yum bzhi rnams la/ !/ gshegs bzhugs mi mnga' bgrod tshul ni gang yang thogs med cing/ dgongs pa ni// rtog pa kun bral thams cad sa le mkhyen// bya btsal med bzhin phrin las
ni/ gzhan dag tshar gcod mkhas/ ngo bo ni// bka' nyan mngag gzhug pho nya rdul snyed la/ ! gnas ni// phyogs bcu'i sa dang nam mkha'i 'jig rten na// cha lugs ni/ lha dang lha min phra rags gzugs

'chang zhing/ dgongs pa'i thugs dam ni// gsang sngags rdo rje theg pa'i gnyer blangs pa/ ngo bo ni// rig 'dzin sngags 'chang rnal 'byor thams cad la/ ! gnas// phyogs bcu stong gi 'jig rten na// sna tshogs snang

ba thabs mchog yab// ma skyes pa nyid shes rab yum/ thabs shes rab 'brel bas// gnyis med gcig la zung du 'brel/ thabs shes rab tu 'dus tshul// ji snyed brjod pa'i chos rnams kun// thabs dang shes rab rang

bzhin te/ mchod lugs// ye shes lha dang dbyer med cing// 'bru brgyad sngags kyi yi ge gsung/ spro thabs// spros pas bla med mchod pa 'bul// bsdus pas dngos grub bsdu lugs/ byang chub sems su gnas// dngos

grub mchog gi gter du 'gyur// yab yum gsang ba'i gnas gang nas blangs na/ mkha' dbyings la/ 'phro 'du gang gis na/ 'bru brgyad dkyil 'khor 'phro 'du ni/ bya thabs gang gis na// phyi nang gsang ba'i dbyibs brgyud

de// dngos grub 'bras bu gar rdzogs pa gsang ba'i mkha' la rdzogs// pad+ma rA ga yum gyi b+ha ga rA ga'i mdog 'od kyi ma d+hal nas// by-i ru dmar po dbang gi maN+Dal la/ gsang ba yum gyi mkha'// ge sar stong gis brgyan pa'i

dkyil 'khor nas/ bsgrub bya lha'i thugs// dpal chen he ru'i thugs kyang rin po che// bsgrub mchog bdag gi sgrub byed rnal 'byor pa'i thugs kyang rin po che/ bsgrub pa'i chos// gdod nas ma skyes thugs kyang rin po che/ 'khor

'das// thams cad ma lus yum gyi b+ha ga bde chen dbyings su rdzogs// mtshan med spros bral bde chen dbyings su thim/ dpe bstan pa// ji ltar 'ja' tshon gsal 'gyur yang// nam mkha'i ngang las yongs kyis 'byung/

don bstan pa// phyag rgya'i cho 'phrul gsal 'gyur yang// ma skyes ngang gis 'byung ba'i cho 'phrul yin/ ye shes ni// rang rigs ye shes mnyam nyid rol pa las/ dbyings ni// ma skyes ngang gis rdzogs pas sku

gsung thugs/ dbyings su bsdu// rang rig rtsol dang bral bas dbyings su rdzogs/ sems su bsdu/ thams cad ye rgyas btab pas byang chub sems/ dbyer med du bsdu// skye med gdod na sa dag pa'i rang bzhin la// 'bru

brgyad phyag rgya cho 'phrul yig 'bru lha/ cir yang snang// thams cad dbyer med sems nyid byang chub sems kyi dang// tshigs las 'das pas brjod bral du gnas ma bcos lhun gyis grub// oM ru lu ru lu hU~M b+h+yo hU~M/ yid

bzhin nor bu lta bu yi// a la os na ro brgyan ma gzhi ma'i 'a la/ thig le/ dang bcas/ A+oM sku// sku rnams ma lus 'dus pa yin/ ra dang la ni// dbyangs dang gsal byed kun la khyab/ zhabs kyu/ u bzhis spras pa rnal

'byor gyi// rnal 'byor ma mo ma rnams kyi srog sngags so// srog sngags zab mo shes pa yin/ gzhi// ha U zhabs khyud thig le hU~M sgo ma'i don// sde tshan bzhi ka tsa Ta ta pa'i gsum pa ni ba yin las// bzhad byed ha ya ya

ta na ma b+h+yo ma mo srog spros// gre ba nas byung ba ta U zhabs khyud dang thig le hU~M lha'i thugs/ so// sngags rnams btu ba gsang ba ni// blo ldan sngags pas shes nas bzlas// yang na oM AHhU~M rdo rje'i bzlas par 'gyur/ lus

bsrung ba// cis kyang mi phyed mi shigs pa'i// stong pa'i nyid du shes pa go cha bla na med// mtshan ma'i yul kun stong pa'i ngang bcom nas kyang/ bdud bgegs kyi mi tshugs// thams cad kun tu rgyal bar gnas/ sku gsung thugs go

bgo ba'i sngags// A+oM oM badzra ka wa tsa ya man+d+haM/ yang byung/ badzra kA ya bA ka tsit+ta sa mAny+dza hU~M// ming dang mtshan ma ma grub pas// mi gnas ma byas 'dus ma byas// chos kyi dbyings kyis bsrungs pas na// rgyal bas kyang ni mi

mthong ngo// A+oM hU~M su ra ta bak+Sha haM// rmad byung gsang sngags dam tshig nos pa las// nyon mongs dug lnga 'dus pa'i dbang song nas// blta ba dmas shing spyod pa rtsings pa yis// rtsa ba zhig cing yan lag nyams
pa yis// slob dpon grogs mched thugs dang ci 'gal ba// ye shes lha 'bangs dngos grub yal la sogs// nongs pa mchis kyang 'gal bar ma mthong ba// rgyal ba'i dkyil 'khor rnams la 'dis bshags
na// 'bru brgyad rags pa'i mchod pa 'di bzhes la// tshangs te dngos grub dam pa stsal du gsol// bsgrub pa'i dkyil 'khor 'bras bu 'thob bya'i phyir// rol pa'i 'phro 'du la sogs gnas bsgyur te// bsnyen

pa'i lung bzhin dbye ba med pa yi// las kyi bye brag bzhin du bsgrub par bya// ston pa thabs mkhas thugs rje che ba yis// phyi rabs rnal 'byor don du gsungs pa'o// he ru ka'i gal po las ru lu spros pa'i
brtag pa ste bcu gnyis pa'o//// de nas phyogs bcu dus gsum gyi sangs rgyas rdo rje 'chang chen po rnams kyis/ rdo rje theg pas bdag gzhan thams cad 'khor ba las yongs su bsgral bar bya
ba'i thabs 'di dag gsungs so// gsang sngags rdo rje'i theg pa nas// rgyu dang lam dang 'bras bu yis// rtogs pas bdag bsgral thugs rjes gzhan// rdo rje bam bsgrub gnas mchog bya// dang po bsam gtan
chos dgu ni// lus ngag yid gsum sbyang bar bya// lus dang ngag sems gtan la dbab// byang sems yi dam bla ma dran// 'di dgu rnal 'byor can gyis bya// phyi nang gsang ba'i mtshams bcad nas// bsrung
ba'i 'khor lo yang dag gnas// lus khams bdud rtsi chen po la// sman dang gtor ma rak+ta yin// phyi nang gsang ba'i bshags pa yis// lus can rnams kyi dri ma bkru// dang por stong nyid bsgoms pas
ni// rang lus dkyil 'khor nyid du bsgom// rtsa ni gzhal yas sprul pa'i sku// yi ge sngags ni longs spyod rdzogs// lus khams bdud rtsi chos kyi sku// ngo bo nyid sku snying po rlung// sku bzhi rang

gnas lha ru rdzogs// las kyi rlung la 'jug pa bzhi// nyams su blangs pa'i gnad rnams ni// bdun cu tham pa'i man ngag gnas// gnas sbyong bzhi bcu rtsa gnyis yin// pho mo ma ning thod rgal rlung/ khams ni
'dus pa dang po la// rgyun rlung lag cha can dag gis// rtsa bral lus sems rmi lam du// nyams su snang ba 'byung ba yis// phyir ldang gsum dang nang 'jug gsum/ khong gnas kha sbyor dbugs gcig
bdun// gzhi ni rtsa ba'i rlung lnga la// yan lag lnga ste rnam dbye bcu// bcu yi ming gnas las dang bcas// zin pa'i zug dang ting nge 'dzin// rengs skyon bcos thabs bdun gyur pas// man ngag gnad ni
bdun cur gsungs// de dag phan yon bcas pas ni// rnal 'byor rnams kyis bslab par bya// rlung dang lus khams bdud rtsi gnyis// rtsa sngags gsum gyis lam yang khrid/ khams ni 'dus pa bar ma
la// lag cha bri ba'i rlung gis dral// mthong snang re dogs bral ba'i lam// sad pa bzhi dang dgra langs yin/ khams 'dus tha ma lag cha bral// sku bzhi gnas par 'gyur ba'o// de nas 'jig rten 'das pa'i
lam// sa rnams non par rgyal bas gsungs// phyi rabs rnal 'byor thams cad la// rdo rje chang gis rgyas par bshad// kye ho skal ldan rigs kyi bu// 'khor 'das thun mong mtshams dang 'das// 'jig rten
pa dang 'khor lo bskor// 'khor 'das thun mong lam bshad na// snang ba gsum du bstan pa'i lam// kun gzhi 'dus dang phyag rgya che// rgyu rgyud thabs rgyud 'bras bu'i rgyud// bla ma sgrub pa bde gshegs

dngos// man ngag nyams myong lung 'brel tshad// gdams ngag drug tu bstan pa dang// snyan brgyud bzhi yis gtan la phab// rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba lnga// thabs dang shes rab mthar lhung ba'i// bsrung
ba'i bye brag bstan pas na// rnal 'byor pa yi lam shes bya// 'jig rten 'khor lo mtshams pa'i yang/ 'cha' ba'i lam/ khams kyi 'du lugs rnam pa gsum// tshom bu rnam pa drug tu bcad// mdor bsdus gnyis

su bstan pa yang// snying po drug gi lam yang khrid/ khams kyi bdud rtsis khrid pa dang// rtsa yi yi ges lam khrid do// lam lnga lta bur bgrod pa ni// tshogs sbyor mthong sgom mthar phyin yin// byang chub mchog ltar

bgrod pa ni// lam lnga'i yan lag nyid du 'gyur// dbugs gcig rdzogs pa'i byang chub ni// bla ma nyid la zhus byas te// dbugs kyi rgyu ba g.yas g.yon zhes// srog rtsol nyams su blang byas la// mthar phyin
yon tan skyon sel byed// phyir 'gro gtang bar bya ba yang// rtsol ba bkag la srog nas gtang// shugs bskyed sna bug gnyis nas gtang/ kha nas sgra bcas gtang ba'o// dgang ba'i yan lag

rnam pa gnyis// rtsol ba bkag la srog gnas dgang/ kha nas sgra med dgang bar bya// de nas rlung gnyis kha sbyar la// nyams su blang zhing bsgom par bya// man ngag bdun cu tham pa yang// srog 'dzin nam

mkha'i rlung nyid la// me dang nus pa mnyam pas ni// me yi rlung du yang dag gnas// thur du sel ba'i rlung zhes pa// sa dang 'dres pa yin zhes bya// gyen la rgyu ba'i rlung de ni// rlung gi rlung ste sna bug gnyis/

khyab byed rlung ni chu nyid la// kun la khyab par gnas pa'o// yan lag rlung lnga rgyu ba ni// me yi rlung ste spyan rab gsal// rab tu rgyu ba rna ba'i rlung// shin tu rgyu ba sna rlung sa// mngon par rgyu ba chu rlung lce// yang

dag rgyu ba nam mkha'i rlung// rtsa ni de nyid la dor gnas// rlung la sngon thags byin rlabs dang// sems drod byin rlabs drug po dang// steng 'og bde ba rnam gnyis bsgom// lam gyi khrid lugs rab bshad

na// rlung lnga rang gnas thim pa'i nyams// 'byung lnga'i rlung stobs 'phel ba'i nyams// 'byung ba bzhi ni cha mnyam dang// 'byung ba bcu drug cha mnyam ste// 'byung ba rlung lnga dbang bsgyur byed// lus khams bdud

rtsi chen po lnga// bzhi mnyam gla rtsi chen po dang// sih+la nyi ma ma las byung// ga bur zla ba pha las byung// mAM sa chu dang bcas pa ni// de bzhin sangs rgyas snang ba'o// rtsa gnas lam ni srog shing gsum// dkyil

'khor bzhi la gnas pa dang// nyam nga mya ngan 'dre yi rtsa// g.yal dang mchi ma'i rtsa rnams so// yi ges lam ni khrid pa las// tsha grang dmyal ba tri nag po// dud 'gro byol song du dud ka/ yi dwags bkres skom
pre yig dmar// nr-i yig sngon po gling bzhi'i mi// su ser lha min ri rab nang// lha yi a dkar ri rab rtse// 'dod pa khams kyi sa bon no// bsam gtan A+oM ni gzugs kyi khams// rtog dpyod dga' bder

snang ba'o// gzugs med khams ni yi ge AH/ skye mched mu bzhi snang ba'o// sku yi A+oM la gsung gi AH/ hU~M ni thugs te yon tan swA// phrin las yi ge hA yin la// dkar dmar mthing ser ljang gu yin// b+h+rUM ni

gti mug zhe sdang hU~M/ khaM ni nga rgyal 'dod chags hrIH/ phrag dog aM nyid dug lngar gnas// b+h+rUM ra ha ni dug gsum sngags// A+oM dang AHdang hU~M las ni// mi zad rgyan gyi 'khor lor gnas// snying po AHdang zung

'jug hU~M// dbyings dang ye shes chos skur gnas/ khams ni 'dus pa bar pa la// lte lkog k+Sha yi yi ge las// srin po rU tra'i snang ba yis/ khrag 'thung 'dul ba'i nyams su snang// mnyen lcugs rnam pa bzhi po
las// yi ge'i man ngag a k+Sha ra// dngos grub rang yin re ba med// bar chad dngos grub dogs pa med// sad ma pa yang bzhi las stong pa lnga// lha sngags rgyan dang stong pa dran// chog shes bdud

las bying chen 'phreng// yang dag spong ba'i gnyen po bzhi/ khams kyi 'dus pa tha ma la// rnam rtog spong ba pad can yul// dal rgyu yid 'jug rnam rtog spong// rdo rje skyil krung lus ngag yid// thig le rlung yang
non pa'o// chos shes bdud choms sbyor lam drod// nang gi sangs rgyas srid rtsi gnyis// ma skyes bzod thob sbyor lam gsum// 'khor ba'i chos 'das lam rdzogs so// skyon can skyon med rlung sems
'dus// ngo bo rang bzhin mtshan nyid yin// 'jig rten pa yi lam yin no// 'khor lo bskor ba 'jig rten 'das// mthong bsgom las ni bdun dang brgyad// sa drug rlung 'jug dngas ma rtogs// rim pas

las rnams kun ldan pa// sa gzhi dbang lung bdud rtsi brgyud// ye dag byin rlob longs sku nyid// sa gnyis dkyil 'khor chos sku stong// stobs lnga dwangs ma chen dag pa// sa phyed rdo rje ngo nyid gshegs// rlung

rtsa bdud rtsi yi ge khrid// mthar phyin pa'i 'bras bu'i 'gros bzhi thim// mi phyed mthar gnas gyur pa'o// pa ste/ rtsa'i 'gros thim pas rtsa thams cad dbus kun 'dar ma'i gnas su thim pas sprul skur gyur to// ye ge'i 'gros thim pas a haM zung

du 'jug pas longs skur gyur pa'o// lus kyi khams bdud rtsi'i 'gros thim pas chos skur gyur pa'o// snying po rlung gi 'gros thim pas ngo bo nyid kyi skur gyur pa'o// de yang sku ni sprul sku/ gsung ni longs sku/ thugs ni chos sku/ sku gsung thugs dbyer med pa ni ngo bo nyid kyi sku yin

no// des 'jig rten 'das pa la lam dang sa dang 'bras bu gsum mo// des ni rtogs pas bdag bsgral bar bstan no// de nas zhing bcu bsgral bar bya// sgrub rdzas bkra shis gtsang ma la sogs pa'i dmigs kyis gang bsgral ba/ de dag byin gyis brlab/

gang gis byin gyis rlobs na// dmigs pa med pa chos kyi sku/ stobs kyi gdeng du gyur pa can gyis/ so// chos sku gdeng can du gyur pa'i ngang las 'gags med ye shes kyi sku// sku mchog 'bar ba'i dpal he ru ka tshul du gsal bar bsam/ khams

gsum skye ba'i rgyu bcad cing 'byung ba'i sgo dgag ces bya ste/ skye rgyu bcad pa ni khams gsum 'khor ba'i rgyu nyon mongs lnga ste/ 'dod chags khrag la gnas te/ srid pa thams cad khrag tu bsdus te/ zhal du rngubs nas 'dod chags kyi rtsad bcad/ khams gsum du 'khor ba'i skye

ba'i rgyun bcad pa'o/ khrag tu dmigs nas kyang// dur khrod kun tu khyab par bsam// A+oM dang AHhU~M swA hA bkod// 'byung ba'i sgo dgag pa ni/ 'bras bu la dgongs la sems can gyi gzugs sku smin pa'i phyir/ spyi bor A+oM/ khar AM/ snying gar hU~M/ lte

bar swA/ rkang mthil du hA/ snying po 'bru lnga bkod nas/ stobs pa lnga/ bskong pa lnga/ mnyes pa lnga/ 'bras bu lnga ste/ dang po rkang mthing gyi ha ljang gu phyogs bcur 'phros pas dmyal ba'i gnas stongs/ las kyi rigs kyi thugs dam bskang/ don yod grub pa yab yum mnyes/ slar

'dus pa las rdo rje rgya gram bsgril mar gyur/ de 'phros 'dus pas don yod grub pa yab yum gyi skur gyur/ yab yum gnyis su med pa'i rol pa mdzad pas yab yum byang chub sems su zhu nas swA ser po lter ba gnas pa la phog pas/ swA ser po phyogs bcur

'phros ste/ yi dwags kyi gnas stongs/ rin chen rigs kyi thugs dam/ rin 'byung yab yum// slar 'dus pas rin po che bsgril mar gyur// de las 'phros 'dus rin 'byung yab yum du gyur/ de gnyis su med pa'i rol pa mdzad pas byang chub sems su zhu 'od dang bcas te yas

'phros pas/ snying ga'i hU~M la phog hU~M sgra dang bcas te phyogs bcur 'phros pas byol song stongs/ rdo rje rigs kyi thugs dam/ rdo rje sems dpa' yab yum mnyes/ slar 'dus rdo rje bsgril mar/ de las rdo rje sems dpa' yab yum/ yab yum gnyis med rol pa las yab yum yang

zhu nas byang sems dang bcas pa 'phro ba nas kha'i AM la phog/ AM sgra dang bcas nas mi'i gnas stongs// pad+ma rigs kyi/ snang mtha' yab yum mnyes/ slar pad+ma bsgril mar/ gnyis su med par snang mtha' yab yum du gyur/ rol pa mdzad nas byang sems su zhu nas/ spyi bor oM

la phog pas/ oM sgra dang 'od du bcas nas phyogs bcur 'phros pas/ lha'i gnas/ de bzhin rigs kyi/ rnam snang yab yum mnyes/ slar 'khor lo bsgril mar gyur nas/ rnam snang yab yum gyi skur gyur te gnyis su med pa'i rol pa mdzad nas chos nyid du gyur nas/ rigs

lnga'i kha dog tshon gyi dru bu bzhin btsugs nas gnas pa dang/ de las raM yaM khaM gsum byung ste/ raM las ye shes kyi mes bsreg/ yaM las rlung gis gtor/ khaM las chus bkrus te sbyangs nas// stong pa lnga dang bskang ba lnga// mnyes pa lnga dang 'bras bu

lnga// raM yaM khaM gis bsregs sbyangs 'thor// dngos ni a ru raM yaM khaM gis sbyangs pa'i sems nyid de a dkar por gsal bar gyur pa la ni sems nyid yi ge ar byin gyis brlabs nas zhes bya la/ byin brlabs nas// ting 'dzin gsal zhing sems

las su rung bas ni cir yang bsgyur du btub pa yid bzhin rin po che ltar 'dod pa 'byung bar sems gsal bar shar ba dang// rin chen gsal bar shar ba dang/ a de las phyogs bcur/ byang chub sems kyi 'od zer 'phro/ ste spro bar bya'o// mos

pa'i thugs la mnyes bsam nas// phyogs bcu sangs rgyas kyi zhing na bzhugs pa'i rgyal ba rnams 'gro ba sems can 'khor ba mya ngan las 'das pa'i zhing du sgrol bar mos pa rnams kyi thugs la mchod pas mnyes par bsam/ 'gro ba sems can ma lus pa rnams kyi

yang don ma lus par mdzad pa rdzogs par byas nas/ 'od 'dus thog pa'i gzugs la gzung/ 'phags pa mchod sems can gyi don byas pa'i 'od zer de dag sngar tshur 'dus pa las/ thog ma'i lus ngag yid gsum la phog nas// sbyangs pa ni gzugs la gzud pa'o// de yang

yi ge ar gnas pa'i gzugs la gzud pa kho na thog ma'i gzugs ma nor ba yin no// phyag mtshan snying po phra mo dag/ gong gi rang rgyud kyi yi ge'i steng du dpa' bo 'bru lnga dag phyag mtshan lngar gyur/ de rnams gcig tu 'dus nas yi dam gang yang rung ba'i phyag mtshan

snying po phra mo dang/ skur gyur par bsam pa dag go/ brtan par red nas mkha' la bzhag/ gsung yig 'bru/ thugs phyag mtshan/ sku yongs su rdzogs pa rnams bstan par red nas/ yum kun tu bzang mo mkha' dbyings rnam par dag pa las/ de'i sems hU~M du gyur

par bzhag go/ bskul ba'i rang bzhin kun 'dus pas/ hU~M de phyogs bcur 'phros nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing khams rnam par dag pa na bzhugs pa rnams/ 'gro don la thugs dam bskul ba rnams kyang 'od kyi rang bzhin du hU~M la 'dus pa las skur

bskyed par bya ba ni// des kyang spor ba'i las rnams byed/ hU~M badzra d+d+r-ika/ badzra sa twa sa ma ya zhes pas rdo rje sems dpa' zhal gcig phyag gnyis kyi sku mngon du bskyed nas/ rin po che'i gzhal yas khang gi nang du zla ba'i gdan bting la/ der zhugs te 'og nas rlung gi

dkyil 'khor du gyur pas btegs nas mi g.yo ba'i dbyings 'og min gnas su 'phang ngo// de la sprul pa 'byung ba'i spyod pas pha rol po sgrol nus so// dngos ni mchod pa'i rdzas su bsngo// de'i phung po dngos ni rin po che lta bu mchod pa'i rdzas su bsngo ste/ sha khrag

mchod rdzas su rol ba'o// de yan chad thugs rjes gzhan bsgral ba'o/ !/ dpal rdo rje sems dpas bam sgrub bshad de/ tshe 'das la phan gdags par bya ba'i don du gsungs pa'o/ !/ de nas rgyal po rdo rje 'dzin// rdo rje bam gyi sgrub pa bshad// dngos

grub chen po blang ba ni// las la grub pa'i dngos grub can/ dang por rab tu shes pa ni gsum ste/ ro'i rigs brtag pa ni/ rol las 'grub pa'i dngos grub yod pa ste/ rab skye ba bdun pa/ 'bring rgyal rigs rje'u rigs/ tha ma skyes pa grir shi ba'i ro yin

pas dngos grub yod pa'o// shi nas rab zhag/ gsum mam 'bring bdun nam tha ma dgu na blang/ de las mang na dngos grub yal lo// de nas ro btsal ba ni/ khro bo rol pa sa btsal bar bya ba dang/ ste rnam par rgyal ba dang stobs po che dang bdud rtsi 'khyil

bar bsgom pa'i slob mas bcol lo// phra men 'byon tshul btsal bar bya/ ni slob ma rnams ma mo dang 'phra men du bsgoms nas btsal bar bya'o// gcan gzan rgyal po sha mi 'bag/ sngags pa dbang bskur thob pa'i ro mi blang/ stag gzig rol

pa'i gdong mi bsdu// gcan gzan gyi zos pa'i 'phro'am mgo dang rnying med pa'i ro mi blang// rigs ngan sme sha rims ro dang/ mdze can sngags pa nang dme'i ro/ spang byas nas/ de ltar/ khung nas dngos grub blang ba ni ro khung nas ro yid bzhin nor

bur shes nas blang/ gshed dang dbral/ rta mgrin du bsgoms pas phyin 'brang ba'i gshed dang dbral ba ni rnam par rgyal bar bsgom pa'i phur pa ro khung du btab la gshed sha rid la sbrang ma 'du ba lta bu de dbral gshin rje gshed du bsgom pa'i phur pa btab la lhan cig

gnas pa'i gshed dang dbral/ khur ba'i dus su gzhal yas khang du shes pa ste/ b+h+ruM las rin po che'i// ro ru gzigs nas gzhal yas khang/ du bskyed nas phyi nas sa bdag thog tu song ba yang 'gal ba med de rin po che'i gzhal yas khang na mi gnas pa gcig kyang

med pa'i phyir ro// ro rang gi gnas su sleb pa dang slob dpon gyi rnam 'joms sam rigs kyi yum gyi gzungs chu'i/ khrus kyis bkru bar bya ba dang/ mi gtsang ba gtsang bar 'gyur ba dang ma mo mkha' 'gro dgyes par 'gyur bas so// rigs drug 'gro ba'i

gnas kyang sbyang/ de nas rigs drug gi maN+Dal byas nas rigs drug nas rim par drang bar bya ste/ rigs drug nas 'dren pa'i cho ga rgyas par bya'o// de nas/ rgyu drug sa bon sbyang ba dang// lha'i a dkar po/ lha min gyi su ser po// mi'i nr-i sngon po// dud 'gro'i du

dud ka/ yi dwags kyi pre dmar po// dmyal ba'i tri nag po rnams dpa' bor 'bru lnga de nas// dug lnga'i gnas lam sbyangs te gti mug oM gyis 'dod chags AHzhe sdang hU~M nga rgyal swA phrag dog hAs/ sbyangs dag par bya/ ste rigs lngas sbyang ngo// tshe

'das kyi rnam shes bar dor 'khyams pa de/ khro bo'i sprul pas bkug la ro nyid la bstim par bya ste pho nyas dgug go/ rnam par shes pa de rten ro la dgug/ pa yang dang po nas 'gugs pa dang zhag gsum na 'gugs pa gnyis so// de nas ngan song sbyong ba'i

sngags kyis// las dang nyon mongs sgrib pa sbyang// pa'o nang zhi bas sbyang ba dang gsang ba khro bos sbyang ste rtog tshogs lhar bsgom pa'o// tshogs kyi drung du// zan skal gtad la yi dam gyi lha gang la mos pa ngo bstan/ te ngo shar lho nub byang gang nas blangs pa

de'i rigs kyi dam rdzas yin pas lha ngo bstan pa'i cho ga yang bya'o// slob mar shes pa chas su gzhug/ pa de bdud rtsi byug khar blugs la phrin las bzhi'i bros sbyangs dkyil 'khor du bcug pas ngan song du mi 'gro ba'i dbang bskur yi dam lha'i thugs kar 'phangs yang

na rig pa 'og min gnas su lam bstan pa'i cho ga bya'o// bros sbyangs dkyil 'khor dbang bskur bya// rU tra dgra bgegs bkug la bstim/ bam bkrod pa'i dus su ro'i lha gshegs la 'dul byed he ru kar gnas bsgyur/ dgra bgegs bkug la ro la bstim/ 'khor los gti

mug mgo nas bkrod/ rdo rjes zhe sdang snying/ pad+mas 'dod chags kha nas/ rin chen nga rgyal lte ba nas/ phrag dog ral gris gsang gnas nas bkro ste bri la gzugs bris bkro bar bya// lha gshegs mtshon chas gnas nas bkro// lha ru shes pa dkyil 'khor

du/ dkyil 'khor zhi ba dang sbyar na zhi ba'i rdul tshon dkyil 'khor bris la rdzas dgod pa ni// rdo rje snying rdo rje sems dpa' nam mkha'i khams so/ la mkhal mkhal ma chu ste lus 'chus pa bsrung ba rnam snang bde gshegs so/ ma gshegs// rin chen mtsher pa sa

rin 'byung pad+ma mchin/ pa me 'od dpag med// glo ba rlung don grub las kyi rigs te rigs rnams ni// dkyil 'khor dag tu dbang po rnams sems dpa' sems ma'i dam rdzas su/ dgod pa bya// ril bu bsgrub pa'i dus na rdzas so so lhar bskyed de

sbyang bar bya'o// yang na lhar shes pa la gnyis te zhi ba la ril por bsgrub pa'i dus na rtogs tshogs lhar bsgom par bya ba dang/ bsgrub zhi ba cha gses khro/ de yang khro bo'i dus na/ snying ni badzra he ru ka ra bsgom par bya ste zla kham dbus su gzhag par bya'o/ khro bo la

cha gses/ sa mtsher pa las gau rI bskyed chu mkhal ma tsau rI me mchin pa pra mo he rlung glo ba be tA lI la bskyed phyogs bzhi khro/ ra gnas gnas su bsdoms te lus 'chus pa bsrang ba'o// rna ba g+hasma rI mig puk+ka sI sna tsaN+Da lI lce sma sha nI mtshams ma ste/ rdzas de rnams

lhar bskyed la phyi sha rnams la gtor ma byas la dbul bar bya'o// gsang ba'i dbang po yum gyi lha kro d+hI shwa rI'i skur bsgom/ !ste yang dag lha dgur bsgom par shes par bya'o// gzhan ma rnams la gtor ma byas te mchod pa 'bul lo// de ltar ro lhar bskyed nas sbyangs

pas tshe 'das kyi shes pa lha dang gnyis su med par bsgrub par bya'o// ro la dam rdzas 'byung bas na/ dam rdzas thams cad ro las gyur pa yin te/ gsang sngags la dur khrod rdzas spyod pa'i// ka pA klad por la ni dngos grub snod/ yin pa dang sangs rgyas mchod

pa'i zhal bu yin pas so// mgo bo thod pa 'og ma la// 'chi bdag gshin rje'i gzugs rang byung du yod pas na de'i kha ru zhal du bstab nas dam sri gnan/ par bya'o// bdud rtsi dri chen dri chu byang sems rgyungs pa dang khrag dang sha dang/ lnga la

mchod pa'i rdzas/ so// brla'-i rkang la// gling bus byas pa ni ma mo mkha' 'gro bod cing lag pa'i rkang la mchog gi phur pos byas pas/ ni yul dgra bgegs gnyis bsgral/ ba'i rdzas yin no// pags pa zhing gi g.yang gzhi la rak+ta'i thig le dgu byas pa ni// bla

rer dbub cing rgyus pa rkang la lcag byas pa ni/ nyu le bzlog/ sgal tshigs la dbang mo mnyes pa'i sbyin bsregs byas la// thal ba sku gdung dge bar tsha tshar gdab/ ste dge ba phyi ltar bzhengs pa'o// dge ba'i rtsa ba nang ltar bzhengs pa ni sha rnams kyis

dpal chen 'khor bcas la mchod pa bya'o// bde ba gshegs pa mchod par bya// sha khrag ru pa mchod pas rgyu bsod nams kyi// tshogs sems nyid lhar bskyed nas gnas spar bas 'bras bu ye shes kyi tshogs gnyis rdzogs sangs rgyas thob 'gyur/ de

yan chad rdo rje bam bsgrub pa'i cho ga bstan no// bcom ldan steng gi gnas mchog na/ 'og min gnas na bzhugs nas// nyon mongs 'khor ba'i sems can rnams/ byang chub sangs rgyas sa la 'god mdzad pa'i// sgrol ba gnas kyi// ting nge 'dzin

la snyoms par zhugs nas// thugs dam sems can tshe zad pa ngan song gsum nas 'don par mdzad pa'i/ phrin las 'di gsungs so// phun sum tshogs pa bzhir ldan nas// dang po phun sum tshogs pa bzhis sgrub pa'i gzhi bzung ba ni/ ston

pa mkhyen pa phun sum tshogs pa ni chos 'di shes pa dang/ 'khor phun sum tshogs pa 'di'i las la mkhas pa dang/ yo byad phun sum tshogs pa rdzas rnams tshang ba dang/ dus phun sum tshogs pa shi nas zhag gsum las ma lon pa dang/ de bzhi dang ldan pa'o// dang por

brtags pa'i gnas chen du// blang sbyang byin rlabs kun byas te// gnyis pa sa'i cho ga bya ba ni/ dang por sa brtag pa ni gnas dben pa'am shi ba'i gnas de nyid du/ sa snang ba mi dang/ mi snang ba sa bdag klu la bslang ba dang/ sa sbyang ba dang/ las dang bya

ba ting nge 'dzin gyis sbyang ba dang/ byin gyis brlabs pa ni 'og min gnas sam lcang lo can gyi pho brang ngam lha gnas kyi 'og min nam/ bde ba can nam pad+ma can nam gsang ba'i gnas su byin gyis brlab par bya'o// gsum pa mtshams bcad pa ni/ 'khor ba'i gnas su log

par 'dren pa bskrad pa'i phyir na/ dpal chen po las khro bo mang po'i sprul pa byung nas phyogs mtshams ma lus par khro bo bkram nas phyogs skyong bcu la sogs tshar bcad de dra ba dang ra bas bsrung ba ni/ khro bo mang po bkram nas ni// bgegs rnams rdul bzhin

brlags shing khyer/ bar byed pa ste/ srung ba'i 'khor lo mtshams bcad pa'i man ngag gis bgegs rnams tshar bcad par bya'o// sngags mkhan bya ba kun byas te// sngags mkhan gyis phyi nang gi khrus byas nas sri zhu'i mgron dang yon tan gyi mgron dang lan

chags dang snying rje'i mgron la gtor ma btang ba ste/ gsum pa// phyogs skyong bzhi pa lan chags kyi gtor ma btang ba ni/ lan chags gtang bar bya// bskang so tshangs pa nod phyir bod/ lnga pa bshags pa bya ba ni/ dam tshig nyams chags bskang ba'i phyir

na bshags pa bya// bskang gso'i cho ga bya/ dam tshig gso zhing changs pa nod// rdo rje'i gral du bod pa'i lung bya'o// dkyil 'khor bri ba ni gsum ste// dang po 'jug pa rdul tshon gyi dkyil 'khor ni/ dbus 'khor lo rtsibs brgyad gru chad sgo dang lcags rir

bcas pa bris pa khro bo lha dgu dag go/ dkyil 'khor brgya pa tshul bzhin gzhag/ gsang mtshan gri ba ni shi ba de'i yi dam lha nyid ma nor bar byas la shing la bris pa lho sgor gzung// ma nor lha ni bsnyen byas la// gsang mtshan ma shes na slob dpon gyi spyi bo rnam snang

bsgom/ mgrin par snang mtha'/ snying gar mi bskyod pa lte bar rin 'byung gsang bar don grub bsgoms la de la bsnyen pa zhag gsum bya/ yang na brgya rtsa brgyad byas pa der ro bdag gis me tog 'phangs la// shi ba der bsgoms la me tog gang la phog pa lha'i gsang mtshan bris
