la dkyil 'khor du dgod do// cha med sangs rgyas kun zhus nas// 'phangs la bsgom gtor gang phog bri// bum pa byin rlabs bum pa kun tu bzang mor byin rlabs/ rdzas lhar bsgom/ bum rdzas dang rgyan gyis brgyan no/ bzang mos

brgyan// rdzas la dbye ba'i lha gnyis gcig/ las kyi bya bas bskyed cing dgod// dung phor ram ka pA lar rdzas dri chab blugs la ye shes lha'i sngags mjug la ngan song gsum sbyong ba'i las sngags btags te bzlas/ khro bos tshe 'das dgug/ zhi ba bum

pa'i lhas sgrib pa sbyong bar bsams te/ bum par chu blugs pas lha gnyis don gcig par bya zhing bum pa lhar bskyed cing dkyil 'khor du dgod do// 'og min gyi gnas sangs rgyas zhi ba'i sku mthong bar bya ba'i phyir na dkyil 'khor gyi rgyan mda'i rwa ba'i steng du ras bris bre ba

ni// mthong phyir rgyan du bre ba ni// las la zhi ba'i dkyil 'khor bris lha'i sngags gnas gnas su bkod la gzugs brnyan rdul tshon gyi steng nas kha thur du sbub la dgab bo// ri mo bris pa'i gzhal med khang// dar gyi lding bu la sogs bri// gnas

spar ba chos sku'i dkyil 'khor dar la yi ge a bris la zhi ba'i dkyil 'khor steng du lding bur gdung la 'phyang du bzhug go/ ting nge'i dkyil 'khor// gsal bar rdzogs pa dang byin phab la rdzas rnams la ye shes kyi byin brlab/ bstim mchod la/ rdzas dang khyad par

du byas// dam tshig dang thugs rjes ye shes kyi lha bkug la dam tshig lha'i sgrib pa dral ye shes lha bstim/ pa la dam tshig pa dang ye shes pa gnyis su med par bsgrub par bya'o// de nas rdul tshon dang khro bo/ bsgrub pa dang mchod pa dang 'phags pa'i

tshogs// lung bzhin las rnams mthar phyin bya// las kyi bum chu bsgrub pa dang chos sku a'i lding bu blta bas bsgrub pa bya sngags kyi stong tshig mchod pa dang 'phags pa'i tshogs mchod pa lung 'di'i yan man nas 'byung ba ltar mthar phyin par bya'o// sku/ bsgom

pa dang ngag dbyangs dang mchod pa dang bstod bskul nas ni/ gyi thun par rnams su tshe 'das de lam// rgyud lnga'i lam nas 'khyams pa de khro bos/ btsal sprul pas drag tu dgug/ ste mngal na gnas na dral nas yong/ sgo nga na gnas na bcag nas yang

bar do nas drang bar bya'o// de nas rgyal ba'i// sras su gyur par lam yang nas yang du bstan yang dang yang// rgyud drug lam nas rigs drug gi dkyil 'khor lhor bris la rigs drug nas pho nyas drag tu dgug drag por dgug/ gsal bas thugs

rje'i sems la gzud/ gshin gyi lus su gsal bar byas la ye shes lha'i thugs rjes sems nyid mtshan byang la gzud do// lta bas bsgral du med lung dpog/ lta bas thag bcad pa ni sems nyid skye shi med pas yang dag par bsgral du med

par blta bas lung dbog go/ sangs rgyas/ gang yin yi dam lha'i sras su lung gsang mtshan gis bskyed// ting nge 'dzin gyi lha de rang gis bsgral bar byas la// tsit+ta la ni lhan ne bos// bsgral ba'i snying la lha de nyid bstim pa yi dam lha dang gnyis su med par

byas la// rang nyid khro bo'i phyag tu/ thabs dang shes rab kyi mda' gzhu thogs la snying gi sras su bskyed pa'i lha mde'u'i rtses blangs la/ ma gos pa'i// gru gsum rnam thar sgo gsum du gzhug pa de blangs te cho ga dang sngags dang phyag rgyas 'og min du 'phang ngo/ pas ni

bsgral bar bya// lung bcas sngags dang phyag rgya yi/ sems nyid sangs rgyas ky-i sras de 'og min du rdo rje sems dpa'/ yab yum sbyor ba'i sras su 'phangs la btang ngo/ gnas su phaT kyis 'phang// bo b+hi tsit+ta la sogs dbang// gral

bkod longs spyod smon lam bskul// sras de yang slar mtshan byang la phab nas/ gsang ba byang chub sems kyi dbang bskur la gsang sngags rdo rje'i gral du bkod la tshogs kyi longs spyod drangs la sgrub pa byed cing sems don mdzad par smon lam gdab/ 'gro don la

bskul bar bya'o// sbyin bsreg bya ba'i dgos pa// las kyi bag chags gtan sbyang phyir// ye shes kyi me dpung 'bar ba'i ting 'dzin la// tshad med bzhi'i thugs rje'i sangs rgyas kyi sku bzhugs nas// rang byung ye shes kyi me yis nyon

mongs pa'i bag chags bsreg mdzad phyir/ na sbyin bsreg bya ba ste// mtha' dbus med pa'i dkyil 'khor ni chos kyis dbyings nyid gru gsum zla kham mu khyud 'khor lo rtsibs brgyad pa gru chad sgo dang bcas pa'o/ gzhal yas khang// rim pa'i snod dang

dkyil 'khor gyi rgyan dang ral gri rnon po dang rgyal mtshan bre/ dang ba dan dang mda' dang dar la sogs pas/ dkyil 'khor ni sgrib pa gcod pa'i 'khor lo rtsibs brgyad nang/ du// zhal nyid hom khung 'bar ba ru/ lte ba gru

gsum brus pa nyid khro bo'i bsreg khang na/ sbyin sreg gi yam shing spungs pa nyid// lha rnams yam shing nyid du spungs/ mchod rdzas// dngos dang tshogs kyi yo byad mchod pa 'bul ba'i phyir dgram// 'khor ba'i// bshal thag byed pa yi bgegs rnams

stangs stabs kyis mtshams/ gcad par bya ba dang// mchod rdzas dang dkyil 'khor rgyan bkod pa rnams byin gyis brlabs te/ sreg khang gzhal yas khang du// rdzogs pa'i byas la lung gis bskul te lha bskyed pa dang yam shing lhar bskyed la yam shing

yang yang bsnan byas la// mchod rdzas dang bsreg rdzas lho nyid du 'bul ba'am/ tshe 'das dngos gyi lha la 'bul bar bsams la/ de/ mthun pa'i lha tshe 'das kyi yi dam gang yin pa'i lha'i dkyil 'khor la bkram ste dbul bar byas nas/ da ni

las kyi rim pa sbyin bsreg bya ba ni// ting 'dzin bskyed pa'i rim bzhin bskyed pa dang/ phrin// las la 'jug pa'i tshul ni snga ma gong du sgrol ba'i cho ga bzhin/ me long la mtshan byang/ khrus byas yang na dngos su bya/ yang na lha la me laung la sku khrus
gsol mtshan byang dngos su bskyed las dang sbyar ba'i/ dbang bskur smon btab nas/ de nas/ dur khrod kyi shing las byas pa'i yam shing me spar te/ bsreg rdzas rnams la bar chad 'byung bas na'am

yang na// las kyi sgrib pa ngan pas bar du gcod pa'am bgegs la yang mtshams bcad la// bsreg khang gi lha dang gsal gdab pa rdzogs par bya rang bzhin pa spyan drangs bstim la sogs/ dkyil 'khor gyi lha tshogs brtan pa gal che'o// mchod rdzas

bum ril du/ cig car bar bsreg khang du bzhag la 'bul lugs/ rim gyis mchod pa ni/ gnyis 'bul lo// lha so so'i bsreg rdzas la mtshan byang du bris la 'bul ba'o// bsregs rdzas dang ming byang bris la dbul te// so so'i tha dad pa lung mthun rdzas gang

'byor pas rnams 'bul// rdzas kyis sgrib gcod nyung dkar gyis sgrib pa rgyun bcad/ lha so so'i sngags kyis sgrib pa bcad/ lha so so'i zhabs drung du skye ba'i smon lam gdab/ par bya'o// de yan chad gzhung don no// tshogs mchod byas la tshogs zan gshin

la zas skal du/ gtad pa'i phyir na rdo rje'i gral du bod gdung/ ba ni/ lung a nu'i// lam 'phar nas thar pa'i phyir na rdzogs pa chen po'i tshig gis bskul nas mthar chos sku skye ba med cing dri ma med pa la phyin par smon lam btab phyung la// lhag ma

gtor ma cha gsum la cha gcig la bshags sbyang ba bya cha gcig smon lam gdab cing gter du sba/ dmod bcol cha gcig mkha' 'gros bskyang// gtang rag gsol zhing mi zad pa'i gter la longs spyod pa'i phyir/ gter du sba/ sems can kyi don du/

bsod nams spel smon lam gdab cing slob ma rnams kyi tshe byin bsrung/ dam tshig gi// dkyil 'khor bsdu zhing ru lu'i brtag pa ltar lus bsrung go bgo/ sems can thams cad kyi don du// las kyi 'bras bu bla na med pa'i byang chub bsngo ba

bya// dus gnas bar pa'i gang zag dang bdag dang slob ma rnams gsum du mi 'bral bar 'grogs pa'i smon lam gdab/ de ltar du// gdung dang rdzas rtags bsdus nas kyang// rus pa dang thal ba brtags la/ gdung byung na// rgyal mtshan gyi

rtser mo btags la mchod pa dang bstod la// rus pa'am thal ba la/ tsha tsha btab la lha'i sku phyag rgya byas la 'gro don bskul/ bar bya'o// zhes gsungs so// dpal khrag 'thung chen po'i gal po las bsgral bar bya ba'i brtag

pa ste bcu gsum pa'o//// de nas bcom ldan 'das longs spyod chen pos// 'khor 'das kyi chos ma lus pa la longs spyod pas na'o// rgyal po sbyin pa'i rgyal srid la longs spyod pa'i ting nge 'dzin la zhugs nas

rim par bgrod pa 'di gsungs so// dper na rgyal po rgyal sar bton nas rgyal srid la gnyer gtad pas rin po che sna bdun la longs spyod pa ltar slob ma yang bla mas gdan sar 'don par dbang bskur ba mnga' gsol lo// spyir dbang la bskur lugs gnyis te

bsgrub dbang dang bskur ba dang/ dbang gzhu ba'o/ dang po ni/ bla ma dang mched kun gyis bsgrubs nas grub pa'i nub tha ma la dbang bskur ba dang dngos grub lain pa'o// gnyis pa ni zhag gsum ste/ dang pos cho ga bar ma lta gon tha ma dbang bskur ro// rtogs pa'i blo can

de dag gis// bla ma mnyes par bya ba'i don du/ shes rab kyis mnyes te// rtogs pa'i blo chai dang ldan pas bla na med pa'i byang chub sems la dang ba bskyed par 'gyur ba'o// dais dbang thams cad kyi gzhi ma lta bur gyur pas dang por gces pa yin

no// 'bring gis ni rang gi srog bla ma la phul nas bla ma'i bya ba ma lus par byas nas/ tha mar rin ci rigs pas blus nas 'bul ba'o// tha ma rdzas kyis mnyes te bla ma la rdzas kyi rnam pa lci ba rin po che dang yang ba rin po che la sogs te/ rta dang glang po la sogs pa'o// srog

lus man chad rdzas kyi rnam// der yang ma zad ste rang gi rgyal srid dang/ bu dang chung ma nor gyi rgyan dang/ nor gyi dbyig rang la gces pa dang/ bla ma'i thugs dang 'thad pa rnams dbul ba'o// bla ma mnyes par bya phyir dbul// de ltar bla ma de yang rab shes

rab kyis mnyes par bya ste/ shes rab che na chos ma lus pa shes pas/ sems can ma lus pa'i bla mar 'gyur pas shes rab gtso che ba dang/ 'bring rang lus kyi mnyes par bya ste bla ma'i bya ba ma lus par 'grub par bya ba dang/ tha ma nor rdzas kyis mnyes te rang la gces pa dang/

bla ma'i thugs dang 'thad pa rnams dbul lo// dngos grub 'dod par gsol ba gdab// dngos grub thams cad kyi rtsa ba dbang bskur yin pas dbang zhu ba yang chos sgo dbang gis 'byed pa yin la/ dbang sgo yon gyis 'byed pa yin pas yon phul rang dbang gang

'dod pa de la gsol ba gdab bo// shar nas rdo rje shugs kyis 'degs// dang por rnal 'byor dbang phyug 'jug/ dpal dang ldan pa'i b+han+d+ha mchog/ rang bzhin gsang ba'i lcang lo can// bdud rtsis bkang ba tshe mchog
ste// thams cad dbang gi rang bzhin la// bdag nyid dbus su 'dug nas ni// rang byung ye shes lha rnams la// sku gsung thugs kyi dngos grub mchog/ phyi ma'i dus la mi gzhes par// da lta nyid du bdag la
stsol// dkyil 'khor yi dam lha mchod nas// sku gsung thugs kyi dngos grub stsol// de nas slob mar gsol ba gdab// dur khrod gsang ba mchog gi dkyil 'khor du// bang rim gsum pa dag la stegs

bcas shing// zla kham dmar po'i steng du dbang nod ma// mar me dgug pa dag gis mdangs phyung nas// b+han+d+ha mtshan ldan dag la tha tshig bsgo// sku gsung thugs kyi dngos grub rab 'byams rnams// bdag
cag sgrub mchog rnams la stsal du gsol/ zhes brjod gar gyi bro yis bskor// dur khrod gsang ba mchog gi bdag po ni// ye shes sku mchog rdzogs pa'i dkyil 'khor la// rig pa byang chub sems kyi me tog
'di// gnyis med rig pa'i dbyings su thim nas kyang// bdag lus bem po dus 'dir sbyang ba dang// dpal chen skur gyur dngos grub stsal du gsol// dur khrod gsang ba mchog gi dkyil 'khor du// dur

khrod rdzas kyi me tog bor nas kyang// skal ldan rnal 'byor 'di ru 'dus pa la// sku gsung thugs kyi dngos grub stsal du gsol// bka' gsang rmad du byung ba'i dkyil 'khor 'dir// dur khrod rdzas ky-i me tog
'di dor bas// sngon tshe bsgrubs pa'i lha ni gang yin pa'i// sku gsung thugs kyi dngos grub stsal du gsol// dur khrod gsang ba mchog gi dkyil 'khor du// byang chub rdo rje'i lam nas drangs nas

kyang// gzhung bzhin bsgrub pa'i rnal 'byor khyed rnams la// sku gsung thugs kyi dngos grub sbyin par bya// zhes brjod dbang rim steng du bzhag/ dang po dkyil 'khor bya ba bstan no// de yang bla ma dbus su bzhugs la slob ma

phyogs phyogs nas phyogs bzhir 'dug nas phyaugs rdzas su dbang bskur bar bya'o// dbus su byang sems maN+Dal bya// shar du dri chen maN+Dal zlum// lho ru sha chen gru bzhi nyid// nub tu rak+ta zla kham la// byang du dri chu gru gsum

bya// slob dpon de yang slob dpon nyid bal gyi 'bol stan nam/ nyi zla pad+ma 'am/ gzungs ma mtshan ldan la bzhugs pa'o// dgos pa ni/ stan bde na lus bde des sems bde/ des na sgo gsum gyi grub pa'i mtha' gcig pa'o/ ji bzhin stan bder gnas// kr-i

ya bas phyag na rdo rje'i tshul du dbang bskur ba dang/ yo ga bas 'khor los sgyur ba'i tshul du dbang bskur ba dang// gsang sngags nang pa thabs kyi rdo rje theg pa rdo rje'i tshul du dbang bskur ba dang gsum las 'di ni phyi ma'o// rdo rje'i tshul du dbang dag

sbyin// chos dbyings yum gyi bum pa na/ rdzas bum pa/ lha sangs rgyas kun 'od du zhu ba/ bskur gnas dbu'i steng/ bstim gnas lus spyir bstim/ nus pa bag chags la 'dus pa 'khru bar byaid do// rgyal ba'i dkyil 'khor pho brang bzhugs// gnyis

med byang chub sems brtags chus// spyi nas bstim zhing dbang bskur bas// lus la sangs rgyas gtams par shog/ ka la sha a b+hi Shiny+tsa a// sangs rgyas kun gyi rin chen tshe/ rdzas dbu rgyan/ bskur gnas mgo// bstim

gnas kun gzhi/ nus pa rigs lnga dang ye shes lnga'o// dpag tu med pa'i 'od dang ldan// rigs mchog phyag rgya lnga ldan pas/ khams gsum bdag por dbang bskur ro// oM rat+na mu ku Ta a b+hi Shiny+tsa swa maM trAM trAM trAM/ rdzas dbu rgyan

dang bskur gnas dbu rgyan la dar sna lnga'i cod pan bcings nas dbul/ bstim gnas kun gzhi nus pa ye shes lnga'o// dbu rgyan mi 'gyur mnga' brnyes pas// chos kyi rgyal srid chen po'i dbang/ khams gsum kun gyi dbang phyug che// chos

kyi rgyal por dbang bskur ro// oM sarba ta thA ga ta ma hA gu h+ya rat+na mu ku Ta a b+hi She ka hU~M/ rdo rje dril bu rig pa 'dzin/ rdzas rdo rje dril bu/ skur gnas lag pa/ lha med de dbyings ye shes kyi phyag mtshan gyi dbang/ nus pa dbyings ye shes rtogs
pa'o// dbyings dang ye shes gnyis med pas// thugs mchog rtogs pa'i rig pa'i dbang// mya ngan 'das pa'i chos la spyod// thabs la mkhas pas sprul pa'i sras// tshogs gnyis rdzogs par dbang bskur

ro// nyon mongs 'joms pa'i rdo rje dang/ rdzas rdo rje dril bu gong ma nyid gnas lag pa g.yas g.yon nam rdo rje ltag khung/ dril bu rna ltag g.yon du bzur/ rdo rje snang ba mtha' yas/ dril bu don grub bo// rig pa'i dbang lnga ni/ bum pa mi bskyod pa/ cod pan rin 'byung/ rdo

rje snang mtha'/ dril bu don grub/ mig rnam snang ngo// chos sgra sgrogs pa'i dril bu yis// de ring khyed la dbang bskur bas// thabs dang shes rabs 'brel bar shog/ oM pra dz+nyA sa ma yo ga badzra sid+d+hi g+haN+De a b+hi

Shiny+tsa hU~M a/ sku gsung thugs byin gyis rlabs pa'i dbang bstan/ rdzas oM AHhU~M bris pa/ lha rnam snang mtha' mi bskyod pa gnas spyi mgrin snying ga bstim gnas lus ngag yid la/ nus pa sku gsung thugs rdo rje ltar mi zad rgyan gyi 'khor lor gyur to// dpal ldan rdo rjes sku

'chang ba// rdo rje mi phyed gsum bsgoms pas// deng bdag byin gyis brlabs nas su// rdo rje'i sku ru mdzad du gsol// A+oM kA ya badzra a b+hi Shiny+tsa mAM/ dpal ldan rdo rje gsung 'chang ba// rdo rje mi phyed gsum

bsgoms pas// deng bdag byin gyis brlabs nas su// rdo rje'i gsung du mdzad du gsol// A+oM bA ka badzra a b+hi Shiny+tsa AH dpal ldan rdo rje thugs 'chang ba// rdo rje mi phyed gsum bsgoms pas// deng bdag byin

gyis brlabs nas su// rdo rje'i thugs su mdzad du gsol// A+oM tsit+ta badzra a b+hi Shiny+tsa hU~M/ phyogs bcur bzhugs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams// sku gsum mi phyed gsum bsgoms pas// deng bdag byin gyis brlabs

nas su// sku gsung thugs su mdzad du gsol// bai ro tsa na A+oM/ a mi de ba hrIH badzra sa twa hU~M/ 'di ni rin chen phreng ba ste// rdzas nas kyi phreng ba/ lha badzra he ru ka/ gnas mgo/ bstim pa kun gzhi/ mtshungs ldan a ba d+hU tI'i rtsa mdud/ nus

pa gzungs dang ting nge 'dzin// rin chen rgyu las byas pa yi// byang chub yan lag phreng ba ste// 'phags mchod 'gro don byed pa la// bsam pa yid bzhin sgrub pa dang// bar chad med par dbang bskur ro// A+oM badzra rat+na

mA la a b+hi Shiny+tsa a/ mtshan ma'i spros bral b+han+d+ha'i rdzas mchog 'di// rdzas b+han+d+ha dpal chen po 'khor dang bcas pa/ gnas lus la lha bkod pa'i dus su// bstim gnas rnam shes tshogs brgyad/ nus pa'i mthu sangs rgyas kun gyi sku sung thugs dbyer med

par thob// sngon gyi skyes mchog bsgrub pa'i rdzas mchog 'di// skal ldan rnam 'byor 'di la dbang bskur bas// dpal chen sku gsung dngos grub thob par shog/ oM badzra shrI he ru ka/ badzra kro d+hI shwa rI s+t+waM/ badzra ka pA

la/ d+harma kA ya/ nirma Na kA ya/ sam b+ho gA kA ya/ a b+hi Shiny+tsa a/ bag chags nyes pa'i skyon bral zhing// 'khor ba'i nyes pas mi gos pa'i/ rdzas dar dmar po dang mthing ga/ gnas mgo/ mtshungs ldan la la nA dang ra sa nA/ lha rdo rje

sems dpa' dang snang mtha'/ bstim gnas kun gzhi/ nus pa chos kyi rgyal srid thob pa'o// ye shes lnga ldan cod pan 'di/ khyod la dbang mchog bskur bar bya// oM badzra ga phaT laM ba na a b+hi Shiny+tsa hrIH rdzas dri chen bu ram la ru lu byas pa/

bskur gnas skye/ lha rnam snang du rab gnas byas pa/ bstim gnas gzugs/ nus pa chos kyi dbyings so/ bde bar gshegs pa'i sgrub rdzas dri chen 'dis// skal ldan sgrub pa po la dbang bskur bas// chos kyi dbyings kyi ye shes rtogs

gyur nas// de bzhin rigs kyi dngos grub 'thob gyur cig/ rdzas byang sems bag phye dang ril bu byas pa/ bskur gnas lce/ lha rdo rje sems dpa'/ bstim gnas khams gsum gsal byed rnam shes la/ nus pa me long ye shes so/ skye

med byang chub sems kyi rang bzhin 'di// dkar la dag pas gnyis med byang chub sems/ skal ldan rnal 'byor 'di la dbang bskur bas// rdo rje rigs kyi dngos grub 'thob par 'gyur// rdzas sha chen ka ra dang sbyar

nas btags pa 'am/ sgog pa dang bca' lga dang sbyar nas ril bu byas pa/ bskur gnas lce/ bstim gnas lus kyi tshor ba/ lha rin 'byung nus pa mnyam pa nyid kyi ye shes so// ma rig khams gsum 'khor ba'i sems can rnams// dug gsum bsgral

ba'i rdzas mchog sha chen 'di// skal ldan rnal 'byor 'di la dbang bskur bas// rin chen rigs kyi dngos grub 'thob gyur cig/ gsung mchog dbang gi rdzas mchog rak+ta 'di// rdzas pad+ma rak+ta star bu bag phye dang bsres

pa/ gnas lce/ bstim gnas 'du shes/ lha 'od dpag med/ ye shes so so brtog pa'o// chags med bde bar byed pa'i rang bzhin gyis// skal ldan rnal 'byor 'di la dbang bskur bas// pad+ma rigs kyi dngos grub 'thob gyur

cig/ rdzas dri chu shing tsha dang ri lu byas pa bskur gnas lce la/ lha don grub/ bstim gnas 'du byed/ nus pa bya ba grub pa'i ye shes rtogs so// las mchog bsgrub pa'i dam rdzas bdud rtsi 'di// phyi nang gsos gyur bdud rtsi'i rang bzhin

'dis// skal ldan rnal 'byor 'di la dbang bskur bas// las kyi rigs kyi dngos grub 'thob par 'gyur// oM sarba pany+tsa a mr-i ta a b+hi Shiny+tsa mAM/ rdzas kha T+wAM ga la thod pa'i Ta ma ru btags nas sam/ gnas g.yas su kha T+wAM ga g.yon

du dril bu/ bstim gnas lag pa/ don thabs shes gnyis su med par bstun nus so/ kha T+wAM ga ni thabs kyi sku// shes rab DA ma ru yi sgra// thabs dang shes rab dbang bskur bas// stong nyid snying rje'i dbang thob shog/ oM d+hA tu ga ru

Na a b+hi Shiny+tsa mAM/ rdzas gtso bo'i mar me/ bskur gnas thugs/ bstim gnas kun gzhi/ mtshungs ldan snying la yod// ye shes dgur byin brlab/ nus pa ye shes dgu'i snang ba 'char ro// dpal chen yab yum gsang ba'i thugs bsdus pa// skye med
dbyings las ye shes me gsal bas// sku gsung lhun rdzogs dag pa'i mar me 'di// kun gzhi gnas 'gyur spyan dgu'i ye shes sbyin// lus ngag yid la gnas pa'i bag chags rnams// sgrib pa phyir bsal ye

shes gsal bar shog/ A+oM ma hA dI pa A lo ke A b+hi Shiny+tsa hU~M// bdud rtsi 'khyil pa'i ra sA rdzas bum pa yin te bdud rtsi'i bum pa/ bskur gnas mgo// bstim gnas lus kyi khams bdud rtsi lnga/ lha rigs lnga/ nus mthu khams bdud rtsi lnga sangs rgyas

lngar ston cing 'char ro/ ya na ni// srid gsum dbang sdud longs spyod chen po'i rkyen// rang byung dag pa'i sgrub rdzas bdud rtsi lnga// rgyud lnga rtsad gcod skye shi med pa'i dbang// grub nas ye shes lnga yi rang bzhin

'dis// rigs mchog rgyal ba lnga ru dbang bskur sbyin// oM AHhU~M swA hA sarba pany+tsa a mr-i ta A be sha ku ru a d+hiSh+Tha swa maM/ thugs rje'i ngang nyid zhi ba'i rang bzhin las// rdzas phul ba/ bskur gnas pa dang/ lha

sprul pa'i khro chung/ bstim gnas rig pa/ mtshungs ldan rang gi lus la rkang phur yod pa rnams/ nus pa dgra bgegs 'joms pa'o// ma g.yos chos kyi sku mchog sku gsung thugs mnga' ba// sdug bsngal log par 'khyams pa'i sems can

rnams// thugs rje mi phyed dbyings su sgrol mdzad pa// bar chad byed pa'i bgegs chen bshig pa'i phyir/ khro rgyal 'bar ba'i byin rlabs dbang bskur ro// oM badzra kI la ya d+ha rod b+ha ba a d+hiSh+Tha na hU~M/ khro rgyal

yab yum gsang ba'i thugs ka nas/ rdzas nyung dkar/ bskur gnas mgul du nyung dkar gyi thum pa gdags/ lha sprul pa mang po sprul/ bstim gnas ba spu'i bu gar bstim/ nus pa go cha ste bgegs dang log 'dren gyis mi tshugs par 'gyur ro// thal byed sar+Sha
pa yi mtshan char ldan// bar chad bgegs kyi tshogs 'joms sgrub rdzas 'di// dbang bskur bsrungs bas mi tshugs go char ldan// nyung dkar rgyal pos byin rlabs sha rI ram// skal ldan rnal 'byor 'di la

dbang bskur sbyin// A+oM a sbUd ta sar+Sha pa a b+hi Shiny+tsa ku ru rak+Sha haM// rdzas ro bsreg pa'i thal chen/ rgyan gyi dbang yin pas lha med/ byin rlabs chos sku'i dgongs pa bya/ gnas dpral bar thal chen gyi tshom bu gsum gdab/ nus pas ging chen bco brgyad bran

du 'khol nus so// lhag pa'i thal chen mtshan ma 'di// he ru ka yi gnas bcu dang// dur khrod chen po'i gnas brgyad du// ging chen kun dang gcig pa dang// rdzu 'phrul chen po bskyed pa dang// dbang chen thabs

kyis bsdu ba'i phyir// 'di ni bdag nyid chen po'i rtags// 'di ni sngaun gyi dam tshig ste// grub pa'i dam rdzas chen po'i dbang// rtags kyi dbang rdzas chen po sbyin// oM hU~M b+ha smi sid+d+hi a b+hi Shiny+tsa ku ru hU~M// rdzas rak+ta

byin brlabs thugs rje chags par byin rlabs/ gnas sna rtse dang mkhur tshos gny-is su thig le bya/ nus pa ma mo mkha' 'gro thams cad dbang du sdud par nus so// thugs rje'i dbang gis chags pa'i rak+ta ni// pad+ma rak+ta dpa' mo rnal 'byor

ma'i// dur khrod mnga' mdzad ma dang mkha' 'gro rnams// ma lus dbang du sdud pa'i dbang thob shog/ oM DA ki ni ma hA rak+ta a b+hi Shiny+tsa mUM hU~M b+h+yo/ kun rdzob snang ba don dam bcud kyis khyab// rdzas mi'i zhag chen// byin

rlabs don dam skye med du byin gyis brlab// gnas khang 'gram/ nus pa don dam gyi chur rtogs so// bcud len zhag gis nyon mongs tha ba 'dul// rtogs tshad 'bul ba'i lang+ka kun dang gcig/ chos nyid dbyings la gnas pa'i

dbang thob shog/ oM d+harma d+hA tu gar+b+he ma hA mAM sa a b+hi Shiny+tsa a/ dbyings las ye shes sgrogs byad gab pa'i gsung// rdzas rngu'u chung/ bskur gnas lag pa byin brlabs dbyings las rigs pa'i sgra 'byung bar byin gyis brlab/ nus pa ma mo dang

dbang mo dbang du byed cing bdud dang mu stegs kyi bar chod zil gyis gnon cing klad pa tshal bar 'gems so// dam la sdud cing pha rol zil gyis gnon// ye shes dbyings su sgrol mdzad mchod pa'i gter// skal ldan rnal

'byor 'di la dbang bskur sbyin// oM ka pa lA g+haM De hoHa b+hi Shiny+tsa a/ 'jig rten 'di na srid pa'i zhal zas la// rdzas 'jig rten gyi zhal zas tshogs tshad// gnas lce la/ bstim gnas ngag la/ nus pa 'jig rten gyi zhal zas gang la gsol

yang byin rlabs dang ldan par 'gyur ro// 'dod pa'i yon tan rnam lnga mi zad gter// dus gsum bde bar gshegs pa thams cad kyi// yid bzhin 'dod dgu'i gter la dbang sbyin no// oM lo ka a li u li a b+hi Shiny+tsa

mAM// rdzas ni 'jam des zhes bya ste mar/ bskur gnas lce/ bstim gnas lus kun gzhi/ nus pa rgyud la zhi gnas 'char ba'o// mar ni byang chub sems kyi rang bzhin te// skal ldan sgrub pa po la dbang bskur bas// dgra bgegs thams

cad zhi bar gyur nas kyang// byang chub sems kyi don dam rtogs par shog/ A+oM sarb-i sa a b+hi Shiny+tsa mAM/ rdzas 'ol skom/ bskur gnas lce/ bstim gnas kun gzhi/ nus pas sems can gyi don byed cing ting nge 'dzin gyi nus pa mthu dang ldan par
'gyur ro// rnal 'byor dbang phyug gal phyis dbang bskur bas/ khams gsum thams cad dbang du sdud pa dang// 'gro ba'i sems can nyon mongs gnas su 'joms/ rnal 'byor dbang phyug chen po'i mthu ldan

shog/ oM b+hak+ta a b+hi Shiny+tsa mAM// rdzas 'chang/ bskur gnas lce/ nus pa khams gsum dbang du sdud/ bstim gnas kun gzhi la bstim pa'o// 'bru bcud kun gyi dza gad dpa' bo yis// skal ldan sgrub pa po la dbang bskur bas// 'gro

ba thams cad dbang du sdud pa dang// thams cad bran bzhin dbang du sdud par shog/ A+oM ma hA su ra a b+hi Shiny+tsa mAM/ khams gsum dbang sdud zla khram dbang gi zas// rdzas zla khram/ bskur gnas lce/ nus pa khams gsum ma

lus pa dbang du sdud par nus so// yang na rdzas zla khram/ bskur gnas ngag la/ bstim gnas mgul/ nus pa khams gsum gyi ma mo dbang du sdud pa'o// skal ldan sgrub pa po la dbang bskur bas// bsod nams ye shes tshogs chen gnyis rdzogs

te/ longs spyod chen po'i rten du 'gyur bar shog/ A+oM ki lA Da a b+hi Shiny+tsa mAM// rdzas gzugs sgra dri ro reg bya/ lha 'dod yon lha mo rnams/ bstim gnas dbang po lnga/ bskur gnas lag pa la sogs pa/ nus pa 'dod yon lnga la ma rmongs par 'char

ro// gzugs sogs bud med lha mo'i tshogs// 'dod pa lnga yi yon tan dag/ chos nyid dbyings kyi rgyan yin pas// dga' mgur spyod pa'i dbang bskur ro// na mo ha ra na gu Na pany+tsa a b+hi Shiny+tsa a/ skye shi med pa

rdo rje tshe yi dbang/ rdzas tshe zan/ bskur gnas mgo// stim gnas snying/ lha tshe dpag med pa gsang ba'i yum bzhis bskor ba/ bsnyen pa dang rab gnas lha de rnams zhu ba'o// nus pa tshe ring bar 'gyur ba'o// skal ldan sgrub pa po la dbang bskur bas// tshe
ring nad med phun sum tshogs nas kyang// dus gsum rgyal ba kun kyang 'dis// sku gsung thugs kyi 'khor lo sbyin// de nyid rdo rje lta bu'i ye shes sku// skye shi 'khor ba'i sdug bsngal bral bar

shog/ A+oM badzra A yu She a b+hi Shiny+tsa trAM/ de nas gzungs ma mtshan ldan te// yum skye ba dag pa rang rgyud kyi rigs bzang ba la skye 'bras legs pa dang/ spyod pas dag pa chos shes shing dbang thob nas rtsa rlung 'byongs pa/ shugs kyis yab rdo rje slob dpon

yang thabs lam gyi man ngag la mkhas pa ste/ gnas pa rtsa dang/ grub pa sngags dang khams bdud rtsi dang snying po rlung gi gdams ngag la mkhas par 'gyur ba des ni/ slob ma la dbang bskur na slob ma gsang dbang la dad pa'am/ shes rab kyi ye shes kyi dbang la dad pa/ bde ba

chen po'i dbang la mos pa/ gang yin pa de la slob ma dbang ji ltar 'dod pa ltar sbyar bar bya'o// rdo rje slob dpon chen po yi// g.yon phyogs gnas la tshul bzhin du// gsang dbang shes rab bde chen po// ji ltar 'dod pa bzhin du

sbyar// de bIr byin gyis brlab pa yang// gar mkhan tshul 'dra sgyu ma'i rgya// dper na gar mkhan gyi lus gcig la gar sna tshogs byed pa'am/ rgyu ma mkhan gyis rde'u dang shing bu la rta glang du sprul pa dang 'dra bar// yum lnga gnas lngar gsal ba

yang// de la 'ja' tshon bzhin du gsal// yum gyi spyi bor sangs rgyas spyan/ mgrin par gos dkar mo// snying gar dbyings phyug ma/ ltai bar mA ma kI/ gsang bar sgraul ma lnga bsams la rgyu de rnams nam mkha'i 'ja' ltar gsal bar bsgom mo/ kha dog ma 'dres

par yang gsal lo// de bzhin du shugs kyis yab kyi gnas lngar yang rigs lnga'i yab lnga bsgom par bya'o// yab yum rol pa'i byang chub sems// des na bla ma dang yab yum gnyis sbyor ba bya/ yum gyi rigs lnga dang yab kyi rigs lnga yang sbyar bar bya'o// 'dod

chags ye shes gsal ba'i phyir// yab yum sbyor ba byas pa'i byang sems kyi 'dod chags kyi 'od kyis sems can tshim par byas/ sangs rgyas mchod nas/ rigs lnga ye shes kyi sku gsal bar spyan drangs la// 'bar ba sna tshogs 'khrigs pa'i 'od// rigs

lnga mdun gyi nam mkha' la yab yum sbyor ba mdzad pas bya chub 'od 'bar ba sna tshogs pa sprin ltar 'khrigs nas// thim pa'i rgyal mor byin gyis brlabs// bdag yab yum la thim pas bag chags sbyangs lus kyi rigs lnga yab yum 'od du zhu nas sgrib pa dag/ nam

mkha'i rigs lnga la thim pas/ yum kro d+hI shwa rI khro mo'i rgyal mor byin gyis brlab bo// yab yum bsnol mar bskul bya ba// dang po yab kyi brdas bskul/ de nas yum gyi brdas bskul bar bya ste/ 'khor gyi sbyor ba mi rig pas na gsang ba'o// ye shes dam tshig

chen po yis// yab ye shes chen po'i rang bzhin dpal gyi skur gsal ba la yum chags pa'i dam tshig las mi 'bral bar sku la 'khril ba ste// bde mchog sgyu ma'i brdas mtshon te/ !/ yab kyis sa ma ya hoH zhes brjod pas dam tshig la dgyes sam zhes brdas

mtshon/ yum gyis sa ma ya s+t+waM zhes brjod pas dam tshig dus la bab po zhes bskul nas/ rA ga yA mi/ chags pa'i bde ba 'dod dam/ rA ga hoHsa chags pa la dgyes so zhes bde mchog sgyu ma'i brdas mtshon nas/ yab kyis yum gyi b+ha ga byin brlab/ yum gyis yab kyi ling+ga byin

brlab bo// mkha' gsang bsnol mar byin rlabs pa// pad+ma rin chen ldan byas nas// yum gyi b+ha ga a las pad+ma 'dab brgyad par byin brlab pa dang/ yab kyi gsang ba rin po che lta bu 'dod pa 'byung ba'i rdo rjer byin gyis brlab

bo// sbyor ba'i byang sems babs pa ni// yab kyi spyi gtsug chos kyi dbyings na khu ba bde ba'i mchog 'byung ba de yang spyi bo bde chen nas khu ba ye shes kyi 'od du shar nas sgal tshigs kyi rta brgyud nas 'byung ba yang/ rang rig pa'i ye shes bde gsal mi rtog pa ye shes

kyi nyams dang ldan pa 'od du shar nas// dbyings kyi bde mchog 'byung ba de// rang rig ye shes de la 'od// yum gyi b+ha ga la babs pa'i dus na yang/ bde stong du gsal ba'i nyams ni stong pa nam mkha' 'dra// ji bzhin mkha' la gsal ba

dag/ dri med nyi ma'i 'od pas 'tsher/ ! gsal ba nam mkha' la nyi ma shar ba 'dra ste/ nyi ma la sprin med pa ltar 'dod chags tha mal gyi dri ma med par ye shes nyi ma'i 'od ltar 'tsher ba gsal lo// byang chub sems ni kun tu dag/ nyi ma ltar gsal bas

dri ma byang/ nam mkha' ltar stong pas zab pa chub/ sems bde stong gi rnam par gsal bas kun tu dag par gnas so// sgrib sbyang mchod don bya ba yang// yum gyi mkha' nas byang sems spro bsdu bya ba ni/ 'od 'phros pas 'dod khams gnas ris nyi shu dang/ gzugs

khams gnas rigs bcu bdun/ gzugs med skye mched mu bzhis bsdus pa'i stong gsum kun 'das par 'od kyis khyab pas/ khams gsum rab tu 'das nas kyang// ma lus stong gsum dang khams gsum srid gsum gyi sems can rnams la snying rjes khyab

byas te// 'dod par bya ba rab tu mnyes// phyogs bcu dus gsum gyi rgyal ba la 'dod chags kyi mchod pas rab tu mnyes par byas nas// 'od 'dus thog ma'i gzugs la gzud// byang chub sems kyi thig le nyid sems can gyi dga' ba dang sangs

rgyas kyi bde ba yang bsdus nas 'od 'dus te thog ma yum gyi b+ha ga'i thig le la gzud do// yum gyi b+ha ga'i thig le la phyogs bcu dus gsum gyi sangs rgyas kyi sbyor ba byas pa'i ye shes kyi khu ba'i bcud thim nas/ des slob bu la dbang bskur bar bya'o// ye shes khu ba'i

bcud thim nas// yab yum gnyis lhan cig skyes pa'i khu ba ni/ dngos po lhan cig skyes pa/ bde stong ni rang bzhin lhan cig skyes pa'i ye shes so// lhan cig skyes pa'i ye shes ni// de dag yab yum gyi khu ba des ni gsang sngags gsang ba'i dngos grub

chen po yin te mchog thun mong ma lus par 'di las byung/ pas/ de la/ sku gsang ba'i dbang gsung shes rab ye shes kyi dbang thugs bde ba chen po'i dbab dang gsum mo/ dbang slob ma des// gang 'dod pa de sbyin te// ji ltar 'dod par nan tan

bya// gsang dbang 'dod na rtsa rlung thig les sbyin/ shes rab ye shes kyi dbang 'dod na rtsa dkyil 'khor bzhi la brten nas byin/ bde ba chen po'i dbang 'dod na rtsa srog shing gsum la brten nas sbyin no// skye med byang chub sems kyi rang bzhin 'di// rdzas byang

sems bu ram dang ri lu byas pa'o// bskur gnas slob ma'i lce la bzhag pa'o// lha rdo rje sems dpa' 'o// bstim gnas khams gsum gsal byed rnam shes so// nus pa me long lta bu'i ye shes lhan cig skyes pa'i bzhi pa'o// dkar la dag pas gnyis med byang chub
sems// skal ldan rnal 'byor 'di la dbang bskur bas// rdo rje rigs kyi dngos grub thob par 'gyur// yab yum sbyor ba'i mchod pa 'dis// sangs rgyas byang chub sems dpa' mnyes// sangs

rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' mchod pas mnyes pas thabs che bas thabs lam yin pa dang sems can gyi// sdug bsngal du gyur pa lam du byas pas sdug bsngal/ las grol bas lam du gyur te thabs che ba dang ldan// theg pa chen po'i nang nas zab mo sngags la

rab dga' bas// 'dod chags 'ching ba las grol nas byang chub lam du mdzad/ cing 'gyur ba dang// sbyor ba'i mchod pa thabs lam du song ste mdor na yon tan mtha' dag dang ldan pas/ sbyor ba'i mchod pa dang du blang ngo/

mchog/ dbang thob mdzes pa slob dpon yon tan ldan pas na/ slob ma snod ldan la dbang byin nas skyes bu la rin po ches brgyan pa dang dra bar slob ma de yon tan dang ldan par gyur pas na mdzes pa'o/ de dag gis// dul ba'i sems su bzhag nas

ni// de'i dus na lus ngag yid gsum dul te spyod lam dul zhing khrel 'dzem che bar gyur pa'o// dam tshig chen po bde bar gnas// bsnyen bsgrub kyi dus su bsrung ba'i dam tshig dang/ bsgrub pa'i dam tshig ste bsrung ba'i dam tshig ni/ le lo gnyid dbang du mi gtang

ba dang/ slob dpon gyi bka' khyad par du gnyan par bya ba dang/ spyod lam yangs pa mched lcam du tshig gi mtshon ma shor ba dang/ dam rdzas la blo yi khu 'phrig med par spyad pa dang/ lha gsal bar bya zhing snying po bar chad med par bya ba dang/ khams gsum yongs sgrol srid

gsum dbang du bsdus te chos nyid kyi dam tshig chen po la gnas par bya'o// dbang don bsgom bsgrub nyams su blang// bum pa'i dbang don bsgom pa dang/ gsang dbang gi dbang don bsgom pa dang/ shes rab ye shes kyi dbang don bsgom pa dang/ bde ba chen po'i

dbang don bsgom par bya ba'o// de yang bum pa'i dbang rig pa'i dbang lnga'o// gsang sngags zab mo'i dbang gsum mo// bum dbang bskyed rim dbyings kyi lam// lam bskyed pa'i rim pa dbyings rtsa'i lam ste/ gsang ba me rlung gi dkyil 'khor du don yod grub pa

yab yum bsgom pa dang/ lte ba sprul pa'i dkyil 'khor du rin 'byung yab yum bsgom pa dang/ snying ga chos kyi dkyil 'khor du rdo rje sems dpa' yab yum bsgom pa dang/ mgrin pa longs spyod kyi dkyil 'khor du snang ba mtha' yas yab yum bsgom pa dang/ spyi bo bde ba chen

po'i dkyil 'khor du rnam snang yab yum bsgom pa dang/ de yang rtsa la gnad du bsnun pas sku dbyings gsal ba dang/ khams bdud rtsi la gnad du bsnun pas rnam pa bde ba dang/ yig 'bru la gnad du bsnun pas rang bzhin stong pa dang/ rlung la gnad du bsnun pas ngo bo zung du

'jug pa dang/ spang bya nyon mongs snga ma spangs par thob pa 'bras bu ye shes lnga 'thob par byas pas bsgom pa'o// gsang lta snying mgrin spyi bo ru// las rin rdor chos rnam pa dang// yum dang bcas sku dbyibs rnam pa bde rang bzhin stong ngo bo zung

du 'jug/ ngo bo nyid gsum blta ba ni// snang dang stong dang zung du 'jug/ log bral ngo bo gcig pa dang// snang phyogs kyi ngo bo nyid yul las 'char/ stong phyogs kyi ngo bo nyid lus las 'char/ zung 'jug ngo bo nyid sems las 'char/ de gsum

re re la yang gsum du ldan par gnas te/ chos can ma rig pa'i snang ba las log pa dang/ chos nyid kun brtags dang bral ba dang/ de yang ngo bo gcig tshul gyi tha dad do// snang stong gnyis blta ba ngan pas gol sa zung 'jug gol sa dang bral ba'o// mthong

lam dang bsgom lam dang mthar lam gsum sbyar ro// grub mtha' 'khor 'das dbye ba med// sa drug rtags dang ldan pa'o// 'jig rten las 'das pa'i lam sa drug la stong gsum nyung 'brur tshud pa kha che chung med/ gyang dang rtsig pa dang ri la sogs pa

la thogs pa med/ chu bo gyen la ldog/ nyi zla gteng par 'dzin/ gcig las mang por sprul/ mang po gcig tu byed do// bar chod 'da' ka rnam pa gsum// snang ba bsgyur ba'i 'da' ka ma ni/ yi dam lha dang bla ma mdun gyi nam mkha' la spyan drangs/ rang nyid lhar

bsgoms la mdun gyi nam mkha' la spyan drangs pa de la yod pa thams cad sngon du btang/ med na yid kyi mchod pa bya// dam tshig nyams chag bshags/ de nas mdun du lus len pa'i snang ba byung ba'i tshe/ rang nyid lhar bsgoms la mdun gyi snang ba de ltar dran par bya/ lha'i snang

ba dang bdag gi shes pa gnyis ro gcig tu bsgyur ro// des bar do'i snang ba mi 'char bar rigs 'dzin du 'gyur ro// rgya dang rgya'i tshul bzhin no// snang ba bsgyur ba'i 'da' ka ma// gnyis pa 'od kyi gong bus 'pho ba ni/ lus tsog pu la lag pa gnyis ltag khung

nas sbyor nas/ rgyab brten dran par byas la sngon 'gro gong ltar bya'o// de nas snying gi nang du 'od kyi gong bu mtheb long tsam bsgom/ de las 'od chad pas gshang gci'i lam/ lte ba kha sna bug mig rna ba mdzod spu rnams zla ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi 'od kyi thig les bkag la/ lte bar

rlung gi dkyil 'khor zla ba la hU~M mthing nag bsgom/ de nas hU~M drag la ring ba bcu dgu'am nyi shus zla ba dang hU~M bcas pa mgrin pa'i bar du drangs la/ nyer gcig pas spyi bo tshangs pa'i bu ga nas bdun gyi yi dam gyi thugs kar 'phang ngo// rig 'dzin du skye bar 'gyur ro// 'od

kyi gong bus 'pho ba dang/ sgra yis 'pho ba'i 'og na sgra la goms par byas na yod 'da' ka ma// gnas skabs 'bras bu 'pho bas rig 'dzin thob pa'o// 'bras bu rig 'dzin 'thob pa dang// rang lus rtsa las grub pas na// rtsa nyid

sprul skur lhun grub thob/ ! mthar thug lam la bar chad ma byung na rang la ye nas sprul skur gnas pas rtsa nyid sprul skur gyur nas sprul sku thob pa ste/ rgyal ba zhi khro sprul pa'i skur rang nyid kyi lus la lhun gyis grub pa thob par 'gyur ro// gsang dbang bdag

byin rlob pa'i lam// rim pa'o// rlung gi gzhu la me sum mdo'i rlung gzhu dang 'dra/ lte lkog gi me mda' dang 'dra/ y-i mda'// byang sems haM gi 'ben la brdeg/ spyi bo'i haM 'ben dang 'dra ba la brdeg pa'o// myur du ye shes 'char bar

'gyur// bde ba'i ye shes myur du 'char zhing lus kun la khyab pa'o// bskyar ba'i sbyor ba med pa'o// thun re la thebs re byas nas de nas 'bab pa la 'jog pa'o// rlung ran par/ kha sbyor lam sbyang lta ba bskyang// drod yang byung rgyal btang ba

dang// thun ni grangs tshad med pa la// yid kyi 'jug yul khams tshod bzung// g.yas g.yon du ba mun sogs brtag/ rnam pa de la blo gnas pa tshogs lam yin la/ rtags byung ba ni sbyor lam ste/ rlung g.yas kyi dbang du byas na/ sa rlung

du ba/ chu rlung smig rgyu/ me srin bu me khyer/ rlung gi rlang mar me 'bar ba/ nam mkha'i rlung zin na nam mkha'i sprin med do// g.yon gyi rlung gis ni bzlog pas mun nag dang/ 'ja' tshon/ glog zla ba'i 'od zer nyi ma'i 'od zer lta bu byung ste/ mthong snang dang rmi

nyams ci rigs par 'byung ngo// lta ba rang byung ye shes bzhi// nyon mongs pa dang rnam par rtog/ snrel zhi gsal zhing yang ba'o// nyon mongs pa rang byung gi ting nge 'dzin ni/ yul las ma byung bar snying ga'i yig 'bru la rlung sems 'dus pas nyon

mongs lnga skye ba'o// rnam rtog rang byung gi ting nge 'dzin rtsa ro rkyang gnyis su rlung sems 'dus pas gzung 'dzin gyi rnam rtog skye ba'o// snrel zhi rang byung gi ting nge 'dzin ni/ dbu ma'i sna rtser a la rlung sems 'dus pa'o// gsal zhing yang ba rang byung gi ting nge 'dzin ni/ zung 'jug

gi hU~M hU~M la 'dus pas sems gsal lus yang 'byung ba yin no// grub mtha' ma 'dres yongs rdzogs pas// sa gzhi rigs drug skad kyang shes// rigs drug gi rgyu 'bras sam so sor shes pa de dag gi skad du chos ston/ A li kA li la dbang thob/ tshig

mchog grub tha snyad las 'das so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi la dbang thob/ tshangs pa'i dbyangs su 'gyur ba la sogs pa'i yon tan rgyud la 'char ro// grub mtha' ma snyogs 'da' ka ma// rlung ni dbu mar thim pa'o// grub mtha' ma snyogs 'da' ka ma 'od

gsal ba ni/ 'chi ka mar rlung gi rkyen byas nas rlung thams cad dbu mar zhugs te stong gsal mchog gi ting nge 'dzin skye/ rtsa bran gyi rlung thams cad rtsa pho brang bzhir 'dus te/ de tsho yang rtsa gtso bo gsum du 'dus/ de gnyis dbu mar thim ste/ bsgom nyams rang byung gi ting nge

'dzin dang 'dres nas/ bar do med par grub mtha' snyogs te rig 'dzin 'thob pa'o// 'bras bu lus kyi yi ge nyid// longs spyod rdzogs pa'i sku grub thob/ rang gi lus la sngags yi ger gnas pa nyid ye nas longs spyod rdzogs pa'i skur gnas pa la/ de

nyid thob pas na 'bras bu longs spyod kyi rdzogs pa'i sku thob pa'o/ man ngag gi gnad kyis zin pa'o// shes rab ye shes dbang don bsgom// dkyil 'khor 'khor lo thabs kyi lam// lam ni dkyil 'khor 'khor lo thabs kyi lam yin no// de la lnga ste

lus ngag mnyam pa dang/ 'dod pa mnyam pa dang/ byin rlabs mnyam pa dang/ rig la dag pa dang/ man ngag gnad kyis zin pa'o// lus ngag lus ngag mnyam pa ni yab yum gnyis ka lha bsgom pa dang sngags bzlas pa'o/ 'dod pa 'dod pa mnyam pa ni yab yum gcig

la gcig brten nas sangs rgyas 'dod pa'o/ byin rlabs mnyam/ byin rlabs mnyam pa ni/ yab yum mkha' gsang bsnol mar byin gy-is rlob nus pa'o// skye ba dag pa'i rigs ma rnams/ skye ba dag pa ni sngar bshad pa ltar dang bye brag/ ri dwags can ma !

ni ri dwags kyi ro stod 'dra ste nu ma mkhrang ba/ ri dwags kyi ro smad 'dra ste smad sha rgyas pa/ ri dwags kyi sked pa 'dra ste phra la 'gros dal ba/ lta stangs skyes pa mthong na mig mi 'dzum pa/ dbugs dang dri la gla rtsi bro ba ste/ mdor na ri dwags gla ba dang yum chos mthun pa'o/ dung

can ma// dung can ma spyir rus pa/ rak+sha 'jam la dkar ba lte ba nang du g.yas su 'khyil pa'i ri mo yod pa// lus stobs che zhing myur ba skad gdangs che zhing ring ba'o// mdor na dung gi chos dang yum de mthun pa'o// glang po can ! ma ni spyir lus kyi sha che zhing yan

lag thung ba stobs che zhing mig chung ba/ rna shal ring ba/ rdul byung ba'i tshe dri zhim pa log shes che la 'dzangs pa/ khyad par du bu sa'i tshogs sdang ba'o/ dang ri mo can// ma ni sha chung la dmar/ lte ba'i steng na ri mo

'greng bu gsum yod pa/ mdzod spu na ri mo 'greng bu gcig yod pa/ mur gong gi mtha' gnyis na dar thod lta bu'i ri mo yod pa spyir tshigs thams cad ring ba 'di ni khyad par du bsngags so// sna tshogs ma ni de dag bzhi ga'i yon tan dang ldan pa'am gsum mam yang na gnyis kyi yon tan dang ldan pa'o/ dang sbyangs pas

dag/ pa ni thos bsam dang bslab pas rgyud yongs su dag pa dang/ dbang gis dag pa dang/ rnal 'byor gyi ting nge 'dzin gyis dag pa'o// de yang skye bas dag pas mtshan dang ldan pa/ sbyangs pas dag pa snod du rung bar byas pa'o// bsnyen pa skad cig dang po

la// dga' ba'i ye shes skye ba ni// gzugs dang dri las bde ba bsgom// dang por dbab/ de nas bzung/ de nas bzlog/ de nas khyab par bya/ mtha' mi nyams par bsrung ngo// de la dang po ni/ rten yongs su dag pa'i yum de nye ring ngan par byas la/

de'i gzugs sgra dri ro reg bya la blta zhing/ des 'dod chags kyi me 'bar bas thig le dbab/ bde ba bsgom/ bgrad pa'i mthas bsrung/ blta ba'i 'gyur bas bsrung/ gsang thub par bya/ de thams cad la bde ba dang/ mi rtog pa'i nyams ci skyes pa thams cad byung rgyal du

bskyang/ de ltar thig le dbab cing/ spel zhing bzung/ bzung zhing rim gyis bzlog ces bya ba gsum 'brel pa can du 'byung/ de ni bya ba mang la bde ba chung bas na skad cig ma dang po la dga' ba'i ye shes zhes bya'o// de yang skad cig ma dang po la

bsnyen pa bya ba'o// nye ba'i bsnyen pa bya ba yang// b+ho la ka ko la sbyar zhing// skad cig gnyis pa mchog dga' yi// ye shes thig le 'bar ba'i drod/ de nas nye ba'i bsnyen pa la/ b+ho la dang ka ko la mnyam par sbyar zhing/ yang 'dod chags kyi mes thig le dbab/ bde

ba bsgom/ bgrad pa'i mtha' dang blta ba'i 'gyur bas bsrung/ gsang thub par bya/ rnam pa sna tshogs pa'i skad cig ma gnyis pa la bya ba chung bde ba chung bas mchog dga'i ye shes so// dga' ba dang mchog dga' de gnyis ni thig le dbab cing bde ba shugs che bas thig le

'bar ba'i drod ces bya'o// de la bsnyen pa zhes kyang bya'o// sgrub pa bsrungs pas skad cig gsum// dga' bral bde ba g.yo ba'i drod// zin rtags byung nas rtsa btsal la// rdo rje pad+ma rtsa dang ni// thig le rlung dang bde stong

chud/ sgrub pa ni de nas rdo rjes pad+ma bsrubs pas/ bde ba mi rtog pa dang ldan par 'gyur te/ snga ma bzhin thig le dbab pa'i bde ba dang mi rtog pa bsgom/ bgrad pa'i mtha' bsrung/ gsang thub par bya ba gces/ 'di'i dus su bde ba mi rtog pa dang ldan pas/ skad cig ma

gsum pa la dga' bral gyis dga' ba/ thig le cung zad gyen du g.yo bas na thig le g.yo ba'i dred ces kyang bya'o// de tsam na thig le bzung dka' bar gyur na/ steng rlung rnam par 'gog pa rtsol ba bkag nas srog nas drang ba'am/ 'gyur ba rnam pa drug la sogs pas 'dir thig

le bsrung/ bsrung ba sla na skad cig ma bzhi pa bsrung/ de tsam na srin po'i lam bem bem lce yor yor byed// tsub tsub byed pa/ dri chen dri chu yang res mi thon/ res mi thos sam/ bde ba bzod pas skra rtsa sar sar byed pa/ g.yal dang mchi ma 'byung/ ci rigs pa 'byung ba'i tshe thig

le zin pa yin no// de tsa na rten yongs su dag pa'i bud med ling+ga gtad pa la sogs pas rtsa btsal la/ byin gyis rlabs pa gsum sngon du song bas/ rdo rje dang pad+ma gnyis kha sbyor/ rtsa gnyis kha sbyor/ thig le gnyis kha sbyor rlung gnyis kha sbyar du gyur pas bde

stong zung du chud cing bde ba ngos bzung dang bral ba'i ting nge 'dzin skye ste/ 'dir yang ting nge 'dzin de bskyang/ bgrad pa'i mtha' la sogs pas bsrung/ gsang thub par bya ba gnyis pa gces so// bde ba brtag par bya ba gces// de la mi mkhas pa ni spyir bzhi

las// dbab pa dag la ma mkhas na// thig le myur du nyams par 'gyur// de'i gnyen por spyir mkhas pa bzhi las// dbab pa la mkhas pa ni rus sbal 'gros// rgya mtshor ri rab log la skam// lto ba sgal pa la sbyar// gling

bzhi dbang du bsdu ba dang// yan lag bzhi lus ma mo la bskum// ro 'dzin rang gi gnas su sbyar// lce yar kan la sbyar// dbang po'i mchog ni steng du bzhag/ mig gnyis gyen la bzlog ste thod pa'i nang du dril// ngag stobs hU~M drag tu

ring du drang// ting 'dzin thig le hU~M drag gzhu la phaT kyis 'phul ba'i mda' brdeg ste drug po dus gcig la 'ong/ gzhu 'phang// yang na 'di// lus kyi spyod lam ldan byas nas// lag gnas nyi ma g.yon pa zla// pus mo gnyis la

bsnol mar gdab// hU~M thung hU~M ring mdun du dgug/ g.yas g.yon dag tu gsum gsum ste// bud pa gsum bstud mar bya dang rngub pa gsum// 'khor ba dag tu sbyar bar bya// nyi ma dag ni gsum pa la// rlung zin

na thig le zin// sba ba spubs su nub par 'gyur// yang na// byin gyis brlab rten rig ma byin gyis brlab pa dang lus ngag gi 'gyur ba bya/ sogs byas nas ni// srin po'i lam ni cung zad bsdam// bsrung ba ni bshang gci'i lam

bsdam// gung mdzub gnyis ni drag tu khar gzhibs// mig gnyis steng du bgrad par bya// thod pa'i nang du bsgril ba// 'dis ni thig le 'dzin par 'gyur// yang na ha la ha la ngag tu 'dren pa zhi drag las drag tu drang ba'o/ drag tu

brjod// lus kyi 'khrul 'khor gzhan yang bya/ khams bdud rtsi thig le nyid rlung dang 'dres nas gnas pas rlung zin na thig le yang 'dzin pa ste lus gnad do// 'dis kyang thig le 'dzin par 'gyur// gzung ba'i man ngag ma mkhas

na// tha mal pa'i lugs dang mthun par 'gyur ba'o// bde ba yun ni thung ba yin// gzung ba dag la mkhas pa la// lus ngag 'gyur ba gsum dang gcig/ sgrub pa chen po ni skad cig bzhi pa la// thig le brtan pa'i drod

yin no// ri dwags kyi 'gyur ba bzhis bsrung pa ni// glang chen hing dang stag mo'i tshang ma ngur// gcan gzan skyug pa ltar lto ba skong skong bya ba/ dang wa ltar bsnom/ bsnom bya// lte hig snying hag mgrin gcan gzan pa spyi gtsug wa ltar bsnom/

drang// bzlog pa ma mkhas na thig le chu dang bsdongs/ nas 'dzag/ bzlag mkhas dud 'gro'i 'gyur ba bzhi// de nas lus kyi 'gyur ba bya ba ni rlung gi ske rags lag pa skad pa la bcing// de bzhin du lag pa zhags pa 'phang ba

ltar bya ba dang// lus kyang gtun shing gi 'khor lo ltar bskor// bu chung ltar mgo g.yas g.yon du 'jog 'jog bya/ spyod lam byas pas ni// lus la dgram par seng ge khyi tshugs su 'dug pa ltar bya/ byas pas khyab// rnam

grol rgya seng ge gangs kyi stod du 'gro ba ltar 'phyong bar bya/ yi lus la dgram/ lus la thig le// dgram pa ma mkhas na nad du 'gyur/ khyab par mkhas pa rnam grol rgya// bde ba skyed nas gang bas 'dzag/ pa ni 'gyur ba drug dang/

ngag 'dren pa zhi drag dang/ khyad par stobs kyi hU~M gis bsrung// gdon dang bag chags rmi lam 'dzag/ gu gul nag po/ mi'i klad pa/ nyung dkar bsreg pa'i thal ba/ pad+ma rak+tas bsrung// nad gzhi chu dang bsdongs nas 'dzag/ kha zas bcud can dang/

rtsa ba gsum gyi phyi ma bsten// rig ma'i rkyen gyis chags skyes 'dzag/ 'gyur ba drug dang bgrad pa'i mthas bsrung// kha zas mi mthun rang nyams 'dzag/ me tog 'byar byed smin pa de zhib par btags pa la ma la btab la ltor gtang// spyod

lam rdul dang bsdongs nas 'dzag/ lus la rdul bar bya// lta ba lhan cig skyes dga' ni// go rim ltos pa'i dga' ba bzhi/ ! dga' ba bcu drug tu 'gyur te/ de la go rim la ltos pa'i dga' ba bzhi ni gong du bstan ste/ skad cig ma dang ma

dga' ba'i ye shes/ gnyis pa mchog dga'i ye shes/ gsum pa dga' bral gyi ye shes/ bzhi pa lhan cig skyes pa'i dga' ba'i ye shes te bde ba bzhi'o// phyi nang gnas kyi dga' ba bzhi// gnyis pa gnas la ltos pa la gnyis las/ phyi'i gnas la ltos pa dang/ nang

gi gnas la ltos pa'o// phyi'i gnas la ltos pa ni/ lus kyi gnad khol bu khol bur skye ba dga'/ lus phal cher skyes nas mchog dga'/ lus thams cad la khyab par skyes na dga' bral/ snang ba'i dngos po thams cad bde bar 'char na lhan cig skyes dga' 'o// nang la ltos pa

ni/ spyi bo nas mgrin pa'i bar du dga' ba/ mgrin pa nas snying ga'i bar du mchog dga'// snying ga nas lte ba'i bar du dga' bral/ lte ba nas gsang gnas bar du lhan skyes so// bde bas spang bya spong ba bzhi// gsum pa spang bya la ltos pa bzhi ni/ gzung 'dzin gyi rnam

rtog rags rim 'gog pa ni dga' ba/ bdag gi rnam rtog rags rims 'gog pa mchog dga'/ phyag rgya'i rnam rtog 'gog pa dga' bral/ dga' ba gsum pa'i rnam rtog 'gog pa lhan cig skyes pa'i dga' ba'o// rang gi ngo bo shar ba'o// bzhi pa ngo bo nyid bzhi ni/ bde ba'i

nyams myong chung ba dga' ba/ bde ba cher 'bar ba mchog dga'/ bde ba mi rtog pa dang ldan pa dga' bral/ bde ba stong pa dang gnyis su med pa lhan cig skyes pa'i dga' ba'o// grub mtha' bde stong rgya chung zhing// bcu gcig bcu gnyis sa pa'o// ni myang

'das la sogs pa ngo bo ci rigs pa rnams bde stong du rtogs pa 'byung ste/ sa bcu gcig pa dang bcu gnyis pa'i// 'da' kar rdo rje sems byon 'gyur/ ! dang po 'byed pa dang/ bar du gnas pa dang/ tha ma 'chi ba thams cad las kyi rlung gis byed pas 'chi ba las

kyi rlung gis rkyen byas nas las kyi rlung log pas rtsa mdud rnams dral/ des sems kyi rten khams thig le lhan cig tu tshogs te/ khu ba cung zad zhugs pa las/ 'chi khar bde stong mchog skye ste/ rdo rje ni stong pa/ sems dpa' ni bde ba/ de sngar gyi bde stong gi blta ba dang 'dres

nas bar do med par grub mtha' snyogs pa'o// lus khams bdud rtsi chos skur gnas pa ste de rtogs nas grol ba'o/ thob// bde ba chen po'i dbang bsgom na// bde ba chen po'i dbang lnga ste// lam ni rdo rje'i rba rlabs te// lam dang blta

ba dang grub mtha' dang/ 'da' ka ma dang/ 'bras bu'o// de la dang po lus sbyang ba la sogs pa sngon du song nas/ bsam gtan gyi yan lag rnams tshang bar bya ste/ srog rtsol la sogs pa sngon du song nas/ 'og rlung bskyed pa lus kyi rba rlabs/ de nas ting nge 'dzin sems kyi rba

rlabs bsgom ste/ yang rab yum pad+ma can dngos sam/ 'bring ye shes kyi phyag rgya la brten nas lam sbyang pa las/ de la gsum dang po thabs rgyud dag par bya ba/ de nas shes rab rgyud dag par bya ba/ de nas gnyis ka'i rgyud so sor dag par bya'o// de yang lus ngag mnyam pa la

sogs pa gsum shes rab ye shes kyi lam dang 'dra bar byas la/ de nas skad cig gis thabs shes rab la snyoms par zhugs pa las yab yum gnyis kyi khams dngas ma mchog gi ze bar byon/ thig le 'od zer gyi khro bo'i rnam par 'gyur/ rtsa g.yas kyi ro ma nas song ltai bar

byon// lte ba'i 'khor lo nam langs pa bzhin yal yal/ nyi ma shar ba bzhin sal sal/ glo ba bus pa bzhin du ltar ltar/ yang g.yas ro ma nas song nas snying gar byon/ chos gsum ldan du dran yang ro ma nas song// rna ba g.yas nas 'od zer rnam par 'phros/ 'od zer gyi snang

ba las lhag pa'i lha'i dkyil 'khor spro/ sems can thams cad kyi rgyud la dbang bzhi bskur/ sems can rnams lhag pa'i lhar byas/ gnyis 'dres bdud rtsi'i bcud du gyur/ bdag gi rgyud sku lngar bsgyur nus pas tshangs pa'i sgaur zhugs/ spyi bor chos gsum ldan du dran/ mgrin

par byon rak+ta btso bas nyi ma stong gi gzi brjid dang ldan/ snying gar bdud rtsi gtso bas 'od kha dog lngar gyur/ rtsa dag pa'i lam lte ba nas byung nas/ lte ba rtsa mdud yangs pa nas yum gyi mkhar snga ma bzhin du gnas so// de ni g.yas bzung ba'i rba rlabs rengs pa/ rnam par thar

pa'i sgo mtshan ma med pa zhes bya ba 'bras bu dang po'o// de bzhin du g.yon du yang bya ste/ 'dzin pa'i rba rlabs rengs pa/ rnam par thar pa'i sgo smon pa med pa ste 'bras bu gnyis pa'o// de bzhin du dbu mar yang bya ste/ byon pa'i dus su thig le nyung dkar tsam du dbab bo// gzung

'dzin gnyis ka'i rba rlabs rengs pa/ rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid de 'bras bu gsum pa'o// thabs rgyud dag par bya ba bstan no// de bzhin du shes rab kyi rgyud la yang rtsa g.yas g.yon gnyis nas ni/ rna ba gnyis kyi sgor byon pa tsam las phyir 'phro ba ni med do// dbu ma

nas song ste/ tshangs pa'i sgo nas spro ba dang bsdu ba byas kyang rung ma byas kyang rung ste 'dra bar bzhed do// rba rlabs gsum rengs pa dang/ rnam thar sgo gsum dang sbyor ba yang snga ma bzhin shes par bya'o// yab sbyor ba'i dus su yang yum gyis yang yab sbyar la/ yum la des

'gre'o// de nas thabs shes kyi rgyud so sor dag par bya ba'i phyir/ yab nyid kyi dbu ma nas khams dwangs ma de 'od zer gyi rnam par song nas gtsug tor mchog tu thim/ yum gyi yang de bzhin du thim ste/ gnyis ka yang sku lnga lhun gy-is grub par dran pa tsam bya'o// nyams de gang du

skye ba ni nges pa med do// ci skyes byung rgyal du gtang ngo// pad+ma can la lus ngag yid// thabs shes gnyis ka'i rgyud dag pas// srog shing gsum las rnam thar sgo// chos rnams shin tu rnam dag pa'i// de kho na nyid blta ba

ni// mas brtan pa yi dga' ba bzhi// rgyu mthun pas ni skra dkar 'joms// de nyams su myong ba lus kyi rtags ni/ lus sems gnyis ka gang byung gi rtags ni/ lte ba'i 'khor lo khengs pas 'gro ba thams cad kyi snying du sdug cing yid

du 'ong bar 'gyur/ de yang sems 'ba' zhig la bzhed pa'i rtags ni/ dang po la bde stong gi ting nge 'dzin shas chung ste lte ba'i 'khor lo'i rtags so// snying ga'i 'khor lo khengs pas mngon shes cung zad tsam 'char ro// gnyis pa snying gar bde stong 'bring ngo// rnam par smin

par stobs ster byed// skyes bu byed pas rnam par 'phel/ mgrin pa'i 'khor lo khengs pas dpung pa dang lce dang lce'u chung 'phel te/ 'jig rten gyi khams kyi ro thams cad la longs spyod nus pa'o// gsum pas mgrin par bde stong chen po'o// dri ma med pas

ni 'chi med 'gyur/ skye bo'i 'khor lo khengs pa tshe nyi zla dang mnyam/ rdzu 'phrul cung zad ston no// bzhi pa spyi bor bde stong chen po'i yang chen por 'gyur ro/ !/ grub mthas ma snyogs 'da' ka ma// phyag rgya chen por 'pho bar bya// nyer gcig khug pa

bcu bdun la// skye dang 'bri bas rlung rnams sbyang/ ! de la sbyang ba ni/ rlung sbyangs te/ gang yang rung ba'i nyi ma dang po la srog rtsol gyi rlung khug pa bcu bdun thun bzhi'i nges pas bya/ de bzhin du nyi ma re re la khug pa re re spel la/ zhag nyer gcig gi bar du

sbyangs te/ nyi ma tha ma la srog rtsol gyi rlung khug pa sum cu so bdun du gyur ro// yang nyi ma dang po la gcig 'bri/ de bzhin du nyi ma re re la re 'bri nas zhag nyer gcig na yang sngar gyi tshad du 'gyur ro// de ltar bzhi bcu rtsa gnyis su rlung sbyangs pas g.yas dang g.yon nas rlung rgyu

bas gsal ba dang/ me rlung rnam ngor rgyu ba la sogs pa'i rnam par nges pa 'byung ngo// sgra la goms par rab byas nas/ ! goms pa la gnyis te/ sgra la goms par bya ba dang/ yi ge la goms par bya ba'o// sgra la goms par byed pas lus gnad la phab la hig

ces pa nyer gcig gis drang zhing/ ki hig ces pa nyer gcig gis ngal gsol/ de ltar thun bzhir nges pas zhag bdun sbyang ngo// yi ge goms par byed 'dod na// yi ge la goms pa la phyi nang gnyis so// phyi ni dri chen gyi lam du dmyal ba'i sgo 'gegs pa'i yi ge k+mayu

sngon po'o// dri chen gnas su sngon po dmyal/// byol song gi sgo 'gegs pa'i smayu~M du bsgom mo/ ser po dri chu'i lam/// lte bar sngon po 'dod lha'i sgo 'gags pa nyid/ bsam mo// yi dwags mgo sprad lce'u chung zla// sum

dkar dag tu gnas pa'o// lce'u chung gi rtsa bar yi dwags kyi sgo 'gegs pa'i zla ba la suM dkar po mgo sprad pa'o// sngon po gnod sbyin sna ru bzlas// sna ru zla ba gnod sbyin gyi sgo 'gegs pa'i yu~M sngon po bsam mo// yuM// rna ba gnyis dmar grub

pa'i lha// rna ba gnyis su grub pa'i lha'i sa bon yuM dmar po bsgom pa'o// yuM// mi dang mi rgyal sngon po mig/ mig gnyis su zla ba la hU~M sngon po mi dang mi'i rgyal por skye ba dgag pa'i phyir bsgom pa'o// hU~M// mdzod spu gzugs khams kyi lhar skye ba dgag

pa ni hU~M sngo dkar ba/ h+m+yu~M/ spyi bo'i gtsug tu kha dog dkar po'i k+ShuM// k+ShuM// yi ge ma bu'i sbyor bas dgag/ de ltar brtsegs pa'i yi ge bzhi dang rkyang pa'i yi ge bzhi ste brgyad kyis sgo thams cad dgag par bya'o// nang du dkyil 'khor nang gi yi ge la

goms par bya ba ni 'khor lo bzhi ste rang gnas dkyil 'khor bzhi la 'byung ba bzhi dgag go/ rnam bzhi la// A li gyen lta kA li thur/ ! rtsa g.yas g.yon gnyis su A li bcu drug mdog dmar po mgo gyen la bltas pa re dang/ kA li dkar po

mgo mthur la bltas pa gnyis gnyis spel mar bkod pas// rtsa g.yas g.yon gnyis dgag pa ste/ ! de yang rtsol ba'i dus su mas yar gsal gdab/ srog gi dus su yas mar gsal gdab bo// g.yas g.yon rtsol ba srog gi dus/ de yang/ thun bzhi pas

zhag bdun du goms par byo/ 'o/ !/ de nas las la sbyar bar bya// bde 'gro dag la sbyar bar bya// mi 'dod sgo bkag 'dod sar 'byin/ ! dang por bde 'gro la sbyar ba ni// nges par 'chi ba'i tshe/ sngon 'gro bum dbang gi 'da' ka ma

bzhin byas pa'am/ ma byas kyang rung ste/ lus tsog pur gnad la phab la/ rtsa dbu ma'i spyi gtsug nas 'og sgor gsal ba las/ rlung ldang 'jug gnas pa sbyang ngo// phyi sgo thams cad yi ges bkag la/ mig la sogs pa bde 'gro gang 'dod pa'i sgo de stong par bzhag la/ snying gar

rlung dang zla ba'i steng du sems kyi rten hU~M gsal gdab/ hig gi sgra nyi shus mgrin pa'i bar du drangs/ rtsa gcig pa la mngon par 'dod pa'i sgo de nas 'phangs na/ sgo de'i rten 'brel nyid kyis bde 'gro dang der las la sbyar ba 'grub par 'gyur ro// grong gzhan sbyar ba

rgyal bu sogs// lus kyi rten la gzhug pa dang// rtags byung zhi drag bya ba dang// de nas drin lan bsab par bya/ !/ grong gzhan la sbyar ba ni/ rgyal po'i bu la sogs pa'i ro rma med pa/ ma rul ba/ na tshod dang rjes su mthun pa'i ro rnyed

nas rab yin pas bla ma la khrus bya/ gu gul kyi dud pas bdug/ lhar bskyed/ gnas gsum bsrung/ nub dang po la bsrung ba'i 'khor lo brtan por bsgom/ gnyis pa la rten de gnas dben par bzhag la/ dam tshig mkha' 'gro dang sha za mkha' 'gro la sogs pa mchod pas

mnyes par bya/ nyin gsum pa la/ rang gi rlung shugs dang/ ting nge 'dzin gyi rlung shugs brtags la/ nye ring tshod zin par byas te/ lus ci rigs pa gnad la phab la/ phyi sgo thams cad snga ma bzhin yi ges dgag/ sna'i sgo gnyis stong par gzhag/ de nas sngar sbyangs pa'i rtsol

ba'i rlung gnyis/ sems kyi rten snying ga na gnas pa de las hU~M gcig bye ste/ rten de'i sna bug g.yon nas bcug la snying gar bzhag/ srog lung ci bder 'od du gzhug/ de bzhin du yang nas yang du byas pas/ rten de'i snying gar drod byung ba dang/ spyi bor yang drod 'byung/ de nas

lus thams cad la khyab pa dang/ mig 'byed 'dzum dang/ smra ba la sogs pa 'byung ste/ de tsam na sems gcig gis rten gnyis gzung ba'i dus zhes bya ste/ de nas drag por byed na hig nyi shus mgrin par drangs la rtsa gcig pa la sna bug g.yas nas byung ste/ rten de'i g.yon nas

zhugs nas snying gar zhugs par bsam/ zhi bas byed na/ rtsol ba nyid kyi sems kyis rten de mgrin pa'i bar du drangs shing// thul phul zer la sogs pa bya/ tha ma sna g.yas nas bton la/ rten kyi g.yon nas bcug la snying gar gzhug ste/ srog 'jug pa dang bral bar byas na

nges par las la sbyor te 'grub bo// de nas drin lan bsab pa'i phyir// rten rnying pa sbyang zhing/ rten gsar pas 'gro ba'i don spyod pa la sogs pa bya'o// gling dang skye gnas gzhan sbyar ba// ni lus la sogs pa gnad la dbab par byas la/ phyi sgo thams cad yi ges

dgag/ tshangs pa'i sgo 'ba' zhig stong par bzhag/ snying gar rlung dang zla ba'i steng du sems kyi rten hU~M mthing nag bsams la/ hig nyi shus mgrin pa'i bar du drangs la// rtsa gcig pa la gnad gsum 'dus pa'i tshul gyis tshangs pa'i sgo nas 'phangs te// rlung

sbyang bde ba can dang ni// pad+ma mngal du bram ze rgyal// gang mngon par 'dod pa'i bde ba can la sogs pa'i gling dang/ skye gnas las kyang rdzus skyes su 'dod na ut+pal 'am pad+ma la sogs pa skye gnas kyi snying po'am/ mngal skyes su 'dod na bram ze dang rgyal po

la sogs pa'i btsun mo'i mngal de yid kyi yul du byas te/ rang gi rig pa rlung 'byongs pa'i rtsal gyis bud med kyi mngal der ting nge 'dzin gyis 'phangs na// mda' dang sgyogs bzhin 'khrul 'khor 'phen// dper na mda' gzhu dang skyegs kyis 'khrul 'khor lta

bus las la sbyar te/ 'bras bu de ni nges par 'grub bo// de lta bu'i las sbyor gsum po de ni dbang bzhi ka'i 'da' ka thun mong ma yin par bzhed do// shin tu zab pa'o// bzhi pa phyag rgya chen por 'pho// phyi yi sgo rnams bkag byas nas/ ! bzhi pa phyag rgya

chen po nas 'pho ba ni/ bde ba chen po'i dbang kho na'i 'pho ba yin te/ lus skyil krung du gnad la phab la/ phyi'i sgo thams cad yi ges bkag ste/ de bzhin nang gi sgo thams cad kyang sgoms pa bzhin yi ges bkag la/ rang gi/ srog rtsol dbu mar yid kyis

gzhug/ rtsol ba'i dus su phyi dbyibs kyi a nas spyi gtsug gi haM gi bar du/ dbu mar yid kyis gzhug/ yang srog gi dus su haM nas phyi dbyibs kyi a'i bar du yang dbu ma nas gzhug/ de bzhin du/ 'chi khar rang gis ngang gi dbu mar 'jug pa dang/ rang yid kyis kyang yang dang

yang du de ltar byas pas/ srog rtsol gyi rlung dbu mar zad de// lam mchog der thim nas// rgya chen rig pa 'dzin par 'gyur// phyag rgya chen po bde stong shin tu dag pa'i de kho na nyid rtogs nas sngar gyi nyams myong dang 'dres pa'i tshul gyis grub mtha' snyog pa'am/ rig pa 'dzin

par 'gyur ro// 'bras bu ni chos sku longs sku sprul sku gsum dbyer med pa/ ra 'gyur ba ni chu dang lan tsha sgog pa dbyer med pa ltar ngo bo nyid kyi sku thob pa'o// ngo bo nyid kyi sku thob pa// bcu bzhi sa la rab gnas pa// ni bcu bzhi pa rdo rje 'dzin

pas sa la gnas pa ste/ rdo rje lta bu'i dgongs pa 'dzin par na rdo rje 'dzin pa'i sa la gnas pa zhes bya ba yin no// rdo rje 'dzin par grub pa'o/ ! khrag 'thung gal po'i dkyil 'khor 'dir// dbang bskur ba yi bla ma la// de la ji ltar blta

bar bya/ !/ slob dpon rdo rje 'dzin pa la// lha mngon shes can dang byin rlabs can rig pa 'dzin pa yis// de la bsngags pa 'di skad brjod/ !/ ston pa rdo rje slob dpon 'di// bdag cag rnams kyi pha nor rdzas 'byor pa

ster bas chos kyi dbul ba sel/ lags so// bdag cag rnams kyi lus sems rtogs pa skyes pas/ ma lags so// thugs kyi sras pho mor dgongs// bu dang bu mo sring bka' drin gyi skyob nus/ gnyen lags// lam stor rnams kyi sangs rgyas kyi

lam 'tshol sa mkhan lags// long ba rnams kyi ye shes kyi spyan 'byed pa'i/ dmigs bu lags// 'khor ba'i/ chu bo las sgrol ba'i gru chen lags// sku dang ye shes kyi// rin chen len pa'i gzings chen lags// sems can rnams kyi

yid la// 'dod pa sangs rgyas sgrub pa'i ded dpon lags// ma lus 'gro ba'i dus gsum rgyal ba bgrod par byed pa'i/ lam chen lags/ ! ma rig pa'i// mun pa sel ba'i sgron me lags// dug lnga ye shes su bsgyur

bas/ gser 'gyur rtsi yi mkhan po lags// dug gsum sku gsung thugs su sgyur ma gi ta chen lags// sprul pa 'byung ba'i snang ba ye shes sgyu ma'i dkyil 'khor du bsgyur ba'i sgyu ma mkhan lags/ 'khor ba'i// g.yul ngo zlog pa'i

dpa' bo lags// lta ba ngan pa'i/ nad gcod 'byin pa'i sman pa lags// 'dod pa mchog thun mong gi dngos grub ster ba'i yid bzhin lags// paN+Di ta la lta ba sgro 'dogs phyi nas gcod pa// lha yi dpag bsam shing chen lags// ku

sa lI pa ltar sgro 'dogs nang nas gcod// gnod sbyin bum pa bzang po lags/ lta ba// nam mkha' lta bur mtha' dbus dang bral ba/ brtan pa lags// sgom pa// rgya mtsho lta bur bying rgod bral bar gnas pa lags// spyod pa/ ri bo lta

bur mi 'gyur bar/ brtan pa lags// nyi zla'i lta bu sku gzi mdangs dang ldan pa lags/ gsung chos kyi 'khor lo// 'brug sgra chos dung gsung smra lags/ thugs/ 'gyur ba med pa rdo rjai'i thugs can lags// yon tan sa gzhi

ltar 'dod pa 'byung ba mnga' ba lags// phrin las thabs mkhas la 'gyur ba gar mkhan glog 'dra lags/ sku gsung thugs yon tan phrin las kyis gzhan/ zil gnon seng ge 'dra ba lags/ phyi/ sgro 'dogs yongs su gcod pa'i bla

mas bum dbang bskur lags/ nang/ rang byung ye shes ston pa'i bla mas gsang dbang bskur lags/ gsang ba/ lhan cig skyes dga'i ye shes ston pa'i bla mas shes rab ye shes kyi dbang bskur/ dgongs pa lags/ de kho na nyid/ chos rnams de

nyid shin tu dag par ston pa'i bla mas bde ba chen po'i dbang ston pa lags/ khams gsum gnas kyi dbang phyug 'dis// lha dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten 'dir/ chos nyid don gyis/ rnal ma la rig pa ye shes kyi blos 'byor 'khor 'das

kyi chos la blta ba dbang spyod nus pa phyug 'bras bu thob par nus pa chen po 'di// bdag cag rnams la chos kyi ston pa'o// zhes gsungs pas/ bral nas brtsis na/ bla ma bslab bya nas brtsis na rdo rje slob dpon dgongs pa nas brtsis na

dam pa rje 'bangs nas brtsis na rje drag zhan nas brtsis na btsan phan par bya nas brtsis na lha rjes kun la thugs kyis dgongs par gyur to// dpal he ru ka'i gal po las/ gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor chen por dbang bskur ba'i

brtag pa ste bcu bzhi pa'o//// de nas bzhugs gnas phyogs bcu dus bzhi'i ra gshegs pa sangs rgyas 'das pa ma lus da lta ba mi lus lus ma 'ongs pa pa med pa thams cad kyis/ sku gsum thob pa// mchog dang grub

chen brgyad la sogs pa thun mong gi dngos grub de dag bsgrub pa'i rnal 'byor pa la bar du gcod pa'i bdud ngos bzung zhing 'dul ba 'di dag rnal 'byor sgrub pa po'i ched du gsungs so// bar chad byed pa'i bar chad kyi bgegs ngos

bzung zhing bzlog pa ni ye shes la ye shes skye ba'i bgegs sam sgrub pa'i bar du gcod pa'i bgegs te khyad par du yang dus drug gi nyul le ma drug yin no/ bgegs chen yang// 'jigs pa med pa'i sems kyis bzlog ! skye ba med pa'i dbyings las

phyag rgya chen po'i skur gsal bar bsgoms pa/ dam tshig gi phyag rgya bstan pa'am/ yang na skye ba med pa'i chos nyid bsgoms te bstan pa tsam gyi gzhan pham mo// dngos grub sbyin pa'i gzugs can yang/ thun mong dang mchog gis bsdus pa'i dngos grub ster bar byed

pa'i ye shes kyi lha la bya'o// re dang dogs dang dga' ba yi/ ! lha yin du re ba dang/ dngos grub thob snyam nas dga' ba dang/ bgegs yin du dogs pa'i sems med par bya ste/ re dogs gnyis kyi blo dang bral ba'o// ngan pa'i don gyis sems mi dbyung/

! re dogs dang bcos pa ni sems ngan pa yin pas na/ sems de lta bu mi 'byung bas na ngan sems dang bral ba'o// nor bu rin chen rkun ma mang/ de yang ni yang dag pa'i dngos grub la bar du gcod pa mang ste/ dper na nor bu rin chen la rkun ma mang ba lta

bu'o// bdud dang bar chod ngos bzung bzlog ! badzra he ru ka'i thugs kyi bsgrub pa'i bsgrub pa byed pa'i rnal 'byor pa la bdud dang bar chod 'byung bas/ de ngos bzung zhing bzlog par bya'o/ !/ de la bdud ni bzhi ste phung po'i dang nyon mongs pa'i dang 'chi bdag

dang lha'i bu'i bdud do// rnam par rtog pa phung po'i bdud// lus sems las su mi rung byed/ phung po'i bdud ni lus sems las su mi rung ba ste/ rnam rtog thams cad do// rtog pas dngos grub la bar chad byed pas so// de la lus sems las su rung ba'i

sman dang yo byad bsten pa dang/ gnyis med kyi blo dang ldan par bya ba'o// nyon mongs bdud ni dug lnga nyid/ ! nyon mongs pa'i bdud ni/ zhe sdang la sogs pa'i dug lngas dngos grub la bar chad du 'gyur ba ste/ de la nyon mongs pa'i gnyen po bsten pa zhe sdang la

byams pa bsten pa lta bu'o// nyon mongs pa lam du 'khyer ba'i man ngag ni dug sman du btul ba lta bu'o// nyon mongs pa'i rang bzhin shes par bya ste/ de ni dug gi rang bzhin shes pa lta bu nyon mongs pa'i dbang du mi gtang ngo// nyon mongs pa'i dbang du 'gro ba ni/ gti mug gis

stong pa nyid la khungs phyung nas ci yang mi 'gal zer ba dang/ zhe sdang gi dbang gis bla ma dang spun grogs kyi srog la rgol ba dang/ 'dod chags kyi dbang gis bla ma'i gzungs ma la gzung ba'o// de dag rU tra'i gnas su ltung bas spang bar bya

ba'o// rang sar grol bar bya ba'o// 'chi bdag bdud ni tshe srog 'phrog/ 'chi bdag gi bdud ni/ 'chi bdag gi gzugs kyis rnal 'byor pa'i srog la gnod pa mtha' dag ste/ gnas bkra mi shis pa dang/ gdon drag po dang/ dug dang dgra la sogs pa ste/ de dag spang zhing bsrung ba dang/ tshe

la phan pa'i bcud len dang/ tshe sgrub la sogs pa bya'o// tshe sgrub srog ni bskyab par bya// lha bdud gzhan 'phrul dbang byed ni// bdud kyi rgyal po dga' rab dbang phyug btsun mo pad+ma 'phreng dang bcas pa blon po bzhi dang 'khor du bdud sdig to can rnams

te bdud kyi rigs rnams so// dga' rab dbang phyug bdud kyi rigs// de dag gi gti mug dang zhe sdang gis rab tu 'khrugs te sems can thams cad bran du mthong ste/ bdud kyi rigs rnams kyis bran med kyis dogs 'khor ba stongs kyis dogs nas bar du

gcod pa ste// 'khor zad bde ba thob kyis dogs/ gsang sngags zab mo'i bka' bzhin du bsgrub pas sems can rnams thar pa la bkod kyis dogs bar chad sna tshogs brtsam mo// bu gcig 'chi ba'i mya ngan tsam// gang zag byang chub

tu sems bskyed pa mthong na bdud de dag bu gcig pu shi ba tsam du mya ngan skyes nas bar du gcod pa'o// de yan chad bdud bzhi ngos bzung nas bshad pa ste spyi don dang po'o// bar chad dngos dang sprul pa 'byung// dngos grub 'byung ba dang byin gyis brlabs nas

'byung ba'o// de yang dam pa la dngos su 'ong/ dam pa ma yin pa la byin gyis brlabs nas 'ong ngo// de la dngos ni gnyis te bdud kyi gzugs dngos su 'ong ba dang sprul pa dngos su 'ong ba'o// de yang br-id pa dang bsdig pa'o// pha ma slob dpon cha byad can// dam pa

ting nge 'dzin drod thob pa la bdud slob dpon dang pha ma'i cha byad du byas te 'ong ngo// rang gi lta spyod des bar chad byed lugs ni lta spyod dang bsgrub pa la bar gcod byed pas/ mi de yang lta spyod dang bsgrub pa las bzlog pas gnyen po yang lta spyod dang bsgrub pa la 'bad par

bya'o/ gnyen po yis// dngos su byung na bzlog par bya// de'i gnyen po ni blta ba sems sangs rgyas su blta/ spyod pa sbyor sgrol gyi chos nyid dbang du bsgrub pa he ru ka bsgrub bar bya ste bzlog go/ bdud dngos su yod pa'o// bdud kyis dngos su byin

rlobs pa// btsun mo la gnyis te/ dang po ni/ bdud kyi btsun mo pad+ma phreng gi bar du gcod pa de la 'phreng ba reg pas nyon mongs pa 'phel te/ rab tu 'phel bas dam tshig la sogs pa dang 'brel lo// ji ltar 'brel na 'phreng bas 'dod chags ldang zhing/ sbyor ba'i dam

tshig la dgar song nas thabs kyis ma zin pa'i sbyor ba rang dgar spyod pa'o/ pad 'phreng spyi bor reg gnyis pa chad dam dpyad// blon po 'thab g.yeng chags 'du shes// blon po bzhi ste/ 'thab byed/ g.yeng byed/ chags byed/ 'du shes zlog pa dang bzhis

bar du gcod de/ 'thab byed kyi rnal 'byor pa nang 'thab mo la sbyor/ g.yeng byed kyi g.yeng ba la/ chags byed kyi chags pa tshul ma yin pa bla ma'i btsun mo dang/ nor rdzas la chags par byed do// 'du shes zlog pas rnal 'byor pa log lta dang 'khrul pa sna tshogs la sems sbyor

ro// gnyen pos yang dag chos skur shes// de dag gi gnyen po ni nyon mongs pa'i dbang du mi gtang ba dang/ snying rjes kun la khyab par bya ba dang/ mthun 'jug thabs kyi khyad par bya ba dang/ yang dag pa'i blos thams cad chos skur mthong ba'o// rgyud nas byin

gyis rlobs pa yang// mi dang mi ma yin pa'o// mi ni dgra lta bu dang/ gnyen lta bu'o// mi ma yin pa ni dud 'gro lta bu dang/ 'byung ba me chu lta bu la sogs pa dang/ yi dwags lta bu'o// rnal 'byor pa la bar du gcod par byed pa ni/ gnod pa/ dngos

su byed pa dang phan pa ltar snang zhing don la gnod pa'o/ !/ tshor dang ma tshor bar lus ngag yid gsum la 'jug pa rnams/ de dag gis dam tshig la sogs pa las bzlog par byed pa'o// bdud de dag gi gnyen po ni/ stong nyid snying rje dang ma bral ba

dang mthun 'jug thabs kyi spyod pa mkhas pa dang sangs rgyas kyi byin/ rlabs pa'i thabs sna tshogs so/ !/ bar du gcod pa 'byung ba'i rgyu/ yang byin gyis rlobs pa'i bdud bar du gcod pa'i bgegs 'byung ste/ de yang slob dpon dgongs pa med pa dang/

mched lcam dam tshig mi gtsang ba dang/ dben gnas bkra mi shis pa dang/ yo byad dang cho ga lhag chad du gyur pas bdud kyi rgyu byas pa'o// nyul le dam 'byung dus drug 'byung/ ! bar chad kyi ngo bo ni nyul le ma drug dang dam sri bzhi dang 'byung po

phal pa 'byung ste/ de yang srod dang tho rangs gnyis/ snga dro dgongs ka gnyis/ nam phyed nyin gung gnyis te drug go/ rtags dang cho 'phrul du ma 'byung// de yod pa'i rtags re dang cho 'phrul re 'byung ste/ dgongs nyi ma nub pa'am/ myur khan srin po sha dred gser bu'i bu

mo rdzu 'phrul bya rog skad bsgyur ba bya ba dang/ srod la rlung lha phyogs skyong gi bu mo kha thun gyi ma ru tse bya ba dang/ nam gung la tshangs pa dung gi thor tshugs can gyi bu mo pra ma na dun ti bya ba dang/ tho rangs gza' stong stong gi bu mo ting ting gi ma ru tse bya ba dang/ nyi ma shar kar nam

mkha' lding gi bu mo blo gros spyan gcig ma dang/ nyin phyed na klu rigs bzhis bar chad byed pas sngags dang pho nya ting 'dzin gyi rang rang gi gnyen pos bzlog go/ de la gnyen pos bzlog par bya// sha trang bu mo bya rog mas// dgongs grib so nag po la lho nub

nas srin po sha dred gser bu'i bu mo rdzu 'phrul gyi bya rog skad sgyur ma bya bas bar gcod byed du 'ong ste// byid bsres snying rje chung ba dang// snga rtags su sha khrag 'dod/ snying rje chung/ gnyid dbang du 'gyur zhing thibs nas 'ong/ de la gnyen pos bzlog go/ rlung lha

kha thun ma ru tses// dkyil 'khor byin med seng po dang/ ! srod la rlung lha phyogs skyong gi bu mo kha thun gyi ma ru tse bya ba rus sbal nag po zhon nas 'ong ste/ rtags dkyil 'khor byin med seng seng por 'gro/ cho 'phrul rlung nag 'tshubs mas dkyil 'khor 'thor

du 'ong/ de gnyen pos bzlog go/ tshangs pa pra ma sny-ing mi dga'// log pa'i chags pa skye bar byed// nam phyed na tshangs pa dung gi thor tshugs can gyi bu mo phra man du na ting bya ba shing dar srub maid kyi la'u gon nas bar du gcod du 'ong ste/ rtags snying mi

dga' zhing 'gro snying 'dod/ cho 'phrul log pa'i chags pa skye/ de gnyen pos bzlog go/ gza' yi bu mo ting ting mas// sgrub po khrau zhing tshig pa za// skya rengs shar tsam na gza' stong stong gi bu mo ting ting gi ma ru tse bya ba/ bar du gcod 'ong ste/ lcags kyi li

ri gsum sgril gong chu ba byed du 'ong ste/ rtags sgrub po khro zhing tshig pa za/ cho 'phrul 'od 'byung/ de gnyen pos bzlog go/ gser mig bu mo spyan gcig ma// des ni nyam chung bying ba'o// nyi ma shar ka'i zer la nam mkha' lding gser mig can gyi bu mo blo

gros kyi spyan gcig ma dngos grub 'phrog tu 'ong ste/ rtags sgrub pa po nyam chung la/ cho 'phrul sgrub po kun bying por 'ong ba'o// de yang gnyen pos bzlog go/ nyin mo rgyu ba klu chen bzhis// 'tshubs ma nad drag snying yang gcus// nyin phyed na nyin mo rgyu ba'i

klu chen rigs bzhi 'ong ste/ rtags ni 'tshubs ma chen po'am/ nad drag pos btab pa'am/ sny-ing gcu zhing na ba 'ong/ cho 'phrul sbal lcong nya sbrul rmi lam du rmi bas/ de'i gnyen pos bzlog go/ gnam gyi the'u brad dkar po gti lte yang/ phur gyi glog mo srin klu gnyan

nag po tshogs// dpon log pa la sogs pa'i rU tra nag po rang gi rang la za zhes bya ba'i dam sri nag po dang bzhi'o// 'od bzhi dam sri bzhi ru bzung// de'i rtags ni 'od skya hod hod po dang/ 'od nag po chu ris can dang/ dmar khra ri mo can dang/ kham nag dud

kha dang 'od rigs bzhi 'od cho 'phrul mi rigs rmi lam du yong ngo// 'byung po phal pa rgyal 'gong dang// dam med rtags kyis ngos bzung ngo// gzhan yang 'byung po phal gyis bar du gcod de/ rnal 'byor pa la rgyal 'gong dam med

dang/ dam nyams dam med dang/ sngar gang gnod pa des bar du gcod do// las las skyes pa'i dam sri dang/ rkyen las gyur pa'i dam sri dang/ gnod par sems pa'i dam sri dang/ de dag rtags dang/ rmi lam gyis gang yin ngos gzung bar bya'o/ !/ rnam par/ mi rtog pas

bzlog pa chos nyid dpal chen sku// sngags dang phyag rgya rab ldan pa'i// pho nya mgyogs byed mang po dang// rang rang gi gnyen pos bzlog par bya/ 'o/ !/ dang po dgongs ka bzlog pa'i gdul bya ni// dgongs ka'i ting 'dzin

mi gsal na// sngon gyi dus nyul chen mo ni// grib so sdud pa'i dbang mo che// rdzu 'phrul bya rog skad sgyur ma// de yi 'dul byed ni 'dul skal chen mo ni/ kha dog nub ka'i dmar thag 'dra// ral pa ser sprin
'khrigs pa bzhin// ral pa sprugs pa'i skra gseb nas// gza' rgod mig dmar char du 'bebs// a la la yi phyag mtshan ni// gnam lcags zhun ma'i khro chu bskol/ khros nas gnyen por rbad pa'i tshe/ khro chu
khol ma'i skyin thang 'bebs// srid pa'i gnam sa dkrug pa skad// srin po'i 'jig rten rba la g.yeng// dam las 'das la btso bsreg byed/ khyod kyi phrin las skal phog pa// dgongs ka'i bar chad byed pa

yi// bdud byed thams cad thal bar rlogs/ !/ srod kyi ting 'dzin mi gsal na// gdul bya ni/ sngon gyi nyams len chen mo ni// phyogs skyong bu mo ma rungs pa/ 'dul byed/ de yi 'dul skal chen mo ni// thogs

med rlung ltar rgyu ba mo// srid pa'i rgyal mo srog gi bdag/ sred bdag chen mo kun gyi rje// ye shes 'od 'bar rdzu 'phrul can// rtse gcig bsgrub pa'i grogs mdzad ma/ khyod kyi phrin las skal phog pa// srod la
bar chad byed pa yi// bdud byed thams cad rdul du rlogs/ ! gdul bya bstan/ nam phyed bar chad byed pa'i bgegs// dkar mo phyogs kyi ma rungs pa// de yi 'dul byed 'dul skal chen mo ni// ral gri'i lus
la rkang lag glog/ ral pa ser sprin 'khrigs pa 'dra// sngags pas gdungs shing bos pa'i tshe// mchi ma thul thul char du 'bebs// thul thul thigs pa re res kyang// dkar po'i bu bran mang po kun// gzhob
sgog rdog pas brdzis pa bzhin// gso glags med par dmyal thag gcod// rgyal ba'i ngag nyan dam tshig can/ khyod kyi phrin las skal phog pa// nam phyed bar chad byed pa'i bgegs// thal ba bzhin du brlag

par mdzod/ ! gdul bya ni/ tho rangs bar chad byed pa'i bgegs// hor ston bu mo gdug pa can// de yi 'dul byed 'dul skal chen mo ni// mgo ni seng ge'i mgo bo la// hur mo seng ge'i ngar sgra sgrogs// srid
pa'i gnam sa grub pa skad// ral pa ser sprin 'khrigs pa 'dra// sngon gyi bskal pa dang po la// rgyal pa'i bka' nyan dam tshig can/ khyod kyi phrin las ska 'phog pa// tho rangs bar chad byed pa'i
bgegs// bdud bgegs bar chad thal bar rlogs/ !/ shar ka'i ting 'dzin mi gsal na// shar ka'i zer la bar gcod pa/ gdul bya/ srab mda' ring la zhon pa mo// de yi 'dul skal 'dul byed chen mo

ni// dung gi mgo la shel gyi lce// ral pa ser sprin 'khrigs pa 'dra// gnam lcags thog gi ser chen 'bebs// sngon gyi bskal pa dang po la// rgyal ba'i bka' nyan tha tshig can/ khyod kyi phrin las dus la

bab// shar ka'i lce la bar gcod pa'i// bdud bgegs thams cad thal bar rlogs/ !/ nyin phyed bar chad byed pa ni/ gdul bya// bying 'thib klub pa'i nad kyi bdag/ de yi 'dul skal chen mo ni/ 'dul byed// sku
ni dung gi 'khor lo la// dkar nag gyon pa'i ya mtshan can// srid pa'i gnam ni gos su gyon// dregs pa'i sa ni gdan du bting/ khams gsum 'jig rten pang du khyer// srid pa gsum ni khur du khur// nyi

ma'i skyin thang spyan nas 'char// zla ba'i dmar dwangs zhal nas 'char// lag na ri rab rtse dgu 'thor// shin tu mi bzad gtum chen mo// klu 'dul chen mo'i dus la bab// 'di ni dpal gyi pho nya ste// dus la

bab po e ka ma// A+oM rag sha rU tra/ yag sha tshal pa/ ha na ha na hU~M phaT// brjod nas bla ma dang las mkhan gnyis gcig gis g.yas nas bskor gcig gis g.yon nas bskor te bzlog !/ gnas skabs kyi brlog pa ni/ bag zan nam ra sog

la// de la ling+ga rab tu bya/ phud ste gsal// dam can phud gtang ye shes kyi srung/ ma gau+o ri dang// las dang 'brel pa dbang mo dang rang dang 'brel/ ba'i srung ma drag tu bskul la/ spams phur blangs te/ phur pa byin gyis brlabs nas ni// rak+ta sa sbal nub tsam

byug/ gu gul dang tshil chen gyis bdug la pho nyas khro bos ling+ga la dgug/ bstim/ phur/ bskor bya ling+gal gdab rdo rjes brdung mtshon gyis gtubs btab pa byas ste gzir/ mnan drag po bya'o// bsgrub pa byed pa'i rnal 'byor pa la// bar

du gcod pa'i bgegs 'dul bsrung ba'i phyir/ lha gang gis bsrung na/ bde gshegs nus pa dril ba gsungs/ bsnyen pa bya ba bstan/ don la gnas pa'i rnal 'byor pas/ khro rgyal 'bar ba'i skur bsgoms la// bar du

gcod pa'i bgegs byung na/ las la sbyar ba ni// bdag nyid lha dpal chen he ru bsgom// spyi bor gshin rje gshed po rdo rje thogs med sku'i lha dkar po g.yas 'khor lo g.yon sdigs mdzub bsgom// mgrin par rta mgrin rgyal po

dbang chen 'bar ba gsung gi lha dmar po g.yas sbrul zhags g.yon sdigs mdzub la// snying gar badzra he ru ka/ che mchog rnon po thugs kyi lha mthing ga rdo rje dril bu// lte bar rdo rje gzhon nu bsam// phrin las rgyal po las kyi lha ljang gu g.yas phur pa g.yon

sdigs mdzub// de las ye shes me yi 'od/ sngags kyi 'phro 'du bstan// rdo rje'i rang bzhin phra mo yis// gang la bya ba'i bgegs rnams kun// bya sgro me yis bcum bzhin bsam// rdo rjai srin po'i ngur sgra

yis// drag tu bzlas shing gdug pa bzlog/ grangs tshad bstan// brgya las 'das na bgegs rnams bzlog/ gsung thugs drag po'i phrin las sngags// pad+ma he ru ka rta mgrin dbang gi sku// A+oM pad+ma kro d+hI shwa rI/ yum chen mo

rnams/ badzra kI la ya/ karma he ru ka rdo rje gzhon nu/ ma hA yak+sha/ rat+na he ru ka che mchog rnon po gshin rje/ kA la rU pa/ nag po'i gzugs can/ phrin las gshin rje gshed/ karma raM raM badzra dz+wa la raM hU~M phaT/ bgegs bskal pa'i mes bsregs// gsang

sngags rgyal po 'di dag ni/ gang la bsrung ba'i yul bstan// rang gi khams rnams 'khrugs pa dang// phya sangs khyer la skabs su bzlas// bde gshegs spyir dril bar chad bsrung/ ! dam tshig khrus lung rgyal mtshan

gyis// dgod ched// mched lcam nyams grib spyang ba'i phyir// bar chod bzlog pa'i don du gsungs// sngags bzlas pa'i yul dang sngags bstan// nyams dang nye na 'di bzlas so// A+oM e ho shud+d+he shud+d+he/ yaM ho shud+d+he shud+d+he/ baM ho

shud+d+he shud+d+he/ laM ho shud+d+he shud+d+he/ raM ho shud+d+he shud+d+he/ a he raM/ b+hi he raM/ bi na raM/ shud+d+he shud+d+he/ a a a sA hA/ sbal bus rgya mtsho rnyogs byas kyang// dam nyams kyis gnod par mi nus pa'i nus pa ni// rnyog ma med 'drar gnod mi nus/

khrus byed bzlas shing nyams chag bkru// dag byed khrus kyi man ngag yin/ ! yul yang bsrung ba bstan// sgrub po drag po'i nad btab bam/ khams 'khrugs snying yang phya sangs khyer// bgegs zhugs nyams len
