bzlog par bya/ lha gang gis bsrung ba ni// rdo rje gnod sbyin sngags kyis brdeg/ sngags gang gis bsrung ba bstan// oM na mo rat+na tra yA ya/ na maHsh+tsaN+Da badzra pA Na ye/ ma hA yak+Sha se na pa ta ye/ rak+sha rU tra/ yak+sha tshal pa/ ha na ha na
hU~M phaT/ !/ gdug pa'i dgra bgegs dar ba na// gau rI nag mos bsad pa'i las/ sgrub pa po/ don dang ldan pa'i rnal 'byor pas// dus/ bskal pa dus kyi tha ma la// bar du gcod pa'i dgra byung na// ye

shes thugs kyi gau rI mas// gnyis med ngang du bsgral ba'i phyir// zhing chen ras la ling+ga dgra gzugs bri// phyag rgya bzhi yis gzugs la dbab/ rdzas dang dkyil 'khor bstan// mtshan ngan rabs chad thod par

gzhug/ 'brub khung nag po e rtsang ldan/ lha'i grangs/ srin mo brgyad kyi dmod mo bri/ rgyu dus// nyi shu gsum gyi nam phyed na// bzlas pa bya thabs/ bzlas la ling+ga gtor mar dbul// gtor ma dgra phyogs zor du

'phang// brlag par nges te gsang bar rigs// sngags bstan/ oM AHhU~M/ gtso bo ha he phaT/ gau ra'i ma bzhi hU~M ni ri ma tsi ta tsi ta tsa ro ma/ rdul phran rdul phran/ keng keng rag ta rag ta// ma ri sha snying la shad shad/

puk+ka sI la sogs bzhi/ tsin dang ma khrag la keM keM/ hU~M tri sha rbad rbad/ dzaHhU~M baM hoH dbugs la 'ub 'ub/ a hU~M he/ ma mo b+h+yo dza dza/ ru lu ru lu rag mo b+h+yo dza/ sngags grangs dang nus pa/ lan gsum lus ngag

yid dbang byed// lngas ni lnga phung rdul du rlog/ brgyad kyis rnam shes 'bral bar nges// zhi khro 'bar ba man chad nas// dbang phyug mkha' 'gro yan chad kyi// dmod pa'i drag sngags gsungs pa 'di// srin mo rgyu
ba'i dus su bya// gau rI nag mo nyi 'khol gyis// dgra bgegs sgrol ba'i las gsungs pas// gang la dmigs pa gsod par byed// yang dag don la gnas pa la// bar du gcod pa'i gnod bgegs

rnams// bzlog par bya ba'i man ngag gsungs// bdag nyid dpal gyi skur bsgoms la/ pra mo he ni/ rmongs mo yin te las la mngags par bya/ dper na/ mda' gzhus brdeg pa ltar de 'dra'i chu srin 'phen/ gyis zin

pas// A+oM badzra pra mo ha ya/ de mo ha ya/ a ka ri sha ya/ sarba duSh+tan/ hr-i da ya/ pra mo he ni hU~M phaT/ sngags 'di gang gis khri bzlas na// mi bzlog pa ni gang yang med// chu srin rgyal mtshan 'phyar la bzlas// de

ni thams cad bzlog par byed/ ! sgrub pa po la phan par byed pa ni lha yin la gnod par byed pa 'dre yin pas// phan gnod byed pa rnam gnyis po// gzugs dang sgra dang dri dang ni// bar chad kyi 'dre yin na gzugs sdug cing sgra snyan yang dri zhim/

lha yin na gzugs mi sdug cing sgra mi snyan yang dri zhim/ de yang lus kyi gzugs dang/ ngag gi sgra dang/ cho 'phrul dri dang gsum po gang byung ba brtag par bya'o// rnam pa gsum po byung ba na/ 'dre yin par/ dogs pa dang lha yin du re bas chags pa'i sems

spangs te/ rang gi sku phyag rgya gsal ba'i nyams kyi dngos grub blang ngo// de ltar bar chad 'dre dang dngos grub lha'i/ bye brag tu ni shes par bya/ !/ gzugs ston pa'i bar chad ni ngang par ston pa yang/ kha dog lnga yi dbyibs dang mdog/ gi

gzugs ni dkar ser dmar ljang mthing la sogs pa bar snang gi 'ja' tshon lta bur snang ba'o// dbyibs kyi gzugs ni skur snang ba dang/ phyag mtshan du snang ba'o// sgra ni snyan dang mi snyan dang// ce spyang bung ba rnga yi sgra// sgra brjod pa'i bar chad ni sgra snyan pa

tshangs pa'i gsung dang mi snyan pa yi dwags kyi skad de/ ce spyang gi sgra dang/ bung ba'i sgra dang/ rnga'i sgra dang/ 'brug gi sgra la sogs pa du mar snang ba'o// dri bsung tshor ba'i bar chad ni zhim pa'i/ dri ni gla rtsi la sogs pa sgog pa sogs/ mi zhim pa// zhim dang mi zhim

bcas pa'o// spos dri can la sogs pa sna tshogs pa ste/ mdor na ga bur nas bzung nas tha ma sgog dri yan chad de/ dri'i rnam pa du ma yod pa rnams so/ ! re dogs bar chad bsal ba ni/ bgegs yin gyi dogs pa yang ngan sems yin te/ chos nyid kyi gshis las kha

dog ma grub pas bar chad dngos grub tu shes skyon yon tan tu shes pa'o// bgegs su dogs pas zin pa dang// lha la chags pas bcas pa'i sems// yi dam lha'i grub rtags bzang po ma chags pa yang bzang sems yin te/ chos nyid kyi gshis la ma

grub pas dngos grub mchog tu gyur pa'o// re dogs gnyis med ye shes kyi lhas sku gsung thugs kyi dngos grub ster du re ba dang 'jig rten pa'i lhas bar du bcad dogs pa gnyis chos kyi dbyings su gcig par blta ba'o/ chos kyi

dbyings// blta spyod dngos grub kyi rdzas la ye shes sgyu ma tsam du shes nas spyod cing rol pa ni bye brag yin no/ mkhas pas shes/ blta ba rtogs pa yi dam gyi sku gsal bar bsgom pa spyod pa bdud rtsi la rol ba de ni mkhas pa'o/ !/ nyams kyi phyag rgyas

rang don sad/ ! lha yin par re ba dang 'dre yin par dogs pa'i sems spangs te rang lha'i sku phyag rgyar gsal ba'i nyams kyis dngos grub blang ba'o// gal te 'byung po gnan par bya// sgrub pa po la re dogs kyi sems med kyang gal te rtags rtsub mo byung na

mnan pa'i cho ga bya'o// shar dri za/ lho grul bum/ nub klu/ byang gnod sbyin mnan no// mos dang nyams kyis 'jug pa la// lam 'jug 'jig rten bar chad chos// dang po thabs lam gyi bar chad ni/ mtshan bcas mes pas 'jug pas ltung ba dang/

mtshan nyid sna tshogs pa'i nyams kyi ltung ba'o// gang zag de la dus bzhir bar chad bzhi 'jug ste/ lam la 'jug pa na 'jig rten pa'i chos kyi bar chad ni gnyis te/ gnyen 'dun dang 'brel ba la sogs pa'i bar chad byung na zang zing gi sbyin pa phra mo sngon du 'gro ba'i dad pa

brtan pas bsrung ngo// bla ma dang grogs kyi bar chad ni zang zing gi sbyin pa dang/ brtse sems sngon du 'gro bas bsrung ngo// de ni khams 'dus pa dang po la 'grub pa'o// lam du zhugs na phyi rol gyi// bdud kyi bar chad bsrung ba dang/ ! lam la zhugs na

phyi rol bdud kyi bar chad ni rdo rje rwa ba'i srung 'khor dang/ sum b+ha ni'isngags dang/ bla ma dang grogs gzhan gyi rkyen la ltos pa'i sngags mdud kyis bsrung ngo// de ni thabs kyi bar chad kyi bsrung ba bzhi'o// bya ba mang bas na thabs yin pas so// sems ni cung zad

brtan pa na// bdud stobs 'phel ba'i bar chod dang// ni srung ba'i 'khor lo go 'pho ba yin te/ bar du gcod pa'i bdag dang/ gcod byed bdud dang/ bar chod gsum go sems su shes pa/ sgyu mar shes pa/ rang bzhin med par shes pa dang gsum gyis

bsrung ste/ 'di ni thabs kyi bar chad la shes rab kyi bsrung ba gsum zhes bya ba// stong par shes pas ni shes rab bo// de gnyis ni khams 'dus pa bar pa la 'ong ngo// sems brtan pa ni ting nge 'dzin// nga ma shes pa'i bar chod do// ni lte lkog k+Sha yig tu

brung sems brtan par 'dus pas rU tra srin po dang sha sdig pa la sogs pa mi 'tshams pa'i ltas du ma byung ba na ting nge 'dzin ngo shes pas bsam gtan gyi gegs sel bar chad ngo shes pas bdud kyi gegs sel skyon yon tan du slang shes bar chad dngos grub tu len shes pas bar

chad zhi ste bar chad med do/ khams 'dus pa tha ma la 'ong ngo// shes rab mos nyams [(]ka[)]gzugs [(]kha[)]sgra [(]ga[)]lha/[(]ka[)]/ ting 'dzin [(]kha[) ]sngags [(]ga[) ]lta nyams [(]nga[) ]kyi sad/ shes rab kyi bar chad bsrung ba ni/ stong pa kho na la mos pa dang 'jug

pas shes rab kyi phyogs su ltung ba dang/ stong nyams kyi shes rab kyi phyogs su ltung ba'o// de gnyis ka la bar chad bzhi ste/ sems nyams lus kyi sdug bsngal bskyed pa'i bar khams 'dus pa dang po la 'byung/ gzugs dang bar ston pa'i bar chad dang/ sgra brjod pa'i bar chad

gnyis khams 'dus pa bar pa la yong/ lha grub rgyur gnas pa'i bar chad khams 'dus pa tha ma'o// bsrung bsad pa bzhi ni nyams kyis sad/ ting nge 'dzin gyis sad/ sngags kyis sad de/ lta sgrub kyis sad do// gzugs kyi phyi nang bdud yin

la// phyi'i bdud dang po nas nag po'i phyaugs bar chad 'ba' zhig byed pa'o// nang gi bdud phan 'dogs gnod pa la tshar gcod rjes bzung bya ba'o// gzugs de la nyams kyi bsad pa dang/ lta grub kyis bsad pa gnyis kyis bsrung ngo/[ (]nga[) ]/ nyams dang [(]ga[) ]blta

bas sad pa gnyis/[ (]kha[) ]/ sgra ni ka la sha [(]kha[) ]a dang// sgra brjod pa'i bar chad la ngag brdas bsrung ste/ ga da sha a bum dbang gi brda'o// ya ra la wa zhes pa dang/ gsang ba'i dbang gi brda'o// rtsa 'khor lo bzhi'i yig 'bru'o// gtum mo bsgom

pa'o// A+oM dang AHhU~M 'bru gsum dang// 'bru gsum shes rab ye shes kyi dbang gi brda'o// lus ngag yid gsum mnyam par gnas pa'o// A+oM bzhi rnam par shes pas bsrung// bde ba chen po'i dbang brda ste/ dbang bzhi thob ma thob kyi brda bstan/ lha yin

na thob/ 'dre yin na ma thob pa'o// rtsa dbu mar gnan pa'o// lus brda ni/ sor mo g.yas pa/[ (]ga[) ]/ lnga bsdus rtse mo g.yon pas de [(]ka[)]mnan pa dag/ ni bum dbang rig pa'i dbang lnga thob bam zhes bya'o// mtheb srin rtse sprad pas gru gsum e yum gyi b+ha ga stim

gsang dbang dngos blangs sam zhes bya'o/ la rig byed gcig/ chang bar mdzub mo bcug pa rnam snang/ byang chub mchog gi phyag rgya ste/ yum la rol pa byas sam zhes bya'o// mdzub mo nam mkha' mtshon pa'o// bde ba chen po'i dbang bde stong nam

mkha' lta bu thob bam zhes bya'o// yan lag gi brda ni bum dbang thob na// sor mo lnga ni phral te bstan/ pas bum dbang thob ces lan no// gsang dbang thob na ni// rdo rje khu tshur yum dang mi phyed pa'i lan no/ 'gyur// rdo rje rtse gsum byas te

bstan// lus ngag yid gsum rol pas shes rab ye shes dbang ngo// de thob ces pa'i brda phyag rgya bstan pa'o// mdzub mo nam mkha' mtshon pa'o// bde stong mtshon pa bde ba chen po'i dbang ngo// phyag rgya bstan pas lha dang gegs shan 'byed do/ !/ thabs

dang shes rab thun mong ni// grib ma drug tu gnas pa dang// grib ma drug ni dang po dam tshig gi grib ma chen po ste/ srog 'phrog pas dbang gis sel lo// gdon gyi grib ma dang/ grogs ngan pa'i grib ma/ zas kyi grib ma/ gnas kyi grib ma dang bzhi 'bring po

ste/ lus sems la sdug bsngal bskyed pas tshogs kyis sel lo// ro'i grib ma ni/ mi blang ba'i ro blangs pa grib ma chung ngu ste/ ting nge 'dzin 'phrog pas na khrus kyis sel lo// grib ma drug go/ gdon gyi grib ma chen po drag po'i sbyin bsreg gis sel/ 'bring rgyas pas sel/ tha ma

zhi ba'i sbyin bsreg gis sel lo// thig le 'dzag pa drug yang bsrung// shes rab ye shes kyi dbang gi skabs su bshad zin to// sgrib gnyis bsrung bar bya ba yang// sgrib pa gnyis ni nyon mongs pa dang/ shes bya'i sgrib pa'o// dang po ni rnam rtog rgyun

chags so// de ni 'jug pa sel ba la sogs pas bsrung ngo// shes sgrib ni/ yid ting nge 'dzin yin yang nyams skyon brgyad de/ dbang gi lta ba rnams so// de dag byung rgyal gyi gnad kyis skyon med gsum gyis bsrung ngo// skyon med ma skyes na/ bsam gtan gyi dug shes bya'i sgrib

pa ste/ skyon med skye bar bya ba'i phyir/ yul snang stong zung 'jug skye bar bya ba'i phyir/ sngar rjes spyod la ngo bo nyid skyong ba bzhin chu nang gi gzugs brnyan nam/ me long gi gzugs brnyan la sogs pa la slong dang goms par byas shing bskyang ngo des skyon med mi skye

mi srid do// shes pa gsal stong du ma gyur na/ gnas khang cung dpangs mtho bar/ lus la sogs pa gnad la phab la/ mig 'byed 'dzum ran par byas te gsal ba sems kyi mtshan nyid/ stong pa sems kyi rang bzhin/ bcos min sems kyi ngo bo/ thabs shes dbyer med du shes

par bya'o// byung rgyal du bskyangs na/ gsal stong zung 'jug mi skye mi srid do// yang lus bde stong byang du ma chud na/ bsgom gtor rkyen gyis gcal zhing longs spyod kyi rba rlabs ston te/ bde stong mchog skye bar 'gyur ro// nyon mongs pa yi sgrog pa dang// shes bya'i
sgrib pa bsrung ba'o// zhes gsungs so// dpal he ru ka mngon par 'byung ba'i gal po chen po las/ bar chad bgegs chen bzlog pa'i brtag pa ste bco lnga pa'o//// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams

cad kyi ngo bo nyid kyis sgrub pa po don yod par bya ba'i phyir mchog thun mong gi dngos grub dam pa blang bar bya ba 'di gsungs so// dngos grub rnams kyi nang nas dam pa zhig blang na mchog dang thun mong ngo/ dam shing blang ba'i phyir// snga ma

las ni dkyil 'khor dang rdzas dang lha dang mchod pa dang 'phro 'du rnams gnas bsgyur nas// sgrub pa chen po yin pas dngos grub len pa'i cho ga kho na brtsam par bya// rdo rje nyi ma nub nas ni/ dus nyi ma nub nas bsgrub pa'i cho ga la zhugs nas/ tho

rangs// skya rengs 'char ba'i bar du dngos grub bsgrub/ pa'i cho ga bya'o// zhag grangs su byas pa dang dus kyi bsnyen pa dang ni btag pa'am/ rtags byung ba dngos grub kyi/ mtshan ma brtan po byung na'o// dngos grub blang bar bya/ !/ rnal

'byor gral dang dkyil 'khor lha// dkyil 'khor gnas bsgyur ba ni dbus zla gam sgo nub tu bstan pa de shar du bstan pa bri/ lha gnas bsgyur ba ni/ dpal gyi zhal nub tu bstan pa dang/ zhal du kha shar du bstan/ gau ri ma'i zhal bu yang shar du bstan no// gzhan ma

rnams des 'gre'o// bsgyur nas cha lugs khro bor bsgyur// dang po gnas 'gyur gyi rim pa byas la dngos grub kyi zhal zas bsag pa'o// rnal 'byor pa gnas bsgyur ba ni/ slob dpon nub na yod pa shar du byon la/ mched kyang 'gre'o/ !/ bkra shis kyi zhal zas ni mar la sogs

pa dkar po'i rnam pa rnams/ zhi ba shar te 'phyur ba la sogs ser ba'i rgyas pa'i rdzas rnams lho/ phyogs su dgod par bya'o// sha la sogs pa/ dbang gi rdzas dmar ba rnams ni nub tu dgod la drag po'i rdzas chang la sogs pa rnams byang/ du bzhag go/ rdzas

rnams zhing spags kyis dgab steng du rdo rje rgya gram bri der rta mgrin bsgoms la/ dang mchod pa 'i rdzas rak+ta dang sman bsham pa'o// srung ba'i 'khor los mtshams gcad par bya ste// dngos grub bsgrub la bar gcod pa// srung ba'i 'khor los gnam

'khor lo rtsibs brgyad du gnas pas bar snang bsrung/ sa pad+ma 'dab brgyad du gnas pas sa gzhi bsrung/ rnal 'byor pa'i lus la bsrung ba rang gnas pa'i dkyil 'khor bsrung bsrung bar bya/ rnal 'byor ma'i/ lus ngag yid ni ma dag pa na// mi gtsang snod

bcud dag par bkru/ !/ snod ma dag pa'i nang du btung ba khyad par can blug tu mi rung ba ltar/ sgrub pa po rnams kyi lus ngag yid gsum dag par bya ba'i don du rang rang gi bshags pa bya/ sman la ma dag par bltas pa lta spyod log pas bshags pa

byas la dag par bya'o// gang gis byin gyis brlab na/ rnal 'byor chen po mchog gi chos/ gang byin gyis brlab na/ bdud rtsi chen por ye nas sbyang/ gtso bo'i thugs dam skong ba'o/ khams gsum thugs rjes bsgral bas na// chags pa

rak+ta rgya mtshor bskyil/ mkha' 'gro'i thugs dam skong ba'o// rgyu mtshan nyid dang sngags phyi pa las khyad par du gyur pas khyad par chen po sgrub pa rgyal ba'i bka'/ bdud rtsi dang chang/ rgyu gnyis rkyen sngags dang phyag rgya ting nge 'dzin gsum sbyar ba'i

bdud rtsi 'di// snang ba snod srid pa bcud snang ba bdud rtsi chen por rang shar ba'i rdzas// rgyal ba rgyud sde bsam yas pa nas bshad pa'i lha thams cad kyang zhi khro gnyis su ma 'dus pa med pas zhi khro'i tshogs la mchod par 'bul/ hU~M dang po/

snang srid rak+ta'i rgya mtsho gnyis pas don dbang gi gnas/ sam rang bzhin du gyur/ gsum pa mchod rdzas kyi rang bzhin sna tshogs pa bdud rtsir gyur// ro mchog brgya ldan bdud rtsi chen por gnas// stong gsum stong gi dkyil 'khor

na// sku ru snang ba sku'i dkyil 'khor zhi khro'i sku// gsung du snang ba/ grag pa gsung gi dkyil 'khor zhi khro'i gsung// thugs su snang ba dran rtogs thugs kyi dkyil 'khor zhi khro'i thugs/ ! stong tshigs 'dzab

mchod gzhi stong tshigs kyis mchod pa la brten pa'o/ dgug pa yan lag don spyan drang ba dang// phyag mchod bshags bstab dngos grub blang/ !/ bsnyen pa'i lha/ zhi ba sgrub pa'i lha khro bsnyen bsgrub mtshams kyi lha'o sbyor ba'i// lha rnams dngos grub bsdus

la blang// ye shes lha dang rig 'dzin mkha' 'gro'i tshogs/ dus kyi bsnyen pa/ da ni zhag gi grangs kyang tshang lags so// mtshan ma'i bsnyen pa/ bsgrub pa'i nam yang langs lags so// bzlas brjod gi bsnyen pa'i grangs

kyang tshang lags so// zhag tu bsgrub pa'i dus drug gi cho ga tshang bas na/ mchod pa'i grangs kyang tshang lags so// zhag grangs dam bcas bsnyen pa mthar phyung ste/ dgongs pa'i tshad ni/ ye shes 'od zer 'khrugs tshul mchog

bsnol nas// bzlas brjod bsnyen pa'i grangs ni khyed la 'bul// dmigs bsam grub pa'i dngos grub bdag la gsol// mkhas rtogs chos kyi dngos grub bdag la gsol// g.yung drung tshe yi dngos grub bdag la gsol// dbang thang bu tsha'i dngos

grub bdag la gsol// mdzod ldan nor gyi dngos grub bdag la gsol// rgya mtsho klu yi dngos grub bdag la gsol// mthu dang rtsal gyi dngos grub bdag la gsol// sprul pa 'gyed pa'i dngos grub bdag la gsol// phrin las bzhi yi dngos grub bdag
la gsol/ !/ bdag cag rnal 'byor sgrub pa po// sgrub mchog dam las mi 'da' yis// dam tshig pa la
bzhengs pa yi/ dpal chen khrag 'thung 'khor bcas kyang// dam tshig gnyan las ma 'da' zhig/ dam tshig gnyan po srog gzung phyir// bdag gi dam tshig rdo rje mchog gsum po// ye shes rtsa ba lha

yi sku gsung thugs/ kyi dngos grub blang ba'o// sku gsung thugs kyi dam tshig bdag bsrung na// sku gsung thugs kyi dngos grub stsal du gsol/ yan lag gi dam tshig bsrung ba'i sgo nas dngos grub blang ba'o// mi spong ba yi dam tshig bdag

bsrung na// bla med sku gsung thugs kyi dngos grub dang// yon tan phrin las dngos grub stsal du gsol// dang du blang ba'i dam tshig bdag bsrung na// rigs lnga ye shes lnga yi dngos grub gsol// spyod pa'i

dam tshig bdag bsrung na// dngos grub mchog gsol ye shes lha// shes par bya ba'i dam tshig bdag bsrung na// sgrub pa po la dbang dang dngos grub gsol// 'bras bu sku gsung thugs mi zad rgyan gyi 'khor lo'i sgo nas dngos

grub blang ba'o// sku dang gsung dang thugs dang gsum// mi zad rgyan gyi 'khor lo'i dngos grub gsol// 'bras bu sku bzhi'i sgo nas dngos grub blang ba'o// chos sku longs sku sprul pa'i sku// ngo bo nyid kyi sku yi dngos grub

gsol// zhes sangs rgyas thams cad kyis bdag po rje btsan dam pa des/ phyi rabs kyi sgrub pa po blo dman pas go zhing rtogs par bya ba'i phyir/ lung du bstan pa'i dgongs pas dngos grub blang ba'i cho ga
gsungs pa'o// he ru ka'i gal po las/ sgrub pa chen po'i brtag pa ste bcu drug pa'o//// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis las sna tshogs kyi dngos grub bsgrub pa 'di gsungs so// las kyi bya ba ma lus

pa// bsgrub phyir dngos grub ma lus pa// he ru ka las 'byung bas na// rnal 'byor pa yis rtag tu bsgrub/ !/ gang zhig 'chi ba bslang 'dod na// he ru ka ni zhal brgyad pa// g.yas kyi zhal gsum sngo dang dmar

dang ser// g.yon gyi zhal gsum ljang dmar bdud ka'i mdog/ steng zhal gcig ser po zhi ba ste/ rtsa zhal dang/ sku lus dung gi mdog can mdangs/ g.yas dang po/ sdigs mdzub g.yon dang po rdo rje g.yas 'og dril g.yon

'og zhags 'dzin/ g.yas gsum pa/ bum pa g.yon gsum pa ral gri bzhi pa mdung thung dang/ lnga pa/ dgra s+t+wa thod pa dang drug pa lcags kyu gzhu/ dang/ bdun pa kha T+wAM mda' dang tho ba dang/ tha ma g.yas g.yon brgyad pa na/ 'khor

lo dang mi 'jigs dngos grub gsol/ !/ gsal nas sngags 'di khri bzlas na// 'chi ba thams cad 'tsho bar byed// dus min mtshon dang chu dang g.yang la lhung ba sogs 'chi ba zhi 'gyur zhing// 'chi ba las ni nges

par slong// oM a mr-i ta saM dzI ba ni ma hA a mr-i ta su lu khe dzI baM pra be sha ya/ pra be sha ya/ sarba badzra pad+ma sa ma yo ge bo d+hi tsit+ta tha bi ti mur te hU~M hU~M a A a A swA hA/ !/ thugs kar zla ba'i dkyil 'khor
gyi// dbus su a la sngags kyis bskor// bar do nas drangs shi ba yi// lus la rnam shes thim 'gyur ba// zhag bdun dag gis 'chi ba bslang// yang na zhag gsum dag na ldang/ rmad byung rol pa'i

sngags kyi 'chi bdag bskrad pa/ !/ hi hi/ 'don pa'o/ ha ha/ mgu ba/ ho ho/ dgyes pa/ he he/ sngags brjod pa'o/ hU~M hU~M/ rdzogs pa'o/ phaT phaT/ gsod pa/ hU~M hU~M/ phur bu rdeg pa/ dza dza/ 'gugs pa/ sa sa/ bsnyen bskur ro/ hU~M b+h+rUM/ rigs lnga sku/ hU~M

b+h+rUM/ gsung/ hU~M b+h+rUM/ thugs/ hU~M b+h+rUM/ yon tan/ hU~M b+h+rUM/ phrin las/ ha ha/ 'phar ba'o/ b+h+rUM b+h+rUM/ 'bar ba'o/ triM triM/ 'gugs pa'o/ t+r+ya~M t+r+ya~M/ mchod pa'o/ sang sang/ dngos grub ster/ hi hi/ rmongs pa/ laM laM/ shis pa/ d+hAM d+hAM/ 'dzin pa/ dzi dzi/ 'gugs pa'o/

hU~M hU~M/ 'khor ba'o/ hri hri/ bod pa/ dzaM dzaM/ 'dzin pa/ ho ho/ sdom pa/ haM haM/ dbang du byed pa/ ho ho/ rengs pa/ TaM TaM/ 'byung ba/ g+huM g+huM/ 'ching ba/ gaM gaM skrod pa/ raM raM/ sreg pa'o// gar gyis rab tu rol mdzad pa'i// rmad byung sngags kyis
'chi bdag skrod// thun bar dag tu ro la ni// nyung dkar dag gis brdeg cing brab// 'chi bdag lag nas shor nas ni// rang lus zhugs nas ldang bar 'gyur/ !/ de nas rnal 'byor sgrub pa pos// char pa

'bebs par 'dod pa na// pad+ma 'dab brgyad lte ba la// he ru ka ni zhal bzhi pa// phyag brgyad g.yas g.yon dang po rdo rje sdigs mdzub zhags/ de 'og gnyis/ thod pa kha T+wAM de 'og gsum pa lcags kyu mdung/ de 'og bzhi

pa/ brgya byin pags bcang te'u bsnams// sku lus mdog ni sngon po la/ zhal bzhi la// g.yas zhal dud pa dmar po la// g.yon pa dud pa ljang gu yin// steng zhal klu bdud khyung gi gdong// chu lha'i gdan la rab

tu bzhugs/ !/ mtha' yas dkar po nor rgyas sngo// 'jog po dmar la pad+ma ljang// pad+ma chen po ser po ste// dung skyong du ba'i mdog can la// stobs rgyu ljang gu ma dros ser/ !/ gtso bo'i thugs kar 'khor lo

la// hU~M suM naM hU~M sku gsung thugs// klu rnams snying la bkod pa ni// hU~M ni hU~M naM rnam par dgod// sngags 'di thun bzhir stong phrag bzlas// oM shrI badzra he he ru ru kaM hU~M naM na ga bar sha pa la bar sha pa la hU~M phaT/

nA ga rA dza b+ha ri sha ya d+ha ki ni dz+wa la sham ba ra hU~M phaT swA hA/ !/ bum pa 'o mas yongs bkang bzlas/ chu mig tu blug la klus khrus byas par bsam mo// 'o ma khrus rang nyid btung char ma phebs na 'o mas sbyin sreg bya// dngul

snod nyung dkar chu blugs zlas// klu sman bzlas la chu mig gam klu gnas pa'i sar sba/ 'o/ !/ oM aM a nan tA ya mtha' yas hU~M nan hU~M swA hA/ hU~M baM bA su ki nor rgyas hU~M nan hU~M swA hA/ oM taM ta k+Sha ka 'jog po hU~M

nan hU~M swA hA/ oM paM pad+ma pad+ma hU~M nan hU~M swA hA/ oM maM ma hA pad+ma pad+ma chen po hU~M nan hU~M swA hA/ oM shaM shang kha pA la dung skyang hU~M nan hU~M swA hA/ oM kaM kar ko Ta stobs kyi rgyu hU~M nan hU~M swA hA/ oM aM a na ba tap+ta ma dros pa hU~M

nan hU~M swA hA/ oM baM ba ru NA ya dbus kyi gdan chu lha'i sngags nA gA d+hi pa ta ye nA gaM bar+Sha pa ya hU~M nan hU~M swA hA/ !/ nyi shu rtsa gcig rab bzlas na// char pa 'bebs shing lo thog rgyas/ !/ oM u gra shU la

pa ti bar+Sha ba ya shI g+h+raM/ A+oM dz+yo ti ni ra NA bar+Sha ba ya shI g+h+raM/ oM nAM swA hA/ !/ skul tshig ldan pa'i phreng sngags 'di// bzlas na char pa 'bebs par 'gyur/ !/ 'byor pa'i longs spyod 'phel 'dod na// gnod 'dzin
nag po zhal gcig pa// g.yas na thod pa khrag bkang 'dzin// g.yon na ne'u le'i rkyal pa bsnams// gcer bu rgyan med zhabs kyis ni// rnam thos sras ni ser po mnan/ !/ nang par bya rog ma langs

dus// gtsang ma'i snod du chu sbyin gtang// chu ni gtor mar bcas pa 'bul// sngags 'dis kha yang byin gyis brlab// oM in+d+ra ni mu khaM b+h+ra ma ri swA hA/ !/ lag g.yas mthe bong mdzub mo sbyar// skyong me kha

bstan lan gsum bzlas// lag g.yas thod pa bum par bcas// rgyun sngags 'di ni dgod par bya// oM dzam b+ha la dza len+d+ra ya swA hA/ !/ shin tu mnyes par bya ba'i phyir// gnod sbyin dbang mo chen mo la// brgya
rtsa brgyad kyis chu sbyin bya// 'dod pa'i longs spyod char pa 'bebs// A+oM dzaM luM swA hA/ !/ 'di ni dbul ba kun sel ba'i// longs spyod yid bzhin bang mdzod can// dben gnas bsten pas kun sdud

pa// sgrub rdzas 'gugs pa'i mchog tu 'gyur/ !/ de nas rnal 'byor sgrub pa pos// lo thog bsrung ba rgyas mdzad pa'i/ sku mdog/ nag mo phyag na rdo rje 'dzin ma dang/ khyab 'jug sku mdog nag po phyag na 'khor lo

'chang ba dang// brgya byin dkar po phyag na rdo rje kha gdengs dang// gshin rje nag po phyag na be con 'chang byed cing// dus kyi sku mdog ser mo phyag na zhags pas bcing ba yi// dril ka ki dang lha lnga spyi yi kA li badzra

sngags// las bcol phur pa na di shaM phyogs bcing bar bya'o/ !/ A+oM ka ki ka ki/ ban d+ha ya ban d+ha ya/ gur ma ya yA/ bi d+h+wan+sa ya oM hU~M phaT swAhA/ !/ A+oM kA li badzra d+ha rI/ nag mo rdo rje 'dzin ma/ lo ka na ha na/ 'jig rten

skyong ma/ biSh+Nu tsakra ha na/ khyab 'jug gi 'khor los rgyob/ in+d+ra badzra ha na/ brgya byin gyi rdo rjes rgyob/ ya ma daN+Da ha na/ gshin rje'i be con gyis rgyob/ kA la pA shen ha na/ dus kyi zhags pa nag po rgyob/ oM hUM phaT swA hA/ lha rigs lnga po khyod kyis srungs/

!/ nyung dkar thal chen bzlas byas nas// 'bum du bzlas nas gtor byas na// yul khams gang nas 'byung ba yi// ser ba gcod par the tshom med/ !/ sngags 'di rnams gzhi legs sbyar yin 'dug kyang yig nor tshan cher

'dug pas slar dpyad dgos/ srin po za snas shar bcing ba// pUrbAM di shaM ban+b+ha mi/ pra da k+Sha sno na/ drag po gdong gi lho bcing ba/ ma ra k+Sha da k+Shi Na di sham b+han+d+ha mi/ srin po gdong gis nub bcing ba/ a ta ha so na/ na ma rak+Sha sa pash+tsi me d+hi/ sha

ba tra mi/ bi ti gnod sbyin gyis byang bcing ba sha na ma rak+Sha sa/ ut+ta ra pas di sham ban d+ha/ ban d+ha kar sno/ spyir dril te steng bcing ba/ na ma rak+Sha sa/ Ur+d+haM ban d+ha mi/ kar ko ta ko/ bud da ma ni/ btsug na nor

bus 'og bcing ba/ sa ta ma ban d+ha mi/ mi na nA ga rA dza/ di sha ma ban d+ha mi/ bi di sham ba na d+ha mi/ drag shul can gyis mtshams bcing ba/ ra ta ra oM he ru/ ti ka yi/ pan ta re ta ke'u/ kan ta re/ kan ta ra ta ya ti/ na di na

di ya hi/ ban d+ha mi na ma swA hA/ steng 'og phyogs mtshams su ma gnas par song zhig/ bum pa gtsang mar lo tog phud// mngar gsum dkar gsum blugs nas ni// lha yi tshogs la 'bul zhing bsngo// bcom ldan tshogs kyi

gtso bo yis// zla ba re la dus brgyad kyi// ser ba gtong ba bsrung ba'o/ !/ rnal 'byor las rnams kun bsgrub na// dben pa'i gnas su maN+Dal bya/ khrag gi zla gam steng du ni// srin mo'i lto bar ma mo'i

sku// thod pa'i nang na bzhugs pa la// mdun na wa sha'i dam rdzas dgram// oM badzra kro d+ha ya ke na shaM ki ma bra du ha ma hU~M b+h+yo hU~M dzaHdzaH srin mo 'od 'dus shang ka ti'i// nyi shu gsum la dbu btsugs nas// gnam
stong bar du bsgrub par bya// grub nas bsrung bzlog bsad pa 'grub/ !/ bzlog na thal chen nyung dkar la// sngags bzlas phyogs bcur gtor ba na// lha srin dam sri'i bar chad dag/ ji ltar 'dod pa bzlog

par 'gyur// oM badzra pra mo ha a lo ke nag mo bam mthun bzlog dza hU~M b+h+yo b+h+yo/ !/ bsrung na gtor ma'i dbus dag tu// bya mo nag mo'i sgo nga'i nang// nyung dkar thal chen sngags bzlas na// nor rdzas srU gang

'dod bsrung// oM badzra pra mo ha/ ha du ling nag mos srungs/ a nu ta ma phaT/ !/ gsad par 'dod na gtor ma yi// nang du gzugs bzhag skye tshe dang// nyung dkar nyung nag snying khrag bsres// gnag pa gang

yin bkug la brab// dzaHyak+sha nag mo/ rak+sha ya nag mo/ snying la shad shad b+h+yo/ che ge mo mugs nr-i rbad b+h+yo/ snying kha rag tshal pa rbad b+h+yo/ ma ma hU~M nan/ bam smugs/ hi rag mo kha tshe da ra ya mthun b+h+yo b+h+yo/ !/ yul

gyi ming ni kha che'i yul// rgya mtsho'i ming ni ma ga do// dur khrod ming ni he chen brdal// mchod rten ming ni ka ni ka/ ma mo 'od 'dus shang ka ti// gnas ni dur khrod he chen brdal// bsrung ni mchod rten ka ni
bsrung// dmar nag 'bar ba'i ral pa can// skad ni mi gcig kha cha'i skad// gzugs ni mi ston lag brgya mo// brda ni mi phrad lho bal mo// mched la gdug zhing dam la gnas// gdung ba'i mchi ma khrag tu
'dzag/ zhing chen g.yang gzhi'i dkyil 'khor du// dmar chen dam la gshegs su gsol// dus 'dir sgrub pa stsal du gsol// bka' dang dam las 'das gyur na// dpal chen he ru thugs khraus nas// dmar

smug nang du tshig ga re// oM badzra pra mo ha ba liM ta pra tits+tsha/ kha raM yo gi ni kha raM DA ki ni khA hi khA hi/ ma hA mAM sa rak+ta A mr-i ta khA hi khA hi ho/ !/ sangs rgyas bstan pa gnas 'dod na// rnal 'byor ma

gsum bsten par bya// skyes pa grir shi'i ka pA lar// gling gsum nang du bsag pa ni// gnam gyi ye d+har chen mo la// glang nag snying dang yum gyi pad+ma'i khrag/ bar gyi glog ma srin la// 'ug pa'i mig 'bras sbrul nag snying/

sa'i phung byed ma la// byan lag snying dang ra rog snying// phag pa rog po'i snying dang ni// bud med grir shi'i klad khrag bsag !/ g.yas dkar g.yon dmar mthing nag dbus// gser gyi rdo rje rgya gram g.yas// shes

rab dril bu g.yon pa na/ g.yas// bar ma ti ra zhing dbyug tha ma kha T+wAM ga/ g.yon pa bar thod khrag rak+ta g.yon tha ma rgyu zhags bsnams// oM badzra shrI he ru ka/ ma hA tsan d+ha sarba duSh+tAn ta ka ha na da ha pa tsa hUM/ sngon du

bdun 'bum rang lus bsrung/ ! gnam gyi ye d+har ma// bud med dbu dgu khyung zhon nag/ bar gyi glog ma srin// dmar mo kle'u gdong drug zhon/ sa li phung byed nag mo// nag mo kang kang mgo dgu zhon// mda' gzhu zhing dbyug

nad rkyal ni// gsum ka'i phyag bzhi dag na 'dzin/ !/ srog la sgrub pa'i drag sngags dang/ bod pas ma mo khug par bya ba 'bum bzlas/ rang nyid dang ma mo rtag tu mi 'bral bar 'grog rko long dang ldog pa dam mo// mtshon cha 'bar ba'i drag

sngags bzlas/ srog la sgrub pa'i sngags// du ri dun ting du la ya dzaH du ru dz+wa la ni ha na dzaH du ma ra ha te tsa b+h+yo dzaH mtshon cha 'bar ba'i drag sngags// dza dur dzaHsa ma ya dzaH dza e du li sa ma ya dzaH dza ra pra ti sa ma ya dzaH

!/ dbye ba'i sngags ni rnam pa gsum/ lha dang/ dbye ba stong dang dgra dgug pa stong dang bskrad pa'o// stong bzlas so// hU~M du lha dbye ba'i sngags so/ raM pra be shag/ dgra 'gugs pa'i sngags/ du ri pra ba chum ril/ hU~M mA ra ya

bskrad du na phaT/ rnam shes ling+ga la bstim pa stong// gzugs la bstim zhing/ ling+ga'i/ gzugs la dbab/ pa stong// gsang ba rab tu bshad pa'o// gzugs la bstim pa'i sngags/ ma hA ti ru na shag/ du na tshal pa dzaH gzugs la

dbab pa'i sngags/ hur tu hur tu shag/ shag tshal pa tshal pa dzaH pra ma kus ti pra ma kus ti hed hed dzaH !/ bsad ba srog la dbab pa dang/ zhag bdun// las bcol bas na mi ldang ba'i sngags/ zhag lnga// dkrugs

sngags gnad la dbab pa byol gyis gdab pa dang/ zhag gsum bya'o// thog dang ser ba dbab pa'o/ 'i sngags nyung dkar la bzlas/ bsad ba srog la dbab pa'i sngags// shang ka da ri dun ti na shag/ kang kang ri dur mi tsi ta sad/ sha

ma pa ri na tsa da ka ri hed/ las bcol ba'i sngags mi ldang ba'o// ma du ni shag he ra ni shag/ ku la du ma her ma her shag/ he ram thum ril mug ta shag shag/ du na du na tshal pa tshal pa/ srog nas dkrugs pa'i sngags// du ni dza

la ha de ni dza/ dun ting du ru ha na ni dza/ du la ma b+h+yo du mA ra ya/ dkrugs sngags kyi dgra yul du brdabs na phung ba'i las sna tshogs 'ong ngo// du ni byol gyi gdab pa'i sngags so/ til la ni ha na ha de b+h+yo// thog ser dbab pa'i

sngags so// ya ma sha sho phob/ mu sha phob/ pra ma sha ni phob/ phrom shar hril drag tu phob/ !/ 'brub khung ling+ga gnas pa la// dug sna khrag sna thun sngags nyung dkar la bzlas la thun gyi brabs na// dgra bo gang yin gtan

nas brlag/ thog ser 'bebs na sngags thun// lha klu rten la dbab na lo nad thog ser 'byung/ !/ gsang ba'i drag sngags rab bshad bya// rten dang dus dang sgrub pa yi/ khyad par kun gyis shes bya ste/ !/ rten
ni sgrub pa'i rnal 'byor pas// dus ngan 'di la gnas 'gyur na// bstan pa gnyan po 'jig pa dang// bla ma'i sku la bsngau ba kun// dus ni gza' skar ngan la 'jug/ bsgrub pa'i khyad par gang yin pa// gru

gsum thur du brkos byas la/ la nang sum brtsegs su// a par ta yi mgo bo dang/ g.yag gi mgo bo rwa dang bcas pa// sha ba ri yi nal bu'i rkang lag dang/ khru khru'i gzugs nal bu'i rkang sor gsum dang la gsor gsum ni rnam

gsum dang// bcu drug sor gyis rta nag po'i lag mig rkang dang bcas pas/ brdeg par bya// ma mo'i sngags ni oM tA re dang e ka dza Ti la bzlas pa/ 'bum du bya// lhag ma oM badzra shrI la rang la bzhi khri'o// he ru ka'i sngags/ A+oM badzra

shrI he ru ka/ ma hA tsan d+ha sarba duSh+tAn ta ka ha na da ha pa tsa hU~M phaT/ lha mo zhi ba'i sngags/ oM tA re tut+tA re tu re sarba 'gru khra re swA hA/ bod pa'i sngags 'di gnyis dril ba la 'bum mo// lha mo khro mo'i sngags/ e ka dza ti ru lu ru lu hU~M b+h+yo/

her shog/ las sbyor bsad pa'i sngags/ her ma shog/ her ma thum ril shog/ she 'dir thum tsit+ta rbad/ thum ril snying kha la rag+sha phrig phrig dun b+h+yo/ tsit+ta rbad yam/ shig tsit+ta rbad/ tsit+ta rmugs rbad/ hUM b+h+yo rbad/ thum dz+wa

la gur pa tri rbad/ !/ bsgrub bya'i khyad par bstan pa la// grub pa'i rtags na mngon sum 'ong ba dang// ba spu ldang dang chu la 'ong// rmi lam bud med legs ma dang// me tog ut+pal 'ong ba dang// zhag lnga dag

na dngos su 'ong// nag po dang ni dmar por 'ong/ !/ grub kyang las mi byed pa ni// gong ma bzhin du rtags byung nas// zhag bzhi pa nas med de 'gro// mi ro/ lhag ma rnams g.yag mgo nang der ni blugs la rta

sug gis brdung/ !/ ma grub par ni rtags mi 'ong// ma grub las kyang byed pa ni// nub bzhi ba nas 'ong ba'o/ !/ ma grub dbang du 'dus pa ni// dang po nyid nas 'ong ba ste// nyi ma lnga'am zhag lnga'am// zhag

lnga la ni brdeg pa'o/ !/ grub rung de ni ma grub rung// las ni byed par gyur pa ni// rtags ma byung yang dgra bo 'chi/ !/ mthe bo dang ni mdzub mo yis// gtor ma chu la nyal ba yod// lce pad+ma'i steng na sangs rgyas sman
lha bzhugs par bsam/ mchil ma bdud rtsir bsams la gtor ma chu'i nang du mchil ma gdab bo/ !/ lha mo ral pa gcig ma yi// 'gal ba cham la 'bebs pa ni// sgrol byaid chen mos g.yag mgor bsad// rta nag
lag pas brdung bar bya// rU tra'i sa bon rgyun yang 'chad// chos kyi 'khor lo rgyas par 'gyur/ !/ srin mo smug nag khros ma yis// thog dang ser ba dbab pa ni// dkyil 'khor gru gsum dbus dag

tu// rams dang ra khrag thun la bsgrub/ !/ bsnyen pa ser ba'i rgyu btsal ba'i sngags// oM ma hA tsa du nye kha lu yaM mun shar phe sha shal mur pa tse hu he tsu swA hA/ ma mo g.yas na zor ba la// g.yon na zhags pa bsnams par

bsgom/ !/ tsa ra'i rU pa rnam gsum du// thun rdzas blug la chu 'dril sngags/ sgrub pa chu dril gyi sngags/ tra ga rak+sha snying khrag lo la khA hi/ sa ma ya b+h+yo b+h+yo phrom phrom/ !/ ra yi ru ba rnam gsum po/ gnam

gta'// ri rtse bar gta' lha dang sa gta' zhing dkyil sba/ !/ dbang phyug nyi shu rtsa brgyad kyis// thog dang ser ba 'khrug cing 'bebs/ dbab pa ga ta'i sngags/ trag rak+sha snying khrag lo la tsi ta mA ra ya phob/ rag mo rag mo che ge mo'i yul

du phob ya/ phrom shar hril shar phob ya/ !/ gnad la 'bebs na ma mo yi// snying la sngags 'dis dkrug par bya'o// ma ma sarba duSh+taM tsit+ta rbad nan/ gdug byed chen mo khros pa ni// thog dang ser ba 'khrug cing
'bebs// zhes cho 'phrul sna tshogs kyi bdag pos gsungs so// he ru ka gal po chen po las/ gsang ba man ngag gi brtag pa ste bcu bdun pa'o//// de nas bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'chang chen pos chos

kyi sku'i rgyu mthun chen po 'di gsungs so// gang zhig sku gdung ring bsrel ni// rnal 'byor kun gy-i sgrub pa'i rten// dngos med me la sbyangs pa yis// dngos can gdung du 'byung bar 'gyur/ !/ dang por lha klu

zhi byas nas// snang dang mi snang sa blangs la// dkyil 'khor chen po'i dbus nyid du// mchod rten rin chen sna bzhis byas// 'og khang rmang gzhir gnas pa la// bar khang bang rim sgo bzhi pa// steng khang bum pa
ro yi gnas// mkhas pas rab tu mdzes par bya/ !/ bzang drug dri ldan ras spangs nas// ro la rab tu dril bar bya// sangs rgyas dpa' bo 'bru lnga dang// 'gro ba'i sa bon drug po dang// dug lnga dug gsum

la sogs pa'i// 'khor 'das sngags rnams gdags par bya// sbyang bya re dang sbyong byed res// ro la rab tu brgyan byas nas// lha dang rtog pa brang sprad la/ !/ rdo rje sa 'dzin bla ma dang// dkar byar bsngo dang

nag byang bsreg/ las mkhan la sogs gzungs thag bzung// gsang ba'i sngags kyis gdab par bya/ dmyal ba sbyong ba// A+oM da ha da ha sarba na ra ka ga te he tuM hU~M phaT/ yi dwags sbyong ba// A+oM pa tsa pa tsa sarba pre ta ka ga te

he tuM hU~M phaT/ dud 'gro sbyaung ba// A+oM ma tha ma tha sarba tir ya ka ga te he tuM hU~M phaT/ rigs drug spyir sbyong ba/ A+oM a nr-i su tri pre du hU~M phaT/ ! zhi ba'i dkyil 'khor shar du bya/ hom

shing// 'o ma can nam rtse mo'i shing/ ting nge/ dang ba'i sems dang rab ldan pas/ yum gang la bya ba// lcug phran ma yi bu mo yi// phur pa gang gis bya ba/ dngul lam dkar po'i phur pas gdab// rlung gang rgyu ba'i dus la bya ba// chu rlung rgyu ba'i dus su

sbyar// gdul bya gang gi don du bya ba// gti mug can gyi sems can rnams/ 'bras bu gang 'grub pa// nad dang gdon bgegs zhi bar 'gyur// a mu ka s+ya/ che ge mo zhig gi/ sarba gra ta bi g+ha nAn/ gdon bgegs thams cad/ sarba

dz+wa ra nAn/ rims thams cad/ sarba bya d+hi nAn/ nad thams cad/ sarba bi Sha nAn// dug thams cad/ sarba durni mi ta nan/ ltas ngan pa thams cad/ sarba a mang+ga la nan/ bkra mi shis pa thams cad/ sarba pA paM las kyi sgrib pa'i sdig pa thams cad zhi

bar karma Na pa ra Na nan/ zhi bar mdzod cig/ shAn+tiM ku ru swA hA/ !/ rgyas pa ser po lho ru bya// yal ga shing ngam gser shing dang// dga' ba'i sems ldan ban glang can// gser ram ser po'i phur bu la// gro yi khur

ba'i gtor ma dang// sa rlung rgyu ba'i dus nyid du// nga rgyal can gyi gdul bya rnams// tshe dang bsod nams 'phel bar 'gyur// a mu ka s+ya/ che ge mo zhig ge/ pu n+ya s+ya/ bsod nams dang/ dz+nyA na s+ya/ ye shes dang/ shri yaH

dpal dang/ te dza s+ya/ gzi byin dang/ a yu She/ tshe dang/ ba la s+ya/ mthu dang/ sarba sam b+hau ga s+ya/ longs spyod thams cad/ puSh+tiM ku ru swA hA/ rgyas par mdzod cig !/ dbang ni nub tu zla gam dmar// sdong po'i shing ngam seng ldeng
can// chags pa'i sems kyis sdong gcig ma'i// b+ha gar zangs kyi phur pas gdab// ram bu'i gtor ma dmar po 'bul// 'dod chags can gyi bud med dang// yul khams rgyal blon dbang du 'gyur// me

rlung rgyu ba'i dus dang bstun// a mu ka s+ya/ che ge mo zhig gi sarba gra ha bi g+ha nAn/ gdon thams cad/ sarba dz+wa ra nan/ rims thams cad/ sarba bi Sha nAn/ dug thams cad/ sarba pA paM karma Na pa ra Na nAn/ las kyi sgrib pa'i sdig pa thams

cad/ yi ke tsi ti/ gang su yang rung ste/ na ta byi ba/ ma bzhag par/ tsha li ba/ phyung zhig/ phe li ba/ thon cig/ A kar+Sha ya/ drongs shig a mu kaM duSh+ta bi nAn/ bdag la sdang ba'i sems dang ldan pa/ sarba gra ha bi g+ha nAn/ gdon bgegs thams cad/ sarba

dz+wa ra rims nad thams cad gra yo ga ta bi g+ha nAn/ gdon bgegs ma lus pa rnams/ a kra ma tiSh+ta gats+tsha gats+tsha/ 'di na ma gnas par song zhig dwe Sha Na sarba gra ha bi g+ha nAn/ gnod byed kyi gdon bgegs thams cad/ u tsa ta yu/ skrod

cig/ a mu ka s+ya/ che ge mo'i/ kA ya tsit+ta/ lus dang sems dang/ A yu:shrI/ tshe dang dpal dang/ te dzaH gzi byin/ sarba rak+Sha/ thams cad srung/ a mu kaM che ge mo zhig la/ sid+d+h+yan+tu yin nam/ bi ta yan ti/ gnod par byed pa'i/ sarba gra ha bi g+ha

nAn/ gdon bgegs thams cad/ A kar+Sha yA/ khug chig d+ha ra zung zhig a gats+tsha/ drongs shig/ ban+d+ha ban+d+ha/ chings shig sI mA ban d+ha ma ku ru/ mtshams chod cig badzra shr-id kha le na ban+d+ha ya/ rdo rje'i lcags sgrog tu chings shig mo

ha ya mo ha ya/ rmongs shing myos par gyis shig ku ru ba shaM ku ru hU~M swA hA/ dbang du gyur cig !/ byang du drag po gru gsum nag/ rtsa ba'i shing ngam tsher ma can// lugs sa rlung gi rlung rgyu'i dus/ khros pa'i sems ldan lcags

phur gdab// shing shing nag po sha khrag gam// dug gi gtor ma mi sha khrag/ ling+ga khrag gis bris pa dang// gtum zhing khros pa gsod par byed// a mu ka s+ya/ che ge mo bdag la gnod pa la/ badzra mut+ga re Na/ rdo rje tho ba dang/

mut+ga re Na/ tho ba dang/ daN+De na/ dbyug pas/ ta ta ya/ chod cig ha na/ rgyob cig bi tsi tra/ sna tshogs/ pra ha re b+h+yaH rab tu 'phrog pa'i/ ha na ha na/ rgyob cig rgyob cig khA d+ha phaT/ zo shig rab tu zo shig ts+tshi da ya/ chod cig/ da ha na/ sregs

shig/ mA ra ya/ sod/ ma hA kro d+ha/ khro bo chen po/ dz+wa le na/ me dbal 'bar ba/ da ha da ha/ sregs shig sregs shig/ b+ha smi ku ru/ thal bar rlogs/ pa ra bi byA na tshe da ya/ gzhan gyi rig sngags gcod pa/ man+t+ra/ gsang sngags/ kr-i t+ya ka kho rdA di nA

nA pra yo ga byang byed pa la sogs pa'i bsam pa ngan pa/ duSh+ta/ gdug pa/ ba lA nAM/ nus pa'i dbal dang/ sarba te dzo nAM/ gzi byin 'bar ba thams cad/ bya ba d+ha ya/ bzlog cig/ a mu ka s+ya/ che ge mo zhig la/ sarba braha bi g+ha nAM/ gnod par byed

pa'i gdon bgegs thams cad/ kI la yA mi/ phur bus gdab bo// s+t+wam b+ha yA mi/ mnan no/ a d+ha me/ gdon phob/ pa shang ku ru/ bdag gi dbang du gyis shig gr-i h+Na/ zung zhig sa hA ya ta hi tan/ grogs dang phrol zhig dz+wa la ba yA/ smrar chu gcig

o tsa tsa da/ myogs par gyis/ A be sha/ phob cig tshin d+h+ya ba ta ya/ gtubs shig/ gzir cig k+Sha na ha ra/ phrogs shig sa ha sra rasmi/ 'od zer stong gis/ badzra ma b+ha ba tu/ rdo rjer gyur cig ni rma Na/ skul ba/ a pra me ya/ gzhal du med pa/

ang+ku sha/ khug cig/ A kar+Sha ya/ drongs shig/ tshe da ya/ chod cig/ swA dA ya/ rol cig tshin d+hA ya/ gtubs shig s+t+wam b+ha ya/ non cig/ a mu kaM che ge mo zhig gi a la tra taM/ gnod par byed pa'i/ sarba gra ha bi g+ha nA/ gdon bgegs thams

cad/ ba la me la ka/ mthu dang dpung dang/ sarba mi spo ta ya/ thams cad shig cig kro d+ha kro d+hI/ khro bo khro mos/ sarba du ti nAM/ pho nya mo thams cad kyis/ a tsi re na karma ku ru/ phrin las myur du mdzod cig/ mA ra ya mA ra ya/ sod cig sod/ !/ zhi

ba'i me ni 'bar zhing dkar// rgyas pa 'od 'phro rab tu gsal// dbang la dmar la dri yang zhim// drag po 'ur sgra che ba yin// 'bar du mi nyan 'chi ba dang// tseg sgra 'phro dang du bas 'tshubs// brtul zhugs

bskyed la blo ldan pas// las dang mthun par las la sbyar/ !/ me lha ra skyes zhon pa la// drang srong phya bzhi bgrang phreng dang// me thab zhugs shing sbyin pa gtong/ me lha'i// lto bar bskyed pa gsal ba'i dkyil
'khor ram/ lha mchod pa dang/ me lha// dpang por gnas la lha mchod pa dbul ba ni// phrin las rnam bzhi'i dgang gzar nang// blugs gzar bdun nam gsum shong bas// sbyin sreg bdun nam

nyi shu gcig/ brgya rtsa brgyad du dbul bar bya// las dang rim par ldan pa yin/ !/ chos nyid rnam dag hom khung nang// chos can mtshan ma'i sbyin bsreg thim/ !/ snang srid snang ba'i hom khung du// bcud kyi
sems can sbyin bsreg thim/ !/ rig ma yum gyi b+ha ga'i klong// byang sems sa bon sbyin bsreg thim/ !/ kun gzhi srid pa'i hom khung du// yid kyi rnam shes sbyin bsreg thim/ !/ yi ge e ni drag po'i

las// baM gyis dbang du sdud par 'gyur// ma zhes bya ba rgyas par byed// yA ni zhi ba chen por gnas/ !/ lkog ma gru gsum drag po la// ro stod gru bzhi rgyas pa ste// lte ba zlum po zhi ba nyid// gsang ba zla kham

dbang du byed// thal bar bsdus te sku gdung gdab// chos nyid don gyi sku gdung las/ 'gyur ba med par gnas pas// 'byung ba rtags kyi sku gdung shar/ ba gang zhe na// phyi ni dbus kyi ri rab lhun por grub/ rin po che sna bzhi

pa// nang ni gzugs kyi phung por shar// nang lus mchod rten gyi dbyibs su// gsang ba b+ha gar 'i nang du sa baun 'byung ba chags/ mchod rten du// de nyid kun gzhi rnam shes tshogs brgyad klong/ dang bcas pa'i// rtogs nas

tshogs chen bsag par bya/ pa rang don du gdab/ gzhan don du gdab pa// phrin las rnam bzhi sgrub pa dang// 'jig rten thun mong gi ngag mnan pa la sogs pa/ las rnas ma lus 'grub// tshe 'das kyi don du sgrib pa sbyong bar byed/

tsha tshe'i rgyu ni// srog chags bral ba'i sa dang chu// rin chen lnga bdar dri sna tshogs pa dang rab ldan pas/ gdab thabs kyi bya ba/[ (]ka[) ]/ rgyar bkos phor du gzhug [(]kha[)]brdung zhing [(]ga[)]dbyung ba dang/[ (]nga[) ]/ bzhugs la [(]ca[)]rab

tu gnas pa dang/[ (]cha[) ]/ gshegs nas [(]ja[)]tshogs bsag [(]nya[)]bzod par gsod// thams cad gsang sngags bshad par bya// A+oM d+harma [(]ka[)]d+hA tu gar+b+he swA hA/ rgyar gzhug pa'i sngags/ A+oM [(]kha[)]badzra mut+ga ra a ko Ta ya swA hA/

brdung ba'i sngags/ A+oM d+harma [(]ga[)]d+hA tu swA hA/ rgya nas dbyung ba'i/ A+oM a [(]nga [)]pra ti tiSh+Tha badzra swA hA/ bzhugs su gsol ba'i/ oM sarba ta thA ga ta ma Ni sha ta dI pa te dz+wa la dz+wa la d+harma d+hA tu gar+b+he swA hA/ rab tu gnas pa'i sngags nas la bzlas la

gtor// gshegs su gsol ba/ oM swa b+hA wa bi shud+d+he A ha ra A ha ra A gats+tsha ya A gats+tsha ya d+harma d+ha tu gar+b+he swA hA/ bskor ba bya ba'i sngags/ na [(]ja[)]mo phyag 'tshal lo/ b+ha ga wa te rat+na ke tu rA dzA ya/ bcom ldan 'das rin chen tog gi rgyal po

la/ ta thA ga tA ya/ de bzhin gshegs pa la/ ar+ha te b+h+yaH dgra bcom pa rnams la/ saM myaka saM bud+d+hA ya/ yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas la/ tad+ya thA/ 'di lta ste/ oM rat+na rat+na/ rin po che rin po che/ ma hA rat+na/ chen po rin po che/ rat+na rin po che

bi dza ye rnam par rgyal ba la swA hA/ bzod par gsol ba'i sngags/ A+oM a [(]nya[)]gar+g+he swA hA/ !/ mchod pa rnam pa lnga yang dbul// nas 'bru la rten 'brel gyi gsang sngags bzlas byas nas/ la stag pa'i nang du blug la gdab po// nang du
blugs la stag pa ye shes sgyu ma'i ngang las nang na/ yi dam lha// gzhal yas khang na gzhugs par bsam/ !/ mthar thug 'bras bu'i sku gdung ni// sku gsum sa la gnas pa ni// ye shes rnam lngas

brgyan par 'gyur// bcu gcig kun du 'od la chos sku/ bcu gnyis ma chags pad+ma can longs sku/ bcu gsum yi ge 'khor lo tshogs chen sprul sku// chos kyi sku la rab tu bzhugs// zhes gsungs so// he ru ka'i gal po las/ gdung bsreg
phrin las kyis sku gdung bzhengs su gsol ba'i brtag pa ste bco brgyad pa'o//// de nas bcom ldan 'das gsang ba mchog gi bdag pos gsang ba tshe'i las 'di 'gro ba'i ched du gsungs so// rang don du tshe

lo stong drug brgya thub pa la gzhan don du bsgyur nas bzhugs pa'o// tshe dbang rig 'dzin bsgrub pa'i phyir// rdo rje g.yung drung gsang ba'i mkhar// 'gyur ba med pa'i tshe ni rdo rje pha lam lta bu'o// sku tshe ring ba'i dpa'o// nyi zla bzhin du rab gnas pa// tshe mchog

gsang ba 'chi med 'grub/ !/ dpal tshangs pa'i tshe lo ltar thub pa'am/ lha'i dbang po'i tshe ltar thub pa'o// tshe lo stong drug brgyar gnas pa'i rig 'dzin no/ !/ gsang sngags gsang ba bsgrub pa'i gang zag gis/ ! dang po tshe'i dngos grub kyis rang

skal gyi tshe las khyad par du 'phags pa 'grub ste/ tshe lo brgya pa yin na nyis brgyar gnas pa'am/ tshe lo drug cu pa yin na brgyar gnas pa lta bu'o// dang por tshe yi dngos grub ma thob na// bgegs kyi rkyen gyis tshe srog bar bcad nas// bla na med

pa'i byang chub mi 'thob pas/ !/ dang por bdag don tshe yi bsgrub pa bya// hU~M zhes brjod pas phyi nang snod bcud dang lus ngag yid/ gsum/ bsregs nas stong pa'i ngang las gnyis bsam pa sngags 'di brjod pa/

pa/ badzra shrI he ru ka hU~M/ zhes pa phyi/ dur khrod kyi gzhal yas khang la nang 'khor lo'i rtsibs brgyad steng 'og gnyis te bcu pa/ khro bo me ri 'dab 'byor// sgo nga'i sbubs lta bu'i nang na khro bo bcu me ri me dpung 'bar/
ba'o// de'i dbus su hrIH zhes pas hrIH las dpal rta mgrin zhal gsum pa/ sku mdog/ dmar po phyag drug pa 'jigs pa/ dbyug pa g.yu 'brug bsnams/ de'i/ thugs kar e gru gsum las chos kyi 'byung gnas

bsgom de'i dkyil du b+h+ruM/ la// gzhal yas khang de'i nang du dpal chen he ru ka/ zhal gsum phyag drug pa bsgom de yi thugs nang du/ bdag khrag 'thung zhal gcig phyag gnyis pa bsgom/ rdor dril 'chang// dai yi snying

gi dkyil du pad+ma 'dab brgyad pa la// de'i dkyil du yi ge a dang nr-i bsam/ 'dab ma brgyad la oM b+hUM badzra A yu She hUM AHzhes pa brgyad bsam/ de la/ nr-i ljang gu gnas pa ni thog ma med pa nas nyon mongs pas bcings pas 'khor ba'i ra skye

ba dang log par 'khrid pa rgyu/ de la/ a dkar po ni mtho ris thar par 'gro ba'i gzhi/ yin no// de la/ nr-i sbyor ba'i phyir pad+ma nas yig 'bru rnams yid la gsal bar dgong/ brgyad par gnas// A+oM b+h+rUM badzra A yu She

hU~M AH oM las drangs pa'i gsang sngags brgya rtsa brgyad kyis gti mug sbyang// hU~M las drangs pa brgya rtsa brgyad kyis ni zhe sdang sbyang trA~M las drangs pa brgya rtsa brgyad kyis ni nga rgyal sbyang la// 'dod chags hrIH las drangs pa brgya rtsa brgyad

kyis 'dod chags sbyang las phrag dog hA las drangs pa brgya rtsa brgyad kyis phrag dog sbyang zhes bya// de ltar/ 'od lnga dkar dmar sar mthing ljang las 'od 'phros te/ nr-i la phog pas dug lnga sbyongs// ye shes lnga dang ldan pa'i nr-i yang kha

dog lnga/ 'i rang bzhin du gnas pa de/ phar/ 'phros nas don gnyis byas tshur 'dus te nr-i la thim pas hUM du gyur// a las 'od yi 'phro sa 'dus pas zla ba'i gab tshe kha sbyor du gyur pa dang hU~M/ du gyur hU~M las 'od 'phros/ bskul

don gnyis byas 'od phung chen por gnas par 'gyur/ sngags 'di brjod pas ye shes sems dpa' sku tshon gang bar gyur par bsam/ s+pho Ta badzra sa twa a A+oM/ ye shes sems dpa' tshon gang/ bde la dbang bskur ba byin brlab bya/ dbang

byin nas// zla ba gab tshe 'i nang na pad+ma'i yig 'bru gsal/ bar bya/ de las// 'od 'phros pas bde gshegs kyi sku dang ye shes dang/ khams gsum gyi 'gro ba'i bkrag dang gzi mdangs dang// rtsi bcud thams cad
bsdus nas ye shes sems dpa' zla bar bcas/ pa la/ 'ub 'ub// 'dus te thim par bsam mo/ ma gsal bar du bzlas pa bya/ 'o// 'di ni yang dag thugs kyi tshe sgrub yin// rdzas dang yo byad dag la rag ma

lus/ thugs ye shes kyi man ngag gi bsgrub pa'o// bsgrub pa'i dus ni gung sangs nas nyi ma ma shar ba'i bar dang/ nyi ma/ nub nas sa ni ma sros pa'i bar du bya/ ste/ 'dis ni// tshe la dbang ba'i rig 'dzin 'thob par

byed pa'i// ye shes thugs kyi man ngag bsgrub pa'o/ !/ gzhan don byed par 'dod pa'i rnal 'byor pas// ling tshe dgu pa'i dbus su gtso bo le'u tshe brgyad la lha mo brgyad dkyil 'khor bar khyams la khro bo bcu/ sgo dang
bcas// bum pa tshe chang zan la mda' dar dmar// dkyil 'khor yang na ci rig bkod pa dang// mtshams bcad dpal gyi dkyil 'khor bskyed byas nas// sma sha nag mo tshe yi pho nya mngags// tshe bdag chen mo

he ru ka/ thugs mchog/ dbang du sdud mdzad tshe'i srung ma rta mgrin dpal// gza' skar 'joms pa'i steng phyogs nyi zla gza' skar lag nas tshe 'gugs pa'i lha hU~M kA ra/ shar phyogs// dri za 'i lag nas tshe 'gugs pa'i lha 'dul ba rnam

par rgyal/ shar lho drang srong me lha'i lag nas tshe 'gugs pa// dbyug sngon drag srong me lha 'joms/ lho/ 'chi bdag gi lag nas srog 'phrog pa tshar gcod gshin rje gshed/ lho nub// srin po 'i lag nas sha khrag 'gugs pa/ 'dul ba mi

g.yo mgon/ nub phyogs// klu rnams kyi lag nas dpal 'phrog pa'i bsrung mdzad rta mchog dpal/ nub byang// rlung lha 'i lag nas dbugs 'phrog pa'i 'joms pa'i gzhan mi thub/ byang phyogs// gnod sbyin gyi lag

nas longs spyod 'gugs pa'i lha/ dbang bsgyur bdud rtsi 'khyil// bgegs rnams kyi lag nas srog 'phrog pa bsrung mdzad khams gsum rgyal// stobs chen gyis klu gnyan sa bdag gi lag nas cho 'dren 'dul// mkha' 'gro ma

brgyad skul ba// shar nas dkar mo zhi mdzad ma// lho nas rkun mo rgyas mdzad ma// nub nas rmongs mo dbang sdud ma// byang nas thal byed gsong la brtson// spaus mo dang ni sme mo dang// gtum mo chen mo ma tshogs

ma// sma sha nag mo tshe yi pho nya bdag/ tshe bdag chen mos tshe drongs la// 'chi med rdo rjai dpal gy-i be'u ru// mi 'gyur brtan par mdzad du gsol/ lha rang rang gi snying po'i zhabs la sngags 'dis dgug go/ A yur+dz+nyA na b+h+rUM nr-i dzaH
dus gsum bde bar gshegs pa mchod// sku gsung thugs kyi dngos grub bsdu// 'gro ba rigs drug gi sgrib pa sbyang// sku dang ye shes mthu dang byin rlabs dang// bkrag dang gzi mdangs thams cad bsdus

te thugs kyi ga 'ur bsdu// bsdus pa khro bcus srid pa'i rlung gis yang mi thar bar bsrung/ ste bzlas brjod bya'o/ !/ de nas dkyil 'khor bsdu ba 'dod na// snang grags chos rnams thams cad gzhal yas khang la

bsdu de rta mgrin la bsdu gzhal yas 'dus/ rta mgrin yang khrag 'thung thugs kyi lha la he ru ka la bsdu de yang ye shes sems dpar 'dus/ de yang hU~M la bsdu// hU~M gi de yang rim pas thig le spyi gtsug tshangs par 'i bu ga thim/ pas dbu'i gtsug tor grub

pa'o// 'chi bdag bdud bcom dbu yi gtsug tor 'grub// thugs kyi hU~M nyid sku yi gtso bor gyur// tshe yi rig 'dzin nyi zla'i tshe dang mnyam// zhes gsungs so// he ru ka'i gal po las/ rdo rje tshe bsgrub pa ste
brtag pa bcu dgu pa'o//// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis 'gro ba ngan song nas drang ba'i dgongs pa 'di dag gsungs so// gang zhig tshe 'das nas zhag gsum brgyal ba ltar chos nyid rang lugs su

gnas/ pa'o// de nas zhag gsum par rang gi lus yin snyam pa'i bag chags kyis srid pa bar do'i gnas su 'khyam/ gshin rje chos rgyal gyi drung du las kyi me long mthong nas// 'chi bdag bran byas las kyis kha lo bsgyur// bag chags

khams gsum 'khor bar yang yang skye// las dge sdig gi dbang du 'gro bas na bdun tshigs zhes bya'o/ !/ bar do'i gnas nas thugs rjes drang ba'i phy-ir// rtsa ba'i dkyil 'khor chen po'i lhau phyogs su// dmyal ba gru gsum sgo

gcig dbus ni tri// yi dwags zla gam sgo gcig pre dmar dbus// dud 'gro zlum po du ni rgya mtsho'i dbus// sog ka sgo gcig nr-i dbus gling bzhi'i mi// 'khor lo rtsibs bzhi lha min su ser po// pad+ma 'dab
brgyad a dkar lha yi gnas/ !/ bum pa rdzas dang gzungs thag kha rgyan bcas/ khyad par gyi mchod pa// sman raka gtor ma gsum dang thun mong mchod pa lnga/ 'gugs pa// lcags kyu bgegs bskrad pa gu

gul nyung dkar sngags kyi mda'// rgyab rten dang phral ba'i gshed 'bral lo/ !/ mtshan/ lha yi thub pa brtson 'grus chos ston phyag mtshan pi wang bsnams/ mtshan/ lha min thub pa bzod pa'i chos ston phyag mtshan go cha gyon// mi

yi thub pa gseg par tshul khrims bsrung// byol song thub pa po ti shes rab sgron// yi dwags thub pa sbyin gtor rin chen sgrom// dmyal ba'i thub pa bsam gtan me dang chu/ !/ dmyal khams rdo rje gdan gyi

'og nas 'dren// gnas gang na gnas na// dmyal ba'i srog snying sa bon yi ge tri nag po// yi dwags gnas grong khyer ser skya'i gnas nas drongs// bkres skom srog gi snying po pre dmar po// dud 'gro phyi yi rgya mtsho

chen po'i nang// glen lkugs srog snying du ni du dkar gnas// mi yi gnas ni gling bzhi gling phan bcas// 'gyur byed nr-i ljang mi yi thub snying yin// ri rab khong seng nang na lha min gnas// 'thab rtsod lha min
srog snying ser po su// lha yi gnas ni ri rab rtse la gnas// de yi srog snying a dkar 'dod yon chags/ !/ lha yi yon tan ni mngon par shes pa mnga'// lha ma yin gyi yon tan ni mgo bcad 'byar bar

'gyur// mi la dam tshig sdom pas lam sna 'dren// byol song rnams ni lto gos btsal bar sla// yi dwags zas skom bsngos pas tshims par 'gyur// dmyal ba sngon gyi las dran snga phyi shes/ !/ tshe ring lha yin lha

min rtag tu 'thab// bde sdug/ 'gyur ba mi la ltos gos gnyis kyis sbyangs// sdug bsngal gyi sdug bsngal brtseg mar spyod pa'i byol song dang// bkres skom yi dwags tsha grang dmyal ba'i gnas/ !/ rang bzhin

gnas pa'i bar do gnas lugs kyi don rtogs par bya/ gzhi ru gnas// chos nyid bar do blta ba thag gcad pa dag la gnas pa dang// ting 'dzin bar bsgom pa nyams su blang ba do 'byongs pa'i rnal 'byor pas// srid pa'i

bar ma do na las kyi 'phro brgyud 'khyams pa rnams/ bdun tshigs phan pa'i dpe// gdung chen mi brgyas theg par mi 'gyur yang/ gdung chen de/ lteng ka'i chur gnas na mdzub mo reg tsam 'dren/ gyis gar 'dod// gson po'i

dus na dge ba chen po byas pa las gshin po'i dus su dge ba chung ngu phan pa che'o/ mi brgyas mi thub lam log kyang/ khugs pa'i dpe// ting 'dzin phra mos rang gi gnas su 'gugs// skye ba rnam bzhi nas 'gugs thabs// sgong skyes bcag nas

mngal gyi nang nas 'dral// skye ba blangs nas khro bor sprul nas bsgral// rdzus skyes de ma thag tu 'gugs pa dang// thabs mkhas pa'i dpe// lcags kyi gtun bu chung yang chu'i gting du 'gro// de nyid thabs la mkhas

na sbyang ltar byas na mkha' la 'phyo/ !/ dug lnga rnam dag ye shes chen po'i khrus// rnam shes thugs kyi khrus gsol/ phung po rnam dag pa'i/ dang po bris sku la sogs la me long gis khrus gsol/ de nas ming byang la khrus bya/ chu de chu bo'am

gtsang sar bskyal lo// me long ye shes sku khrus kyis// zhe sdang nyon mongs bag chags bkrus// mi bskyod rdo rje sems dpar 'gyur// gzugs kyi phung po rnam dag pa'i// chos dbyings ye shes khrus gsol bas/ ma

rig gti mug bag chags sbyang// rnam par snang mdzad sku thob shog/ yon tan gyi/ tshor ba'i phung po rnam dag pa'i// mnyam nyid ye shes khrus gsol bas// nga rgyal dri ma dag gyur nas// rin chen 'byung ldan skur

'grub shog/ gsung gi sku khrus// 'du shes phung po rnam dag pa'i// so sor rtog pa'i ye shes chus// 'dod chags nyon mongs dag gyur nas// snang ba mtha' yas sku mchog brnyes// phrin las// 'du byed phung po rnam dag

pa'i// bya ba grub pa'i ye shes chus// phrag dog nyon mongs byang gyur nas// don yod grub pa'i sku thob shog/ dug gsum sku gsung thugs kyi khrus gsol// ye shes chu bo khrus kyi rdzing// rnam rtog dri ma sbyong byed pas// dug

gsum sgrib pa dag gyur nas// sku gsum lhun gyis grub par shog/ hU~M hU~M ka la k+Sha khaM/ khrus bya ba'i sngags// las dang nyon mongs bag chags rnams// sbyor bar byed pa sngags yin pas// gsang sngags rab tu bshad

par bya// bzlas brjod brtson pas 'phro 'du bya// sngags rnams thams cad bsdus pa'i mchog/ sku gsung thugs// rdo rje mi phyed gsum bsgoms pas// sku gsung thugs kyi gnas su sngags bkod nas// rdo rje'i bzlas pas ye

shes mchog/ mi phyed sku gsum dkyil 'khor dang// sku zla ba'i steng du oM dkar po gsung lce la pad+mar AHdmar thugs snying gar nyi ma la hU~M mthing ga/ sangs rgyas ye shes 'thob 'gyur ba// sku gsung thugs rdo rje lta bur 'grub pa'i oM AHhU~M la// rdo

rje bzlas pa'i sbyor ba yis// sangs rgyas kun gyis byin rlob pa// gsang sngags rdo rje'i bzlas pa 'di// rab tu 'bad nas bsnyen par bya// oM rlung phyir ldang ba AH khong du gnas pa hU~M/ nang du 'jug pa/ !/ sngags

kyi don kun bzlas pa ni// rdo rje mi phyed sku rdo rje spyi bor zla ba la oM/ gsung lce la pad+mar AH thugs snying gar nyi ma la hU~M/ gsum gyi mtshan// rdo rje dbye ba gsum gyi mthar/ swA hA sbyar// bkod pa rdo rje gsum zhes bya// oM sku AH

gsung hU~M thugs swA yon tan hA/ phrin las/ !/ sku gsung thugs kyi gnas rnams su// spro sku tshangs pa'i bu ga nas oM dkar po spro/ gsung mgrin pa nas AHdmar/ thugs snying ga nas hU~M mthing ga spro/ ba rnam pa gsum dag bya// rdo rje'i

bzlas pa 'di yis ni// rdo rje sku rdo rje 'gyur ba med/ gsung rdo rje 'gag pa med/ thugs rdo rje skye shi med par 'gyur ro/ gsum gyi thugs 'drar 'gyur// oM hU~M swA hrIHa phaT dza/ oM AHhU~M/ yang byung/ !/ sangs rgyas rnams ky-is sku
gsung thugs/ oM AHhU~M bsgom// bsgoms nas mchod pa'i mchog bya'o/ brtag pa// ye shes rdo rje byas na ni// rdo rje gsum gyi thugs 'drar 'gyur// oM AHhU~M phaT dza/ !/ sangs rgyas rnams kyi sku

gsung thugs// bsam nas gzugs kyi mchog brtag pa// ye shes rdo rjer rab tu bya// 'di ni byang chub mchog thob pa'o// oM bo d+hi tsit+ta ma hA su kha dz+nyA na d+hA tu a/ oM ru lu ru lu hU~M b+h+yo hU~M/ a nr-i su tri pre du/ sho d+ha

ne sho d+ha ne/ sarba pA paM bi sho d+ha ne swA hA/ !/ dang po rten bcas mi 'i lus su dbug la tshogs/ bsags// gnyis pa lha dbang sta gon gnas/ tshogs rdzogs nas lha'i lus kyi dkyil 'khor du zhugs// gsum pa dkyil 'khor rang gi

skal pa dang sbyar nas/ dbang bskur nas// bzhi pa dbang thob nas zhi bas bsnyen pa bya/ bsnyen pa rdzogs nas// lnga pa khro bo bsgrub pa la// drug pa a las sgrub pa'i 'bras bu rang don du chos sku 'thob// bdun pa gzhan don du
gzugs sku 'gro don mdzad// bdun tshogs zhes ni mgon pos gsungs// he ru ka'i gal po chen po las/ bar do nas sangs rgyas ba'i brtag pa ste nyi shu pa'o//// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis sku
gsung thugs kyi rten rab tu gnas pa 'di dag gsungs so// sku gsung thugs kyi rten rnams la// ye shes bzhugs pa'i byin rlabs can// 'khor ba'i 'byung ba lha yi gnas// sku dang gsung dang thugs nyid yin/

!/ dang po skar ma rgyal la zhugs// dben pa'i gnas su maN+Dal ni// pad+ma bzhi pa bris pa la/ !/ bum pa lnga ni gzhag par bya// me long ngos la tsan+dan chus// rten 'brel yi ge bris nas ni// brgya brgya tshang nas

bum par blug/ rin chen sna tshogs sman gyi chu// sngags ldan bum pa gang ba la// gzungs thag sngags pa lngas bzung nas// rigs lnga spyi'am so so ru// bskyed cing spyan drangs mchod pa dang// rigs lnga'i sngags

la rten 'brel gdags// zhag gsum rab tu bzlas pa bya// yang na ma 'byor gcig gis bsgrub/ !/ chos sku'i rten ni mchod rten la// phyi rgyu'i chos lam lnga sa bcu rdzogs// rgyu nang la 'bras bu'i chos sku gsung thugs rdzogs/

'bras chos rnams rdzogs par bsgom// rin chen sna bzhi'i mchod rten nang// mchod rten nyer lha khang yin te lha khang dang mchod rten rab gnas 'dra'o// sku gsum sangs rgyas dus gsum bzhugs// gzugs sku'i sku gzhi'i lha ni

rten ni sku gsung thugs// lugs ma ri mo la sogs pa// spyir na rnam par snang mdzad bzhi// yang na rigs bdag gang yin lha// po ti gsung gi gzhi dang lha ni/ glegs bam la sogs gsung// mtha' yas mchog tu

bsgom pa bya// yang na yi dam rigs gang yin// rdo rje dril bu la sogs kun/ thugs kyi gzhi dang lha ni// mi bskyod rdo rje 'dzin pa'am// gang yin rigs sam yi dam lha// sku gsung thugs dang rigs lngar 'dus/
!/ dang po shing shun ras la sogs// sku ni shin tu phye bar bya// dri bzang byugs nas gtsang ma las// lha yi dkyil 'khor rab bskyed nas// ye shes dkyil 'khor gzhug par bya// dbang po skyon

rnams rab bsal te// bdud rtsi lnga dang sha lnga dang// rmad du byung ba'i gtor ma dbul// spos dang mar me me tog bshos// dri chab la sogs mchod pa 'bul// gdan dang rgyan dang na bza' dang// rgyal srid

rin chen sna bdun 'bul/ !/ rig pa'i dbang lnga bskur bar bya// bum pa'i chu ni mi bskyod dbang// cod pan rin chen 'byung ldan la// rdo rje snang ba mtha' yas nyid// dril bu don yod grub pa ste// ming ni rnam
par snang mdzad do// sku la byin rlob gsang ba'i dbang// gsung la shes rab ye shes nyid// thugs la bde ba chen po'i dbang// mi zad rgyan gyi 'khor lor 'gyur/ !/ 'dod pa'i yon tan rnam pa
lngas// tshogs kyi 'khor lo rab bskor nas// zhal bsro chen po rab mdzad la// 'jig rten ma stongs bar gyi dus// sems can lus ngag sgrib sbyong ba'i// don mdzad chos kyi 'khor lo bskor// bzhugs par
gsol ba gdab pa bya/ !/ 'khor na gnas pa'i chos skyong rnams// gsang sngags srung mar gnyer gtad la// dgra yi 'jigs pa srung byed pa'i// dkor srung byed par bka' yang bsgo// zhes gsungs so// he
ru ka'i gal po chen po las/ sku gsung thugs kyi rten rab tu gnas pa'i brtag pa ste nyi shu gcig pa'o//// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshogs gtor chen po 'di gsungs so// sbyin bsreg la bzla mkha' 'gro
bskyang// tshogs kyi 'khor lo rab tu bskor// gsang sngags don rnams kun bsdus pa// tshogs dang gtor mar rab tu 'dus/ !/ dben pa'i gnas su mtshams bcad nas// tshogs kyi nang du 'du ba ni// skal

ldan mi'i tshogs/ 'byor ldan yo byad kyi tshogs/ dga' ldan lha'i tshogs so/ khro bo sngon po shin tu mdzes// sgo srung mi g.yo ba dang gshin rje gshed/ khyod ni dam tshig bsrung zhing bsgrub pa de nga yang yid du 'ong// nor bu gces pa'i rin chen

bcings// mi g.yo ba la nor bu zhags pa// dbyug pa gshin rje'i phyag na be con bsnams mdzad pa// 'khor ba las ni bdag bsgral phyir// dpa' bos bla mas gnang bas sgo srung gi nang du gtang du gsol// rdo rje tshe zan

dang gal phyi dang/ zho phye mar zer// 'jam dais mar zla phrom thud zla rgyas khur ba dang// tshe khrid skyur po dza gad chang dzak+ti sha dang// bran mo tshod ma sham mo sing po kun tu rgyu/ tshwa// a mra mi sha rgun 'brum glang

po'i sha a ga ru/ rta sha// na li ba lang sha ga rgyas khyi sha la sogs drangs/ bsang ba ni// bdud rtsi 'am chu rdo rje 'am mtheb srin gyis/ gtor zhing sngags brjod// tshogs la gtor ba dam tshig can gyi rdzas/ kyis bsang ba'o// A+oM

kro d+hI shwa rI sarba nus pa can gyi sngags kyis bsang ba'o dra byam sho d+ha ya hU~M AHhU~M hrIHTha/ byin rlabs can gyi ting nge 'dzin gyis bsang ba'o// a yi rang bzhin bdud rtsi chu// bdud rtsi'i chu yi ge a'i rang bzhin du// rdzas la spros

te thim pa ni// gzung ba yul gyi dri ma dag pas yul snang stong chos kyi dbyings su bsam/ 'dzin pa sems kyi dri ma dag pas sems rig stong chos kyi skur bsam/ mtshan ma thams cad kun// chos kyi dbyings su rnam par dag/ raM las ye shes

gyis me byung bas dngos po dang rtog pa thams cad me yis bsreg par bsam/ yaM las// ye shes kyi rlung byung bas dngos po thams cad gis gtor bar bsam byas nas/ khaM las ye shes kyi/ chu byung bas yis dngos po thams cad bkrus

pas rnam par dag pa ra bsam pa ni// raM yaM khaM gi mthu las byung/ !/ byin gyis brlab pa ni snod/ rin chen las grub pa'i gzhong pa 'i nang du hrIHlas grub// zhal zas kyi rnam par dmigs te hrIH zhes brjod pas bdag gi thugs ka nas yi

ge hrIHlas trAM gcig chad nas yo byad la phog pas// trAM las zhal zas rin po che// oM trAM rat+na tre lo kya s+pha ra Na phaT// bdud rtsi lnga las grub pa'i yid bzhin gyi nor bu rin po che nyi ma stong bas gzi byin che ba tse re re gsal bar bsgom mo// hU~M gi 'phro

'dus chos thams cad stong nyid dag par sbyangs/ nas chos nyid du bsam// AHlas phyi nang gi chos thams cad bdud rtsi dkar po dri ma med/ par bsam// A+oM las bdud rtsi dai 'dod yon gyi lha mo drug bsam gyis mi khyab par bsam

mo/ !/ ye shes grub pa spyan drangs la// tshad med bzhi las grub pa yi// byams pa bdug/ spos dkar mo dang snying rje me tog mthing ga dga' ba mar me dmar mo btang snyoms dri/ chab ma ljang gu'o// ye shes bzhi las shar ba

yi// me long ye shes las sgeg mo/ mnyam nyid ye shes las/ phreng ba ma dang so sor rtog pa las/ gling bu ma dang bya ba grub pa las gar/ mkhan mo// gzugs kyi lha mo dkar mo/ ni rnam par snang mdzad la 'bul// dri 'i lha mo ser mo ni rin

chen 'byung ldan la/ 'bul// sgra'i lha mo dmar mo ni snang ba mtha' yas nyid/ la 'bul lo// ro'i lha mo ljang gu ni don yod grub pa la 'bul ste// reg gi lha mo mthing ga ni rdo rje sems dpa' la 'bul/ !/ sngags kyis spro thabs gsum gyis gzung 'dzin gyi dmigs pa so sor bya'o/ tshogs bsgral

spro bar bya// dza len+d+ra/ dzu len+d+ra/ s+pha Na tsakra/ 'khor lo spro ba/ oM b+h+rUM/ 'khor lo rnam snang/ hU~M b+h+rUM/ rdo rje mi bskyod/ swA b+h+rU~M/ rin chen dkon mchog dpal/ a b+h+rUM/ pad+ma snang mtha'/

hA b+h+rUM/ ral gri don grub// dang po phud 'dod yon drug gis lha mor bsams la mchod// gnyis pa dam rdzas bdud rtsis lngar bsam pa bshags/ par bya// gsum pa tha ma la/ dgra bgegs kyi gzugs phung byas la bstab/

par bya'o/ !/ tshogs 'dren pa pos brjod pa tshogs kyi zhal zas la// gzigs shig mdzed pa dam pa'i chos// 'di la bdud rtsi lnga'i rgyu las byas pa yin zhes gtsang mi gtsang gi the tshom bya mi rung// bram ze gtsang sbra che ba khyi dang phag gdol
pa lta bu gtsang btsog med pa gsum// rang bzhin gcig la dgongs la gsol/ len pa pos brjod pa// bde bar gshegs so chos kyi mchog/ gzung 'dzin dri ma med pa yi/ tha mal gyi zhen bdag pas// 'dod

chags dri ma dang bral bas// de kho na nyid la bdag phyag 'tshal/ !/ de nas smon lam gdab par bya/ !/ lhag ma'i gtor ma chas su gzhug pa ni lhag gtor bsdus te dug gsum sha khrag rus pa'i rang bzhin la 'dod yon sna tshogs dang ldan par

byin brlab bo// lhag ma'i dkyil 'khor chas su gzhug pa ni byang shar mtshams// zhing lpags mgo lus ma nyams pa la rkang pa'i bar du e'am zla gam bdun br-i/ rak+tas zla gam e// rnal 'byor pa chas su gzhug pa ni dpal gyi chas

brgyad gsol// gtor ma chas su gzhug pa ni/ hU~M he phaT b+h+yo'i sngags kyis dpal gyi gtor ma la ye shes kyi dkyil 'khor bskyed par bya/ ste las kyi bzlas pa bya zhing mchod bstab bya'o// hU~M ha he phaT b+h+yo/ !/ dang po/ dbyings nas rnam par

bskul ba 'i gnas ni/ gnyis pa/ byin gyis yang dag par brlab pa 'i gnas dang/ gsum pa/ thabs chen yab kyi gnas tu bstan pa dang/ bzhi pa/ shes rab yum gyi gnas du gnas pa dang/ lnga pa khro mo gau rI brgyad

kyi gnas rnams dang/ drug pa/ yul gyi phra men gyi gnas chen mo dang/ bdun pa/ ye shes sgo ma bzhi po 'i gnas rnams// yar gyi gnas bdun dkyil 'khor steng/ !/ ma hA rU tra phaT phaT/ a li bza' ba u li btung

ba tA li bca' ba ta pa li/ bgo ba/ daM Sh+ta mche ba can go nA yon tan ro'u tr-i/ drag mo/ kha raM zo zhig yo gi nI/ rnal 'byor ma/ kha raM zo zhig d+ha ki nI/ mkha' 'gro ma/ ma hA mAM sa/ sha chen po/ ma hA rak+ta/ khrag chen po/ ma hA keng ni ri

ti/ rus pa chen po/ ma hA pany+tsa chen po lnga a mr-i ta/ bdud rtsi/ ma hA su kha hoH bde ba chen la// gru gsum me thab nang dag tu// gtor ma sbyin bsreg dbul bar bya/ !/ dpal gyi lce la rta mgrin hrIH/ de nas lhag ma'i steng du phud

pham phab kyi tshul du btsal/ bdag nyid dpal chen por bsgoms te/ bdag gi lce steng du hrIHdmar po gcig las rta mgrin yab yum bsgoms la thabs dang shes rab gnyis su med pa'i byang chub sems spros te/ 'dus ma byas// mkha' dbyings kyi phyag rgya gtor ma'i

steng du bcas te rab ldan pas// bdud rtsi'i kha chu lan gsum btab pas dang pos gtor ma'i dngos po/ rtogs sregs bar pas gtor ma bdud rtsi chen po'i rang bzhin du bsam/ tha mas mkha' 'gro ma rnams la sbyor ba'i mchod pa 'bul/ te phul bas

dbang du 'dus par bsam mo// gzhi lhag ma la sku gsung thugs byin gy-is brlabs la kha chu gdab pa'i sngags so// rang gi lce thog tu bzhag la dngos grub thob pa'o// oM sarba ta tha ga ta kA ya wA ka tsit+ta swa b+hA wa At+ma ko\u0f85 haM/ de nas bdag gi thugs ka nas

dzaHsngon po 'phros te// dzaHhU~M baM hoH/ A gat+ta yA a gat+ta ya/ ta ki rA dza lag na lcags kyu thogs pa mang po spros te/ Ta ki rA dzas lhag ma la dbang ba dgug pa'i sngags so// pra be sha ya pra be sha ya/ ban d+ha ya ban d+ha ya/ to sha ya to sha ya/ mo ha

ya mo ha ya/ badzra Tak+ki hU~M dza dza/ rta mgrin gyis dbang du bsdu ba'i sngags/ hrIHba sha a lo ka/ A kar+Sha ya A kar+Sha ya/ pra be sha ya pra be sha ya/ ban d+ha ya ban d+ha ya/ badzra DA ki nI hU~M phaT/ ha ya grI ba ha ha hi hi/

'dod pa'i rgyal po sku mdog sngon po lag na lcags kyus dgug/ rta mgrin dmar pos lag na lcags sgrog thogs pas dbang du bsdu bar bya// badzra he ru ka mthing ga phyag mthe bong gnyis gshibs nas gshog pa ltar brkyang ba/ yis zil

gyis mnan// sngags 'dis mchod par rab tu 'bul// oM bud d+ha d+hA ki nI pra tIts+tsha sangs rgyas mkha' 'gro la mchod pa'o/ maM ba lin+ta A+oM phaT/ A+oM badzra rdo rje rigs kyi d+hA ki nI pra tIts+tsha maM ba lin+ta hU~M phaT/ mkha' 'gro ma mchod

pa'o// oM rat+na d+hA ki nI rin chen rigs pra tIts+tsha maM ba lin+ta trAM phaT/ oM pad+ma d+hA ki nI pra tIts+tsha maM ba lin+ta hrIHphaT/ oM karma d+hA ki nI pra tIts+tsha ma pa lin+ta hA phaT/ dang po/ rdzu 'phrul mkha' la 'gro ba mkha' 'gro ma'i gnas sum cu

gnyis// gsung gi rgyud zla gsang thig le na rgyas so// gnyis pa/ sbyor dang sgrol la dga' ba'i sa sbyor sgrol gyi gnas ging chen brgyad/ 'jam dpal gshin rjai gshed kyi rgyud na rgyas so// gsum pa/ lang ka tshar gsum yang dag nas 'byung/ rtogs

tshad 'bul ba 'i gnas dang/ bzhi pa/ lus ngag yid gsum kyi gnod pa'i me ltar 'bar ba'i 'bar ma sgyu 'phrul bla ma nas 'byung brgyad/ kyi gnas dang// bdud dang srin po'i ma dang sring mor gyur pa ma mo rgyud lung nas 'byung/ srid ma mo

bdun dang sring mo bzhi/ 'i gnas dang lnga'o// drug cu rtsa bzhi pad+ma dbang chen nas 'byung/ pho nya'i gnas dang drug go rnams/ de yan chad/ lhag ma dag la dbang ba'i gnas drug yin/ no// 'di nyid gsang ba snying po nas 'byung ba'i dbang

mo// nyi shu rtsa brgyad phud dang lhag ma gnyis ka la dbang/ ba'o// mar gyi gnas bdun so so'i srog nas drang/ !/ dzaHhU~M baM hoH/ mkha' 'gro sum cu rtsa gnyis kyi sngags/ tsod tor tsod tor/ she pa she pa/ pa ra pa ti pa ra pa

ti/ re ma ma ra/ tra mi mu te hU~M/ khA hi khA hi/ ging chen bco brgyad kyi sngags/ king+ga ra king+ka ra/ pa tra pa tra/ shu la shu la/ karma rak+Sha sI b+h+yo// dbang mo spyi'i sngags/ b+h+yo b+h+yo ma ma b+h+yo b+h+yo// sa ma ya b+h+yo dza/ lang ka'i sngags/ trag rak+sha si ta

tsa ra sa ma ya b+h+yo/ ma bdun sring bzhi'i sngags/ trag rak+sha trag rak+sha ma ma b+h+yo/ ma ma ru lu ru lu hU~M b+h+yo hU~M/ 'bar ma brgyad kyi sngags/ dz+wa la dz+wa la sa ma ya ru lu ru lu b+h+yo/ pho nya drug cu rtsa bzhi'i sngags/ du ne du ne sa ma ya ru lu ru lu

b+h+yo// spyir mchod sngags so// ma hA pany+tsa a mr-i ta ar+g+haM pra tIts+tsha swA hA// zhes gsungs so// he ru ka'i gal po chen po las/ tshogs kyi 'khor los mnyes par bya ba dang/ lhag mas mnyes par bya ba'i brtag pa ste nyi shu
gnyis pa'o//// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis las phra mo 'di dag gsungs so// rnal 'byor bskyed dang 'brel ba'i las// de bzhin rdzogs pa dag dang 'brel// thun mong las ni dang po dag/ rol mo
'di dag rab tu bsgom// sangs rgyas dkyil 'khor dbus gnas par// bdag gi lus las snang mdzad gzhag/ snying gar yi ge oM bsams pas// sngags kyi rnam par shes pa bsgom// 'gog
pa'i rdo rje sems nyid du// nam zhag de la rab tu 'gyur// sangs rgyas kun gyi mdzod 'dzin pa// yid bzhin dpal ldan 'dra bar 'gyur// sangs rgyas dkyil 'khor dbus gnas par// bdag gi lus la mtha'
yas gzhag/ snying ga'i a la rnam shes gtad// 'gog pa sems nyid sangs rgyas mchog/ nam mkha' dbus su sangs rgyas rnams// bdag lus rdo rje sems dpa' nyid// hU~M gi 'gog pa reg gyur na// sangs
rgyas mchog 'dzin dpal ldan 'gyur// 'di ni 'gog pa'i rnal 'byor pa// sku dang gsung thugs sgrub pa'o// sangs rgyas dkyil 'khor dbus gnas par// rnam par snang mdzad rab tu bsgom// snying gar yi ge
oM bsams nas// sems nyid thig ler gyur pa gzhag/ sangs rgyas dkyil 'khor dbus gnas par// tshe dpag med pa rab tu bsgom// snying gar yi ge AM aHyang/ bsams te// sems ni thig ler gyur
par gzhag/ sangs rgyas dkyil 'khor dbus gnas par// rdo rje mi bskyod rab tu bsgom// snying gar yi ge hU~M bsams nas// sems ni thig ler gyur par gzhag/ 'di ni thig le'i rnal 'byor te// sku dang
gsung thugs sgrub pa'o// rdo rje nam mkha'i dbyings gnas par// gsal ba'i dkyil 'khor bsgom par bya// lus ngag sems la yi ge oM// bsams na de ni bskal par gnas// rdo rje nam mkha'i dbyings
gnas par// chos kyi 'khor lo bsgom par bya// lus ngag sems la yi ge AH/ bsams na de ni bskal par gnas// rdo rje'i dkyil 'khor bsgom par bya// lus ngag sems la yi ge hU~M// bsams na de ni
bskal par gnas// de ni bskal par gnas pa yi// tshe yi rig 'dzin gsum bsgrub po// dur gyi khrod la sogs pa'i gnas// bsam gtan bsdus pa 'di dag bsgom// mi bskyod ye shes dag la sogs// rdo rje

nam mkha'i dkyil du bsam// mngon shes lnga po'i sbyor ba yis// sangs rgyas mchog gi gnas su bsgom// rdo rje chen po rtse lnga pa// 'bar ba lnga la sogs pas brgyan// gnas lnga dag tu sbyor ba yis// rdo rje

mngon shes 'dra bar 'gyur// ga bur tsan+dan sbyar ba yi// ri lu lcags gsum gyis dkris pa// dbang po gnyis kyi sbyor ba yis// sangs rgyas kun gyis mi mthong ngo// glang po a ga ru sbyar ba'i// ril bu lcags

gsum gyis dkris pa// dbang po gnyis kyi sbyor ba yis// rdo rje stobs po cher 'gyur ro// rdo rje 'dzin pa gang yang rung// phyag rgya chen por byin brlabs nas// de ni dpal dang ldan pa yi// sangs rgyas 'od
dang 'dra bar 'gyur// 'dod khams gnas pa'i bu mo ni// lha yi longs spyod brtul zhugs ma'am// yang na gzugs khams gnas pa la// stongs chen gyis ni 'dod pa spyad// gal te byang chub

mchog 'dod na// lag pa'i phyag rgya mi bcing ngo// mchod rten dag gi las mi bya// glegs bam bklag par mi bya zhing// dkyil 'khor dag kyang yongs mi bri// rdo rje gsum mchog phyag mi bya// sangs rgyas byang
chub sems dpa' dang// rang rgyal nyan thos de bzhin te// sku gsung thugs su sbyor ba na// phyag 'tshal na ni ma rungs 'gyur// sems can rnams la mdo ru ni// bsam gtan rdo rje bskul bar bya// rdo rje

gsum gyi phyag 'tshal mchog/ rdo rje'i thig ni gdab pa dang// tshon rtsi rnams ni 'gyed pa dang// sngags ni sems dpas mi bya ste// byas na byang chub rnyed par dka'// sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje'i// rnal
'byor 'di gyur phyin chad ni// bklag gam yang na sems kyang rung// rdo rje 'dzin par de yang 'gyur// gter sba bzod gsol dkyil 'khor bsdu// smon lam bkra shis bro brdungs te// dge bsngo ma dag
bshags pa dang// rgyun gyi ting 'dzin nan tan bya// bskang gso'i las la rab 'bad nas// sgos mdos brgya dang rtsa brgyad kyis// bka' yi srung ma bskang ba dang// he ru ka yi thugs mdos bya// kun kyang
sems can don du bsngo// byang chub mchog ni thob par 'gyur// zhes gsungs so// he ru ka'i gal po chen po las/ bsam gtan gyi brtag pa ste nyi shu gsum pa'o//// de nas dam pa'i rigs can rnam pa

lngas mchod pas mchod de/ pad+ma rak+ta ni rma la/ ka ma la muk+ta ni/ lo ka ban d+ha ni/ sarba karma su tsa me/ chos la chags pa chags pa ste// yul la chags pa chags pa'i mchog/ 'gro ba'i gtso la phyag 'tshal
lo// las rnams thams cad rdzogs gyur te// g.yar dam nyams chag bskang gyur cig/ dpa' bo khyod la phyag 'tshal lo// bdag cag lung 'di gzung bar bgyi// zhes brjod pas/ gsang ba'i bdag po chos kyi
skur thim/ dam pa'i rigs can rnams kyis rjes su bzung ngo// he ru ka'i gal po zhes bya ba lung thams cad kyi rgyal po rdzogs so//// pad+ma sam+b+ha was ba su d+ha ra la gnang/ des sangs rgyas ye shes
rin po che la'o////

rgya gar skad du/ shrI he ru ka ya mA dza tan+t+ra nA ma/ bod skad du/ dpal khrag 'thung 'dus pa'i rgyud ces bya ba/ dpal khrag 'thung rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo// 'di skad bdag gis thos pa'i dus gcig
na/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rang bzhin/ sku dang gsung thugs rdo rje btsun mo'i b+ha ga la bde ba chen po'i dbyings/ gsang ba mchog gi gzhal yas khang/ zab mo

'dus pa'i bdag nyid/ nyams bzhi skyed pa'i gnas/ rtse mo thig le chen pos mngon par brgyan pa na/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rang bzhin/ thig le chen po byang chub kyi sems rdo rje/ ma lus pa 'dus

pa'i snying po de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi snying pos byin gyis brlabs pa/ yid bzhin gyi nor bu rin po che/ khams gsum gy-i dbang brnyes pa/ pad+ma rnam par dag pa'i gsung gi dbyangs mnga' ba/ 'gro ba

ma lus pa phrin las kyis 'dul bar mdzad pa ste/ 'di ltar nam mkha'i dbyings dang mnyam pa'i rnal 'byor gyi dbang phyug chen po// btsun mo'i tshogs dang bcas pa dang/ sa bcu'i dbang phyug rgyal ba'i sras su

gyur pa/ btsun mo'i tshogs dang bcas pa dang/ gdug pa 'dul zhing phyin ci log tshar gcod par mdzad pa'i big+h+nAM ta kr-ita la sogs pa btsun mo'i tshogs dang bcas pa dang/ gzhan yang 'khor zhing gi rdul snyed
dang bcas par thabs cig tu bzhugs so// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa dgyes pa chen po de nyid kyis/ phyogs thams cad du rnam par gzigs te phyogs bcu dang snod bcu dang phyi nang dang khams gsum dang/
zhing khams dang sa dang lam du bcas pa rnam par gzigs so// de ltar khyab pa chen po dang/ chags pa chen po dang/ mdzes pa chen po dang/ zil gnon brjed pa'i tshul gyis gzigs pas/ ma lus pa'i thig

le chen po'i rang bzhin dmigs pa med par thugs su chud par gyur to// dgyes pa'i byin rlabs las/ thugs ka dang ljags dang spyi bo las 'od sna tshogs byung ste/ khyab pa dang gsal ba dang 'joms pa dang/

nyams bskyed par gyur nas/ phyogs bcu'i zhing yongs su sbyangs te/ rgyal ba'i sras su gyur te/ rgyal ba'i zhing khams rdul phra mo snyed kyi sangs rgyas kyi dkyil 'khor dang bcas pa 'dus par gyur te/ de dag la
phyag 'tshal zhing 'di skad ces brjod par gyur te// e ma 'o sangs rgyas thams cad ni// rgya chen gdod nas skye med de// 'dul ba'i thabs kyi khyad par gyis// mdzad pa sna tshogs bstan pa legs// zhes

gsungs so// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis byin gyis rlabs kyis/ sku gsung thugs rdo rje btsun mo'i b+ha ga la/ dus gsum du nyams bzhi'i tshul gyis dga' bar mdzad de/ rdo rje snying po'i tshul
gyis pad+ma'i snying po la zhugs par gyur to// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa sras dang bcas pas 'di skad ces gsol to// e ma'o sangs rgyas thams cad kyi// sku gsung thugs kyi byin rlabs kyis// brtul zhugs
gsum la gnas bya'i phyir// dbang bskur bdag la gnang ba stsol// zhes gsol pa las/ de ma thag tu zhal bstan pa dang/ thig le chen po dang bde ba chen po dang/ ye shes bar chad med pa'i

dbang bskur nas/ ma lus pa'i thig le chen po'i rang bzhin du gsal bar gyur te/ sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje'i rang bzhin du dbyer med par gyur to// de nas nam mkha'i dbyings dang mnyam pa'i rgyal ba
rgya mtsho rnams kyis 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// dam tshig gsum la gnas pa yis// bar chad med pa'i sa phyogs su// byang chub mchog tu sems bskyed de// ma lus dag pa gsum bsgoms nas// rgyal ba'i
pho brang dag par bsgom// rang bzhin ji lta bzhin bsgoms la// rgyal ba yab yum sras dang bcas// sgo bar bcas te bsam par bya// dbyer med mchod bzlas brtan thob nas// brtul lugs gsum ni brtag

par bya// shin tu yid dga'i sa phyogs der// sa yi bya ba kun byas nas// tshad dang ldan pa'i stegs bu brtsam// nyi shu lnga ldan dag pa der// bla ma yum dang ldan pa yis// nga rgyal gsal bar byin brlabs

nas// ras bal gtsang ma nyis 'gyur tshad// sbom phra sgo yi nyi shu cha// rang gi rtog pa ji bzhin pas// thig gdab cho ga ji bzhin bya// dri yi thig ler mtshan bkod ste// nam mkha'i dkyil 'khor phab cing
mchod// bum pa lnga dang bcu yang rung// yo byad tshang bar byin brlabs la// rang rang gnas su 'tshams par gzhag/ snod dang ldan pa'i slob ma dag/ mos pas khrus byas sems bskyed de// lhag par gnas pa

ji bzhin bya// rin chen lnga dag 'bras lnga dang// 'byung khungs lnga ldan kha dog la// rigs lnga'i byin rlabs bsdus te bri// zlum po thig bzhi le'u tshe dgu// sgo bzhi ldan pa'i tshul du bri// rgyan dang bro brdung phreng ba
dang// yid 'ong lha yi 'byor pas bskor// ma dag pa ni mtshams gcad cing// dag pa'i sgrub rdzas byin brlab dgod// ting 'dzin lha bskyed gsal bsgoms la// bzlas dang 'phro 'du rgyun mi gcad// nus pa
ldan pa'i lhas thob nas// rnal 'byor bdag nyid 'jug par bya// de nas bla ma mnyes byas la// cho ga rgyas par shes pa yis// gus ldan me tog 'dzin pa yis// slob ma dam tshig ldan pa de// zhugs nas rang

gi ye shes phab// cho ga bzhin du nan tan bya// dkyil 'khor bzhi la rim zhugs nas// dbang bzhi rim pa bzhin du sbyar// de nas gang la dga' ba yi// bsgrub pa'i gnas la sbyin par bya// rang rang rtog pa
las bstan pa'i// cho ga'i rim pa la brten pas// brtson 'grus ting 'dzin ldan pa yis// tshe 'di nyid la 'grub par 'gyur// zhes gsungs so// dpal he ru ka 'dus pa'i rgyud las/ gleng gzhi dang/ dpal rdo
rje 'dzin pa'i cho ga'i rim pa bstan pa'i le'u ste dang po'o//// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa ma lus pa sras dang bcas pa rnams kyis/ 'dul ba'i skye bo grangs med pa'i bsam pa so sor

gzigs par gyur te/ la la ni zhe sdang can du snang/ la la ni 'dod chags can du snang/ la la ni nga rgyal can du gnas/ la la ni gti mug can du gyur/ la la ni phrag dog can du gyur te/ phyin ci log tu gyur
pas/ 'khor ba'i dngos po la 'byol nyog tu spyod cing zhen pas/ log pa'i ri bo mngon du brtas pas/ srid pa gsum gyi bdag por brtags par gyur te/ 'jig rten kun dbang du bsdus nas/ rgyu 'bras log

par smin pa de gzigs nas/ dkyil 'khor gyi 'khor los 'di skad ces bskul to// a ho// ma bcos spros med byang chub snying po ni// mkha' ltar mi 'gyur thig le stong pa ste// ma rtogs blo la rtog pa'i ri bo
