snang// thugs rjes khros pas 'gro ba gdul du gsol// dang po dam bcas rgyal ba thugs rje can// sku gsung thugs las sprul pa'i cho 'phrul gyis// gdug pa ma lus btul zhing tshar bcad nas// ma bcos
snying po'i ngang la dgongs su gsol// zhes rnam par bskul bas/ bcom ldan 'das dgyes pa chen po des bskul bar mkhyen nas hU~M zhes gsungs pas/ dkyil 'khor gyi 'khor lor bcas pa nyid kyi sku la rim

par 'dus par gyur to/ hUM hUM hUM hUM hUM// 'di ltar dang po bdag gi sa bon bkod/ gnyis pa gsum pa bzhi brjod pas// stong gsum rim pas sgra ru grags// de las phyag mtshan gyur pa ste// tha ma sku rdzogs nges

par blta// g.yas dkar g.yon dmar dbus mthing zhal// rdo rjai kha T+wAM rnge chung g.yas// dril bu dung dmar rgyu zhags g.yon// yum yang yab dang mthun pa la// g.yas pa shes rab thabs la brten// g.yon pa
dung phor gtso la stob// dur khrod chas brgyad gar dgu dang// 'gyings tshul brjid pa'i tshul gyis bzhugs// rigs bzhi yab yum 'khor tshul te// sbas pa'i rak+sha yak+sha dang// gu h+ya sa nu yab yum

rnams// 'khril pas 'khor lo'i tshul du bzhugs// gsang ba'i bu mo khro mo brgyad// phra men brgyad dang gus pa bzhi// 'bar ma brgyad dang bcas pa yi// bka' nyan nyi shu rtsa brgyad ldan// mkha' 'gro'i tshogs

dang ma mo bdun// sring mo bzhi dang ging chen dang// pho nya yang sprul sum brgya dang// drug cu nyi khri bdun stong tshogs// rdo rje rig 'dzin la sogs pa// 'khor lo'i tshul du thabs cig bzhugs// de nas gsang
bdag rdo rje 'dzin// ma lus gsang ba'i mdzod 'dzin pa// dgyes pa'i gar dang dbyangs dang bcas// gus dang mdzes pas spyan sngar 'dug/ brtag pa'i cho ga legs par dris// dpal chen he ru ka yi
don// rang bzhin thabs dang 'bras bu gang// he zhes bya ba gang ci zhig/ ru zhes bya ba gang gi don// ka zhes bstan pa'i don ci zhig/ blta ba'i don ni ji lta bu// spyod pa'i khyad par gang dag

lags// rtsa ba'i dkyil 'khor gang dag lags// ting nge 'dzin ni ji lta bu// dag pa gsum zhes ji lta bu// dbang gi khyad par ji ltar bskur// spyod dang khyad par dam tshig gang// thun mong thun mong ma yin
pa'i// bsgrub pa'i khyad par ji lta bu/ phrin las rim pa gang zhig lags// he ru ka ru bdag sbyor ba'i// lam gyi rim pa gang dag lags// dpa' bo chen pos bshad du gsol// dpa' bos bskul ba gsan
nas kyang// cho 'phrul chen po kun bstan nas// 'od kyi dkyil 'khor 'khrigs pa can// bskal pa'i me ltar 'bar ba yis// ma dag pa ni mtshams bcad nas// gang zag dam par byin brlabs nas// gsang
ba'i bstan pa bsgrags par mdzad// e ma ho sangs rgyas thams cad kyis// dri med ye shes he ru ka/ nam mkha'i dkyil 'khor sna tshogs ston// rang bzhin kun gyi rang bzhin te// thabs ni phyi nang sbas pa
gsum// 'bras bu rang bzhin mthar phyin pas// he ni dgyes pa chen po nyid// ru ni chags pa bde chen po// ka ni phrin las mdzad par shar// lta ba ma bcos chos nyid mthong// spyod pa sgo gsum blang dor

med// lha dang dngos grub dbang la sogs// snying po 'byung bzhi lhun rdzogs pas// 'byung bzhi 'khyil ba'i dkyil 'khor te// gang dang gang du gsal ba'i yid// ma yengs pa nyid ting 'dzin te// dag pas dag

pa gsum du brjod// gang gis gang la gang bskur ba// rgyud dag nus pa thob phyir dbang// ma lus sgo gsum khyab par dag/ bdag dang gzhan phyir mi 'gal ba// spyi dang khyad par dam tshig mchog/ rig 'dzin
lam dang 'bras bu dang// tshe dang pra dang ro langs dang// rkang mgyogs mkha' 'gro la sogs pa// bsgrub pas bsgrub pa nyid du bshad// zhi dang rgyas dang dbang drag nyid// mdzad pa phrin las nyid du
brjod// de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes ni// bsam gyis mi khyab rang byung ste// ma lus rnam dag byang chub sems// thig le chen por dus gcig rdzogs// chos kun rang sems me long la// kun gyi gzugs

brnyan rang shar ba// de dag de yi rang bzhin te// ma lus bde gshegs snang ba nyid// byin rlabs sna tshogs bsam yas pa// rdo rje 'dzin nas rtsi shing sogs// rang rang nus pa sna tshogs kyis// ma lus kun gyi

bsam pa ltar// dpag med che ba sna tshogs ston// stong la stong min he ru ka/ bde chen rnam 'phrul sna tshogs gzugs// zhi la zhi dang khro la khro// chags la chags dang rmongs la/ rmongs// dregs la ri bo mnyam
la mnyam// 'byung la 'byung ba 'dod la 'dod// le lo ser sna de bzhin te// thabs mkhas 'dul ba sna tshogs pa// ji ltar 'tshams par rnam par gnas// zhes gsungs so// dpal he ru
ka 'dus pa'i tan+t+ra las gleng gzhi dang/ rgyud kyi snying po 'byung ba'i le'u ste gnyis pa'o//// de nas gsang ba'i bdag po yis// ma lus drag pos 'dul ba'i phyir// thabs mkhas rol pa'i brda' yis
ni// kun mkhyen khyod la gsol ba 'debs// kun mkhyen rgyal pos mnyes gzigs nas// 'bar zhing rngam pa'i mdangs kyis ni// 'jig rte khams kun sgras bkang nas// bskal pa'i me ltar drag cing

'bar// phyi nang bgegs rnams thams cad 'byer// oM ba hu be d+ha/ ro hu ti/ pany+tsa ti/ a sha Sha/ ni she Sha bA da bi na ya/ bid+ya ga ta/ tsa le pra tsa le/ gurba gurba/ bi gurba sarba badzra shi ba le/ tsa le tsa le/ oM ru lu ru

lu hU~M b+h+yo hU~M// 'bar ba'i dkyil 'khor sna tshogs 'phros// cho 'phrul rnam pa sna tshogs kyis// phyi nang snod bcud bcas pa gang// grangs las 'das pa'i lha rnams ni// rig pa'i dkyil 'khor mtha' dbus
med// phyogs bcu dus bzhi khyab par snang// dngos grub kun gyi rtsa ba ni// bsnyen pa dang ni las sngags te// 'di dag yid bzhin nor bu ltar// ma lus da ltar 'grub par 'gyur// bsnyen pa'i yi ge 'bru
brgyad la// rtsa ba'i dkyil 'khor rdzogs pas na// yan lag ma lus rang rdzogs pas// dngos grub ma lus rdzogs te gnas// gang du bsnyen pa gsum rdzogs nas// rab 'bring tha ma'i rtags thob na// brgyud

pa'i yul dang bral bas na// tshe 'dir sangs rgyas nyid thob na// dngos grub gzhan lta smos ci dgos// sgrub pa po dang gzungs ma dang// rdzas dang grogs dag bzhi pa ste// dag pa'i rgyud la snang ba ni// me long
bzhin la snang ba yin// bsnyen pa'i dkyil 'khor gsal bsgoms shing// 'od gsal byin rlabs gnas thob nas// sbyor ba'am thig ler thob pas bzlas// tshe 'dir sangs rgyas nyid thob 'gyur// dngos grub

gzhan lta smos ci dgos// tshe dang lcong zhi dmar ser ba// bkra shis dag pa'i zhal zas la// rtags thob bar du bzlas bskyed na// mi 'chi tshe yi dngos grub 'thob// drag po'i sbyor ba gsal ba yis// bdun

'bum sngon du song ba yis// gu gul sbyar ma bsreg bya zhing// stong rtsa brgyad du bzlas byas na// grong dang yul phyogs thams cad du// bgegs ni ma lus 'phros par 'gyur// dkyil 'khor snying po ldan bkod

nas// mu khyud rdo rje ra ba la// las sngags bkod de byin brlabs nas// bdun 'bum grangs tshad ga bur bcug/ grong dang sgo dang zhing srang dang// ri rtse la sogs gar bzhag pa// ser ba dang ni nad dang
gdon// ma lus pa ni zhi bar 'gyur// gro ga ras dang dar sogs la// bris shing byin brlab bsnyen rdzogs nas// lus sam gtsug phud mgul btags na// tshe ring nad med bde ba dang// dgra
dang bgegs kyis 'tshe ba med// thal chen mu zi nyung dkar la// bye ba 'am bdun 'bum bzlas byas te// rdzing dang 'bab chur dor byas na// lo legs 'bru ni 'phel bar 'gyur// gu gul nag pos byugs pa

yi// thang phraum pa dang tshil chen la// bzlas shing bsregs te bdug gyur na// smyo ba ma lus zhi bar 'gyur/ khrab dang nyung nag tshil chen la// bdun 'bum bye ba bzlas nas ni// chu mig 'gram du bsreg byas
na// dmigs pa nad kyis 'chi bar 'gyur// tsan+dan dkar po mar sar dang// spang spos gla rtsi sbyar byas la// bzlas zhing gzer sar bskus byugs na// gzer nad ma lus zhi bar 'gyur// bdud rtsi lnga la

ling+ga byas// drag po'i phur pa lnga nyid la// bsnyen rdzogs nyi shu gcig bzlas nas// gnas lngar btab na 'chi bar 'gyur// drag po'i hom khung nag po ru// mtshan mar bcas pa'i ling+ga la// bsnyen rdzogs nyi
shu gcig bzlas te// gnan na g.yo ba med par 'gyur// 'bras chang rdza 'am thod pa la// sngon bzhin 'khor lo sngags bcas bri// byin brlabs kha sbub gar bzhag sar// ser ba chen po gcod par

'gyur// ga bur shel dang tsan+da dkar// bzlas shing rang la gang 'chang ba// rims dang gnod pas mi tshugs shing// lus yang nad med byed par 'gyur// til dang tsan+dan dkar po dang// zho dang mar dang 'o ma

la// bzlas shing sbyin bsreg byas na ni// 'dus dang nad bgegs zhi bar 'gyur// gang du las rnams kun byed pa// de nyid rten 'brel las byung ste// gang la gang brten 'bras byung ba// 'di ni rten cing 'brel

'byung ba'i// chos nyid rdzas dang cho ga dang// thabs kyis rten cing 'brel ba ni// gang dag ci dgar grub pa ni// rgyal bas kyang ni bsngags pa ste// dag dang ma dag khyad par dang// log dang ma log khyad par

las// bde dang sdug bsngal sna tshogs 'phrul// gsang sngags thabs kyi byin rlabs kyis// me las cho 'phul snang ba ste// ngo bo byin rlabs khyad par can// sna tshogs ngo bo nyid du snang// de bzhin chos

rnams thams cad kyang// ngo bo nyid kyi khyad par can// gang gi byin rlabs sna tshogs pa// mthun pa nyid du de ltar snang// chos kun ngo bo nyid snang ba// phyogs dang bral ba'i byang chub sems// gang du snang zhing

snying po med// ma lus mkha' ltar khyab pa'i sems// rtag tu rang gi ngo bos stong// mtha' dbus gzhi rtsa las 'das pa// thabs chen gsang sngags dang bral ba'i// che ba'i che ba zab mo 'di// lung dang rigs
pa la sogs pa'i// rtog ge'i spyod yul nams kyang min// gdod nas dbyer med snying po la// rtog ge'i rig pas gang bltas pa// gsal ba'i 'od zer snying po la// dmus long brgya yis bltas
pa ltar// snying po'i don ni mi mthong ste// rang nyid tshi chad brlag par 'gyur// zhes gsungs so// dpal he ru ka 'dus pa'i rgyud las cho 'phrul chen po bstan pa'i le'u ste gsum pa'o//// de nas gsang
ba mchog gi bdag pos/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ e ma ho// 'bar ba'i rgyal po byin rlabs 'dab// ma lus snang srid dkyil 'khor gnas pa la// sgrib pa gsum gyis 'bar ba'i zhal ma
mthong// de phyir 'bar ba'i dkyil 'khor bshad du gsol// zhes gsol pas/ de nas bcom ldan 'das dgyes pa chen po he ru kas// bdag nyid dkyil 'khor 'di skad do// b+h+ruM stong gsum ma lus gzhal

yas khang// 'byung ba lnga po rim bzhin brtsegs// dur khrod rgyan chas lhun gyis grub// dbang po lnga yi khong gseng can// nyi zla pad+ma rang bzhin gnas// phung po lnga dang 'byung ba lnga// rnam shes yul dang yan lag

dang// nyon mongs yid chos de bzhin te// rgyu ba'i lam dang mtshan dag dang// nang grol 'dren yang/ 'drel rten rtsib ma dang// sha dang skra dang ba spu dang// rang byung 'bar ba'i dkyil 'khor te// lnga phung phra

rags 'byung ba bzhi// sbas pa'i don du shes par bya// 'di ni dur khrod dkyil 'khor te// lus can kun la gnas pa yin// lus can tsit+ta'i pho brang ni// rgyal ba kun gyi rang bzhin te// rten can lnga ni phung po

ste// rags pa'i phra ba sbas par brjod// dwangs ma lnga 'dus yum gyi gtso// snyigs ma lnga ni gsang ba'i yum// thig le gsang ba'i bu mo ste// rten can phra men nyid du brjod// gsang ba'i sgo bzhi gus pa

ste// sbas pa'i thabs can spaur byed ma// rgyu ba'i lam srang las byed ma// bu ga bdun dang thig le bzhi// sbas pa'i tshul du rdzogs par gnas// rgyu ba'i g.yas g.yon rten can rten// rtsa bzhi la brten sgrol
mar yang/ bar bshad// bde ba'i 'khor lo mkha' la 'gro// sum cu rtsa gnyis mtshan dang ldan// lus bcud rtsa yi mdud pa ni// sum brgya drug cu khyab gnas te/ khyab 'dzin gugs pas las byed cing// skra

rtse thig les khyab byed cing// ba spu'i bu ga thig ler chags// yang sprul 'phro zhing nyid la sdud// thabs dang shes rab rang bzhin las// lnga phung chags ldang lngar snang ba// rig pa'i rgyal po lnga

yi gzugs// gsang ba'i 'byung ba dwangs snyigs las// yum gyi rang bzhin shes par bya// phung po'i snyigs ma he ru ka/ bde ba'i rnam shes khro mo ste// yul nyid bder chags phra men nyid// sbyor ba'i phyag rgya
'jug pa nyid// sbor byed bde bar 'bar mar 'dod// gang du rgyu ba bran mo ste// rgyu ba'i 'khor lor mkha' 'gro ma// rtsa mdud kun khyab pho nya ste// hUM spros sbyor sgrol thabs mkhas nyid// gsang

ba'i rlung du'ang shes par bya// phyi dang nang chags mkha' 'gro ma// skra rtse ba spu 'bum gyi cha// thabs dang thig ler gang 'phros pa// rtog pa gang skyes der sdud pa// yang sprul phyag rgya'i tshogs su brjod// kun gyi
rang bzhin 'dir 'dus shing// rang bzhin gnas pas rang bzhin yin// zhes gsungs so// dpal he ru ka 'dus pa'i rgyud las/ rang bzhin gyi dkyil 'khor bstan pa'i le'u ste bzhi pa'o//// de nas
yang gsang ba'i bdag pos/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// phyogs bcu dus gsum de bzhin gshegs pa yi// sku gsung thugs kyi rang bzhin he ru ka/ 'bar ba'i rgyal po mdzes pa'i sku mchog
gis// nyid kyi rang bzhin bdag la bstan du gsol// zhes gsol ba las/ bcom ldan 'das ye shes rngam pa'i rgyal po des 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// chos rnams kun gyi rang bzhin ni// ma bcos bde ba

chen po'i dbyings// thig le chen po'i rang bzhin la// chos rnams ma lus rdzogs par ldan// he ni khyab gdal stong pa'i ngang// ru ni gnyis med bde ba che// ka ni cir yang rol pa nyid// ma skyes pa dang skye ba

dang// dbyer med tshig gi rang bzhin yin// he ni dgyes pa chen po ste// ru ni chags pa chen po nyid// ka ni phrin las thogs pa med// 'di ni mi gnas mya ngan 'das// mtshon pa kun bral ye shes ni// gang gi

mtshon pa de nyid de// dbang po mchog gi rnal 'byor la// ma lus ye shes maN+Da la// sku dang gsung thugs 'bar ba yi// ma lus rgyal ba rgya mtsho'i dbyings// he ni dgyes pa chen po ste// ru ni chags pa chen po

nyid// ka ni snying rjes khyab pa gdal// de nyid mtha' dbus las 'das pa'o// he ni rgyu dang bral ba ste// ru ni mtshan ma'i gzugs la 'das// ka ni chos sku mtshon dang bral// snying po rang bzhin gsang ba'i

gsung// he ni chos sku mtshon dang bral// ru ni longs spyod chen po ste// ka ni sna tshogs sprul pa'i sku// sku gsum lhun grub rtsol ba med// chos nyid smon lam thugs rje yis// ngang khro shugs dang bcas pa

ni// thugs rje byin rlabs bcas pa nyid// byams dang sdang dang chags khro nyid// yul dang bcas pa de bzhin 'gyur// gang du gang la gang snang ba// las dang thugs rje thabs 'brel ba// byin rlabs ye shes

lhun rdzogs ni// dpag bsam nor bu lta bur gnas// dpag med rig pa chos kyi dbyings// ye shes lnga yi ngo bo las// gdul bya'i blo ni rim pa bzhin/ khrag 'thung lnga yi ngo bor gnas// sku ni snang ba thams
cad de// gsung ni brjod pa kun nyid de// dran rtog thugs la dbyer med pa// ma lus sku gsung thugs la rdzogs// kun gyi rang bzhin de nyid de// rgyu 'bras mtshon pa kun gyis stong// gang la de

nyid rang snang ba// chu la chu bur snang ba ltar// ma bcos phyag rgya chen por gnas// sna tshogs phyag rgya'i mtshan nyid de// de nyid thabs mchog mtshon pa'i tshul// skal ldan rgyal sras rnal 'byor la// man
ngag thabs kyis 'grub par 'gyur// ma lus 'jig rten brtan g.yo dang// 'das dang ma 'das thams cad kun// rang bzhin thabs kyi rgyal po ste// gzhan las byung ba'i chos ma yin// dpal ldan ye shes he
ru ka/ thabs chen mdzad pa kun gyi gnas// gsang ba'i gsang ba thugs kyi thugs// mkha' la dri med gsal ba ltar// skye med dbyings las phyag rgyar gsal// las dang ting 'dzin ye shes dang// yid kyi rnam

par 'phrul pa mchog/ ji srid rnam rtog gnas kyi bar// de srid phyag rgya'i tshogs mchog ste// gang dang 'tshams par gang snang ba// phyag rgya'i dkyil 'khor grangs las 'das// kun gyi gzhi rtsa snying po nyid// phyi
nang snod bcud ma lus pa// rgyu 'bras med pa'i rig par gcig/ rang snang bde ba'i ngo bor gnas// thabs chen gsang ba'i rang bzhin ni// log par mthong ba'i skye bo la// thabs kyi khyad par ci bstan
yang// dmus long kha dog bstan pa bzhin// ma nor thabs dang ldan pa yis// skal ldan dag pa'i skyes bu la// man ngag legs par bstan pa yis// gsang ba 'dzin pa'i rgyal por 'gyur// zhes gsungs
so// dpal he ru ka 'dus pa'i rgyu chen po las/ he ru ka'i rang bzhin bstan pa'i le'u ste lnga pa'o///// de nas gsang ba'i bdag pos/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// e ma ho rgyal ba rgya
mtsho'i sku gsung thugs// thams cad ma skyes ngang la gnyis med kyang// dman pas dam pa'i blta ba rtogs dka' bas// bdag cag rnams la rgya chen bshad du gsol// zhes gsol pa las/ bcom ldan
'das ye shes thams cad kyi rgyal po des 'di skad ces gsungs so// chos rnams ma lus sems nyid rang bzhin te// de nyid brtag cing dpyad pa las 'das pas// kun gyi yul las 'das shing brjod dka'

bas// gang du yang ma mthong mtshon pa'i yul las 'das// rgyu dang 'bras bu'i chos rnams ji snyed pa// gzhi rtsa med pa'i ngang du rang bzhin 'dus// dbyings dang ye shes thabs dang shes rab kyang// de nyid chen
po'i ngang du dbyer med pas// ma bcos chos dbyings brdal ba chen po la// sgro skur yin min dpyod dang rtog pa med// dam pa'i rang bzhin thabs kyis gang rtogs pa// chos rnams kun gyi rang bzhin dus
gcig rtogs// gzhi rtsa kun 'das nam mkha'i rang bzhin la// blun pos bltas pas rang nyid tshi chad ltar// sems nyid mtha' dbus 'das pa'i rang bzhin la// mtshan mas bltas kyang chos

dbyings don mi mthong// ma skyes stong chen nam mkha'i rang bzhin la// rnam rtog grangs las 'das pa'i phyag rgyar shar// mkha' la gza' skar chu yi chu bur ltar// ji ltar snang yang skye ba med par gcig/ sku

gsung thugs kyi mtshan ma ji snyed pa// sems can mos pa'i khyad par snang ba yin// nus mthu byin brlabs so sor snang ba yang// ma skyes sems kyi ngang las gzhan ma mthong// don dang rtags kyi lha zhes

brtags pa yang// thig le chen po'i ngang la gnyis med pas// sku mdog phyag mtshan mdzes par brgyan pa dang// ma lus snang ba'i rig pa stong par gcig/ sems nyid dngos po mtshan mar gang shar kyang// sgyu

ma smig rgyu chu zla brag cha ltar// sems nyid stong pa'i gzugs brnyan rang shar bas// sgyu ma rnam bzhi ma bcos gcig tu 'dus// rtag pa rang rgyud zad pa'i sems nyid ni// ji ltar snang yang de ltar mi gnas

te// phyogs 'das spyod med mkha' ltar dag pa la// ye shes sgyu ma dgag bsgrub kun dang bral// sgyu ma bde mchog rang bzhin thig le cher// brtag pa zad pa'i bde ba rang 'byung bas// bde bas bde ba mtshon
par rtogs thabs kyis// snang srid ma lus bde ba chen por mthong// khrus dang gtsang spra dka' thub mi dgos te// thabs dang shes rab snying rjes gang bstan pas// 'dod chags bde ba mchog tu nges par
mthong// mthong dang ma mthong rtsod pa chad dus na// dam pa'i dgongs pa lhun gyis grub nges pa'o// gang gis gang la nges pa'i don gsal nas// dam pa yin pa'i rtags ni gsal bar 'gyur// zhen pa chung
dang tha mal las rgyun chad// gzungs ma rigs can 'du zhing byin rlabs che// las dang bsam pa 'grub cing blang dor med// ting 'dzin chu bo'i rgyun gyi klung du 'jug/ bsngags pa thob cing rtsod pa'i
'jigs dang bral// 'du shes mtshan ma 'gag cing bya ba nyung// rang bzhin dal zhing 'du byed mtshan ma phra/ gang zhig dam pa'i don de rtogs phyin chad// rgyal ba'i sras po rig pa 'dzin pa de// 'khor

ba'i 'jigs bral mya ngan 'das smon med// gdod nas dag pa nam mkha'i rang bzhin la// mthong dang ma mthong glo bur rtog pa'i chos// dam pa'i don la mthong zhing gsal rtogs na// mthong dang ma mthong rtsod
pa rnam par 'chad// blun po mkha' la rtsod pa ji bzhin du// byis pa mtha' yi tshig la rtsod pa byed// rang sems gnyis med rtsod pa'i yul las 'das// mtha' dang dbus med nam mkha' stong pa'i
klong// bdag dang gzhan med rig pa gcig gi ngang// phyi dang nang med chos dbyings brdal ba'i gnas// che chung rgyu 'bras med pas 'bras bu'i lam// ma bcos don dam rtogs pa'i don gsal
na// mtshan ma'i zhen pas rtsol ba bya mi dgos// zhes gsungs so// dpal he ru ka 'dus pa'i rgyud chen po las/ blta ba de kho na nyid bstan pa'i le'u ste drug pa'o//// de nas yang gsang ba'i bdag po
des/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// e ma ho dpal chen che mchog he ru ka/ nyi ma stong ltar 'bar ba'i gzi brjid can// sku gsung thugs la mos pas gsol 'debs na// spyod pa'i khyad par
bdag la bstan du gsol// zhes gsol pas/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rang bzhin/ ye shes rngam pa'i rgyal po des 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// e ma 'dus pa chen po'i tshogs// spyod pa'i khyad

par ji snyed pa// rang rang thabs tshul mtha' yas pas// nam mkha'i khams ni mtha' yas pas// rnam par 'phrul pa'i tshul gyis byed// 'dul ba'i skye bo ji snyed pa// rang rang thabs ni sna tshogs kyis// so so'i

gar thabs sprin phung gis// ma nges 'dul ba'i don du snang/ khyod kyis srog chags gsad mi bya// ma byin par yang mi blang ngo// gzhan gyi bud med spyad mi bya// rdzun gyi tshig ni brjod pa min// rang gi lha yi

rnal 'byor gyis// dka' thub dka' ba bral bzhin du// thabs mkhas 'dod pa bsten bzhin du// bdag dang gzhan don spyad par bya// snying po byang chub bar du ni// dam rdzas chen po lnga spyad cing// 'jigs pa

med pa'i longs spyod bya// cis kyang gdung ba med pa yi// bde ba yid 'ong rtag tu bsten// dmar chen po dang ga bur dang// dri chen mAM sa chur bcas pa// dogs pa med par rtag bza' zhing// chos kyi 'khor lo

rtag tu bskor// khyod kyis srog chags gsad par gyis// ma byin par yang blang bar bya// gzhan gyi bud med spyad par gyis// rtag tu rdzun du smra bar bya// 'di ni sangs rgyas thams cad kyi// gsang ba'i spyod pa

bla na med// blun po gang zhig spong byed pa// de la mchog gi dngos grub med// sems nyid sbyangs shing dag bya'i phyir// mtshan ldan bud med rtag tu bsten// rang lus rgyud kyis rgyas byas la// bde ba'i thig le

rtag tu gzung// dus tshod khyad par nges bzung la// tshogs kyi 'khor lo spyad par bya// gtong dang 'dzin dang 'dren pa dag/ skabs kyi khyad par shes bya zhing// spang zhing dam tshig nyams pa min/ gang gis bud

med bsten bya zhing// 'dod pa'i cho ga rgyas pa yis// rang nyid brtan par gnas par bya// dam rdzas bud med rtag tu bsten// lus dang sems dang snang ba dag/ rim par 'phel ba'i tshul gyis ni// bde ba nam
mkha'i khams dang mnyam// rig pa'i brtul zhugs ma spyad na// rang gi skal ba dman pa dang// bde ba dman zhing rigs chad nas// de la dam pa'i dngos grub med// rang lus sgo gsum mnyam

sbyar zhing// 'dod pa'i yon tan lnga rnams la// rang nyid bsten cing gzhan la mchod// dka' thub skyung ba mi bya zhing// slong mos 'tsho bar bya ba min// rang gi yul dang lhan cig tu// lha yi spyod pas bsten bya
zhing// dogs pa med par rtag tu spyod// sna tshogs rig pa'i ting 'dzin gyis// phyi nang snod bcud nam mkha'i khams// lha yi sku gsung thugs nyid kyis// til 'bru bzhin du gang bar gsal// glu dang gar

dang spyod pa kun// rgyal ba'i mdzad par ma gyur med// 'di ni sangs rgyas thams cad kyi// rdo rje gsum gyi spyod pa ste// blun po gang zhig 'da' byed pa// dngos grub rgya chen gang yang med// dpa' bo sgyu ma'i
brtags rtag 'byin med kyang pa bzhin// ma lus de ltar yongs goms na// 'jigs med bde chen sa thob nas// dpa' bo thaud pa'i dbu rgyan dang// stag lpags la sogs gon nas ni// rdo rje kha T+wAM thogs nas

ni// re dogs med pa'i sa ru 'gro// gal te 'jigs pa'i sems byung na// dam tshig nyams te dmyal bar skye// 'di la bya dang mi bya med// re dang dogs pa cung zad med// gtsang sme rtog dang mi rtog med// yin
dang ma yin chos med de// bsdam dang glod pa'i dka' thub med// dman dang dam pa'i rigs med cing// grong pa'i chos ni rnam par spang// sngags dang phyag rgya bzlas 'ching med// sbyin bsreg mchod dang
dkyil 'khor med// 'dod pa bsten cing chags med de// sku dang gzhal yas kha dog med// de nyid dbyings la mnyam sbyor zhing// ma lus dam pa'i spyod par mdzad// 'di ni sangs rgyas thams cad kyi// snying

po rol pa'i spyod pa ste// blun po gang zhig 'da' byed pa// de la mchog gi dngos grub med// gsang ba'i spyod pa dor ba dang// bla ma rgyab kyi phyogs pa dang// don la ngo mtshar nyams med pas// tshig la ngo

mtshar cher byed cing// dam tshig gtan nas spong byed pa// ji srid nam mkha' gnas bar du// rdo rje dmyal bar gnas pa nyid// 'di ni sangs rgyas thams cad kyi// spyod pa'i rlabs chen rmad byung ba// rnal
'byor kun gyi mdzad pa ste// spyod pa 'dir ni bstan pa yin// zhes gsungs so// dpal he ru ka 'dus pa'i rgyud chen po las/ gsang ba'i spyod pa bstan pa'i le'u ste bdun pa'o//// de nas yang
gsang ba'i bdag po des/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// e ma ho// rgyal ba kun gyi gsung gi bdag/ rgyal ba kun gyi gsung gi 'khor lo nyid// rdo rje sngags kyi tshul du spyod nas kyang// rdo
rjai'i gsang sngags chen po bshad du gsol// zhes gsol ba dang/ bcom ldan 'das ye shes thams cad kyi bdag po rngam pa'i rgyal po des// gsung gi dkyil 'khor mngon du phyung ba zhes bya

ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas gsang sngags 'di dag mngon du phyung ngo// oM ma hA shU n+ya tA dz+nyA na badzra swa b+hA wa At+ma ko\u0f85 haM/ oM dz+nyA na tsit+ta badzra swA b+hA wa At+ma ko\u0f85 haM/ hUM raM e yaM ra suM keM/ b+h+rUM bi shwa

bi shud d+he ka pA la b+h+rUM/ ma hA de wa ti ra baM/ hUM hUM hUM hUM hUM hUM hUM hUM hUM hUM hUM hUM hUM hUM hUM hUM hUM hUM/ bud+d+ha/ badzra/ rat+na/ pad+ma/ karma/ rak+sha/ yak+sha/ gu h+ya/ sa nu/ shrI shrI shrI shrI shrI shrI shrI shrI shrI/ he he he he he he he he he/ ru ru

ba ba ba/ dzra dzra dzra dzra dzra dzra dzra dzra/ sing+ha/ byA g+h+re/ sriM gA la/ shwa na/ gr-id+d+h+ra/ gang+ka/ kA ka u lU ka mu mu mu mu mu mu mu mu/ kha kha kha kha kha kha kha kha/ he he he he he he he he/ ba ba ba ba/ dzra dzra dzra dzra/ ang+ku sha/ pA sha/ s+pho

Ta/ g+haN+De/ dzaHhUM baM hoH 'di man sngags sor bzhag badzra a pra ti Ar+ya ni tsa tur sha ya phaT/ badzra A be sha yo gi nI Ar+ya ni tsa tur sha ya phaT/ badzra mu ni a pra ti Ar+ya ni a pra shi ka ra phaT/ badzra mu ni a mr-i te

a ma ra Ni/ ba shi ka ra phaT/ badzra ma ni a pra ti Ar+ya ni kri pa shi ka ra phaT/ badzra mu ni a pra ti Ar+ya ni pra shi ka ra phaT/ badzra mu ni a pra ti Ar+ya ni du ba shrI ka ra phaT/ oM badzra mu ni a pra ti ma tri tsa tur ta ra

phaT/ b+h+yo b+h+yo b+h+yo b+h+yo b+h+yo b+h+yo/ b+h+yo b+h+yo b+h+yo b+h+yo b+h+yo b+h+yo/ b+h+yo b+h+yo b+h+yo b+h+yo b+h+yo b+h+yo/ b+h+yo b+h+yo b+h+yo b+h+yo b+h+yo b+h+yo/ b+h+yo b+h+yo b+h+yo b+h+yo/ ma nu rak+Sha sI/ brah+ma NI/ rau trI/ beSh+Na be/ kau ma rI/ in+d+ra nI/ badzra ping+ga laM/ a mr-i tA/ sau mya/ daN+Da daM/ rak+Sha sI/

b+hak+Sha sI/ ra ti badzra/ ru d+hi ra mat+tA/ e ka tsa ri NI/ ma no hA raM/ sid+d+hi ga/ bA ya be/ ma hA ma ra Na/ ag+nI/ ba ra hI/ tsa muN+Di/ su ta ni/ ba ru NI/ badzra ma hA ka lI/ badzra tsa kA laM/ badzra luM b+ha kar+NA/ badzra laM bo da

dzaHdzaHdzaHdzaHdzaHdzaHdzaHdzaHdzaHdzaH dzaHdzaH dzaHdzaHdzaHdzaHdzaHdzaHdzaH/ dzaHdzaHdzaHdzaHdzaHdzaHdzaHdzaHdzaHdzaH/ dzaHdzaHdzaHdzaHdzaHdzaHdzaHdzaHdzaHdzaH/ dzaHdzaHdzaHdzaHdzaHdzaHdzaHdzaHdzaHdzaH/ lang+ka drug cu'o// dzaHdrug cu/ dzaHdrug cu/

dzaHdrug cu/ dzaHdrug cu/ dzaHdrug cu/ dzaHdrug cu/ oM b+ha na b+ha na ang+ku sha dza/ ha la ha la pA sha hUM/ gardza gardza s+pho Ta s+pho Ta baM/ pa tsa pa tsa g+haN+De hoH kro d+ha kro d+hI hUM/ ma me shwa ra hUM/ pho nya sum brgya drug cu'o//

b+h+yo bdun 'bum nyi khri'o// oM A:hU~M/ oM sarba ta thA ga ta kA ya badzra swa b+hA ba At+ma ko\u0f85 haM/ oM sarba ta thA ga ta wA ka badzra swa b+hA ba At+ma ko\u0f85 haM/ oM sarba ta thA ga ta tsit+ta badzra swa b+hA ba At+ma ko\u0f85 haM/ oM AHhUM swa hA/ ka pA la

b+h+rUM/ oM shU n+ya tA dz+nyA na badzra swa b+hA ba At+ma ko\u0f85 haM/ oM ma hA A dar+sha dz+nyA na badzra swa b+hA ba at+ma ko\u0f85 haM/ oM ma hA sa ma ta dz+nyA na badzra swa b+hA ba At+ma ko\u0f85 haM/ oM ma hA pra t+ya be k+Sha Na dz+nyA na badzra swa b+hA ba at+ma ko\u0f85 haM/ oM ma hA kr-i

t+ya nuSh+ThA na dz+nyA na swa b+hA ba At+ma ko\u0f85 haM/ hUM badzra/ paM pad+ma// e h+ye hi b+ha ga wAn/ ma hA ka ru Ni ka ma hA kro d+ha dr-i sh+ya hoH dr-i sh+ya stAM/ sa ma ya dzaHhUM baM hoH/ pra be sha phaT/ A be sha ya a/ ma hA kro d+ha a ti pu ho/ pra tIts+tsha ho/

dzaHhUM baM hoH/ shrI ma hA he ru ka/ ma hA kro d+ha ma hA kro d+hI shwa rI/ hU~M he he phaT dzaHb+h+yo dza ma dza/ ma hA d+hU pa dI pa puSh+pe nai bid+ya/ rak+ta/ mAM sa/ ma hA keng ni ri ti/ ba su ta go ro tsa na kha kha khA hi/ zhes gsungs pas/
gang bar gyur/ thim par gyur/ 'bar bar gyur/ 'dres shing byin gyis brlabs par gyur/ mnyes par gyur to// dpal he ru ka 'dus pa'i rgyud chen po las/ gsung gi dkyil 'khor chen po mngon du phyung ba'i
le'u ste brgyad pa'o//// de nas yang gsang ba'i bdag pos/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// e ma ho// phyogs bcu'i rgyal ba kun gyi sku// 'bar ba'i gar dgus zil gyis gnon
mdzad pa// dpa' bo 'bar ba'i rgyal po'i thugs rje yis// sku yi dkyil 'khor bdag la bstan du gsol// zhes gsol pa dang/ bcom ldan 'das dpal ye shes rngam pa'i rgyal pos sku'i dkyil 'khor 'di
bshad do// ma bcos mi gnas dmigs dang bral// bsam dpyod yid 'dzin rtog las 'das// ci yang 'du shes mi 'jug pa// de bzhin nyid kyi ting 'dzin bsgom// stong nyid ye shes rang gsal

ba'i// phyogs med nam mkha'i rang bzhin ltar// snying rje chen pos khyab pa yis// kun tu snang ba bsgom par bya// gnyis med rig par rang snang ba'i// ma lus skye rgyu hUM bsgom bya// de las byung ba'i raM yaM khaM// ma

dag pa rnams bsreg sbyang bkrus// stong pa nyid du bsam par bya// a las nam mkha' yangs pa'i steng// rlung gi dkyil 'khor bsam pa'i steng// ra las khrag gi rgya mtsho 'khrugs// suM las zhing chen keng rus

nyid// tshad dang ldan pa'i steng du b+h+rUM// dur khraud 'bar ba'i gzhal yas khang// raM las bskal pa'i me dpung dmar nag 'khrigs// thig bzhi btab pas le'u tshe dgu// gru chad sgo bzhi khyams brgyad la// sna
tshogs gzhal yas gdan dang rgyan// rim pa bzhin du 'khrigs par bsgom// dpal chen bud+d+ha he ru ka/ dbu dgu phyag ni bco brgyad dam// yang na zhal gsum phyag drug ste// zhal gcig phyag gnyis de

bzhin te// rig pa rang snang ma nges pas// sku mdog phyag mtshan cir yang 'gyur// de bzhin dngos med phyag rgya dang// de las byung ba'i phyag mtshan rnams// nges pa med par dpa' bos bshad// mkhas pas ci
dgar bsgoms pas 'grub// yab yum gnyis med sbyor ba las/ khro bo de bzhin bzhugs pa rnams// rig pa'i dkyil 'khor phyogs med pas// ji ltar mos pa bzhin du bsgom// smug nag ser nag dmar

nag dang// ljang nag smug ser dmar ser dang// dmar ljang dkar ljang 'jigs pa'i sku// thabs ni rdo rje rin chen dang// pad+ma rgya gram de bzhin du// dbyug to s+t+wa re ral gri dang// be con g.yon gyis

dril bu 'dzin// kro d+hI shwa rI yum rnams ni// sku mdog yab dang mthun pa la// g.yas pa shes rab thabs la brten// g.yon pa b+han+d+ha gtso la stob/ le tshe dag la shes par bya// dang por khro mo brgyad kyi

khyams// gnyis pa phra men brgyad bkod de// gsum pa de bzhin 'bar ma la// sgo ma bzhi dang ldan par bsam// bzhi pa dbang phyug nyi shu brgyad// rang gi sgo dang ldan par bsam// lnga pa mkha' 'gro'i bar
khyams te// phyogs bzhir bdun bdun sgo bzhir bcas// drug pa ma mo bdun gyi khyams// sgo la las kyi sring bzhi gnas// bdun pa ging gi gnas yin te// phyogs bzhir gsum gsum sgo bzhir bzhi// king
ka ra dang dbugs sdud ma// bka' sdod mdun dang rgyab na gnas// brgyad pa pho nya'i khyams yin te// phyogs bzhir drug cu rigs mdog can// steng 'og ser dang dmar ba yi// drug cu phrag gnyis shar nub
khyams// dzaHhUM baMhoH/ sgo bzhir gnas// yang sprul gnas la nges med de// nag mo khrag shog can gyi tshogs// steng gi nam mkhar 'khod pa yin// rig 'dzin bye ba sa ya dag/ phyi rol 'khor yug

cha la bsam// phyi nang kun tu 'phro byed pa'i// me ri'i 'od ni gtibs ma thag/ dam pa nges pa skye ba'i sa// skal med bsreg cing 'bros pa'i gnas// rdo rje rnal 'byor can gyis bsgom// de nas dbang bskur

byin brlabs la// yan lag lha ni gsal byas la// sngags kyi yan lag tshang bar bsgom/ rdo rje bsdu ba'i phyag rgya yis// nam mkha'i khams gtugs sangs rgyas kun// til 'bru bzhin du gang khyab pa'i// rdo rje
khro bo'i gzugs su sad// dzaHhUM baM hoHsa spyan drangs la// bkug dang bstim dang bsdam byas te// dbang du byas te bstim par bya// gnyis med mnyes par phyag byas te// rang rang dgyes pa'i gar stabs
kyis// mnyes pa'i mchod pa sna tshogs dbul// lag gnyis bsgyur cing gyen du dgrol// rang rang mchod pa'i phyag rgya yis// dkyil 'khor 'khor lo mnyes par bya// zhes gsungs so// dpal he ru ka 'dus
pa'i rgyud chen po las/ 'bar ba'i sku'i dkyil 'khor mngon du phyung ba'i le'u ste dgu pa'o//// de nas yang gsang ba'i bdag po des// bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// e ma ho// dus
gsum rgyal ba kun gyi gsang ba'i thugs// rnam grol ye shes skad cig thugs chud pa// rnam par grol ba de nyid mtshon pa'i phyir// phyag rgya'i mtshan nyid bdag la bshad du gsol// zhes gsol pa las/
dpal chen ye shes rngam pa'i rgyal pos 'di skad ces gsungs so// dbus kyi gtso bo'i phyag rgya ni// g.yas dkar g.yon dmar dbus mthing zhal// rdo rje kha T+wAM rnge'u chung g.yas// g.yon dril dung dmar
rgyu zhags bsnams// dpal chen ye shes thabs kyi rgya// shes rab dbyings kyi phyag rgya ni// zhal gcig phyag gnyis sku mdog mthing// g.yas pa shes rab thabs la brten// g.yon pa dung dmar gtso la

stob// he ru brgyad kyi phyag rgya ni// g.yas pa rang rang mtshan ma ste// 'phyar zhing 'gying ba'i tshul du gnas// g.yon pa dril bu yum la 'khyud/ khro mo kro d+hI shwa ri rnams// kun kyang g.yas pa thabs

la 'khyud// g.yon pa b+han dmar gtso la stob// gnas dang yul gyi phyag rgya ni// gau rI b+han dmar byis dbyug sngo// tsau rI mda' gzhu 'gengs ma ser// pra mo chu srin rgyal mtshan dmar// be tA byi za rdo 'phyar

gnas// puk+ka dmar ser byis rgyu 'dren// g+hasma rung dmar khrag 'thung ljang// sma sha mthing nag byis snying za// tsaN+Da ser skya mchog lus 'bral// sing+ha kha ro bsnol ser seng// bya g+h+ra gnan lta bsnol dmar

stang// sri la nag mo byis ldag wa// shwa na 'dral lta mthing ga sbyang// gr-i d+ha gri dmar rgyu 'dren rgod// kang+ka zhing phrag snar mgo ring// kA ka kha ro ban gri gnag/ u lU mthing tshogs lcags kyu

'ug/ rta gdong sngon mo lcags kyu 'dzin// phag gdong nag mo mche zhags bsnams// dmar mo lcags sgrog nyi zla sdom// thal byed dril bu sna tshogs mdog/ ma mo rnams kyi phyag rgya ni// srin mo smug nag thod rlon

'chang// tshangs ma dmar ser pad+ma bsnams// lha chen dkar chen tri shU la// gtogs 'dod sngon mo 'khor lo 'chang// gzhon nu dmar mo mdung thung 'phen// brgya byin dkar mo in+t+ra gdengs// rdo rje ser mo

tsan+da 'thung// bdud rtsi dmar mo pad+ma bsnams// zla ba dkar mo puN+Da ri// be con ljang nag dbyug to 'phyar// srin mo dmar mo dung khrag 'thung// za ma ljang nag ba su 'dren// dga' ba dmar mo ka tar
'phyar// stobs chen dkar mo gshol mda' 'dzin// rdo rje ser mo spu gris gcod// 'dod pa dmar mo mda' gzhu 'gengs// nor srungs dkar mo bum pa 'dzin// rlung lha sngon mo ba dan 'phyar// gsod byed

dkar mo ral gri so// me mo dmar mo gsal shing 'dzin// phag gdong nag mo mche zhags can// rgan byed dmar mo zhing chung za// sna chen dkar mo thod khrag 'thung// chu lha sngon mo sbrul zhags 'dzin// rdo rje

nag mo lcags kyu 'dzin// rdo rje ser mo ra mgo zhags// rdo rjai dmar mo lcags sgrog sdom// rdo rje ljang nag dril 'khrul dgyes// 'bar ma rnams kyi phyag rgya ni// sku mdog gdul bya'i tshul 'dra zhing// g.yas pa

rdo rje 'bar ba 'dzin// g.yon pa b+han+da rak+ta 'dzin// mkha' 'gro rnams ky-i phyag rgya ni// rdo rje gshog pas zil gnon cing// b+han+da khrag 'thung chags pa che// 'dod chags tshul gyis 'gro ba 'dul// ma bdun sring

bzhi'i phyag rgya ni// 'jo sgeg mdzes mar zil gyis blta// g.yas pa 'khyud tshul dkar 'dzin bstan// g.yon pa dung khrag 'thung byed pa'o// ging chen bco brgyad phyag rgya ni// sngo skya 'jigs pa'i tshul ston

cing// g.yas pa gri dang mtshon cha thogs// g.yon pas 'dzin cing gsod par byed// pho nya sum brgya drug cu'i tshogs// dkar dang sngo dang dmar ljang gnag/ gser dang byu ru'i mdog 'dra ba// drug cu drug gis

rdzogs pa ni// lcags kyu zhags pa lcags sgrog dang// tho ba gshog pa gtun tshogs 'dzin// ma lus khyab pa'i tshul gyis gnas// rdo rje nag po khrag shog can// 'phur zhing 'dzul te kun tu rgyu// phyogs bcur

khyab pa'i las byed cing// nyi zla'-i tshul du mkha' la 'gro// sha khrag tshil bu rkang za zhing// brjid pa'i tshul gyis sdigs byed cing// lag na mtshon cha sna tshogs thogs// bye ba phrag ni bdun 'bum
tshogs// 'gugs dang chags pas rmongs pa dang// gsod dang spor dang thal byed pa// mdzes dang chags dang 'thab pa dang// sdang mig gyen dang mthur lta zhing// rdzu 'phrul thogs med rlung
shugs can// 'jigs pa'i gzugs dang 'jigs pa'i sgra// sna tshogs de bzhin dri dang ro// nam mkha' khyab pa'i stobs kyis gtibs// rnal 'byor bstan pa srung byed cing// gdug pa skrag sdang za bar
byed// 'dzin dang bsnyeg dang dgug pa dang// dbang dang gsad pa'i pho nya ni// sprul cing las rnams byed pa'i 'khor// 'bar 'khrug rngam pa'i cha byad can// gom pa'i stabs kyis gnas par bya// ma bcos

chos kyi dbyings nyid las// rol pa'i phyag rgya snang ba ni// rgya mtsho chu yi chu bur ltar// dang ba'i sprin dang rol mo ltar// dus gcig gsal bar bsgom par bya'o// rang gi rig pa bsam yas pas// grangs dang

phyag mtshan sku mdog dang// ma nges phyag rgya'i ngo bor shar// ji ltar snang ba'i sku yi tshogs// sgra skad ma lus gsung nyid de// dran rig sna tshogs thugs kyi ngang// ma bcos dbyings dang ye shes la// dran pa rgyun

gyi chu bo ltar// ma yengs gsal bar bsgoms byas pas// rgyu 'bras ma btsal lhun gyis rdzogs// he ru ka yi brtag pa nyid// dbang po'i khyad par ji bzhin du// rang gi thabs ni sna tshogs kyis// rang rang mos
pa ji bzhin du// bsgrub pas ci dgar 'grub par 'gyur// mchog dang thun mong la sogs pa// dka' thub med par tshe 'dis 'grub// ces gsungs so// dpal he ru ka 'dus pa'i rgyud las/ phyag rgya thugs kyi
dkyil 'khor bstan pa'i le'u ste bcu pa'o//// de nas yang gsang ba'i bdag po des/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// e ma ho// sangs rgyas thams cad kyi// sku gsung thugs kyi rgya che
ba// 'dul ba'i thabs kyi mdzad pa gang// cho ga'i khyad par bshad du gsol// zhes gsol to// de nas bcom lda 'das dpal ye shes rngam pa'i rgyal po des/ 'di skad ces gsungs so// ri bo ri sul nags

'dab dang// chu gling dur khrod gangs 'dab tu// skyon dang bral zhing yid 'ong ba// bkra shis bar chad med gnas su// sa bdag zhing skyong bcas pa la// dang por mchod pa byas nas ni// gtor ma mchod pas

tshim par bya// bdag po rnams las blang bya// sa yi skyon rnams bsal byas te// ngan nam bar chad byung ba na// spo'am yang na sbyin bsreg bya// zangs sogs phur pa dbang gi lha// sngags dang ting 'dzin ldan
pas gdab// sa yi bcud rnams bsdus pa yis// sa yi dngos grub dbang du 'gyur// ma dag pa ni dag byas la// rin chen sa gzhir mos ldan par// maN+Dal cha snyoms tshad ldan la// ba byung lnga ldan legs par
byug/ dag pa lnga yi dkyil 'khor ni// rim par bskyed de mdzes par gnas// dkyil 'khor bkod cing spyan drangs la// mchod cing bzlas bstim byin ldan pas// legs par bzung zhing byin

ldan nas// phyi nang bar chod bsal ba'i phyir// bsrung ba'i cho ga brtsam par bya// bdag nyid lha yi rgyan ldan pas// nam mkha' khyab pa'i rtsibs ldan la// nyi steng sum pas lha gnan to// thugs las phyung ba'i
khro bcu las// rdo rje sder mos btab bsams na// bar chad bgegs rigs mi g.yo 'gyur// lag pa'i bre ga'i yig 'bru las// chau ga bzhin du byin brlabs las// rdo rje mtshon cha lnga rim bzhin// spros pas
ma lus bskrad pa dang// 'dus pas gzhal yas gur rim gyur// ma dang a las hi zla'i mig/ 'bar bas phyogs bcur bltas byas nas// tshangs dang gu lang gtogs 'dod bcas// bsreg cing gso dang dkrug byas kyang
bkru dang btsos byas pas// tshangs pa'i 'jig rten bcas pa nyid// bar chad med cing zhi bar 'gyur// phyogs bzhi mtshams bzhi steng 'og bcu// kun kyang 'bar ba khrag 'thung ste// sku

gsung thugs kyi sprul pa yis// ma dag pa nyid mtshams bcad nas// rdo rje khro bo'i gur du gyur// dang po sa yi cho ga ste// gnyis pa la ni sta gon gnas// gsum pa 'jug pa'i cho ga bya// 'di dag cho gar 'dus

pa yin// gang dag tu ni rang nyid kyi// dri dang ldan par lha yi mtshan// grangs dang ldan par nges bkod de// dzaHhU~M baM hoHsa bstim byas la// phyi nang mchod pas rgyas mchod de// bstod dang bzlas pa rim pa

bzhin// de nas byin brlab mkhyen par gsol// dur khrod rin chen bum pa ni// mtshan ldan lha dang grangs mnyam par// nyi shu rtsa lnga grangs mnyam par// byang chub sems su byin brlab ste// mtshan ma thob nas
mchod bstod de// byin gyis brlab cing gzhag par bya// snod dang ldan pa'i slob ma la// tshad dang ldan pa'i slob dpon gyis/ khrus byas dga' dang gus ldan pas// sems bskyed chos bshad sdom pa
phog/ bgegs bskrad rmi lam brtag byas la// ngan na bsreg dang bskrad par bya// de nas dur khrod rgyus pa'am// ras bal 'jam la sras bu ni// nyis 'gyur 'jug mdud med pa yis// byang chub sems su

byin brlabs la// dang por tshangs thig zur thig gdab// de nas dkyil 'khor rim pa bzhin// so sor bgo zhing gdab par bya// de nas sras bu phyi ma yis// ye shes dam tshig byin brlab phyir// ye shes rdo rje

la thim pas// rdo rje ye shes thig tu gyur// rdo rje shugs kyi mi 'gom zhing// bkod pa nam mkhar bzhag nas ni// ye shes pho brang mtshon pa'i phyir// rdul mtshon cho ga brtsam par bya// dur khrod thal ba dang

bsres pa'i// rin chen lnga dang 'bras sbyar ba'i/ kha dog lnga yi phye ma la// rang gi rigs kyi cho ga ltar// ye shes 'bru lngar byin brlab cing/ khrag 'thung lnga yis dbang bskur la// slob dpon 'byung

ba'i phyogs bris te// phyi ma zhal dbang thob pas bris// sngo dang dkar dang ser dang dmar// kun gyi mtha' mar ljang gu ste// pho brang so sor mdzes bya'i phyir// 'di ni tshon gyi rim par 'dod// pho brang dbus ni

zlum po la// gser gyi 'khor lo rtsibs brgyad 'bar// mu khyud rim pa gsum ldan pa'i/ khro mo phra men gnas pa'i khyams// gnyis pa sgo bzhi snying po rdzogs// 'bar ma dang ni dbang phyug ma'i/ khyams dang sgo

mar bcas pa bri// phyi rol mkha' 'gro'i khyams nyid ni// mkha' 'gro rang gi 'khor bcas dgod// ma mo'i khyams la ma bdun te// de yi sgor ni sring mo bzhi// de nas ging chen bco brgyad de// pho nya sum brgya

drug cu dag/ phyi rol khyams la sgo bzhir ni// rdo rje tho ba lu gu rgyud// rdo rje 'bar ba 'bebs pa bzhi// sgo bzhir phyogs dang mthun par bris// rdo rje nag mo khrag gshog can// steng 'og kun tu gtibs byed

cing// pho nya'i tshogs dang lhan cig gnas// rdo rje me ri lag cha dang// phyi rol khro bcu yab yum ste// phra men nyi shu yang sprul dag/ bye ba phrag ni sa ya 'phro// dkyil 'khor rgyan ni thams cad kyang// bam ril

khog pa stod smad dang// zhing dang btsos dang lhu dum dang// rkang dang lhu tshigs tsit+ta'i tog/ thod sku gsung dang thugs kyis mtshan// so so'i bye brag kun tu dgram// bla re rgyan phran gos dang gdugs/ kha dog phye

brag so sos mdzes// bza' btung bca' ba'i yo byad rnams// mdzes shing tshims pa'i tshogs kyis bskor// gzhan yang dur khrod mchod pa lnga// rmad byung gtor ma sha lnga dang// bdud rtsi lnga dang dpa' bor
bcas// rak+ta spyan gzigs rol mo'i sgra// so sor 'tshams pa nyid du dgod// de nas gral bzhin rim bkod de// sngon 'gro'i cho ga legs spyad nas// dur khrod gzhal yas byin rlabs te// rdzas dang sku
gsung thugs bkod nas// rang gi nga rgyal gsal ba yis// rim bzhin dkyil 'khor bskyed pa la// dbang bskur byin rlabs cho ga bzhin// dzaHhU~M baM hoHsa spyan drangs la// byin brlab rab gnas rdzogs bya'i

phyir// gzhi dang 'dres te dbyer med bsgom// brtan pa'i phyag rgya bcings nas ni// brtan bzhugs mchod pa'i cho ga bya// rang gi bzlas pa mthar phyin cing// 'bar dang 'dzum pa dri dang sgra// lung bstan nges
pa'i rtags byung na// bar chad bgegs bskrad dngos grub blang// de nas dad ldan slob bu yis/ khrus byas dri ldan me tog thogs// dar sogs dmar pos ngo bkab la// gsol gdab dam dpog lha bskyed
cing// mig dbye lha bstan cho ga gdag/ ji ltar 'thad pa'i cho ga bya// de nas dbang thob bya ba'i phyir// rta dang glang po gser dngul dang// bu dang chung ma bu mo dang// rgyal srid rang lus la

sogs pa// bla ma mchod phyir dbul bar bya// gang du sdug bsngal mtsho bsgral zhing// thar pa'i grong khyer 'thob bya zhing// dbang dang dngos grub thob bya'i phyir// bla ma che la gsol ba 'debs/ khyod ni dam pa'i
bdag nyid las// 'jigs pa kun las bdag bsgral zhing// thar pa'i lam la dgod pa dang// dbang dang byin brlabs bdag 'tshal bas// de phyir dad pas khyod bsten pas// thugs rje can gyis byin gyis

rlobs// gnang ba thob nas gus ldan pa'i// dbang rim bzhi nyid nod par bya// me tog char dang sgra dang dri// mthong ba dag dang shes rab 'phel// tshe dang longs spyod 'phel ba dang// gzungs ma mkha' 'gro
'du ba dang// byin rlabs mngon du snang ba dang// byin rlabs dbang thob lam rtags yin// zhes gsungs so// dpal he ru ka 'dus pa'i rgyud las/ gzugs brnyan gyi bya ba bstan pa'i le'u ste bcu gcig
pa'o//// de nas bcom ldan 'das dpal dgyes pa chen po rngam pa'i rgyal po ye shes he ru kas/ dkyil 'khor thams cad mchod pa'i sprin 'byung ba zhes bya ba 'di sku dang gsung dang thugs las mngon du

byung ba'o// oM shrI he ru ka ma hA kro d+ha hUM/ kro d+hI shwa rI sa ma ya hUM hUM hUM/ oM badzra gau rI ha sa ma ya hUM/ badzra sid+ha mu khI hUM sa ma ya dzaHhUM/ oM badzra aM ku sha dzaHdzaHhUM// rdo rje rkang lag mdzes pa'i gar// nam mkha'i rdul

snyed rab sprul te// 'bar ba'i dkyil 'khor mnyes bya'i phyir// dkyil 'khor lha la phyag 'tshal lo// nam mkha'i mdzod kyi gter ldan pas// sngags dang phyag rgya'i byin rlabs kyis// ji ltar 'dod cing yid 'ong

ba'i// yo byad nam mkha' khyab par sprul// mos pa dag pa'i khyad par bzhin// 'khor gsum dag pa'i stobs kyis 'bul// rdo rje thal mo kha phye zhing// rak+ta sbreng ba'i tshul gyis ni// phyag zhabs zhal bsil

dbul bar bya// thugs rje chags pas bdag don gsol// oM shrI he ru ka ma hA kro d+hI shwa rI/ sa ma ya ha he phaT/ ru lu ru lu ma hA rak+ta ar+g+haM pra tIts+tsha ho khA hi// rdo rje khu tshur 'gyings byas pas// mdzes par bsgyur

ba'i tshul gyis ni// thal mo gyen du bskor byas te// rdo rje me tog la sogs pa'i// mchod pa lnga yi bye brag gis// dkyil 'khor cho ga bzhin du mchod// oM AHhUM/ su ra to ma hA rA ga pa na be ma/ pe nu su ra

to// ti pu pa ra mu/ sarba ta thA ga ta sid+d+hi hu/ sa ma yo ta muH/ sarba ma hA su kha sid+d+hi hu/ oM A hUM shrI badzra rA ga d+dU pe d+hU/ puSh+pe pu/ A lo ki hrIH gan+d+he gan// rdo rje lha mo rab mdzes ma// so so'i yo byad rab thogs
nas// nam mkha' khyab par rab sprul zhing// yo byad rang lus thim par mchod// sangs rgyas kun gyi ra sA yan/ 'chi ba med pa'i bdud rtsi lnga// mthar thug med pa'i rgya mtshor sprul// rgyal ba

rnams kyang tshims par mdzad// rdo rje phyag rgya gar 'grol te// mtheb srin rtse mos blangs gtor bas// rdul snyed bzhugs pa'i rgyal ba rnams// dgyes shing gzi byin ldan par 'gyur/ oM shrI he ru ka ma hA kro d+hI shwa

rI/ ha he phaT/ ru lu ru lu hUM/ ma hA pany+tsa a mr-i ta ra sA ya na/ a la la ho// rdo rje dam tshig mchog gsum po// bdag gzhan byin rlabs blangs bkod nas// nam mkha' mthas gtugs sku gsung thugs// byin
rlabs brtan pa nyid du 'gyur// bza' dang bca' dang btung dang bgo/ 'dod pa'i yon tan lnga ldan pas// nam mkha'i sprin ltar gtibs spungs nas// dkyil 'khor nyid la dkyil 'khor thim// myos byed dang

ni ru d+ha ra// tshe dang tshims byed rak+ta dang// dar dir snyan par bcas pa'i glu// lha mo rdul snyed mdangs ldan pas// ma lus khyab cing mnyes par bya// zhing du gyur pa ma lus pa// byams dang snying rjes gzhi bzung
nas// thabs chen ldan pa'i rnal 'byor pas/ khams gsum ma lus bsgral bar bya// srog chags rlung ni rang dwangs shing// bde ba chen por smin byas nas// ma rungs gdug pa'i lha chen rnams// 'gro ba kun

la brtse ba dang/ khro bas khro ba 'dul ba'i phyir// rtog pas thugs rjes bsgral ba ni// bde chen sa la dgod par rigs// phyin chad 'khor bar mi ldog par// skyes bu chen por dbang bskur te// thabs dang snying
rjer ldan pa yis// bde chen sa la the tshom med// chags pas chags pa 'dul ba dang// bde ba chen po'i gar thabs kyis// nam mkha'i khams ni kun bkang ste// dkyil 'khor mnyes par bya ba'i phyir// lha mo

klu mo la sogs pa'i// na tshod yod med gang rung la// thabs dang cho ga'i khyad par gyis// sbyor ba'i lam ni brtsam par bya// ye shes ting 'dzin las grub pa'i/ khyad par sbyor ba'i yum du brtag/ sbyor ba'i cho ga

sna tshogs kyis// lha yi 'khor lor gyis bar mdzad// nyi zla byang chub sems kyi tshogs// bde ba chen po'i thig le nyid// rdo rje pad+ma'i stobs las byung// zhing khams phyi nang ma lus pa// bde ba'i mchod pas gang
bar 'gyur// gang du dgyes pa'i gnas gsum nas// dgyes pa'i lha mo rdul phran tshogs// rang gi lag char bcas thogs nas// rgyal ba 'khor bcas mnyes par 'gyur// sha pa ta la sogs pa yi// brdung dang

dkrol ba la sogs pa'i// rol mo'i bye brag mtha' yas pa'i// glu dang tshig tu bcas pa yis// mchog cing bstod pa sna tshogs bya// rdo rje rol mo'i tshogs mchod ni/ khyad par gnyis dang lnga la sogs// tshe dang
bran mo g.yon can ma// mAM sa dpa' bo zla rgyas dang// zla phraum tshims byed gzi brjid mchog/ thar pa me tog dri zhim pa// yid 'ong bde skyid yo byad tshogs// dag cing byin brlab ma nyams
pa'i// yo byad nam mkha'i mthas gtugs pa// bshams shing sprul pa'i rgya mtsho'i tshogs// mchod pa'i lha mos gang byas te// bde mchog ro yis brgyan byas te// dkyil 'khor tshogs la mchod par dbul// rdo

rje rkang pa'i stabs ldan zhing// lag gnyis 'gy-ing bcas gar byas nas// thal mo'i snyim pa gyen bkrol nas// tshogs kyi mchod pa dbul bar bya// gang gis 'di dag sbyor ba yis// rgyas ba sras bcas rdo rje

'dzin// rnal 'byor mkha' 'gro dang bcas pa'i// dgyes pa'i tshul gyis byin brlabs shing// mthu dang rdzu 'phrul ci yod pas// rang gi 'dod pa ji lta bar// dgyes par dngos grub bstsal ba dang// dbang dang
byin rlabs phun sum tshogs// kun gyi bdag po nyid du 'gyur// zhes gsungs so// dpal he ru ka 'dus pa'i rgyud las/ mchod pa'i de kho na nyid skal pa bzang po zhes bya ba'i le'u ste bcu gnyis
pa'o//// de nas yang gsang ba'i bdag pos bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// e ma ho sangs rgyas thams cad kyi// dam pa dri ma med pa'i thugs// mi 'da'i rang bzhin gang lags
pa// dam pa'i don du bshad du gsol// zhes gsol to// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdag nyid ye shes rngam pa'i rgyal po des 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// sangs rgyas kun gyi rang bzhin ni// 'da'
ba med pa'i rang bzhin te// rnal 'byor rnams la phan gdags phyir// dam tshig khyad par bshad par bya// dus gsum sangs rgyas thams cad kyi// sku gsung thugs kyi rang bzhin ni// mi 'da'i dam pa mchog

gyur ba// 'das par gyur na tshig par bshad// rang bzhin bzang dang dad pa dang// mos shing dge la brtson pa dang// 'khor bas 'jigs shing snying rje ldan// de la dam tshig sbyin par bya// sangs rgyas kun gyi
rang bzhin che// byang chub sems nyid dag pa ste// ma lus rang bzhin kun tu bzang// don dam kun rdzob dbyer med pa// mgon pos gnang ba la gnas shing// skyo ba med par gnas par bya// gzhan du bskal
pa grangs med par// dka' bas sbyin dang tshul khrims dang// dkar po'i don la gang gnas kyang// sa bon med pa'i 'bras bu bzhin// de yang gzhan las ma yin te// bla ma mchog las shes par bya// rgyal ba
kun gyi sku gsung thugs// rgyud la 'jug cing dbang bskur dang// gsang ba sgrogs shing 'dren pa dang// zab mo'i don gyi lam ston pa// rgyal ba kun dang mnyam pa'i phyir// nam mkha'i mthar thug bar du
ni// zhabs la spyi bos reg bya zhing// thugs las 'gal bar mi bya'o// 'khor ba nub par byed pa dang// sangs rgyas sa la 'jog pa yi// dam pa de las 'gal byed pa// rdo rje 'dzin pa nyid kyang
'dzin// dam pas gnang ba'i grogs mchog rnams// rdo rje gsang bas gcig bsdus pa'i// snying po gnang gnas pa'i yang/ ba'i 'od bzhin pas// nam yang 'bral ba ma yin phyir// dam pas dam pa rdzogs

par ru// bskur zhing brnyas par mi bya'o// rdo rje dam pa 'dral byed pa// bdag gzhan gnyis ka 'phung ba dang// rdo rje 'dzin rgyal khros gyur nas// bdun rgyud tshun chad brlag par 'gyur// de nas rigs dman
log par 'gyur// dam pa rnams kyis smad pa dang// bskal pa brgya phrag du ma ru// gsang ba'i don las 'gal bar 'gyur// sangs rgyas sras dang pho nyar bcas// 'khor lor mthong dang zhugs pa yi// dam
pa'am rang gi dam pa ni// dam pas dam par byin brlabs pas// sku gsung thugs kyi ngo bo ste// sngags dang phyag rgyas rgyas btab nas// bar chad med par mi bskyod cing// tha mal dman pa'i las spyod
pa// dam pa kun la brnyas pa ste// drag shul spyod pa kun bsdus nas// dus min sdug bsngal 'bab pa dang// byang chub sems dang bral ba yin// sangs rgyas kun gyi de nyid ni// gsang ba dam par byin
brlabs pa// reg pas sdug bsngal zhi byed pa// thob nas gzhan du brjod mi bya// 'di ni sangs rgyas thams cad de// dbang bskur bcud dang 'brel pa yi// sku gsung thugs kyi de nyid de// rigs ngan byis
pa'i yul min pas// gang zhig dam las 'da' byed pa// dam pa rnams kyi rgyud gcod cing// sdug bsngal grong khyer 'phel byed pas// sangs rgyas nyid kyis sgrol byed 'gyur// 'di ni dam pas byin brlabs

shing// dam pa'i rtsa ba yin phyir te// dam par grub pa dam pa ste// dngos grub 'dod pas gnas par bya// gang phyir sangs rgyas 'dod pa yis// 'don chags zhe sdang gti mug dang// nga rgyal phrag dog dam tshig

che// dam par gyur pa mi spang ngo// sangs rgyas kun kyi rang bzhin te// ye shes lnga dang rgyal ba lnga// sku gsung yon tan phrin las thugs// spangs pas mi 'grub 'khor bar 'gyur// sbyor sgrol ma byin len pa

dang// rdzun dang ngag brlang spyod pa lnga// sangs rgyas kun gyi spyod pa'i phyir// 'da' bar bya ba ma yin no// sha chen dmar chen dri dang bcas// byang chub sems dang dag pa'i chu// dang du blang pa'i rang bzhin

pas// rtag tu bza' zhing btung bar bya// sha chen khyi sha mchog yin te// mche can mkha' lding stobs ldan sha/ gang zhig byin brlabs za byed pa// rgyal ba rdo rje 'dzin dang mnyam// phung po 'byung ba kha dog
dang// dbang po yul du bcas pa'i chos// dag pa lnga ni shes bya ste// 'khor bas sangs rgyas lnga ru shes par bya// kun gyis bsgrub pa'i sangs rgyas lnga// rdo rje rin chen pad+ma dang// las dang de

bzhin gshegs rang bzhin// bdag nyid lhun gyis grub par bya// spyi dang khyad par bsgrub pa dang// lhag pa'i dam tshig la sogs pa// gsang ba spyi dang khyad par dang// rang rang bsgrub pa las gsungs pa// cho
ga bzhin du nan tan bya// gal te bcas pa'i dam tshig la// cho ga bzhin du ma bsgrubs shing// dam pa'i don las 'gal byed pa// rgya mtsho bskam dang ri bo zad// ji srid nam mkha' gnas bar du// rdo rje
dmyal bar gnas pa nyid// dam pas dam par byin brlabs nas// gang zhig de las 'gal byed pa// sangs rgyas rdo rje 'dzin pa dang// mkha' 'gro rnal 'byor la sogs pa// ma lus kun la brnyas pas
na// sdug bsngal rnam pa mang po ni// mtshon cha'i 'khor lo bzhin du 'khor// gal te dam pa'i las byas nas// bsams pa bzhin du mi 'grub cing// nyams pa'i snga rtags ltas byung na// nyams pa skong ba'i
las byas la// dam pa rnams kyis bshad pa ltar// phyin chad gang yang nyams mi bya// sku gsung thugs kyi dam pa ni// gang gis tshul bzhin gnas pa dang// ji ltar rigs par gnas pa ni// gang gis ji ltar
bsgrubs pa dang// tshe 'di nyid la 'grub par 'gyur// mos dang dbang po che ba yis// bar chad med par brtson byas na// lo phyed bzhi dang zla ba nyid// bco brgyad kyis ni 'grub par 'gyur// dman dang
bskal ba ngan pa dang// shes rab yo byad zhan pas kyang// thabs kyis cho ga ma nyams par// dam pas bstan pa bzhin bsgrubs na// tshe 'dis thob par the tshom med// ces gsungs so// dpal he ru ka 'dus
pa'i rgyud chen po las/ dam tshig bstan pa'i le'u ste bcu gsum pa'o//// de nas yang gsang ba'i bdag po des/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// sangs rgyas kun gyi rang bzhin
dpyod// sangs rgyas kun gyi sku gsung thugs// ma lus skyob pa'i rang bzhin gyis// gtor ma'i khyad par bshad du gsol// zhes gsol pa las// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa rngam pa'i rgyal pos
'di skad ces gsungs so// sna tshogs snod kyi 'jig rten du// bcud kyi sems can gtor mar sbyar// gdod nas ma bcos chos kyi dbyings// yongs la khyab pas phyogs bcur snang// 'dod pa'i yon tan lnga
rnams dang// rang bzhin gnas dang sprul pa yi// mchod dang rgyal rgyan yang la sogs pa'i bdags kyang bdag/ ma bzung btang bas khyab pa ste// chos can sna tshogs mchog tu bshad// ji snyed bsam yas ma
lus thabs// stong zhi ma bcos ngang la sbyar// de nyid zhi bar gnas rtog pa// chos nyid ma bcos gtor ma yin// rigs pa mtha' bral snod chen du// sna tshogs rig pa'i 'don yon lnga// nam

mkha' khyab pa'i stobs kyis sprul// ting 'dzin sprul pa'i gtor ma yin// mtshan ma rdzas kyi khyad par yang// bza' btung bro ba'i mchog rnams dang// sha lnga bdud rtsi lnga las byas// dag cing byin brlabs ldan
pa'o// phung po chos kyi dbyings kyi yin// gtub pas ye shes rol pa yin/ kham bu thugs rje sprul par bshad// chos dbyings ma bcos dbyings su bsdus// ye shes rol pas byin brlab snang// sha khrag dmar

gyis mkha' 'gro brten// thugs rjes 'phrul pas phyogs bcur khyab// dang por ye shes bdud rtsi ste// dkyil 'khor ji bzhin sbyin bsreg bya// bar ma'i 'dod yon lnga yi ste// rnal 'byor mi zad gter du sba/
yum lnga'i mkha' klong gnas la gtad// ye shes lnga yi rgya yis gdab// tha ma lhag ma'i cho ga gang// gnas bdun yongs su rdzogs nas ni// 'khor gyi mkha' 'gro mchod pa dang// za lam bstan dang sbyin
bsreg bya// snang srid snod bcud ma lus pa// rang bzhin 'dod pa'i yon tan lnga// phyogs med mnyes par rol pa ni// phyogs bral chos dbyings gtor ma yin// bdag nyid dkyil 'khor gsal bsgoms
pas// snang srid bde ba'i longs spyod la// sgo gsum bar chad med spyod pa// rnal 'byor spyod pa re dogs med// thabs ldan 'di ltar su zhig ni// bsod nams ye shes rdzogs 'gyur zhing// 'khor ba'i mtshan
mar snang ba dag/ sku gsum ye shes lnga 'grub 'gyur// sha khrag rus pa sna tshogs pa// bdag gzhan dug gsum zad pa dang// 'khor ba ye shes spyad pa'i phyir// thabs ldan rnal 'byor pas dbul bya// srid
gsum ye nas bdud rtsi lnga// ma bcos lhun gyis rdzogs sangs rgyas// bdag gis rtogs par bya ba'i phyir// sha lnga bdud rtsi lnga dbul bya// thabs dang shes rab rang bzhin gyis// gtor ma zhes ni de la
bya// sku gsung thugs kyi rang bzhin gyis// zhi sogs las la thogs med cing// rang rang 'byor pas tshogs bsag phyir// dus bzhi'i gtor ma dbul bar bya// gang du gdug tshogs zhi ba dang// nor dang 'bru

rnams 'phel ba dang// bkra shis 'byor pa bya ba dang// ci 'dod dngos grub bsgrub bya'i phyir// tshogs dang gtor ma'i las bya'o// dam tshig nyams dang chags pa yis// gnod pa pha rol sbyor ba dang// las

dang bag chags che ba dang// bsam pa mi 'grub lha g.yel dang// dngos grub don la nus pa med// dam tshig nyams pa'i rtags byung na// tshogs dang gtor ma bzlas shing bya// las rnams mtha' yas gang sngon
du// tshogs dang gtor ma'i sbyor ba bya// thun mong thun mong ma yin pa'i// las dang lam ni myur 'grub na// tshogs dang gtor ma bzlas par bya// des na gang yin las la sbyar// zhes gsungs
so// dpal he ru ka 'dus pa'i rgyud chen po las/ mchod pa'i yan lag gi le'u ste bcu bzhi pa'o//// de nas yang gsang ba'i bdag pos/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// dus gsum
sangs rgyas thams cad kyi// gsang ba'i don la bdag 'jug phyir// dbang bskur snang ba rmad byung ba// gang lags rim pa bdag la stsol// zhes gsol pa las/ de bzhin gshegs pa dpal ye shes rngam pa'i
rgyal pos 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// dbang bskur gnang ba thob 'dod pas// slob dpon 'brel ba'i thabs ldan pa// snod dang ldan pa'i slob ma la// thabs dang ldan pa'i dbang bskur te// lam la gnas
pa'i dbang thob pas// gang bsgrub dbang du snang bar 'gyur// thabs chen rgyud dang bral ba yi// tha mal grags 'chang bla ma yis// blun po gang bsgral 'khor ba las// gnyi gas sdug bsngal chen po
'thob// sdug bsngal dang len bde 'dod pas// ci nas skyo ba'i sems bral bas// las dang rdzas sogs ma chags pas// bla ma dag la bsnyen bkur bya// rdo rje bla ma de bzhin gshegs// 'gro ba kun la snying

rje ba'i// yid bzhin nor bu lta bu nyid// rjes mthun thugs rjes khyab par byed// sna tshogs cho gar ldan pa yis// dad dang dam tshig ldan pa yis// rten 'brel sbyor ba myur 'gyur ba// dper na me dang gtsub

shing bzhin// dang por thar pa'i grong khyer du// 'jug pa'i tshul gyis gsol ba gdab// sngon du rung ba byas pa dang// dam tshig sdom pa thob pa dang// byin rlabs ye shes myong ba dang// bdag dang gzhan don

lhur len pa// 'dod dang sbyin pa'i tshul dag gis// rim pa bzhin du sbyin par bya// bum pa dbu rgyan cod pan dang// phreng ba po ti rgya gram dang// 'khor lo'i ming dang phyag rgya dang// longs spyod bcu yis dbang

skur ba// thun mong dbang du rgyal bas gsungs// rdo rje dril bu dam rdzas dang// thod pa zhing dang stag lpags dang// ko ba me ri gshog pa dang// sbrul dang za byed phyag rgya dang// yum dang thang gshol mda' gzhu
dang// rgyan gsum bcas pa la sogs pa'i// mdzes dang sdig dang 'bar ba dang// rol pa'i rdzas kyis dbang bskur ro// bdag gzhan bya ba yongs rdzogs phyir// nyan bsgom la sogs 'chad pa dang// rdo rje

slob dpon dbang sbyin la// thun mong phyag rgya'i cho ga bstan// rang la gnas pa'i dkyil 'khor dag/ rnam pa'i tshul te mtshon te bstan// phyogs bcu dus gsum rdul snyed kyi// sangs rgyas zhing khams gzhal
yas pa// dkyil 'khor lhar ni gyur nas kyang// rol mo'i dbyangs kyis dbang bskur mdzad// gang du thabs ldan rnal 'byor la// snang srid phyi nang bcas pa kun// dbang gi rdzas su gyur nas

kyang// de yi sems la 'jug pa mdzad// me tog char dang sgra snyan dang// dri dang glu dbyangs sgrogs pa dang// gzugs dang mngon shes nyams skyes dang// de bzhin sgra dang yid 'pham dang// byin rlabs cho ga

tshang ba dang// bsnyen dang rdzas rnams tshang ba la// thob pa'i rtags rnams 'byung bar 'gyur// gang zhig dad med ma gus dang// grogs dang bla ma'i nyams len cing// gsang ba'i don la smon byed pa// bar
ma'i srid pa mi 'byung bar// rdo rje 'bar ba'i gnas su skye// dang po 'jug pa nas bzung nas// 'jigs pa lnga bral rigs nges par// dngos dang 'od kyi rnam pa bzhin// 'du 'bral med pa'i rnam par

bya'o// dang po dkyil 'khor 'jug pa dang// snang ba phyag rgyar rdzogs pa la// gtsang dang 'jigs pa spang ba'i phyir// dam rdzas byang chub sems kyis bskur// bco brgyad nyi shu lnga lon pa// mdangs dang dbang

po gsal bar 'gyur// 'jigs dang gtsang sme rnam par spangs// yid 'ong ngag snyan skyo ba med// spyod pa dal zhing bzang ba dang// khyag pa che zhing bka' blo bde// dad pas bya ba ci yang nus// bde chen gsang

ba'i spyod la dga'// gsang ba'i don mchog bsgrub pa'i phyir// thabs dang rdzas dang ting 'dzin dang// sngags kyi sbyor ba la brten te// cho ga bzhi yis dbang du bya// tha mal spyod pa spangs byas te/ khrus dang

byug pa kha spos dang// gos rgyan chags pa skyed bar byed// yid 'ong spyod dang dbyangs kyis mchod// 'du shes gsum ldan sbyor ba yis// lhar bskyed gsang gnas skye mched dag/ tha mal chags pa spang phyir
brlab// ci nas yid ni mi skyau bar// rdo rje thabs kyis nan tan bya// tha mal dmigs pa mi gnas phyir// dmigs pa gsum ldan ting 'dzin skyes// phyag rgya bzhi rol pa bya// rdo rje slob dpon bde
chen po// gtso bo 'dod chags ting 'dzin gyis// sangs rgyas rdul snyed bdag bzhugs par// gnyi gas brten par gsal bar du// dal dang bskyod dang gzung ba yis// gsal ba'i thig le nan tan bya// rdo rje

nyi zla rdul snyed grangs// he ru kas ni mngon gsal na// thabs dang shes rab gnyis med pas// rtse nas rtse ru thim pa las// gnas ngan len pa kun sbyangs nas// 'khor lo 'od kyis gang ba yi// rdo rje thig le

'od du 'bar// bcu gnyis bcu bzhi phyag rgya mo// dkar dmar phyed cing dad pa che// snying stobs dang ni chags par ldan// shes rab che zhing sbyor thabs mkhas// dal zhing bka' blo bde ba dang// dkar 'dzin
ta la'i 'bras bu 'dra// rdo rje'i mtshon gyis ma phog par// 'dod pa rang gi gnas na gnas// sngar bzhin cho gas sbyangs byas nas// tha mal bzlog dang chags pa bskyed// zas dang spyod lam

bsgyur ba dang// lhar bskyed dbang bskur sbyor ba bslab// b+ha ga'i dkyil 'khor 'jug pa dang// dam tshig lha dbog dkyil 'khor bstan// rdo rje slob ma chags pa can// rgas dang bus pa ma ning min// dbang
po dar zhing brtul zhugs can// 'dzag med rlung gi de nyid mkhas// 'khor lo pho brang gsal ba dang// chags pa bde rgyas rtags byung na// bla mas slob ma'i lag bzung la// sbyor ba'i cho gas sbyor byas

la// dga' dang bde dang chags pa dang// re dogs bcad pa'i nyams brtag cing// rdo rje'i ming dang gsang ba'i ming// bde chen lhan cig skyes pa'i ming// ming dang bral ba'i tshul gyis ni// rdo rje dbang gi cho

ga byas// dang por rigs dang lha nyid de// gnyis pa gsum pa yi ge lnga// bzhi pa dran rtog spyod yul kun// bde chen stong nyid ngang du nub// thig le nyi zla gang bzung ba// bag chags gsum dang bral ba
yis// dus gcig thig les khyab pa'i mthus// bde chen lhan cig skyes par gsal// chags pa ma yin chags bral min// dbu ma tsam du'ang ma yin te// bag chags rtog pa rnam 'jig cing// nam mkha'i
khams dang mnyam pa yi// yid ni rab tu pham mdzad nas// bde chen mi rtog 'od du 'bar// spyod yul 'dod yon dran rtog rnams// bde ba chen po'i ngang du nub// ma lus 'od gsal bde chen po// phyogs

'dzin yid kyi rtog pa spang// bde chen ye shes mngon du 'bar// phyi nang bcu drug bco brgyad ma// pad+ma 'am ut+pal kha phye 'dra// zla ba ldan zhing cha byad sgeg/ sked pa phra la sha mdangs srab// 'dod pa rgyas la

sbyor thabs mkhas// brling zhing 'jigs med dpa' bo la// cho ga'i khyad par ci 'tshams par// rgyas par legs par byas nas ni// zas dang rlung dang spyod lam gyis// bsnyen pa'i cho ga rdzogs nas ni// rdo rje

lha mo mnyam sbyar nas// gsum pa'i tshad nas mnyam sbyar zhing// rang lus 'de bas ma rgyas par// spyad dang brtag dang 'dris par bya// dang por lus kyi bde ba yis// de nas reg pa'i bde ba nyid// chu bo lta
bur gnas par bya// de nas snang ba'i bde ba yis// zag pa zad cing bar chad med// sdug bsngal bder smin 'chi ba med// 'du 'bral rlung la dbang thob cing// bde ba chen po'i ngo bor 'jug/ de nas bde ba

chen po nyid// rang gi ngo bos rtag tu stor// stong pa'i thig le g.yo ba med// bde chen thig le rgyu ba med// bde chen nus pa brtan gyi bar// rtog pa'i cho ga ma yin pas// lha mo stong dang mnyam sbyar
yang// thabs dang rlung la brten pa yis// byang chub sems ni 'pho ba med// byang chub sems spangs rnam par rgyal// lus rgud rnam shes bying gyur pas// gal te de lha'i rtags byung na// rmi lam

du'ang nan tan bya// gal te thabs dang stobs bral na// 'du byed spangs te lce yis blang// dang por rgyal rigs bram ze mo// de nas yid kyi lha mo ste// de nas ting 'dzin mngon snang yin// tha ma mi shes lha mo
lnga// chags dang mdzes par rol ba yis// nam mkha' mtha' gtugs snang ba kun// bde chen mi rtog gzugs su 'bar// dngas snyigs rgyu rkyen skye 'gag med// ji srid nam mkha'i mthas gtugs par// bde
ba chen po 'phel 'grib med// shes pa 'dus pa'i rim pa yis// bdud rtsi thig ler 'jug pa dang// re dogs bcas pa'i yid min pas// 'chi 'pho'i dus dang mtshams sbyar yin// de la gang du ci skyes

pa// ma lus sgyu mar snang na ni// sgyu ma'i ye shes bde chen te// 'di dang bar mar dbyer med pas// skye 'chi 'pho 'gyur gnas dang bral// rgyal ba'-i dkyil 'khor bkod pa la// mthong dang mos pa mchod pas
kyang// rdo rje 'dzin dang mnyam 'gyur nas// tshe 'di'i bde ba thob 'gyur na// bcug cing dbang bskur thob pa dang// bsgoms dang nyams la gnas pa dang// brtan zhing yongs su rdzogs pa nyid// dka' thub
'bad med bde ba yis// lo zla dus tshod bral ba yi// da lta nyid du bde mchog 'grub// dka' dang 'bral ba med pa ni// thun mong dngos grub smos ci dgos// bde zhing shes rab ldan pa dang// mkhas dang
longs spyod kun rdzogs kyang// dbang bskur gnang ba ma thob par// dngos grub gang yang mi 'byung ste// skye bo nyid du 'gyur phyir ro// de bas gang zag dman pa des// dbang dang man ngag bral ba
yis// gsang ba'i don la ci spyad kyang// blun pos ral gri bskor ba ltar// 'dod pa'i don dang bral nas kyang// rang nyid brlag cing 'chi bar gyur// dbang ni nus pa zhes bshad cing// nus pa rim pa gang
'phel ba// lam dang ting 'dzin khyad par te// spyod pa dag kyang shes par bya// gang la gang ni nus med na// de la de bskur nus pa med// de bas de yang nus med pas// dbang thob ma yin dman pa
yin// zhes gsungs so// dpal he ru ka 'dus pa'i rgyud las/ dbang bskur ba'i cho ga bstan pa'i le'u ste bco lnga pa'o//// de nas gsang ba'i bdag po yis// bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces

gsol to// dus gsum rgyal ba thams cad kyi// sku gsung thugs kyi ngo bo nyid// 'bar ba'i rgyal po he ru ka/ ye shes gtso la phyag 'tshal lo// 'bar ba'i sku gsung thugs bstan phyir// phyag rgya gcig pa bshad
du gsol// zhes gsol ba las bcom ldan 'das/ ye shes rngam pa'i rgyal po yis// 'di skad ces ni bka' stsal to// phyogs bcu'i rgyal ba'i ngo bo ni// ma skyes bde chen he ru ka/ gnyis
med thig le 'od gsal ba// phyag rgya gcig pa zhes bshad do// dang por dur khrod chen po ni// rab dben yid 'thad gnas chen por// snang dang mi snang bdag po la// bslang dang byin brlabs bgegs bcom
la// cho ga rgyas par brtsam par bya// bar chad kun bral bdag po'i sems// lhan cig bdag nyid gnas par bya// 'jigs dang re dogs rnam par spang// gtsang dang dad ldan dka' thub bral// brtul zhugs

che zhing sbyor ba yis// dbang dang dam tshig ldan pa dang/ khu 'phrigs chung zhing brtan pa dang// gdeng ldan bar chad bsam pa med// snying rjer ldan zhing le lo med// ting 'dzin sngags dang cho gar ldan// gang

zhig mi bstan gang zag ni// gsang chung le lo ser sna che// sgro skur grogs po'i nyams len cing// phyi nang can dang dka' thub can// gtsang sbra can dang 'dzin rtog can// sgro skur can dang brkam chags

can// 'dod chags zhe sdang gti mug dang// nga rgyal phrag dog ldan pa spang// dur khrod rdzas la brten pa yi// mchod pa lnga dang bsgrub pa'i rdzas// sha lnga bdud rtsi lnga la sogs// ban+d+ha zhing chen rkang gling

dang// nang dang gsang ba'i mchod pa dang// rmad du byung ba'i rdzas dag bsham// dus ni bkra shis 'byor pa dang// nya dang tshes brgyad la sogs la// sngon du bya ba kun rdzogs nas// sgrub pa'i bar chad bsal
bar bya// dkyil 'khor tshad dang ldan pa la// dur khrod mdzes pa'i rdzas byugs la// dmar chen chag chag btab pa la// sta gon bya ba ji bzhin brtsam// dur khrod rgyus pa kha dog bsgyur// legs par 'jur
mdud med pa yis// yab yum gnyis med las byung ba'i// byin brlabs thig ni gdab par bya// dur khrod thal ba las byung ba'i// tshon lnga ye shes lngar ldan pa'i// dur khrod dkyil 'khor 'jig par ni// lha

yi nga rgyal ldan pas bri// dbus su zla gam kha sprod bri// byang chub sems dang chags pa'i mdog/ phyi rim zla gam dmar po la// thod phreng sgo gcig ldan pa bri// phyi rol dur khrod rdzas rnams dang// rmad du byung

ba'i mchod pas brgyan// me mar dgu yis mdzes par brgyan// bkra shis zhal bu kha sbyor la// yab yum mtshan mar bcas pa gzhag/ dngos grub zhal bu rten dang bcas// bdud rtsi sha lnga dpa' bo lnga// dngos

grub yi ger bcas pa dag/ rnal 'byor skyes bu'i g.yas su gzhag/ rang rang gdan la 'khod nas ni// sngon 'gro'i cho ga rdzogs nas ni// thun mong spyod pa ring spangs la// spyod yul sgyur ba'i cho ga bya// dpa'
bo chen po'i rnal 'byor pas// ma bcos chos kyi dbyings nyid la// gnas pa med pa'i don gyis bsgom// snying rje chen po'i ting nge 'dzin// dmigs pa med pa'i gnas thob nas// sa bon snying
po 'phro 'du yis// bsreg sbyang stong par gnas pa las// rang gi rig pa rang snang ba'i// sa bon las ni 'byung lnga bsgom// ri rab steng du gzhal yas khang// dur khrod 'bar ba'i dkyil 'khor ni// zla
kham thod phreng sgo gcig bsgom// cho ga rdzogs pa'i sbyor ba las// 'bar ba'i rgyal po he ru ka/ yab yum zhal sbyar gnas bzhin bsgom// dbang dang byin rlabs snying por bcas// dur khrod rgyan chas
ldan par bya// phyogs bcu dus bzhi'i sangs rgyas kun// dur khrod dkyil 'khor lhun gyis grub// 'bar ba'i dkyil 'khor rdul snyed kyang// rig pa'i rgyal pos gzugs su 'gyur// phyag rgya bzhi yis
gnyis med par// thim par byin rlabs ldan par bsam// de nas phyag rgya cher byas la// yab yum brtan pa'i ting 'dzin bsgom// phyag 'tshal brtan bzhugs mchod pa dang// bzlas pa'i bye brag srog ldan

pas// 'od dang sgra dang dri la sogs// mtshan ma brtan po byung ba'i bar// stong tshigs mchod dang bstod pa dang// goms pa'i blo ni 'bad par bya// de nas dkyil 'khor zhal bsgyur nas// dang por bar chad
bzlog pa dang// dkyil 'khor bskyed dang dbab bstim dang// mchod bstod bzlas shing dngos grub gsol// slob ma 'jug dang dbang bskur dang// sgrub pa'i gnang ba sbyin par bya// de nas ci la'ang thogs

pa med// dkyil 'khor rgyas dang bsdus pa dang// dkyil 'khor kun gyi snying po'o// dngos grub bcud bsdus 'bru brgyad de// de las gzhan pa'i snying po med// de bas bzlas pa'i snying po sbyin// oM ru lu ru lu

hU~M b+h+yo hU~M/ oM ni rgyal ba yab yum bcu// ru lu gong ma khro mo brgyad// ru lu 'og ma phra men brgyad// hU~M ni phyag rgya sgo ma bzhi// b+h+yo ni bran mo nyi shu brgyad// hU~M ni byang chub sems kyi ngang// 'bar ba'i dkyil 'khor
ma lus pa'i// bzlas pa'i mchog ni 'di las med// dang por 'dun pas bag chags sbyang// gnyis su dga' bas snod du rung// gsum pa dbang gi dngos grub rlab// tha ma 'grub par dngos grub
blang// gnas gsum 'phro 'du 'od phreng gis// phyi nang bdag gzhan bag chags sbyang// ma lus bdag nyid snod du rung// ma lus sku gsung thugs nyid ni// bdag gam dngos grub rdzas la dbab// de yang phyag

rgya bzhi nyid kyis// bdag gis bsdus mchod rol par bya// sku ni 'ja' tshon chu zla bzhin// gsung ni sgra brnyan brag cha ste// thugs ni sprin med nam mkha' bzhin// 'di ni spros bcas man ngag yin// 'bar
ba'i rgyal po he ru ka/ khams gsum rgyu ba zil gyis gnan// 'dod chags dbang mo man ngag gis// bde chen skyon dang bral bar bya// gnyis med nyi zla kha sbyor gyis// sa gsum sku gsum dus
gcig gnon// yab yum gnyis med rang bzhin gyis// brtag pa rnam pa gsum du gsungs// dang po gnyis pa gsum pa ni// pho mo lha dang lha mor ni// rig pa stong pa'i rang bzhin gyis// yab yum chags dang
mdzes pa yis// brtag dang goms pa'i stobs las byung// rigs pa'i dkyil 'khor 'od 'dus pas// thig le 'od kyi gong bur gsal// de las rang gi lhar bskyed cing// spyan drang mchod pa rgyun du bya// rang

nyid brtan par ma gyur pas// dges shing tha mal spyod pas min// tshogs kyi yo byad 'di dag ni// dang por lha la mchod pa ste// bar pa rnal 'byor mnyes byas nas// tha mas lhag ma'i mchod pa nyid// dang
por rang rang bskyed pa dang// gnyis pas gdan steng gnas nas dgug/ gsum pa zil mnan dam tshig bsre// bzhi pa rang sngags rdzas kyis mchod// lnga pa dam bdar phrin las bcol// drug pa kha chus dbang

du bran// bdun pa dang por sbyin bsreg bya// brgyad pas gter sba rgya yis gdab// tha ma za lam bstan nas kyang// ma lus khyab pa'i tshul du bsngo// dkyil 'khor bsdu zhing spyod lam bya'o// 'gro la sbyin gtang
bla ma la// 'khor gsum yongs dag mchod par 'bul// 'di ltar bsgrubs shing bsgom pas na// nyi zla 'od la 'dug nas kyang// lus la cho 'phrul bzhis bstan nas// sgra dang 'od kyis gang byas nas// ma
lus spro ba bskyed byas nas// yang dag bsgrub pa'i zhing khams su// re dogs med par sangs rgyas so// zhes gsungs so// dpal he ru ka 'dus pa'i rgyud chen po las/ dpal he ru ka yab yum sgrub pa'i le'u
ste bcu drug pa'o//// de nas yang gsang ba'i bdag pos/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas thams cad kyi// rang byung 'bar ba'i rgyal po khyod// dur khrod 'bar
ba'i dkyil 'khor rnams// bdag la legs par bshad du gsol// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi ngo bo dpal ye shes rngam pa'i rgyal pos 'di skad ces gsungs so// dur khrod chen por rab

dben pas// skye bo 'dus dang rnam bral zhing// skyon bral yon tan kun rdzogs pa'i// bdag dbang bar chad med pa'i sar// sngon bya'i cho ga rdzogs pa dang// sa ni dag par gzung bya ste// dkyil 'khor tshad

dang ldan par bya// mthu chen rgyal po sde bzhi la// bar chad bsal ba'i las bcol nas// phyogs bcu khro bo'i byin rlabs kyis// phyogs skyong so sor gzir nas kyang// gnas kyi srung mar bsgo ba dang// rang
rang 'khor du gtogs pa rnams// bskrad cing bar chad bsal bar bya// de nas phyag rgya chen po yis// maN+Dal nag po gru gsum du// bar chad dam sri gnan bya ste// bag yangs bde ba'i nan tan
bya// dur khrod chen po'i bdag po dag/ bskyed cing zil gyis gnan byas te// gnas kyi srung mar bkol ba dang// dur khrod gzhal yas khang du brlab// dkyil 'khor dur khrod chen po yi// bdud rtsi lnga yis

skyang nul bya// dbang gi rak+ta pho brang du// dur khrod thig skud gsum bsgril gyis// byin brlab mkha' gsang sbyor ba yis// byang chub sems su byin gyis brlab// dpal ldan rngam pa'i rgyal po dang// gzungs ma
'dod pa'i dbang mo yis// byin rlabs ldan pa'i thig btab pas// pho brang so sor bgo bar bya// dur khrod bdud rtsi lnga yi tshon// sngags mchog dkyil 'khor 'jigs pa bri// dkyil 'khor zla kham 'dra ba
la// thig bzhi btab pas le tshe dgu// dbus su zla kham kha sprod la// dpal chen yab yum bcas pa dgod// phyogs bzhi mtshams brgyad zla kham brgyad// nang du kha bltas me ri can// 'jigs pa'i dkyil
'khor bri bar bya// dur khrod chen po'i rta babs can// sna tshogs dur khrod rgyan bcas pa// rnal 'byor mnyam par gzhag pas bri// go'u ri ma sogs dpal 'bar ma// so so'i mtshan mas dgram par bya// dur
khrod rgyan cha rdzogs par dgram// dpal gyi snang ba chen po dgu// dur khrod rdzas la byas pa gzhag/ gal te mi gsal bar chad ni// bgegs bskrad bshags la gral du dgod// gzhan yang mchod dang dngos
grub rdzas// so sor 'tshams par ci rigs gzhag/ rnal 'byor rgyan chas gral du 'khod// rang rang gsal ba'i ting 'dzin gyis// dur khrod bgegs ni kun bsal nas// rgyal rigs rje'u yid 'ong ba'i// rmad

byung bam chen ro blangs te// bkra shis rdzas kyis lus byugs nas// dkyil 'khor chen po'i phyogs bzhi ru// rol pa'i bro yis sbyang bar bya// bkra shis rdzas su byin brlabs nas// phyag rgya lnga yis spros byas
nas// dkyil 'khor so sor ci rigs par// rang rang phyag rgya bskos su gdab// 'di dag yang dag sgrub pa'i rdzas// mchog dang thun mong brten pa'i gzhi// dur khrod chen po'i dkyil 'khor 'dir// skal ldan
'dus pa kun tshogs nas// brtul zhugs rol pas su 'jug pa// dngos grub mchog la sbyor bar nges// brda dang gnang ba'i dbang thob nas// gtso bo yab yum bskyed pa dang// byin rlabs cho 'phrul kun
rdzogs nas/ khro bo brgyad po ji bzhin bskyed// ye shes dam tshig la thim nas// gzi byin bskyed dang brtan par bzhugs// mchod pa phyi nang gsang ba dang// rab tu mnyes par bstod par bya// gsang chen
'bar ba'i yig 'bru brgyad// rtsa ba'i dkyil 'khor rab rdzogs pa// bar chad med pa'i brtson 'grus kyis// mtshan ma thob pa'i bar du bzlas// dus drug tshogs kyi mchod pa dang// dus bzhir
bar chad bsal ba dang// stong tshig mchod bstod bzlas pa ni// bar chad med pa chu bo bzhin// gzugs dang sgra dang dri dang ro// rnal 'byor yum dang mched lcam la// gsang ba'i dngos grub mtshan thob
nas// rdzas la brten te dngos grub blang// snga ma las ni gnas bsgyur te// rang rang cho ga ji bzhin sbyar// mchod bstod ji bzhin rab rdzogs nas// dngos grub bdag la bsdu bar bya// dang por bag chags
sbyangs byas te// gnyis pas rgyal ba'i sras su bya// gsum pa dngos grub rdzas la gdab// bzhi pas dngos grub blang bar bya// dkyil 'khor chen por 'jug pa dang// dbang bskur cho ga'i rim pa bzhin// de

nas dngos grub rim pas blang// lhag ma'i cho ga rim pa dang// mtshams kyi rim pa dgrol bar bya// zhes gsungs so// dpal he ru ka 'dus pa'i rgyud chen po las/ zla gam dgu pa'i sgrub lugs kyi le'u ste bcu
bdun pa'o//// de nas bcom ldan 'das dpal ye shes rngam pa'i rgyal pos/ dur khrod chen po bsgrub pa'i/ dkyil 'khor zla gam bco brgyad pa 'di gsungs so// 'bar ba'i rgyal po bsgrub 'dod
pas// ri bo nag 'dabs chu gling dang// dur khrod gsang phug nyams dga' bar// phun sum tshogs pa bzhir ldan nas// re dang dogs pa'i sems spangs la// ji ltar dga' bde ldan pas bsgrub// sngon du

dbang rnams thob pa dang// dam tshig snying rjer ldan pa yis// ngan pa'i sa rnams dag byas la// dur khrod sar ni byin gyis brlab// de nas sa gzhi cha mnyam la// rmad byung gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor bya// bdud

rtsi lnga dang rak+tar bcas// dbang gi dkyil 'khor byug par bya// de nas dur khrod srad bu yis// bdud rtsi dang ni tshon bsres pa'i// byin brlabs ldan pa'i thig gdab cing// rang rang pho brang bgo bar bya// dur
khrod 'bar ba'i dkyil 'khor du// gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor thig 'debs shing// yang dag gsang ba'i don bsgrub kyis// dpal chen 'khaur tshogs gshegs su gsol// dpal chen 'khor tshogs gshegs
nas kyang// dur khrod rdzas la byin brlab cing// bdag la dngos grub stsal du gsol// 'khor lo rtsibs brgyad 'bar ba la// rtsibs mchan thod pa'i mu khyud la// 'jigs shing gsal ba'i me ri
'phro// 'jigs shing ya mtshan skye ba'i gnas// dbus su zla gam dkar dmar gnyis/ kha sprod dpal gyi mtshan mar gzhag/ zla gam nang du kha bltas brgyad// 'khor lo'i rtsibs la bri bar bya// rtsibs mchan
nang du zla gam brgyad// kun kyang dbang dang chags pa'i phyir/ kha dog dmar po bri bar bya// dur khrod ka pa gdung dag dang// thod phreng sbrul dang nyi zlas brgyan// 'bar ba'i rgyan cha sna tshogs

brgyan// dur khrod mchod pa sna tshogs dang// zhal bu bdud rtsi rak+ta dang// dpal gyi zhal zas longs spyod rgyan// dngos grub rten du bcas pa gzhag/ dpal gyi ban d+ha snying po can// thabs dang shes rab ldan
par dgod// rig ma bcu drug mtshan ma ni// rigs bzang tshul du mtshan ldan la// gsal ba'i rtags gsum bcangs pa'am// yang na dur khrod rdzas su dgod// rol mo hasta'i g.yab mor bcas// ji bzhin pa
yi gnas su gzhag/ gzi brjid me mar snang ba dgu// ye shes dgu yi rtags su gzhag/ rdo rje slob dpon 'brel bcas pas// rang rang mtshan ma'i gral bkod de// ltag pa'i rtags dang rgyan ldan pas// ma
dag pa mi mtshams gcad cing// dag pa thams cad byin gyis brlab// gsang bar gsang ba'i dbang thob nas// rang rang gsang ba'i las la 'jug/ sku gsum sa la goms bya'i phyir// ting 'dzin gsum

po tshul bzhin bsgom// brten pa 'byung ba'i rim stengs su// ban d+ha dbang po dang ldan pa'-i// rlon rtsig rang gi dbyibs bzhin du// pho brang nyams dga' gdan bcas bsgom// cho ga gsum gyis skur bskyed
nas// yan lag rdzogs par nan tan bya// 'khor gyi lha mo bcu drug ni// rang rang gdan dang phyag mtshan dang// sku mdog bzhugs tshul mtshan ma dag/ ji ltar rigs par sras bskyed la// yan lag lha dang
bcas pa dag/ rang rang gnas su dgod par bya// ye shes dkyil 'khor spyan drangs te// dam tshig mchod la thim par bya/ de nas cho ga'i go rim dag/ mchod bstod mnyes pa'i don du bya// dngos grub 'byung

ba'i snying po ni// 'bru brgyad gsang ba'i dbyangs dang bcas// gsal ba'i tshad dang ldan pa yis// dga' dang brod pa'i tshul gyis bzlas// skul tshig dbyangs dang mchod pa byas// mtshan ma brtan po byung ba
