dang// 'dod pa'i don ni ma rdzogs bar// spyan drangs gshegs su gsol ba min// dur khrod chen po'i dkyil 'khor 'dir// gsang ba'i rdzas la rten bcas nas// dngos grub mtshan ma 'di bsgrub pas/

bdag la dngos grub stsol ba dang// dur khrod brgyad kyi mkha' 'gro yis// dngos grub rgya chen stsol ba dang// 'dod pa'i don rdzogs dngos grub mdzod// 'bru brgyad rtsa ba'i dngos grub stsol// bar chad bsal
nas nyams brtag la// bsnyen nas bsgrub pa las bsgyur te// zhing khams rdul dang mnyam pa yi// 'bar ba'i byin rlabs 'od bsdus pas// ma lus khyab pa'i char phab pa// dngos grub rdzas la dbab par
bya// dbang bskur 'jug dang dam tshig dbog/ dngos grub 'dod par gsol ba gdab// dang por dpal gyi longs spyod de// gnyis pa slob dpon nyid du bshad// gsum pa rnal 'byor pho mo

ste// blangs te thogs pa med par spyad// lhag ma'i las kyi cho ga dag/ dang por sbyin bsreg cho ga bya// bar ma mi zad gter du sba// tha ma mkha' 'gro yongs la btang// las kyi lhag ma bsdu byas la// slob
dpon mnyes pa'i cho ga bya// thabs dang ldan pa'i rnal 'byor gyis// 'di ltar bar chad med bsgrubs na// cho 'phrul bzhi dang ldan pa yis// yang dag bsgrub pa'i dngos grub 'thob// ces gsungs so// dpal
he ru ka 'dus pa'i rgyud chen po las zla gam bco brgyad pa sgrub pa'i le'u ste bco brgyad pa'o//// de nas bcom ldan 'das rngam pa'i rgyal po des/ dur khrod chen po'i dkyil 'khor zla gam drug cu rtsa

brgyad pa'i cho ga 'di gsungs so// dang pos dbang thob byin ldan pa'i// las dang bya ba mkhas pa dang// bar chad 'jigs bral sgrub pa pos// ri rtse dgon pa dur khrod dang// rab tu dben pa'i sa phyogs su/

sa gzhi legs par brtag pa dang// bslang dang sbyang dang byin brlab pa// cho ga bzhin du byas nas ni// dkyil 'khor tshad dang ldan par bya// dam rdzas bdud rtsi byugs byas nas// dur khrod srad bu tshad ldan

pas// dam rdzas rmad byung 'bar ba'i tshogs// byin rlabs ldan pas thig gdab la// pho brang rmad byung so sor bgo/ pho brang zlum po le tshe dgu// thod pa'i ra bas yang dag bskor// phyi rim 'khor lo rtsibs

brgyad ldan// rtsibs mchan thod pa'i ra bas bskor// 'bar ba'i sgo bzhis rnam par brgyan// phyi rim thod skam gzhal yas khang// ma mo'i gnas su ldan pa de// de yi sgo dang ldan par bya// phyi rim rdo rje me ri
phreng// bar mtshams med par bskor bar bya// dbus su zla gam zhal sbyor la// dpal gyi mtshan mar bcas pa bri// phyogs bzhir zla gam kha sprod bri// rigs bzhi khrag 'thung thugs mtshan dgod// phyi rim

'khor lo rtsibs brgyad la// zla gam nang du kha bltas brgyad// ma mo brgyad kyi mtshan ma gzhag/ rtsibs mchan brgyad la phyir blta brgyad// phra men brgyad kyi mtshan mar gzhag/ sgo bzhir phyir blta'i zla gam

la// sgo bzhi'i mtshan ma gzhag par bya// phyi rim phyir blta nyi shu brgyad// dbang phyug sgal tshigs bcas par dgod// phyi rim bskal pa'i me ri la// zla gam phyir blta bcu po la/ khro bo bcu yi mtshan ma
gdab// dur khrod dkyil 'khor chen po ste// 'bar ma chen po bzhugs pa'i gnas// mkha' 'gro sprin phung 'du ba'i rten// 'jigs pa'i rgyan chas gtibs pa yi// pho brang lhun rdzogs ka pA la// dbang po lnga
ldan 'phrul gyi rdzas// cho 'phrul sna tshogs bsgrub pa'i rten// cho 'phrul mkha' la sbyor ba'i skyogs// thod pa gsum du snang ba ni// dus gsum bzhugs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams// sku gsum lhun
gyis grub pa'i rtags// dur khrod rgyan chas rdzogs pas dgod// rmad byung gtor ma mchod par bcas// dngos grub rdzas su bcas par dgram// rdo rje rnal 'byor 'dus pa yis// ma lus dag par byin brlabs

la// rtags dang rgyan chas mdzes par bya// dang po de bzhin nyid bsgoms la// de nas mtshams sbyor ting 'dzin bsgom// rgyu las 'bras bur rang snang bas// dbang chen 'byung lnga rim par brtseg/ dur khrod

dkyil 'khor bsgrub par bya// rang gi dbyings kyi gdan stengs su// rang rang lha yi cha byad bzhin// dang por gtso bo bskyed par bya// de nas de la 'khor gyi tshogs// drug cu rtsa drug bskyed par bya// yan lag

snying po gsal rdzogs nas// ye shes spyan drang bstim byas la// mchod bstod mnyes pa'i cho ga bya// ye shes snying po 'bru brgyad po// ye shes byin rlabs 'od zer ltar// dbang dang byin rlabs thob byas
nas// dngos grub rang gi gnas su bstim// rtags dang mtshan ma dbang thob nas// snga ma las ni tshul bsgyur nas// rang gi cho ga rdzogs pa na// dngos grub 'dod par gsol gdab cing// gsang ba'i mchod

pa rdzogs pa dang// dur khrod 'bar ba'i dkyil 'khor du// 'dug cing dam phog dbang bskur la// dngos grub rim pa blang bar bya// lhag ma'i cho ga ji snyed pa// rang gi las dang mthun par bya// zhes gsungs
so// dpal he ru ka 'dus pa'i rgyud las/ zla gam drug cu rtsa brgyad pa'i sgrub lugs te le'u bcu dgu pa'o//// de nas yang gsang ba'i bdag pos/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol
to// dus gsum sangs rgyas thams cad kyi// sku gsung thugs kyi rang bzhin gyis// 'khor ba'i dur khrod sgrol ba'i bdag/ rU tra bsgral ba'i phung po nyid// dkyil 'khor chen po mdzad du gsol// zhes gsol
pa las/ bcom ldan 'das dpal ye shes rngam pa'i rgyal pos/ 'di skad ces gsungs so// chos rnams yul sems gnyis med la// bdag dang bdag gir 'dzin pa yis// rU tra gsum gyis ngo bor

brtags// de nyid ma skyes rtogs pas bsgral// dur khrod phug dang ma mo'i khyim// shes dang byin brlabs bkra shis pa// skye bo 'du 'dzi med pa yi// bar chad med pa'i sa phyogs su// rtsod pa zhi dang bkra shis

phyir// sa yi cho ga kun byas la// byin brlab bskrad pa rgya cher bya// phun sum tshogs pa kun 'dus pa// tshogs bsag gtong dang sbyin byas la// bsam ngan bar chad bsal byas te// phyi rol bya ba'i cha rdzogs
rU tra ha ha pra be sha phaT/ ha na ha na hU~M phaT/ ma rig mun pa'i sgo phye nas// rnam shes thugs su gsal bstims te/ khog pa dur khod gzhal yas khang// rang dang mthun par byin gyis brlab// dzaHhUM

baM hoH shrI he ru ka/ ma hA ma traM ka ru tra ha ha pra be sha phaT/ de steng zla gam dmar po'i dkyil// ma traM rU tra'i khog pa nyid// mgo bo lho nub mtshams su bstan// rkang pa byang shar thug pa med// snying gar gru gsum

rim gsum la// phyi rol gru bzhi mkhyid gang bya// steng du mthing nag sor bzhi'i tshad// de yi steng du sor bzhi'i tshad// de yi steng du zla gam dmar// sor gsum tshad du legs par bya// rkang lag bzhi dang lte

gsang dang// mkhal ma gnyis te gnas brgyad du// dkyil 'khor mtho gang sor bzhi brgyad// zla gam phyi rim me ri klong// b+han d+ha dbang po lnga ldan la// yab yum snying po yang dag gzhag/ mthing nag gru

gsum bskal pa'i me// dmar po tha ma gru bzhi la// b+han+d+ha rigs bzhi snying por bcas// phyogs bzhir rim par dgram par bya// yan lag brgyad kyi dkyil 'khor la// tshal bu khro mo'i snying po brgyad// lag pa
g.yas g.yon rkang pa gnyis// mgo dang mkhal ma g.yas g.yon gnyis// gsang ba gau ri nas brtsams nas// gtum mo rab tu dgod par bya// dpung ba gnyis dang gung mo gnyis// brla gnyis pus mo gnyis

dag la// seng ge stag dang bya rgod dang// kang ka wa spyang 'ug pa dang// bya rog 'thab pa'i tshul du gnas// sha khrag mig dang rna ba dang// rkang dang tshil bu srog rtsa dang// klad pa brgyad kyi rdzas su dgod// sgo
bzhi yan lag mtshan ma ste// phyi rim zla gam sgal tshigs gang// dbang phyug ma yi mtshan mar dgod// dgos pa'i yo byad kun bkram nas// bar chad bsal zhing byin brlabs te// dag pa gsum gyis byin
brlabs nas// b+h+rUM las khog pa gzhal yas khang// dur khrod rgyan dang ldan pa yi// dbang drag gzhal yas me 'bar la// lha dang bcas pa kun bskyed la// dgug dang bstim mchod bzlas rdzogs nas// mchod
bstod dngos grub gsol ba gdab// dus dang mtshan mar byung bar du// mkhas pas rtag tu brtson par bya// dur khrod rdzas la rten bcas nas// 'khor ba yongs sgrol dkyil 'khor du// 'jug dang dam tshig
phog pa la// dur khrod mtshan mas dbang bskur la// sbyin bsreg mnyes pa'i las byas la// lhag mas mkha' 'gro mnyes byas la// cha gsum rim pas bgos nas ni// rdzogs nas ci rigs las la
dbab// ces gsungs so// dpal he ru ka 'dus pa'i rgyud las/ ma trang gnan pa sgrub pa'i le'u ste nyi shu pa'o//// de nas yang gsang ba'i bdag pos/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol
to// dus gsum sangs rgyas thams cad kyi// gsang ba'i 'khor lo gter gyi bdag/ byin rlabs rmad byung gsang ba'i thugs// dug gsum sku gsung thugs sbyor ba'i// sgrub pa'i lam mchog dam
pa dag/ bdag la rgya cher bshad du gsol// zhes gsungs pa las// bcom ldan 'das ye shes rngam pa'i rgyal pos 'di skad ces gsungs so// dad dang dam tshig dbang thob cing// brtul zhugs ldan pa'i rnal

'byor pas// ban d+ha dbang po lnga ldan dang// tshal bu rang rang snying po can// rim pa bzhin du dgod par bya// 'jigs pa'i rdzas dang snang ba'i me// dngos grub mchod pa'i rdzas dag dgram// yid 'ong 'dus
dang rnam bral zhing// rab dben bar chad kun bral la// brtag cing blang bzung bstan pa ste// byin gyis brlab par brtsam par bya// dkyil 'khor thig gdab byin brlabs shing// yid 'ong mtshan ldan rig ma

yis// dur khrod rmad byung gsang ba'i thig/ gsal la 'brus pa med par gdab// stegs bu gru bzhi tshad ldan la// rmad byung rdzas kyis go ma bya// dur khrod rdzas kyis byug byas la// dur khrod chen por byin gyis

brlab// dur khrod rdzas kyi tshon lnga yis// he ru ka yi don mtshon phyir// thod pa'i mtshan mas gsal byas pa'i// dur khrod dkyil 'khor 'jigs pa bri// tha ma zla gam dmar po ni// gru bzhi'i steng du mdzub gang

'phar// de yi steng ma gru gsum ni// sor bzhi'i 'phang dang ldan par bya// dur khrod sol bas byug par bya// dang po der steng dmar nag ni// zla gam 'phang du sor gsum tshad// tshil dang sha khrag gsur chen

dang// rgyan chas gsol zhing gdan bsgaums nas// dmar dang ban d+ha'i bzed phor dgram// thun mong bya ba kun rdzogs nas// chos skyong rgyal po sde bzhi la// bar chad bsal bar mnga' gsol te/ khro bo mang
po phyogs bcur dgram// 'byung po rU tra tshar bcad nas// rgyan chas gsol shing gdan bkod nas// byin brlab bar chad bsrung ba'i phyir// rdo rje mtshon chas gtibs nas ni// gsang ba'i brda' yis kun

mtshan nas// ji ltar rigs pas nan tan bya// gtso bo'i snying po ldan pa'i mtshan// yang rtog zla gam steng du gsol// tshal bu snying por bcas pa ni// tha mar rim bzhin dgod par bya// tha ma dmar po sgo bzhir

ldan// sgo bzhi'i rjes su dgod par bya// phyi rol bskal pa'i me ri la/ khro bo bcu yi mtshan ma dgod// zhi ba las ni gnas bsgyur te// dag pa gsum po goms pa yis// 'byung ba lnga yi rim pa las// dur khrod
'jigs pa'i gzhal yas khang// ji ltar bsgyur ba bzhin du bsgoms// lha dgu gsal nas bzhi dgod de// hUM las pho mo tshang bar bsam// mtha' thug med pa'i sangs rgyas rnams// 'jigs byed ngo bor byon
nas ni// dur khrod 'bar ba'i dkyil 'khor 'dir// phyag rgya sngags kyis bkug bstims te// bzhugs dang brtan dang mi g.yo dang// zil mnan mnyes pa'i las byas te// bzlas dang mchod
bstod bsnyen pa dang// mtshan ma thob kyi bar du bya// nyams dag rtags dang mngon sum du// yid ches mdzes pa'i rtags thob nas// bar gcod nyes pa kun bsal te// dur khraud gsal ba'i dkyil 'khor
du// rmad byung rdzas la rten bcas nas// 'khor ba'i dur khrod gzhom pa'i phyir// 'jigs byed 'bar ba'i dkyil 'khor la// dga' dgu rang pa'i bsam pa yis// rtse gcig bsam pas gsol 'debs
nas// 'khor dang bcas pa gshegs nas kyang// ya mtshan rmad kyi dngos grub stsol// dad pas 'jug dang dbang bskur dang// bla ma mnyes par byas nas ni// 'jigs pa kun las thar ba yis// lhag ma'i
las rnams kun rdzogs nas// las kyi mtha' rnams bsdu bar bya// bsrung dang rgyun gyi ting 'dzin dang// ji ltar rigs pas nan tan bya// zhes gsungs so// dpal he ru ka 'dus pa'i rgyud chen po las/ dug
gsum sku gsung thugs su bsgral ba'i le'u ste nyi shu gcig pa'o//// de nas gsang ba'i bdag pos// bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// dus gsum sangs rgyas thams cad kyi// rang
byung bdud rtsi'i ngo bo khyod// ma lus nad sel thugs rje yi// bdud rtsi'i cho ga bshad du gsol// zhes gsol pa las// de nas bcom ldan 'das dpa' ye shes rngam pa'i rgyal pos// 'di skad ces gsungs

so// snang srid ma lus bdud rtsi lnga// thig le rang byung bcom ldan 'das// ma bcos thabs kyis de bsgrub na// 'chi med bdud rtsi rmad byung 'grub// gzhan yang mtshan mas bsgrub bya na// gangs phug sman
ljongs nags 'dabs sam// chu klung rgya mtsho'i ngo la sogs// dgon par bar chad med par ru// phun sum tshogs pa kun ldan nas// 'byor dang dus tshigs bzang po la// bkra shis kun nas ci 'tshams

pa// bdag gzhan don phyir bsgrub par bya// sa gzhi brtag dang bslang ba dang// sbyang dang bar chad bsal byas nas// rang gi dkyil 'khor tshad bzhin brtsig/ bdud rtsi lnga yis byug par bya// phyi nang bar gyi

bgegs bsal nas// bskang gso tshogs rnams bsag par bya// rdo rje'i byin rlabs las byung ba// so sor cha las byung ba ltar// rdo rje dbyings kyi dkyil 'khor nyid// rdo rje'i pho brang gdab par bya// dkyil

'khor thig bzhi le tse dgu/ khyams dang sgor bcas bri bar bya// bzhi bcu rtsa gnyis kun bkod la// so sor rgyan dang rol mo dag/ phyogs cha kun nas brgyan par bya// dri chen rtsa ba yan lag bcas// ji snyed

dbus kyi ban d+ha ste// bskyed dang byin brlab 'phro 'du las// rnam par snang mdzad ngo bor gyur// byang chub sems kyi ngo bo ni// rtsa ba yan lag mi spyod pa// 'phro 'du byin brlab bcas pa nyid// rdo

rje'i rigs su lhun gyis grub// mAM sa rtsa ba yan lag bcas// lho yi ban d+ha rgyas ma ru// 'phro 'du byin brlab bcas pa yis// 'byung ldan ngo bor lhun gyis grub// rA ga rak+ta chags pa dngos// rtsa ba yan lag

bcas pa nyid// byin brlab 'phro 'dur bcas pa yi// snang ba mtha' yas ngo bor zhu// dri chu rtsa ba yan lag bcas// byang gi b+han d+ha rgya gram du// 'phro 'du byin brlab bcas pa nyid// don yod grub pa'i ngo bor
zhu// 'di dag so sor dgod par bya// rgyan chas dbang bcas gral bkod de// dkyil 'khor gzhal yas gdan dang bcas// sangs rgyas dkyil 'khor yab yum gnyis// bskyed cing byin brlab dbang bskur
bya// gnyis med gsal bstim mchod byas te// byin brlab sman gyi lha mo sbran// bar gcod bsal ba rgyun tu bya// de nas 'bar ba'i dkyil 'khor du// ji bzhin 'bar ba rgyan dang bcas// skad cig gsal
bskyed spyan drang bstim// phyi nang gsang bas mngon mchod de// rang rang gsal ba'i srog ldan bzlas// bar chad med par brtson par bya// 'di ni khrol bu bsgrub par bshad// de nas gzhan yang bshad par

bya// thig dang tshon sna byin brlabs la// 'khor lo rtsibs brgyad dkyil 'khor bya// so so rtsa ba yan lag bcas// phye ma'i rigs lngar phye bkod la// rdzas dang yo byad rgyan rnams dang// rim pa bzhin du rnam

par bkod// ma bcos chos dbyings rang bzhin la// snying rje nam mkha'i rang bzhin shar// rgyu las rten byas gzhal yas khang// rigs lnga yab yum rgyan dang bcas// bdud rtsi nyid la bskyed byas te// ye shes
dbab bstim mchod byas nas// mtshan ma thob par bzlas par bya// stong tshig bar chad bsal ba dang// lha mo sbran dang byin rlabs dbab// rol mo dang ni g.yab mo dang// dbyangs snyan bcas par lha mo

rten// lha mo mdzes pa'i b+ha ga ru// rdo rje thabs kyi tho ba yis// rtsa ba yan lag bcas brdung ba// phye ma gnas lngar bkod pa ste// byin brlab sngags dang phyag rgya dang// ting 'dzin bdud rtsi lnga ru zhu// de nas

legs par bsdu bar bya// 'di ni phye ma'i sgrub thabs so// de nas bum pa'i sgrub pa ni// snga ma'i dkyil 'khor gnas bsgyur te// dkyil 'khor pad+ma 'dab brgyad la// ge sar snying po bcas pa bris// phye ma kun
bsdus bum par stsal// cod pan rgya dang gzungs thag gdags// dang por btag btsag gzhal bar bya// tshad dang ldan pa'i bdud rtsi ni// bdud rtsi 'khyil bar mnga' gsol la// byin brlabs dbang skur
dbus su gzhug/ ta kr-ita brgyad dang he ru ka/ sum rtsegs 'bar ba'i dkyil 'khor bskyed// dbang bskur byin brlab gnyis med stim// mchod bstod bdud rtsi'i srung ma sbran// rang rang bdud
rtsi'i bzlas par bya// rtse gcig ting 'dzin bar chad med// dgu pa'i phyag rgya gnan zhing bzlas// mthun pa'i rtags ni byung bar du// mchod bstod las bcol srung ma bod// bar chad bsal ba rgyun mi

bcad// rtags kyang rnam pa bdun gyis te// 'od dang du ba sgra dang dri// lha mos lung bstan 'byung ba dang// mang du 'phel na bsgrub rdzas yin// ru lu gar gyi bro brdungs pas// dngos grub rang gi gzhung dang

sbyar/ 'jug dang bdud rtsis dbang bskur zhing// dngos grub gsol gdab cho ga bya// rdo rje bla ma yum bcas pas// byang chub sems kyi dbang bskur te// bsrung dang bla mas gnang byin la// bla ma la ni bsnyen
bkur bya// zhes gsungs so// dpal he ru ka 'dus pa'i rgyud las/ bdud rtsi sgrub pa'i le'u ste nyi shu rtsa gnyis pa'o//// de nas yang gsang ba'i bdag po des/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces
gsol to// dus gsum sangs rgyas thams cad kyi// 'chi med rdo rje tshe yi bdag/ rnal 'byor bar chad bsal ba'i phyir// rdo rje tshe mchog bshad du gsol// zhes gsol ba las/ bcom ldan 'das dpal ye

shes rngam pa'i rgyal pos 'di skad ces gsungs so// gangs ri 'am ri rtse brag 'dabs su// rnal 'byor bar chad bsal ba'i phyir// tshe yi sgrub pa bshad par bya// maN+Dal gru bzhi 'dom gang ba// bdud rtsi lnga dang
dris phyugs la// pad+ma 'dab brgyad dmar po la// rdo rje'i ra bas bskor ba bri// dbus su shel gyi bum pa ru// dmar ser ba yi 'o ma dang// cong zhi dkar po rnam gsum dang// dkar gsum mngar gsum 'chi
med sman// byang chub sems su bcas pa gzhag/ rdo rje bdud rtsi zhal zas dang// dbang gi mtshan ma btab pa gzhag/ 'phrul zhal btung ba bcud dang bcas// bdud rtsi lnga dang bcas pa dgod// dbus su tshe
dpag med pa yi// thabs dang shes rab 'khril bar bsgom// 'khor ni lha mo tshe 'dzin brgyad// dkar mo mdangs gsal 'od 'phro ma// dgug pa 'phel ma rgyas 'debs ma// mdzes ma byin byed ma rnams

kyang// pad+ma brgyad la rim pa bzhin// kun kyang sku mdog shel mdog ste// phyag na bdud rtsi'i bum pa bsnams// tshe 'phel la sogs brtson par bsgom// spyan drang bstim mchod bzlas pa dag/ bar chad med

par brtsam par bya// oM A ro li ka pAM rA ga ra ti// badzra a b+hi Shiny+tsa hUM pra be sha ya phaT/ A be sha ya phaT a/ sarba ta thA ga ta a d+hi tiSh+Tha swA hA/ badzra rak+Sha hUM hUM b+hUM baM/ 'phro 'du 'od kyis bkug byas nas// ma lus
bum pa'i bcud la bsdu// de yang rim nas rim bsdus te// 'od dpag med pa'i thugs kar bstim// dang po gnas nas dgug pa ste// de nas snying gar dril ba ste// gsum pa gzugs la bstim

par bya// bzhi pas brtan par bya ba ste// tha mas bsrung bar bya ba nyid// gal te dbang du ma gyur na// tshe dpag med kyang khro bo ste// dmar nag khros pa 'jigs tshul can// thabs dang shes rab 'brel bar

bsgom// 'khor yang khro mo brgyad du ste// byang chub sems kyis bkang ba yi// b+han d+ha thogs pa'i 'phro 'du yis// ma lus gang bar spros pa yi// tshangs dang lha dbang brgya byin dang// rgyal chen tshe bdag phyogs

skyong bcas// tshe dang gzi brjid phrogs nas bstim// rdzas rnams dngos grub blang byas la// bdag nyid sku gsung thugs la bstim// las kyi lhag ma'i cho ga rnams// ci rigs su ni sbyin par bya// dpal he ru
ka 'dus pa'i rgyud chen po las/ rdo rje tshe sgrub pa'i le'u ste nyi shu rtsa gsum pa'o//// de nas gsang ba'i bdag pos/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// dus gsum sangs rgyas thams cad
kyi// phrin las 'jigs mdzad he ru ka/ gdug pa 'dul la phyag 'tshal lo// sgrol ba'i cho ga bshad du gsol// zhes gsol pa las/ bcom ldan 'das ye shes rngam pa'i rgyal pos 'di skad ces gsungs
so// rnal 'byor mchog gi gang zag gis// bar chod gdug pa bsal ba'i phyir// dur khrod phug gam shing gcig gam// ngam grog lam chen chu mdo ru// sa yi cho ga legs byas la// dkyil 'khor bdud rtsi
lngas byugs la// dur khrod 'bar ba'i thig btab nas// gru gsum zla gam gsum ldan la// thod pa'i ra bas kun nas bskor// lcags sam tsher ma can gyi shing// drag po'i phur bu brgyad ldan pa// zla gam
bdun rgyab gnas la dgod// dur khrod mchod pa sna tshogs dgram// phyi nang bar chad bsal byas la// sku gsum las byung gzhal yas khang// rten gyi dbyibs dang ldan par bsgom// dbus su drag po he ru
ka/ thabs dang shes rab rgyan ldan bcas// drag tu khros pas phur bu 'dzin// zhabs bzhi bgrad pa rnam par bsam// gnas bzhi las byung khro mo brgyad// drag po'i las mdzad phur pa rnams// 'gugs shing
gsod pa'i las mdzad pa// bka' nod bskor ba'i tshul du bsgom// ye shes spyan drang mchod gsum sbyar// drag po'i byin brlab bzlas pa ste// dang por bsnyen pa 'bru brgyad bzlas// de nas las la gzud

pa'i sngags// brgya rtsa brgyad dam nyi shu gcig/ de nas rang rang sngags bzlas pa/ 'od dang sgra dang drag po yi// rtags gsum bar du bzlas par bya// oM badzra kI li kI la ya/ gau rI dgra bgegs mA ra ya
phaT// lhag ma de bzhin shegs par bya// rtags byung khugs nas gsal ldan pas// gtso bo'i phur pa snying la brdeg/ lhag ma gnas brgyad dag la sbyar// bcud bsdus bag chags gsum
bsregs nas// 'og min gnas su phaT kyis 'phang// phung po mtshon chas bsgral byas nas// bstab pas 'bar ba'i 'khor lo mnyes// dngos grub blang dang las mjug bsdu// ci rigs par ni las rnams
bya// zhes gsungs so// dpal he ru ka 'dus pa'i rgyud las/ drag po sgrol ba'i le'u ste nyi shu bzhi pa'o//// de nas yang gsang ba'i bdag pos/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// shin
tu khro zhing gtum pa la// zhi bas phan par mi 'gyur te// rmongs dang gsad dang gzir ba yi// las ni bdag la bshad du gsol// zhes gsol pas/ bcom ldan 'das ye shes rngam pa'i rgyal pos 'di skad ces

gsungs so// drag shul las kyis 'dul ba dang// zhing bcu bde la dgod pa'i phyir// rnal 'byor drod ldan snying brtse bas// dben pa'i gnas su las 'di brtsam// maN+Dal tshad dang ldan pa la// bdud rtsi dri

chen gyis byugs la// dbus su gru gsum thur brus la/ khrag chen mi ro'i sol bas byug/ tha ma zla gam khrag gi byug/ thod pa'i ra bas kun nas bskor// dbus su thod pa nag po la/ khrag sna tshogs dang dug sna
dang// nyung dkar nyung nag khrag dang bcas// zla gam mdun rgyab gnas brgyad du// phra men za byed brgyad po bzhag/ dbus su 'jigs byed 'bar ba bsam// phra men tshogs kyis bskor bar bsam// spyan drang

bstim mchod bzlas pa dag/ rtags thob bar du bzlas shing bsam/ oM sid+ha mu kha he ru lu ru lu dgra la b+h+yo// dang po bsnyen pa 'bru brgyad ste// bar du las la gzud par bya// tha ma thun gyi bsnyen pa

bzlas// 'od dang nyug dkar 'tsheg pa dang// khol dang lud pa'i rtags byung na// rten nam rang ngam phyogs su 'phang// bsgral nas yang dag 'grub par sbyar// dngos grub blang ba la sogs pa// ji ltar rig
par sbyar bar bya// zhes gsungs so// dpal he ru ka 'dus pa'i rgyud chen po las// drag po las kyis yan lag bstan pa'i le'u ste nyi shu lnga pa'o//// de nas yang gsang ba'i bdag pos/ bcom ldan
'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// sangs rgyas kun gyi sku gsung thugs// 'bar ba'i rgyal po he ru ka/ dngos grub kun gyi snying po nyid// bdag cag rnams la bshad du gsol// zhes gsol pa las/ bcom
ldan 'das ye shes rngam pa'i rgyal pos 'di skad ces gsungs so// rab tu dben pa'i gnas mchog tu// skye gnas dag pa'i rnal 'byor pas// dbang dang dam tshig sngon song ba'i// mchog gi rnal 'byor brtsam
par bya// chos rnams ma lus thams cad la// sems kyi thig le phyogs cha med// dang po bar dang tha mar yang// skye med thig ler rgyu ba spang// rang byung ye shes rgyu med pa/ gsang ba'i thig le

snying por rdzogs// yul dang dbang po rnam shes rnams/ brtags pas byang chub sems nyid de// mthong dang brjod sogs yul 'das pa'i// stong nyid ma skyes klong la thim// dang po de bzhin nyid thob nas// de

nas lha dang snying po dang// dkyil 'khor phyag rgya 'du 'phro dang// mchod dang bde ba la sogs pa// ji snyed sgo gsum dran rtog rnams// nam mkha'i cho 'phrul rang bzhin rnams// mthun par snang zhing dngos po
med// gang las gang du ci sprul pa// sems kyi dkyil 'khor rgya khyon med// mtha' thug med par rang snang ba// rang gi sems de dngos med gzhi// sems kyi dkyil 'khor don mthong na// ma lus sems las

gzhan med cing// ma skyes dngos po the tshom can// ji ltar snang grag thams cad kun// byang chub snying po gsal bar snang// spros med chos skur kun gsal phyir// dkyil 'khor sngags dang phyag rgya med// sbyin
bsreg dngos grub rdzas med cing// re dogs 'chi 'pho pha rol med// sangs rgyas sems can gnyis med cing// blang dor dge sdig cha las 'das// gtsang sme bde sdug las grol bas// lam dang 'bras bu'i
khyad par bral// gang la'ang gnas par mi byed pa// thabs chen gsang ba'i lam gnas par// rtog ge pa yi yul min te// yang dag grub pa gcig pu nyid// skye ba brgyud pa'i sdug bsngal bral// zhes gsungs
so// dpal he ru ka 'dus pa'i rgyud chen po las/ spros pa med par bstan pa'i le'u ste rtsa drug pa'o//// de nas bcom ldan 'das dpal kun tu bzang po ye shes rngam pa'i rgyal pos/ sgyu ma ye shes kyi

rnal 'byor zhes bya ba'i rtog pa 'di gsungs so// dpal ldan he ru ka yi dngos// bla ma sangs rgyas kun gyi dngos// longs spyod bu dang chung ma dang// rgyal srid bla ma mnyes byas nas// phun sum tshogs pa'i

slob ma yis// man ngag 'dod par gsol ba gdab// de nas lung ldan bla ma des// ji srid snang srid chos rnams kun// sgyu ma 'ja' tshon chu zla dang// brag cha sgra brnyan chu bur dang// mgal me lta bur bdag
gzhan brtag/ bdag gzhan yul sems rab rtogs pas// ma lus mkha' la sprin phung dang// dbu ba lta bu'i 'du shes 'byung// gang la'ang chags pa bral ba ni// yid ches brtan pa med phyir ro// bdag gi
lus ngag yid gsum ni// chu zla brag cha nam mkhar ni// byin rlabs dbang gis gsal 'gyur na// ma lus sgyu mar mngon du snang// rnal 'byor thabs dang shes rab ni// dpa' bo dpa' mo'i rang bzhin te// lnga
dang lnga la rigs bsdus pas// bde ba sgyu ma'i rnal 'byor bsgom// de bzhin gshegs pa'i dkyil 'khor tshogs// thabs chen gsang ba rab bshad ni// skye ba gzhan du mi brgyud pa'i// tshe 'di
nyid la dngos grub 'thob// phyag rgya chen po'i rang bzhin nyid// 'khor lo mngon du snang ba yis// sgo gsum sgyu ma'i rang bzhin no// rnal 'byor pa yis bsgom par bya// rang bzhin gzugs dang bde chen
dang// 'dus ma byas pa'i sangs rgyas rnams// thabs chen la gnas rnal 'byor gyis// sku gsung thugs ni gsad par bya// ji srid 'khor dang mya ngan 'das// ma lus ming gi phung po ste// de ltar brtag pa'i
don mthong na/ thabs chen skye med rnal 'byor mthong// rtog pa'i bag chags zad pa dang// sgo gsum las rgyun chad pa dang// spyod lam sgyu mar gsal gyur na// gnad kyis chags dang sdug bsngal
bral// bdud kyi tshogs rnams bar gcod pa'i// ngo bo de bzhin gshegs pas bsal// 'chi ba'i rgyu bzhi rnam spangs pas// skye gnas brgyud pa'i sdug bsngal med// ma lus sgyu mar mngon sum la// chags dang

'jig pa'i chos dang bral// phung po rlung dang sems su bcas// yid tshim zas su gang mthong ba// rnal 'byor thabs kyi spyod pa yi// bdud kyi 'tshe ba stong par log/ dang por brtag par shes par bya// tha mar
'phen pa'i sbyor ba yis// de bzhin brtag cing gnas pa la// snang ba rig pa'i thig ler bsdus// rgyu ba nam mkha' stong par 'char// shes pa'i 'od gsal thig ler thim// yul dang shes pa ma mthong

bas// phung po nyid mtshams sbyor dang bral// ma bcos 'od gsal thig le la// rol pa rang snang kun 'char yang// rgya mtsho'i rlabs ltar 'gro 'ong med// ces gsungs so// dpal he ru ka 'dus pa'i rgyud chen
po la/ yid kyi gzugs brnyan brtag cing/ sgyu ma'i rnal 'byor bya ba'i le'u ste nyi shu bdun pa'o//// de nas yang de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdag nyid kun tu bzang po ye shes rngam pa'i rgyal
pos 'di skad ces gsungs so// dbang phyug gsang ba'i rnal 'byor pas// dad dang dam tshig brtse ldan zhing// dbang thob brtul zhugs cher ldan pa// dngos grub chen po thob 'dod pas// dur khrod bas mtha'
rab dben par// bdag nyid bya ba kun rdzogs nas// yid dang 'thad pa'i gzungs ma bsten// rigs dang ldan zhing yid 'ong ba// 'jam la dal zhing na so gzhon// lus ni dar la babs pa dang// dad pa che
ba shes rab rno// brtul zhugs 'dzem dang khu 'phrig chung// spyod pa brling zhing thogs rdug med// gsang thub 'dod chags che ba dang// 'khyud brdeg sbyor ba'i las la dga'// dkar la dmar mdangs che ba
dang/ kha yi dri zhim lus rlan chags// b+ha ga bzang dang bde ba che// 'grogs shing yid dga'i bud med la// tha mal pa las bsgyur byas te// gsang ba'i yum du thabs kyis sbyar// nges pa'i

drod thob gyur pa na/ khams bzhi rlung dang zas dang gos// mthun pa'i spyod pas bsten byas te// thabs dang shes rab rang bzhin gyis// mdzes dang yid 'phrog cho ga yis// bltas dang brtag dang 'khyud pa

yis// bsnam dang lce yi ro myong dang// lus kyis myong ba che chung dang// zla gam dbang po mthun sbyar nas// dam du 'khyud cing btsir byas te// bde ba'i dkyil 'khor bsam byas las kyang/ pas// tshad dang ldan

par 'phel byas te// byang chub sems ni 'pho mi bya// gal te sems ni 'phos gyur na// lus sems ting 'dzin rgud pa dang// dam tshig dag kyang nyams pa dang// mchog gi dngos grub yal ba dang// dga' dang chags
dang bde ba dang// rgyu bcad pa yi nyams bzhi yis// tha mal gol sa bkag nas kyang// dngos grub bde chen zhing du blta// gang du bltas pas don mthong ba// tha mal pa dang dkyil 'khor

dang// chos kyi dbyings su gang mthong ba// 'khor ba'i grong khyer rnam par 'joms// gang gis gang la bltas mthong ba// spyad dang spangs dang dkyil 'khor dang// bde chen nyid dang stong nyid du// mthong dang

nges 'dzin 'du shes zad// spyad dang 'khyud dang bgang ba dang// sbyar dang glu blang blta ba dang// dmigs dang dran pa tsam gyis ni// bde ba bskyed pa'i khyad par yin// smin dang mnyes pa ma yin pa// thig le

shor na dam tshig nyams// ma myong ba dang rgyun chad dang// nges par gnas na dngos grub med// dpal dang ldan pa'i he ru ka/ 'dod pa'i dbang mo skyon bral ma// tha mal pa dang bar chad dang// 'pho ba rlung gi
'jigs pa bral// mthong ba'i bdud ni rang log pas// gnad kyi rgyu bzhi gnas las grol// gnas pa'i stobs zad rlung 'gags na// brtag dang 'phang dang dmigs pa dag/ thabs dang ldan pas pha rol

phyin// thog ma mtha' dbus med pa yi// rlung ni ma bcos de bzhin nyid// chu yi chu bur ji bzhin du// ma bcos mthong bas skye shi bral// phung po sgyu ma ming med la// zhen pas brtags pas 'chi ba mthong// rang
sems thog mtha' dbus med pas// phyi nang bdag gzhan med pa dang// 'gro ba'i dngos po kun bral bas// sems la skye shi 'du 'bral med// ma bcos rang byung phyogs bral ba// ma bcos 'dzin med ye shes
bzhag/ yengs med 'khrul pa rnam par gcad// zhen pa med pas mngon sangs rgyas// re dogs med pas bdud bzhi choms// he ni dgyes pa chen po nyid// ru ni thabs chen chags pa'i yum// ka ni bskyod pas
phrin las mchog/ ka ni mdzes pas gnyis med sku// ru ni chags pa'i gsung nyid de// he ni bde ba'i thig le nyid// ka ni 'dod pa'i dbang mo che// ru ni sgeg pa he ru ka/ he ni thig le bde chen

po// he ni yab yum 'khril ba ste// ru ni sbyor ba'i phyag rgya bzhi// ka ni thig le 'bebs pa'i las// he ni rgyu rkyen bral ba la// ru ni yab yum mdzes par snang/ gnyis med thig le bde ba che// rang la gad mos

tshul du snang// ka ni yab yum phyag rgya che// ma ni bskyed pa lha yi tshogs// la ni sbyor ba'i dngos grub mchog/ thabs dang shes rab gnyis med pa'i// nyi zla'i 'od kyi gang bu la// bskyod pa rlung gi dbang bskur
bas// ma lus bde ba chen por snang// la lar chags pas chags bral 'gyur// chags pas chags pa 'joms byed pa// thabs chen ldan pa'i skyes bu ni// dug gis dug nad sel ba'o// dngos grub zhing gyur
rnal 'byor pa// nyon mongs bar chod bdud lnga po// thabs chen thob pa'i rnal 'byor pas// de nyid de yis rnam par grol// dug nyid bdud rtsir gyur pa la// rigs min thabs kyis rnam par 'joms// de ni
ma rtogs nyon mongs dug/ thabs kyis bdud kyi bdud rtsi 'bar bar byed// ces gsungs so// dpal he ru ka 'dus pa'i rgyud chen po las/ bde ba chen por byin gyis rlabs pa'i le'u ste nyi shu rtsa brgyad
pa'o//// de nas gsang ba'i bdag pos/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// dus gsum sangs rgyas thams cad kyi// sku gsung thugs kyi rang bzhin khyod// yid bzhin nor bu chen po
ltar// 'gro ba kun gyi bsam pa bskang// dngos grub kun gyi gter du gyur// dngos grub sgrub thabs bshad du gsol// zhes gsol pa las// de nas bcom ldan 'das dpal kun tu bzang po ye shes rngam
pa'i rgyal pos 'di skad ces gsungs so// sgrub pa mchog gi rnal 'byor pa// dad dang dam tshig brtul zhugs dbang// nges par thob pa'i rgyal po yis// 'jigs pa bag tsha kun spangs te// dur khrod la sogs
dben pa'i sar// rang gi ting 'dzin las rung nas// nam mkha'i dbyings su zla ba bsgom// rang nyid sgrub pa hUM bcas bsam// de las rdo rje sems dpa' ni// yab yum 'od dang gzi mdangs bcas// ting
'dzin rim par bskyed byas nas// cho 'phrul mngon shes rim pa yis// sangs rgyas zhing khams bgrod par bya// nam mkha'i dbyings su zla ba bsgom// swA las rin chen 'od 'bar bsam// rin chen sems
dpa' yab yum bsgom// ting 'dzin rim pas bskyed nas ni// sangs rgyas zhing khams bgrod par bya// nam mkha'i dbyings kyi dkyil 'khor na// grub pa'i a las zla ba bsam// nges 'gyur hrIHsnying pad+mar
'bar// pad+ma sems dpa' yab yum bsgom// ting 'dzin lam gyis drangs nas ni// sangs rgyas zhing khams nges bgrod bya// nam mkha'i dbyings kyi dkyil 'khor na// a las zla ba'i dkyil
'khor bsam// rgya gram las kyi sems dpa' nyid// grub pa'i ting 'dzin bskyed nas ni// bdag gzhan bya ba bsgrub pa'i phyir// sangs rgyas sa la bgrod par bya// rig 'dzin sgrub pa'i rnal 'byor pa// dgon

pa dben pa'i sa phyogs su// bA yA maN+Dal lnga steng du// byis pa pho mo gtsang ma la/ khrus dang dri zhim ldan byas la// ma yengs rtse gcig bsams pas gang// bdag nyid he ru kar gsal bas// ma nor lha ni

brten byas la// bar chod bgegs ni bskrad byas la// tshangs pa dang ni brgya byin dang// mthu chen phyogs skyong 'jig rten skyong// sngags dang phyag rgya ting 'dzin gyis// bkug nas de la dbab par bya// bcings

nas 'dar zhing 'phar ba dang// dam chu blud la smra ru gzhug/ gal te smra bar mi byed na// dbang chen gsang bdag rgyal po yis// he ru ka yi ting 'dzin gyis// sngags dang phyag rgyas bsdig bya'o// bdud rtsi lce la
bzhag nas kyang/ khams gsum gtam ni smra bar bya// bdag nyid gsal ba'i lha bsgoms nas// snying gar yi ge 'bru gsum bsam// ma lus gzi byin gsum bsgoms nas// 'od lus yi ge a dkar
'bar// de nyid rim pas 'dus pa las// stong nyid a yi ri mor thim// rgyu ba chad nas zag pa bral// bde chen 'bar ba'i gzi mdangs ldan// nyi zla nam mkhar gnas bar du// 'chi ba med cing gnas par
'gyur// dam bcas 'dor dang bgegs dbang gyur// dgra dbang gyur dang mkha' 'gros gtses// sbod gtong khar 'dus dus min 'gro// tshe nyams pa yi rgyu ru bshad// gzi byin med dang lus nyams
bral// mdog nyams bya ba dor ba dang// yid mi bde zhing lus stobs chung// tshe nyams pa yi rtags su bshad// gang zhig ro langs bsgrub 'dod pas// rgyal po rje'u bram ze'i rigs// cho rigs btsun zhing
dar la bab// bzhin legs rma med btsal byas nas// legs par bkrus shing dris byugs nas// stegs bu'i steng du gzhag par bya// rtsa ba las sngags steng du ni// drag po ro langs sngags kyis dgug/ phyag

rgya bzhi yis dbab par bya// snum dang krag dang mnar byung na// 'og tu gzhum zhing drag sngags bzlas// 'dar dang 'phar dang sgra byung na// rdo rje ro langs grub pa ste// bdud rtsi dam phog gtam dris na// bden
par smra bar bra ru 'gyur// bslang la mna' bkag dam phog la// las bcol ro langs rkang mgyogs 'gyur/ kha nas lce hrIHbyung sos gcad de// ro la brdabs na gser du 'gyur// lce gcod thod pa ral gri
ste// mgo bcad go mtshon g.yul bzlog ste// sde brgyad dmag kyang 'joms 'gyur na// rmongs pa mi lta smos ci dgos// bdag nyid las kyi sems dpa' ste// 'og tu zla ba'i dkyil 'khor

bsam// de 'og rlung gi dkyil 'khor te// drag zhan mtho dman rtags dang sbyor// ting 'dzin rlung gi gom pa yis// phyogs bcur bsam pas phyin par 'gyur// chu steng yang nang zla ba thim par bsam// de steng
rdo rje rgya gram bsam// mngon du gsal bar gyur pa na// ting 'dzin ma yengs stobs kyis bgrod// rgya mtsho 'bab chu la sogs par// thogs pa med par 'gro bar 'gyur// bdag nyid rdo rje sems dpa'
ste// thugs ka'i hUM ni grangs med pa// nam mkha'i rdo rje'i skas kyis gtams// gang dga' sa phyaugs bgrod pa ni// sems kyi spyod yul yangs par 'gyur// bdag nyid gang rung lhar bsgoms la// zla ba'i
dkyil 'khor steng gnas te// de 'og rlung gi dkyil 'khor bsam// rlung la rlung gis bskyod bsgoms pas// gang la dga' ba'i sa phyogs su// mkha' la thogs pa med par 'gro// thugs rjes 'gro ba'i don
byed na// bdag nyid drag po'i lhar gsal 'bar// rol pa'i dkyil 'khor mngon bsam ste// bar chod bgegs ni bsal bar bya// ro la nges pa'i khrus byas zhing// shes pa bstims byug rgyan btags

la// 'khor ba'i rtog pa sbyang byas la// dkyil 'khor nyid du bsam bya zhing// rang rang lha yi snying po dag/ ras chen dag la bris te gdags// yang na de nyid me yi lha// rigs dang mthun par gsal bsgoms
nas// rang gi mchod pa gang rigs pas// dkyil 'khor lha la mchod par bsam// yang na rol pa'i dkyil 'khor gyi// thugs rje 'byung ba'i dkyil 'khor te// drag shul sgrol ba'i ging chen des// gdug pa ma
lus bkug bstims nas// drag po stobs kyis bsgral nas ni// 'khor ba'i sa bon bsregs nas ni// cho ga gsum gyis lha bskyed nas// 'og min sbyor ba'i lhums su 'phang// ye shes tshogs su bsngo bar

bya// phung po lhag ma bsgral ba ni// lha yi tshogs dang sbyar nas ni// rdo rje gsang ba'i glu blang zhing// bsreg rdzas mchod pa'i skongs su 'bul// rdo rje gdungs pa'i glu blang zhing// bkra shis gnas kyi smon lam
gdab// mi dge sdig pa'i bag chags dngag/ gdung ba'i glu dang bcas te bshags// rdo rje me ri'i lha rnams kyang// legs nyes rab 'bring tha ma brtag/ ngan zhing bag chags ma byed na// lan gsum bsreg

par byas na ni// ngan 'gro nges par skyes pa yang// thar bar 'gyur te the tshom med// 'di dag rim par brtsam pa yang// rnal 'byor lam la zhugs pa dang// tha mal pa dag spyad pa dang// ma shis gdon gyis
nyan pa la// rim bzhin las ni brtsam par bya// dngos grub yid bzhin 'grub 'dod na// byams dang snying rjes gzhi gzung nas// ma nor snying po'i don rtogs nas// ting 'dzin sngags dang phyag
rgyar ldan// dad dang brtson 'grus brtul zhugs kyis// bar chad med par bsgrubs pas na// lo dang zla bas 'grub par 'gyur// zhes gsungs so// dpal he ru ka 'dus pa'i rgyud chen po las/ dngos grub kyi
rtog pa bstan pa'i le'u ste nyi shu rtsa dgu pa'o//// de nas yang gsang ba'i bdag pos/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// dus gsum sangs rgyas thams cad kyi// ma btsal rang shar phrin
las bdag/ thugs rje phrin las lhun gyis grub// phrin las rim pa bshad du gsol// zhes gsol to// de nas bcom ldan 'das dpal kun tu bzang po ye shes rngam pa'i rgyal po des 'di skad ces bka' stsal

to// byang chub sems ni rdul dang bral// che ba'i yon tan mkha' dang mnyam// cir yang snang yang nyid la 'dus// chos nyid ngang la rnam rtog med// gangs 'dabs dang ni chu gling dang// nags tshal sman ljongs

me tog tshal// phug dang grog mdo'i 'jigs pa dang// dur khrod shing gcig ma mo'i khyim// rnam par snang mdzad dkar po dang// rdo rje rin chen gser gyi mdog/ mtha' yas pad+ma rA ga ste// rdo rje yis ni sna

tshogs mdog/ oM trAM hrIHhUM las byung ba'i// rang gi 'khor dang bcas par bsgom// zhi ba la ni zlum po ste// rgyas pa'i thab khung gru bzhi pa// dbang gi dkyil 'khor zla gam la// drag po'i e ste mkha' 'dra'i

dbyibs// 'khor lo rin chen pad+ma dang// rdo rje yis ni rnam par brgyan// dA ru Na dang stobs 'byin dang// 'dod pa skyes dang khro bar bshad// dad pa dang ni dga' ba dang// chags dang khros pa'i sems su

bshad// rgyal po rje rigs smad 'tshong ma// shan pa'i me ni blang ba dang// mdzes ma dang ni phyug mo dang// smad 'tshong ma dang yugs sa mo// dngul dang gser dang zangs ma dang// lcags kyi phur pa bsngags pa

yin// sngags kyang rang rang sngags nyid la// shAn+tiM puSh+tiM ku ru dang// ba shaM mA ra ya yis mdzes// zho dang 'bras dang nas dkar dang// mar sar 'o ma bzhi la sbyar// mar rnying phrum dang gro chan dang// thud dang dri

zhim shing rgyas pa// 'bru mar sbrang rtsi sha chen dang// 'bras dmar chan dang tsan dan dmar/ khrag dang sha chen tshil chen dang/ khrag gsum dug dang mi rus bcas// gsod par byed pa'i mchog tu 'gyur// dbyar dang ston
dang dgun dang dpyid// snga gro gung dang dgongs ka dang// nam gung rnams ni dus yin no// nad dang sdug bsngal zhi ba dang// tshe dang longs spyod rgyas pa dang// dgra bgegs gzungs ma dbang bya
dang// dgra bgegs gdug pa tshar gcod dang// dgos che 'bras bur bshad pa yin// chos kyi 'khor lo nang gi gnas// dbyibs dang kha dog la sogs pas// rang bzhin las dang thabs
bcas pa// phrin las bzhi ru grub pa yin// b+ha ga gsang ba'i ngo bo las// phrin las bzhi yi rang bzhin gnas// dbyibs dang kha dog las rnams kyis// e baM ma yA grub par gnas// rlung dang bla ma'i byin

rlabs kyis// rnam par rtog pa'i rdul zhi zhing// bde ba chen po rgyas pa dang// lus dang rlung dang snang ba dang// rnam rtog phyi nang snod bcud rnams// bde ba'i dbang du gyur pas ni// rnam par rtog pa'i gzhi med

pas// phyis mi 'byung bar sngags kyis gsad// ngo mthon gsad pa'i dam tshig gis// rdo rje gsad pa'i rang bzhin ni// sangs rgyas dang ni sems can dang// phyi nang snod bcud ma lus pa// rdo rje rtogs pa'i ye

shes kyis// ma lus par ni dus gcig bsgral// rang byung thugs rje'i phrin las kyis// gang la ji ltar 'dul ba dang// ma bkag rlabs kyis spyod pa ni// sangs rgyas kun gyi spyod pa ste// thog mtha' med pa'i

rdo rje sems// dpa' chen he ru ka yi dngos// thog mtha' med pa'i phrin las ni// ji ltar 'tshams pa bzhin du snang// zhes gsungs so// dpal he ru ka 'dus pa'i rgyud chen po las// phrin las lhun gyis grub
pa'i le'u ste sum cu pa'o//// de nas gsang ba'i bdag pos/ 'di skad ces gsol to// dus gsum sangs rgyas thams cad kyi// gsang ba gsum la gnas pa'i bdag/ gsang ba kun mkhyen rgyal po
yis// gsang sngags lam ni bshad du gsol// zhes gsol to// de nas bcom ldan 'das dpal ye shes rngam pa'i rgyal pos 'di skad ces gsungs so// e ma ho sangs rgyas thams cad kyi// thabs chen dri ma
med pa'i lam// dka' thub dka' spyod 'bad pa med// nyon mongs gzir dang zhen pa med// 'dod pa lnga la spyod byed cing// bde bas byang chub 'grub par 'gyur// dang po tha mal zhen bsal nas// byin

brlab dam tshig ldan byas te// phyi nang zhen pa kun bsal nas// gang du zhen pa kun brtags nas// 'du shes yid 'dzin bral ba yi// stong nyid ma skyes rnal 'byor bsgom// ma skyes pa ni sna tshogs don// de
nyid dngos po med gnas pa'o// sgyu ma smig rgyu ltar snang ba'i// ma lus sgyu ma'i rnal 'byor bsgom// dngos po gsang ba gsum gyi dngos// gdan stengs gsal ba de nyid kyis// ma lus zhen pa gsum dag

nas// phra mo'am phyag rgya chen por bsgom// de nas rim par gsal bsgoms la// rtsa ba'i lha ni tshang 'gyur la// yan lag dgu sogs kun tshang nas// sangs rgyas dkyil 'khor grangs med snang// spyod lam ye
shes lhar gsal nas// dur khrod rab dben bas mtha' ru// dur khrod rgyan dang mchod par bcas// dur khrod gsang ba'i rol mor bcas// rnal 'byor pho mo grangs ldan pas// mos dang spyod
pa'i brtul zhugs bcas// 'bar ba lnga yi bro glur bcas// lo 'am zla ba'i grangs bzhin du// thabs dang cho gar ldan spyod pas// zag med nam mkha'i lam la gnas// skye 'jig med pa'i skur 'gyur

te// bskal pa grangs med tshe la dbang// bden pa'i nges mthong 'jig pa med// ting 'dzin grangs med dbang thob nas// bskal pa bye ba grangs med du// yengs med ye shes phyag rgya che// he ru ka yi rdul phran

ni// stong gsum khyab par gsal ba la// spyod lam log dang ma log med// goms pa mthar phyin mthar thug sa// sangs rgyas rdzu 'phrul cher grags shing// mngon shes rdzu 'phrul ye shes ldan// yon tan lhun
grub ngo mtshar che// rang byung ye shes 'bar ba ni// gsang ba mthar phyin gsum gyi bdag/ rang byung rtsal 'chang bdud 'dul zhing// dpa' bo bdud 'dul bdud kyi gnyen// skad cig tsam la thogs pa

med// dang po med pas ma byung ba// thog ma tha ma dngos med pa'i// rang byung mtha' dbus med pa yi// de bzhin chos nyid chos kyi sku// nam mkha'i mtha' la longs spyod pa// rang byung 'khor lo 'od kyis
bskor// rol pa'i longs spyod bde dang ldan/ 'khor lo sangs rgyas mngon thob nas// cho 'phrul nam mkha'i mthar thug pa// sprul pa 'gro 'ong med pa yis// nam mkha'i skar tshogs bkram pa ltar// 'phel
'grib phyogs char yongs las 'das// rgya mtsho chu yi rba rlabs ltar// grangs las 'das kyang nyid la rdzogs/ ye shes lha mo dpag med pa'i// zhal phyag bde ba'i dbang thob pa'i// ye shes nam mkha'i
mthar thug pa'i// bde ba chen po nyid du gsal// ye shes chen po 'dod chags ste// lha mo ye shes rol pa las// bde chen nam mkha' mtha' dbus med// sangs rgyas kun gyi rang bzhin ni// thog ma tha ma med

pa yis// ye shes rgya mtsho tshad dang bral// che ba'i yon tan grangs med pa// rdul dang mnyam pa'i rang bzhin shar// chos dang longs spyod rdzogs pa'i sku// thugs rje'i sprul sku khyab tshad med// gang du sangs rgyas
rnams ni sku gsung thugs// phyos bcu nam mkha' khyab par gang gnas pa// rang byung ye shes thugs rje chags dbang gis// ji srid 'khor ba'i bar du rgyud mi 'chad// smon lam ye shes bar chad mi mnga'
ba// ji srid 'khor ba rgyun cha bar du ni// me bsnyel thugs rje'i dbang gis 'khor bar bzhugs// nam mkha'i nor bu bsam pa yongs rdzogs shing// dpag bsam shing ltar 'dod pa skong mdzad pa// ma rig
mun sel 'gro ba'i sdug bsngal sel// ye shes ri bos blta ngan rnam par sel// bde ba chen po longs spyod rdzogs pa'i sku// mtshan dang dpe byad 'od 'bar mdzes ldan ni// ye shes lha mor zhal
sbyor dam 'khyud cing// lce 'jib sen 'debs chags pa'i gar stabs kyis// ye shes thig le'i char gyis rab rgyas bde ba'i sku// sna tshogs rnam 'phrul dgyes pa'i gar thabs ni// dga' dang mdzes dang
chags dang rol pa dang// 'bar dang bsdigs dang 'gred dang mnyes pa dang// sprul pa'i gar dgus 'gyings pa yis// 'gro ba'i bsam pa yongs rdzogs lhun gyis grub// ces gsungs so// dpal he ru ka
'dus pa'i rgyud chen po las// rnal 'byor 'bras bu'i le'u ste so gcig pa'o////
de nas yang de bzhin gshegs pas dgos pa chen po 'dod chags gsang ba'i ngo bo kun tu bzang po ye shes rngam pa'i rgyal pos 'di skad ces gsungs so// dpal he ru ka 'dus pa'i rgyud chen po 'di ni phyogs

bcu dus bzhi'i sangs rgyas ma lus pa'i sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje'i ngo bo yin pas// de la gnas par gyis shig/ sangs rgyas kun gyi ngo bo gcig par bslab par gyis shig/ thig le chen po phyos med par
bslab par gyis shig/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams dang/ sems can thams cad dang// phyi nang gi dngos po thams cad sems nyid do// sems nyid ni thog ma dang tha ma med pa'o// ngo bo nyid la go 'byed pa'i
stong pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i rang bzhin/ dpag tu med pa'i ye shes kyi by-in rlabs can/ dus gsum 'dus ma byas pa la// yengs pa med pa'i tshul du gnas par bya'o// stong las stong min ye shes he ru
ka/ ma bcos chos nyid 'byor pa sna tshogs gzugs// gang yang ma yin bde dang mi bde min// chags min bral min bde mchog rtog pa'i rgyud// gsang bdag khyod kyis legs par nan tan gyis// 'dri 'chad
klog dang 'dzin bsams la// bdud dang log 'dren bgegs kyis mi tshugs la// bsam pa yid bzhin nor bu lta bu 'phel// dus min 'chi dang nad dang sdug bsngal dang// skye rgas na 'chi'i rba klong 'khrugs
pa dang// mi mthun phyogs bzhi'i bdud las rnam par rgyal// dad dang gus dang mos pas 'chad pa dang// nyan dang 'dzin pa rdo rje 'dzin pa yin// de bzhin bde gshegs rgyal po'i sras po ste// thogs med
'khor ba rgya mtsho pha rol phyin// mkha' 'gro shugs 'gro rig 'dzin bka' nyan rnams// bran bzhin bka' nyan rjes su 'brang bar byed// de phyir gsang ba'i bstan pa bzung bar gyis// zhes gsungs so// de
bzhin gshegs pa ma lus pa thams cad dgyes par gyur te/ dkyil 'khor chen po ma lus pa thams cad nyid kyi sku gsung thugs rdo rje la zhugs nas/ dus gsum gyi chos thams cad skad cig ma

gcig la bde ba chen po nyid/ dbyings thog ma dang tha ma med pa'i thig ler thim nas mi snang bar gyur to// ta thA ga ta thams cad kyi sku gsung thugs rdo rje'i rang bzhin/ dpal he ru ka 'dus pa'i rgyud chen po
las/ rgyud gtad pa'i le'u ste so gnyis pa rtsa rgyud rdzogs so//// zhus chen gyi lo tsA ba bai ro tsa nas bsgyur pa'o// nam mkha'i snying pos bsgyur ba yang yod do////
